item.text: @#/ /rgyud ca pa bzhugs so//
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra mA la a b+hi d+ha na ma hA yo ga tan+ta sarba tan+t+ra hr-i da ya
ra ha s+ya bi b+he da kaM i ti/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon
par brjod pa rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang pa rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba/ 'phags
pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par
@##/ /snang mdzad chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon
mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la tshad med pa'i
phyag rgya chen pos mngon par rtogs pas bzhugs te/ dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i rigs dang 'brel pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs cig tu thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po mngon par
rtogs pa mngon du bya ba la bzhugs pa/ gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong bas dgyes pas mchog tu pad+ma dgyes pa/
chos thams cad kyang ji lta ba bzhin nyams su myong ba mthong bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na nyid la mngon du phyogs pa/
rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dam tshig bla na med pa'i dbang du gyur pa la rab tu mkhas pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe sdang rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po chags pa rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rdo rje ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
@#/ /chu rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rlung rdo rje dang / de lta bu rnams gtso bor gyur pa dam tshig chen po'i rigs dang 'brel pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cu rtsa
gnyis dang / gzhan yang rigs chen po dang 'brel pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' rnam par rgyas pa dang /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i gtsug
tor dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshams rnams kyis nges par grol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje
dam tshig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje longs spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rdo rje spyi bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i sbyi gtsug
dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i dam tshig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu
dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna tshogs dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje dang /
@#/ /gzhan yang dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i theg pas lhag par grol pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan
'das de yang chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ shin tu bskor/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa shin tu yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni/ shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa de
'khor la zhal rab tu 'dzum par bcas pas bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po rnams la gzigs
nas de dag snod du rung bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa'i rdo rje theg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las 'od
zer gyi dra ba chen po bkye ste bzhugs so/ /'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la reg bas mchog tu dga' ba thob pa ni/
gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ji lta ba bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag nyid dga' ba dang /
bde ba dang / mchog tu mgu bskyes nas brgyal bar gyur to/ /de nas yang de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spur 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po bsdus par gyur to/ /bsdus pa
de yang rdo rje'i lam nas lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyi 'od zer chen po nye bar byung bar gyur pa nges brgyal ba de dag la reg nas rdo rje phreng ba lta bu nyid rdo rje'i lam nas gtsug tor gyi
'khor lo la zhugs nas gnas so/ /slar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bde ba chen po rjes su myong bar gyur te/ rdo rje'i yi ge hUM brjod pa de nyid kyis bde ba
chen po de nyid nyams su myong ba nyid kyi thugs ka'i lte ba'i rtsa sbubs nas 'od zer chen po phyung ste rang gi stan la 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas de rnams chu'i gting nas thon pa lta
bur sems dga' ba skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo mtshar chen po'i cho 'phrul mthong nas shin tu mig gdangs te bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs gcig gis yang dag par
bstod do/ /bcom ldan ro gcig gyur pa yi/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas rgyas/ /bcom ldan mchog tu ngal bso kye/ /ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul 'das/ /bcom ldan nyid kyi
dgyes nyams ltar/ /'gro ba gsum po yang dag bde/ /a ma'o lhan cig skyes bdud rtsi/ /ro bsten thugs rje chen po skye/ /bcom ldan sems can thams cad kyi/ /sems can don
kun gsal bar mdzad/ /de nyid gsum gyi ro gcig pa/ /phyag rgya chen po rab dbye ba/ /bcom ldan rnal 'byor che la dgyes/ /'ching ba thams cad gcod mdzad kyi/ /bcom ldan
@#/ /dgyes pa cher mdzad cing / /'gro ba skal bzang nges par mdzad/ /e ma'o rdo rje theg pa bde/ /rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba stsol/ /e ma'o sngags ni rab rgyas
pa| |rang byung go 'phang sgrub pa po/ /e ma'o shin tu zab mo'i chos/ /dmigs pa med par ston par mdzad/ /e ma'o rdo rje 'chang chen gtso/ /gsang ba'i dbang po shin tu gsang //
e ma'o mchog tu byang chub pa/ /e ma'o sbros pa rnam spangs shing / /bden pa'i don ni gsal mdzad pa/ /theg pa'i sgron mas snang bar mdzad/ /mgon po bdag cag khyed drin
gyis| |rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang thob/ /mgon po bdag cag lam log zhugs/ /khyed kyis yang dag lam la bkod/ /mgon po bdag cag mun par 'thom/ /ye shes
snang ba thob par mdzad/ /dam tshig rdo rje nyi ma kye/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don ston mdzad/ /bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thugs rje'i phyag rgya che bdag nyid/ /phyag 'tshal
gnyis med dga' ba'i mkha'/ /dga' ba'i zla ba khyed la 'dud/ /ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa mdzad nas slar yang 'dus par
gyur te/ rdo rje'i phreng ba mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba shin tu phra ba'i sa ji lta ba'i ngo bo 'dri bar 'dod nas yid la byed pa gcig pa dang / sems rtse gcig gis dga' bar byed
pa'i gsung nyan par 'dod nas ba spu ldang ba dang / dbugs g.yo ba dang bcas pas yang dang yang du bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed cing rang gi stan la 'khod nas sems re dogs
dang bcas pas gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi de lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas slar yang rdo rje'i phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang ba'i rdo rje las rang gi rig ma phyung ste/ sgeg ma la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa bdag nyid kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs
nas sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i gzugs blangs nas rang rang gi rig ma la 'khyud de phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor la rjes su zhugs nas slar yang de dag de lta bu'i
gzugs nyid du mthong ste ngo mtshar skyes nas mig gdangs te ri mo'i bkod pa lta bur mthong ba nyid kyis ci yang mi smra bar gyur pas de la 'khor rnams yang dag par 'khod par
gyur to| |de nas bcom ldan 'das rang gi rig ma yang dag par bskul te phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor dor nas nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las btsun mo rdo rje rigs kyi snying po 'di
gsungs so/ /oM AHhUM/ de nas de skad du gsungs ma thag bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu ga las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rig ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'
@#/ /dang / khro bo'i rgyal po rnams phyung bar gyur to/ /phyung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur te/ kha cig ni/
rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs kyis so/ /kha cig ni/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzugs kyis so/ /kha cig ni/ 'od dpag tu med pa'i gzugs kyis so/ /ji srid gnod mdzes rgyal po
dang / /gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba yi/ /rgyal po'i bar gyi gzugs kyis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das cung zad cig ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe byang chub
sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi dbyangs gcig gis ched du brjod nas smras pa ni/ e ma'o rdo rje rigs chen po/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i don ston mdzad/ /e ma'o rdo rje theg gsal ba/ /
chos kyi dbyings kyi don ston mdzad/ /ces lan gsum brjod nas de dag gis rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig thang gcig yud
tsam de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po 'dus pa de dag mthong nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan ye shes rdor dbang phyug /gsang ba'i pad+ma'i nang bzhugs pa/ /dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor dbang / /thugs rjes bdag gi tshig gson cig /bskal
ba bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje theg pa mngon 'dod pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /'di dag lus kyis phyag 'tshal 'khod/ /snyigs ma lnga yi dus na ni//
ma 'ongs pa yi sems can rnams/ /brtson 'grus chung zhing bsod nams chung / /lta ba ngan pa mang po dang / /tshe thung ba yi sems can rnams/ /go 'phang mchog ni thob phyir zhu/ /
rgyal ba'i sras ni de dag dang / /ma 'ongs pa yi sems can rnams/ /'khor ba las ni pha rol tu/ /gang gis myur du thar par 'gyur/ /gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen la/ /'di ltar bdag
ni gsol ba 'debs/ /'gro ba'i gtso bo khyod drin gyis/ /de nyid mchog ni bdag gis 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba yi/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa/ /bla na med
pa'i rim pa gnyis/ /rdo rje phreng ba mngon rtogs pa/ /cung zad 'dri bar 'tshal lags kyi/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /khyod kyis bdag la bstan du gsol/ /dpal ldan
'dus par brda tsam gang / /rnal 'byor bla na med rgyud du/ /thub pa chen pos chos phung po/ /brgyad khri dang ni bzhi stong ngo / /de skad smras nas mdun 'dug ste/ /lus kyi phyag ni byas
nas kyang / /ye shes chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'gro ba'i bla/ /rdo rje gsum ni ro gcig don/ /de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang thob/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi sbas pa'i
@#/ /don| |bdag la bstan par mdzad du gsol/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i ming ni ci/ /'dus pa ci zhig stong pa ci/ /thig le'i dbye ba dang ni sgra/ /gsang ba dang ni dam tshig dang / /
sdom pa dang ni sgra tsam dang / /rlung gi de nyid bde chen ci/ /rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor dang / /sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor pa/ /rlung rnams dang ni 'khor lo dang / /grangs ni ci tsam gang
du gnas/ /rnal 'byor lus la rtsa gang lags/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sogs skad cig /dga' ba bzhi dang rdzas dang ni/ /sngags dang rlung dang thig le zhes/ /yi ge gsum gang
de nyid gsum/ /de bzhin sna yi rtse mo gsum/ /lus kyi stong nyid ye shes dang / /lha rnams kyang ni ji ltar gnas/ /de rnams kyi ni ming ni ci/ /'char ba dang ni nub ba ci/ /mgon
po dga' rnams ji ltar ni/ /yang dag skye ba gsal bar gsungs/ /sngar bshad rtsa rnams rtag tu ni/ /rdo rje'i lus la ji ltar rgyu/ /mtshams kyi rtsa gsum de dag ni/ /gtso bo ru
ni ji ltar gsungs/ /rlung rnams ji ltar ldang ba dang / /gtso bo de rnams ji ltar thim/ /de ni mkha' 'gro mar sdud pa/ /gtso bo ji ltar yang dag 'thob/ /rnam rtog rlung ni rab bcad
nas| |rnam rtog med par ji ltar 'char/ /rtsa rnams ji ltar nub pa dang / /sbyor ba drug gis ji ltar rtsom/ /dus kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu/ /gsang ba'i yang ni 'bras bu ci/ /chos

kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje dang / /rigs kyi dbye ba ji lta bu/ /phyag rgya'i dbye ba ji tsam zhig /phung po la sogs skye mched dang / /phyag rgya chen po'i ming ni ci/ /ro rnams kyi ni dbye ba dang / /bdag
gi sgra ni gang la gnas/ /stong nyid dbye ba bsdus po dang / /stong pa nyid ni gang du skye/ /nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo gang / /A li kA li brda dang ni/ /mtshams kyi 'char ba ji lta bu/ /
rgyud gsungs sngon ni bsnyen pa sogs/ /cho ga nyi shu'i las dang ni/ /rgyu mtshan ci zhig 'bras bu'ang ci/ /mchod pa'i cho ga ji ltar gsungs/ /de bzhin lha mo'i rang bzhin dang / /lha mo'i
ming ni ji ltar gsungs/ /rgyud du thog mar gsungs pa yi/ /'di skad bdag sogs ji lta bu/ /'di skad ces sogs dang po'i ngag /don rgyas par ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyin
sreg ci| |bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' ba dang / /rnal 'byor ma tshogs 'dus pa dang / /de bzhin gsang ba'i brda dang ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni ji ltar gsungs/ /sangs
rgyas dam chos dge 'dun gyi/ /ming rnams bshad pa ji lta bu/ /bla ma ston pa slob dpon dang / /rdo rje 'chang ni bshad pa ci/ /slob ma'i yon tan gang ldan na/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi snod du 'gyur//
de yi dpyod pa'i dbye ba du/ /de yi 'bras bu ji lta bu/ /zhib rgyas pa dbang dang ni/ /de bzhin bsad dang bskrad pa dang / /rengs par byed pa nyid dang ni/ /bsgrub bya la ni mngon spyod dang / /
@#/ /sngags kyi tshig ni ci zhig dang / /mgon po khro bo'i bzlas ba ci/ /dngos grub brgyad ni thob pa dang / /mngon shes lnga ni ji ltar thob/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyis de nyid
mthong / /skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub/ /lus brtan pa dang rgas pa med/ /bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba dang / /gser 'gyur sogs kyi sbyor ba dang / /rdo rje'i
phyag rgya dngos grub che/ /'gro ba'i bla ma ji ltar 'thob/ /lus kyi rang bzhin gzhal yas khang / /de ni rang bzhin ji lta bu/ /'dis ni gnas sogs ji ltar gnas/ /thim
dang longs spyod bdag po dang / /rlung ni gang gi mtshan nyid ci/ /de dag 'jig par ji ltar 'gyur/ /de ltar dri tshig rdzogs pa dang / /lag na rdo rje thal sbyar te/ /'gro ba'i bla ma'i
mdun 'dug nas/ /lus kyis phyag byas de nas ni/ /gtso bos rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /legs so bya ba byas nas ni/ /tshangs dbyangs zab mo snyan pa yis/ /'gro ba'i mgon pos
gsungs pa yin/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ gsol ba gdab pa dang / dri ba dang / slob ma'i las nyid la sogs pa rgyud kyi gleng
gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /de nyid gsung gi 'gro mgon gyis/ /lag na rdo rje la pos te/ /yang dag dris pa nges bshad
pa| |snying po'i don ni don bsdus pa/ /dbye bar dka' ba'i dngos po kun/ /khyod gyis dri bar byas pa rnams/ /rdo rje dbang phyug gsang chen bdag /bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud rnams dang / /rnal
'byor rgyud ni gang du yang / /mchog tu gsang ba ma gsungs pa/ /rdo rje'i dbang phyug de nyid mchog /dris pa'i lan rnams gsal por ni/ /nges par nga yis rab bshad bya/ /skad cig gis
ni sbyan phye la/ /mchog tu rmad byung ston mdzad la/ /thugs rjes khyab par de skad gsungs/ /de phyir khyod ni legs par nyon/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rjes thugs brlan cing
the tshom thams cad gcod pa la phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab ste mchog tu gsang ba'i tshig gis bshad pa gsungs pa ni/ dbang bskur ba ni gtso bo ste/ /dngos grub thams cad rtag tu
gnas/ /da yis ji bzhin don bshad kyi/ /de phyir thog mar yang dag nyon/ /thog mar slob ma gang gi tshe/ /blo ldan yang dag dbang bskur na/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /de yi
tshe na snod du 'gyur/ /yang dag dbang bskur gyis dben na/ /sgrub pos rgyud kyi don zhes kyang / /slob dpon slob mar mtshungs par ni/ /mi bzad dmyal ba chen por 'gro/ /de phyir yang dag bla
ma ni| |rab tu gus pas bsnyen bkur bya/ /dbang bskur thob cing de nyid shes/ /blo ldan snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /zab cing rgya che dri ma med/ /gnod dang 'tshe ba rnam par spangs/ /skal bzang
@#/ /lus ni rdzogs pa dang / /mtshan dang dpe byad rnam par brgyan/ /chags pa che la gcig tu dga'/ /yul la phrag dog rnam par spangs/ /bag yod rtag tu dga' pha
dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi mngal nas skyes/ /rdo rje theg la gcig tu mos/ /theg pa dman la rgyab kyis phyogs/ /de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan/ /bla ma slob mas bsnyen bkur bya/ /yang
dag bla ma rnyed nas ni/ /slob ma'i rang bzhin dri ma rnams/ /dag dang rtogs dang smin byas nas/ /ji bzhin ye shes bzang dang ldan/ /ji ltar rin chen brdar ba dang / /gser ni bsregs
dang bcas pas brtag /de bzhin du ni slob ma yang / /lo ni bcu gnyis par du brtag/ de phyir phan tshun de lta bus/ /dus kun tu ni de ltar brtag/ gzhan du bgegs ni 'byung 'gyur
te| |dngos grub 'joms shing sdug bsngal ster/ /dug ni sngags kyis 'joms pa bzhin/ /sngags kyis dge byas bcud len byed/ /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sngags kyi slob ma
rtogs byas nas/ /bla ma dbang bskur la sogs kyis/ /dngos grub phyir ni ji lta'i don/ /de phyir dbang bskur slob ma ni/ /ma dag pa yang dag par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen la//
de la lag na rdo rjes zhus/ /dbang bskur ji ltar rgyud du ni/ /gtso bo ru ni gsungs pa lags/ /rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen/ /the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa/ /de kho na
nyid mkhyen pas ni/ /lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa/ /don de ji lta ba bzhin du/ /nga yis yang dag bshad kyi nyon/ /dbang bskur ba yi dbye ba ni/ /dang po'i dbang ni gtso bo ste/ /gnyis pa
gsang ba'i ming can no/ /gsum pa kun nas sbyor ba ste/ /bzhi pa'i don ni dam pa'o/ /gtso bo dbye ba bcu gcig ste/ /bcu gnyis pa ni gsang ba 'o/ /bcu gsum pa ni yang dag sbyor/ /bcu
bzhi pa ni don dam ste/ /dbang bskur re re sa re'o/ /rnam pa gsum ni rgyu yi dbang / /bzhi pa 'bras bur shes par bya/ /dga' ba la sogs rim pa yis/ /thams cad la ni nga yis khyab//
mar ngo yi ni tshes gsum dang / /de bzhin tshes bcu tshes bcu bzhi/ /yon tan bzang ldan slob ma la/ /bla mas cho ga bzhin dbang bskur/ /lus phra lo ni bcu drug lon/ /gzugs dang
skal pa dag gis brgyan/ /sngo bsangs mig ni yangs pa dang / /snying rje'i bsam ldan yang dag mos/ /dag snyan dbang bskur thob pa dang / /rnal 'byor rgyud la lhag par mos/ /yang
na lo ni nyi shu lon/ /nyams dga' bde bar byed pa ste/ /de las lhag pa skal med 'gyur/ /de ni dngos grub ring du byed/ /lhag par 'jam pa'i bu mo la/ /chung ma 'am yang na sring
mo'am/ /yang na bu mo'am dad pa yis/ /bla ma la ni dbul bar bya/ /gser dang rin chen gos dang ni/ /me tog phreng ba sna tshogs pas/ /mchod nas bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas/ /
@#/ /slob ma yis ni 'di skad brjod/ /deng nas brtsams te bdag bran du/ /gtso bos bdag ni mchod pa bzhes/ /de lta'i rnam pas mnyes nas ni/ /bdag nyid kun gyis bla ma
mchod| |bla ma'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang / /de phyir yang dag bla ma mchod/ /de nas bcom ldan yum phyag rgya/ /yang dag mchod nas bsten par bya/ /bsten pa las ni gang byung ba/ /ltung ba
skal bzang kha la ni/ /sbom po tha ltag sbyor ba yis/ /yang dag par ni longs spyad bya/ /de las skyes pa'i ye shes ni/ /bde ba chen po rang rig pa/ /'byung rngub pa ni ro gcig cing //
rab tu dga' bas mchod par bya/ /hUM phaT sngags ni nor bu'i sgor/ /bkod de rdo rje rab bskyod bya/ /dga' rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ /skad cig de la skyes gyur pa/ /dga' ba'i sems
kyis bde ba la/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i kha nas brjod/ /de yang slob ma'i lag tu ni/ /gtad nas gsal bar 'di skad brjod/ /ji ltar pad mchod bya ba ni/ /byos la e baM mchog gi gdong //
gang phyir rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ rang nyid 'di yi snying la zhugs/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa yis thob mi 'gyur/ /shin tu phra ba'i dngos de yang //
bde chen rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsten par gyis/ /lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid ni/ /dbang bskur gtso bor gyur pas na/ /thams cad ji lta ba bzhin
thob| |rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ slob dpon dang slob ma brtag pa dang / /dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas de nyid gzhan
yang nyon/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i don gsal ba/ /rgyud rnams kun tu spas pa ni/ /dri ba gzhan la brjod mi bya/ /rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya'i ming / /de yangs ni bcu gsum pa/ /dga' ba bzhi yi don gyi
gnas| |thams cad stong pa dga' ba ste/ /ngag gi spyod yul rnams las 'das/ /gnyis pa thams cad rnams par spangs/ /skal bzang rnal 'byor kun gyi mtha'/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dag

gi yul/ /stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang / /rdo rje phreng ba zhes bshad do/ /stong nyid rdo rje gsang pad+ma/ /rtsa ni rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug /ye shes mchog tu bde ba che/ /lhan cig skyes dga' rmad
byung ba| |rdo rje de yang rnam rtog rnams/ /'bigs par byed par yongs su grags/ /phreng ba de rnams kyi yang rgyun/ /byang chub sems kyi rdo rje rnams/ /mi phyed pas ni rdo rjer gsungs/ /rgyud
rnams kun tu spas pa ni/ /gang yang rung bas brjod mi bya/ /de ni dbugs su yongs su grags/ /phreng ba rgyun ni mi 'chad par/ /dga' ba rab 'bab bdag nyid kyis/ /rnam rtogs rlung
kun 'bigs par byed/ /rlung la 'bigs par mi nus so/ /nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu ni/ /brgya dang brgyad lhag gsal bar yang / /rnam rtog rang bzhin rlung rnams ni/ /'char ba
@#/ /dang ni 'joms pa dag /ji lta ba bzhin rab dbye yis/ /rlung rnams kyi ni ming nyon cig /btang bzung dang ni dung phyur dang / /myos pa dang ni blo ngan dang / /bsil byed
dang ni g.ya' ba dang / /ngar snabs dang ni sta re dang / /gzegs pa chu srin dza sha dang / /rnam par gtsigs dang myos pa'i dus/ /'dod myos chu ba chu srin dang / /sna tshogs skyed dang

'dud pa dang / /snyems dang rnga dang sgra sgrog dang / /rlung lha dang ni gnad 'bigs dang / /me dang dus dang ci bgyi dang / /rdo rje mchog sbyin tsu ta dang / /sbrang ma dang ni zla ba'i 'od/ /kam po dza
dang ral pa can/ /yungs nag rab bkram dus 'gugs dang / /sdig pa dang ni g.yon can rten/ /grims mo dang ni mgrin pa dang / /kun sel mchog ster smyo byed dang / /nga rgyal mtsho dang
tshogs bdag dang / /rtsangs pa dang ni sa yi blo/ /theg pa bzang dang mchog tu skyes/ /dri med phru gu nyi ma dang / /gsal byed dang ni nyi ma gnon/ /stobs bzhin nga ro dang ni dus/ /sdom pa dang
ni mchongs nas 'gro /sbrang ma khyi dang mtshan ma dang / /thong dang sgyur po drang po dang / /sa dang sa la 'gro ma dang / /bram ze dang ni sna 'gyur gnas/ /ma mo'i rigs dang lce bskyod pa/ /mi
smra dang ni rnga sgra'i sprin/ /dga' bar byed dang mig yangs dang / /dri med 'od srung ne tso dang / /sna tshogs mchu dang mig mnyam dang / /mdzes dang chos kyi dbyig pa dang / /'gro kun

snying stobs brtan pa dang / /za bod bong bu snyom las dang / /kha gdangs sgra chen stobs kyis rtse/ /rtsa bran dbang byed g.yo sgyu can/ /gtso bo che dang rtag tu dga'/ /glog phreng dang ni dga' byed dang / /

dbugs 'byung ra ga lce dang ni/ /bde mchog u dum ba ra rmongs/ /pad+ma'i dra ba pad+ma bskor/ /dgra sta rma bya rlung dang ni/ /rdo rje dbang phyug rlung gi ming / /de ltar nga yis bstan pa yin/ /bcom ldan
dris pa'i rlung rnams kyi/ /gnas rnams kyi ni dbye ba yis/ /de dag gang las ldang ba dang / /mched pa rnams su bgyid pa lags/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rlung gi khams kyi
mtshan nyid ni/ /'khor lo drug la khyab pa'i rlung / /chos kyi 'khor lo rtag tu gnas/ /srog ces bya bas 'gro la khyab/ /rnam rtog med pa mtshan phyed na/ /nam mkha' mchog las shar nas
ni/ /rlung gi rang bzhin 'joms bar byed/ /rlung de dgu yi rnam par rgyu/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i cha na gnas/ /mtshan phyed dus nas brtsams nas ni/ /'khor lo drug la dgu bdag nyid/ /
nyi ma phyed kyi mtha' ru ni/ /rlung rnams kyang ni ldang bar byed/ /nyi ma phyed nas brtsams nas ni/ /'khor lo drug las dgu bdag nyid/ /mtshan phyed kyi ni dus kyi mthar/ /rlung rnams
gsal bar rgyu ba dang / /de nyid gnas kyi dbye ba yis/ /sna tshogs pa yi rtog par 'gro /rnam par rtog pa rnams phye nas/ /de dag ming rnams bshad par bya/ /'dod chags zhe sdang
@#/ /gti mug dang / /rgyags dang nga rgyal mngon par zhen/ /phrag dog khro dang ser sna dang / /g.yo dang sgyu la cha lugs ngan/ /blo rgod brkam chags gnyid dang ni/ /the
tshom dang ni ngar 'dzin dang / /dga' dang chags bral dregs pa dang / /'chab dang sred dang bag chags dang / /sgyu dang rmongs dang 'dod chen dang / /rtsod dang rtse 'jo spyi brtol dang //
tshul 'chos dregs dang kun nas gdungs/ /rnam 'gyur ma zhi shes bzhin med/ /bem po log pa'i nga rgyal dang / /'gyod dang khrel ni med pa dang / /gus pa med dang ches pa med/ /blo
dman ngo tsha med dang 'ching / /ngo tsha shes dang ngo tsha dang / /mi ster ba dang mya ngan dang / /yid gnyis dang ni rlom sems med/ /bsgrims dang the tshom ngal ba dang / /dbang dang 'khrul
pa'i snying stobs dang / /snyam sems pa dang brgyal ba dang / /thim pa dang ni mi srun dang / /gya gya snyoms dang myos pa dang / /rig byed min dang bag yod dang / /gnas ngan len dang
nyam chung nyid/ /yid mi bde dang lhag par rtog/ skrag dang rmugs dang gnyid dang ni/ /brkam chags rol pa khrung khrung dang / /'tshe ba le lo yon po nyid/ /bsam dang spyod dang
zhum pa dang / /kun rdzob de nyid don yod dang / /ster dang dga' ba'i 'dod pa dang / /'jigs dang 'dar dang pra bdag nyid/ /gsal dang rnam gsal lhad 'jug dang / /'brel
dang rtag pa'i de nyid dang / /rus sbal ngoms med gnod pa dang / /mi gsal ba dang yid du 'ong / /gnas med mang du smra ba dang / /bdag nyid skyas bu nyid dang ni/ /ya mtshan dga' dang skye bo
ngan| |dman pa'i de nyid sdug bsngal gsum/ /'khor ba la ni chags pa dang / /rtag tu brgya dang brgyad lhag pa/ /nyin dang mtshan mor rtag tu ni/ /rlung gi rang bzhin rgyu ba yin/ /rnal
'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ rdo rje phreng ba'i tshig dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas rdo rje gsum nyi ma/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma kha
'byed pa/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang bzhugs/ /'dus pa'i mchog don rab gsungs pa/ /'dus pa 'dres pa zhes ni bshad/ /'dres pa nga yis khyod la bshad/ /'khor lo bzhi dang tha
mi dad| |sngags ni lhan cig cho ga bzhin/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba/ /gang tshe gsang ba'i rtsa gnyis ni/ /yang dag sbyor ba reg gyur pa/ /de tshe nam mkha' rnam rgyas nyid/ /nam
mkha' las ni skyes pa'i rlung / /de yis me ni rab tu 'bar/ /rtsa ni stong phrag bdun cu gnyis/ /rtsa rnams rab sang gzi brjid kyis/ /bde ba kun gyi go 'phang mchog /bde ba chen
po'i 'khor lor khyab/ /bde ba chen po'i byang chub sems/ /rnam par zhu nas rtsar gnas pa/ /rdor gsum rang bzhin gcig 'gyur phyir/ /khams rnams ro gcig gyur pa dang / /
@#/ /phung po rnams ni yongs zad dang / /ngal bso pa la rlung rnams ni/ /dga' ba rnams ni yang dag skye/ /de nas byang chub sems kyang ni/ /gnas kun nas ni zhu gyur nas/ ngo bo
gcig tu gyur pa dang / /rtsa ni gcig gi 'bras bu ni/ /ro gcig tu ni gyur pa la/ /'dres pa zhes ni de la gsungs/ /phung po khams dang dbang po dang / /yul rnams su ni sbas pa
rnams| |rnam rtog kun nas zad pa las/ /bde ba chen po yang dag skyes/ /ro gcig pa ni ngal bso ba/ /de ni 'dus pa 'dres pa ste/ /de kho na nyid mchog gsang ba/ /rdo rje sems

dpa'i go 'phang gsungs/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /'dus pa'i tshig lhag par bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon/ /stong nyid don ni rab rgyas pa/ /stong pa nyid ni chos rnams kun/ /nang du khyab pa'ang chos nyid de/ /de nyid yang dag shes pa ni/ /de bzhin nyid dang
rnam mi rtog /bdag dang gang zag chos rnams ni/ /bdag med rang bzhin gcig pa nyid/ /stong pa nyid dang rang rig dang / thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs pa/ /rnal 'byor
gcig pus rtogs pa ste/ /rtog ge pa yi spyod yul min/ /chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdus pa/ /'khor lo drug tu rnam par brjod/ /de nas nang du'ang khyab pa ni/ /rtsa yi
'khor lo legs rgyas pa/ /de ni nam mkha' khyab cing phra/ /khyab byed zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /dmigs pa med cing rten pa med/ /gzugs med nyon mongs med pa dang / /rnam par mi
rtog mchog tu zhi/ /rang bzhin med cing dri ma med/ /gnyis su med cing bya ba med/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /dus dang dpe las 'das pa ste/ /ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul
bral| |chos nyid chos ni thams cad kyis/ /ji lta ba bzhin mngon par brjod/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par bral/ /dge dang mi dge'i srid las grol/ /de ni kun nas bsgribs pa med/ /
nam mkha' lta bur mchog tu khyab/ /chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin skye/ /de ni de bzhin nyid ces brjod/ /gang nas kyang ni ma 'ongs shing / /gang du yang ni 'gro ba med/ /rmongs dang 'khrul pa
gcig pu las/ /de ni rab tu spro bar snang / /bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal spangs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang sogs mi gos/ /'khrul dang rnam par 'khrul par 'brel/ /rtog pa dang bral dri ma med
bdag dang srog dang skye ba po/ /skyes bu de bzhin gang zag dang / /shed las skyes dang shed bu dang / /byed pa po dang tshor ba po/ /shes pa po dang mdzod pa po/ /sgro 'dogs pa ni rnam par
spangs/ /phung po skye mched khams la sogs/ /rnam shes dang ni gzung ba yis/ /sgrib pa med cing mchog tu phra/ /nam mkha' mchog la yang dag gnas/ /de ltar ma lus stong nyid don/ /
@#/ /brjod dang brjod bya'i don dang bral/ /ming tsam gcig pu kho na yang / /rang byung mchog tu rmad byung ba'o/ /brjod pa yi ni kun rdzob tu/ /de ni nga yis yang dag
bshad| |rang rig shin tu phra ba'i phyir/ /de kho na nyid mthong ba med/ /bdag nyid rang gi ngo bor rig/ /pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul min/ /de ni rang rig par bshad do/ /chos kun gnas
ni zhi ba'o/ /rnam rtog gis 'khrul rtog ge gang / /mi shes pa yi rmongs pa rnams/ /don dam par ni mi shes shing / /kun rdzob dgra yi mdzod 'dzin pa/ /ye shes mchog ni mi shes shing / /
rtog ge stong nyid smra bar byed/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan rnal 'byor bas/ /de ni mchog tu phra bar spyod/ /stong nyid yang dag nam mkha' che/ /shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs/ /rtog
pa'i rnam pa rnams dang bral/ /stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lor brjod/ /phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus/ /'khor lo drug gi phug nang na/ /zla ba phyed ba'i cha lta bu/ /stong nyid rlung gi 'khor lor
gnas| |phyed min gang ba med pa dang / /ji ltar bag chags chu zla bzhin/ /rlung gi 'khor lo srog tu bshad/ /mtshan phyed skad cig ma la 'char/ /de ltar yang dag sgom pa ni/ /
'di ni stong nyid sgom byed pa'o/ /don dam gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis/ /yang na rgyu 'bras sbyor ba'i phyir/ /de ni rang bzhin 'grub par sgom/ /don dam rang gi ngo bor ni/ /kun rdzob
kyang ni de bzhin du/ /bsgoms pas 'khor ba 'joms par 'gyur/ /ji ltar til la til mar ni/ /gnas pa nyid la mthong mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin lus la stong pa nyid/ /gnas kyang bsgribs
pas mthong ba med/ /bla ma'i zhal las 'di shes par/ /yang dag rig pas kun rdzob spangs/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi don
bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /thig le'u dbye ba bla na med/ /'jig rten thig le dbye bas dben/ /'khor bar yang dang yang du 'khor/ /mdzod
spu'i dbus na gnas pa ni/ /thig le rlung du yang dag bshad/ /sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'byed/ /rnal 'byor mdud pa bkrol nas ni/ /rlung gi de nyid rig pa de/ /mchog tu 'byed pa'i sbyor ba
yis| |sbyor ba de yang mi shes par/ /rlung dang sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /brjod dang brjod bya'i dpe las 'das/ /mi gsal log par mthong rnams kyis/ /bsam gtan bsgom bya dang
bral ba'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni thob pa dka'/ /rnal 'byor ma yi drin gyis ni/ /zhal nas zhal du brgyud nas gnas/ /bcom ldan bde ba chen po la/ /rdo rje sems dpas slar zhus pa//
'gro ba'i mgon gyis bstan du gsol/ /thig le'u dbye ba rig bcas pa/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni gang gis shes/ /sbyor bas mdud pa 'byed par byed/ /khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba 'di//
@#/ /myur du dngos grub mchog tu 'gro/ /de skad zhus nas rdo rje can/ /rdo rje dbang phyug la gsungs pa/ /mchog tu gsang ba 'di nyid ni/ /gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs
pa| |thig le'i dbye ba de yang ni/ /nga yis bshad kyi de nyid nyon/ /snying gi pad sbubs nam mkha' la/ /ye shes rdo rje rtag tu bzhugs/ /steng dang 'og la brten nas ni/ /srog dang thur
sel rlung chen gnas/ /de la'ang dbye bar dka' ba yi/ /dbus su mdud pa gsum gyis dkris/ /de yis mchog dang bcom byas pas/ /steng du 'gro ba thob mi byed/ /des bcom slar
yang rnam lnga rgyu/ /srog dang thur sel gyen rgyu dang / /khyab byed dang ni mnyam gnas nyid/ /rtse mo lnga las rgyun du ni/ /rtsa lnga la ni yang dag brten/ /rgyags dang rnam par rgyas pa dang //
myos dang btung dang mdza' bo ste/ /de dag rtsar ni lngar shes bya/ /rdo rje'i 'og tu gsal bar khyab/ /steng gi srog gi dbus na yang / /rdo rje'i lte ba'i mkha' dbyings 'gro/ /srog ces bya
pa'i rlung chen po/ /lte ba mdud pa dang phrad pas/ /bcom nas kyang ni rnam lngar rgyu/ /rtse mo rnams la rtse lngar ni/ /zla ba'i cha dang sma dang ni/ /bsnyen bkur lkog shal mchin pa ste/ /rtsa

ni lnga yi ming yin no/ /rtsa ni lnga las rgyu ba'i rlung / /klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang / /lhas sbyin dang ni gzhu las rgyal/ /de ltar rtse de dang bcas pa/ /lus kyi thur du 'gro bas na/ /sprul
pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams ni/ /yang dang yang du bskul byas nas/ /bskul bas kyang ni rgyas pa na/ /gti mug chen pos dbang du byed/ /de steng chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ /gnas pa'i rtsa ni bskul byas
nas| |de rnams lhan cig rtsa de dag/ zhe sdang gis ni dbang du byed/ /yang dag bskul nas de steng gi/ longs spyod mchog tu ngo mtshar skye/ /rtsa de rnams dang lhan cig tu/ /chags pa chen pos
dbang byas nas/ /bskul ba dang ni de steng gi /spyi bo'i 'khor lo'i bde chen du/ /rtsa de rnams dang lhan cig tu/ /byang chub sems kyis gang bar byed/ /rnam rtog rnam par rgyu byed cing / /sna tshogs
dbye ba thams cad las/ /steng ma rnams kyang thur du 'gro/ /srog gi rab tu bcom nas ni/ /de dag thams cad rdo rje'i rtser/ /zhugs nas thur du kha bltas pa'o/ /de yang thur du mi 'gro ste/ /
ma rig mdud pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /rnam par shes pa'i shing rta'i rlung / /de ni bag chags dang 'dres pas/ /mig dang rna ba de bzhin sna/ /lce ste rnam par shes pa bzhi/ /rtse mo bzhi nas
phyung nas ni/ /bag chags rnam shes dang 'dres nas/ /rnam shes dbang po lhan cig tu/ /don ni rab tu rgyas par byed/ /slar yang lam de nyid nas ni/ /ji lta ba yi rim pas 'jug/ de
yi dngos nyid de sbyor bas/ /rnam shes bsten pa'i skad cig la/ /de yi bag chags bcas kyis 'phel/ /'khrul byas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las/ /de ltar bag chags kyis bslab
@#/ /pa'i| |rnam shes las kyi ngo bor 'gro/ de nyid kyang ni srog sbyor bas/ /khams gsum par ni 'khrul pa'o/ /byed po las kyi 'bras bur myong / /gzhan nyid du ni 'khor ba
med| |de phyir 'khor pa gzhom don du/ /thig le go 'phang gsal bar dbye/ /sgom pa la ni 'bad par byed/ /ma rig gzhan ni mi shes pa/ /dbus kyi mdud pa de yang ni/ /de phyed na
ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor grub pa ste/ /ye shes lnga ni thob nas ni/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob pa dang / /mchog tu gsang ba thob nas ni/ /blo bzang ji lta ba bzhin
gnas| |phreng ba mi dgos sgo mi dgos/ /bya ba mi dgos dgag mi dgos/ /sngags kyi de nyid gcig pu yis/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob/ /las chos dam tshig phyag
rgya yi| |dbye ba 'di ni mi gsungs so/ /'khor lo'i dbye bas ma yin zhing / /de bzhin dga' ba sogs kyis min/ /phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang gsal/ /sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni thob/ /
stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang / /gnyis med bde ba de nyid dang / /gsang ba'i thig le'u dbye ba dang / /rnal 'byor grub pa'i bde chen po/ /ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed cing / /'jig
tshogs lta ba'i ri bo 'joms/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dang / /rab tu byed pa mchog tu bshad/ /sngags kyi de nyid nges sbyor bas/ /rigs shing yan lag gsal ba gang / /
rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin dang / /bla ma'i zhal las nges rtogs 'gyur/ /man ngag med pa'i bzlas ba ni/ /sngags kyi rgyal po blo rmongs byed/ /de yi dka' ba gcig pu dang / /chu bsgrubs mar
ni mi 'gyur ltar/ /de bzhin man ngag dang bral sngags/ /skyes bus ji srid 'tsho yi bar/ /bzlas kyang de yi 'bras bu yi/ /cha tsam thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi shes pa yi mi 'ga' zhig /rgya
mtsho'i gzhi yi pha mtha' yi/ /sa la shin tu 'gro 'dod pa/ /lam ni gang yin mi 'dri gang / /de ltar bdag nyid 'gro bar byed/ /de bzhin dga' ba cher byed pa'i/ /man ngag dang bral sgrub
pa po| |'bras bu med cing mkhas pa yang / /sgrub pa po ni khong khro skye/ /khong khro skyes pa'i skad cig la/ /'bras bu med cing du 'bod 'gro /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /dad pas bla ma
brgyud pa las/ /man ngag dag ni bslab par bya/ /gang phyir brgyud pa'i lung gis khyab/ /brgyud pa'i rim pas gnas par byed/ /de ni rnal 'byor ma zhal dang / /bla ma'i zhal las 'bad pa
yis| |de nyid mchog ni bslab par bya/ /sngags kyi man ngag brgyud pa'i lung / /de thos lag na rdo rjes kyang / /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /the tshom thams cad gcod pa la/ /phyag byas
nas ni zhus pa ni/ /khyed kyis bstan pa de nyid mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ni/ /sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med/ /gang bslab skad cig dngos grub 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan
@#/ /rdo rjes gsungs/ /sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba/ /de nyid mchog tu gsang ba ni/ /gang du'ang nga yis ma bshad pa/ /skal ba med pa bsam pa'i rgyus/ /rgyud
rnams kun tu sbas byas la/ /da ni nga yis bshad kyi nyon/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med/ /sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa yis/ /gang gi myur du dngos grub 'gyur/ /thog mar uSh+ma'i
tha ma bri| |dbyangs yig drug pas rnam par brgyan/ /sde tshan tha ma'i mtha' dang ldan/ /dbyangs med pa yi cha dang bcas/ /uSh+ma'i mtha' la dbyangs yig 'di/ /dgu pa dang ni
yang dag ldan/ /mthar ni tsheg drag mchog gi sgra/ /sngags kyi gtso bo btu bar bya/ /de ltar yi ge gnyis kyi ming / /sngags kyi brda ni rmad byung ba/ /'dzin pa thams cad spangs pa'i
phyir| |sgra dang thig le'i ming du byas/ /rlung gnyis kyis ni phye nas ni/ /ma rig mdud pa 'byed par byed/ /phyag rgya chen po mchog gi rgyu/ /mchog tu zhi ba'i yi ge gnyis/ /man
ngag thob pa'i 'dod pa'i don/ /gang gis zla ba drug bzlas na/ /thig le'i sgra yi go 'phang gsal/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed/ /skye bos dben pa lha yi gnas/ /sgra yi tsher
ma rnams dang bral/ /bgegs med skal bzang nyams dga' ba/ /skyed mos tshal bzhi bde ba che/ /'dod pa lnga la longs spyod pas/ /sngags kyi gtso bo 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di
na gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /khyim du bde ba'i phyag rgyas gnas/ /gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /sgrub po bde ba'i stan 'dug nas/ /mig gnyis sna rtser gtad byas nas/ /
sna ni lte ba'i tshad du bzhag /phrag gong bsnyams la lce rkan sbyar/ /so dang mchu ni bde bar bzhag/ dbugs kyi 'byung rngub glod nas ni/ /cung zad cung zad rtsol bral nas/ /ji lta ba
bzhin 'byung rngub ni/ /rdo rje skyil krung legs gnas pas/ /de ltar phyag rgya dang ldan pas/ /yi ge gnyis ni rtag tu bzlas/ /thig le'u dbye bas bde ba che/ /zla ba drug gis rnal 'byor
mchog/ /thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /rtsa ba'i rgyun ni dang po 'di/ /a ba d+hU ti dri med gnas/ /rlung gi de nyid ye shes che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni rgyu/ /ri lu ral gri ro langs
dang / /rgyal po mig sman bcud kyis len/ /dmag dpung rengs dang rtsig pa'i bags/ /rig 'dzin gyi ni go 'phang mchog /mi snang ba dang gter mthong ba/ /'dod rgur sgyur dang gzugs
mthong dang / /gser 'gyur dang ni dug las rgyal/ /mi yi nang du 'jug pa dang / /mngon shes lnga yi go 'phang dang / /ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar skad cig gcig la ni//
byang chub mtshan nyid go 'phang ngo / /dka' ba spyod pa spangs nas ni/ /shes rab snying rje yang dag ldan/ /bshad pa'i bde ba chen po rten/ /sdom pa mi dgos sbyin sreg min/ /phreng ba
@#/ /mi dgos bgrang mi dgos/ /'di ni bskyed rim dbye mi dgos/ /gsungs pa'i dka' thub sogs mi dgos/ /sngags kyi rnal 'byor gcig pu yis/ /bla ma'i
zhal las brgyud pa dang / /zla ba drug gis mngon sbyor bas/ /go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /thig
le'i dbye ba dang / rnal 'byor mchog thob par byed pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon/ /bla na med pa na de'i don/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni//
tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub 'gyur/ /sgra yang mi shigs par ni bshad/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal dri ma med/ /rnam pa kun las rnam par grol/ /lte ba sprul pa yang dag gnas/ /sprul
gyi lce ltar phra ba ni/ /gnyis med ye shes rmad byung ba/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang / /dbang phyug dang ni rtag zhi ba/ /de dag de ltar rin po che/ /skyed pa po yi pha dang mas/ /ya
ge med cing gong ba med/ /'byung ba chad pa rnam par spangs/ /dus dang rtog pa rnams las grol/ /skye med zad med rmad du byung / /'dzin pa kun la zhen la sogs/ /spangs shing
lhag ma med pa dang / /mchog gi mchog ste zhi ba med/ /dngos po kun gyi dbus na gnas/ /rnam rtog med cing rten pa med/ /kun gzhi rnam zhes gsungs pa/ /nyon mongs
can gyi yid kyis ni/ /bem po rnams kyis sad par byed/ /mchog tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis/ /thob pa'i go 'phang bla na med/ /gnyis med mchog tu gsal ba dang / /rlung gi de
nyid yang dag rten/ /yi ge hoHyis bskul nas ni/ /me yi 'khor lo sad par byed/ /de lta'i nA da'i go 'phang don/ /bla ma'i zhal la yang dag gnas/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo
rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /nA da'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i don/ /bla na med pa bshad kyi nyon/ /gsang ba b+ha
ga zhes su gsungs/ /b+ha ga de bzhin chos 'byung ba/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang rten/ /dga' ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni gnas/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid
gsal| |ye shes chen po spros pa med/ /rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /bral dga'i mtha' ste mchog tu phra/ /lhan cig skyes dga' kun bdag gnas/ /dga' bral la sogs
skad cig gnas/ /phra ba yang dag byang chub sems/ /srog la phan bar 'tsho ba ste/ /srang mda' 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas/ /dus bral rnam rtog med pa ste/ /stong nyid skye med 'chi ba med//
sprul pa'i 'khor lor thim pa dang / /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo skye/ /bsam gyis mi khyab zhi ba ste/ /chags bral 'gro kun skye ba med/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/ /bde ba thams cad
@#/ /ster bar byed/ /rlung gi de nyid rig pa yis/ /rtsa ba'i dbus su 'dzin par byed/ /gang de skye ba nyams myong bar/ /gsang ba zhes ni bya bar grags/ /de nyid gsang ba
yi ni mchog/ bla ma'i zhal la lhag par gnas/ /phan tshun brgyud pa'i rim pa yis/ /bla ma bzang po'i zhal nas shes/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon
par rtogs pa las/ gsang ba chen po'i tshogs ma lus par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang sdom pa'i don/ /de kho na nyid bshad kyi nyon//
sdom pa srung bar byed pa gang / /de ni byang chub sems zhes brjod/ /rdo rje'i rtse mor sems 'dzin pa/ /de ni srung pa zhes ni grags/ /dbang po rnams ni yul rnams la/ /'jug
cing rtag tu gang gnas pa/ /de ni sdom pa srung ba dang / /dam tshig srung bar bshad pa yin/ /gdul dka' tshul 'chos g.yo sgyu can/ /rmongs dang sems khros g.yo can dang //
dad med rtog ge pa lhan cig /rtags kyis nye bar 'tsho ba dang / /nyan thos nor la brkam chags can/ /de kho na nyid sun 'byin cing / /don dam pa ni mi shes pa/ /med par lta dang
tshul khrims 'chal/ /gtam dang tshig ni kyal pa dang / /'dri ba la sogs mi bya zhing / /se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang / /de dang lhan cig gnas mi bya/ /las kyi phyag
rgya nyams dga' ba/ /gal te byis pa'i skye bo dang / /de dang lhan cig dam tshig ni/ /mi bya rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur/ /bskyed na dam tshig dbus zhugs dang / /pad snod phyag
rgya sogs brten dang / /brkam dang 'brel pas 'jug pa dang / /dam tshig la ni 'jug mi bya/ /snod dang cang te'u gri gug dang / /glegs bam dang ni bgrang phreng dang / /dam tshig med
pa gzhan dag la/ /gang du'ang bstan par mi bya'o/ /dge slong sdom la gnas pa la/ /rnal 'byor spyod sogs bya ba dang / /man ngag rnams ni bstan mi bya/ /ras ris la sogs mi
bstan cing / /gang gis dam tshig lhan cig tu/ /ji ltar spyod pa yang dag spyod/ /bla ma la yang smra min na/ /gzhan rnams la ni smos ci dgos/ /dbang po yul la spyod pa ni/ /gang
nas de ni bsdams nas ni/ /stong nyid gnyis med sgyu ma la/ /sogs pas kun rdzob ltag spyad na/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur sogs/ /nyams su myong ba'i bde ba yis/ /
bde ba chen po'i dran pa yis/ /dbang po rnams ni yul las ldog /bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa dang / /ye shes snyems sogs nges spangs pa/ /blo ldan rdo rje dbang phyug gi/ yang
dag sdom pa bshad pa yin/ /de lta bu sogs dam tshig ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rtag bsrung bya/ /gzhan du rnal 'byor rnams par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa rdo rje can/ /bgrang
@#/ /phreng dang ni dbu rgyan dang / /rus pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya dang / /glegs bam bsam gtan ras ris dang / /thod pa la sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /thams cad du ni
dngos grub phyir/ /bla ma la yang sba bar bya/ /sngags ni tshig tu brjod mi bya/ /mchu 'gul bar yang mi mngon zhing / /cung zad mgrin par brjod bya yis/ /sngags kyi rgyal po de
ltar bzlas/ /gsang las dngos grub mtshungs pa med/ /gang phyir de ni sdom par bshad/ /snod min nor ni chen po dang / /ldan yang rgyud las skyon du gsungs/ /bla mas bla
med dngos grub phyir/ /'bad pa yis ni spang bar bya/ /bza' btung gos la sogs pa dang / /nor ni chen po la chags shing / /snod min slob ma man ngag mchog/ rmad du byung ba
smra ba gang / /rnal 'byor shes pa tshe 'di la/ /de ni dmyal ba du 'bod 'gro/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ sdom pa'i tshig gtan la dbab
pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon/ /dam tshig don ni bla na med/ /bza' ba yi ni dam tshig gang / /de ni de yi don bshad bya/ /bza' ba ru ni bshad pa
gang / /de ni bdud rtsi lnga ru brjod/ /rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis/ /zhu nas ro gcig slar yang ni/ /rdo rje lam nas steng song ste/ /gcig tu gyur pa bza' ba'o/ /dam tshig lus dang
ngag yid kyis/ /de nyid gsum dang gang shar dang / /'khor lo bzhi po rnams la yang / /bde ba nyams su myong ba gang / /de dang ro gcig rnal 'byor pa/ /rtag tu spyod pa bza' ba'o/ /byang
chub sems kyi de nyid mchog/ bde ba chen po'i go 'phang thim/ /zhu ba rlung gi de nyid kyis/ /bza' ba bsam gtan bzang po'o/ /spyi bo thod pa'i slad nas ni/ /de tsam rnal 'byor pas rtag
tu| |de la snying rje btung ba ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde ba che/ /snod mchog gsang ba'i pad+mar blugs/ /rten ni bza' ba rab rtogs byed/ /sems kyis bdud rtsi 'thung byed ni/ /bdud
rtsi lnga yi ro rdzas 'thung / /de za ba ni rdo rje 'chang / /glang po rta khyi ba lang mi/ /byang chub sems dang bcas pa'i khrag/ bsres nas skad cig de la bza'/ /de ni bdud rtsi lnga zhes brjod/ /
rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis/ /stong pa nyid du gsal ba'i snod/ /rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'/ /stong nyid ye shes pha rol 'gro/ /dga' ba gsum pa'i bde ba ni/ /lhan skyes lhan
cig snod du ni/ /rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas/ /rnam rtog rlung rnams thams cad ni/ /zhi ba'i de nyid snod bzang por/ /rlung gi de nyid shes pas
bza'| |rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang gnas/ /phyag rgya gsum dang yang dag sbyor/ /phyag rgya chen por bshad snod du/ /rnal 'byor de nyid shes pas bza'/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i ga
@#/ /'phang gnas/ /rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis/ /sgom dang sgom min sogs 'khrul pa/ /srog chen po yi snod du ni/ /rnam rtog dra ba'i sa bon tshogs/ /phung po'i
bud shing snod bzang por/ /ye shes chen po'i me yis min/ /sngags kyi de nyid rtogs pas bza'/ /bdud bzhi'i khro bo chen po yi/ /stobs kyi rig pas sgrub pa po/ /sgrub pos legs
par mnyam bzhag nas/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor snod du bza'/ /rlung dang sngags dang rdzas rnams kyi/ /thig le gsum ste bla na med/ /mi shigs go 'phang snod du ni/ /zos na rnal 'byor
pha rol 'gro/ /stong nyid ye shes mtshungs med pa/ /snying rje'i snod kyis mchog tu ni/ /ye shes chen po'i mnyam bzhag nas/ /btung zhing rtag tu btung ba'o/ /phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces
su bshad/ /rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyor/ /de kho na nyid mchog skyes gang / /de ni skal ldan snod la ni/ /rnal 'byor pas 'thungs nyams dga' ba/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i de nyid mchog/
nyon mongs dang bral lhan cig skyes/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don bsgrub bya/ /de lta bu sogs dam tshig sogs/ /gzhan ni gang du'ang ngas ma bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog /
bla ma'i zhal las gsal bar rtogs/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ dam tshig gi don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //
da nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /sgra tsam don ni bshad par bya/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /'pho ba med pa'i go 'phang 'thob/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i pad sbubs su/ /sgra tsam yang
dag gnas pa ni/ /chags med snang ba med pa dang / /gnyis su med cing dri ma med/ /dpe bral g.yo ba med pa dang / /gzhi med bla gab med pa dang / /lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog/ 'byung
dang rngub pa rnam par spangs/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi lha dbang phyug/ /de lta bu ni rnyed par dka'/ /mchog tu zhi ba bde ba che/ /gzugs mchog 'chi ba med pa'i mchog /rten cing 'brel 'byung
rang bzhin gyis/ /rgun chang ro yis myos pa ltar/ /mchog tu nang du song gyur nas/ /de bzhin rnam pa kun gyi gnas/ /sngags kyi de nyid rig pa'i rten/ /rang gi nyams myong rtog pa'i
gnas/ /de nas ston pa bla med pa/ /rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa ni/ /bcom ldan de nyid zhi ba mkhyen/ /sngags kyi de nyid rab dbye ba/ /gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /de kho
na nyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /sngags kyi de nyid bla na med/ /mchog dang rab mchog phra ba dang / /ye shes chen po mchog chen po/ /snying po yi yang
snying po mchog /yang dag bshad kyi mnyan bar gyis/ /rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa rnams/ /gsang ba'i go 'phang 'pho ba med/ /lte ba'i 'khor lo de nyid mchog /sgra tsam du ni
@#/ /yang dag gnas/ /stong nyid chen po'i dbus su thim/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gsal/ /gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang / /snang ba med cing kun rdzob
med| |gnyis med ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis/ /sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba/ /thog ma med cing zhi ba dang / /dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer
med pa| |byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni/ /de tshe thog mar stong nyid sgom/ /snang ba med pa'i go 'phang zhi/ /rang bzhin med gnas nyams dga' ba/ /rnam rtog med la
mchog tu rten/ /stong nyid ye shes mtshungs pa med/ /byang chub sems kyi rgyud dang ni/ /yi ge hUM las yang dag byung / /rnal 'byor shes pa rmad byung che/ /de nyid gsum ni
ro gcig don/ /a ba d+hU ti'i go 'phang gnas/ /slar yang dga' ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /'jug pa la sogs rnam par spangs/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ni/ /byang chub
sems ni dri ma med/ /sna tshogs skad cig dbyer med pa/ /rjod pa'i bdag nyid dbyangs bral ba/ /rtag tu gnas pa'i rgyun gyis kyang / /byang chub sems ni 'bab pa ni/ /sngags
kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni thob/ /skye med zhi ba'i thig le tsam/ /sngags kyi spyod pas spyad pas na/ /ye shes mchog ni rang rig pa'o/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba
mngon par rtogs pa las/ sgra tsam gyi don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas rlung gi de nyid mchog /don dam pa ni bshad kyi nyon/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rlung
bsgoms na/ /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rlung gi thig le ye shes che/ /phra zhing de gnyis go 'phang gsal/ /dngos grub kun byed nyams dga' ba/ /gnyis med rnal 'byor
mi zad ba/ /skye med kun 'gro zhi ba dang / /lus rnams kun la khyab pa dang / /ma pham stong pa bsam mi khyab/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /sgom dang bsam gtan rnal 'byor
gyis| |thig le rang gi ngo bo shes/ /chos rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i gnas/ /sngags kyi de nyid kyi ni rgyu/ /bag chags kun las rnam par grol/ /kun mkhyen bde ba kun gsol ba/ /sna yi
rtse mor de nyid mchog /'od zer thig le bsam par bya/ /srog dang rtsol ba yang dag sbyor/ /rtog pa rnams kyi grangs ster ba/ /skal bzang ye shes lnga yi bdag /sangs rgyas lnga yi cho ga
ni| |rin chen lnga yi sbyor ba'i gzugs/ /'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid tsam/ /thog ma lus kyi phyag rgya'i dngos/ /ngag gi grangs kyi zlos mtshan nyid/ /yid kyi rnal 'byor che la zhen/ /sgom
pa'i go 'phang mi bzad pa/ /dbugs kyi tshogs ni bgrang ba dang / /rlung gi rnam par dpyad pa dang / /gnas kyi dbye ba rtsa rnams kyi/ /dus kyi dbye ba rtogs pa dang / /rlung rnams kyi ni
@#/ /zlog pa dang / /rtog ba dang bcas spangs pa ste/ /de ltar mdor bsdus rnam drug gis/ /'byung dang rngub ba zhes su brjod/ /thog mar 'byung dang rngub pa rnams/ /nyi khri
dang ni chig stong dang / /de bzhin grangs ni brgya phrag drug /nyin dang mtshan mo nges pa ni/ /ji srid grangs ni thob pa'i gnas/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun du/ /grangs kyi rjes su sbyor ba
yis| |grangs ni yang dang yang du brtag /dus mtshams kyi ni rab dbye bas/ /de nas rjes su zlos par 'gyur/ /thun tshad so sor srog rnams dang / /rtsol ba ru ni brtag pa ste/ /nyis stong
bdun brgya'i grangs kyis ni/ /yang dag par ni nges gzung med/ /yongs su gsal bar bcad nas ni/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la/ /'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis/ /nyin dang
mtshan du nges par ni/ /de rjes gnas kyi rtsol ba yis/ /tha dad du ni rab tu brtag /rtsa yi 'khor lo rgyu ba yis/ /'byung dang rngub pa med par ni/ /nges par gzung ba'i sbyor ba
pas| |rtsa yi 'khor lo spyad par bya/ /de yi 'khor lo'i rtsa dbye bas/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las/ /de rjes gnas kyi sbol ba'i sa/ /gnas kyi dbye bas brtag par bya/ /gnas
mi so sor brtags pa yis/ /brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sbyor ba mchog /rtog pa spangs pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag /
brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu/ /'di ni yang dag rnal 'byor mchog /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis/ /mtshan nyid sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /ji ltar gnas par rang ngo bo/ /rtog dang
bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de rnams rnal 'byor log nas ni/ /rtog pa dang bral rlung chen po/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo rnam par rgyu/ /de thob nas ni log pa dang / /kun nas nyon mongs rnal
'byor pas/ /nges pa la ni don dam pa/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las/ /las dang po pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /blo dang ldan pa log pa las/ /de nas dgag pa de dag kyang / /yang dag rnal
'byor stobs kyis ni/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i rnam rtog rnams/ /kun nas rab tu spangs nas ni/ /rlung gi de kho na nyid rgyu/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /gnyis med mchog gi
rnal 'byor gyis/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la/ /rlung gi de kho na nyid rten/ /'khrul pa'i rnal 'byor dag pa ni/ /de la rtse gcig sems kyis ni/ /rtog med de kho na nyid kyis/ /rlung gi de
nyid rnal 'byor mchog /yang dag rtsol la byas pa gsal/ khang bzang byed pa bzhin du ni/ /thog mar sa ni yongs su sbyang / /de steng bgegs dang bral byas la/ /gnas ni legs par
dag par bya/ khang bzang skal ba nyams dga' ba/ /blo ldan ji ltar 'dod par bya/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor spyod pas mchog /rlung gi de nyid rnam par bsgom/ /snga ma bzhin du mnyam
@#/ /bzhag nas/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba dang / /rnal 'byor mchog gi ye shes che/ /rnal 'byor rig pa bsgom par bya/ /thog mar rlung gi de nyid dang / /de nas sngags
kyi de nyid gsal/ /de la rlung gi 'od zer mchog/ gsal ba chen po'i kha dog lnga/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rang bzhin/ /phung po lnga yi rang ngo bo/ /de ni ye shes lnga dag pa/ /rlung
lnga ru ni rgyu bar byed/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga'i/ /de nyid mtshan nyid go 'phang mchog /sna yi rtse mo de nyid mchog /rlung lnga dang ni rang ngo bo/ /rlung gi thig le zhes ni bshad/ /
yang dag de nyid gsal ba yang / /sna yi yungs kar de yang ni/ /rgyud gzhan rnams su gsungs pa ni/ /sna rtse yungs kar de yang ni/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i brtag pa ste/ /srog dang
rtsol ba la gnas pa/ /'od lnga sangs rgyas rnams su sgom/ /steng gi sna las nges 'byung ba/ /g.yas dang g.yon dang gnyi ga yang / /dal bar rgyu dang rnam bzhir 'gyur/ /nang gi
dus ni yin par bshad/ /lkog ma snying ga lte ba dang / /gsang ba'i pad+mar 'gro 'ong ston/ /thun phyed kyi ni dus dag tu/ /go rim ji bzhin gnas pas bstan/ /g.yas pa nas ni
'byung ba'i khams/ /me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba nyid/ /pad+ma'i mgon po rgyu ba 'o/ /g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor
zhes bya ba/ /ljang sar dag tu snang ba ste/ /las kyi mgon po rgyu ba 'o/ /gnyis ka las ni 'byung ba'i khams/ /gser gyi mdog tu snang ba ste/ /dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rin chen mgon
po rgyu ba'o/ /dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams/ /dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba 'o/ /lus kun la ni gnas pa'i rlung / /bya ba kun la 'jug
pa 'o| |'di ni rnam snang ngo bo ste/ /'chi ba'i lus la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi de nyid gsal ba 'di/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can/ /rnal 'byor byis pa'i yul min zhing / /rtog ge pa
yis mi shes so/ /dngos grub thams cad gsal byed pa/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi dngos grub pa/ /de nyid kun gyi go 'phang gsal/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi don bsdus pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i
go 'phang gsal/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /de nyid mchog ni shin tu phra/ /bla ma'i zhal las rtogs par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon
par rtogs pa las/ rlung gi de kho na nyid bshad ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /bde ba chen po'i gsal ba'i tshig /rdor sems go 'phang
mi phyed pa/ /rang rig pas ni mchog gi mchog/ kun rtog gis brtags kyis stong pa/ /bde ba chen po zhes 'di brjod/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dus su ni/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par
@#/ /spangs/ /bde dang sdug bsngal rnam par spangs/ /zhi ba gnyis med rnam par bral/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag /bde chen zhes ni 'di la brjod/ /rdo rje ye
shes lnga yi dngos/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin can/ /lnga ni rtsa nas 'bab pa'i rgyun/ /stong nyid rdo rje'i go 'phang gsal/ /rang bzhin med cing rten pa med/ /gnyis med dngos
po rnam bral zhing / /cha med cha ni rnam par spangs/ /rtag tu rtog pa kun las grol/ /'pho ba med cing zhi ba dang / /zag med bde ba thams cad gsal/ /nyon mongs kun
las rnam grol ba/ /bde ba thams cad la 'jug pa/ /stong pa stong pa chen po dang / /shin tu stong pa mchog gi mchog /stong pa dang gzhan stong pa'i gnas/ /nam mkha' lnga
yi ngo bo nyid/ /mi chod mi 'gyur ngo bo nyid/ /mi tshig pa dang mchog tu 'bigs/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi ye shes mchog /rang bzhin rdo rje zhes ni brjod/ /snying rje rnal 'byor yang
dag 'dres/ /mchog tu skye ba'i bde ba 'di/ /de nyid gsum po ro gcig pa/ /brjod dang brjod bya rnam par spangs/ /bde chen zhes bya'i 'khor lor gnas/ /dbang po rnams
kyi spyod yul min/ /mchog tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis/ /zhi ba dga' ba'i mtshan nyid gcig /'khor lo bzhi yi rim gyis thob/ /rnal 'byor bzhi yi go 'phang gsal/ /stong
nyid lnga yis kun nas gang / /cha bzhi yis ni rnam bkag pa/ /rdo rje rtse mor 'dzin pa ni/ /sems dpa' zhes byar gtan la dbab/ /nam mkha' lnga yi cha yis gang / /'di ni rdo rje sems
dpar brjod/ /de nyid bde chen go 'phang ste/ /bzhi pa dga' ba kun la khyab/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor skyes/ /mi phyed dbye ba rnam par spangs/ /de yi ngo bo de nyid de/ /rang nyid tshor
bar rig pa'o/ /pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul min/ /dpe bral mtshon par dka' ba dang / /rang gi blo la yang dag gnas/ /rang rig pa zhes bshad pa'o/ /gzhon nu ma yi rab dga'
bzhin/ /mchog tu gsal bar nyams su myong / /de nyid mchog dang pha rol 'gro/ /mchog ni thub pa kun la sogs/ /rtog pa gsal ba'i go 'phang ni/ /de ni mchog dang bde ba che/ /de
nyid gsum du mtshan nyid gcig /dngos dang dngos med las grol ba/ /bde ba'i bdag nyid 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ni grol bar rtogs/ /gnyis dang gnyis med rnam dbyod rang bzhin
dang bral blo ni zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ /gsungs pa'i nyon mongs gcod cing 'jig rten kun rtog dang ni bral ba zhes/ /shes dang shes bya'i rnam rtog dben pa spangs shing bden pa'i rang
bzhin dang / /mthar gyur kun khyab zhi ba mchog dang mchog rab de nyid 'gro ba bde la stsol/ /dus ni dus kyi mtha' zhes brjod/ /bzhi ba'i dus sbyor zhes bya ba/ /'khor ba 'khrul
@#/ /ba'i rtog spangs shing / /mya ngan 'das pa thob pa spangs/ /mnyam pa'i nyams ni chen por myos/ /mnyam nyid ye shes mtshan nyid can/ /gzung ba rnams kyi yul rnams
zhes| |kun nas gzugs la sogs pa las/ /'dzin pa dbang po rnam shes rnams/ /mig la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /bde dang bral zhing mchog tu phra/ /ye shes bde ba
kun gyi bdag /sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /bde ba sems ni zhi ba nyid/ /sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid des/ /de las
rnam grol 'jigs pa med/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po/ /stong nyid ye shes chen po'i bdag/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung zhing / /thugs rje zhi bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ /
mya ngan 'das pa'i bde mi gnas/ /nyan thos ye shes zhi ba nyid/ /gnyis med mchog dang bse ru 'o/ /de dag bde ba rtogs pa yi/ /de dang bral ba'i bde chen po/ /dgang phyir mchog
tu dga' ba'i dus/ /nyan thos ye shes zhes brjod do/ /de mtha' bral ba'i dga' ba ni/ /rang rgyal mya ngan 'das pa dang / /de ni gnyis med ye shes zhi/ /bde ba yis ni bye brag byas//
dngos po mkhyen pa'i ye shes che/ /byang chub sems kyang 'dzin par byed/ /rtsa rnams kun la bde ba ni/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas/ /de yi bdag nyid de nyid ni/ /bde ba
chen po zhes ni brjod/ /rnal 'byor gcig pus de nyid ni/ /rtog pa rnam rtog bdag nyid min/ /bsnyen nas bzlas pa sbyin sreg min/ /bsam gtan rlung ni bgegs pas min/ /bya ba
ma yin phreng bas min/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgoms pas min/ /cung zad zhi ba'i dbang bskur gyis/ /bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas 'thob/ /rnal 'byor ma kun kun spyod ni/ /mchog gi
ye shes bde ba che/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ bde ba chen po'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas
gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam par sbyor/ /gang gis yang dag dngos grub 'gyur/ /tshe 'di nyid la rnal 'byor pa/ /mi phyed rdo rje zhes ni brjod/ /de ni rlung du yang dag grags//
yi ge a ni phye ba yis/ /rnal 'byor shes pas rtag mchog stsol/ /de rten snying ga'i pad+ma yi/ /'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam bar brgyan/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skal ba bzang / /thams cad
bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /de yi 'dab ma la skyes pa/ /rnam shes brgyad ni kun rdzob bo/ /mig la sogs pa yang dag rten/ /'gro ba gsum du rnam par spyod/ /de dag 'joms pa
bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /de yi 'dab ma la skyes pa/ /rnam shes brgyad ni kun rdzob bo/ /mig la sogs pa yang dag rten/ /'gro ba gsum du rnam par spyod/ /de dag 'joms pa
rlung rdo rje/ /bgegs mthar byed pa zhes ni brjod/ /rnam shes rnams dang gang de la/ /'jig rten skyod ba rnams su brjod/ /'jig rten gsum du kun nas khyab/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams
@#/ /gnas| |skyong ba yang ni thams cad kyis/ /yul la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gnas/ /de la rlung gis yang dag sbyor/ /rdo rje pad+mo zhes ni brjod/ /rdo rje snying rjes shes par
bya| |pad+ma yang ni stong pa nyid/ /de dag sbyor ba'i mchog tu shes/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje nyi ma zhes ni gsungs/ /'od zer tshogs kyi bdag nyid can/ /de rnams kyi ni 'byed
ba gang / /de ni pad+ma zhes su brjod/ /de yi rnal 'byor mchog tu shes/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba/ /byang chub sems kyang rdo rjer 'gyur/ /bde chen 'khor lo pad+ma'o/ /de la'ang de yi sbyor
ba gang / /sbyor ba mchog de rmad du byung / /bla ma'i gsung ni rdo rje ste/ /slob ma bzang gis thos pa'i snod/ /pad+ma de yi gnas de la/ /de yi sbyor ba'ang mchog tu gsal/ /zhi gnas pad+ma zhes
gsungs la/ /de la lhag mthong rdo rje'o/ /de gnyis gcig gyur rnal 'byor ni/ /sgom pa yis ni de nyid mthong / /rnal 'byor ma zhal pad+mar gnas/ /rdo rje bde chen bla na med/ /pad+ma slob ma
bzang gi kha/ /man ngag gi ni don gyi snod/ /de gnyis rnal 'byor kun bdag nyid/ /yang dag de nyid don mthong byed/ /blo ldan rnam rtog bral ba yi/ /rdo rje ling+ga zhes ni bshad/ /rnam
rtog bral ba'i blo ldan gyis/ /b+ha ga pad+ma zhes ni brjod/ /dam tshig gis brlan rnal 'byor ma/ /de gnyis dngos gcig yang dag sbyor/ /gnyis med ye shes mthong bar byed/ /stong
phrag gnyis dang bdun khri yi/ /rtsa rnams rdo rje zhes ni brjod/ /byang chub sems ni 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /pad+ma zhes ni yongs su grags/ /de ni kun tu sbyor ba des/ /dga' ba skyed par byed pa yi/ /
rdo rje yi yang nyams dga'i stan/ /rang rig rdo rje 'chang pad+ma/ /de la de gnyis mnyam sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas ye shes go 'phang gsal/ /dbang bskur mchog ni rdo rje ste/ /pad+ma slob ma snod bzang
bo| |de gnyis mchog tu yang dag sbyor/ /yang dag de gnyis kyi ni rgyu/ /e ni pad+ma zhes su brjod/ /yi ge pa ni rdo rje nyid/ /thig le de nyid mi shigs pa/ /de nyid sbyor ba'i ngo mtshar ni/ /de ltar
sbyor ba mchog tu shes/ /rdo rje pad snod sdom pa ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi man ngag dang / /bla ma'i drin gyis yongs su shes/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs
pa las/ rdo rje pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //sngags kyi de nyid ye shes mchog /bshad kyi rdo rje can ni nyon/ /sngags kyi spyod pa spyad pa
yis| |gang gis dngos grub myur 'grub 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ /sngags ni gzungs bzhin bzlas brjod bya/ /de yis myur du dngos grub 'gyur/ /rlung gi de nyid pha
mthar phyin/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya go 'phang zhi/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sdom pa'i don/ /mchog gi de nyid ye shes che/ /sngags kyi de nyid bstan pa yin/ /dmigs med pa yi go 'phang gsal/ /rdo rje
@#/ /sems dpa' nges pa'i rgyu/ /sngags ni yon tan kun gyis gsal/ /lus ngag yid kyi sdom pa'o/ /de nyid de skyes ye shes mchog/ /de nyid kun gyi don bsdus
pa| |snying ga'i pad+mar mchog tu gsal/ /de nyid ye shes bla na med/ /zla drug bzlas pas 'grub par ni/ /'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi thabs dang ni/ /
rnal 'byor bas ni yongs su grags/ /dmigs med ces ni gang gsungs pa/ /de ni don dam par ni brjod/ /sbrul sogs pa yi dbye ba yis/ /sngags ni bzlas pa gnyis su med//
'on kyang mi phyed de nyid gsum/ /sngags kyi don dam bsdus pa'o/ /bzlas pa'i dngos grub mtshungs pa med/ /yang dag mnyam par bzhag bzlas na/ /dngos grub mtshungs pa med
par 'gro/ /rnam dag go 'phang bzang po gsal/ /gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i bla/ /sngags don sngags de nyid dang ni/ /sngags kyi man ngag kha brgyud ba/ /sngags kyi man ngag mi gsal
ba| |gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i bla/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /kun mkhyen 'gro ba'i bla ma la/ /rdo rje sems dpas yang nas yang / /phyag byas nas ni yongs su zhus/ /sngags kyi
mtshan nyid ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ming dang don/ /rang bzhin ci zhig rab gsal ba/ /sngags kyi de nyid man ngag ni/ /sngags kyi sdom don ji lta bu/ /de nas bcom
ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /rnal 'byor gsum gyi 'bras bdag nyid/ /sngags kyi don dang ming mchog dang / /gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid can/ /de kho na nyid bshad kyi nyon/ /snying po snying
po'i don bsdus pa/ /thog ma med cing zhi ba dang / /dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /sngags don rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /nyon mongs med cing mi
gsal ba/ /rang bzhin med pa'i mchog gi mchog/ ming med rang bzhin med pa dang / /rnam pa med pa'i chen po'i mchog /gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /bde ba yang dag
'phel bar byed/ /skal bzang bde ba 'phel bar byed/ /thams cad shes shing cha dang bral/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor skyes/ /de nyid de ni don dam yang / /de nyid de bzhin nyid
gzhan min/ /de nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'i dngos/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid/ /khyab pa kun 'gro stong ba nyid/ /nyon mongs thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /dri med dri bral dga' ba dang / /rang
rig pa yi go 'phang mchog/ dang po'i lha ste nyams dga' bzang / /cha yis tshogs rnams rgyas par byed/ /man ngag gnas kyi bye brag gis/ /'khor lo'i dbye bas btu bar bya/ /rtsa dang
mgrin pa snying ga rkan/ /rtsol ba ji bzhin brjod pa yi/ /de bzhin du ni las bya ba/ /zhi ba la sogs go rim bzhin/ /ji bzhin dngos grub ye shes dang / /ji bzhin nyams su myong mtshan
@#/ /nyid| |rang bzhin rdzogs pa ji lta bu/ /rgyun gyi dbye ba ji lta bu/ /rig pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin/ /'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin gnas/ /yang dag bsam gtan phyag
rgya'i rim/ /gzugs rdzogs pa la sogs pa yi/ /bla ma brgyud pas yang dag gnas/ /rab tu 'bad pas bslab par bya/ /gser dang do shal gos dang ni/ /rin chen sna tshogs yon
tan mchog /bran dang las byed grangs med dang / /dad cing gus pa la sogs kyis/ /ji ltar bzhed pa ston pa la/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i dngos rnams kyis/ /sngags kyi don ston bla ma
ni| |dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/ /phyag byas de rjes sngags pa yis/ /yang dag bzung nas 'bras bu'i don/ /mi yi rus pa'i smyug gu dang / /sa gzhi rin chen rab 'bar ba/ /
yang na dur khrod thal ba ni/ /rab brdal dngos grub ster bar byed/ /thog mar dbang bskur blangs byas nas/ /mdun du dkyil 'khor la sogs bya/ /bgegs mthar byed la gtor ma
ni| |chen po gtsug lag khang du sbyin/ /sku gsung thugs ni sgrub byed pa'i/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i sngags btu bya/ /dang po'i yi ge thog mar bri/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa yang dag ldan/ /
sde tshan tha ma'i mtha' cha ldan/ /sku yi sa bon du ni brjod/ /thog ma'i yi ge gnyis 'gyur la/ /suSh+ma Sha yi cha dang ldan/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i sngags btu bya/ /gsung gi rdo rje
snying po mchog /uSh+ma Sha yi cha dang bcas/ /dbyangs yig drug par yang dag ldan/ /sde tshan mtha' yi mtha' char bcas/ /thugs kyi rdo rje go 'phang gsal/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig
gsum| |'jig rten gsum yang 'grub par byed/ /rnal 'byor pa yi de nyid mchog /sngags btu ba ni bla na med/ /de nyid dngos grub thams cad byed/ /sngags rnams kun gyi don bsdus
pa| |sngags kyi theg pa kun yin no/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu sa nyid la/ /dngos grub rnams kyi rnal 'byor mchog /rnal 'byor ye shes bla na med/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po ni/ /ye shes bla na med
pa'i mchog /man ngag ji bzhin sngags zlos pa/ /dngos grub phyir ni lung bzhin gyis/ /de yi dngos grub rgya chen 'gro/ /tshe 'di nyid la sngags shes pas/ /ye shes chen po zhes
bshad pa'i/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor che/ /rab gsal sngags ni mtshungs pa med/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod byed/ /gang zhig sngags ni mgul pa ru/ /rtag 'chang de kho na nyid
shes| |rtog pa kun yang 'grub par byed/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa dang / /dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang / /blo bzang 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i
rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ sngags kyi de kho na nyid gsungs ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /grangs kyi rim pa bla
@#/ /na med| |ji ltar gnas ba'i rlung rnams kyi/ /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ /gang gis thob bskal pa bzang / /srog ni thams cad bdag nyid gnas/ /gang gis yang
dag yongs su shes/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par byed/ /rlung gi mtshan nyid mi shes pa/ /'jig rten gsum du rnam par 'khor/ /goms pa thob pa de yang ni/ /bla ma rnal 'byor
de shes brgyud/ /rlung gi mtshan nyid ji lta bu/ /lo tshigs kyi ni mtshan nyid ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /sprin gyi dpal las gsal ba gang / /mdor bsdus
nas ni dus ni drug /lo tshigs su ni yongs su grags/ /sbyor ba gnyis ni dus yin te/ /dus de nyin zhag drug cu'o/ /nyin dang mtshan du nges pa la/ /nyin zhag gcig ces
yongs su grags/ /nyin mtshan chu tshod drug cu ste/ /de bzhin dbyug gu tsa sha'o/ /'byung dang rdub pa'i dus drug la/ /tsa sha zhes ni yongs su grags/ /skad cig ma drug la ni
dbugs/ /de nyid se gol gtogs pa'i tshod/ /thang gcig gsum la skad cig go /de la yungs kar bskor ba tsam/ /dbugs gsum la ni thang gcig go/ /thang gcig de ni
yud tsam mo/ /thang gcig gsum la mig btsums te/ /de yang mig ni 'dzum pa yi/ /tsam gsum la ni mig btsums te/ /tsam ni thal mo brdabs pa'o/ /bde ba 'char ba de
gsum tsam/ /de ni thig le 'pho ba'o/ /sngags pa gsum la bde bar gnas/ /de ni rab 'gyed 'jigs ba brjod/ /dus gsum la ni 'jigs par bshad/ /dus ni phra ba skad cig bdag/
'das pa dang ni da ltar dang / /ma 'ongs pa yi mtshan nyid do/ /'das pa'i skad cig gsum du gsungs/ /da ltar yang ni skad cig gsum/ /ma 'ongs skad cig gsum du bshad/ /de
las slar yang skad cig gsum/ /de ltar skad cig gsum gyi cha/ /de las cha gsum de las cha/ /de srid grangs ni ji srid du/ /rtog pa stong pa gnyis su med/ /rnal 'byor mchog
ni thob par 'gyur/ /srog ni gnas ni bla na med/ /phyogs dang dus kyi rtog pa bral/ /rigs pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa dang / /de yi srog ni shar nas thim/ /gnyis med de ni bsdus ba'o//
gzhan yang bshad par bya yi nyon/ /srog ni thim dang 'char ba yi/ /gang tshe skad cig la sogs rtogs/ /kun nas rab tu ma zhi ba/ /de srid srog ni rlung gi gnas/ /grol ba'i gnas ni
mi shes so/ /bshang sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas/ /ming ni ma skyes cha chen po/ /de yang rnam shes dang bral ba/ /ye shes lus ni bdag med pa/ /der ni skye ba mchog gi mchog/
srog chags rnams kyi mchog tu brjod/ /rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo ston/ /thog mar byung ba gzhi po la/ /sgra 'dogs skyed pa'i ngo bor byed/ /de tshe rang gi gnas su thim/ /rnam shes
@#/ /las ni skye ba rlung / /de las me ni skye bar 'gyur/ /me las chu ni 'byung bar byed/ /de las sa ni yang dag skye/ /de dag rnams las phung por 'byung / /de phyir skye
mched rnams dang ni/ /de las rnam shes rang bzhin med/ /brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rim/ /ji ltar skye bo de yi gnas/ /thim nas 'gro ba'i rang bzhin du/ /rgyags pa skyed
pa'i rlung chen po/ /nyon mongs yi ni 'das nas ni/ /sngags thob nas ni rnam rgyas te/ /skye mched rnams ni sdud par byed/ /de las rgyags pas chu yi rlung / /rgyags pa bskyed pa
za ba'i phyir/ /phung po rnams kyang sdud byed nyid/ /rim gyis lus chen sgra sgrog byed/ /de las rgyags pa'i cha ni 'byung / /rgyags pa'i cha ni sdud par byed/ /'byung ba rnams kyis
bsdus nas kyang / /go rim ji lta ba bzhin du/ /de la rlung ni btang bzung 'byung / /rgyags pa'i cha ni za bar byed/ /de nas kyang ni rlung ni sdud/ /khyab cing phra ba sgrib par byed/ /de
las mi bzad btang bzung dang / /rnam shes skad cig sgrib par byed/ /bsgribs nas de las rnam shes kyang / /bem por song nas brgyal bar 'gyur/ /skye mched cha ni sgrib par
byed| |dag pa'i ye shes mchog gi mchog /de las thim par gyur pa'i srog /rnam shes dang ni mtshungs par ldan/ /de nyid mchog ni de ltar bshad/ /srog ni thim zhing 'char
pa dang / /ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes/ /bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa 'byung / /rigs pa gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /rdo rje'i sku ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /'chi ba med pa'i sgrub pa ni/ /gang
gis 'chi med lus mchog ni/ /thob pa yon tan rnams kyi rten/ /gang phyir sems can tshe thung pas/ /'chi med go 'phang sgrub mi nus/ /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /'chi ba med
par rab bsgrub bya/ /bcom ldan mgon po ye shes mchog /rnal 'byor de nyid pha rol byon/ /rdo rje sems dpas phyag byas zhus/ /'chi ba med gnyis rigs par ni/ /ji ltar yang dag
thim pa lags/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /bya ba kun sgrub go 'phang ni/ /'chi ba med pa'i rnal 'byor che/ /yang dag de nyid rnam nges pa/ /sems can tshe ni thung ba yis/ /dngos
grub 'grub pa gang yang med/ /de bas rnal 'byor bzang po rnams/ /tshe ring ba ni dge ba'o/ /de la thog mar rnal 'byor mchog /blo bzang nang gi bdag nyid sgrub/ /lce ni rkan gyi dpus sbyar
ba| |byas nas de kho nyid tshig bzla/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /yang dug rnal 'byor rjes dran bya/ /sna rtser dbugs ni rgyu bya zhing / /kha ni gsal bar dgag par bya/ /rkan gyi
gnas son zla ba ni/ /sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni zhu/ /zhu ba rlung gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos btung / /mtshan phyed kyi ni dus tshod mthar/ /ji srid thun gcig ma
@#/ /chad par/ /de srid rnal 'byor pas sngags bzla/ /rdo rje'i lus ni byed par 'gyur/ /sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la/ /dbyangs bcas pa dang yang dag ldan/ /
yan lag ma nyams rtag tu bzla/ /sgrub pa po yi srog ni 'gugs/ /rdzas kyang rtag tu bsten par bya/ /de nyid lnga yi rim pas skye/ /bzlas pa rdzogs nas rtag tu ni/ /lus la 'byung
ba'i dri ma med/ /lcags lnga'i rang bzhin snod du ni/ /bzhag nas ji srid nyi ma ni/ /'char kar de nas de la yang / /yo Shi rak+taM bde ba ni/ /blugs nas rtag tu rdzas kyi mchog /bdud
rtsi bdun pa'i ming can no/ /nyal kar yang ni de 'thungs na/ /rdzas kyis tshe ni 'phel bar byed/ /sngags kyi rgyal po oM AHhUM/ /de nas lan bdun bzla bar bya/ /lag g.yas ba dan
gyis mtshan la/ /snod bzang de la bkab nas su/ /yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /lan gsum du ni dag par bya/ /de phyir bud med gzhon nu ni/ /rtag tu 'khur ba bkang zhing
btung / /de ni bza' ba sbyin pa yang / /mar la btegs pa'i 'bras dang ni/ /ma sha dang ni nyi dga' dang / /ra yi 'o ma kha ra kar/ /til rnams cha mnyam byas nas ni/ /myos pa
yis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /nyal kar de la bza' ba sbyin/ /bla na med pa'i bza' ba'o/ /de ltar rigs bas cho ga shes nas/ /su la'ang smra bar mi bya'o/ /thams cad sngon bzhin
zhib ni| |myur du dngos grub ster bar byed/ /zla ba drug tu'ang gang bsten pa/ /de ni rdo rje'i lus su 'gyur/ /bcud kyis len dang gser 'gyur sogs/ /tshe dgug pa ni bla na med/ /rab
tu 'bad pas bstan par bya/ /phyag rgya che don sgrub pa pos/ /rgas pa med cing srin nad med/ /snyoms las med cing lkugs pa med/ /glo skam rlung mkhris nad sogs med/ /nang dang
'bras dang 'brum bu dang / /shu ba g.yan pa 'brum phran med/ /mdze nad mtshan par rdol ba med/ /dud dang pad dkar dpal lus ldan/ /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar 'bar/ /rig
pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog/ de ni rtag tu 'gugs par byed/ /de yi mdza' chen lha rnams te/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams sems dpar byed/ /lus kyi rang bzhin rtag tu ni/ /phyag bya ba dang
mchod par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ rlung gi grangs kyi rim pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas
gzhan yang rtsa rnams ni/ /grangs dang gnas ni bsdus pa nyon/ /'khor lo'i grangs kyi dbye ba yis/ /ji bzhin rmad du byung ba'i mchog /'khor lo drug la rten bcu drug /lus la lha yi
gzhal yas khang / /rnal 'byor ji bzhin gnas ji bzhin/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /rlung gi 'khor lo gnas pa'i rtsa/ /'dab drug rlung ni mkha' la spyod/ /'dab
@#/ /gsum ma yi 'khor lor bshad/ /rtsa gsum gnas ni rim gyis 'char/ /de bzhin longs spyod 'khor lo yang / /rtsa ni bcu drug yang dag brjod/ /chos kyi
'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa/ /brgyad ni kun la khyab pa'o/ /de bzhin sprul pa'i 'khor lo yang / /drug cu rtsa bzhir 'char bar bshad/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo cher/ /rtsa ni
sum cu gnyis su bshad/ /de ltar mdor bsdus rim pa yang / /brgya dang sum cu gcig lhag par/ /rtsa rnams su ni yang dag bshad/ /gzhan dag tu ni rgyas par yang / /rtsa ni
bdun khri nyis stong du/ /gnas kyi dbye bas phye ba ni/ /nges par brjod pa 'bum sder gsungs/ /rgyud ni chung ngu'ang 'di nyid du/ /snying po las ni snying por gsungs/ /smin ma'i dbus
nas rlung 'khor lo/ /bye ba 'khyil ba mi bzad pa/ /mi bzad brtan dang mtshan nyid can/ /rtsa thung drug gi mtshan nyid do/ /'dzin pa rtog med gang ba ni/ /rtsa gsum gru gsum me
dkyil 'khor/ /mgrin pa'i 'og tu bshad pa yin/ /dri ma dang bral gsal ba dang / /drag po dang ni gsum yin no/ /yang dag zhugs dang shin tu zhugs/ /shin tu bzang dang
bzang por 'gro/ stobs chen dang ni mi bzad che/ /mdzes chen mdun du skyes pa che/ /rgya gas pa'i rtags dang rgyags pa'i cha/ /rgyags pa'i chu dang rgyags smyo byed/ /rgyags
dang rgyags pa'i rgyu mthun dang / /rgyags pa'i rlan dang rgyags pa chang / /rtsub dang mkha' dang 'byung brlang dang / /dbugs mi bde dang g.ya' mkha' 'gro/ /'dab chags yan
lag khwa yi gdong / /za phod mi bzad sgra sgrog dang / /dri ldan rdeg dang rdul ba dang / /dbyangs dang dbyangs skyes dang ni sprin/ /chu ba mthong dang rgyun ltar spo/ /yud tsam gtso bo
yud mi skyes/ /rgyab tu kha bltas dbyug pa dang / /dbyug snyems dang ni rnying pa dang / /tshigs kyi lto dang tshigs kyi tshig /tshigs kyi tshad dang brtul ba dang / /tshigs kyi gnas dang
tshigs kyi gdong / /tshigs 'od tshigs kyi lu gu rgyud/ /dul byed dud 'gro gzi brjid dang / /dri med dul ba'i snyems pa dang / /chu 'phyang lto dang chu 'phyang chags/ /chun 'phyang
chun 'phyang phyed sbrang bu/ /phru gu phru gu ster dri ba/ /lo ma lo ma'i mgrin pa dang / /rab mchog ma dang rab gsal te/ /de ltar drug cu rtsa bzhir bshad/ /lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo
gnas/ /bdud rtsi mchog gis yongs su gang / /rin chen chen po pad+ma dang / /rdo rje chen po stobs po che/ /mgo bo che dang sgra che dang / /nyes dga' chen pos myos pa che/ /'di brgyad
chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus/ /snying ga'i pad+mar yang dag gnas/ /longs spyod longs spyod ster ldan dang / /nyi 'gro gsal dang skal pa dang / /sgom pa dang ni thal ba'i gdong / /
@#/ /bza' ster bza' dang bkres pa dang / /bcud len ro ni skyur ba dang / /ro 'jigs pa dang ro dang ni/ /khrung khrung longs spyod 'khor lor gnas/ /grangs ni bcu
drug tu ni brjod/ /de steng rim rigs 'dod pa can/ /'dod can ma dang srog gi lus/ /zla 'thung zla ster mdzod dang ni/ /'dod chags min smra ku sha dang / /sha pi spo dang dag
pa dang / /mi dang mi ro ne tso dang / /gang la gnyis ro ldan pa dang / /kis ring chang ster bdud rtsi dang / /dung can dang ni dung rna dang / /dug gi mig dang dug gi sna/ /rgyags dbang
rgyags pa brkam pa dang / /rgyags pas brgyal dang ngo mtshar rgyags/ /snyems pa dang ni tshogs kyi rten/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes ni brjod/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo cha/ /
mchog tu dga' ba ster bar byed/ /phra dang reg bya mchog tu phra/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /rang nyid bde chen rang bzhin dang / /gzhan dag la yang ster bar
byed| |de ltar yang dag rtsa yi rim/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/ /rtsa yi rim med nges par ni/ /phung po la sogs mi 'byung ngo / /phung po med na ye shes che/ /rnal 'byor
pa yis thob mi 'gyur/ /phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus/ /mkha' 'gro lngar ni rab tu grags/ /de nyid 'byung ba lnga yis ni/ /ye shes lngar ni rnam par gnas/ /de phyir 'bad pa
thams cad kyis/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo shes par bya/ /ji ltar chu yi dbus kyi shing / /myur du yang ni 'phel nas 'gro/ /de las 'bras bu sogs ldan pa/ /ster ba 'di la the tshom med/ /de
