bzhin phung po shing zhes bya/ /rtsa yi chu yis 'phel nas ni/ /'phel bas yang dag 'bras bu ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster byed/ /lha yi rnam pa'i ngo bo yis/ /rtsa rnams rang
bzhin bsgom par bya/ /gnyis phrad pa las reg bya gnyis/ /gal te rdo rje lhag gyur na/ /de tshe me ni yang dag 'bar/ /de rjes me yi 'khor lo'i dbus/ /'khor lo'i ming can pad+ma
rnams| |rim gyis rim gyis bye bar 'gyur/ /'di ni rtsa las 'bab de las/ /byang chub sems ni bde ba che/ /sprul pa'i snying po yang dag thob/ /ngo bo gcig gyur bsdus nas
ni| |'bab pa nyi ma zla ba'o/ /mi dbang dkyil 'khor dbus su yang / /gang phyir srad bu'i rnam par gnas/ /rgyu gcig tu yang shes nas ni/ /de gnyis 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis//
g.yas pa nyi ma'i rnam pa dang / /g.yon pa zla ba'i rnam par 'byung / /gang tshe g.yas pa'i nyi ma ni/ /de tshe khrag 'gyur bde ba'o/ /gang tshe g.yon pa'i zla ba gsal/ /bde ba kun
kyang de lta bu'o/ /de gnyis khongs su chud pa'i me/ /yan lag bdun nyid yang dag gnas/ /sngon la rlung gi rnam shes ni/ /brgya lam gang tshe 'khrul gyur na/ /pha yi mkha' la
@#/ /mtshungs par gnas/ /de tshe chags pa'i dbang du 'gyur/ /gsang gnas zla mtshan ldan pa'i rtsa/ /me dang nyi ma 'char ba na/ /de tshe lhag par chags pas non/ /
chags pa mchog tu 'dod par 'gyur/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'dres pa'i gdong / /'jug pa pha yi kha yi rlung / /de tshe sa bon du ni 'gyur/ /sa bon las ni sems can 'byung / /de phyir rtsa
las yang dag 'char/ /'bras bu ngo mtshar can ni skye/ /de nyid byang chub sems kyang ni/ /'dzin pa srog ni bsdus pa'o/ /ye shes mchog dang de nyid mchog /mchog tu bde ba rmad
byung che| |ye shes rnal 'byor thob pa yis/ /mchog tu bde ba bla na med/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ rtsa'i 'khor lo'i gnas
kyi rim par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor lus la rim ji bzhin/ /rtsa rnams rtag tu yang dag ni/ /brgyud pa
yi ni rigs kyis skye/ /gsal ba ru na mi gsungs pa/ /dad pa'i bsam pa rnam spangs pa/ /skye bo skal pa med don du/ /gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs pa/ /snyigs ma
lnga zhes bya ba'i dus/ /sems can myur du dngos grub don/ /snod du bya bar 'dod pa yis/ /rang byung ye shes rmad byung ba/ /rnal 'byor lus kyi bde chen po'i/ /'khor lo'i rtsa
na sum cu gnyis/ /byang chub sems ni gsal 'bab pa'i/ /rtsa rnams yang dag rnam bshad bya/ /de ni bde ba chen po'i gnas/ /de yi mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /ga ca Ta ta pa'i
sde tshan| |ya ra la wa Sha shas/ /de dag rim par shes par bya/ /slar yang de dag bsdus nas ni/ /sde tshan tsam ni gcig tu 'gro/ /de yang zhi ba'i ye shes mchog /byang chub sems
la thim nas 'gro/ kun rtog thams cad spangs nas ni/ /bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog /shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /de las
'khor lo gsum dbye bas/ /rtsa ni brgyad kyi dbye ba las/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sngags kyis ni/ /gsum phyed bdun cu rtsa gnyis gsal/ /de ni stong du rab phye ba/ /so sor 'phros
pa'i bdag nyid can/ /stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis/ /rtsa rnams kyi ni grangs zhes bya/ /rlang dang mkhris pa bad kan ni/ /khams gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis/ /stong phrag nyi
shu rtsa bzhir ni/ /'khor lo 'khor lo'i dbye ba yis/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ni/ /nges pa'i man ngag rjes 'brang nas/ /phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor de nyid mchog /lha yi rim
pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rtsa ni so sor dbye ba yis/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/ /de las yang ni sdom sbyor bar/ /song nas phan tshun kun nas brten/ /slar yang bdun cu rtsa gnyis
@#/ /'gro/ /bde chen 'khor lo rtsa yi gnas/ /rtsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis las/ /de yang 'khor lo sdom par 'gyur/ /'khor lo re re'i gtso bo'i rtsa/ /brgyad brgyad
du ni 'gyur bar gsal/ /rnal 'byor lus kyi rtsa mchog ces/ /rmad byung sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/ /yi ge sum cu gnyis dbye bas/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos thob/ /phung
po khams dang don yul nyid/ /dbang po'i sgo ni srung ba'o/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis dbye bdag nyid/ /gsal ba yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog /lus kyi gzhal yas khang du yang / /
de nyid kyi ni nang bzhugs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo dang / /gzugs la sogs dang rgyal sras rnams/ /khro bo bcu zhes bya ba yi/ /de nyid mchog ni yang dag bzhugs/
slar yang khro bo rgyal sras la/ /nang du mi snang bar ni 'gro/ /rgyal sras rnams ni gzugs la sogs/ /lha mo rnams la bsdus nas ni/ /de rnams kyi ni sa sogs 'gro/ /de
dag de bzhin gshegs lnga la/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la/ /de dag la yang bsdus nas 'gro/ /de kho na nyid bde gcig pu/ /de la yang ni thim nas 'gro/ /gzung dang
'dzin pa rnams las grol/ /bde ba kun rten pa yi mchog/ de yang nyams myong tsam las slar/ /de ni yi ge tsam la thim/ /yi ge tsam ni thig ler thim/ /thig le yang
ni sgra la thim/ /sgra tsam 'od gsal ba la'o/ /'od gsal go 'phang yang dag par/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /rnam par shes dang chos dbyings dang / /don dam pa dang
bde ba che/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba/ /byang chub sems ni dri ma med/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i zhi ba che/ /gnyis med ye shes rmad du byung / /dbang bskur bzhi pa bde ba dang / /bzhi
pa'i dga' ba go 'phang mchog /de la sogs ming bye brag gis/ /go 'phang mchog ni gsungs pa yin/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye ba yis/ /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ /de ltar bskyed dang
rdzogs pa yi/ /rim don bla ma brgyud las shes/ /zhi ba gnyis med mtshan nyid can/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ rnal 'byor pa'i
lus kyi rtsa bsdus pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sna tshogs la sogs skad cig bdag/ yang dag gzhung lugs mtshan nyid ni//
de nyid ji lta ba bzhin nyon/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin/ /rnam par 'joms dang mtshan nyid bral/ /skad cig ma ni bzhi zhes gsungs/ /rnam par phye nas slar bshad bya/ /

rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'dod/ /de yi skad cig dbye bar bya/ /a ling ga na dang / tsum+ba na dang / tsu ma sha na dang / ku tsa gra ha dang / bu la tra ta ha na dang / da sha na dang / da kha da na
@#/ /dang / do la dang / pu tsi tsi dang / ku ra pa la sogs pa'i ka ra na dang / rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig go /na li stong phrag bdun cu gnyis/ /lus ni bde ba rgyas pa
na| |mgrin pa dag tu gang phyin pa/ /rnam smin zhes bya skad cig go /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i/ /
rnam pa med pa'i skad cig go /na li las byung shu kra 'das/ /rnam pa dang bral skad cig go /ye shes bzhi dang stong pa bzhi/ /skad cig ma ni bzhi las rtogs/ /rnal 'byor
chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad
bya ba| |dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni/ /lugs 'byung lugs las ldog pa yi/ /ji lta ba yi rim pa yis/ /dga' ba'i bde ba dang po ste/ /mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa dang / /
dga' bral zhes pa gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par bshad/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lor dga' ba dang / /mchog dga' chos kyi 'khor lor gnas/ /longs spyod bral
ba'i dga' ba dang / /lhan cig skyes dang bde ba che/ /lugs ldog rim pa zhes ni gsungs/ /de rjes lugs 'byung bshad bya ste/ /bde chen 'khor lo spyi bo la/ /de ni dga' bar
bshad pa yin/ /longs spyod 'khor lor mchog dga' dang / /dga' bral chos kyi 'khor lor gnas/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lor lhan cig skyes/ /dga' ba nyams su myong bar
byed| |blta dang dgug dang de bzhin brda/ /kha la tsum pa byed pa yi/ /dga' ba nyams su myong bar shes/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid do/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma mchog/
tu| |de bzhin sgra la 'dzin pa dang / /rdo rje pad+mar bzhag nas ni/ /nyams myong sa ni skad cig mchog /rnam smin zhes bya skad cig nyid/ /de nyid rgyur ni rnam par shes/ /rtsa yi
dbus na rab gsal gnas/ /gtum mo yang ni rnam rtog 'joms/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che/ /mchog gi cha ni zhu bar byed/ /bral dga'i gnas su myong ba ni/ /rnam rtog
skad cig mtshan nyid do/ /de la ro gcig rang bzhin ni/ /rtsa ni gcig gi rgyun la rten/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhi/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs
skad cig gsungs/ /stong nyid kun gyi gzhi yi mchog /chos kyi 'khor lo de las steng / /rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub bya ba/ /nyams su myong ba mchog dga' ste/ /rnam smin
skad cig mtshan nyid do/ /longs spyod 'khor lo de las ni/ /steng du byed pa'i skad cig la/ /nyams myong bral ba'i dga' ba ni/ /rnam 'joms mtshan nyid skad cig go /bde
@#/ /pa chen po'i 'khor lo che/ /de thob mtshan nyid skad cig ma/ /lhan cig skyes dga'i nyams myong ba/ /mtshan nyid dang bral skad
cig go /rtsa gsum kun gyi nam mkha' che/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs yang dag gzugs/ /de las rab sad nyams myong ba/ /mtshan nyid gcig par ro
mtshungs pa/ /rnal 'byor chen pos nyams su myong / /slar yang mtshan nyid med par 'gro/ /rab tu sad pa nyams su myong / /stong phrag bcu drug bdag nyid
do| |bde chen go 'phang mi phyed pa/ /gnyis med rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas/ /de ltar 'di ni dga' dbye ba/ /gzhan du gsal bar ma gsungs so/ /rnal 'byor
ma yi bka' drin gyis/ /bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ dga' ba'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye
ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /thig le gsum ni bla na med/ /gang gis shes pa tsam
gyis ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dngos grub 'gyur/ /rtsa rnams kun tu 'bab pa dang / /byang chub sems ni zhu byas pa/ /rdo rje'am ni pad+ma'i rtse/ /rlung
ni bzung ba'i skad cig la/ /rkan dgug pa yi sbyor ba dang / /k+Sh+mIM gyi sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par byed/ /bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor
lo de nyid mchog /snying ga'i pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /dbus su hUM ni bkod nas ni/ /thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/ /de kho na nyid lus skyob
pa| |phyogs yul dus dang rnam par bral/ /steng dang 'og ni rnam par spangs/ /sems bral rang gi ngo bor gnas/ /ngag gi dra ba yongs su spangs/ /rgyud dang mtshan ma dang bral zhing //
rtog pa'i spyod yul rnams dang bral/ /gnyis pa kun las rnam par grol/ /mchog tu rtag cing zhi ba'o/ /rlung gi thig le rnal 'byor mchog /kha dog snga pa gsal ba che/ /sna rtser
sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /kun nas kyang ni bsgom par bya/ /yi ge oM ni sngags kyi mchog /rnal 'byor pa yis bzla bar bya/ /snga ma bzhin du ye shes lnga/ /zhi ba la sogs de
bzhin sgrub/ /bag chags rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /rtsa ni gsum po 'di ni mchog /bsdus nas slar yang dbye ba ni/ /phan tshun du ni so sor
'gro/ /rdzas kyi thig le khong chud pa/ /thig le gnyis te sngags dang rlung / /sngags kyi thig le de nyid mchog /thig le gnyis ni 'od dang rdzas/ /slar yang rlung gi thig le yang / /
@#/ /thig le gnyis kyi nang du 'gro/ /sngags dang rdzas kyi bdag nyid can/ /rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag shes/ /zla ba nyi ma me yi rtsa/ /gsum zhes bya ba'i mtshan
nyid do| |la la nA dang ra sa nA/ /a ba d+hU ti zhes bya'i ming / /sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang / /de nyid du ni yongs su grags/ /steng dang 'og tu khyab pa nyid/ /so sor lu gu
rgyud tshul du/ /rtsa rnams kun la khyab nas ni/ /yang dag man ngag rim pas gnas/ /de ltar rnal 'byor mchog tu phra/ /shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs/ /dngos grub thams
cad kyi ni gzhi/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rmad byung che/ /gso sbyong gis min bzlas pas min/ /phreng bas ma yin 'gog pas min/ /grangs min dus min sbyin sreg min/ /'byin
byed 'gog byed kyis ni min/ /ye shes chen po'i go 'phang zhi/ /rnal 'byor gcig pus rtogs par byed/ /mngon par shes pa lnga dang ni/ /de bzhin ye shes lnga yi mchog /
thig le gsum ni rnam sgom pa/ /zhi sogs bya ba yang dag ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' rdo
rje sems/ /dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya gsungs/ /gnas kyi grangs kyi dbye ba yis/ /bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba
mngon par rtogs pa las/ thig le gsum rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon/ /de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang mchog /
sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /snying po bdag nyid dam tshig ni/ /yi ge gsum ni sku gsung thugs/ /snying po yang ni bshad par bya/ /de ni rnam phyed khyod nyon cig /de ni ji lta ba
bzhin bshad/ /oM ni sku yi rdo rje yi/ /snying po ru ni yang dag bshad/ /yi ge a dang yi ge u/ /yi ge ma zhes bya ba gsum/ /AHni chos 'khor pad+ma la/ /rlung gi 'khor lo la
ni khyab| |sgrib med pa yi rlung chen po/ /srog tu gsungs pa thams cad bsdus/ /cha med cha dang bral ba dang / /dngos po dngos med dbus na gnas/ /thig le 'khor lo'i cha la
khyab| |nam mkha'i khams kyi yi ge mchog /sngags rnams kun gyi don gyi gnas/ /sngags rnams thams cad rab sad byed/ /sngags rnams kun gyi phan byed cing / /ngag gi 'khor
lo rab sad byed/ /dngos su lan gsum gyi ni gzhi/ /'byung ba thams cad dbang du byed/ /zag med 'phel ba med pa'i gnas/ /byang chub sa bon bde ba che/ /gzugs med
khams su yang dag bshad/ /'khor lo bzhi yi don bsdus pa'i/ /u ni longs spyod 'khor lor gnas/ /me dang nyi ma 'dra ba yi/ /mgrin pa'i mtha' nas spyi gtsug mtha'/ /
@#/ /khyab pa gzi brjid kyi ni lus/ /gzugs kyi khams zhes bya bar shes/ /gnas ris bcu bdun bdag nyid can/ /bde chen 'khor lo zhes byar bshad/ /
yi ge ma ni thig le tsam/ /gdod tshad mtha' yi sor bzhi tsam/ /dga' ba'i gtsug tor gnas na gnas/ /zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba yi/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhi/ /
rtsa ni kun la khyab pa po/ /mi phyed lus kyi go 'phang ni/ /'dod pa'i khams zhes bshad pa yin/ /bsdus na gnas ris nyi shu'o/ /de ltar rlung ni gnas gsum gyi/ /rtsa gsum gyi
ni gnas su 'dus/ /yi ge oM gyi brda shes na/ /khams gsum rnam par sad par byed/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'gro ba'i gzugs/ /spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu/ /rnam par
rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni/ /sna yi bu ga nas ni byung / /yang dag nyi ma zla ba gnyis/ /sbas pa nang nas rgyu bar byed/ /me ni 'bar ba rtse mo la/ /smin ma'i dbus su srog gi rlung / /de
ltar gcig pu'ang gsum du bshad/ /gtan la phab ste de nyid gsum/ /zhi ba khams gsum la khyab pa/ /skye ba'i sa bon rgyas pa'o/ /yi ge a ni ye shes mchog /gsung gi
rdo rje snying po mchog /a ni gnyis dang yi ge haM/ /ring por byas te dbye ba gsum/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi don bsdus pa/ /yi ge AHni sngar bshad zin/ /gnyis pa yang ni srog gi
rlung / /stong nyid ye shes ming can te/ /srog dang rtsol ba gnyis su rigs/ /yul dang dbang po bsdus pa'o/ /kun gzhi dang ni nyon mongs yid/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /
ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni/ /gsung gi rdo rje brjod pa'i mchog /AHni chos 'khor pad+ma las/ /mgrin par yi ge AHnyid 'gyur/ /srog nyid dang ni thur sel dang / /yi ge ha yis
kun nas ni/ /mgrin pa'i dbus na gnas pa bcings/ /A haM kha nas gsal bar brjod/ /ro 'bab pa yi khrung khrung ni/ /ro skyur ba zhes bya bar gsungs/ /bkug nas rtag tu khyab par
byed| |gzugs kyi khams ni 'bar ba'o/ /ha dang de bzhin yi ge u/ /de ni yi ge ma dang gsum/ /rkang pa nas ni mgo mtha'i bar/ /'khor lo bzhi yi don bsdus pa/ /ha ni thur sel
ming can rlung / /bshad sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas/ /yi ge U ni khyab byed rlung / /mgrin pa pad+ma'i dbus na gnas/ /yi ge ma ni srog rlung yin/ /dpral ba rlung gi 'khor lo la/ /
de dag gcig gyur snying ga nas/ /thugs kyi sa bon du ni brjod/ /mi bskyod snying po kha dog nag /gzugs med khams kyi ming can no/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /snying po gsum
du rab tu bshad/ /lag na rdo rjes thal sbyar nas/ /slar yang thams cad mkhyen la zhus/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sngags don dang / /gnas kyi dbye ba 'tshal lags na/ /'di rnams dbu
@#/ /na bdag po gang / /ji lta bu zhig gtso bos gsungs/ /gtso bo rdo rje 'chang ba che/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa/ /gsang ba'i mchog tu gsungs
pa yi| |sbas pa'i don ni khyod 'dri ba/ /rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsungs pa/ /rab tu bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /thugs kyi sa bon bdag po ste/ /kun gyi nang na rnam rtog med//
gang phyir gtso bos gzhan rnams ni/ /sgrib dang de bzhin 'phrog pa dang / /rnam par rtog ba'i rlung gnyis ni/ /lus kun la ni khyab par byed/ /sna yi bu ga las ni rgyu/ /lus la
rtag tu 'byung bar byed/ /'gro ba drug gi 'khor lo'i lam/ /gang gi stobs kyis khyab par byed/ /gsum pa rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs/ /rnam rtog med par rmad byung che/ /rlung
rnams thams cad 'gags pas na/ /skyes pa de nyid rtogs pa'o/ /rlung ni thams cad 'gog pa yang / /yang dag rigs par nga yis bshad/ /sprul pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus//
rgyud 'di pad+ma gnyis su gsungs/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi brgyad 'dab gnyis/ /steng dang 'og tu kha bltas nas/ /slar yang kha sbyor tshul du gnas/ /srog dang thur sel rgyu bar byed/ /de
nyid rtog pa dang bcas pa/ /rlung gnyis su ni gsal bar gsungs/ /sku dang gsung gi snying po gnyis/ /la la nA dang ra sa nA/ /sa ba d+hU ti mchog gi gnas/ /de gnyis dbus na
mchog gi mchog /rnam rtog med pa rlung gi rlung / /rtag tu rgyu zhing kun la khyab/ /rnam rtog gang thob rtag tu ni/ /las kun byed cing mkhas par 'gyur/ /rlung gi rang bzhin bye
brag ni| |brgya dang brgyad la gang rgyal ba/ /dus kun tu ni 'phel bar rigs/ /rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes pa/ /skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub/ /de yis thob par rgyud
'dir gsungs/ /de ni gang tshe skad cig thob/ /de ni skad cig mchog tu gsungs/ /de yang ji ltar thob par byed/ /de la rigs pa ru ni brjod/ /thog mar rnal 'byor pa chen po//
blo bzang gis ni zhi gnas bsgom/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo'i phyag rgya byas nas kyang / /dbang po yi ni sgo dgu la/ /thams cad du ni kun rdzob pa/ /hUM bzlas
pa ni mtshungs pa med/ /mchog tu rgyun mi 'chad par ni/ /zla ba gcig tu bzlas byas na/ /de rjes skad cig de la thob/ /gang phyir de ni bzlas byas na/ /snying ga'i pad+ma'ang steng
bltas 'gro/ /de nas gsang ba'i pad+ma las/ /kha sbyor bas ni de bas kyang / /rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni/ /de las rnam par bcas nas 'gro/ /rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po/ /
sku gsung rdo rje bcad nas ni/ /rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba ste/ /sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'thob/ /a ba d+hU ti'i rgyun la gnas/ /smin dbus rlung ni phye byas pa/ /de thob byas pa'i
@#/ /dga' ba ni/ /rgyun du 'chang zhing mi zad pa/ /chags sogs bral zhing zhi ba dang / /rang rig bde ba chen bo'o/ /'dir ni rgyu mtshan bshad par bya/ /sngags
grub pa yi rnal 'byor pas/ /'dir dang rdul dang ba spu langs/ /rtag tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang / /gdong ni zangs mdog yid du 'ong / /kun gyis mthong dang dga' ba dang / /grangs
lhag chad pa la sogs dang / /'jig rten chos dang de bzhin gnas/ /rnal 'byor sngags kyi de nyid ni/ /gnod pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng
ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ sku gsum gyi snying po bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /de nyid gsum gyi tshig bstan
bya| |bdag nyid sngags sogs byed pa yis/ /ji lta ba bzhin rim pa rnams/ /bdag gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi rgyu/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang
bzhin bdag /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa/ /kun mkhyen go 'phang mi gsal byed/ /rigs kyi dbye bas rab gsal byed/ /rigs ni lnga yi rnam pa gang / /de ni phung
po'i mtshan nyid do/ /phra rags la sogs dbye ba yis/ /thogs bcas thogs med mtshan nyid dang / /'byung ba chen po bzhi yi dngos/ /'di ni gzugs kyi phung por gsungs//
der ni rnam snang ngo bo dang / /thams cad spro bar byed pa'i rgyu/ /bde dang sdug bsngal mchog tu zhi/ /grang dang dro ba mchog gi mchog /gang gis shin tu rig pa ni/ /de ni tshor ba'i
phung por bshad/ /rin chen 'byung ldan nyid kyi mtshan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spros bdag nyid/ /glang po bong bu lce spyang dang / /rta dang ri dwags dang ni phag/ pha dang ma dang pha yi
spun| |mdza' bo snang gi gnyen tshan sogs/ /gang gis yang dag shes pa ni/ /'du shes phung po'i mtshan nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med/ /de ni spros pa kun nas
gsal| |'gro ba khyad par yongs su shes/ /dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras bu/ /gzhan yang lung du ma bstan min/ /de yi 'du byed du ni bshad/ /don yod spro ba'i rang bzhin can//
'khor ba dngos dang dngos med sogs/ /kun rtog 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can/ /rnam shes nas ni rnam par shes/ /mi bskyod spro ba'i bdag nyid can/ /de ltar phung po yongs shes

na| |lung dang rigs pa'i shes pa skye/ /dzi na dzi ka dang rat+na d+h+r-i ka/ a ro li ka dang pra dz+nyA d+h+r-i ka /badzra d+h+r-i ka ces bya ba'i sngags/ /ci rigs par ni rim bzhin shes/ /spyan la sogs pa
bzhi po gang / /de ni khams gsum yongs su brtag /sra ba la sogs bzhir phye bas/ /sa yi khams su yongs su brtag /gti mug dga' bas mngon par brjod/ /de yi spyan du
@#/ /yongs su grags/ /zhu ba ci mchi khu ba sogs/ /rdzas kyi bye brag yang dag bsten/ /chu yi khams su rnam par shes/ /mA ma kI yi bdag nyid can/ /dro ba bza'
btung smin pa dang / /gzi brjid 'phro ba nyid thams cad/ /me yi khams su shes par bya/ /gos dkar spro ba'i bdag nyid can/ /'byung ba rdub pa rab tu 'phel/ /rlung rnams kyi
ni tshogs kyi mchog /brkyang ba dang ni bskum pa dang / /steng dang 'og tu byed pa dag /de ni rlung gi khams su shes/ /sgrol ma spro ba'i bdag nyid can/ /de ltar 'byung ba bzhi po yang / /
rnal 'byor mchog nyid rnam par shes/ /mo ha ra ti/ dwe Sha ra ti/ rA ga ra ti/ badzra ra ti/ de ltar rim pas sngags rnams ni/ /de dag mngon sum cho ga yis/ /gzugs la sogs
pa yul gyi tshogs/ /lha mo'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du/ /rnal 'byor mchog gis rnam par shes/ /stong nyid gcig bu rgyu gcig pu/ /sngo ser sogs kyi dbye ba dang / /ring dang thung
ba'i rnam pa yis/ /lha mo de gzugs rdo rje ma/ /phyi rol gzung ba'i rang bzhin can/ /mkhar rnga sil snyan sbubs rol mo/ /de bzhin rnga snyan pi wang dang / /bstod dang smad sogs
sgra dag ni/ /sgra yi rdo rje ma zhes bya/ /gzung ba dang ni rang bzhin mchog /rnam par shes pa sad par byed/ /dri nga ba dang dri bzang dang / /sbyar ba'i dri yi mchog rnams ni/ /dri yi
rdo rje mar shes bya/ /gzung ba'i rnam shes cher dmar ba/ /ro drug mchog tu ldan pa ni/ /lan tsha skyur la sogs dbye yis/ /rdo rje ro mar de shes bya/ /kun kyang gzung ba'i rnam pa'o/ /
mig sogs dbang po la brten pa/ /rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad ni/ /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad du shes/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che/ /mig
gnyis sa yi snying por gsungs/ /gzugs la sogs pa ci rigs par/ /rang gi ngo bo spro bar byed/ /sgra yi rnam pa thams cad nas/ /bye brag so so ci rigs par/ /sgra yi rnam par
shes pa ni/ /phyag na rdo rjer yang dag bshad/ /dri yi bye brag la spyod pa/ /so sor ji ltar rig pa ni/ /sna yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni/ /nam mkha'i snying por rnam par shes/ /ro yi bye
brag la spyod pa/ /dbye ba so so'i go rim bzhin/ /lce yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni/ /'jig rten dbang phyug tu ni shes/ /reg bya'i bye brag la spyod pa/ /bye brag so so'i go rim bzhin/ /
reg bya'i rnam shes mtshan nyid ni/ /sgrib pa rnam par sel bar shes/ /yid kyi bye brag la spyod pa/ /dbye ba so so'i go rim bzhin/ /yid kyi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa/ /'jam dpal
zhes bya'i ming can no/ /rgyus pa kun la yang dag sbyor/ /dbye ba so so'i go rim bzhin/ /bag chags yul gyi bdag nyid can/ /byams pa ru ni rnam par shes/ /rtsa rnams so so'i
@#/ /mtshan nyid can/ /bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can/ /'di ni kun tu bzang por bshad/ /de ltar rnam shes tshogs brgyad mchog /
yang dag de nyid bla na med/ /mig sogs dbang po'i rnam shes ni/ /gzugs sogs mthong ba'i rang bzhin no/ /rje ngar dpung pa bral thal gong / /sgo gnyis dang ni thams cad kyi/ /shes
pa bcu yi mtshan nyid ni/ /khyab pa rnams su yongs su shes/ /gshin rje mthar byed shes mthar byed/ /pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba/ /dbyug
sngon dang ni stobs po che/ /gnod mdzes gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur/ /de ltar de rnams gnas dbye bas/ /ye shes gsum gyis yongs su gsal/ /ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni/ /
yang dag de kho na nyid rten/ /gang gis de nyid cho ga bzhin/ /bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/ /sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog /ye shes chen po legs rgyas pa/ /skye med zag med
mi gsal dang / /'gyur ba med cing sgrib pa med/ /gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang / /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog /sbrul dang btus dang mtha' med dang / /mgo med
yongs su dbye ba yis/ /oM dang hUM phaT swAhA'i mtha'/ /sbrul zhes bya ba mngon par brjod/ /rang ming yon tan dang ni gzugs/ /btus pa'i mtshan nyid ming can no/ /oM la sogs
pa zhabs med pa/ /mtha' med ces bya'i ming can no/ /swA yi mtha' can oM med pa/ /mgo med ces ni bshad pa yin/ /thams cad yod la oM med pa/ /mgo med ces na bshad pa
yin| |de ltar mtshan nyid shes nas ni/ /sngags kyi de nyid bla na med/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /'di yi rgya chen don shes bya/ /ye shes de nyid rnal 'byor mchog /gnyis pa
thams cad rnam par spangs/ /dbang po thams cad mnyam par sbyor/ /dngos po thams cad gcig pu'i lus/ /ngag gi rnam rtog kun tu spangs/ /snang ba thams cad rnam par spangs/ /
bdag byin brlab pa'i rang bzhin can/ /kun la khyab pa rmad du byung / /rang rig pa yi rnal 'byor mchog /skad cig bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni/ /cha bral kun 'gro khyab pa dang / /rnal 'byor
byis pas mi shes shing / /kun rdzob yongs su mi shes pa/ /don dam rang gi ngo bo ni/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pas dbye ba dang / /sngags kyi de nyid rab tu gsal/ /a ni de nyid mtha' thig
ler| |yang dag thim par rnam par bsgom/ /thig le yang ni a la thim/ /a ni mtha' yi ha tsam la'o/ /ha yang yi ge hUM la'o/ /yi ge U ni haM la'o/ /yi ge haM yang oM la thim/ /yi
ge a ni thig le tsam/ /thig le yang ni sgra la thim/ /sgra yang sgra tsam la ni 'o/ /sgra tsam mchog ni nam mkha' la'o/ /de yang 'od gsal ba la thim/ /'od gsal go 'phang gsal
@#/ /bzhi| |shin tu rnam dag chos dbyings te/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog /rab tu sad cing rab tu 'char/ /ngag gi spyod pa rnams dang bral/ /gnyis pa thams
cad rnam par spangs/ /phung po lnga ni gcig pu'i gzhi/ /'byung ba lnga ni yang dag bsten/ /rnam shes brgyad ni tshogs dben pa/ /phyi yi yul drug bsdus pa ni/ /rlung bcus shes
pa bcu bsdus pa/ /de ltar mtshan nyid kun bsdus pa'o/ /kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /gang gis bzhugs gnas srid pa gsum/ /dngos grub kun byed dpal dang ldan//
skal ba bzang po kun 'phel ba/ /rdo rje de ni rdo rje sems/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed dbang phyug dang / /he ru ka dang dus 'khor lo/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas thub pa che/ /kun tu bzang po
'jam dpal dang / /sna tshogs spro ba'i bdag nyid can/ /sna tshogs yon tan tshogs kyi gzhi/ /kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po dri ma med/ /ye shes de nyid
gsal ba ni/ /rtog pa med cing gnas pa med/ /chos dbyings 'pho ba zhes bshad do/ /bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid dag /skra yi rtse mo brgyad stong 'dra/ /shin tu gsal
zhing 'od gsal ba/ /lung dang rigs pa'i dbye ba yis/ /bla ma brgyud pa las ni shes/ /de ltar de nyid gsum dam tshig /zhal nas brgyud pa'i rim pa skye/ /gsang ba yi ni ye
shes mchog /bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid skad cig mchog /rnal 'byor chen bo'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ de kho na nyid gsum gyi dam tshig gtan la dbab pa'i
le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad kyi nyon/ /sna rtse gsum gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /gsang ba snying ga gdong sna'i ming / /gsum po rgyud las gsal ba ni/ /
'khor lo gsum gyi dbye ba yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sgom pa'i rim/ /shin tu chags pa'i dbang song ba'i/ /sems kyi bde ba ster bar byed/ /rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis/ /rtsa yi
'khor lo sad par byed/ /bde ba chen po kun nas skye/ /khams gsum ro gcig gyur nas ni/ /dgug dbang cho ga bzhin du bya/ /byang chub sems ni bde ba che/ /lhan skyes skad cig
mtshan nyid ni/ /rdo rje rtse mor gzung bar bya/ /de nyid bde ba chen po ste/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can/ /kun rtog thams cad rnam par spangs/ /gsang ba'i sna rtser rdzas thig le//
yang dag gzung ba'i bdag nyid can/ /chags chen sems ni gcig pu yis/ /rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya/ /pad 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi la/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo rim bzhin 'char/
de yi lte ba snar ni bshad/ /gsang bar bde ba thams cad ster/ /snying ga'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /de yang lte ba snar ni brjod/ /zhe sdang nyid kyi sems ni bsgom/ /gsang sngags
@#/ /'bar ba'i ye shes sems/ /yang dag spro bar byed pa'i rgyu/ /ngag gi rtog pa kun spangs pa/ /rmad byung chen po ye shes mchog /rtag tu sngags ni nA da 'byung / /
rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che/ /bsam gtan la sbyor bde ba'i mchog /man ngag thob pas bde ba rgyal/ /zhe sdang myur du dbang byas na/ /zhi ba'i de nyid rgyu gcig ni/ /zla ba
nyi ma me dang gsum/ /lam gsum gyi ni dbus nas khyab/ /gdong gi sna ni zhes byar bshad/ /rlung rnams gnas kyi mtshan nyid dang / /de la gnas pa'i ye shes che/ /thig
le mu tig gis gnon yin/ /bsam gtan gti mug mchog las rgyal/ /dngos po thams cad rnam par spangs/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gsal/ /de kho na nyid lnga brten
mchog /de yi 'od zer thig le tsam/ /gdong gi sna rtser yang dag brten/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /gti mug rgya mtsho las ni rgyal/ /de nyid dam tshig sems dpa'
yi| |ming can du ni yang dag bshad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni/ /ye shes lnga yi mtshan nyid can/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pa rnams kyis ni/ /gti mug mun pa rnam 'joms
pa| |kun mkhyen rtog pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi rigs gnas na/ /sna rtse bu ga las byung zhing / /rlung lnga steng du yang dag rgyu/ /lus la rtag tu spyod par 'gyur/ /
kun rdzob snar ni rgyu ba yi/ /sgo de las ni rnam par byung / /g.yon dang g.yas dang gnyis ka dang / /dal bar rgyu dang rnam pa bzhi/ /g.yas pa las ni 'byung ba'i khams/ /me yi dkyil
'khor nyid yin te/ /kha dog dmar ba bzang po 'di/ /pad+ma mgon po rgyu ba 'o/ /g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dres pa/ /ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste/ /
dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rin chen mgon po rgyu ba 'o/ /dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams/ /dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni/ /'di ni chu yi dkyil 'khor te/ /rdo rje mgon po rgyu
pa 'o| |khams gsum las ni yang dag byung / /rten dang brten par bzung ba ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin te/ /'chi ba'i mthar ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po de
dag ni| |mnyam par bzhag pas rtag tu zlos/ /sngags bzlas pa yi grangs kyis ni/ /nyin mtshan rtag tu zlos pa yin/ /de ltar rlung ni sna rtser ni/ /kha dog lnga par rnam par bsgom/ /
gnyis med mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis| /'od zer tshogs ni dri ma med/ /de yis zhi sogs bya ba ni/ /rim gyis sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
rdo rje sems dpa' 'gro mgon la/ /de nas lag na rdo rjes zhus/ /thig le gsum gyi gzhung lugs ni/ /khyod zhabs bsnyen bkur gyis 'tshal na/ /'di la cung zad the tshom mchis//
@#/ /srid pa mthar mdzad gsal bar mdzad/ /rdzas dang sngags dang de bzhin rlung / /thig le gsum ni bsgoms pa na/ /rnal 'byor pa gcig nyid dam ni/ /yang na
rnal 'byor so sor bsgom/ /de la the tshom kun gcod gtso/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /yun ring chags chen dbang song bas/ /srid pa gsum du skyob pa rnams//
de dag 'gro ba'i don du ni/ /rdzas kyi thig le gsungs pa yin/ /zhe sdang chen po'i dbang song ba/ /mi gang mi srun pa yi lus/ /de rnams myur du grol don du/ /sngags kyi thig ler
gsungs pa yin/ /gti mug chen pos kun nas 'khrul/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho las skyob gang / /de dag dngos grub brgyad 'bras bu/ /thob phyir ye shes rgya mtsho ni/ /rlung gi thig ler
gsungs pa yin/ /yang dag de nyid spros pa ni/ /de ltar yang dag thig le gsum/ /bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin/ /tshe 'di nyid la grub don du/ /sgrib pa thams cad dag pa'i
phyir| |rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis ni/ /ye shes gsum gnas nyams dga' ba/ /me tog 'bras bu chu yis brgyan/ /skye bos dben pa'i ri yi rtser/ /dngos grub thams cad
bsdus pa ni/ /'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs ba las/ sna'i rtse mo gsum gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu
rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad kyi nyon/ /stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni/ /lus la gnas pa de nyid mchog /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /chos
rnams thams cad snang bar byed/ /mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'dod/ /de las ye shes bde ba che/ /'od gsal ba ni rnam dag pa/ /gang phyir a ba d+hU tIr zhugs/ /yang dag stong pa nyid du
'dod| |chos rnams rnam rtog snang ba mched/ /rtog pa thams cad gcod par byed/ /rnam rtog rlung gi ngal bso ba/ /de ni stong pa nyid du bshad/ /gtso bo chen po mi bskyod pa'i/ /'jig
rten khams ni de nyid do/ /der ni rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sa/ /srog gi ye shes ming can te/ /gzugs med drag po chen po yi/ /zhi ba'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid can/ /de la ye shes bde
ba che| |byang chub sems kyi sa gang nyid/ /de nyid bde chen go 'phang gnas/ /ye shes yang dag byang chub sems/ /de la sogs pa ming gi sgras/ /brjod bya gcig pu bde ba che/ /dngos
po gcig dang ldan pa nyid/ /stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod/ /bde ba can zhes de la bshad/ /bde ba dge ba'i thob mtshan nyid/ /gang de bde bar gnas pa ni/ /de ni bde ba can zhes
brjod| |tshe dpag med pa'i zhing khams na/ /bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog /byang chub sems ni tshe dpag med/ /de las byung ba'i skye ba'i 'od/ /de phyir 'od dpag med du shes/ /
@#/ /bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog /stong nyid rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug /de nyid mnyam par sbyor ba ni/ /stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod/ /shes rab pad+ma la la nA/ /
zla mtshan nyi ma 'bab pa na/ /de yang stong par rnam par shes/ /gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /thabs kyi rdo rje ra sa nA/ /zla ba shu kra rab tu 'bab/ /de ni ye shes mchog
tu gsungs/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog /de gnyis sbyor ba mchog tu shes/ /stong nyid ye shes mi zad pa/ /zla ba nya dang de nyid yin/ /rnal 'byor ma yi zhal las
shes| |rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi tshig bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang
bshad kyi nyon/ /lus ni stong pa nyid kyi gnas/ /lus ni gang gis shes pa ni/ /lha rnams kun gyi pho brang mchog /longs spyod chos dang sprul pa dang / /bde ba chen po yi ni
rten| |'khor lo yang ni gang bshad pa/ /rim pa ji bzhin ma lus pa/ /de ltar rtag tu yang dag bzhugs/ /thim dang longs spyod bdag po ni/ /lha nyid mchog tu gnyis su
med| |yang dag ngo bo'i go 'phang rten/ /ye shes chen po'i go 'phang phyir/ /bde ba chen po'i yang dag rten/ /zhe sdang che dang gti mug che/ /phrag dog che dang chags dngos kyis/ /
khro bo che dang rnam pa'i mchog /'khor ba'i mdud pa nges gcod pa/ /sa dang chu dang de bzhin med/ /rlung dang nam mkha'i dbye ba yis/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg bya nyid
dang ni| |chos kyi dbyings dang mig bzang dang / /rna ba sna dang lce dang ni/ /lus kyi rnam shes chos dang ni/ /kun gzhi nyon mongs can gyi yid/ /dad dang brtson 'grus dran ting 'dzin/ /shes
rab dbang po'i dbye ba yis/ /dad stobs brtson 'grus stobs dang ni/ /dran pa'i stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs/ /shes rab stobs ni bla na med/ /ji bzhin gnas su yang dag shes/ /lus
kyi lha ru gsal ba yin/ /sngon bzhin ming gi dbye ba yis/ /sngags kyi dbye bas rim pa dang / /sngags dgod pa yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rim bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yis/ /lung gi rnam
par nges byas pa'i/ /yang dag gnas kyi dbye ba dang / /lha mo rtag tu rnal 'byor pas/ /bdag la byin brlab go 'phang gnas/ /'dod pa lnga la longs spyod cing / /rab tu 'bad de mchod
pa byas| |rdo shing sa yi rang bzhin gyi/ /phyi rol lha la phyag mi bya/ /bdag la byin brlab rim de nyid/ /gzhan du srid pa gsum na med/ /de kho na nyid rnal 'byor mchog /bdag la byin
brlab sgrib med pa/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pa sogs/ /phyi yi dngos po mi bgrang ste/ /de nyid thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu ni/ /'bad pas byin gyis
@#/ /brlab par 'dod/ /bdag byin rlob thabs mchan nyid do/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ lus kyi lha ye shes kyi mtshan
nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi/ /de rnams kyi ni ming bshad bya/ /'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis/ /rtsa yi rim pa'i grangs kyis ni/ /las
dang rdo rje pad+ma dang / /'khor lo la sogs rigs dbye bas/ /rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba yis/ /rtsa yi rim pas yang dag bzhugs/ /'dir ni rigs ni lnga par yang / /de kho na nyid nyams
myong mchog /tshor ba nyams su myong ba yi/ /thams cad la ni khyab par gnas/ /sprul pa rang gi rigs las skyes/ /lha mo 'di dag yang dag zhugs/ /mkhyen ma gtum mo
dpa' mo ma/ /las sgrol ba dang yid gcugs ma/ /'khrul 'khor ma dang 'bud ma dang / /snying stobs yang dag sangs rgyas ma/ /rab dang ma dang yid 'ong ma/ /grub ma sprul 'tsho
sgra ma dang / /gter 'dzin lha yi dbang phyug ma/ /ge sar pad+ma dri med ma/ /rlung gi lu gu rgyud byed ma/ /bzang mo dang ni khwa yi gdong / /gnyid log ma dang mi 'phel ma/ /'phar ma
sngo sangs dus mtshan ma/ /rtse 'joms ma dang skal bzang 'phel/ /na ra dza na khyi gdong ma/ /chags ma dga' ma rnam sgeg ma/ /brtson 'grus 'phel dang dkar mo dang / /bdud
rtsi lnga ni 'phel ba ma/ /dngos 'bebs shin tu dpa' mo dang / /pad+ma lnga dang 'dod ma dang / /sgyu ma yid 'ong mdza' mo dang / /skyur dang chang gi dbang phyug ma/ /mi bzad che dang las skal
bzang / /me tog bzang mo gdug rmongs ma/ /steng gzigs zhal dang rtse gsum mtshan/ /mdzes ma dang ni ljang bskyod ma/ /rtag bam ma dang gar ma dang / /ri dwags mig dang chags
dga' ma/ /sna tshogs rmongs par rol pa mo/ /dkar mo 'jig rten gsum pa mo/ /ro blan dri med 'gro bstun ma/ /ral ga rnams ni yang dag bzhugs/ /rtag tu brgyad dang spel
ba'i grangs/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dri ma med/ /rigs kyi phyag rgya dbye ba yis/ /mtshon cha rnams kyis yang dag brgyan/ /de dag sna tshogs rdo rje g.yas/ /g.yon pa 'gying bas
up+ta la| |g.yas na 'khor lo rin chen dang / /de bzhin ral gri chos 'byung ni/ /g.yon gyi phyag gnyis la ni 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs/ /zhal ni
ljang gu spyan gsum pa/ /don yod grub pa'i cod pan can/ /zhal rnams bzhad par sgom pa dang / /bde ba thams cad 'phel bar byed/ /rang gi ming gi dbye ba yis/ /yi ge gsum
dang rnam par spel/ /sngags kyis kyang ni yang dag mchod/ /'dod pa'i de nyid rab stsol mdzad/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rtsa brgyad dbus/ /lha 'di dag ni yang dag bzhugs/ /rdor dbyings
@#/ /dbang phyug lA ma dang / /rdo rje phyag rgya stobs chen mo/ /rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje gdong / /rdo rje chos ma rdo rje bzang / /rdo rje rol mor shes par bya/ /chos kyi 'khor lor
dgu bdag nyid/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa dang / /sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang / /g.yas pa yi ni phyag na 'dzin/ /g.yon
na ral gri pad+ma dang / /dril bu 'dzin pa bla na med/ /sku mdog sngon po spyan gsum pa/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /rang ming yi ge gsum dang spel/ /sngags kyis de
dag rab tu mchod/ /longs spyod 'dab ma bcu drug la/ /pad+ma'i dbus na lha rnams bzhugs/ /pad+ma'i sgrol ma pad dkar mo/ /pad+ma ku mu da 'phel ma/ /pad+ma'i spyan dang pad
gtsug phud/ /pad+ma'i phreng ba pad skyes ma/ /pad gdan pad+ma'i dra ba ma/ /de bzhin pad+ma'i 'od dang ni/ /pad+ma'i spyan dang pad bzang ma/ /pad+ma'i nang bzhugs pad skyes ma/ /
pad+ma'i ge sar pad+ma ma/ /de ltar 'di ni yang dag bshad/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs/ /g.yas ni pad+ma 'khor
lo dang / /rdo rje yang ni 'debs par mdzad/ /g.yon na ral gri dril bu dang / /rin po che yis rnam par sgeg /spyan gsum rnam par 'char ba dang / /pad+ma dmar po'i mdog
ltar dmar/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyer bzhugs shing / /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /rang ming yi ge gsum dang bcas/ /'di rnams sngags ni bla na med/ /bde ba
chen po'i 'khor lo che/ /pad 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis la/ /rtag tu lha mo rnams ni bzhugs/ /rab tu sad pa 'bad pa can/ /'khor lo'i shugs ma rdo rje ldan/ /rin chen sgrol ma
pad zhugs ma/ /sna tshogs las ma gti mug dga'/ /zhe sdang rdo rje dga' chags ma/ /rdo rje las chags gzugs rdo rje/ /sgra yi rdo rje ro rdo rje/ /reg bya rdo rje chos dbyings ma/ /spyan
'od ma dang thod dbyangs ma/ /sna yi snang ba ro dga' ma/ /sku yi rgyal mtshan yid dga' ma/ /khams bcas ma dang rgyu 'bab ma/ /gshin rje 'joms pa'i blo yi ni/ /bye brag rnam
par rgyas ma dang / /pad+ma'i ral pa gyen du brdzes/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms pa mo/ /sbas pa'i mthil dang dbyug sngon ma/ /shin tu brtan ma stobs chen ma/ /rang byung
ma dang 'khor lo'i gtsug /de ltar rtsa yi dbus nas shar/ /slar yang lha mo zhal gsum dang / /phyag drug bde ba 'phel ba can/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang bzhugs/ /dri
med pad+ma dkar po'i mdog /zhi ba zhal gsum spyan gsum pa/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa ni/ /'khor lo lcags kyu rdo rje rim/ /de bzhin g.yon pa'i phyag gsum
@#/ /la| |pad+ma zhags pa rin po che/ /'char dang 'debs dang sgeg par mdzad/ /pad+ma dkar po 'dra ba'i 'od/ /spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad 'chang / /rang gi ming dang
yig gsum ming / /'di dag sngags ni go rim bzhin/ /de nyid mchog ni rab tu gsal/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sdom pa ni/ /de lta bu yi sdom pa mchog/ lha mo rnams kyi de
nyid mchog /rtag tu gnyid log lus la gnas/ /'dod pa lnga yi longs spyod bsten/ /mchod pa nyid kyis yang dag mnyes/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i bde bas myos/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i
go 'phang mchog /mnyes nas slar yang gso bar byed/ /de yi zhi sogs bya ba rnams/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /bsam gtan rnal 'byor sogs spyod dang / /
sngags dbyibs la sogs bya ba ni/ /dgos med mchog tu cung zad ni/ /bla ma'i lung las yang dag skyes/ /de phyir rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /'bad pas dngos grub kyis mnyes
bya| |rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ 'khor lo bzhi'i lha mo bzhi rim pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// //
de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /'char dang nub ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rtsa rnams kyis ni rnal 'byor mchog /dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gnas/ /mdun gnas pa yi
yul rnams las/ /yid la byed pas der mi 'gro/ /sngon gyi bag chags nang gnas pa/ /de tshe dbang po rab tu gsal/ /de yis de ni rab tu sad/ /de rnams rtsa la rim bzhin gnas/ /
rab sad de yis sad byas nas/ /lha mo rang yang 'khor lo las/ /de yis 'char ba'i rim par gsungs/ /nub pa yang ni bshad par bya/ /yul rnams kyang ni dngos bral med/ /yid
la byed nas gzhan du gnas/ /bag chags kyang ni sad mi sad/ /rtsa rnams 'char bar mi 'gyur zhing / /lha rnams yang dag sad par ni/ /de yi phyir ni mi 'gyur te/ /snying gi dbus
na bde ba'i dngos/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma gsal ba'i 'od/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis kyang / /de ni 'od zer bcu gnyis te/ /'od 'phel 'od zer gzi brjid ma/ /gsal ba
'bar ma 'od 'bar ma/ /mig la sogs pa la brten nas/ /phyi rol gzugs sogs 'dzin pa'o/ /mun sel 'od ma snang ba mo/ /gsal mdzes gsal 'od nyi ma gsal/ /
phyi rol gzugs sogs rnam pa'o/ /drug po 'di dag 'og tu 'dod/ /lha mo rnams ni gang 'char ba'ang / /ye shes nyi ma 'char ba yin/ /de yang yang dag nub pa ni/ /
de yang mchog tu nub ba 'o/ /'char ba nub pa rnams 'chad pa/ /go 'phang mchog tu shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po legs par sad/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma sdom pa'o//
@#/ /'di ni rnal 'byor de nyid mchog /'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i
rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /'char ba dang nub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /dga' ba skyed pa'i mtshan nyid
ni| |gang gis yang dag shes pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' go 'phang mchog /de ni rtsa yi 'khor lo la/ /slar yang rgyas dang bsdus pa yis/ /'khor lo bzhi yi yang dag sbyor//
rtsa rnams brgyad dang gnyis lhag pa/ /mtshams kyi rtsa yi rim pa yang / /rtsa ni bcu drug la yang brten/ /bzhi dang bzhi yis rtag tu khyab/ /de rnams dga' ba'i rim pa'o/ /chu
khams khong du chud pa can/ /pad+ma'i rnal ma lta bu yis/ /de ni de yis khyab byas shing / /bde ba chen po phan par byed/ /'khor lo so so'i dbye ba yis/ /cha bzhi pa yi yi ge ha//
shin tu phra ba'i cha rtag tu/ /khyab pa rten gyi tshul du gnas/ /rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba las/ /rim pa bcu drug dbye bas 'thob/ /phreng ba'i bdag nyid rmad byung ba'o/ /ro gcig
pa yi go 'phang 'thob/ /rim gyis so sor nyams myong las/ /sna tshogs chu yi sbyor ba las/ /rim gyis rgya mtsho chu bzhin du/ /sbyor ba bzhi yi 'khor lo'i dus/ /dga' ba
bzhi ni de la brjod/ /rnal 'byor ma rgyud spyod pa las/ /go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ dga' ba
skyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang yang dag nyon/ /rdo rje brtan pa'i lus kyis ni/ /rtag tu rtsa rnams kyi ni rgyun/ /de kho na nyid ngas bshad
bya| |stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/ /rtsa ni rtag tu rmad byung ba/ /byang chub sems ni 'bab par shes/ /bde ba thams cad rab tu 'phel/ /rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa/ /stong phrag nyi shu
rtsa bzhi ni/ /khrag 'bab par ni shes par bya/ /nyi ma 'pho ba'i bdag nyid can/ /rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa/ /stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/ /rlung rgyu bar ni shes par bya/ /rgya mtsho
chen po'i rgyud las ni/ /lus kyi gnas ni dbye ba yis/ /de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod/ /thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid/ /grangs ni bdun cu rtsa gnyis brjod/ /re re 'ang 'khor
lo stong stong ngo / /thim pa longs spyod bdag 'dor ba/ /gtso bo yang ni bsdus pa las/ /gnas rnams kyi ni grangs su 'gyur/ /slar yang bsdus nas 'gro ba na/ /gsum po brgyad
brgyad dbye ba'ang ni/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba dang / /thun tshod skad cig sbyor ba yis/ /rtsa rnams gong nas gong du ni/ /nang du 'gro bar shes par bya/ /g.yon pa byang chub
@#/ /zla ba 'bab/ /g.yas pa khrag dang nyi ma 'bab/ /dbus na rlung rgyu ba yis ni/ /me sad byed par shes par bya/ /la la nA dang ras nA/ /a ba d+hU ti zhes bya'i ming / /
de rnams spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /re re'i rim gyis thun brgyad brgyad/ /gsum pa nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gro/ /thim dang longs spyod bdag po'i phyir/ /rim gyis grangs ni bdun cu
gnyis| |slar yang de spro sbyor ba yis/ /re re'ang stong stong dbye ba yis/ /rtag tu grangs nyid 'gyur ba ni/ /stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so/ /gtso bo gsum po slar yang ni/ /
sbyor bas gcig pa nyid du 'gro/ /dang po las ni rnal 'byor pas/ /phra ba de ni shes par dka'/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mchog tu ni/ /thig le nA da rnam par spangs/ /bde ba
kun gyi gzhi gsang ba/ /srog gi rten gyi mtshan nyid dang / /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang / /dus kyi rtsa ni rnam par bshad/ /ro gcig go 'phang bdag nyid can/ /rnal
'byor ma yi rgyud las shes/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /rtsa 'bab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu
pa'o|| ||de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /mtshams kyi rtsa yi ngo bo nyid/ /rtsa rnams sdom par 'char ba ni/ /gang gis shes na rtag tu ni/ /mchog tu dga'
ba nyams myong ba/ /lha yi ye shes gsal bar byed/ /lha yi sngags su yang dag sbyor/ /lha yi rnal 'byor don nges pa/ /de nyid gsum sbyor dri ma med/ /de gsum gcig car bdag nyid
sdom| |'jig rten gsum du khyab cing phra/ /lus kun la ni yang dag brten/ /ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems/ /gang phyir dam tshig sems dpa' bde/ /rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par
bya| |khyab pa'i de nyid rmad byung ba/ /mchog rab mchog dang phra ba dang / /rang byung ye shes mi zad pa/ /byang sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab/ /rtsa ni thams cad mchog tu rgyas/ /bde ba che
po'i 'khor lor gnas/ /cha kun bdag nyid rtsa ba ni/ /de yi dbus su rtsa gsum ste/ /gtso bo yang ni yang dag bshad/ /zla ba nyi ma me rgyu ba/ /'byung ba thams cad la ni khyab/ /ji ltar
shing rtsa cung zad cig /sa la brtan par gnas pa na/ /sdong bu yal ga 'dab phre'u/ /sogs pa yis ni kun nas khyab/ /de bzhin skyes bu mgor ldan pas/ /phung po khams la
sogs tshogs la/ /mchog tu kun nas khyab pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dngos/ /de kho na nyid gsum sdom pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /rang bzhin mtshan
nyid dbye ba gsum/ /mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams kyis kyang / /dam tshig mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum/ /sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun ni/ /gsum phye dam tshig mtshan nyid
@#/ /dang / /stong nyid ye shes rdo rje ni/ /rnam gsum de nyid mtshan nyid do/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu nye 'khor ni/ /rnal 'byor gsum gyi mtshan nyid do/ /rlung dang bad kan
mkhris pa ni/ /gsum phye khams gsum bsdus pa'o/ /'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams/ /'jig rten gsum pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /rtsa ba gsum dang 'bras
bu gcig /rim bzhin gyur nas chos 'khor 'gro /de ni sprul pa gsum du gsal/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /gang tshe de la rab sbyor ba/ /de ni gzas zin mtshan
nyid do| |gang tshe cung zad sbyor ba na/ /de tshe phyed 'dzin mtshan nyid do/ /gang phyir srog ni rlung bcom na/ /de tshe 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid yin/ /rtsa yi gtso bo 'ang nyid rnams ni/ /

gsum po nges pa zhes ni bya/ /rgyas par rnal 'byor ma rgyud las/ /rnal 'byor pa yis gsal por shes/ /rnal 'byor pa yis gsal por shes/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa
las| mtshams kyi rtsa gsum gyi nges pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /rlung skye ba yi mtshan nyid ni/ /dus kyi glags ni btsal
ba na| |ji ltar dngos su yang dag shes/ /bag chags nyon mongs can gyi yid/ /rang gi ngo bo gzugs gzhan mthong / /don ni shes par mi shes shing / /rlung tsam
gcig pus rmongs pa'o/ /kun gzhi rnam shes bkug nas ni/ /bag chags nang du rnam par spyod/ /bag chags kyis ni rnam shes bzung / /bag chags dang 'dres
rim pa las/ /nang gi bag chags bgos pa yis/ /de rnams zla mtshan dus su ni/ /mngal gyi rtsa la 'jug pa na/ /rdo rje khu khrag zhu thig le/ /'dres pa ru ni gyur pa dang / /kun
gzhi las ni rnam shes skye/ /ji ltar chang ros myos pa bzhin/ /kun gzhi rnam shes bag chags las/ /rnam par shes pa'i rgyun ni skye/ /nyon mongs can ni srog rlung nyid/ /skad
cig gcig la yang dag 'gro/ /thog mar 'pho ba'i dus su ni/ /nya yi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur/ /'pho ba gnyis pa'i dus su ni/ /slar yang khrag dang 'dres pa ni/ /steng dang 'og
gi dbye ba yis/ /srog gi rlung ni gnyis su 'gro /thur sel rlung gi 'gro 'ong la/ /rus sbal rnam par 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de nas 'pho ba gsum pa la/ /khrag dang khu ba zos pa na//
thur du sel ba'i rlung gi tshogs/ /bskams nas gyen du rlung ni 'byung / /steng du kha bltas nas ni gnas/ /phag rgod 'dra ba'i lus 'chang 'gyur/ /slar yang 'pho ba bzhi pa
la| |khrag dang khu ba bsgos pa ni/ /gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung bkug nas/ /'og tu kha bltas nas ni 'gro/ /seng+ge'i rnam pa yis kyang ni/ /khyab byed rlung ni spro bar byed/ /de nas 'pho
@#/ /ba lnga pa la/ /khrag dang khu ba 'phel nas ni/ /mnyam gnas rlung ni 'dar nas ni/ /me yi gzugs red rim bzhin 'gro/ /mnyam gnas rlung gi khyab byed spro/ /gang
gis 'gul dang 'dar bar 'gyur/ /phung po lnga ni rdzogs pa na/ /de ltar gsungs pa de las slar/ /'pho ba drug pa'i dus tshod la/ /sa yi khams dang mig gnyis dang / /khyab byed
rlung gis klu rlung spro/ /rlung gi dngos po 'phel bar byed/ /de nas 'pho ba bdun pa la/ /chu yi khams dang sna bug 'dod/ /klu yi rlung gis rus sbal rlung / /spros nas gnyis su med par
sprod| |de nas 'pho ba brgyad ba la/ /me dang sna yi bu kha 'byed/ /rus sbal rlung gis rtsangs rlung spro/ /rang gi rang bzhin shes par byed/ /de nas 'pho ba dgu pa la/ /rlung gi khams dang

ro ni tshor/ /rtsangs pa zhes bya'i rlung chen pos/ /lha sbyin rlung ni spro bar byed/ /de rjes 'pho ba bcu pa la/ /lha sbyin rlung gis gzhu rgyal spro/ /rlung kun bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /dgu pa'i
dbus na khyab pa'i khams/ /phra zhing thogs med mtshan nyid can/ /rtsa dang rgyu ma rgyus pa'i sbubs/ /sgo ni dgu po rgyas par byed/ /lus kyi mchog tu tshor ba dang / /gcig tu reg
pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin/ /ra ba sad mchog ni nam mkha' la/ /'od gsal bzang po yang dag gnas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa bcu/ /de lta bu nyid bshad par bya/ /'pho ba
bcu ni sa bcu ste/ /rim pa yis ni rnam par shes/ /ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /b+ha ga phyag rgya chen por brjod/ /byis pa yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /thams cad mkhyen cid thams
cad gzigs/ /mgo bo'i skra ni bregs pa dang / /phru ma'i chos gos dmar po bgos/ /dpal dang ldan pa thal mo sbyar/ /spyi bo sa la gtugs pa phyag /mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis
'chang | |dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan/ /ye shes chen po legs par sad/ /'du byed thob pa grol dang bcas/ /dpa' bo chen po rnam rtog med/ /skyed byed sha ni 'jigs par
byed| |bdud rtsi lnga ni ye shes che/ /rtag tu bdud rtsi lnga myang byed/ /dngos po thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /rnal 'byor seng+ge bzhin du sbyor/ /'di nyid mchog ni gsang ba ste/ /gang du yang ni
ma gsungs so/ /rlung skyes pa yi nges pa ni/ /bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ rlung gis bskyed pa skyes bu skye ba
'jug pa'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rlung rnams mchog tu nub pa ni/ /gang gis yang dag shes pa yis/ /'chi ba'i skad cig mtshan
nyid ni| |phan tshun du ni yang dag sdud/ /skye ba'i rim ltar thim par 'gyur/ /rlung rnams yang dag skye ba ni/ /phan tshun nub pa'i nyi ma bzhin/ /thog mar lo bcu lon nas ni/ /rgyag
@#/ /pas myos pa'i rlung skyes nas/ /gzhu las rgyal ba'i rlung zos te/ /rim gyis sgra gcan zla ba bzhin/ /de rjes lo bcu phyin pa ni/ /rgyags chu rlung gis yang dag skye//
lha sbyin zhes bya'i rlung ni za/ /rlung gi rim pa snga ma bzhin/ /gzhan yang lo bcu phyin pa na/ /rgyags pa'i chu rlung skyes par 'gyur/ /rtsangs pa zhes bya'i rlung ni za/ /de nas gzhan
yang lo bcu phyin/ /lo las skyes pa'i rim pa yis/ /btang bzung rlung ni chen po yis/ /rus sbal rlung ni za bar byed/ /klu yi rlung dang btang bzung rlung / /stobs dang gzi brjid
mtshungs pa'i phyir/ /dus gzhan lo bcur phyin pa na/ /gnod pa byed par mi nus te/ /stobs dang nus pa mtshungs pa'i phyir/ /gang gis gang la gnod pa ni/ /byed pa nyid du
mi nus so/ /bcu ste gzhan du phyin pa'o/ /long ba btang bzung stobs chen thob/ /klu yi rlung ni rim gyis za/ /de nas bcu pa gzhan phyin na/ /khrag dang sha ni rnam par 'phel//
rgyags shing myos pa'i rim pa yis/ /btang bzung rlung ni za bar byed/ /de rjes lo bcu lon pa na/ /myos chu rlung ni bkug nas ni/ /tshil dang kha chu rnam par 'phel/ /de yis
btang bzung klu za byed/ /de nas bcu pa gzhan phyin pa/ /lo la btang bzung rlung stobs skyes/ /myos pa'i dus rlung za bar byed/ /me dang rlung ni 'phel bar byed/ /btang bzung
rlung nyid rnam gyur nas/ /longs spyod chen po 'phel gyur nas/ /de nas lo bcu gzhan lon nas/ /rlung gis lus rgyas lci bar 'gyur/ /chu dang rlung ni 'dres pa ni/ /khyab cing bsgribs
byas rim pa las/ /de las lo bcu gzhan du phyin/ /chu shing 'bras bu bzhin du med/ /rtsa ba dang bcas med par 'gyur/ /las kyi rnam smin mtha' yis ni/ /de ltar rim pa bcu pa
yis| |zla ba 'am ni nyin zhag gzhan/ /tshe ni nyung ngur byas nas ni/ /srog zad par ni shes par bya/ /mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i rgyud las ni/ /shin tu rgyas par shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor
chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /rlung gi rim pas srog zad pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o// //
de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /mtshan nyid chen po ye shes mchog /bsdu ba'i mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor mchog /snying pos snying po'i don bsdus pa/ /gang phyir
mkha' 'gro mas bsdus pa/ /de phyir bsdus pa'i mkha' 'gro brjod/ /lte ba'i dbus na rtag bzhugs pa/ /nyi ma stong dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /kun rtog thams cad 'joms par
byed| |char pas phung po'i rnam rtog ni/ /bsregs byas bar chad med pa'i lus/ /rdo rje khams kyi rnam rtog ni/ /bsdus nas slar yang rang bzhin gyis/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam
@#/ /rtog ni| |snying rjes der ni slar yang sdud/ /de ltar gang la phye leb bzhin/ /'ching ba thams cad sreg par byed/ /rlung gis de nyid mngon sbyor bas/ /sngags kyi
lus kyi sbyor ba yis/ /rnam par rtog pa tsam yang ni/ /sreg pa nyid du the tshom med/ /mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i rgyud las ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi rim shes na/ /mkha' 'gro ye
shes rgyas par ni/ /rnal 'byor bsten pa rig par bya/ /rnal 'byor bsten pa rig par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /mkha' 'gro ma sdud pa'i le'u ste sum
cu bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /rnam rtog rlung ni rnam par gcod/ /nyin dang mtshan du shes par ni/ /brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu/ /rlung
rnams de ni rnam rtog ni/ /gang phyir rnam par gcod par byed/ /rnal 'byor de ni mchog tu zhi/ /thams cad stong pa'i ngo bor byed/ /the tshom thog ma sbyor ba drug /rnal 'byor
rig pas mchog tu sgrub/ /de nas dbyangs med yi ge ha/ /shin tu rgya che bzlas par bya/ /gang phyir mdud pa 'joms byed cing / /bde ba skye ba ster bar byed/ /de yis rnam rtog
thams cad ni/ /skad cig gis ni gcod par byed/ /rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang / /shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/ /de yi dbye ba bco brgyad kyis/ /dang po sbyor
ba bsgom par bya/ /bcu bdun rjes su rnal 'byor sogs/ /de las dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog la dbye ba lnga/ /de las kyang ni las rgyal mchog /rnal 'byor dbye ba
bcu gnyis so/ /de nyid dbye ba bzhi bcu dgu/ bskyed pa'i rim pa bsdus pa yis/ /mngon sum byed pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /de la rdo rje bzlas rim mchog /rdzogs rim rnal 'byor
yan lag ni/ /rnam par rtog pa 'joms byed pa/ /phra ba'i de nyid bla na med/ /cho ga ji bzhin rnal 'byor pa/ /blo dang ldan pas sngon bzhin bsgom/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod par
byed| |rnal 'byor chen po ye shes che/ /nges par bsgoms pas yang dag ni/ /rnam rtog rlung ni 'joms par byed/ /don gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa yis/ /dngos med ngo bo gcig pa
dang / /stong nyid brten pa mngon par zhen/ /sgom pa nges par brtan par byed/ /sgrub pos yang dag bsgoms byas nas/ /rdo rje bzlas rim bla na med/ /de yi rim bzhin ye shes mchog
thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa
lnga pa'o|| //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /rnam rtog med pa'i rlung shar na/ /gang shes rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /yang dngos go 'phang bzang po 'thob/ /rnam rtog
@#/ /med pa'i rlung chen po/ /gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag /sgom dang sgom min go 'phang bral/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i
ye shes che/ /gnas pa med cing dri ma med/ /phra ba'i cha kun dbus na gnas/ /thig le nA da rnam par spangs/ /kun la khyab cing zhi ba dang / /bdag byin brlab pa'i mtshan
nyid gcig /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnams las grol/ /bag chags rnam rtog rnam par spangs/ /tshig dang mdud pa'i cha yi lam/ /sgom dang bsgom bya rnam par spangs/ /stong
nyid ye shes mtshan nyid do/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i cha/ /rnam pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs/ /bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor gyi/ /rgyud rnams la yang bklag mi bya/ /rnal
'byor chen po'i rgyud chen po/ /bshad par bya ba dam tshig mchog /man ngag ji bzhin cho ga bzhin/ /thog ma nyid du bshad par rigs/ /de yi rim pa rjes 'gro shes/ /bla ma
brgyud pa'i go 'phang mchog /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng pa ma ngon par rtogs pa las/ /rnam rtog med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// //
de nas rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rtsa rnams nub pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /de kho na nyid bshad kyi nyon/ /yul dang dbang po yang dag sbyor/ /rtsa rnams kyang ni 'char bar 'gyur/ /
shar nas sngon bzhin song nas ni/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa bla na med/ /rnam rtog skye ba de yi phyir/ /brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rim/ /de las skye dang rga dang na/ /'chi zhing slar yang
ldog par 'gyur/ /yul rnams dngos po med pa yis/ /sbyangs pa'i ye shes de nyid phyir/ /de nyid de la spyod pa'i phyir/ /dang su yul rnams dngos med phyir/ /dbang po rnams ni skye
ba min| |de las gnyis gnyis yang dag sbyor/ /dngos dang dngos med stong pa nyid/ /de nas rtsa rnams nub 'gyur te/ /'khor lo'i rim pa la yang brten/ /de rnams bsdus pa las
ni zhi| |stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni/ /kun kyang rtsa yi 'khor lor 'gyur/ /de nyid kun chas nang du khyab/ /stong nyid sgom pa rnal 'byor las/ /yul rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid/ /nges pa
ru ni shes pa zhes/ /rigs pa'i rdo rjes rnam par 'joms/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /rtsa rnams nub pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu
rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /sbyor drug go 'phang mtshan nyid ni/ /ji lta ji lta ba bzhin sbyor/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i yan lag brten/ /rnam pa drug po
de las phyed/ /de bzhin brgyad brgyad de las lhag /brgyad gnyis brgyad phrag bzhi dang ni/ /de ltar grangs kyis sbyor ba gsal/ /zla ba phyed pa'i cha lta bu/ /stong nyid rlung gi 'khor
@#/ /lor gnas/ /phyed pa ma yin rdzogs pa min/ /chu yi zla ba lta bur snang / /sgyu ma chen po 'gro ba'i ma/ /thams cad rten pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rlung gi 'khor lo
srog ces bshad/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi spyod yul min/ /me yi 'khor lo stong nyid khyab/ /dbus na thig le lta bu ni/ /mi 'gyur kun du 'gro ba dang / /rang byung kun la khyab pa dang //
bde ba yang dag 'phel bar byed/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed rnam par spangs/ /'jig rten gsum ni ma lus pa/ /gcig tu byas na skyed par byed/ /mi shigs nA da'i go 'phang can/ /
rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /sbrul gyi lce ltar g.yo ba dang / /tshangs pa la sogs pha mes dang / /'jigs pa ma yin g.yo ba min/ /yi ge dang ni tshig ma yin/ /'byung ba'i
tshogs ni rnam par spangs/ /grangs bral zad med skye ba med/ /lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa/ /sgra tsam dri ma dang bral ba/ /chags
bral chags pa med pa dang / /bya ba byed dang gnas med pa/ /dpe med gnas pa med pa dang / /srog dang rtsol ba rnam par spangs/ /lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog /de
lta bu yang rnyed par dka'/ /longs spyod 'khor lo mchog tu gnas/ /'ching ba med pa'i rnam pa mchog /mchog tu khong du chud gyur pa/ /rnam pa kun gyis yang dag bzhugs//
rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin gyis/ /chang gi ro yis myos pa bzhin/ /mchog ni dang po ma lus pa/ /dngos bo kun gyi nang na gnas/ /thog ma tha ma lhag par gnas/ /mtshan nyid
med cing snang ba med/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rnam par spangs/ /zhi ba mi 'jigs brjod du med/ /rang bzhin nyams myong rang ngo bo/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas/ /bla ma brgyud
pa las ni thob/ /de ltar ye shes bye brag che/ /rang gi ngo bo rnam shes drug/ /steng dang 'og tu yang dag sbyor/ /rnal 'byor zhes ni rab tu grags/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo
rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ 'khor lo drug sgom pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs/ /dus kyi mtshan nyid sdom pa
ni| |rnal 'byor gang gis rnam par shes/ /grangs kyi rnal 'byor bla na med/ /dus ni dus tshod ces ni bshad/ /bsam dang bsam bral rang dngos ni/ /dus bzang dang ni dus ngan
dang / /rnam pa gnyis la yang dag gnas/ /sna yi bu ga las byung nas/ /phyi yi sgo las rtag tu 'char/ /nang du sdud par dus bzang gsungs/ /'byung ba yang ni dus ngan 'dod/ /
dus ngan las ni gzhan pa mchog /dus bzang mchog ste rang nyid ni/ /rdzogs ldan dang ni gsum ldan dang / /gnyis ldan dang ni dus bzang po/ /rtsod pa'i dus ni ngan pa ste/ /de
@#/ /ltar gsungs pa'i dus mtshan nyid/ /dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang / /lhan cig skyes pa dus bzang ste/ /dga' dang bral ba ngan dus so/ /dus kyi mtshan
nyid de ltar bshad/ /'jug pa dang ni gnas pa'i dus/ /dus bzang por ni yongs su grags/ /ldang ba yang ni dus ngan te/ /de ltar dus kyi mtshan nyid do/ /dus ni khams rnams
thams cad de/ /mnyam pa ro gcig go 'phang mchog /ye shes rnam shes rnam spangs te/ /dus ni gcig ni brjod pa yin/ /dngos dang dngos med spros bral ba/ /bzhi pa'i skad
cig mtshan nyid ni/ /brjod bya rjod byed las grol ba/ /dus gcig ces ni brjod pa yin/ /chags dang chags bral nges grol ba/ /bde ba chen po go 'phang spangs/ /phyag rgya chen
po'i don gyi gzhi/ /dus gcig ces ni brjod pa yin/ /mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med/ /grangs ni rnal 'byor rnam par spangs/ /de nyid dus su ngas bshad de/ /bla ma brgyud pa
las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /dus dang dus tshad rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //
de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i 'bras bu mchog nyon cig/ gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gro/ /phyag rgya chen po yang dag bsten/ /gsang ba sbas pa zhes
ni bshad/ /rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes shing / /bzhi pa'i dbang zhes bya ba'i ming / /zhal nas brgyud pa'i rim pa rnams/ /mchog tu zhi ba'i ye shes che/ /rnam rtog thams cad rnam
par spangs/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i don bsdus pa/ /rnal 'byor ma rgyud las bslab pa/ /mchog tu rmad byung ngo bo nyid/ /ye shes chen po'i ro 'bebs
pa| |de nyid chen po'i yon tan ldan/ /nam mkha' mchog la gnas pa'i sa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo/ /bde ba rnams ni 'phel bar byed/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang 'das/ /
shes dang shes bya rnam par bral/ /sgom dang bsgom bya rnam par spangs/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi bya bas stong / /kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /dngos po kun gyi go 'phang gsal/ /'jig
rten gsum gyi rnam pa'i mi/ /chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs/ /dam tshig chen po la gnas pa/ /grangs med 'jig rten gsum gcig dngos/ /dngos grub de kho na yi rgyud/ /
de ltar gsang ba'i 'bras bu gsal/ /gzhan ni gang du'ang ma gsungs pa/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi ye shes mchog /rnal 'byor ma rgyud las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal
rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /gsang ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang
@#/ /mchog /chos kyi dbyings nas khyab pa'i khams/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis de la brjod/ /kun khyab mchog tu phra ba dang / /kun 'gro rtag tu 'char ba dang / /phung po lnga nyid
'byung ba lnga/ /yul dang skye mched rnam shes dang / /de dag yang dag ldan chos kun/ /bshad de gsang ba'i dbang phyug skye/ /de dag dbus na gnas pa'i khams/ /khyab cing spyod
yul ma yin pa/ /ji ltar til gyi til mar dang / /ji ltar shing la me bzhin du/ /de bzhin chos rnams thams cad la/ /khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no/ /nam mkha' bzhin
du dri ma med/ /chos kun gyi ni gzhi yi mchog /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i kun rtog gis/ /khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no/ /stong nyid ye shes rnal 'byor gyis/ /rnal 'byor pa
yis gsal bar mthong / /chos dbyings b+ha ga zhes ni brjod/ /b+ha ga rin chen za ma tog /gang phyir dbang phyug sogs yon tan/ /ldan pa de phyir b+ha ga brjod/ /b+ha ga chos
rnams su yang bshad/ /dbyings ni byang chub sems su gsungs/ /khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba yis/ /rgyu na b+hi ga zhes byar bshad/ /dbyings ni yang dag sbyor dngos kyis//
chu zla bzhin du yang dag gnas/ /don dam gcig pu'i de nyid shes/ /lag mthil skyu ru bzhag pa bzhin/ /mchog gi de nyid ltar ni snang / /rang rig shin tu dri ma med/ /dngos
dang dngos med zad nas ni/ /rtag tu de nyid mthong zhing snang / /chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang gsal/ /de ltar shin tu rgyas par bshad/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas/ /sbyor bral shes pa
rmad du byung / /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi don bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom
ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /rdo rje yi ni mtshan nyid mchog /de yi don du bshad kyi nyon/ /ji lta ba bzhin bshad par bya/ /rdo rje mi phyed ces ni gsungs/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid mchog /rtsa
lnga yi ni nam mkhar brten/ /rtse mo lnga yi rang ngo bo/ /sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dang ni/ /rtsa yi nam mkha'i cha yi gzugs/ /bla ma brgyud las shes par bya//
aM raM laM baM yaM sa bon/ /brjod pa rtsa ni lnga rnams te/ /'bad pa yis ni shes par bya/ /rdo rjes skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ /pad+ma lte ba'i dbus gnas pa/ /thig ler bshad pa 'gro ba med/ /dam
tshig gnas ni shes pa dang / /bdud rtsi mchog gis rab tu gang / /rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med/ /de ni rdo rjer yongs su grags/ /me long mnyam nyid ye shes dang / /so sor rtog
dang bya nan tan/ /rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin no/ /de yi ngo bo yongs su shes/ /rdo rje rang nyid nyams myong mchog /nam mkha' cher gnas zhi ba dang //
@#/ /rtog pa med cing nyon mongs med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag gzhi/ /bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par
rtogs pa las/ /rdo rje bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /rigs kyi dbye ba don bsdus pa/ /de tshe rigs ni rnam pa lnga/ /rtsa
ba'i rgyud du gsal bar gsungs/ /rnal 'byor spros pa dbye ba yis/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig go/ /rgyud du grags par dbye ba yi/ /mthar thug de ni yang dag gsungs//
de nyid las ni bsdus nas kyang / /rigs kyi dbye ba brgya ru gsungs/ /sna tshogs spros pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes ni brjod/ /gang gis de yi rnam pa mthong //
sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis/ /sna tshogs nyon mongs mnan nas ni/ /'gro ba'i bla mas grol ba'i
phyir| |gzhung nas gang gis de yis ni/ /sna tshogs spro ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /grangs med pa yi dbye ba yis/ /dbye ba grangs med sbyor ba yis/ /don dam rigs kyi dbye ba nyid/ /rgyud
gzhan rnams su gsungs pa yis/ /sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gis/ /de ni bsdus na dbye bar 'gyur/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo'i rim ba yis/ /stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis
pa'o| |de la stong phrag sum cu drug /lus kyi rdzas dang gnas sogs kyis/ /rim pa'i dbye ba de las kyang / /stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'o/ /de rjes brgya yis mchog tu gang / /bdun cu rtsa
gnyis drug cu bzhi/ /sum cu rtsa drug bsdus pa las/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi de las kyang / /sum cu dang ni dgu yang ngo / /de las lnga dang de phyir gsum/ /gsum yang bsdus na gcig nyid do//
rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gzhan yang gzhan du 'dres nas 'gro/ /de yang 'od gsal go 'phang la'o/ /rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che/ /gnyis med ye shes dri ma med/ /chos
kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid mchog /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ rigs kyi dbye ba'i don bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa
gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med/ /chos dang las dang dam tshig dang / /phyag rgya chen po mngon par brjod/ /las kyi
rnam smin nges pa yis/ /kun nas rgyas btab lta bur gnas/ /gang yang 'di ni las gang gi /de 'bras ji lta ba bzhin 'gyur/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid/ /rang bzhin gyis
ni rgyas btab nas/ /dam tshig rang gi yon tan dngos/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis rgyas btab pa/ /stong dang snying rje mi phyed pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyong ba/ /de bzhin gshegs
@#/ /pa'i dam tshig ni/ /yongs su dag pa'i mdzad pa yis/ /de yi rang bzhin rang bzhin med/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes ni brjod/ /las kyi phyag rgya yongs shes na/ /sngags
pa las ni thob par skye/ /bla mas shes rab dbang bskur na/ /ji ltar mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang dngos don/ /snying rje'i bsam pas gsal ba ni/ /de las
nges par thob nas ni/ /chos nyid sgo nas nges par byed/ /de ltar de nyid de ye shes/ /de ltar rnal 'byor ma mtshan nyid/ /dam tshig la zhen mkhas pa dang / /rlung gi de nyid pha rol
son| |dpal ldan 'dus pa'i don bslab pa/ /ngag 'jam shes rab ldan ma dang / /mig yangs ma yi bu mo rnyed/ /gzugs dang lang chos rnam par brgyan/ /ji bzhin rnal 'byor
dam tshig la/ /phyag rgyas lhan cig sgrub par byed/ /de nas de nyid thob pa na/ /phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid do/ /de nyid bde chen go 'phang ni/ /kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs//
stong nyid ye shes dri ma med/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang gsal/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med/ /rigs dang pha rol phyin dbye bas/ /phyag rgya
drug tu yang dag bshad/ /yaM raM laM baM aM haM dang / /lha mo rnams kyi rim pa las/ /mchod pa'i rim pa ro gcig pa/ /rtag tu yang ni mchod par bya/ /gdol pa mo dang khrus mkhan
mo| |sme sha can dang gar mkhan ma/ /ro sreg mo dang bram ze mo/ /grub 'gyur don du rnal 'byor pas/ /bdag nyid rol cing gnas par bya/ /khrus mkhan rin chen rigs las skyes/ /gdol
pa pad+ma'i rigs las skyes/ /de bzhin gar mkhan las kyi rigs/ /ro sreg ma ni 'khor lo'i rigs/ /sme sha can ni rdo rje'i rigs/ /ye shes phyag rgya bram ze mo/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs
su brjod/ /'di ni rigs ni drug tu 'gyur/ /bram ze mo ni ma yin te/ /khrus mkhan mo ni sring mor brjod/ /gar mkhan mo ni bu mor shes/ /sme sha can ni chung mar grags/ /ro sreg mo ni mna'
ma ste| |sgyug mo gdol pa ma zhes bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/ /rnam rtog med pas brjod par bya/ /gang phyir rnam rtog med gyur na/ /dngos grub kun la dus kun tu/ /sems ni ma ru
gyur nas ni/ /sring mo dag tu yang dag bshad/ /lus ni bu mor shes par bya/ /srog ni chung mar rab tu gsal/ /mna' ma thur du sel ba'i rlung / /dbu ma'i rlung ni sgyug mor brjod/ /ma ni rgyags
pa'i rtse mo cha/ /sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog /sring mo khu ba 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /spyi bo'i gnas na yang dag gnas/ /bu mo khrag rgyu ba yi rtsa/ /de ni phyed phyed lhag par gnas/ /chung ma
gcin ni 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /de nyid kyi ni dbus na gnas/ /mna' ma mchi ma 'dzag pa'i rtsa/ /mgrin pa'i gnas su lhag par gnas/ /ma ni sa ru yang dag bshad/ /chu yi khams ni
@#/ /sring mor brjod/ /me ni bu mor shes par bya/ /rlung ni chung mar rab tu grags/ /mna' ma nam mkha' ru ni bshad/ /sgyug mo nam mkha' chen po 'o/ /mngar bar gyur
pas ma dang ni/ /skyur ba sring mo ru ni brjod/ /kha ba rang gi bu mo dang / /lan tshwa chung mar yongs su grags/ /bska ba sgyug mor shes par bya/ /tsha ba mna' mar yongs su grags/ /
de dag 'bad pas 'dod bya zhing / /dngos grub 'dod pas bsten par bya/ /las kyi phyag rgya dbye ba 'di/ /de yi yon tan bsten pa'i mchog /dam tshig de dang rtog par 'jug /phyag
rgya chen po'i bde ba che/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang zhi/ /ye shes mchog ni bla na med/ /de ltar phyag rgya'i go 'phang gsal/ /rnal 'byor ma rgyud spyod yul lo/ /rnal 'byor chen
po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /phyag rgya'i dbye ba rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang yang dag bshad/ /phung
sogs skye mched mtshan nyid ni/ /rgyal ba rgyal ni gzugs zhes bshad/ /rdo rje 'dzin ni rnam shes dang / /rin chen 'dzin la tshor bar gsungs/ /'khor ba las rgal 'du shes
gsungs/ /shes rab 'dzin ni 'du byed dang / /de ltar phung por rab tu gsungs/ /sa ni gti mug dga' mar bshad/ /de bzhin chu ni zhe sdang dga'/ /me ni chags la dga'

ba dang / /de bzhin rlung ni rdo rje dga'/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug /gzugs ni gzugs kyi rdo rje dang / /sgra ni sgra yi rdo rje ste/ /dri ni dri yi rdo rje dang / /ro ni ro yi rdo rjer bshad//
reg bya'i rdo rje reg byar 'gyur/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /mig gnyis sa yi snying po dang / /rna ba phyag na rdo rje dang / /sna ni nam mkha'i snying po dang / /lce ni 'jig rten mgon
po dang / /lus ni sgrib pa rnam sel brjod/ /yid ni kun tu bzang po dang / /rtsa ni byams pa ru ni brjod/ /ye shes mchog ni 'jam dpal nyid/ /khyab pa ru ni yang dag bshad/ /de bzhin
lus kyi chos rnams ni/ /khro bo bcur ni yang dag bshad/ /de ltar lus kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs/ /phung po la sogs skye mched sogs/ /rnal 'byor gnyis med mchog gis ni/ /bla ma
brgyud pa las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ phung po la sogs pa dang skye mched kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga
pa'o|| ||de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don mtshan nyid/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i 'bras bu zhi/ /ye shes chen po'i don bsdus pa/ /bde ba chen po'i skal
ba che| |ro mchog chen po'i bdag nyid can/ /sgyu ma chen mo mchog tu phra/ /chen po'i chen po nam mkha' che/ /phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs ye shes/ /rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang ste/ /mi
@#/ /phyed rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas/ /rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che/ /nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med/ /rang bzhin med cing gzhi dang bral/ /gnyis med bdag med brjod du med/ /
rnal 'byor rnams ni rang rig pa/ /phung po khams dang skye mched cha'i/ /kun rtog chos ni yongs su spangs/ /sgom dang bsgom bya snyoms 'jug dang / /rim pa gnyis ni rnam
par spangs/ /rnam shes ye shes dang bral ba/ /sngags dang bzlas brjod bsnyen pa spangs/ /dngos po kun gyi gnas las rgal/ /ye shes chen po rab gsol pa/ /dngos
grub chen po 'dir shes bya/ /phyag rgya chen po bla na med/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ phyag rgya chen po'i don rnam par nges pa'i
le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs/ /nyams kyi mtshan nyid dbye ba ni/ /gang gis yongs shes rnal 'byor pa/ /rnal 'byor chen
po dag shes par/ /gyur nas kyang ni ye shes che/ /de nyid rnal 'byor kun las bsgyings/ /'dar dang rdul dang ba spu langs/ /dbyangs 'gyur ba dang ldib pa dang / /mdog
'gyur mchi 'dzag thim pa dang / /snying stobs can gyis 'di brgyad nyams/ /dga' ba rgyas pa'i rtsa yi cha/ /rgyags pa'i cha yi rtsa dga' na/ /khong stong 'dar bar skyed par

byed| |rgyags pa'i chu yi rtsa sad na/ /rab tu rdul byed skyed par byed/ /de bzhin rgyags pas g.yengs pa'i rtsa/ /khong stong ba spu lnga bar byed/ /de bzhin na sa ra yi rtsa/ /khong stong tshig ni lding
par byed/ /rus sbal chen po'i rtsa rgyas na/ /kha dog 'gyur ba skye bar byed/ /mgo bo chen po'i rtsa rgyas na/ /brgyal zhing sdug bsngal bcas par byed/ /'ur 'ur chen po'i rtsa bye na/ /ba spu langs
pa skyed par byed/ /dga' ba chen po'i rtsa rgyas na/ /khong stong mchi ma 'dzag par byed/ /myos pa chen po'i rtsa bye na/ /srog gi rlung ni thim par byed/ /brgyal dang sems med bde ba che//
de nas dran pa nyams par 'gyur/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams su shes/ /sngar bshad rim pa sad par byed/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHde bzhin du/ /a la la la la ho sngags/ /rab tu bskul bas
rgyas nas su/ /nyams ni so so'i dbye bas shes/ /de ltar de ni dbye rgyud pa'o/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ nyams kyi dbye ba bshad pa'i
le'u sta bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /bdag ces bya ba sgra yi rten/ /gang gis yang dag shes pa yis/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid
ni| |a haM 'khor lo'i 'ching ba dag /de ni yongs zad grol ba'o/ /a ni dngos po kun gyi mchog /lus rnams kun la lhag par gnas/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan/ /kun
@#/ /khyab kun mkhyen zad pa med/ /thogs med snying stobs zhes bya ba/ /thabs cig tu ni skye bar byed/ /srid dang srid rtse brtse ba med/ /sprul pa'i sku yi mchog dang
ni| |don kun byed pa la mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs 'byung ba'o/ /haM ni dngos po dang bral ba/ /lus la gnas kyang lus bskyed min/ /dbang po las 'das mi
gsal ba/ /rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol zhing / /gang la'ang lhag par gang gnas pa/ /dngos po thams cad nub pa dang / /chos kyi sku yi
ngo bo nyid/ /sems ni rdo rje 'chang dbugs phyung / /don kun byed pa dang bral ba/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin mya ngan 'das/ /ye shes sku yi rang bzhin nyid/ /rjod dang brjod bya rnam par
grol| |de yang yi ge haM du grags/ /thams cad a haM kun la khyab/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /a haM dngos po thams cad la/ /khyab pa'i sa ni lhag par gnas/ /
a haM dang bral skyes bu ni/ /rtsa ba bcad pa'i shing bzhin no/ /haM ni dpral ba'i skra mtshams na/ /a ni lte bar yang dag gnas/ /'dir ni a las zla bar bshad/ /'od zer
stong 'gyed pa yi haM/ /'dir yang a yi ming la brten/ /brten pa'i haM du rab tu grags/ /a ni srog gi rlung du bshad/ /de bzhin thur sel haM du brjod/ /de gnyis gcig gyur
'khor ba ste/ /des na a haM zhes par grags/ /rnam rtog bral ba'i gnas pa ni/ /a haM gang du gnas pa med/ /gzhan ni 'ga' zhig 'di la yang / /don dam par ni dmigs su med/ /
de ltar a haM pa yis bshad/ /rgyud rnams kun tu rnyed par dka'/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ a haM gi sgra'i don bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi
bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa ni gang gis shes/ /stong nyid de ni shes par 'gyur/ /mi mthun pa dang
gnyen po'i phyir/ /stong nyid sgom par yongs su gsungs/ /nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams ni/ /kun tu rtog pa'i gnyen po dang / /phyin ci log ni rnam dag pa/ /phyi nas stong pa nyid du
'dod| |phyi rol dmigs pa dang bral ba/ /nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams dang / /phyi rol du yang mi rtog pa/ /'dir ni phyi dang nang gi ni/ /stong pa nyid du yang dag bshad/ /snod kyi
'jig rten dang bral ba/ /chen po stong pa nyid du brjod/ /ye shes gang gis de stong par/ /mthong ba de yang stong par brjod/ /me long ye shes rdzogs pa la/ /rjes su dmigs par
byed phyir ro/ /de yi mi mthun phyogs stong pa/ /dngos med stong pa nyid stong nyid/ /don dam par ni rdzun pa'i dngos/ /shes pa don dam stong pa nyid/ /'dus byas sbyin pa la sogs
@#/ /kyi| |dge ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ /rang gi rnam rtog mtshan nyid spyod/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid du bshad/ /yang dag byang chub 'dus ma byas/ /rgyu mtshan
yang ni dmigs su med/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/ /'dus ma byas pa'i stong nyid gsungs/ /sems can don du smon lam sogs/ /rang dga' sogs pa dmigs
pa med/ /shin tu stong pa nyid du bshad/ /kun rtog thams cad rnam par spangs/ /mtha' las 'das pa'i stong nyid gsungs/ /thog mtha' med pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ /'gro ba'i
phyir ni smon lam nyid/ /rlom sems med par de brjod do/ /thog mtha' med pa'i stong pa nyid/ /mya ngan 'das la dmigs pa med/ /dge ba'i bdag nyid mi stong pa/ /rlom sems
med pa zhes bshad do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/ /'dod chags la sogs dri ma ni/ /bdag ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i/ /de ltar rlom sems med gsungs pa/ /rang bzhin
stong pa nyid du gsal/ /mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa/ /sku gzugs de yi yon tan ni/ /gzhan rnams la yang mi dmigs pa/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ /byang
chub phyogs kyi chos rnams nyid/ /spyod pa la yang rlom sems med/ /chos rnams thams cad stong par bshad/ /bdag dang skyes pa'i chos rnams ni/ /sgro btags dngos po
med pa'i mchog /'ching ba thams cad rnam par gcod/ /dngos med stong pa nyid du gsungs/ /ji ltar sngon gsungs stong pa nyid/ /de ltar dngos po med shes pa/ /slar yang mi
