dmigs pa nyid ni/ /dngos po med pa stong nyid 'dod/ /de ltar stong nyid dbye ba yang / /bag chags rnams kyi gnyen po'i phyir/ /rgyu yi gnyen po mi mthun phyogs/ /bla ma brgyud

pa las shes bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba'i le'u sta bzhi bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /stong pa nyid ni skye ba'i rgyu/ /rnam pa med pa'i nyams myong dngos/ /lus rnams la ni khyab pa dang / /phung po lnga ni rang bzhin lus/ /'khor lo
drug la khyab pa dang / /chos rnams kun gyi dbus gnas phyir/ /ring ba ma yin nye ba min/ /de ni kun rdzob dang dbyer med/ /stong pa nyid ni don dam mo/ /rdo rje phreng ba de ltar bshad//
srog gi rten gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /sku mdog sngon po zhal gsum pa/ /spyan gsum pa la phyag drug mchog /rdo rje 'khor lo nor bu g.yas/ /g.yon pa dril bu pad+ma dang / /ral gri shin
tu rnon po dang / /phyar ba go rim bzhin du bsnams/ /A li kA li las byung ba/ /zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /sna tshogs bad rgyas gdan la ni/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung
@#/ /gis bzhugs/ /hUM gi sa bon rdzogs pa dang / /rdo rje chen po'i rigs las byung / /kun rtog rnams ni bskyod pa'i rlung / /rnam par gcod cing thim par byed/ /
gnod byed de dag sel bar byed/ /gnyis pa thams cad rnam par gcod/ /sgyu ma chen mo stong pa che/ /sangs rgyas sa ni rmad du byung / /sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras ster ba'o/ /'di
yi sngags ni brjod par bya/ /oM dang badzra mA le dang / /de bzhin AHdang hUM dang gnyis/ /phaT dang swAhA yang dag ldan/ /sngags mchog btus pa bla na med/ /rlung 'phrog de kho na
nyid kyis/ /yid kyi rnam rtog sel bar byed/ /zhi ba'i gnas dang chu 'gram dang / /shing gcig lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / /yang na sum mdo 'bum phrag bcu/ /gsal bar yang
ni bzlas par bya/ /de ni dngos grub mchog tu 'gro/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /de yi yon tan gsal bar 'byung / /zhi pa la sogs 'bad mi dgos/ /skad
cig gcig la mngon par rtogs/ /de ni de nyid rigs mchog shes/ /dpa' bo gcig pu'i cho ga 'di/ /dpa' mo gcig pu nyid sgrub pa/ /de yi mtshan nyid sgom pa gang / /
rnam rtog spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /shin tu rnam dag nam mkha'i dngos/ /rang gi dngos grub mchog tu 'gro/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par
rdzogs pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i phreng ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /mtshan mo shes rab shes par bya/ /'byung
po thams cad thim nas 'gro/ /mtshan ma'i cha ni zla bar 'gyur/ /zla ba mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam gyi/ /shes rab rnam pa gnyis zhes bya/ /kun rdzob shes
byar shes par bya/ /don dam reg bya rnam par spangs/ /reg bya dang bral bde ba gang / /bde ba mchog de thob par dka'/ /nyin mo slar yang thabs su bshad/ /thabs ni nyin mor gyur
pa dang / /gang tshe dngos las skyes nyi ma/ /rtag tu b+ha ga'i bdag por 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i rnam pa nyi mar 'gyur/ /nyi ma las ni zla ba skyes/ /de las gnyis med ngo bor bshad/ /
'bar ba'i phyir ni nyi mar 'gyur/ /rnam par dpyad pa'i don dam dang / /chags bral mchog tu phra ba dang / /mi snang pa dang stong pa'i lus/ /'od gsal ba yi go 'phang zhi/ /gang
du yang dag mi gnas so/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ mtshan mo nyin mo rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /A li kA la'i dam tshig ni/ /rgyud rnams gzhan du ma gsungs pa'i/ /rgyal sras rnams la dgongs pa yi/ /'od gsal go 'phang las skyas
@#/ /pa'i| |snang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /gsal byed sum cu rtsa gsum ldan/ /kA li'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o/ /snang ba mched pa'i go 'phang ni/ /snang
ba las byung zad pa med/ /dbyangs ni bcu drug dang ldan pa/ /A li'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o/ /de gnyis gsang ba'i sbyor ba las/ /dbus su skyes pa'i bde ba che/ /A li kA
li'i dam tshig ces/ /dgongs pa'i tshig gis bye brag byas/ /shin tu phra ba'i ye shes mchog /bla ma brgyud las shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba
mngon par rtogs pa las/ /A li kA li rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /mtshams kyi mtshan nyid bla na
med| |snang dang mi snang bral ba'i mtshams/ /shes rab rdo rje las byung ba/ /gnyis med 'dres pa'i dbus na gnas/ /'bags shing gos pa rnam par spangs/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'chi
med skyes/ /zla ba nyi ma yang dag 'dres/ /mthar ni yang dag mi 'gro gang / /mtshams med 'khor ba dag par byed/ /rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog /phra ba'i mtshan nyid bsam
mi khyab| |sems can kun gyi mtshams kyi ni/ /rdo rje 'chang gi btsun mo dang / /'char ba mchog tu dag par bshad/ /dga' bral la sogs rnam par spangs/ /mdud pa'i rtser
gnas mchog tu zhi/ /tsa na ka yi tshig gu tsam/ /mtshan mo bdag po de shar ba/ /gang phyir steng gi go 'phang gnas/ /la la thig le'i rang ngo bor/ /rnam ba bzhi yis yang dag gnas/ /
la lar thog ma la sogs spangs/ /la lar de yang dmigs su med/ /gang phyir rang gi bdag nyid can/ /de phyir brjod du med pa 'o/ /rnal 'byor chen bo'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba
mngon par rtogs pa las/ /mtshams kyi 'char ba'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /rnam pa nyi shu'i ming tsam ni/ /slob
dpon las su yongs su bshad/ /sngags kyi rnal 'byor legs rgyas pa/ /sngon du bsnyen pa sa sbyang dang / /'byung po bskrad pa nyid dang ni/ /sa gzung nyid dang thig skud ni/ /spyan dang
lhag par gnas pa dang / /bgegs bskrad de bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi/ /thig ni rab tu gsal ba dang / /phur bus yang dag gdab pa dang / /bum pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / /bcom
ldan 'das kyi lhag gnas dang / /khrus dang rab tu sbyangs pa dang / /mchod pa rab gnas gtor ma dang / /slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang / /me la sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin/ /dbang
bskur ba dang gshegs su gsol/ /de ltar cho ga nyi shu'i las/ /gang gis de shes 'gro ba'i bla/ /dge slong rdo rje 'dzin bas bya/ /bdud las sdigs mdzub de ni mchog /yi ge
@#/ /gsum bzlas pa la zhen/ /rdo rje theg pa lhag par grol/ /zhi ba la sogs las gang gis/ /rtag tu lag pa'i mthil la gnas/ /de yi yang dag cho ga yis/ /cho ga
mchog ni bya ba yin/ /rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor sogs/ /cho ga la sogs brtsam par bya/ /bgegs mthar byed pa'i snying po'i sngags/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi mchog /stong
phrag bcu ni yongs su bzla/ /thog mar mkhas pa ji bzhin du/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsal ba'i phyir/ /sngon du bsnyen pa zhes ni bshad/ /de 'og yi ge gsum khrir ni/ /
bsam pa kun gyis bzlas byas na/ /yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster/ /slob ma rnams kyi dngos grub rgyur/ /skye bos dben pa'i phyag dar bcas/ /sa bzung chu ni nye bar bcas/ /
grong dang ha cang mi nye zhing / /ring por yang ni brtsam mi bya/ /shin tu 'jam zhing srog chags med/ /rgyal po'i pho brang shin tu ring / /gang khyim tshong dus las rgyang ring / /yang na
bde gshegs rten la ni/ /thog mar sor mo rnams la ni/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags dgod bya/ /khru gang sor ni bzhi pa yis/ /seng ldeng phur pa byas nas ni/ /yi ge gsum
sngags chu yis bkru /yi ge brgya ba lan bdun dang / /yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis brko/ /sa ni chu yi mthar thug pa/ /yang na khru ni phyed dang gsum/ /yang na sems kyis sbyangs
par bya| |de la gnas pa'i 'byung po ni/ /yang dag 'gror ni 'jug par bya/ /oM ma hA kro d+ha dz+wa lArka/ /hUM phaT mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ /de ltar lag mthil sngags bkod la/ /'byung
po rnams ni bskrad par bya/ /sa la thal mo lan gsum du/ /brdab pa byas nas sngags bzlas te/ /ud gats+tsha da lan gnyis brjod/ /sarba b+hU ta gra ha ud gats+tsha/ /yi ge gsum ni mtha'
ru brjod/ /badzra satA be bshad de/ /las ni thams cad par gsungs pa'i/ /gtor ma byin nas 'gro ru gzhug /sa ni yongs su bzung rjes la/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis brtsam bya/ /tsha rgo
med cing ma gsal/ /mnyam zhing zug rdu med pa dang / /me long lta bur 'jam pa dang / /mnyam pa yang ni mkhas pas bya/ /ba yi lci ba la sogs pa/ /rnam pa lnga yis byug par bya/ /
byugs nas de rjes khrus byas la/ /slob dpon khro bo'i sku dang ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'jam pa'i rdo rje yis/ /mchog tu mi g.yo gzugs kyis ni/ /'jam pa dang ni sum sgril gyis/ /ras
sam yang na gso ma yis/ /yi ge gsum gyis rnam par sbyang / /thig skud kyis ni kun nas mnyam/ /gru bzhi par cha byas nas kyang / /rdo rje can gyis khru gsum gsum/ /gru bzhi bar ni
gzung bar bya/ /de yi dbus su lte ba'i cha/ /sgrib pa'i skyon ni spang bar bya/ /sku gdung dang ni rin chen bzhugs/ /legs par bsangs nas byin gyis brlab/ /yi ge gsum yang swAhA'i
@#/ /mtha'| |phaT kyi dbus su yang dag sbyar/ /sngags 'di yang ni bzlas par bya/ /brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag par gsal/ /tshangs ba'i thig ni btab nas ni/ /yi
gi brgya pa bzla bar bya/ /de rjes de la me tog char/ /sngags ni brjod nas gtor bar bya/ /oM dang a mo g+ha pad+mo/ /de bzhin du ni phyi nas su/ /ba su d+ha ri d+ha ra gnyis/ /d+ha ra Ni
maN+Da li hUM/ /yi ge brgya pa'i sngags dang ni/ /lan gsum bar du thig skud la/ /zhabs bsil chu yis bsang bar bya/ /yi ge gsum gyis thig gdab bya/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo
bzhi pa| |rdo rje can gyis mtshams bzhi pa/ /thog mar shar dang byang dang ni/ /ji srid lho dang nub dag dang / /mtshams su yang dag thig skud dang / /slar yang yang dag gdab
par bya| |shar dang lho yi mtshams dang ni/ /nub dang byang gi mtshams su ni/ /thig skud kyis ni tshad gzhal bya/ /zur bzhi dang ni thig skud bya/ /bskor thig gsum ni sgo
bzhi pa| |rdo rje phreng ba gsum gyis mdzes/ /tshangs pa'i thig gnyis btab nas ni/ /de las dbang po'i pho brang ni/ /rnam pa kun gyis yang dag thig /rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs
gnas gsal/ /de la rig pa 'dzin pa bri/ /slar yang rin chen phye ma 'a ma/ /tshon sna lnga rnams me tog dang / /rdzas sam las kyi sbyor ba las/ /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ /
mtshan ma'i phyag rgya la sogs bri/ /mi bskyod sku mdog phyag rgya sogs/ /rigs ni dbus su dgod par bya/ /rgyal ba rgyal dang rin chen 'chang / /'khor ba 'das dang shes rab 'chang //
rim bzhin sku mdog dbye ba yis/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dgod/ /gti mug zhe sdang chags ba dang / /rdo rje dga' sogs rim pa bzhin/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams
su| |ji lta ba bzhin dgod par bya/ /sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba yi/ /gdan bdun gzhan gyi nyi ma gnyis/ /'khor dga' zhe sdang dga' bar bcas/ /ka yi phreng gis rnam par brgyan/ /zhal
gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/ /g.yon na shes rab ral gri bsnams/ /gzugs dang dbyibs rnams ji bzhin du/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya/ /phyi rol gzugs kyi rdo
rje sogs/ /mtshams kyi char ni rnam par dgod/ /shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la/ /byams pa sa yi snying po shar/ /'jam dpal phyag na rdo rje lhor/ /mkha' snying 'jig rten
dbang phyug ni/ /kun nas nub tu bsgom par bya/ /sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / /kun tu bzang po byang du dgod/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/ /g.yon na ral gri
dgod pa dang / /phyag na rdo rje dri med pa'i/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni gdan/ /lha mo rnams la zla ba'i gdan/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng na gsal/ /rnam par snang mdzad rigs
@#/ /las byung / /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya la sogs dgod/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su/ /gshin rje gshed la sogs pa dgod/ /zhal gsum phyag drug
rnam pa can/ /de bzhin ral gri g.yon na 'dzin/ /mi g.yo la sogs mtshams rnams su/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rang ngo bo/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/ /g.yon
na ral gri rnam par bsam/ /gang phyir shes rab rang bzhin g.yon/ /de bzhin g.yon na ral gri brjod/ /gnod mdzes de bzhin gtsug tor ni/ /'og dang steng du rnam
par dgod/ /khro bo rnams ni nyi mar bzhugs/ /de bzhin sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan/ /de bzhin phyag rgya dbyug la sogs/ /nye bar mtshon nas dgod par bya/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa rnam dag pa'i/ /ri mo lnga ni rnam par dgod/ /de la rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng / /ra ba gnyis ni yongs su bskor/ /rin chen dra ba rnga ma dang / /lha mo rnams kyi snam
bu yis/ /ka ba rta babs 'khor lor mtshan/ /ri dwags rnams kyi mtshan pas brgyan/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/ /rnga yab me long la sogs kyis/ /brgyan
pa ru ni rnam par bshad/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag brten/ /slob dpon mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan no/ /rdo rje slob dpon las bya
ba| |bgegs bskrad bas ni sngon song bas/ /suM b+ha'i sgra dang ni suM b+ha/ /thog mar oM dang ngo mtshar cha/ /hUM gnyis phaT kyi mtha' dang ldan/ /shar gyi sgo ru dgod par bya/ /oM dang gr-ih+Na
gr-ih+na zhes/ /hUM gnyis phaT dang yang dag ldan/ /blo dang ldan pas lho ru dgod/ /oM dang gr-ih+na ba ya gnyis/ /hUM gnyis phaT kyi mtha' dang ldan/ /nub tu yang dag spro bar bya/ /oM
A na ya ho b+ha ga wA na dang bid+ya rA dza dang / /hUM gnyis dang ni phaT mtha' dgod/ /de rjes yang ni byang du dgod/ /'di yis gdug pa bkug nas ni/ /de nas sngags pas phur pa
gdab/ /seng ldeng las ni byas pa yis/ /phur bu sor ni bcu gnyis tshad/ /zur gsum yi ge gsum gyis mtshan/ /yi ge brgya pa so sor bzlas/ /sngags kyi chu yis bsangs nas
ni| |phyogs dang mtshams su dgod par bya/ /oM dang yi ge g+ha lan gnyis/ /de bzhin g+hA ta ya ni gnyis/ /sar+b+ba duSh+TaM phaT ces dang / /de bzhin kI la ya gnyis dang / /sarba pA paM
phaT dang ni/ /hUM gsum badzra kI la ya/ /badzra d+ha ra a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ /kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra dang / /kI la ya hUM phaT yi ge'i/ /mtha' can gyi ni phur bus gdab/ /oM dang badzra mud
ga ra| |badzra kI lA ya A ko Ta/ /sa dang hUM gnyis phaT mtha' dang / /sngags dang phur bus brdung ba brjod/ /rdo rjes bgegs ni 'jug la sogs/ /bskrad don rdo rje ra ba dang //
@#/ /steng du mda' yi dra ba dang / /'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje dang / /gtsug tor gnod mdzes sngags kyis ni/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga yis/ /bum pa bcu 'am yang na
drug /rin chen las byas rnam drag pa/ /sman lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga/ /'bru lnga la sogs kyis gang ba/ /rin chen lnga dang sna ma sogs/ /lo ma lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /
gur gum gla rtsi ga pur dang / /tsan+dan chu yis gang bar bya/ /me tog la sogs kyis mchod bya/ /rang rang sngags kyi byin gyis brlab/ /badzra d+h+r-i ka dang dzi na dzika /rat+na d+h+r-i ka dang
A ro l-ika /de bzhin pra dz+nyA d+h+r-i ka sngags dang / /lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi sa/ /'og min 'jig rten khams nas ni/ /bum pa rang gis bskur byas pa/ /de nas spyan
drangs nas ni gzhug /de nas lha mo'i gzugs spros nas/ /de rjes gzhan la dgod par bya/ /oM dang ru ru s+phu ru dang / /de las dz+wa la tiSh+Tha gsal/ /de bzhin id+hA lo
tsa ni/ /sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ne/ /swA hA zhes ni de la bzlas/ /spyan gyi rnam pa rdzogs nas ni/ /bum ba'i dbus su mchod par bya/ /oM dang shaM ka re dang yang / /de las shAn+taM ku ru
dang | |de bzhin g+hu Ti g+hu Ti dang / /g+hu Ti ne dang g+hu Ti ne/ /g+hA ta ya ni lan gnyis brjod/ /swA hA'i mtha' can sngags brjod bya/ /mA ma kI yi rnam pa rdzogs/ /bum pa'i
dbus su mchod par bya/ /oM dang ka Ta bi ka Te/ /ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te/ /ka ro Ta bIR+ye swAhA/ /gos dkar rnam par rdzogs nas ni/ /bum pa'i dbus su mchod bar bya/ /oM dang tA re tut+tA
ra| |tu re swAhA dgod par bya/ /sgrol ma'i rnam pa rdzogs nas ni/ /bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya/ /gshin rje gshed sogs gzhan rnams la/ /gcig la las ni thams cad

pa| |oM na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra NAM/ na maHbadzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA deSh+T+ro ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la/ pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/

tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+naM bi nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya hUM phaT swAhA/ sngags 'di lan bdun
bar du ni/ /las ni thams cad pa yin te/ /snying po'i sngags ni bzlas byas la/ /rigs kyi dbang phyug mchod par bya/ /yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /lan bdun bar du bsgom
par bya/ /brgya dang rtsa brgyad rim pa yis/ /yi ge gsum yang bzlas pa ni/ /de nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mchod yon snod du mchod par bya/ /de nas du gu la ras ni/ /ga
pur a ga rus bdugs pa/ /bkab nas rang rang sngags dang ni/ /de la rim bzhin lhag gnas bya/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam ba can/ /sprin bral nam mkha' lta bu 'o/ /de lta
@#/ /bu yi sku mdog phyag /rang snang ba yi sku la 'khyud/ /A li kA li la sa byung ba/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /gzhal yas khang dbus nyams dga' ba'i/ /
'og min zhing khams na bzhugs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /bsgoms nas de las 'od zer spro/ /kha dog lnga dang lcags
kyu yi/ /de yis spyan drang slob dpon gyis/ /sngags brjod nas ni spyan drang bya/ /e h+ye hi dang b+ha ga wAn/ /sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ /tiSh+Tha gnyis dang sa ma ya/ /de la a nu sma ra
gnyis| |sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang / /swA hA yi mtha' lan gsum brjod/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje spyan drang bya/ /dkyil 'khor ba dang yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su spyan
drang ba/ /rang gi gdan gyi dbye ba la/ /bzhugs shing yang dag mchod par bya/ /rang rang sngags dang rim ji bzhin/ /lha yi me tog sogs kyis mchod/ /'khor lo mchog ni
mchod par bya/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin grong / /yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni/ /dkyil 'khor mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal/ /thugs
ni brtse bar nyer dgongs te/ /mgon pos mchod pa 'di bzhes shig /oM sar+b+ba ta thA gA ta nAM/ bU dzo bas+thA na ya At+ma naM niR+yA ta yA mi/ bla mas yi ge gsum ni brjod/ /lha yi

rnam par byas nas ni/ /de rjes bdag la mchod par bya/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ pU dza badzra swa b+hA rba/ /At+ma ko\u0f85haM zhes ni brjod/ /rang lha'i nga rgyal byas nas ni/ /ji ltar bskyed pa'i yum
rnams dang / /gnod byed kha na ma tho med/ /zhe sdang chen po'i rigs las byung / /dkyil 'khor dbang phyug mchod bya zhing / /de las lha rnams lhag gnas bya/ /yid 'phrog sna tshogs
lha yi gos/ /ga pur a ga ru yis bdug /sngags kyis dag byas dgab par bya/ /oM dang tiSh+Tha badzra hoH/ /brjod nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas bya'o/ /oM dang spa ra badzra hoH/ /blo
dang ldan pas sngags 'di brjod/ /me tog spar bas gtor nas ni/ /lhag gnas der ni gshegs par bya/ /rnam pa kun dang yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong bar
bya| |rigs lnga'i rang bzhin bzang po yis/ /bcom ldan gzugs brnyan bsgoms nas ni/ /me long sogs la khrus bya zhing / /de bzhin rdzas dang 'o ma sogs/ /ji ltar bltams
pa tsam gyis kyang / /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba/ /de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol/ /cod pan dbang phyug rdo rje sems/ /dbus su yi ge gsum dang spel/ /
swAhA'i mtha' can brjod par bya/ /las kyi de nyid cho gshes/ /de rjes sbyar ba'i gtor ma bya/ /oM sar+b+ba A bar Na/ /shud+d+ha sar+b+ba bA baM dang / /di shud+d+ha badzra hUM phaT/ /swA hA'i mtha'
@#/ /can sngags brjod bya/ /pad+ma bskor pa'i phyag rgya dang / /yungs kar dkar po bsregs byas nas/ /nyon mongs pa ni sel bar byed/ /'khyud cing bskor bas
dor bar bya/ /de nas cho ga bzhin legs mchog /sil snyan glu la sogs pa dang / /bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya/ /rang rang sngags dang go rim bzhin/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA
ga ta/ /puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha dang / /sa mu dra dang s+pha ra Na/ /sa ma ya dang shri ye AH/ /hUM gi sngags ni rjes su brjod/ /rdzas rnams kun la rang ming ni/ /gzugs la sogs pa snga
ma bzhin/ /cho ga bzhin du yang dag brjod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' legs bsgyings pa/ /rdo rje slob dpon cho ga shes/ /sngags 'di yis ni rab gnas bya/ /oM dang su pra tiSh+Tha
dang / /badzra swA hA'i mtha' can bzlas/ /yi ge gsum gyi snying po ni/ /sku gsung thugs la bkod nas ni/ /me tog char ni dbab par bya/ /slob dpon slob ma'i tshogs dang
bcas| |glu yis yang dag bskul nas ni/ /sad pa na ni phyag kyang byas/ /las kun bdag nyid rnal 'byor bdag /gtor ma don kun grub par byed/ /las la byang shing mkhas
pa dang / /cho ga bzhin du bsgyings bcas dang / /chang dang sna tshogs sha dang ni/ /de bzhin la du 'o ma dang / /'bras can phye yi 'khur ba dang / /sran 'khur bye ba mang po dang / /mchod
yon me tog sogs kyis mchod/ /snod bcu chu yis gang ba la'o/ /gsungs pa'i khro bo bcu sngags kyis/ /snga ma bzhin du cho ga yis/ /de dbus 'byung po kun la ni/ /ngo mtshar
chen po'i gtor ma sbyin/ /snga ma bzhin du cho ga yis/ /til bsregs bza' bas khyad par du/ /blo dang ldan pas sngags bzlas bya/ /'di ni don kun sgrub byed pa/ /oM brah+ma de ba

tA sar+b+ba/ in+d+ra da sha lo ka rak+Sha ka /nA ga gan+d+har+b+ha kuM b+hAN+Da/ yak+Sha b+hU ta ga NA/ ta thA pre ta u ga ta/ pi shA tsi a ba sma ra/ DA ki nI gra hA/ bi g+h+naM mA k+Shi ga NAH/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ag+ni ma ra

gra hA| oM dzo b+hak+Sha ma hA te dza/ ma nu Sh+ya na ma/ bi hiM sa ka/ mu dra man+t+ra a d+hi d+ho b+h+ya tsa/ gra hA nak+Sha tra ma nu Sha/ i maM ba liM/ pra gr-ih+Nan+tu/ sid+d+hi m+me pra ya ts+tshan+tu me san+d+ha/ sa t+ya ma ne Shu ka ra

me Shu| sata sa ha ya b+ha ban+tu tse/ d+hA na d+hA na/ su pa ra Nany+tsa/ d+ha DAn+tu ma ma to shI ta/ i ti u pa tA Na tro Sha Ni/ satwA ta nA ma na sha yan+tu tse/ thog mar oM dang AHhUM phaT/ /swAhA'i mtha'
can las kun byed/ /de ltar sngags 'di snod la bzlas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par rol/ /slob ma lhag par gnas par byed/ /mtshan nyid yon tan gyis brgyan pa/ /tsan+dan
ga pur gla rtsi yi/ /chu yis kyang ni khrus byas te/ /dad pa'i chu ni 'chang ba yi/ /sems kyi dri ma rnam par 'khrud/ /bdog pa thams cad gtong bar byed/ /gos gtsang ba ni mchod
@#/ /tu bgo khang pa brtsegs ma byas nas ni/ /ras kyi yol ba kun nas bre/ /yi ge gsum dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje can gyis sngags chu ni/ /lan bdun
gdong la gtor ba yis/ /las skyes dri ma sbyong bar byed/ /de nas sa yi snying po sogs/ /mig la sogs la rnam par dgod/ /sor mo dbu ma gnyis kyis ni/ /dbang po so so
la reg pas/ /sngags brjod bya zhing byin gyis brlab/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor gyis/ /oM dang tsak+Shu tsak+ShuHdang / /sa man+ta dang tsak+ShuHbzlas/ /mai tri satwa lo tsa ni/ /sar+b+ba
ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ /swAhA'i mtha' dang sngags 'di brjod/ /mthe bo gung mo yang dag sbyar/ /zhabs bsil chu dang mnyes nas ni/ /sngags de lan gsum bzla bar bya/ /slob ma'i
mig la so sor ni/ /mthe bo'i phyag rgyas reg par bya/ khru gang ba la sor bzhi pa'i/ /skud pa zhags pa 'dra ba la/ /yi ge brgya pa'i sngags lan gsum/ /bzlas nas zhabs
bsil chus bsang bya/ /skud pa lan gsum dkris pa ni/ /rdo rje gsum ni mdud bar ldan/ /dpung pa g.yon par bcings pa ni/ /sngags 'di lan gsum brjod par

bya| |oM dang lo tsa ne yi sgra/ /ya ta twat+taM saM pra taM/ /maM b+ha bi shud+d+he yi sgra/ /raM dang rat+na tra yA ya/ /sid+d+hi na ni da da sha/ /ya swAhA yi sngags 'di ni/ /theg pa bla med lan bdun
bzlas| |slob ma la ni me tog gtor/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang gis ni/ /sor ni bcu gnyis gzhal ba yis/ /zur ni gsum du yongs su bya/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs bsgom/ /
slob ma'i lag tu gtad par bya/ /oM dang pra ti badzra dang / /sa man+ta dang I shwa ri/ /AHhUM swAhA'i mtha' can sngags/ /bzlas nas slob mas dor bar bya/ /sar bab pa yi phur bu ste/ /
phyogs ni gang du lta ba nyid/ /slob dpon dang ni slob ma yis/ /de yi phyogs bltas nyal bar bya/ /nam nangs yang dag bla ma la/ /ji ltar mthong ba'i don kun zhu/ /de la dmigs
nas sbyin sreg ni/ /zhi ba la sogs rab dbye bas/ /las ni thams cad pa nyid dam/ /bgegs zhi ba yi don du bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgyings bcas pas/ /rnal 'byor ji bzhin
cho ga bzhin/ /sngar bzhin 'dir yang gtor ma ni/ /bgegs rnams zhi phyir sbyin par bya/ /de nas gsol 'debs slob ma ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon thugs rjes khyab/ /thal mo sbyar
ba byas nas ni/ /mdun du 'dug nas phyag byas te/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon
pa chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsal/ /thar ba chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par
@#/ /'tshal| |de nas bla mas de la yang / /bya dang mi bya gsungs pa ni/ /sems can las kyi srad bus gdab/ /rdul tshon bkye ba'i rim pa dgye/ /'gro ba 'di dag dkyil
'khor te/ /rang bzhin dag pa gnyis med pa'o/ /thog mar dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor bdag /rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid bsgom/ /slob ma bdag nyid 'drar dmigs nas/ /de
'og thams cad rab bsgrub bya/ /bla ma bzang la dbang bskur phyir/ /slob mas de rjes gsol ba gdab/ /'di na 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la/ /nyon mongs chu srin na kras khyab/ /
las kyi rlung gis dba' klong 'khrugs/ /bdag bying thugs rje'i rgya mtsho kye/ /mi shes ling tog gis bsgribs mig /nyon mongs dbang du bya ba ni/ /bde ba sdug bsngal
'jigs las skyob/ /thugs rje'i rgya mtshos bdag skyabs mdzod/ /de 'dra tshig gsan rdo rje can/ /thugs rje'i thugs ni yongs su gang / /slob ma la ni yongs su gsungs//
bu khyod dus 'di nas bzung ste/ /rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung lugs bstan/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni khyod kyis zungs/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas/ /bu khyod 'di ni bdud
rtsi ste/ /srungs shig ma bsrungs na ni sreg /bsrungs na dngos grub kun grub 'gyur/ /nyon mongs thams cad sel ba'i rlung / /oM dang pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ /u da ka dang AHhUM
Tha| |slob mas bdud rtsi lnga btung bya/ /rdo rje ye shes rmad byung ba'o/ /gsang ba dran na skyon 'gyur phyir/ /rdo rje slob ma la ni dbab/ /dri chen dri chu la sogs pa/ /mtshal chen 'bab pa'i
bu mo'i gos/ khrag dang khu bas yang dag bsgos/ /gu gul dang ni rnam par bsres/ /yi dwags me ni blangs nas su/ /pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas ni/ /der ni thams cad gzhug par
bya| khro bo rdo rje gsum bdag nyid/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas gnas/ /rdo rje 'chang dbang slob ma la/ /rmad byung chen po'i bdug pas bdug /'bab par 'gyur ba the tshom
med| |oM tiSh+Tha ma hA kro d+ha/ /de bzhin A be sha ya hUM/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sngags 'di brjod/ /slob ma la ni gsal bar dbab/ /badzra satwa hi ma he/ /bid+ya rA dza ya bi d+ya ma he/ /de
ltar sngags ni 'di yis kyang / /slar yang slob ma dbang bskur nas/ /rang bzhin gyis dag rang gi lus/ /dkyil 'khor mchog 'di mthong ba na/ /de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo
dang / /rgyal ba'i sras kyis yang dag gzhi/ khro bo khyab pa'i gsang ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' rten dang ni/ /phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /gnyis po de la bstan par bya/ /
slar yang slob mas gsol ba gdab/ /bdag la dbang bskur mdzad du gsol/ /rnam rgyal bum pa blangs nas ni/ /pad+ma'i snod ni bzang po la/ /de yi dbus su blo bzang bo/ /hUM
@#/ /rdor las byung mi bskyod bsgom/ /rang nyid ye shes sa bon gyi/ /'od zer yang dag bskul bas byung / /slar yang ye shes sems dpa' bsgom/ /mi bskyod pa ye
rnam pa mchog /mi bskyod ngo bo de nyid kyis/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po bsgom/ /slob ma'i mgo bor lag pa gzhag /rdo rje slob dpon thugs rjes khyab/ /oM dang ma hA sa twa
dang / /de bzhin I shwa ra traM dang / /a b+hi ShI ny+tsa mi swAhA/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA gA ta/ /a b+hi She ka sa ma ya/ /shri ye AHhUM de nas bzla/ /chu yi gting nas slob ma la/ /dbu rgyan dbang
bskur don du ni/ /cod pan 'jig rten gsum rgyal po/ /sems can kun gyi don grub pa/ /snying rjes khyab pa ngas byin gyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i yon tan gnas/ /sa bon traM
las byung ba yi/ /rin chen 'byung ldan bsgoms nas ni/ /ri mo dar sogs cod pan dang / /slob ma'i mgo la sbyin par bya/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ /rat+na mu kun sgra dang / /de
bzhin sgra dang bU dza ya/ /a tiSh+Tha dang AHhUM dang / /sngags 'di dag ni brjod nas ni/ /me tog mgo la sbyin par bya/ /slob ma rdo rje dbang bskur phyir/ /slar yang bla ma
la gsol gdab/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dngos/ /rdo rje brtul zhugs ngas byin gyi/ /gang gis ma rig sgong 'byed/ /ye shes thob 'gyur nga yis byas/ /hrIHlas pad+ma
rdzogs par ni/ /'od dpag med du rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje lag pa g.yas par sbyin/ /slob ma la ni 'di skad brjod/ /ngas khyod de ring dbang bskur bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas
thams cad de/ /kun tu bzang po'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /dngos grub bzang phyir rdo rje longs/ /khaM las byung ba'i ral gri 'am/ /don yod grub pa'i rang ngo bo/ /rdzogs par lag pa
g.yon pa ni/ /slob ma bsgyings pa'i phyag rgya 'dzin/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dril bu sgra yi rjes 'gror brjod/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /byang chub mchog ni
rgyal ba'i gzhi/ /rdo rje dril bu bzung rjes la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab ngo bo/ /rang bzhin yon tan rnams kyis gang / /bdag po yi ni rnal 'byor 'gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad
rang ngo bo/ /slob ma'i mgo la lag bzhag ste/ /rdo rje can gyis ming dbang bskur/ /gzugs kyi phung po rnam par bsgom/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ /che ge mo zhes badzra satwaM/ /a b+hi
Shiny+tsa mi swAhA/ /phung po lnga yi rnam dag pa/ /thog mar chu nas ming gi mthar/ /dbang bskur ba ni mchog tu shes/ /rmad byung chen po bshad par bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni dag pa
'di/ /dbang bskur lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /ma rig pa ni bsal nas ni/ /ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /slob ma 'dod don sngags dbang
@#/ /sbyin/ /sngags kyi dbang bskur ye shes mchog /ngas byin dngos grub ster bar byed/ /de nas yi ge drug sngags phaT/ /swAhA'i mtha' can yi ge gsum/ /
kha ni dam tshig gis bkang nas/ /sngags kyi sku yis dag pa dang / /bla ma'i zhal las yang dag brjod/ /bla mas dngos grub sbyin bya'i phyir/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi| |snying po yi ni ye shes mchog /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa ni/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /de nas slob ma spyod brtul zhugs/ /sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye
phrag gis/ /gang gi spyod pa rnam dag pa/ /'dod la thugs rje'i gtso bo yis/ /sems can don ni byed pa'i thabs/ /nga yis spyod pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin/ /de nas glegs
bam dung la sogs/ /mda' gzhu ral gri 'khor lo dang / /sngon bzhin sngags kyis dag par byed/ /slob ma'i lag tu rim bzhin sbyin/ /'di ni kun bzang spyod brtul
zhugs| |bsam pa sna tshogs rnam dag byed/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /sems can kun gyi don gyis byos/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ /de bzhin d+h+rI Ta ra twa dang / /d+hA R+ya mi
AHhUM dang / /de ltar sngags 'di dgod par bya/ /de nas lung bstan thob don du/ /bsam pa dang bas bla ma la/ /da ltar sangs rgyas rigs su 'jug /khyed kyis bdag la
lung bstan gsol/ /don yod rdo rje zhes bya khyod/ /rigs kyi dbang phyug lung bstan bya/ /de nas slob ma dbugs dbyung 'dod/ /bla ma'i zhal snga nas ni skye/ /mgon po yang dag
bdag dbugs phyung / /byang chub spyod pa'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /de nas rdo rje chos gos mtha'/ /g.yon pa'i lag pas bzung nas ni/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin byas la/ /dbugs
dbyung ba yi mchog bya ba/ /nga yis rdo rje gsung bdag khyod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi go 'phang mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par brjod/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ /dpal
ldan yon tan 'byung gnas bdag /bdud kyi stobs ni kun las rgyal/ /grong khyer mchog tu khyod zhugs so/ /de nas slob ma don 'dod la/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur bya/ /
phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la stsol/ /de nas ye shes rdor dbang phyug /ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer gyis/ /spyan drangs sangs rgyas lnga la
sogs| |lha mo'i 'khor lo rim bzhin 'byung / /de yis ye shes chus bkang ba'i/ /bum pa phyag bsnams de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang rgyal ba rgyal/ /rin chen 'dzin
dang 'khor ba sgrol/ /shes rab 'chang ni rim pa bzhin/ /gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags la/ /de bzhin rdo rje dga' ma sogs/ /gshin rje mthar byed shes mthar byed/ /pad+ma
@#/ /mthar byed bgegs mthar byed/ /'di yis kun nas dbang bskur bas/ /rdo rje slob ma rnam par bsam/ /dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che/ /khams gsum kun
gyis phyag byas pa/ /gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung / /sangs rgyas kun gyi nga yis sbyin/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs lha mo/ /khro bo rang gi gnas su dgod/ /'jam
dpal rnam bar bsgoms nas ni/ /ye shes rdo rjes rnam par brgyan/ /oM dang su pra tiSh+Tha dang / /badzra swAhA zhes ni dgod/ /blo bzang gis ni sngags brjod nas/ /slob ma la
ni me tog gtor/ /de nas me tog sogs kyis mchod/ /slob ma'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'dra/ /thugs rjes khyab pa'i bla ma yis/ /de nas slob ma rjes gnang bya/ /de nyid
shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /mi bya ba ni ci yang med/ /dpa' chen khyod kyis bka' drin gyis/ /da ni 'dod yon lnga la spyod/ /sgyu ma rmi lam 'drar shes nas/ /rten 'brel
las byung chos rnams ni/ /gzugs brnyan lta bur shes nas ni/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /bya ba byas pa'i slob ma ni/ /ci bde bar ni sgrub par gyis/ /de nas
bla ma la yon dbul/ /bstod cing kun nas phyag kyang bya/ /skye bo bzang dang lhan cig tu/ /de nas bla ma gsang don gnyer/ /thur du kha bltas kha sbyar te/ /ji ltar bdag
nyid chen po khyod/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar mdzod/ /de nas rigs lnga las byung ba'i/ /las dang chos sogs dbye ba yi/ /sngags kyi theg pas lhag par grol/ /skal ldan
bud med phyag rgyar bshad/ /skye bos dben pa'i mtshan phyed na/ /ro yi gzhi yi gnas song nas/ /thugs rje chen pos khyab pa yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon yon tan 'byung / /de ltar ji
ltar rnyed phyag rgya/ /snyoms 'jug la ni gang byung ba'i/ /bla na med pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi yang dag ltung / /kun rdzob byang
chub sems gang yin/ /gsang ba de yis dbang bskur bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig chen po rnam byung ba/ /khams lnga las byung bcud kyis len/ /bde ba chen
pos myang bar gyis/ /slob ma rtog pa dang bral bas/ /pad+ma la gnas de myang gyis/ /'das pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba yis/ /rgyal sras ji ltar dbang bskur bya/ /byang chub sems kyi chu yis
ni| |bu khyod de bzhin dbang bskur bya/ /de nas shes rab dbang bskur phyir/ /bla mas don 'dod slob ma la/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/ /bdag la khyed kyis dbang bskur
stsol| |de nas slob dpon bdag nyid che/ /phyag rgya yang dag byin gyis rlob/ /mchog ni thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /de 'og slob ma la ni sbyin/ /lha mo phyag rgya chen po 'di/ /dpag
@#/ /med bde ba rab ster ba/ /bu yis kun nas blangs nas ni/ /bla na med ba'i mchod ba gyis/ /de nas shes rab ye shes de'i/ /sgrub pa'i mchog tu 'dod pa'i don/ /
lha mo'i ye shes de nyid mchog /dngos grub don du nga yis sbyin/ /lha mos de la bka' bsgo ba/ /dpa' bo'i bu ni bla na med/ /dpa' bo khyod ni spro 'am ci/ /byang chub sems ni
za nus sam/ /yang dag de ni nges par ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du smos/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i dam tshig mchog /lha mo ci phyir bdag mi nus/ /de nas lha mo de dgyes
nas| |sra bkrol gos ni por nas kyang / /pad+ma dag ni 'byed byed cing / /b+hany+dza mok+Sha ho zhes gsungs/ /b+ha ga'i pad+ma'i dbus gnas pa/ /bde ba kun tu rgyu ba'i rtsa/ /sor mos
bskul nas dga' bar bya/ /dzi hwAs kyang ni rol par bya/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i bde byed pa/ /'di nyid rig pa bzang bsten na/ /mchog tu dga' bas nyams myong nas/ /lhung
ba'i bde bas de myang bya/ /de nas bcom ldan ma dgyes nas/ /b+hany+dza mok+Sha'i sngags gsung zhing / /rkang pa g.yon pa mgo la bzhag /bka' yis de nyid yang dag bstan/ /de
ring phan chad bu khyod kyis/ /ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /rmi lam bzhin du sems can gyi/ /bla na med pa'i don byos shig /bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa yi/ /'di la
man ngag la mi shes/ /rig pa 'di ni dor byas nas/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya/ /brtul zhugs rnams kyi mchog gi mchog /rig ma'i brtul zhugs bu yis spyod/ /de ltar
'di ni byang chub mchog /rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma/ /rim pa bzhin du yongs shes bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang brten/ /bdag la go 'phang mchog stsol lags/ /ting
'dzin kun gyis 'bras bu gsal/ /sems can kun la ci 'dod par/ /dngos grub bla na med par gsol/ /slar yang gshegs par mdzad pa'i phyir/ /rang gi gnas gshegs badzra

muH/ /de nas lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin/ /'khor lo lhag par 'byung ba'i rim/ /u ts+tshiSh+TA k+She tra pa la/ /a ti tsa kra u tsiT+Ta/ /su b+ho dzaM nAM bi ba gnyis/ /b+hak+Sha gnyis dang sar+b+ba dang / /
sid+d+hiM pra yats+tsha me dang / /oM sngon AHhUM phaT swAhA/ /de yi rjes la brjod par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu 'chang 'gyur ba/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas/ khams gsum rnam
rgyal rang bzhin dang / /rdo rje slob dpon rang bzhin ni/ khams gsum rnam rgyal rang bzhin 'chang / /de ltar cho ga nyi shu las/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid bstan/ /de
nyid mang du shes pa yis/ /bla ma dge ba'i las dbang po/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ cho ga nyi shu pa'i las rgyas pa'i le'u ste
@#/ /lnga bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /de yi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu ni/ /las ni cho ga nyi shur bshad/ /dbang phyug chen po'i rgyu mtshan
ci| |de yi 'bras bu ci zhig 'gyur/ /chen po'i chen po ji skad gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /las kyi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu dang / /sngon du bsnyen pa'i las
kyis ni| |rgyu mtshan 'jig rten dngos grub brgyad/ /ser sna la sogs bsal ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas mchod ba rnam bsgom zhing / /sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /
brtson 'grus bsam gtan rab tu rdzogs/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur gyis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa rdzogs/ /gsang ba la sogs la gnas pa/ /skye bo chags
pa'i rgyu mtshan no/ /kun tu spyod pa'i chos rnams kyis/ /mnyam nyid ye shes rgyu yis ni/ /bla ma dad pas mchod pa na/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang don/ /chu sogs ming
ni mthar thug pa/ /ye shes lnga yi rnam dag phyir/ /spyod pa phyir mi ldog pa'i mtha'/ /sems can bsam pa rnam dag phyir/ /shes rab brtul zhugs sogs kyi mtha'/ /
dpe yis bde ba bstan pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor sa tshon phra rab dang / /mtshungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /mchod pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / /de ltar 'bras bu
'khor lo 'jug /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa ni/ /las kyi sgrib pa dag par 'gyur/ /shin tu rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/ /dbang bskur ba ni thob pa dang / /dngos po'i
ngo bo ji bzhin du/ /shes rab ye shes kyis ni thob/ /bla ma yis ni sgrub pa yang / /mchod pa de yi go 'phang mchog /de ltar yun mi ring bar 'thob/ /dag pa'i spyod pa brtul
zhugs mchog /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ cho ga nyi shu pa'i rgyu mtshan dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu lnga pa'o// //
de nas rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /mchod pa'i cho ga bla na med/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /lus la mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim/ /rdo shing sa dang gser gyi ni/ /
sku gzugs la ni phyag mi bya/ /rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang / /de nas nam yang mi bya'o/ /dri chen rdor chu dkon mchog sogs/ /bdag nyid lnga ni rtag tu mchod/ /
de phyir de la mngon zhugs pa'o/ /thugs kyi rdo rje rang nyid gtso/ /sems de yang ni de dngos med/ /gang phyir stong nyid mtshan nyid ni/ /stong nyid kyang ni rnam pa med/ /de phyir
thams cad nam mkha' 'dra/ /de ltar rnam dag rnam shes bya/ /rtsa ni gsum la'ang mchod par bya/ /gang phyir sems kyi rang bzhin kun/ /sems las gzhan pa yod ma yin/ /
@#/ /rang nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /sems kyi rang bzhin la ni gnas/ /lha yi gzugs ni bla med pa/ /sems ma gtogs pa gzhan ni med/ /de phyir de ltar
rnam dpyod pa/ /rang lus gcig pu rtag tu mchod/ /rigs lnga dag tu rtag spyod pas/ /rigs gcig tu ni rnam par brtag /'dod dang mi 'dod dbye ba dang / /btung dang
mi btung rnam par spangs/ /rnal 'byor skal yod skal med ces/ /nam yang smra bar mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya'i rnam pa sngon po sogs/ /de bzhin gzugs la'ang dbye ba gsum/ /
gzugs rdo rje ma bkug nas su/ /sa snying la ni dbul bar bya/ /yang dag klu dang brjod bral dbyangs/ /de bzhin sgra la'ang dbye ba gsum/ /sgra rdo rje ma yang dag dgug /
phyag na rdo rje la ni dbul/ /ga bur a gar dzA ti sogs/ /de bzhin dri yang dbye ba gsum/ /dri rdor je ma yang dag dgug /nam mkha'i snying po la yang dbul/ /'o byed pa
dang 'jib pa dang / /ro drug de bzhin dbye ba gsum/ /rdo rje ro ma yang dag dgug /'jig rten dbang phyug la ni dbul/ /rdo rje pad+ma yang dag spyor/ /gos dang 'khyud pa'i
dbye ba gsum/ /reg bya rdo rje yang dag dgug /sgrib sel la ni dbul bar bya/ /phyi yi chos rnams 'di dag kun/ /brtags pa dang ni ma brtags pa'ang / /chos dbyings
rdo rje yang dag dgug /'jam pa'i rdo rje la ni dbul/ /de bzhin phyi dang nang dang ni/ /gnyis ga yang ni mi dmigs la/ /gzugs la gsum du byas nas ni/ /lha rnams la ni dbul
bar bya| |yul ni lnga ni nges gnas te/ /rgyud lngar nges par 'byung ba ni/ /rmi lam rlung dang ldan pa ru/ /'dod pa lnga rnams spyod par byed/ /dbang po gang dang gang lam gyis/ /sgrub
pa po ni yul 'thob bo/ /de dag thams cad thugs rje che/ /mnyes pa'i phyir ni dbul bar bya/ /yang dag dga' ba'i me tog gis/ /rdo rje nyi ma pad+ma 'byung / /me tog bdag nyid la
mchod pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog /rnam rtog tshul yul ma yin zhing / /de ltar gtum mo'i me yis ni/ /nges par bsregs pa de ni spos/ /thugs kyi rdo rje la ni dbul/ /
rdo rje pad+ma yang dag par/ /zhugs pa la sogs rim las byung / /rnal 'byor pa yi mi shigs sgra/ /thugs rdo rje la dbul bar bya/ /yi ge hUM las yang dag byung / /sngags kyi 'od
zer shin tu gsal/ /mar me 'bar ba'i yang dag 'od/ /thugs kyi rdo rje la dbul bya/ /bde ba chen po nam mkhar gnas/ /byang chub sems ni sad pa dang / /de nyid kyis kyang
byugs pa ni/ /thugs kyi rdo rje la dbul bya/ /'dir ni gang dang gang longs spyod/ /dbang po thams cad yang dag brten/ /de dag thams cad thugs rdo rje/ /bza' ba'i snod du mchod
@#/ /par bya| |dgod dang sgeg dang rtse 'dze ni/ /sna tshogs kyis ni sems dga' byed/ /rnam par thar ba'i sgo dag dang / /thugs kyi rdo rje la ni dbul/ /rnal 'byor chen
po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ nang gi bdag nyid mchod pa'i cho ga'i rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo
rjes gsungs/ /lha mo yi ni mtshan nyid mchog /rnal 'byor bde la rtogs pa rnams/ /rtsa dbye ba yi rang bzhin gyis/ /rtag tu lus kyi rtse 'jo bya/ /de yi lha rnams su ni bshad/ /
rtag tu bde ba kun gyis dga'/ /kun nas rnam par sgeg pa'i lus/ /bde ba chen pos kun tu khyab/ /lha nyid du naM yang dag brjod/ /dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang / /
bral ba lhan cig skyes skad cig /'char ba dang ni rtse 'jo dang / /kun nas lhag par sgeg pa dang / /brgyal dang sad par gyur pa dang / /de rnams lha mo ru ni bshad/ /phyi rol
du ni byung ba na/ /gang phyir yang dag sbyor bar 'gyur/ /lus kyi rtsa rnams yang dag sad/ /de phyir rnal 'byor mar ni bshad/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba
mngon par rtogs pa las/ lha mo'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /e baM zhes bya yi ga gnyis/ /e ni stong pa
nyid du bshad/ /de bzhin baM ni thugs rje dang / /thig le de gnyis sbyor las byung / /de ni rnal 'byor rmad mchog byung / /e baM gnyis ni sangs rgyas dang / /mdor bsdus chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /
rgyal po chen po phyag rgya gnyis/ /rgyud rnams su ni thog mar gsungs/ /se ni b+ha ga'i mtshan nyid do/ /pad+ma'i rten du shes par bya/ /rten pa rdo rje zhes ni gsungs/ /brtan pa rdo rje 'chang
ba yi| |de la gnas pa'i thig le'i gzugs/ /sna tshogs sprul pa ston par byed/ /bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /e ni gsang ba'i mkha' dbyings
sam| |b+ha ga chos 'byung pad+ma la/ /rnal 'byor seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /mchog tu rmad byung ston par mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' baM rdo rje/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed dbang phyug dang / /
he ru ka dang dus 'khor lo/ /dang po sangs rgyas la sogs mtshan/ /e baM de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya/ /gnyis su med pa'i bde mchog dang / /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med dang / /
gang la de nyid mngon par brjod/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya/ /gnyis med ye shes mtshan ma ni/ /rgyud kun gyi ni gleng gzhir gsungs/ /rgyud kun gyi ni don bsdus pa/ /
stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa/ /gang la de nyid mngon par brjod/ /e baM zhes bya ba'i mi ge gnyis/ /gang la 'di nyid med pa ni/ /de la de kho na nyid med/ /gang la de nyid yongs shes
@#/ /pa| |bcos ma'i gser ltar gsal bor ni/ /rgyud ni legs bshad de nyid shes/ /sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas par/ /de ltar 'di ni de nyid mchog /e baM
don ni rnam par nges/ /chos kyi phyag rgya yi ge gnyis/ /dang po'i ngag tu yang dag bshad/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ e baM
zhes bya ba dang po'i ngag bshad pa dang rgyu mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /e baM la sogs don rgyas pa/ /
gang gis yang dag yongs su shes/ /chos kyi de ni yang dag rtogs/ /e/ e ni shes rab dam pa ste/ /'dod chags bral sogs skad cig bdag /srid pa gsum na yongs
shes pa| |'di ni rtsa bar rnam par bstan/ /baM/ 'od ma sgreng ba ltar mdzes shing / /chags la sogs pa rab bskyed ldan/ /snang ba gsal ba rnam par shes/ /ming ni thabs
shes bya ba yin/ /ma/ rig chen rang nyid rtsa ba ste/ /ma rig pa ni bzlog pa yin/ /ma rig pa las 'di 'byung bas/ /de bas snang ba 'byung ba'o/ /yA/ /'gro ba rnam shes gsum
dang po'i/ /de ming snang ba gsal ba ste/ /de ni stong pa cher 'gyur la/ /de yang 'od gsal bar 'gro 'o/ /shru/ snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid can/ /gang 'di rnam shes gsum
thob pa| |sems can khams ni ma lus pa'i/ /rang bzhin rtsa ba 'di yin no/ /taM/ de ni re re'i don snang ba/ /rlung gis blangs nas 'dzin byed pa/ /laM/ rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam shes ni/ /
kun tu 'gro la gnas par 'gyur/ /e/ 'di ni rlung khams chen po ste/ /rnam shes gsum gyi bzhon pa yin/ /de yis rang bzhin dag tu ni/ /ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ka/
sra ba'i sa khams chu nyid dang / /de bzhin me dang rlung dag ni/ /rnam par shes par blangs nas su/ /srid gsum gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /smi/ 'di ni phung po lnga rnams su/ /'byung ba
'dus byas mtshan nyid ni/ /gzugs tshor 'du shes 'du byed dang / /rnam shes nyid ni lnga pa 'o/ /sa/ mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang / /bya ba grub pa nyid dang ni/ /me long dang ni chos
kyi dbyings/ /'di ni ye shes lnga po yin/ /ma/ yid kyi skye mched nyid dang ni/ /mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang / /sna dang lce dang lus rnams te/ /'di ni skye mched rnams 'byung ba'o/ /
ye| gang yang khams gsum sems can rnams/ /srog dang rtsol ba la brten pa/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas bzhin dang / /mi shes bsam gtan klog pa spangs/ /b+hA/ 'di las
rang bzhin chags pa dang / /chags med la sogs par yang 'gyur/ /de las dge dang mi dge'i las/ /de las skyes ba 'byung ba yin/ /ga/ 'gro ba 'byung ba'i phung po rnams/ /sangs
@#/ /rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid de/ /mngon par byang chub rnam lnga zhes/ /ming gis rab tu bskul ba yin/ /wa na/ rlung dang chu dang me dang sa/ /spyan la sogs pa bzhi po
ste| |ye shes bdag nyid can gsum du/ /shes bya sangs rgyas byang chub ster/ /sa/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur/ /phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab cing / /mig la sogs
pa'i bdag nyid der/ /sa snying la sogs rgyal sras so/ /rba/ rol pas dga' ba gang yin pa'i/ /khro bo'i rgyal po stobs chen rnams/ /de yi phyogs mtshams ngo bo ru/ /dpung
pa yan lag rnams su brtag /ta/ de dang de yi rigs las byung / /lha dang lha mo tha dad pa/ /de ni yod min de dag kyang / /'gro ba'i don phyir ston pa yin/ /thA/ 'di las
gnyis med mthong ba yi/ /rnal 'byor pa ni ye shes gsum/ /mthong phyir dman dang bar ma dang / /dam pa'i yul la gzhag par bya/ /ga/ dbang po rang nyid rang yul la/ /
'gro bar 'gyur ba de dang de/ /dbang po'i spyod yul gang dang gang / /de dang de snang tsam nyid do/ /ta/ dbang po de yi lam nas ni/ /sgrub pa pos ni yul thob pa/ /de bzhin de las
ma gsungs par/ /tshim par bya phyir dbul bar bya/ /kA/ sku gsum dag ni tha dad par/ /skyob pa yis ni yang dag bstan/ /rdzogs pa'i rim gyis sbyor ba yis/ /gcig tu
yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /ya/ gang zhig sangs rgyas sku mtshan nyid/ /kun rdzob bden par gsungs ba ni/ /de nyid rdzogs rim sbyor ba yis/ /'od gsal bar ni rnam dag 'gyur/ /
wA ka/ tshig gi lam gyi yul 'di nyid/ /gtso bo ye shes sku rang bzhin/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /'ja' tshon bzhin du snang ba yin/ /tsita/ sems dang sems byung ma
rig pa| |shes rab thabs dang nyer thob dang / /stong dang shin tu stong pa dang / /stong chen zhes kyang rab tu brjod/ /ta/ rang bzhin snang ba'i dbye shes na/ /de nas spyod pa rab tu bya/ /
las kyi lus ni yongs spangs nas/ /rdo rje sku nyid thob par 'gyur/ /hri/ thugs la 'jig rten pa rnams kyi/ /don spyod bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs/ /kun rdzob tu ni sprul skur
gnas| |ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa spyod/ /da/ yid bzhin nor bu mchog bzhin du/ /'dod pa thams cad ster bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi phun tshogs kyang / /stobs kyis blangs
nas spyod par 'gyur/ /ya/ rnal 'byor dbang po gang yang 'dod/ /de ni sgrib pa med par bya/ /mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor gyis/ /rtag tu mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur/ /ba/
rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas/ /ye shes gsum gyi cha rig pa/ /blo la gos dang mgos pa/ /der ni bde bas rtag tu gnas/ /dzra/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dngos dag kun las
@#/ /rnam par rol/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed bzhin du/ /gtan la phab pa'i gzhi la gnas/ /yo/ rnal 'byor lhag ba'i rnal 'byor dang / /rnal 'byor chen po rang
nyid 'gyur/ /rdo rje can dang mkha' 'gro ma/ /gang yang rnal 'byor de rang nyid/ /ShI/ dgag pa dag kyang byed pas na/ /bya dang bya min rnam spangs te/ /b+he/ pad+ma la ni 'dam gyis
bzhin| |ngo bo nyid cas gos mi 'gyur/ /b+ha/ yon tan brgyad dang nyer ldan pas/ /sems can thams cad rigs 'gyur zhing / /'jig rten khams ni ma lus par/ /bdag nyid
ye shes lus kyis spyod/ /ge/ gtso bo gang du spyod pa yi/ /de yi khyim ni nam mkha' nyid/ /bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /de nyid du ni rtag tu rol/ /Shu/ 'di la snang ba dbye ba
la| |thun mtshams nyin mo mtshan mo yi/ /'jig rten tha snyad byas pa yis/ /ye shes gsum ni mthong phyir ro/ /bi/ sna tshogs pa yi tha snyad dag /'jig rten pas ni yongs
brtags pa/ /lan gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis/ /ye shes gsum las 'byung ba'o/ /dza/ skye dang gnas dang 'jig pa dang / /srid pa bar mar gnas pa ste/ /ji snyed 'jig rten
gyis brtags pa/ /sems kyi rlung ni rnam 'phrul lo/ /ha/ rgod dang rtse mo byed pa dang / /gar gyi nyams dgur ldan pa dang / /sngags dang phyag rgya rnam rtog pa/ /rdo rje sems
dpa'i spyod pa'o/ /ra/ bdag byin brlab chen ma gtogs pa/ /rin chen gzhan dag 'di na med/ /me yis spyangs pa'i nor bu bzhin/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam pa'o/ /'di skad
la sogs dang po'i ngag /mchog tu gsungs pa'i don rgyas pa/ /gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i mdo/ /de nyid bshad pa bsdus pa ni/ /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin shes/ /sgrub po'i de nyid
shes pa ni/ /ye shes mchog gi mtshan nyid kyis/ /gang du gsal bar ma gsungs so/ /rim pa 'di yis rnal 'byor pas/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa rgyas btab pa/ /de ltar rim pa
'di yis shes/ /sems can kun la phan bskyed pa'o/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ e baM ma yA zhes bya ba dang po'i ngag bshad
pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg mchog /nang du rgyu ba'i 'byung ba rnams/ /gang gis thim par
gyur pa dang / /rnam rtag bag chags sa bon ni/ /phung po lnga yi bud shing dang / /rnal 'byor ye shes chen po'i mes/ /rtag tu spyin sreg rmad byung bya/ /lte dbus gnas pa'i sgra
tsam ni| |sgra tsam phyi rol gsang pad+ma/ /de la rang rgyud rlung gis ni/ /yongs su bskul pa'i me yis ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni yang dag sbyor/ /gzi brjid gsal bar rab tu 'bar/ /
@#/ /gang tshe mar gang gsang pad+ma/ /de la 'di ni snod du brjod/ /haM ni blugs gzar zhes byar gsungs/ /rdo rje dgang gzar du ni brjod/ /b+ha ga thab khung zhes ni bshad/ /
dbang po lnga yi bsreg rdzas dang / /phung po yam shing du ni gyur/ /mar ni byang chub sems su bshad/ /gnam stong nas brtsams nya yi bar/ /ji srid byed pa gshegs su gsol/ /
me thab thig le tsam du gsungs/ /blugs gzar nam yang mi 'pho ba/ /sangs rgyas gti mug dga' la sogs/ /gzugs rdo rje sogs rgyal sras rnams/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bcu la ni/ /
rtag tu sbyin sreg gis tshim bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchod pa gang / /de yang dgang blugs su ni brjod/ /hUM phaT yang dag ldan sngags kyis/ /cho ga bzhin du sreg blugs dbul/ /de
yis lus gnas mnyes 'gyur na/ /lha yi dam tshig bla na med/ /yid la ji ltar 'dod pa rnams/ /de ltar dngos grub stsal nas ni/ /sbyin sreg 'di ni mchog tu gsungs/ /dngos
grub kun gyi 'bras bu stsol/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg gi le'u ste drug cu ba'o// //
de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' ba ni/ /do la grub kun byed de nyid mchog /ji ltar rigs pa'i rim pa bzhin/ /rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod dang / /
don yod grub dang 'od dpag med/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan lnga po ni/ /bdud mi lnga yi mtshan nyid do/ /khrag ni rin chen dbang phyug dang / /byang chub sems ni 'od dpag med/ /de bzhin
don yod grub pa sha/ mi bskyod de bzhin rdo rje chu/ /dri chen rnam snang mdzad du bshad/ /de dag bdud rtsi lnga ni mchog /bas mtha' nyams dga' skye bos dben/ /sgra yi tsher ma rnam par
spangs| |de la khang pa bya ba ni/ /khang pa nyis btsegs sgo dang bcas/ /sa 'og khang pa gcig bya zhing / /gzhan dag de yi steng du bya/ /gzhan ni gsang nas bya ba ste/ /'jig rten pa ni gcig
tu shes| |sgrub pos de nyid kun shes shing / /sngags shes bsam pa rgya che ba/ /brtan zhing snying rje mkhas pa dang / /yul la phrag dog rnam par spangs/ /sgrub po gtso bo'i yon tan gang / /
de lta bu nyid sgrub grogs mchog /chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs/ /brtson zhing brkam chags med pa dang / /khro med dang bcas dpa' ba dang / /mang du thos shing yod
par blta/ /thog ma gnyis ka yi ni lus/ /'bras bu sogs kyis dag bya ba/ /gnod mdzes skul byed 'bum phrag gcig /de rjes sngags pas bzla bar bya/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM

b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga wA na pid+yA rA dza hUM hUM phaT/ de nas zla gcig yi ge gsum/ /sgrub pos mi smra
@#/ /bzla bar bya/ /kun tu bzang po 'gro ba'i gtso/ /de ni skad cig rmi lam mthong / /des ni bka' yis bsgo ba ni/ /ka n+ya mchog ni rten gyis la/ /sems
can don ni mtshungs med byos/ /ji ltar de nyid rdo rje 'chang / /bu mo skal ldan mig yangs ma/ /gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan/ /brkam chags med cing chags
bcas sems/ /sgeg pas myos shing bsgyings dang bcas/ /nu rgyas sngo bsangs nyams dga' ba/ /rnam rtog med cing mang du thos/ /sgrub pos de srid 'dod par bya/ /ji
srid khu ba dang bcas gyur/ /de nas gdong ni pad+ma gnyis/ /gnyis ka 'byung ba blangs nas ni/ /pad+ma'i snod der gzhag par bya/ /mtshan nyid bzang por zhag bdun du/ /
glang po rta khyi ba lang mi/ /dpyid zla tha chung gnyis ka shar/ /skye gnas nas ni blangs nas ni/ /de bzhin de ru rim pa bzhin/ /pad snod de nyid la ni der/ /zhag bdun par
du gzhag par bya/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ /yi ge gsum ni sngags bzlas bya/ /'du 'dzi med cing dben pa'i gnas/ /tsan+dan bzang po byung nas ni/ /dzaHhUM
baM hoH'i sngags bkod pa'i/ /pad+mo'i snod la gzhag par bya/ /ra yi 'o ma til gyi mar/ /mar dang li kha dkar po dang / /cha bsnyams bskol ba byas nas ni/ /de dang lhan
cig snod bzhag bsre/ /rgya shug tshag gu tshad tsam gyis/ /blo dang ldan pas ril bu bya/ /grib ma la ni bskams byas nas/ /rim gyis bskyed cing bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje ming
sring spun dang ni/ /rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'/ /zla ba gcig nas de nas lhag /mdza' bo rnams dang yang dag bsgo/ /mar ngo'i tshes brgyad tshes bcu 'am/ /yang na
bcu bzhi nas brtsams te/ /de la gtor ma bya ba ni/ /las kun la ni bla na med/ /de las kyang ni dngos grub skye/ /phyag rgya chen po mngon rdzogs dang / /dngos grub rgyas dang zhi ba
sogs| |de yis 'bad mi dgos par thob/ /rlung gi de nyid yang dag slob/ /mkha' spyod nyid ni thob par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs
pa las/ bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo cho ga mchog /gang gis mchod pa
las byung ba/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi dngos grub mchog /rnal 'byor tshe dang lhan cig tu/ /bsgrub pa'i phyir ni yang dag gnas/ /phyag rgya brda ni yongs shes shing / /de dang
dam tshig la ni 'jug /de rnams tshogs ni rab mchog dang / /tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhes ni brjod/ /kun kyang dam tshig la gnas pa/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /
@#/ /bla ma la dad dam tshig gnas/ /gtong sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /thabs zhes bya ba bgegs med na/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo la ni 'jug /gzhan
du skyon ni 'byung 'gyur te/ /'khor lo la yang 'grub mi 'gyur/ /shes rab kyang ni thabs dang mtshungs/ /mdza' bo bzang dang rab tu mkhas/ /lo ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lon/ /lhag
ma yongs su spangs nas ni/ /thabs dang so sor shes rab dang / /kun la gcig ni phan yon med/ /thog ma yid 'ong nyams dga' bar/ /me tog gi ni dkyil 'khor bya/ /de
nyid sna tshogs mchod pa ni/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag nas mchod/ /gtso bo dngos po kun gyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du mchod/ /tshogs kyi mchod pa byas
rjes la| |dkyil 'khor lugs 'byung lugs ldog pas/ /dad pa dngos pos kun nas ni/ /mnyam pas blta bas bsgoms nas ni/ /bstan bcos nyams myong 'jig rten
dang / /'gal ba de ni gzhug mi bya/ /gzhan yang bstan bcos las gsungs pa/ /mtshan phyed na ni dgug par bya/ /slob dpon mgon la yang dag mchod/ /ji ltar
gdan steng bzhugs gsol nas/ /gdan ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /phyag rgya chen po yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje slob dpon de nyid kyang / /mkhyen pa 'khor lo'i dbus na
bzhugs/ /dkyil 'khor ba ni gzhan rnams dang / /de bzhin 'khor lo gnas pa gzhag /dkyil 'khor pa bzhin shes par bya/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lor gtam smra dang / /rtsod dang
de bzhin sgrub pa dang / /mchil snabs dor zhing dgod pa dang / /rkang pa la sogs rkyong ba dang / /yang dang yang du ldang ba ni/ /de la dus kun du mi bya/ /phyag rgya brda yi tshogs rnams
kyis| |bya zhing bya bar shes par bya/ /shes bzhin du ni gar dang glu/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du mi bya/ /gtso bo la ni snod kyi mchog /dum bu gcig mtshan nyid bzang / /
de med dum bu gsum pa la/ /me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod/ /lha yi chad la sogs pa gang / /legs par mnyam par bzhag ste dbul/ /tshogs rnams la yang so
sor snod/ /me tog tshogs kyis yongs gang ba/ /thog mar gtor ma chen po sbyin/ /sngon bzhin bza' ba la sogs ldan/ /gang gis dga' ba rnams nyams pa/ /de 'dra btung
bar mi bya'o/ /yang dang yang du phyag byas nas/ /phyag rgya bcings nas btung bar bya/ /de nas bza' ba thams cad ni/ /spyang bya sogs kyis yang dag sbyangs/ /oM dang AHdang
hUM gis ni/ /sbyang dang sbar dang rtogs par bya/ /gur gum tsan+dan dpa' bo dang / /gangs dang ri dwags lte ba dang / /'di ni dag byed bdud rtsi lnga/ /bza' ba 'di rnams rab tu spyod//
@#/ /sbom po ming med sbyor ba yis/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rim bzhin/ /rang gi lce rtses myang bar bya/ /pad+ma'i dbus su dus kun tu/ kha la sems ni rnam
par bkod/ /bla na med pa'i mchod pa bya/ /pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus la ni/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi gdan du brjod/ /dpa' bo'i don gyi mtshan nyid rnams/ /gal te dpa' bo
mi shes na/ /dngos grub thams cad gsol ba yi/ /'khor lo de yi 'bras bu med/ /de lta'i rim pa cung zad gang / /phyi nang bdag nyid yang dag spyod/ /de yis rnam dag
dngos grub 'gyur/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i 'bras bu ster/ /rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig 'dres/ /rab tu bshad kyi de nyon cig /gdug pa'i mkha' 'gro ma 'ga' zhig /
sems rtog pa yi phyir 'ongs nas/ /de la de tshe smra ba yang / /sgrub pa pos ni mi bya zhing / /tshig tsam gyis kyang lan mi gdab/ /bde bar 'ongs sam phyag rgya bya/ /de la
cung zad bya smra gang / /slob dpon rang nyid kyis ni bya/ /yang na bya ba thams cad ni/ /las kyi rdo rjes yang dag spyad/ /gang phyir gang nyid rdo rje sems/ /las kyi rdo rje
gzhan 'ga' med/ /sna tshogs kyi ni rnal 'byor ma/ /yang dang yang du dgug par bya/ /de la g.yo ba'i spyod pa med/ /slob dpon dpa' bo bzhin du spyod/ /gang
yang skyon gyi spyod pas ni/ /de yi lus ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /shin tu dga' ba yang dag skyes/ /bka' bsgo gar gyi spyad pa bya/ /rdo rje bcing ba de yang bya/ /lha rnams ji ltar mnyes
pa nyid| |ma 'am sring mo bu mo 'am/ /gal te mchod par 'dod pa na/ /shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/ /rtog pa med pas bstan par bya/ /rab mchog de yi dngos grub ni/ /thob
par 'di la the tshom med/ /lhag ma'i gtor ma blangs nas ni/ /dgon pa chen por song nas dor/ /k+Sh+miM u ts+tshiSh+Ta k+She tra pA/ /lA ya swAhA sngags brjod bya/ /gal te de la rab byed pa'i/ /
rnal 'byor ma ni slar yang mthong / /de ltar de ni yongs shes nas/ /rnal 'byor pa yi mtshan nyid mchog /gang gi gdong ni 'bar ba'i 'od/ /zlum zhing 'jam la mdzes pa
dang / /smin ma ring ba de shes bya/ /'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung / /de la pad+ma'i phyag rgya bstan/ /rus sbal phyag rgya lan yin no/ /mchu rlo mig dkyus ring ba dang / /kha
dog ser mo yid 'phrog ma/ /'di yi dpral bar ri mo gsum/ /ji srid skra mtshams bar du gnas/ /g.yul du 'chi ba rnams kyi ni/ /gtam dag la ni rab tu nyan/ /'di 'dra'i
mkha' 'gro mthong na ni/ /mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa dang / /de ni gar byed rab tu ston/ /g.yon pa yongs su bskor nas ni/ /phyag rgya'i
@#/ /lan ni bstan par bya/ /sna tshogs pa yi gos la'ang dga'/ /rin chen 'byung ldan rigs las byung / /kha dog nag cing gos kyang nag/ skra ni 'khyil
cing dar gyis bcings/ /dpral bar gzhu yi rnam pa yi/ /de 'dra'i mtshan ma mthong na ni/ /rtag tu de ni sems g.yo ba/ /ma mo zhes ni rab tu grags/ /dril bu'i phyag rgya
bstan par bya/ /de yi g.yon pas phyag rgya ston/ /mi bskyod rigs las byung bar shes/ /mtshan mo 'ongs nas 'gro ba mchog /thung du lto sbom kha dog dkar/ /byin pa
sbom zhing shin tu mdzes/ /sa spyod mar ni shes par bya/ /dung gi phyag rgya lan yin no/ /rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung / /mig yangs rdzi ma stug pa dang / /yan lag
kun la ba spus khyab/ /sngo bsangs mig ni dmar ba dang / /yan lag phra zhing dpung pa ring / /de ni mkha' 'gro ma ru grags/ /don yod grub pa'i rigs las byung / /de
'dra ba ni rab mthong na/ /ba dan gyi ni phyag rgya dang / /g.yon pa'i phyag rgya lan yin no/ /de ltar 'bad pas shes nas ni/ /mkhas pas mtshan mo song nas ni/ /de la cung
zad 'jigs mi bya/ /gang phyir de nyid mchod par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga dang / rnal
'byor ma dang 'dre ba'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /gsang ba'i tshig gi bshad pa dang / /rdo rje'i gnas sogs gnas rnams
su| |rigs kun las byung rnal 'byor ma/ /mtshan mo 'du ba'i dam tshig ni/ /'di 'dra ba yi tshig rnams dang / /de lta bu yi gsang ba ni/ /bshad kyi dad pa'i sems kyis nyon/ /
saM po ta kaM chang 'thung ba/ /bri raM sha ru mngon par brjod/ /ni la na pa traM thod dang / /ku laM mi yi rus pa'i rgyan/ /kun du raM 'dod yang dag sbyor/ /tsha druM ro drug bza' ba'o/ /suM su
TaM dbang gnyis sbyor ba/ /a lo kaM yod pa yi ming / /sha rim ga kaM skal yod shes/ /tsa tra kaM ni skal med brjod/ /tuM shaM raM ni zhu bar shes/ /me ga ma traM gla rtsir brjod/ /tsan+d+ra ma ni
khrag tu bshad/ /ga naM bshad bar yongs su grags/ /g+ha naM sha chen du ni bshad/ /ni dzaM d+ha du ra ru brjod/ /b+ha sa naM ni chu ru bshad/ /pak+ShaM yan lag rab tu bshad/ /shu pa bzang po
zhes ni brjod/ /ho ni tshim pa zhes ni grags/ /marga ltogs pa ru ni brjod/ /g+h+ri taM lam du bshad pa dang / /khyo ma gaM naM pha rol dpung / /ka ma ya ni gyis shig brjod/ /na ga raM
ni bdag lus brjod/ /ba ta ka ni nyos zhes brjod/ /a dzaM ya ni me zhes brjod/ /sha khaM za ba zhes ni brjod/ /rag ma 'dor ni cho ga brjod/ /sha ta kaM mi bza' bar brjod/ /ci
@#/ /'dra ba ni sngags zhes brjod/ /sha raM khyi 'tshed sha zhes brjod/ /raM ba ka ni bla mar bshad/ /ka ya 'dir ni rgyal rigs brjod/ /ra gaM rje rigs zhes ni bshad/ /
be raM rgya ni dmangs rigs brjod/ /tsa baM rigs ngan zhes ni brjod/ /sha raM sme sha can du brjod/ /b+ha ba tsa kraM ko lpags mkhan/ /khad kom ro sreg ma ru bshad/ /sa man+t+ra ni
rgyal por brjod/ /mi raM ma yi ring du brjod/ /b+ha ra ha gang zhes ni bshad/ /bim+kh+ya phag ces brjod par bya/ /ba laM sha ni nya zhes brjod/ /di nam ra skyes su ni bshad/ /nag tuM
sbyin sreg tu ni bshad/ /ma rta a h+na 'dab chags brjod/ /hi ra phyu ni me tog brjod/ /sha drul laM ni spos su bshad/ /mA la tri ni dri ru bshad/ /sha ku ni ka mar mer bshad/ /
ka shi kaM ni gos su bshad/ /ke sa ra ni gdong du brjod/ /paM traM dpral ba zhes su brjod/ /ma la smin mar yang dag grags/ /ko bal yaM ni mig tu shes/ /a dar ni so ru
brjod| |pal la bo ni mchu ru shes/ /pa sha mgrin pa ru ni grags/ /hUM so phrag pa ru ni bshad/ /a gu ro ni dpung bar brjod/ /so so ru ni lag par bshad/ /shri pang le
ni nu mar brjod/ /dza taM pha laM rkang par brjod/ /dal naM ni lte bar brjod/ /pad+ma dza lam gsang ba'i gnas/ /ka taM ba kaM bral gnyis so/ /be saM rje ngar du ni bshad/ /tshwa
ga na ni rkang par brjod/ /ba ra a ka ke sar/ /sen mo zhes ni yang dag bshad/ /pad+ma gar ni ga ni snang / /sha kra ku su laM mal stan/ /shag tu bu zhes bya bar brjod/ /na la
ni nA lam ston med/ /go bag Sh+ma lam thams cad brjod/ /sa ga raM ni rgas par bshad/ /sa laM ro ni zhim por brjod/ /ak+Sho raM rim mi zhim bshad/ /mrI gaM mi smra bar ni
bshad| |pa go la mu daM glu len/ /mi tra gar zhes bya bar brjod/ /shap+ta tshul 'chos su ni bshad/ /spar sha zhags par rab tu grags/ /ras sgeg mo yi ro 'bebs ma/ /ru paM
ri yi rtse mo'o/ /twa ne ha ni bshad par bshad/ /pA rA ba ta 'chi bar brjod/ /ta ma lA ko sa ma yul/ /pha laM grong khyer du ni brjod/ /pra na grong du bshad pa yin/ /th+ya n+ya srog ces
bya bar bshad/ /ku ru ta ra mkhas par bshad/ /na ya na ni rnam shes brjod/ /a b+hi na baM dgod par bshad/ /ru d+hi ra ni 'chang bar brjod/ /ku mu ra ni nyin mor bshad/ /
kan nya mtshan mor rab tu grags/ /da sa nyi ma phyed du bshad/ /da pi mtshan gyi cha ru grags/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/
gsang ba'i tshig bshad pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /sku ni mgo bor gnas
@#/ /pa ste| |sum cu rtsa gnyis byang sems 'bab/ /de ni so sor rab phye bas/ /sku yi 'khor lo ru zhes bya/ /yi ge phyi mo'i dbye ba yis/ /gsung la gnas
par rab tu shes/ /chags sogs bag chags dbye ba yis/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo ru ni shes/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bshad pa ni/ /sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig /rdo
rje slob dpon lus 'di la/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni rim bzhin gnas/ /dang po sku yi rdo rje ni/ /gzugs phung la ni yang dag bzhugs/ /de rjes nam mkha' rdo rje ni/ /tshor ba yi
ni phung por bzhugs/ /bcom ldan gsung gi rdo rje ni/ /'du shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs/ /las rnams kyi ni rdo rje ni/ /'du byed kyi ni phung por bzhugs/ /bcom ldan
thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /rnam shes phung por yang dag bzhugs/ /yang 'di'i sha sogs sa khams la/ /bcom ldan 'das yum spyan bzhugs so/ /khrag sogs chu yi khams
la ni| |bcom ldan 'das yum mA ma bzhugs/ /dro ba la sogs me khams la/ /bcom ldan 'das yum gos dkar bzhugs/ /mi bskyod la sogs rlung khams la//
bcom ldan 'das yum sgrol ma bzhugs/ /de mig dbang po gnyis la ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pas snying po/ /de yi rna ba'i dbang gnyis la/ /bde gshegs phyag na
rdo rje 'o| |de yi sna bug gnyis la ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i mdzod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang / /de yi lca yi dbang la bzhugs/ /de yi yid kyi
dbang po la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs bzhugs/ /khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu ni/ /lus zhes bya bar brtags pa la/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs so/ /lus kyi tshigs ni thams cad la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang / /lus kyi rtsa rgyus thams cad la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byams
pa'o| |lag pa g.yas pa'i rtsa bar ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje gshed/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i rtsa bar ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan mi thub/ /kha yi pad+mar
bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rta mgrin no/ /gsang ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /dpung pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni//
de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba/ /dpung pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal/ /pus mo g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs
kha dbyug pa sngo/ /pus mo g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs po che/ /rang gi mgo steng bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor los bsgyur/ /
@#/ /rkang pa'i 'og tu bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gnod mdzes te/ /lus ni 'di nyid kun la 'dir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs/ /
sku yi dkyil 'khor zhes brjod pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbye ba yis/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus 'di/ /lus pa med pa sangs rgyas
sku| |skye ba 'di la rnal 'byor pa/ /mya ngan 'das pa myur du 'thob/ /khyod kyi dge ba yongs sbyin pa/ /de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /lus la rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs/ /
mthong na don ni yod pa kye/ /phyi ma'i dus na sems dpa' che/ /de bas sems can thams cad kyi/ /lha yi mchod pa'i yo byad kyis/ /rab tu 'bad de bla ma bsten/ /de nas
mthong ba don yod bcas/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags pa che/ /dga' zhing mgu bas phyag byas te/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchi ma blags/ /gsung dang thugs kyi
dkyil 'khor bzhugs/ /legs so bya ba byin nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /a A i I u U dang / /r-i r-I l-i l-I e ai dang / /o au aM aH
dbyangs zhes bya/ /ka tsa Ta ta pa sde tshan/ /ya ra la wa sha Sha sa/ /ha dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes/ /ngag kun rab tu spro dang ldan/ /'dod chags la sogs bag
chags kyang / /grangs ni nyi shu brgyad kyis so/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor legs rgyas pas/ /dpal mchog las ni shes par bya/ /de ltar 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ /rdo rje
gsum ni dam tshig mchog /mchog tu rmad byung rgyas pa ni/ /sgrub pa'i dbang pos yang dag shes/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/
sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dang / /bla ma
ston pa slob dpon dang / /rdo rje 'chang dang slob ma yi/ /mtshan nyid thams cad bsdus pa ni/ /dri med sems ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /chos ni ngag tu yang dag gsungs/ /
sku ni dge 'dun zhes bya ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi gnas/ /sangs rgyas yi ge hUM du bshad/ /gsung ni yi ge AHru brjod/ /dge 'dun zhes bya yi ge oM/ /kun
nas 'phro ba'i bdag nyid do/ /sangs rgyas a ba d+hU tIr 'gyur/ /chos kyang la la nA ru brjod/ /dge 'dun ra sa nA ru brjod/ /'di ni gsum po'i mtshan nyid do/ /gzugs med
khams ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /gzugs kyi khams ni chos dang ni/ /'dod khams de bzhin dge 'dun te/ /de ltar khams gsum mtshan nyid mchog /snying por gyur pa
@#/ /rang srog las/ /khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/ /sgyu ma rlung gi khams gsum pa/ /rmi lam rmi ba bzhin du mthong / /khams gsum bdag nyid de
bzhin du/ /gcig pur myur ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /byin gyis brlabs nas de bzhin nyid/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /
dam pa'i chos ni chos kyi sku/ /dge 'dun sprul pa'i skur ni 'gyur/ /de ni sku gsum bdag nyid can/ /snang ba sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs/ /chos ni snang ba thob pa'o/ /dge
'dun snang ba mched par 'gyur/ /de ni snang ba gsum mtshan nyid/ /zhi ba la sogs las la byang / /sngags dang rnal 'byor cha rnams shes/ /cho ga nyi shu bya ba bslabs/ /
de ni bla mar mngon par brjod/ /tshul khrims dag cing sbyin pa gtong / /bzod dang brtson 'grus mchog tu ldan/ /nyin dang mtshan du sgom la zhen/ /shes rab ldan
zhing bzo la mkhas/ /bla ma'i spyir ni yon tan tshogs/ /dpal ldan slob dpon zhes ni brjod/ /nang ni gsang 'dus la rab dga'/ /phyi rol nyan thos la spyod pa/ /de
lta'i man ngag rim pa yis/ /slob ma rnams la rjes su bslab/ /de ni ston par yongs su gsungs/ /de skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ /rtog pa rnams dang dkyil
'khor tshogs/ /dam pa'i don gyis bya ba dang / /slar yang snang ba gsum dang ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi spyod pa la/ /slob cing gzhan yang slob tu 'jug /de ni slob dpon
zhes bya'o/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs shes nas/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs bya ba shes/ /slob ma rjes sdud nus pa dang / /gsang ba'i dbang ni bskur ba dang / /shes rab snying rje yang
dag ldan/ /rgyud kyi man ngag la mi 'jigs/ /zab cing rgya cher yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa mchog /tshar gcod phan 'dogs pa la mkhas/ /de ni rdo rje 'chang
du bshad/ /dad cing bla ma la yang gus/ /rtag tu dge ba'i las la gnas/ /gnyis med sgyu yang med pa dang / /rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs/ /lung ni mang du thos pa dang / /gsod
pa dang ni 'tshe ba spangs/ /sems can rnams ni 'don pa'i blos/ /kun tu brtson dang yang dag ldan/ /de la sogs pa'i yang dag ldan/ /dad pa chen po'i slob ma bzang / /stong
nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /gang la de nyid nges shes bya/ /gong na med pa'i spyod rab mchog /sngags dang rnal 'byor rim pa sogs/ /ye shes lnga ni rnam dag dang / /sangs
rgyas lnga ni rang bzhin nyid/ /mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis/ /snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang / /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang / /sku gsum rnam par bsgom pa
@#/ /dang / /bde chen yon tan mtshan nyid ni/ /dga' ba la sogs dbye ba dang / de bzhin sgeg sogs nyams dang ni/ /rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang / /
shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/ /dang po sbyor ba mdor bsdus pas/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog /las kyi rgyal po rnal 'byor mchog /'jug dang gnas dang
ldang ba ni/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor dang / /bde gnyis dbugs 'byung gnyis la sogs/ /gang la rgyas bshad de nyid rgyud/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du brjod/ /
yon tan ji lta bu yi rgyud/ /thos sogs yon tan mchog gi ni/ /rten dang snod ces bya bar gsungs/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang / /ji ltar seng+ge'i 'o ma ni/ /
sa yi snod du gzhag mi bya/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud/ /snod min dag la sbyin mi bya/ /slob ma skad cig de la 'chi/ /'di dang pha rol tu ni phung / /snod min
man ngag rab bshad na/ /slob dpon dngos grub nyams par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ sangs rgyas dang dam pa'i
chos dang dge 'dun la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig rgyas pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/ /slob ma'i bya ba'i spyod pa
ni| |zhi ba la sogs bya ba yang / /sngags dang rnal 'byor rim pa yi/ /lham dang gdugs dang gtsug tor dang / /so rtsi la sogs myang ba dang / /snabs kyi gong bu mchil ma
sogs| |'dor zhing rkang pa rkyong ba dang / /gzhan du blta dang spyi brtol smra/ /nor gyis snyems dang ngar 'dzin dang / /rgyan la sogs pa blta ba dang / /bag med par ni smra ba
dang / /bla ma'i grib ma 'go ma pa dang / /de la sogs pa skyon gyi tshogs/ /bla ma'i mdun du rnam par spangs/ /'jigs pas thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /spyi bor phyag rgya bka' lung
nod| |rab bdog kun gtong dam bcas pas/ /ngo mtshar bcas shing gdong smad pas/ /slob mas bla ma'i mdun gnas bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /bla ma'i
mdun du slob ma rnams/ /de lta bu sogs spyod ces bya/ /dam tshig sdom pa sngar bshad pa/ /de rnams slob ma'i spyod pa'o/ /de yi zhi sogs bya ba ni/ /bla mas bstan par bya ba'i
rigs| |de la mdor bsdus bshad par bya/ /thun mong cho ga'i mtshan nyid ni/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa gnyis/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo la bya/ /dbang dang mngon spyod kyi ni las/ /zla ba mar
gyi ngo la brtsam/ /byang du kha bltas zhi ba la/ /de bzhin rgyas ba shar du blta/ /drag po'i las la lho phyogs su/ /dbang gi las la nub tu blta/ /gsod pa nyid la me yi phyogs/
@#/ /sdang bar bya la bden bral du/ /gnas nas bskrad la rlung gi phyogs/ /rengs pa la ni dbang ldan phyogs/ /zhi ba'i kha dog dkar po ste/ /rgyas pa la ni
ser po bya/ /dbang dang dgug pa la ni dmar/ /kha dog nag po gsod pa la'o/ /byams pa'i sems kyis zhi ba la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa la/ /chags pa'i
sems kyis dbang dag la/ /khro ba'i sems kyis gsod pa'o/ /zhi la phal cher tho rangs bya/ /de bzhin rgyas par snga dro bya/ /dbang dang mngon spyod dag gi las/ /nyi ma
gung dang mtshan phyed la'o/ /de ltar rigs par yang dag bshad/ /sngags kyi rgyud gsungs mtshan nyid kyis/ /zhi ba la sogs dngos grub brgyad/ /blo ldan cho ga bzhin du
bsgrub| |rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ slob ma'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang / zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bstan
pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon/ /khro bo bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /gang gis rnal 'byor dngos grub bshad/ /thob 'gyur
'di la the tshom med/ /khro ba'i sems kyis bzlas pa ni/ /khro bo'i bzlas pa zhes ni brjod/ /yang na khro bo'i rgyal po rnams/ /sngags bzlas pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo'i
bzlas pa de shes bya/ /dngos grub brgyad kyi 'bras bu stsol/ /'jigs su rung ba'i dur khrod du/ /'jigs pa 'jigs par byed pa'i gnas/ /skyes bu thod pa khrag gis gos/ /rma
med pa yi mtshan nyid blangs/ /skyes bu'i khu ba zla mtshan dang / /bsres nas bri bar bya ba ni/ /de na bsgrub bya'i rnam pa dang / /gsal dang 'jigs pa skrag pa dang / /g.yon brkyang
pa yis mnan nas ni/ /zhag bdun par du dus gsum du/ /gshin rje gshed kyi sngags 'dis ni/ /dngos grub rgyur ni bzla bar bya/ /na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra NAM/ oM kha

kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta sa twa da ma ka/ a si mu sa la par shu pA sha hasta/ khaD+ga bA ma ta ra tsa ni haSh+Tha/ tsa tur mu kha/ tsa tur b+hu dza/ Sha Ta tsa ra Na/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sarba duSh+Ta

pra NA a pa hA ri Ne/ ma hA big+h+nAM g+hA ta ka/ bi kri te A naM/ sar+b+ba b+hU ta b+ha yaM ka ra/ aT+Ta aT+Ta hA sa nA di ne byA g+h+ra tsar+m+ma ni pA sa na ku ru ku ru/ sar+b+ba kar+m+mA Ni/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ sar+b+ba man+t+rAM/ b+hin+da

b+hin+da| pa ra mu drA na/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ sar+b+ba b+hU tAM/ ma tha ma tha/ nirma tha ni rma tha/ sarba duSh+TA na/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ maN+Dal ma d+h+ye/ bai ba shwa ta/ dzI bi ta an+ta ka ra/ ku

ru ku ru| ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi lam+pa mA bi lam+pa/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ hUM hUM/ tardza ya/ b+ha ga naM/ phaT phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ kA ra kA ra/ sar+b+ba A na na ba ri bI ra pU rU
@#/ /ya| he he b+ha ga bAM/ kin+tsi rA ya si na/ na maHsar+b+bA r+tha sA d+ha ya hUM phaT swAhA/ theg mar khro bo'i bzlas pa 'di/ /dbang du bya dang dgug pa'i mchog /bskrad
pa rab tu bshad par bya/ /khro bo gnyis pa'i bzlas pa yang / /ske tshe lan tshwa yungs mar dang / /dug dang d+ha du ra'i khu ba/ /sdigs mdzub khrag dang bsres nas su/ /dur khrod
ras dang bya ba ni/ /zla ba phyed pa lta bu mchog /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /logs gnyis rdo rjes mtshan par bya/ /de dbus bsgrub bya'i ming bris la/ /g.yon brkyang bar
ni gnas nas ni/ /sngags ni yongs su bzla bar bya/ /sngar bzhin bsgrub bya'i ming bkug nas/ /mtshan phyed kyi ni dus su ni/ /kun nas zhag bdun bsgrub par bya/ /bskrad
pa yang ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra NAM/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daMSh+Tota ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ oM a mr-i

tu kuN+Da l-i/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sar+b+ba bi g+h+nAM bi nA ya kA na/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI
bi ta an+ta ka ra ya hUM phaT swAhA/ sngags 'dis gdug pa'i sems can ni/ /bskrad pa'i don du byas pa yi/ /zhi ba'i las ni bshad bya ba/ /gzhan gyis mi thub ming dang
ni| |khro bo gsum pa bzlas nas ni/ /me dang sbrul sogs zhi bar byed/ /lag pa gnyis la nyi ma gnyis/ /de la hUM gnyis bsgom par bya/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo la lag gnyis kyis/ /
brabs la de la zhugs nas ni/ /bsgrub bya'i snying la de gnyis kyis/ /'byung po sreg par bsam par bya/ /me dang 'byung po 'jigs byed pa'i/ /'di yi sngags ni bshed par bya/ /
na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra NI/ oM a pa rA dzI ti rI dzi hUM phaT/ che ge mo 'byung po'i gdon las grol bar mdzod cig /d+h+rIHdug sel ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /bzhi pa bshad
kyi de nyon cig /khro bo rta mgrin bzlas pas ni/ /yang dag mi mtshungs pa yi mchog /bsgrub bya sems dpa' sum brtsegs bsgom/ /snying gar zla gnas ye shes sems/ /
de yi 'od zer gyis rab gang / /bsgrub bya'i lus la mchog tu bsam/ /rab tu 'bar ba de yis dug /de nas lag g.yas bsam pa ni/ /zla ba haM gis rnam par brgyan/ /
kha dog dkar por sor mor dgod/ /de ltar sgrub pa po la bya/ /hUM d+h+rI dzi k+ShIM sA d+ha dgod/ /las rnams kun ni 'grub par byed/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo bo nas brtsams te/ /rkang
pa'i mtha' yi bar du bsgom/ /chu rgyun rgyun mi 'chad pa ni/ /dug ni 'og btang rim pa yis/ /'dir ni sngags 'di bzla bya ste/ /rta mgrin du ni mngon par brjod/ /na maH
@#/ /sa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM/ ta ru la bi ru la/ sar+b+ba bi Sha g+hA ta ka ta ka dz+wa li ti bi s+phu ling+ga/ aT+TA aT+Ta hA sa nA da sa hi tA/ ka sa ri sa ho pa

taM ad de badzra khu ra g+ha ta na/ tsa ta pa su d+ha ta la ni shwA sa ma ru ta uta k+Ship+ta d+ha ra Ni d+ha ra/ bi Sha na aT+Ta hA sa a pa ri mi ta wa la pa rA kra ma AR+ya ga Na b+hi ta/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ ha ya

grI ba kha kha ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ A be sha ya/ sar+b+ba gra he Sh+wa/ a pra ti ha to b+ha wa/ badzra daM Sh+Ti kiny+tsi rA ya si i daM duSh+Ta gra haM daM Sh+Ta sar+b+baM pA d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ marda marda/ bud+d+ha

d+har+m+ma ra d+ha/ bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma saM g+ha a nu dz+nyA na kaR+yaM ku ru swAhA/ che ge mo'i dug la sogs pa sel bar mdzod cig hUM zhes bya ba dang sngags spel lo/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs
te| |lhag ma rgyas par shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ /khro bo'i bzlas pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub
brgyad kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog
dngos grub la sogs mtshan nyid ni/ /sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang / /'jam dpal sgrib pa sel ba dang / /byams pa lnga po 'di dag dang / /yi ge gsum dang rnam par
spel| |mig dang rna ba yid dang lus/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo byin gyis brlab/ /mtshan gsum nyin mo de dang 'dra/ /mngon shes lnga nyid thob par byed/ /bzhi pa yis ni dbang bskur
bas| |blo ldan de nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ /snang ba mtshan mo'i cha ru 'gyur/ /nyin mo snang ba mched pa'o/ /mtshams ni snang ba thob pa'o/ /de ltar snang la sogs mtshan nyid/ /
mtshan min mtshams dang nyin mo min/ /kun rtog rlung ni spong bar byed/ /de ni skad cig mngon byang chub/ /mtshan nyid skad cig mar ni brjod/ /tha mar 'byung dang thog mar
'byung ba'am/ /dbus min 'byung ba'ang dbus su 'byung ba'am/ mtha' min 'byung ba'ang mthar ni 'byung ba'am/ /de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs/ /
