gang du 'gro ba dang ni 'ong med cing / /zad med 'phel med dngos med min/ /ngo mtshar gzugs can yin zhing ngo mtshar min/ /gnas par 'gyur min myur du 'gro ba min/ /
gang zhig yod dang med pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral/ /bsod nams gzugs min sdig pa'i gzugs ma yin/ /bsod nams sdig gi bdag min mchog gyur pa/ /de ni
thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs/ /skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub/ /mtshan nyid 'di ni skad cig mchog/ rdo rje rtse mo byang sems ni/ /'dzin pas
@#/ /lus kyi brtan pa nyid/ /de yis de nyid byang sems ni/ /rlung gi de nyid rab sbyor bas/ /rigs pas steng du byed pa ni/ /rgas pa med par the tshom med/ /hUM ho
rim bzhin shes pa ni/ /'dzin pa steng du rnam par spel/ /sngar bshad pa yi bdud rtsi lnga/ /'di ni bcud kyis len du brjod/ /'di nyid kyis ni grub par byed/ /lcags kyi
gser 'gyur byas nas ni/ /rdo rje phyag rgya dngos grub che/ /zung du 'jug pas thob par 'gyur/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dang / /de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang / /
gang la de gnyis gcig 'gyur ba/ /de ni zug du 'jug par bshad/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /rtog pa gnyis po spangs pas ni/ /gang du dngos po gcig 'gyur
pa| |zung du 'jug ces de la bshad/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag /rtog pa gnyis dang rnam par bral/ /gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa/ /de ni zung du 'jug par
bshad| |rdo rje bzlas pa'i rab sbyor bas/ /rlung gi mtshan nyid shes nas ni/ /rnam rtog rlung rnams rnam par gcod/ /sems la dmigs pa thob par 'gyur/ /bdag
la byin brlab rim pas kyang / /dngos grub brgyad ni thob par 'gyur/ /snang ba la sogs dbye ba shes/ /mngon par byang chub rim pa thob/ /zung 'jug rim pa la
gnas pa/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa yis the tshom med/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub cher/ /zung du 'jug pa'i
ting 'dzin gyis/ /rnam rtog med par zhugs nas ni/ /thob pa 'di la the tshom med/ /lus ni gzhal yas khang du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis yang dag brten/ /zur bzhi pa
ba mdun rgyab dang / /g.yas dang g.yon gyi dbye bas so/ /steng 'og sgo yi dbye ba yis/ /sgo bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /sna rtse bzhi yi dbyibs kyis ni/ /rta babs bzhi ni
brjod par bya/ /dra ba rgyu mar yang dag bshad/ /rgyus par gyur pa dra ba phyed/ /cha ni zla ba phyed pa dang / /bum pa lto bar yang dag shes/ /rje ngar bral dpung lag ngar ni/ /ka
ba brgyad du yang dag bshad/ /mig gi rnam shes me long sogs/ /sgra yi rnam shes rol mo dang / /sna yi rnam shes me tog phreng / /rin chen pha gu lce rnam shes/ /lus kyi
rnam shes ras 'phan dang / /yid kyi rnam shes ri dwags so/ /mig ni 'khor lo'i mtshan ma dang / /rna ba kun nas rdo rje rnams/ /sna ni ba dan du ni bshad/ /lce ni dril bu ru
ni gsungs/ /rnga yab la sogs rnam dag pa/ /lus kyi tshogs zhes bya bar bshad/ /yid ni dbus kyi pad+mar gsungs/ /rnam rtog rlung ni yang dag brten/ /ye shes lnga
@#/ /ni rnam dag pa/ /re khA lngar ni yang dag brjod/ /phung po lnga ni rnam dag lnga/ /rnam dag kha dog lnga ni dbye/ /de dag gzhal yas khang du bsgom/ /dang po
sbyor bar shes par bya/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ /rigs kyi dbye ba rang ngo bo/ /de nyid phyi rol gnas par brjod/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'o/ /khams
bzhi'i rang bzhin bdag nyid ni/ /gzugs kyi phung po mdor bsdus ni/ /gzugs kyi phung po rnams dang ni/ /mig gi rnam shes sa snying po/ /phyi rol gzugs kyi rdo rjer
bshad| |byams pa rtsa rgyus dbus na bzhugs/ /de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis/ /shar dang lho yi mtshams su ni/ /me long ye shes su ni bshad/ /rnam par snang mdzad
rnam dag nyid/ /bde dang sdug bsngal 'jigs dang skyo/ /tshor ba'i mtshan nyid du ni 'dod/ /tshor ba chu yi khams dang ni/ /phyi rol sgra ni rdo rje dang / /rna ba phyag na rdo rjer
bshad| |rigs ni gnyis po 'dres pa nyid/ /dri yi rdo rje phyi rol 'gyur/ /sna yi rnam shes mkha' snying po/ /khro bo gnyis po rnam par shes/ /mnyam nyid rin chen 'byung
ba dang / /dngos dang dngos med sogs 'du shes/ /snga ma rjes dran mtshan nyid can/ /'du shes phung po me khams dang / /phyi rol dri yi rdo rje dang / /lce yi rnam shes 'jig
rten mgon/ /de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis/ /de ni so sor rtog ye shes/ /'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung / /dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kyis/ /bag chags 'du
shes mtshan nyid ni/ /'du shes phung po rlung gi khams/ /phyi rol ro yi rdo rje dang / /lus kyi rnam shes sgrib rnam sel/ /kun bzang tshigs kyi mtshams dbus bzhugs/ /de
bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis/ /bya ba nan tan grub ye shes/ /don yod grub pa'i rigs las byung / /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /ye shes mtshan nyid rnam shes brjod//
rnam par shes pa nam mkha'i khams/ /yid kyi rnam shes 'jam rdo rje/ /de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis/ /shin tu rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/ /mi bskyod pa yi rigs las
byung / /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ /gzhal yas khang ni 'di dag bzhugs/ /de nyid khams kyi dbye ba yis/ /rim pa ji bzhin bshad par bya/ /skra rus phyis mchil
ma snying / /sa ni rnam snang bdag nyid do/ /spu dang nag dang nye ba'i snying / /sen mo chu yi khams su shes/ /rin chen 'byung ldan bdag nyid kyi/ /rigs kyi rten du shes par
bya| |so dang bags pa sha dang snying / /me yi khams zhes bya bar brjod/ /'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin dang / /rigs kyi dbye bar shes par bya/ /rgyus pa sha dang rtsibs logs
@#/ /snying / /rlung ni don yod grub pa'o/ /dri ma rgyus pa mkhris pa snying / /de ni nam mkha'i khams su grags/ /mi bskyod pa yi rang bzhin dang / /snying ni
rnam shes lnga zhes bya/ /re re la yang so sor ni/ /rnam pa lnga ni spro ba shes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phung po lnga/ /nang gi bdag nyid rdzas phye ba/ /sha rtsa rgyus pa sha
kham tshad/ /klad pa dang ni klad rgyas dang / /rus pa rkang dang snye ma dang / /mkhal ma snying dang lto ba dang / /glo ba mcher ba gcin dang ni/ /bshad ba pho ba long ga
dang / /zhag dang chu ser rnag dang ni/ /khrag dang mkhris pa bad kan dang / /ngar snabs skra dang kha spu dang / /sen mo spu dang pags pa dang / /lag pa rkang mig yan
lag sogs/ /mtshog ma dpung pa zhes ni brjod/ /de dag rim par shes par bya/ /gzhal yas khang ni rnam dag pas/ /de la gnas kyi dbye ba ni/ /mdor bsdus
nas ni bshad par bya/ /pu lI ra ni mgo bor shes/ /spyi gtsug dzA lan+d+ha ra dang / /rna ba g.yas pa u D+yan dang / /spyi bo'i rgyab ni arbu da/ /go dA ba ri rna ba g.yon//
rA me shwa ri smin ma'i dbus/ /mig gnyis de bo ko Ti dang / /mA la wa ni dpung ba'i rtsa/ /kA ma rU ba mtshan khung gnyis/ /o De nu ma gnyis su grags/ /ko sa
la ni lte bar shes/ /tre sa ku ni rna ba'i rtsa/ /kha yi pad+ma ka ling+ka/ /mgrin pa laM pa kar ni brjod/ /snying ni kAn tsir shes par bya/ /hi ma la ya mdoms su shes/ /mtshan ma gr-i ha de
ba dang / /pre ta pu ri bshang ba'i lam/ /brla gnyis su war+N+Na dwI pa/ /sau raSh+Ta ni byin pa gnyis/ /rkang pa'i bol ni sin+d+hu'i yul/ /sor mo rnams la na ga ra/ /mthe bong gnyis ni ma
rur shes/ /ku lu tA ni rkang pa'i mthil/ /de ltar gnas kyi rnam dag dang / /sa bcu rnam par dag pa nyid/ /de nyid dang ldan shes par bya/ /thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid/ /
'jug pa la sogs bye brag gis/ /rim gyis rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /rlung rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid mchog /srog gi rlung ni snying gar
gnas| |mi bskyod bye brag rigs las skyes/ /mdoms na gnas pa'i thur sel ni/ /rin chen 'byung ldan bye brag skyes/ /stod du rgyus pa lkog mthar gnas/ /'od dpag
med pa'i rang bzhin no/ /me dang mnyam gnas lte bar gnas/ /don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin no/ /khyab byed yan lag kun la gnas/ /rnam snang mdzad kyis byin gyis
brlabs/ /dbang po'i sgo yi rgyun las ni/ /srog dang rtsol ba rgyun 'di dang / /dus kun du ni rgyu ba ni/ /srog ces bya ba yin par bshad/ /srog dang rlung dang phyi sa dang / /de
@#/ /bzhin du ni khu ba sogs/ /'og 'dren 'di ni thur sel rlung / /rtag tu rnal 'byor pas shes bya/ /rgod dang za dang ldag pa dang / /kun tu 'thung dang 'jib
pa dang / /gang zhig rtag tu mnyam gnas pa/ /mnyam du gnas pa zhes byar brjod/ /gyen du 'gro zhing sdud pa dang / /bza' dang myang ba la sogs pa/ /shes dang lhan cig
'byor pa dag /gyen rgyu'i las su shes par bya/ /khyab dang 'dzin pa nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin 'gro dang ldog pa sogs/ /tshigs kun du ni khyab pa'i phyir/ /khyab byed ces
ni bya bar bshad/ /rlung gi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/ /de nas de yi 'jigs par brjod/ /snga ma bzhin du btang bzung sogs/ /phan tshun du ni gnod par byed/ /gzhan
ni gzhan la 'tshe ba yin/ /stobs ni thob pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /gcig ni gcig la thim par 'gro/ /ji ltar zla ba gzas bzung la/ /rlung rnams rim gyis nyams 'gyur
ba| |snga ma bzhin du gong nas gong / /rang gi bdag nyid la thim par/ /btang bzung slar yang 'gro bar byed/ /ji ltar sems bsregs dngos med dang / /rgyu med par ni
thim par 'gro/ /slar yang srog gi rlung shar ba/ /las kyi rlung ni sna tshogs pa/ /de ni lhan cig rnam shes dang / /slar yang 'jig rten gsum du gnas/ /de las
las dang de las skyes/ /de las chags sogs bag chags dang / /de las slar yang 'chi dang skye/ /de ltar 'khor lo bskor ba 'dra/ /sngon bzhin rdo rje bzlas la sogs/ /rim
gyis de yi dbye bar 'gyur/ /de nas sems dpa' chen po kun/ /de nyid mig sman thur ma yis/ /thams cad 'khrul pa'i yong ba bsal/ /yang dag dngos po nyid ni mthong //
de nas yang yang phyag byas te/ /mchi bcas mig gis bcom ldan la/ /lan gsum du ni bskor byas nas/ /rdo rje 'chang la yang dag bstod/ /e ma'o kun 'gro kun dbang
phyug /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa brnyes/ /e ma'o dam tshig de nyid gsum/ /mchog tu rmad byung ston par mdzad/ /khams gsum las ni rnam par grol/ /chos kyi
dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid/ /'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang / /skye mched rnams la mi rten cing / /
srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing / /spros pa med cing gos pa med/ /mkha' dang mnyam
pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal gyur pa/ /'jig rten gsum 'di
@#/ /rnam par g.yos/ /bdud rnams bcom par mdzad nas ni/ /'jig rten gsum gnas lha las rgyal/ /khro bo bcu ni kun nas ni/ /'jig rten gsum
rgyal gtso bo yis/ /'di ltar bka' ni bsgo bar 'gyur/ /sa yi cha ni gang na 'di/ /rdo rje phreng bar mngon brjod pa'i/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig rgyud/ /dus kun
tu ni spyod 'gyur zhing / /rgyun du de nyid rang nyid kyis/ /khro bo bcu yis de las ni/ /rtag tu phur bus bgegs kun la/ /bsrung ba'i don du yul 'khor der/ /rang rang
phreng ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /de rnams la ni gtor ma dbul/ /sems can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ /sna tshogs sprul pa bstan nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dus kun tu//
nyin dang mtshan du bzhugs par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug
cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las/ rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rdzogs
so|| ||thugs dam sa'i snying po thi ling snying po dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po su dza na shrI dz+nyA na dang / sgra sgyur gyi
lots+tsha ba chen po bod kyi lha bcan po bla ma dge slong zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ san+d+hi bya ka ra Na nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad
du| dgongs pa lung ston pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nyid 'di skad bdag gis thos/ /shin tu gsang ba'i
dus gcig na/ /gsang gtso rdo rje bcom ldan 'das/ /dam tshig mchog ni rdo rje gsum/ /de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni/ /yon tan phun tshogs bsam mi khyab/ /yod
med mtha' gnyis las 'das pas/ /gnas med pa la gnas zhes bya/ /nam mkha' rang bzhin gcig pa 'dir/ /kun mkhyen ye shes rnam sgom pa/ /'gro snying rnam dag
ces bya la/ /thub pa chen po bzhugs pa yin/ /ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang / /rnam par shes dang ming dang gzugs/ /skye mched drug dang reg pa dang / /tshor ba dang ni sred
pa dang | |nyer len srid pa skye ba dang / /rga shi zhes bya rig ma yin/ /nga rgyal che ba'i nga rgyal dang / /nga'o snyam nga rgyal mngon nga rgyal/ /gzhan yang nga rgyal las nga rgyal/ /cung
zad nga rgyal log par bcas/ /'di dag rdo rje mtha' can mchog /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /de rnams brjod mi lang ba'i grangs/ /brjod kyis
@#/ /lang nyid du gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med pa'i/ /ri rab rdul phran grangs mnyam pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /til gyi gang
bu mtshungs pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang / /nam mkha'i khams kun gang bar snang / /de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /sku gsung thugs
kyi rdo rje can/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ /de nyid gsum skyes skur mdzad do/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug lha chen dang / /'dod dang rig byed de bzhin zung / /
tshangs lha de bzhin zla ba ste/ /phung po la sogs grangs dang mnyam/ /sgra sgrog de bzhin dga' byed dang / /skya bseng skem byed thub pa dang / /sna yon dang ni dkon mchog
gsum| |de bzhin gshegs kun gcig pu nyid/ /de tshe phyung la gsol ba yi/ /gsang sngags gsungs pa dang po nyid/ /thub chen byang chub sems tshul du/ /mdzad pa gnyis
pa yin par bshad/ /rnam lnga mngon par byang chub pa'i/ /phra mo rnal 'byor gsum pa yin/ /dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa bzhi/ /gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid bzhi pa/ /
srung ba'i bslab gzhi rnam bzhi dang / /spyod pa'ang 'dir ni lnga pa ste/ /drug pa rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi/ /ting 'dzin phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro/ /bdun pa de nyid mchod par bshad/
gsang ba'i dbang du gtso bos mdzad/ /phyag rgyas dbang bskur brgyad pa bstan/ /dam tshig bzhi pa dgu pa yin/ /rnam pa bcur phye yang dag rtog/ bzlas pa'i sngags kyang
gsungs pa yin/ /bcu gcig ming du byung ba na/ /phyag rgyas gcig par bshad dkyil 'khor/ /bcu gnyis pa yi bdag nyid sku/ /nyan thos byang chub ston par mdzad/ /de bzhin
rig pa spyod grub pa/ /mngon shes lnga ni bcu gsum pa/ /bcu dang bzhi par bzhi po dang / /phreng sngags bla ma ston par mdzad/ /phyogs dang skya bseng nyid 'gyur ba/ /dngos
grub dkyil 'khor bla med pa'o/ /sgra sgrog dus dang yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor rdul tshon ldan pa 'o/ /slob ma dbang bskur nyi zla dag /chags bral sna tshogs nyid gyur pa/ /
sna tshogs tshig gi don gyi brda/ /sna tshogs ming can ming gcig pu/ /de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /so sor sdud pa rab tu bstan/ /gcig dang du ma las grol ba/ /yang
dag mthong nas yongs su sgom/ /yongs su bsgoms par gyur pa'i bdag /rten 'brel du yang bstan par bya/ /de nas ma skyes sbyor ba la/ /thub pa rnam par snang mdzad che/ /
rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i/ /ting 'dzin de 'og ston par mdzad/ /'dod pa'i yan lag 'gro ba'i tshogs/ /gnyis pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ /'dod
@#/ /chags che tshul zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gtso bo yi/ /rang gi sku la zhugs par mdzad/ /byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rgyun de la ni sbyor bar gyur/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs kun dang / /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs
bdag mnyes bya'i phyir/ /de rnams zhugs nas byung gyur pa/ /srog dang gyen rgyu thur sel dang / /mnyam gnas khyab byed ces bya dang / /klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang / /
lha sbyin gzhu rgyal zhes bya ba/ /'di dag tu ni nyid sku mdzad/ /bud med gzugs su slar sprul te/ /rang gi ngo bo ji bzhin du/ /de yi sku las byung bar gyur/ /de nyid gsum
ni mnyam sbyor las/ /rang gi gsang sngags de dag sgom/ /yan lag kun las nges grol zhing / /shin tu phra ba nyid du gyur/ /dbu gos ming las byung ba ni/ /zhi gnas
dang ni lhag mthong ste/ /dngos med ngo bo nyid yin pas/ /rang nyid kyang ni mi shes so/ /'on kyang 'di ltar thub pa la/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams gsol ba 'debs/ /bcom
ldan dgongs pa lung bstan pa/ /chos kyi mchog ni bstan du gsol/ /khyab bdag khyed ni chos 'di rnams/ /dngos med nyid ni thugs su chud/ /'gro ba'i don ni rab
grub pas/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mdzes/ /gang zhig yang dag shes gyur na/ /'jig rten pa dang rtsod med cing / /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang / /'jig rten shin tu
'das de bzhin/ /gang 'di zhi ba nyid kyi chos/ /zhi gnas shin tu sngon 'gro ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' thos na yang / /de bzhin nyid kyi bde ba byed/ /de nas sa snying la sogs
pa'i| |byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /mgon po rnam snang chen po la/ /de dag gis ni zhus gyur pa/ /gang shes bla med byang chub ni/ /ma 'ongs skye bos thos 'gyur
ba'i| |gsang sngags de nyid don 'byung ba/ /rnal 'byor bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /lan gnyis gsol kyang mgon po ni/ /mi gsung bar ni rnam par bzhugs/ /rdo rje can
gyis de shes nas/ /de nas slar yang zhus par gyur/ /gang 'di zhi gnas la sogs pa'i/ /rnal 'byor zab mo bla med pa/ /de ni 'di ltar bsngags pas bsngags/ /'tshal
'gyur de ni gtso bos gsungs/ /bya ba dag bya'i rnal 'byor dang / /rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig pa nyid dang / /lung ni yang dag gang yin pa/ /de ni bstan par mdzad pa'i rigs/ /
zhus pa'i don ni mkhyen nas ni/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /gsang sngags tshul ni mchog gyur 'di/ /gsang ba khyod la bstan par bya/ /'di skad ces bya'i
@#/ /gsang sngags che/ /gsang sngags kun don sngar ster ba'o/ /der ni lnga yi bdag gyur cing / /sbyor ba bzhi dang bcu yi bdag /lnga pa lnga po'i ming 'di ni/ /
gsal dang mi gsal dag tu sbyar/ /rgya mngon phyogs pa'i sbyor bshad pa/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa yin/ /bcu bdun zhes ni bshad pa 'di'i/ /gsungs pa'i
don de ma shes pas/ /sngags pas gsang sngags sbyor ba dag /de tshe ji ltar byed par 'gyur/ /don 'di rtogs par gyur nas ni/ /sna tshogs don ni ston pa dang / /'gro
ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa/ /gsang sngags rig pa mchog rnams byed/ /bdag ni stong dang yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge a ni steng du gnas/ /phyi ma zhes bya gnas byas la/ /sngags
pas sems can don rnams bya/ /yi ge a gnyis sbyor ba gang / /a sgo las skyes nyid du 'gyur/ /steng 'og phyogs kyi rnam pa de/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /gang zhig
'di las gsungs pa ni/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i thabs chos nyid/ /bdag gis zhes rtogs de 'gyur ba/ /thogs med rtogs pa 'di gnas so/ /ston pa po dang bstan dang
gnas| |phra rab tsam gyi ngo bo med/ /kun rdzob dus gsum sbyor gcig la/ /sngags pa rnams kyis thos de 'gyur/ /shin tu grangs med bskal pa ru/ /sangs rgyas
rnams kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /sngags pa rnams kyis dus gcig na/ /skad cig la rdzogs byang chub thob/ /kun mkhyen kun rig thugs chud pa/ /gsang sngags ston pa'i chos
can te| |de nyid kho na bcom ldan mchog /sku gsung thugs rdo rje las skyes/ /mi rtog nam mkha' ji bzhin de/ /gsang sngags thams cad nyi ma 'dra/ /sa la rlung bzhin sngags
pa ni| |'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod/ /thams cad 'gyur ba gang gang yin/ /de de stong pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de bzhin sbyor ba de mthong bas/ /kun rig de ni de bzhin gshegs/ /
de bzhin nyid gzugs brnyan gyur pa/ /de ni sku yi rdo rjer gyur/ /'gro ba yang dag tshim par 'byung / /mi phyed gsung gi rdo rjer gyur/ /nam mkha'i gnas kyi sbyor ba gang / /bsam
mi khyab par spro bdag nyid/ /de nyid ye shes rgya mtsho la/ /thugs kyi rdo rje yang dag 'byung / /sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/ /nam mkha' yongs su brtags pa ste/ /de
yang de ru kun gnas pas/ /bud med chos gcig pu yi gzugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gang brten pa/ /sar gyur de ni bcu gsum pa/ /de ni bud med ces bshad de/ /de
bas chos de b+ha ga yin/ /bya ba la sogs ji skad bshad/ /dam tshig gsum po gcig tu gyur/ /dngos med chos nyid gcig pu ru/ /'di ni de dag mnyam par 'gyur/ /dam
@#/ /tshig sku gsung thugs dang ni/ /ting 'dzin de bzhin rgyal ba dang / /sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag dang / /gzugs dang sgra dang
dri dang ro/ /reg dang de bzhin chos kyi dbyings/ /'di rnams rdo rje'i mtha' can byung / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /de ltar brjod mi lang zhes pa/ /brjod mi lang
ba nyid gyur rnams/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi ri rab kyi/ /rdul phran gyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang / /nam mkha' mnyam pa'i de bzhin
gshegs/ /mi bskyod rnam snang mdzad rin chen/ /dpag med tshe dang gdon mi za/ /'di dag nam mkha'i khams mnyam pa'i/ /rdo rje snying po de bzhin gshegs/ /dper
na til 'bru mtshungs pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i khams ni yongs khebs pa/ /de rnams der ni yang dag snang / /de nas mgon po rnam
snang mdzad/ /de bzhin nyid dang gcig tu gyur/ /gang yang dam tshig sngon 'gro dang / /sku rdo rje sogs ming can gyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang / /don
yod thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ /'di rnams sku yi yan lag grags/ /zhi gnas bsam mi khyab las byung / /ma skyes gcig pu gzigs pa ni/ /'dod chags
chen po'i tshul du gyur/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog gi gting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi tshogs/ /de ni nyid kyi sku la bcug /de ni de bzhin
gshegs pa kun/ /de ni rnam par snang mdzad che/ /'di nyid mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ /nyid sku bud med nyid du mdzad/ /de nas mgon po bsam yas las/ /bud med gzugs
su byung bar gyur/ /de ni sangs rgyas spyan 'dra dang / /mA ma kI 'dra sbyor ba dang / /gos dkar mo 'dra'i gzugs dang ni/ /sgrol ma'i gzugs su yang dag gnas/ /sgra yi ngo bo'i
gzugs can dang / /dri yi ngo bo'i gzugs dang ni/ /de bzhin ro yi ngo bo'i gzugs/ /reg gi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang / /la la gzugs kyi ngo bo yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
de rnams bzhugs/ /de nas tshul gsum don gcig dang / /mi bskyod pa yang bstan phyir dang / /'jig rten rgyang phan gdul don du/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul byung ngo / /
gnyis med mnyam pa nyid rnal 'byor/ /rdo rje bud med b+ha ga mchog /dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /de ni mi bskyod yang dag bri/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sbyor bzhi
gcig tu sbyor ba nyid/ /dri ma med par byin brlabs pa/ /kun nas shin tu gsal ba'i gzugs/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab/ /'bar ba mang po'i rnam par 'khrug /gsal ba la
@#/ /sogs dkyil 'khor ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /de nas de ni bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di/ /dkyil 'khor
chen po'i dbus su yang / /rnam par bzhag ste bzhugs par gyur/ /mi bskyod rin chen dpag med dang / /don grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs/ /de rnams byang chub
sems rdo rje'i/ /thugs la rnam par bzhugs par gyur/ /de rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems/ /dngos med ngo bor gcig par
ni| |mkha' 'dra rdo rje las byung gzigs/ /shes rab ting 'dzin gzhi gcig pu/ /de ni grib ma ltar thugs chud/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin skur mdzad nas/ /'gro don mnyam
dang mi mnyam mdzad/ /ji ltar mtshams gnas nyi ma yis/ /'gro ba gnyid log sad par byed/ /de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /byang chub sems kyis srung bar byed//
sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje gcig /de rnams skye bar bzhed pa yis/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bo yis/ /rdo rje'i sngags su mdzad par gyur/ /rig pa skyes bu'i gzugs dag
ni| |sngags kyis byin rlabs bla na med/ /der ni zhal gsum pa lta bur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gzigs/ /de nas mgon po bcom ldan gyis/ /thugs
rjes bzhugs pa las byung ste/ /byang chub sems ni rab bskor la/ /lan gsum ched du brjod pa mdzad/ /bsam mi khyab cing dpag med gang / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun
gyi gsang / /rdo rje byang chub sems gcig las/ /spyod yul der ni gyur pa yin/ /de nas gsang tshul thos pa dang / /de 'og gsang ba'i bdag pos ni/ /khyab bdag rnam par snang
mdzad la/ /ji bzhin tshul du de btud zhus/ /phung po khams la sogs pa'i chos/ /'dus la gang zhig gnas pa'i rnams/ /rten 'brel las skyes yin par ni/ /khyad chos ston
par mdzad pas khums/ /dman pa'i chos rnams 'di dag ni/ /zhe sdang la sogs rkyen dang ldan/ /'di dag ji ltar bde gshegs dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po rigs ma lags//
byang chub sems dpa' sems chen de/ /lus la sogs pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /gang zhig phyi dus skye bo yis/ /'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /
'od chen ldan pas bka' stsal pa/ /ma 'ongs skye bo mthong nas ni/ /gang zhig khyod kyis nga dris pa/ /legs so legs so sems dpa' che/ /gsang ba'i bdag po khyod legs
so| |smras don ji lta ji lta bar/ /de ltar khyod la lung bstan bya/ /ma 'ongs dus na mi rnams ni/ /'jig rten rgyang phan mchog gzhol 'gyur/ /log par lta ba la gnas
@#/ /te| |ci dga' bar yang spyod par byed/ /la la glu dang gar la dga'/ /dgod dang sgeg la mchog tu gzhol/ /dri dang phreng ba la dga' zhing / /de bzhin
'khrig pa la dgar 'gyur/ /rmongs pa la sdang ba dang / /de bzhin gti mug la rab gzhol/ /la la de bzhin 'dod chags zhen/ /shes pa gzhan dag 'dod par
'gyur| |nya dang sha dang de bzhin chang / /bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni/ /skyes bu glen pa za byed cing / /med par smra ba chos su sgrog /ma dang sring mo la sogs pa/ /
bgrod min la ni bgrod pa dang / /pha dang ma yang gsod pa dang / /de bzhin srog chags gzhan rnams gsod/ /rdzun gyi tshig nyid smra ba dang / /khyad par du yang brku ba dang / /
gzhan gyi chung ma'i thad 'gro zhing / /smad pa gzhan yang byed par 'gyur/ /la la dam chos spong ba dang / /de bzhin mtshams med byed pa ste/ /sna tshogs sdig pa byas
nas kyang / /sngags pa dngos grub 'dod par 'gyur/ /gzer nad dug dang sbyar ba'i dug /sna tshogs nad ni mi bzad pa/ /'di rnams kyis ni gzir gyur nas/ /zhi ba nyid
ni 'dod par 'gyur/ /'dor bar byed pa rmongs pa de/ /mi bzad sdig pa byas pa dang / /log par lta la mchog gzhol rnams/ /ngan song gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ /gsang ba 'di ltar bstan pa yin/ /gang zhig yang dag thob pa nyid/ /'dir ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i bdag po mkhas
rnams kyis/ /tshul mchog 'di ni rnyed gyur nas/ /don gsal yang dag rnyed pa dang / /de yang nga rgyal dag tu ltung / /de rnams ting 'dzin zhi nyid dang / /shes rab nyid kyang shin
tu ring / /rab tu dga' dang ldan pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni bdag nyid ces/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal la rtag dga'/ /sgyu dang bcos ma'i chos dang ldan/ /mya ngan 'das dang gzhan
'gro ba| |phan tshun dag ni sun yang 'byin/ /gsang sngags smra ba la brten nas/ /gcig la gcig ni rtsod par 'gyur/ /de rnams bdud kyi byin rlabs kyis/ /gal te dngos
grub phra thob na/ /des ni mngon par nga rgyal bas/ /mkhas pa snyam du shes par 'gyur/ /tshogs pa'i nang du rtsod pa dang / /khyi bzhin kha zas la spyod 'gyur/ /rang las 'bras
las byung ba yi/ /phan pa la ni gnod pa byed/ /de rnams dge dang mi dge rnams/ /bdag cag rnams kyi stobs yin zer/ /mngon sum sangs rgyas 'dra ba yi/ /slob dpon
smod cing bsnyen bkur med/ /skad cig gcig gis sdang byed cing / /de la skad cig gis rjes chags/ /khyi dang phag dang khwa rnams kyi/ /spyod pa dag ni ston par byed/ /
@#/ /de rnams phan tshun rnam 'tshe bar/ /mngon par dga' bar byed par 'gyur/ /gsang ba 'dus pa mi shes par/ /dam tshig la sogs byed par 'gyur/ /
gsang ba srung bar mi byed par/ /thams cad du ni ston par byed/ /'jig rten la ni smad byas nas/ /gzhan dag la yang rab gsal byed/ /bdag nyid rtsa ba med par
ni| |dam tshig 'das par byed par 'gyur/ /sgra bcas spror ldan gyis bskul bas/ /rang la rang gi glags rnyed med/ /de nyid ye shes 'byung ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de yis
shes mi 'gyur/ /nyes pa cung zad tsam gyi phyir/ /mngon spyod rab tu byed par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rab sbyor dman pa yi/ /sngags pa rnams ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /phyi
rol bstan bcos la rtag dga'/ /de yi sbyor la gcig tu mkhas/ /rang gi dam tshig yongs spangs nas/ /lcags kyu med pa bzhin du spyod/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i
sbyor ba yis/ /de rnams 'tsho ba sgrub par 'gyur/ /gang du rnyed pa thob 'gyur bar/ /dam pa'i chos ni ston par byed/ /de rnams yang dag sdud byed pa'i/ /gsang ba
dgongs pas bshad pa yin/ /dam tshig nyams te gnas pa rnams/ /'di yis thams cad dgug par bya/ /de dag rjes rig mi shes na/ /de rnams zhi bar ga
la 'gyur/ /de nas rjes su gzung don du/ /tshul 'di dag ni gyur pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas su/ /de bzhin gshegs
kun bdag po la/ /rang mchod de nyid dam tshig sprin/ /yang dag 'byung bas legs mchod de/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni 'di skad gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba mchog/
de bzhin gshegs pa kun bsdus pa/ /'dus pa gnyis med rnal 'byor ba'i/ /nyams dga' rdo rje snying po 'di/ /de nyid bsdus pa rnams kyi mchog /de nyid bcom ldan bshad
du gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs kun la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa/ /gang yang 'di ltar gsol 'debs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams legs so
legs| |'di ni de bzhin gshegs rnams kyang / /the tshom skye bar byed yin na/ /byang chub sems gzhan ci smos shes/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams la gsungs/ /de nas
ngo mtshar rmad byung nas/ /the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa'i/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/ /bdag po la ni 'di skad zhus/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs
kun gyis/ /yon tan kun gyis phul phyung yang / /gtso bo 'dir ni ston mdzad par/ /ji ltar spro ba mnga' ma gyur/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzad de/ /de bzhin gshegs
@#/ /yid bde la sogs/ /ye shes rgyu 'bras thob pa'i phyir/ /de ni yang dag bshad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po ni/ /de rnams zhu par mkhyen
nas su| |ye shes sgron ma rdo rje grags/ /ting 'dzin zhe sdang rigs 'byung ba/ /gtso bos mi bskyod snying po ni/ /sku gsung thugs ni dpal ldan pas/ /de nas yang dag phyung
ba ni| |badzra d+h+r-i ka ces bya ba'i sngags/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /zhe sdang rigs byung las skyes pa/ /de ni rig pa skyes bur 'gyur/ /mi bskyod rgya chen thabs
kyis sbyor/ /zhal gsum nag dang dkar dang dmar/ /bdag nyid chen po de zhal yin/ /rdo rje gsum 'dir de bzhin gshegs/ /bzhugs pa ye shes zhes bya'o/ /de nas
de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /dam tshig 'byung rdor zhes bya yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la gtso bo ni/ /snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzod/ /de nas dzi na dzi ka ces pa'i/ /snying
po de bzhin yang dag phyung / /de nas gsungs pa tsam gyis kyang / /gti mug rigs byung las skyes pa/ /rig bcas skyes bur gyur pa ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad de
bzhin gshegs/ /dkar dang nag dang dmar bcas pa'i/ /zhal gyis mdun du bzhugs par gyur/ /de nas rin chen byung ba yi/ /dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
la| |snyoms par zhugs nas bde gshegs kun/ /bde dang yid bder gyur pa'i phyir/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rigs/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di/ /
de nas rat+na d+h+r-i ka ces bya'i/ /snying po dpal ldan de tshe phyung / /de ni phyung ba tsam gyis ni/ /rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur/ /ser dang dkar dang nag pa yi/ /zhal dang
rin chen 'byung ldan ni/ /rdo rje gsum gyi bdag po yi/ /lho phyogs logs su bzhugs par gyur/ /de yang byang du gzigs gyur to/ /mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o/ /da
nas bcom ldan bdag po de/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig bdag/ 'dod chags chen po las byung ba/ /rdo rje zhes ni bya ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /'dod
chags chen po'i rigs las byung / /A ro l-i ka ces bya snying po/ /rdo rje gsum las de nas phyung / /de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni/ /de 'og bcom ldan gtso bo ni/ /rig
dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur/ /'jig rten dbang po 'od dang mtshungs/ /dmar dang dkar dang nag pa'i zhal/ /dpal ldan rigs chen po yi bdag /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i bdag po yi/ /nub phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /don yod dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ /ting 'dzin rdo rje yang dag phyung / /gtso
@#/ /bo de la snyoms zhugs nas/ /snying po mchog gi mchog ces bya'o/ /dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i rigs/ /snying po pra dz+nyA d+h+r-i ka ces pa/ /rdo rje gsum
zhes bya las byung / /de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni/ /don yod rdo rje sbyor ba yi/ /de nyid mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /rig dang bcas
pa'i skyes bur gyur/ /ljang dang nag dang dkar ba'i zhal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi/ /byang phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur/ /zhe sdang gti mug rigs dang
ni| |de bzhin yid bzhin rin chen dang / /'dod chags dam tshig ces bya ba/ /'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrubs pa'o/ /de nas khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags
dam tshig 'byung ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa btsun mo mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /dam pa dag ni phyung bar 'gyur/ /
sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gcig pu/ /yum zhes bya bar yang dge bshad/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /gang phyir lha mo btsun mo mchog /sku dang gsung
dang thugs las byung / /dwe Sha ra ti zhes byar grags/ /rig pa skyes bu zhes bya ba'i/ /de ni bud med gzugs 'dzin ma/ /zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs kyis
ni| |me yi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas rjes mnyes rdo rje grags/ /sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung / /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug ste/ /rdo rje gsum las byung
ba ni| |de ni mo ha ra ti ste/ /gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang / /rig pa skyes bu byung ba ste/ /zhal gsum lta bu'i rnal 'byor ma/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor
pas| |sangs rgyas kun gyi yid 'ong gcig /gsang ba bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bden bral phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas rjes chags rdo rje zhes/ /bya ba rdo rje gsum
las skyes/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /bde ba chen po phyung ba ni/ /'di ltar rA ga ra ti phyung / /zhal gsum pa yi gzugs can de/ /gtso bo bud med gzugs
'dzin pa/ /de ni rig pa skyes bur gyur/ /gos med ye shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo ste/ /rlung gi phyogs su
rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig can/ /slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /de bzhin
gshegs kun btsun mo mchog /zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs can ma/ /badzra ra ti zhes bya ba/ /rdo rje gsum las phyung bar gyur/ /de ni phyung ma thag tu yang / /gtso bo
@#/ /rig ma skyes bur gyur/ /bud med kyi ni gzugs 'dzin te/ /dbang ldan phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan mgon po de/ /rnam snang rdo rje
las byung ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gshin rje gshed/ /khro bo chen po phyung ba dang / /phyung nas de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams/ /bsnyengs par bya bar shar phyogs bzhugs/ /de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /mngon byang rdo rje zhes bya
yi| |ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /khro bo chen po phyung ba ni/ /pra dz+nyA n+ta kr-i ta rdo rje can/ /de nas dpal ldan phyung ba ni/ /rig pa skyes bur yang dag phyung / /dkyil 'khor
chen po'i sbyor ba las/ /'od chen phur bu'i gzugs lta bu/ /rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs byed pa/ /lho yi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas rin chen 'byung gnas grags/ /
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor/ /rdo rje gsum las khro bo che/ /pad+ma n+ta kr-i ta 'od po che/ /bdag po de nas phyung bar gyur/ /de nas
phyung ba tsam gyis 'dir/ /gtso bo'i rig pa skyer bur bcas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang / /gsung gi tshul du rnam sbrul zhing / /gos med ye shes bla
med pa| |nub kyi sgor ni zhugs par gyur/ /bcom ldan de nyid sna tshogs pa/ /thugs kyi rdo rje ting 'dzin la/ /kun nas snyoms par zhugs nas ni/ /de nas gtso bos phyung bar
gyur| |khro bo chen po rnam phyung ba/ /kun nas bgegs mthar byed pa ste/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /byang gi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje
'dzin| |dkyil 'khor mchog 'di thos pa dang / /mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che/ /de la slar yang zhus gyur pa/ /mkha' dang dbyer med sbyor gcig cing / /dngos med de
bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /dga' ba'i mchog sogs bgyis nas ni/ /ji ltar de rnams zhu bar 'gyur/ /'di dag thog mtha' yod min na/ /'di yi gtso bo ji ltar 'gyur/ /
phyogs kyi cha rnams bzhag pa la/ /'di ni gang gis rnam par sbyang / /gsang ba 'di ni mi srid ces/ /theg pa gsum po rtog pa dang / /so so'i skye bo'i tshig gis kyang / /spang
ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyan thos rnams dang ni/ /de bzhin mdo sde las spangs pa'i/ /zhe sdang sogs dang 'dod lnga sogs/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams
bsten mdzad pa/ /rjes su spyod dang thun mong ba'i/ /bya ba de dag phyin ci log /dga' mtha'i spyod pa de rnams ni/ /de bzhin gshegs de rnam mdzad pa/ /tshig gcig la
@#/ /ni dpag med don/ /gsang ba dam pa 'di dag ni/ /mgon po gang zhig ma 'ongs pa'i/ /skye bos ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal
pa| |phyag na rdo rje tshul 'di ni/ /dgongs pa gsang ba bla med pa/ /dris pa rnams ni bshad par bya/ /zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags/ /lus la sogs pa'i phung po lnga/ /
'di dag bdag med rtogs nas ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas ni tshul gsum gnas/ /pha ni zhi gnas yin zhes bya/ /ma ni lhag mthong yin par bshad/ /de bzhin nyid shes lus
su 'gyur/ /zhi ba rnal 'byor pa yi zas/ /ji ltar bzo bos bder gshegs kyi/ /sku yi gzugs brnyan byas pa ltar/ /gang zhig sku lta bu yi sku/ /de bzhin gsung gi rnam
pas gsung / /thugs kyi rnam pas thugs su ni/ /zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung / /phung po la sogs chos rnams ni/ /stong zhing rten 'brel las byung mthong / /ye
shes nyi ma shar ba'i gzugs/ /zhi las rnal 'byor pa rnams byed/ /de bas sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ /grib ma lta bur byung ba yin/ /de bzhin phung po khams la
sogs| |dam tshig gcig la rnam par gnas/ /de nas tshul gsum don gcig pa/ /zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung / /de nas rdo rje tshul yid 'ong / /gsang
ba'i bdag po mnyan par gyis/ /stong pa rten 'brel las byung bar/ /rnal 'byor ba yi rdo rje zhes/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni/ /phung po la sogs chos byung
ba| |lus dang ngag sems kun rtog ni/ /phung po sogs byung 'byung las gyur/ /'di dag dngos med yang dag sbyar/ /de las ting 'dzin skye bar 'gyur/ /'di dag ting
'dzin gnyis med sbyor/ /mi phyed rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/ /zab dang rgya chen rtog byang chub/ /de rtogs pas ni sems dpar gyur/ /'di dag nam mkha' mtshungs gyur pa/ /chen
po zhes bya shes byed pa'o/ /de la rtogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /rdo rje theg par ston pa yin/ /ting nge 'dzin ni de nyid las/ /rdo rje'i theg pa byung ba yin/ /'di las 'jig
rten 'das 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das/ /dgongs don de bzhin nyid gcig pu/ /gsang ba 'jig rten pa zhes bshad/ /ma skyes pa las byung ba ni/ /
kun rdzob dang ni don dam yin/ /bdud gyur lha yi bur bshad de/ /phung po nyon mongs 'chi bdag bcas/ /'di las dngos med pas rgyal bas/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rjer rnam
par bshad/ /lus sogs phyi yi phung por bshad/ /'byung dang 'byung las gyur bshad gang / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /'di dag rdo rje'i rigs can
@#/ /'gyur| |dngos po gang dang gang dag gis/ /phung po lnga po brtags gyur ba/ /de rnams de bzhin yang dag dmigs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
su 'gyur/ /ji ltar me long mtshungs gsal ba/ /dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid can/ /der ni bdag gis bdag nyid mthong / /dkyil 'khor mchog 'gyur rnal 'byor
pa| |phung po de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid las spros byas pa/ /chos kyi sku can rgyal ba yi/ /mchod pa chen por de 'gyur ro/ /'di ni spros dang bsdus
pa dag /de ni dga' bar yongs su grags/ /sems can gang zhig longs spyod cing / /de ni gsol 'debs zhes bshad do/ /yang dag shes rab thabs gnyis te/ /
mkha' dbyings dbyer med rab sbyor ba/ /de ni 'dod chags che tshul 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mngon bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje theg pha rnal 'byor cher/ /bdag nyid nges
par sbyor ba gang / /dbang po thams cad bde bskyed pa'i/ /yid bde ba ni skye bar 'gyur/ /zhal gsum rnam thar gsum du gang / /mthong zhing de la phung po sogs/ /lha yi bdag
nyid rig 'gyur ba/ /de nyid gsum du bshad pa yin/ /dngos med pa ni lam gyi mchog /mya ngan 'das par gnyis med 'jug /'on kyang so sor gyur pa de/ /chos kyi sku las
zhe sdang gyur/ /bcom ldan bdag po de nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung zhing / /mya ngan 'das tshul rdo rje can/ /de nyid dbang po kun byed pa'o/ /dam tshig la sogs
'byung ba'i chos/ /rang gis rig par ma gyur kyang / /der ni gnas pa yang dag bshad/ /de ni gti mug de bzhin sems/ /gang gi ji ltar brtags chos kyis/ /longs spyod rdzogs zhes
bya byed pa/ /de ni yid bzhin rin chen 'byung / /rin chen chen po'i rigs kyi gtso/ /de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags ni/ /kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba/ /gnas med gnas pa'i
sbyor gyur pa/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /ji ltar 'dam dbus pad+ma ni/ /de yi nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor rig pa mchog/ 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod/
'gro ba gcig tu 'dod pa khyab/ /de nyid rdo rje rigs mchog yin/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste/ /gsum po de dag mdor bsdus pa'i/ /zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags/ /rdo rje
dga' ba'i mtha' can gtso/ /ngan 'gro gsum 'don pas bud med/ /gcig pu yin yang du mar gyur/ /gsum po yang dag 'dug gyur pa/ /gshin rje shes rab gyur de bzhin/ /pad+ma
bgegs gyur khro bo ste/ /mthar byed mtha' yi ming can no/ /'jug pa la sogs gsum nyid la/ /phung por grags te de bzhin gshegs/ /skrag byed gshin rje gshed kyis kyang / /
@#/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /rdo rje dam tshig skrag par byed/ /de bzhin shes rab mthar byed gtso/ /pad+mo'ang gsung zhes bya bar gyur/ /'chi
bral rnal 'byor grub pa yin/ /bgegs mthar byed kyang thugs kyi gtso/ /rigs pa'i bdag nyid rang bdag po/ /'di ltar rtag spyod rnal 'byor pa/ /gsang ba'i lus kyis
rnam par spyod/ /dgongs pa lung ston la gnas par/ /gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur pa/ /des ni de bzhin bya ba dang / /de nas gsang ba yang dag 'byung / /nu zho zas kyis bu
bso bzhin/ /srid pa gsum na bcom ldan gtso/ /sems can bsam dbang ji bzhin du/ /chos kyi bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yis/ /
sku gsum gcig tu sbyor ba las/ /bcom ldan gsang ba dgongs mdzad pa/ /bden pa ma yin rdzun pa'ang min/ /zhe sdang gti mug rin chen dang / /'dod chags sna tshogs
rigs byung ba/ /dgongs pa'i rigs kyi brdar gyur pas/ /gleng gzhi yin te dang po'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag la/ /slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun/
lhag par mchod pa byas nas ni/ /thub chen de la 'di skad gsol/ /dgongs pa'i rdo rje dam pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes/ /byang chub sems ni bla med
pa| |gsang ba bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi/ /zhu ba yang dag thugs chud cing / /byang chub sems dpa' yongs rtog pa/ /thub nyid kyi ni rnam
mkhyen pa/ /de nas byang chub sems kun la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs/ /lus sems de dang 'dra ba dang / /de bzhin ngag ni tshig brjod blta'i/ /byang chub sems
ni bla med pa/ /khyed kun gyis ni bskyed par bya/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la/ /ston pas ji bzhin ston par mdzad/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /sku dang thugs
dang de bzhin gsung / /de 'dra'i tshul du sbyar nas ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /sku gsung thugs rdo rje can la/ /ched du brjod pa ched du brjod/ /e ma kun tu
bzang po yi/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung las skyes pa/ /skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /skye ba 'dir ni rab tu bsgrags/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i rdo rje gsum/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /mngon rdzogs byang chub rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /dpal ldan byang chub sems 'di gsungs/
dngos po med pa'i dngos gnas na/ /dngos dang dngos med gnyi ga'ang min/ /de ltar dngos po dngos med pas/ /sgom pa dngos por yod ma yin/ /de nas dpal ldan rnam
@#/ /snang mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /gnyis med dam tshig rdo rje grags/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mchod /
gsang ba dgongs pa rdo rje can/ /byang chub sems ni thams cad nas/ /de ni yang dag bka' stsal to/ /dag pa de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /phung po khams sogs rnam spangs shing //
gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba/ /chos bdag med pa'i stong nyid can/ /byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs pa/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung ming can te/ /thog ma med nas ma skyes
bdag/ rang sems mnyam pa nyid kyang yin/ /de nas mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs/ /kun gyi gnyis med mi bzad pa'i/ /ye shes ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs te/ /byang chub sems ni
'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas/ /phung por grags pa'i chos nyid med/ /nam mkha' lta bur blta dka' ba'i/ /bdag med byang chub ces bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
dkon mchog dpal/ /bdag med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /byang chub sems 'di rab tu gsungs/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing / /chos
kyi mtshan nyid rnam spangs pa/ /bdag med chos las yang dag 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /de nas 'od dpag med mtshan can/ /ye shes 'bar ba sgron rdo rje'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so/ /ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/ /dngos po med cing sgom pa'ang med/ /nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis/ /dngos
po zhes ni rab tu bshad/ /de nas de bzhin gdon mi za/ /zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so/ /chos 'di rang bzhin
'od gsal zhing / /gzod nas dag pas mkha' dang mtshungs/ /byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/ /byang chub sems ni yin par bshad/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /byang
chub sems ni thos pa dang / /dgongs pa'i don ni rab bshad par/ /rnam par snang mdzad che la gsungs/ /dngos po med cing dmigs med pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkha' dang
mtshungs/ /gsang ba'i tshul ni 'di thos nas/ /dngos po yi ni rtog pa skye/ /lus la sogs pa gsung sbyor bas/ /sems ni de rnams skyed par byed/ /yang dag byang chub du ma'i
mthar| |'di la so so skye bo smra/ /thub pa'i gsung ni do rnams la/ /rang gi sgra bzhin 'dzin par byed/ /bsam pa'i dbang ni ji bzhin du/ /'gro ba'i don du bka' stsol cig/
de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'di/ /rnam par snang mdzad thub pa che/ /legs zhes lan gsum gsungs nas ni/ /lag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs/ /rnam par mi rtog don de
@#/ /nyid| |rab tu phye ste bshad par bya/ /tshig tu brjod pa dmigs par bshad/ /brda dang don dam pa yin no/ /rkyen dang nyan thos rnams kyis kyang / /mdo dang gsang
sdags spyod rnams kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yi/ /byang chub sems 'di bla na med/ /de bzhin yang dag sbyor ba 'di/ /dgongs pa'i gsang ba bla na med/ /gnyis
med dam tshig rdo rje dang / /pad+ma de las skyed par byed/ /tshig tu brjod pa thun mong ste/ /sangs rgyas sku ni dmigs can yin/ /gsang sngags de nyid ces bya brda/ /de bzhin nyid
ni don dam pa'o/ /dang po gcig ni dgu dbus na/ /gang zhig bcu yis ma bcings pa/ /de ni bcings med ces bya ste/ /de shes pa ni mchog gi gnas/ /dbyangs dang
gsal byed yi ge ste/ /grangs dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa/ /as bcings phan tshun sbyor ba las/ /gang gis shes te 'gro ba'i bla/ /gang zhig shes pa rnam grol
ba| |'bras bu phun tshogs grub 'dod pa/ /de ni de nyid grub 'dod de/ /gzugs med pas ni gzugs spangs pa/ /'byung ba'i mtha' ni yang dag ldan/ /cha la sogs
pa bcu drug gnas/ /lnga pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /bzhi ni gsum du nges par sbyar/ /yi ge aM bcas ring por bcas/ /yon tan sbyor sogs phyis
dang mtshungs/ /thung ngu ma lus dag tu 'gyur/ /gcig min du ma ma yin no/ /ya yi don gyis gang yang rung / /bya ba'i dngos grub 'dod gyur pa/ /ra la
sogs pa gsum nyid kyis/ /'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug /yi ge gang zhig sngar bshad dang / /gang yang mngon du phyogs pa rnams/ /bud med skyes pa ma ning
ste| |khams la sogs par rab tu brtag /'og nas steng du bcas par ni/ /shes nas blos ni nges par sbyar/ /drug bshad bzhi dang gsum dang gcig /dngos med do
bo gcig las byung / /de ni ya sogs don sbyar na/ /dus gsum shes pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pas sgyu ma mig 'phrul bzhin/ /'gro ba rnams ni sgyu mthar bya/ /brjod pa
yi ni sngags 'di dag /dngos med ngo bo las byung ba/ /de ni yongs su gyur pa'i gzugs/ /lha ru nye bar mtshon pa gang / /brda yis de nyid gsum gnas pa/ /rang bzhin
bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /ming med brjod du med pa ste/ /byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no/ /gsum po de nyid gcig gyur pa/ /'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med/ /'gag med
rab tu zhi ba ste/ /rtag dang chad pa rnam spangs pa/ /dus gsum mkhyen pas ma byas pa'i/ /rtog pa nam mkha' dbyer med mtshan/ /'di nyid kho na don dam ste/ /so sor rang rig
@#/ /mtshan nyid do/ /de 'di sems can kun zhes bya'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ngo bo nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' gcig 'byung yang / /rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin
can/ /gang 'di byang chub sems dag nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa ni nyi 'drar 'gyur/ /'di ni rnam rtog kun bral yang / /rigs kun la ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /sreg dang skem dang bde can
dang / /kun zar 'jug pa'i me bzhin no/ /'di ni lhas kyang mchod bya bar/ /sems can kun la rnam par gnas/ /byang chub sems 'dod bdag nyid de/ /'gro ba bu gcig bzhin lta zhing //
gang zhig bdag dang mnyam gnas pa/ /byams pa chen po de bskyed bya/ /phyin ci ma log 'di mthong nas/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung / /des ni snying rje cher gyur nas/ /des ni 'khor
ba nges par 'joms/ /sems can kun dang de bzhin bdag /byang chub sems la mthong na/ /'on kyang 'gro ba'i don byed ba/ /de las dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/ /'khor ba dngos po yod min
la/ /sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra/ /byang chub sems ni mthong nas ni/ /btang snyoms chen por gyur pa yin/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /thos pa'i byang chub sems dran
zhing / /slar yang de don mtshan nyid ni/ /rnam par sna ba mdzad che la zhus/ /'khor dang gcig shos zhes bya ba/ /'di kun byang chub sems yin na/ /ji ltar so sor gyur nas ni/ /phan tshun
'gal bar rab tu gnas/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid la/ /gnyis su 'gog byed gang yang med/ /gang zhig nor bu gcig las byung / /mi mthun phyogs su ji ltar snang / /dman
dang bar ma de bzhin mchog /'khor bar nyon mongs mi zad pas/ /sems can kha cig gzir ba dang / /byang chub sems la'ang sbyar bar 'gyur/ /de lta'i rnam rtog kun rtog par//
ma 'ongs skye bo bgyid 'gyur gyi/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung las byung ba/ /'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la/ /byis pa rnams ni rtsod par 'gyur/ /de
rnams rtsod pa med pa'i phyir/ /dgongs pa bshad par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje can la gsang dgongs pa/ /shin tu rnyed dka' byang chub sems/ /de ni
yang dag bka' stsal to/ /phyi ma'i mtha' gang stong pa gcig /sngon gyi mthar thug de bzhin te/ /sems de mngon du byas nas ni/ /ci dga' bar ni bya ba yin/ /sems ni de yis ma mthong
bas| |lta ba so sor gyur pa yin/ /de bas de rnams 'khor ba ru/ /'gro ba drug gi ming du gyur/ /des na tshangs pa khyab 'jug dang / /dbang phyug che la kun tu brten/ /zla ba nyi ma bya ba yi/ /
kun tu spyod pa de rnams byed/ /sum cu rtsa gsum par bshad dang / /dga' ldan gyi ni gnas dag dang / /de bzhin gzhan dag dmyal bar yang / /lta bas skad cig dag gis 'gro/ /yi
@#/ /dwags su yang 'gro ba dang / /'gro ba sna tshogs dag tu 'gro/ gang tshe ma rig kun bsten pas/ /bdag nyid kyang ni mi shes so/ /'du shes can dang 'du shes med/ /
sems can du brtags 'di gnas pa/ /de rnams rlung las byung ba ste/ /rlung las slar yang 'gag pa yin/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i cha yis kyang / /rang gi rnam par rtog par lhung / /
de nas 'khor bar skrag bzhin du/ /sna tshogs 'gro bar de dag 'gro /mi rtog pa yi sems de ni/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas gyur kyang / /de ni phyin ci log gyur pas/ /khyi dang
lce spyang glang po dang / /sems de ltar yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin du ni phag nyid dang / /mi yi rigs ni smyig mkhan dang / /sme sha can dang rigs ngan dang / /bza' dang mi
bza' bya kun tu/ /byang chub sems de skye bar 'gyur/ /bram ze la sogs 'jig rten shes/ /byang chub sems las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phung sogs dngos po med gyur las/ /
rang gi myong ba shes par 'gyur/ /de ni 'jig rten shes zhes bshad/ /'jig rten pa ni byang chub sems/ /nye bar dmigs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas sku ru 'di 'byung ste/ /
sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid/ /tshig gis brjod pa tsam du 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje snying po'i don gsungs pa/ /'gro ba'i bla ma gcig pu la/ /phyag 'tshal
nas ni slar gsol pa/ /'jig rten pa yi lung nyid ni/ /byang chub sems ni rab gsungs na/ /ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa/ /ma 'ongs pa yis ji ltar rtogs/ /lta ba thams
cad rab spang phyir/ /khyed kyis chos rnams ston mdzad na/ /ji ltar byang chub sems de nyid/ /lta ba de ni rab bstan 'gyur/ /dgongs pa'i tshig la rmongs pa rnams/ /gsungs pa'i
don ni ma rtogs nas/ /gsungs pa 'di las gzhan min zhes/ /de ni ji bzhin sgrar 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/ /lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa/ /khyed gsungs
dgongs pa ma rtogs pa/ /'dri bar byed pa legs so legs/ /byang chub sems ni rlung gyur cing / /nam mkha' la ni rnam gnas pa/ /sems can kun gyi srog gyur gang / /
lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis zhes grags pa/ /ngo bo nyid rnam gsum du 'gyur/ /rlung zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems/ /dbang po kun gyi gtso 'di
yin| |ji ltar mi mngon phra ba las/ /rtag tu gsal bar brjod pa yin/ /'gro ba yul sogs las byed pa/ /'dir ni de la brten pa yin/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /dbang
dang de bzhin mngon spyod rnams/ /de nyid gsum gnas la brten nas/ /de kun byang chub sems kyis byed/ /ji srid 'jig rten gdags pa dang / /de bzhin btags pa sna tshogs
@#/ /rnams| |rnam rtog byang chub sems zhes pa'i/ /rlung las rtag tu 'byung ba yin/ /bde sdug la sogs ches rnams kyi/ /sa bon lta bur bshad pa yin/ /
byang chub sems kyi ngo bo 'di/ /phung sogs gnyis med mkha' dang mnyam/ /shes rab thabs dang sbyor ba yis/ /byang chub sems ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /klog dang bsam
gtan rnam spang par/ /bdag por bdag nyid zlos pa de/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis/ /nyi zla rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po med par 'gro khyab pa/ /byang chub sems
kyi rlung gcig pu/ /dge dang mi dge 'bras spangs nas/ /nam mkha' 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin/ /'gro ba'i don ni shes pas kyang / /ming ni de bzhin nyid ces bya/ /dbyangs kyi thung ngu
nyin mor bshad/ /ring po mtshan mo yin par bshad/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed dbye ba las/ /de nyid ming las sbyar bar bya/ /e ma'o 'gro ba'i bya ba byung / /de nyid gzhan las
de nyid gsal/ /de las 'jig rten pa yi brda/ /myur du mngon par shes par 'gyur/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos ni/ /byang chub sems 'di thos pa dang / /gtso bo rnam snang
chen po las/ /khyab bdag la ni slar gsol ba/ /sems can thams cad skyed pa po/ /sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni/ /de bas dngos po med gyur kyang / /srid pa dag
tu rab tu grags/ /byang chub sems ni mkha' mnyam pa/ /legs par rjes su myong mdzad pa/ /'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po/ /skye bo mchog la de bstan gsol/ /sgrub pa yi
ni thabs tsam zhig /shes nas rgyud la rgyab kyis phyogs/ /'di ltar bdag ni slob dpon zhes/ /ma 'ongs pa na smra bar 'gyur/ /bdag gi tshig ni 'di nyid dag /yin zhes smra
zhing byas pa 'jig /des ni dgongs pa'i byang chub sems/ /ji bzhin don du mi shes so/ /de bzhin 'jig rten pa rnams ni/ /skal med chos kun rnam spangs la/ /rig pa yang
ni mi mthong bas/ /de rnams la yang gnas med 'gyur/ /de bas byang chub sems bdud rtsi/ /de ni smra bar rigs pa yin/ /'brel ba'i nyi ma thob pa ni/ /ma 'ongs pa na 'byung
bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/ /grags ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa las/ /byang chub sems kyi nges pa'i don/ /slar yang de nyid la gsungs pa/ /nang na ma yin phyi
rol min/ /gnyi ga ming du'ang 'gyur ma yin/ /rtag pa ma yin skad cig min/ /de ni so so rang rig yin/ /mi rtog nam mkha' ji bzhin du/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i don/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'byung / /'das dang ma 'ongs pa nyid dang / /da ltar zhes ni bya ba dang / /sangs rgyas sku yang 'byung 'gyur ba/ /
@#/ /don dam gcig ni kun rdzob yin/ /rig byed dus dang me yi sgra/ /nyi zla rlung gi gzugs can te/ /bzhi phyed gsum pa dag las byung / /byang chub sems
gcig dbye ba nyid/ /de ni shes rab thabs zung 'brel/ /de bzhin bde byed 'dzin pa dang / /ha ni so la gnas pa yang / /gnas skabs ji snyed de bzhin du/ /ming ni yod pa ma yin
pa| |de 'di byang chub sems su 'gyur/ /rdo rje nang du zhugs gyur pa/ /bsam bya'i snying po'ang de nyid yin/ /lhod pa gnas zhes bya ba ni/ /tsheg drag bcas pa'i rlung yin no/ /
rang nyid lhod par byed pa'i mchog /de ni srog dbang yid kyang yin/ /nga rgyal dang ni de bzhin blo/ /de dang ldan pa byang chub sems/ /bzhir grags cha las yang dag byung / /yod
med rab tu zhi ba can/ /dngos po med pa'i sems 'di ni/ /rang rig gcig pu'i spyod yul yin/ /de nyid don ni rig byed pa/ /dgongs pas yang dag bshad pa yin/ /de nas
gsang ba'i dgongs pa 'di/ /chos kyi yi ge mchog thos nas/ /byams pa zhes la sogs pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /ngo mtshar rmad byung legs skyes nas/ /
ched du brjod pa ched du brjod/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos/ /e ma'o chos ni ston mdzad pa/ /dngos kun dag pa'i don gcig pu/ /dag pa de nyid don dag ster/ /rnam par
mi rtog mkha' mtshungs bshad/ /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag med chos las yang dag byung / /byang chub tshogs na rdzogs byed pa/ /ngo bo med cing dmigs su med/ /
byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun bzang gcig las yang dag byung / /dgongs don byang chub ster ba po/ /byang chub spyod mchog rdo rje mchog /byang chub sems la phyag
'tshal lo/ /dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa/ /rdo rje gsum ni rang bzhin gcig /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgongs pa lung
ston la dad par/ /gang gang yid ni bzong gyur pa/ /dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las/ /des ni de bzhin bya ba yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gsang
ba las| |yang dag byang chub sems bshad pa/ /le'u gnyis pa yin par bshad// //de nas de nyid gsang rdo rje/ /gsum dang tshul gsum lam gsum mchog /rnam
thar gsum dang dkon mchog gsum/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa/ /'phro ba'i sprin gyi rdo rje dang / /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs
te| |de nas rdo rje 'dzin la gsungs/ /rdo rje bkod pa mchog 'di yi/ /le'u brtul zhugs bzang po nyon/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /phra mo rnal 'byor dag la bzhugs/ /
@#/ /oM ni gcig dang yang dag ldan/ /shU n+ya tA ni gnyis pa ste/ /dz+nyA na zhes ni gsum pa yin/ /badzra zhes bya bzhi pa'o/ /swa b+hA bAt+ma kaHlnga pa/ /a haM zhes pa drug
par brjod/ /de ltar bder gshegs drug pa ni/ /skye bo mchog la bstan pa yin/ /oM shU n+ya tA zung dang po'o/ /dz+nyA na badzra gnyis pa yin/ /swa b+hA bAt+ma ko\u0f85haM gyur/ /de nyid
gsum ni 'dir brtags pa'o/ /de nyid gsum ni gcig gyur par/ /mi gsal gsal ba'i ming can no/ /mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni/ /'od zer sprin gyi
tshogs chen po/ /yi ge ma yi 'od kyis khyab/ /kun nas yongs su zlum po'o/ /'dod yon lnga yis kun tu khyab/ /mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa/ /mdor na de ltar bsgoms
nas su/ /dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya mchog /de nyid gsum gyi rdo rjes mtshan/ /yang na rdo rje gsum mgon gyi/ /phyag rgya yang ni rnam
par bsgom/ /mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya che/ /tshogs ni gnyis med sbyor ba dang / /dkon mchog dpal gyi rgya chen dang / /tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang / /de bzhin don yod
gzugs can rgya/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom/ /rdo rje gsum gcig rdo rje can/ /in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra ba/ /rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams/ /rnam par
gtsigs pa 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /dzam+bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab tu 'khrigs/ /de ni phyag na rdo rje che/ /rtse mo dgu pa rnam par bsgom/ /shel dang zla
ba'i 'od 'dra ba/ /thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan/ /rab 'bar lag na 'khor lo bsnams/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /margad ta yi 'od 'dra ba/ /rdo rje 'bar
bas rnam par brgyan/ /'bar zhing 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis khyab/ /rin chen de la rnam par bsgom/ /'dod chags chen po rdo rje can/ /pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra zhing / /thor tshugs
cod pan dag gis brgyan/ /phyag na pad+ma bsnams par bsgom/ /sna tshogs rdo rje gdon mi za/ /'od chen sna lnga'i 'od 'dra ba/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du/ /phyag na ral
gri bsnams par bsgom/ /de ltar rnal 'byor bshad pa dag /gsang ba'i bdag pos thos nas ni/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor cha dag kyang / /de bzhin gshegs bdag la zhus pa/ /
phung po khams sogs sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal na/ /mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du/ /de rnams kyang ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /gcig
shos phyi rol tu sgom pa/ /dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas ming can ni/ /dngos po med pa'i dngos po la/ /sgom pa po rnams ji ltar brtag /mgon po phra mo'i rnal 'byor 'di/ /
@#/ /dkyil 'khor gang zhig bka' stsol ces/ /gang zhig ma 'ongs pa rnams ni/ /'di ltar mchog tu'ang som nyi 'tshal/ /lag na rdo rje grags ldan
pa| |phra mo'i rnal 'byor de nyid skyes/ /'gro ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /phra ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin/ /rnam lnga mngon par byang chub 'di/ /ma 'ongs skye bo'i
rgyur gyur te/ /chos ni yang dag sdud 'gyur gang / /ji lta ji ltar ston par byed/ /phung po nyid ni sangs rgyas gyur/ /byang chub don gyi rkyen las byung / /de yang de bzhin
gshegs bshad pa/ /de nyid gnyis med sbyor bas so/ /ston dang 'jog pa po 'di ni/ /blo yi dngos grub ston pa po/ /thog mtha' med pa rnal 'byor ni/ /phra mo zhes ni bya
bar brtag /mi gsal gsal bar yang dag sbyor/ /dngos med ngo bo las skyes pa'o/ /gzod ma nyid nas rab grub pa/ /gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa/ /rten 'brel
chos zhes grags pa ste/ /dngos po thams cad gcig tu byung / /bdag nyid 'di 'drar byas nas ni/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri/ /dmar dang nag dang de bzhin
ser| |dkar po nyid ni mdo ru ste/ /bzhi bzhi gcig tu sbyor ba yang / /gos dkar la sogs yang dag bri/ /de rnams dbus su lha mor bcas/ /zhi sbyor mchog dang mchog
min dang / /steng dang thad ka mnyam dang 'og /ji ltar gos dkar sogs/ /me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang / /chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bco brgyad dag tu yang dag bshad/
de yang 'di nyid dag la bshad/ /ji ltar 'o ma khyad par ni/ /mar gsar gnas par gyur ba yin/ /de bzhin gos dkar la sogs la/ /zhi ba nyid ni de gnas so/ /gzugs la
sogs pa nang gi chos/ /mthong ba de ni lhag mthong yin/ /mi bskyod la sogs grangs ji bzhin/ /rtog pa dag ni zhi gnas yin/ /'di gnyis dngos po med pa'i bdag /de bzhin
nyid ni zhi zhes bya/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rdub dbyung / /sbyor ba de nyid gcig pa nyid/ /shes
rab thabs la gnas nas ni/ /sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas/ /bya ba thams cad nyid du yang / /rnal 'byor rig pas nyal sogs la/ /ming med brjod du med pa dang //
dus gsum 'das pa rtag tu bzla/ /gos dkar la sogs bzlas bshad pa/ /brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga/ /bzhi pa legs par bsgres pa yi/ /sbyor bzhis bsdus pas brgya
phrag dgu /dgu brgya dag tu gang bstan pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rim gyis ni/ /de ni so sor 'byung pa las/ /nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o/ /de 'dir gsang ba dgongs pa yis//
@#/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa yin/ /klog dang bsam gtan med mod kyi/ /'on kyang bzlas pa yin par bshad/ /de ltar rnam pa mang po yi/ /'gro la phan
pa'i gsung thos nas/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la/ /rdo rje can gyis slar yang zhus/ /gang zhig bsgoms na ma 'ongs 'gro/ /thams cad mi rtog par 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje
gsum gyi snying po mchog /snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de nyid gsum gnyis med sbyor ba/ /de ni phra mo'i rdo rje bsgom/ /myur ba la sogs gsum spangs pa'i/ /
rnal 'byor bar yang bdag cag 'gyur/ /de ni bdag rig yid ches shing / /zhi ba nyid ni mi shes 'gyur/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor gtso spangs te/ /log pa'i rnal 'byor kun tu
bsten| |ston pa po yi sbyor smra zhing / /phra mo zhes bya de nyid ni/ /ma 'ongs dus na spong 'gyur ba/ /de nyid de ni nges par byed/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra ba'i/ /lung bstan pa ni
gsan pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po/ /chos nyid ngo bo nyid ces bya yi/ /ting nge 'dzin de kun nas ni/ /snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzad/ /dpal ldan snyoms
par zhugs mdzad nas/ /gsang sngags 'di ni bka' stsal to/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rjer bshad/ /khyad par du ni byin rlob pa/ /gnyis med rdo rje gsum sbyor bas/ /de
ni yang dag bshad par bya/ /oM ni dang por shes par bya/ /d+harma zhes bya gnyis pa'o/ /d+hU tu zhes bya gsum par bshad/ /swA b+hA bar grags pa bzhi pa'o/ /At+ma ka/ /ni lnga pa yin/ /a haM
du gyur drug par 'dod/ /sngags 'di brjod nas de 'og tu/ /sgom pa bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/ /rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa/ /yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam/ /nyams dga'i 'di
rab rtse mo ru/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par bsgom/ /rin chen mi g.yor gyur nas spro/ /mi g.yor ma gyur spro mi bya/ /sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od 'dra ba/ /mchog rab sprin rnams spro
bar bya| |'khor lo rdo rje sprin chen dang / /pad+ma ral gri mtshon cha mchog /byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams/ /spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro/ /phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus
gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /bzlas dang sgom pa'i sbyor ba yang / /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom/ /rin chen lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dngos la brtson pas
rin chen sgo/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las byung ba/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du bri bya/ /'di dag sangs rgyas rab mchog gi/ phra mo rdo rje gsum sgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor
las byung ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa'o/ /dgongs pa gsang ba zhes pa yi/ /lung ston dam pa 'di la ni/ /gang gis sems ni bzod gyur pa/ /de ni de bzhin byed pa
@#/ /yin| |de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /rdo rje phra mo de nyid las/ /'di ni rdo rje bkod pa'i mchog /le'u gsum pa nyid yin no// //de nas
bcom ldan 'das thams cad/ /gnyis su med par gyur nas ni/ /slar yang rdo rje gsum bdag la/ /bstod pas de rnams gsol ba 'debs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi| |zhi ba gnas rnams mchog gyur pa/ /chos kun gcig tu bdag med pa/ /dkyil 'khor mchog 'di bshad du gsol/ /yongs su rdzogs par yang dag brgyan/ /mtshan
rnams kun gyis mtshan pa'o/ /kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /ye shes spyod pa'i don las byung / /zhi ba'i chos ni sbyong ba po/ /kun tu
bzang po gsung gi mchog /dngos mchog dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dri med dag /sems ni kun tu bzang po nyid/ /sems can kun gcig che ba'i
mchog /dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/ /de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ /khams gcig khams ni gsum pa po/ /'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje mchog /'jig
rten gsum gyi ston pa po/ /nyams dga' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun dag la/ /thugs de dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa
bka' stsal to/ /de nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /rdo rje ye shes rab 'dra ba/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya/ /'di ni gsad pa'i
bdag nyid mchog /legs bsgril de bzhin nyid bstan pa'o/ /sna tshogs lung gi mtshan ma ni/ /mtshan ma bzang por de bshad do/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag /gnyis su med pa
mdzes pa yin/ /shes rab 'di ni thig yin te/ /thabs ni de yi rjes su 'jug pa'o/ /shes rab thabs kyi thig gcig gis/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs mchog ni/ /sems kyi dkyil
'khor thig gdab ste/ /rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa/ /'phags pa'i bden bzhi ngos bzhis te/ /tshangs ba'i gnas bzhi gra bzhi yin/ /bsdu ba'i dngos grags sgo yin te/

re re'ang bzhi yi ming can no/ /chos kyi de nyid don gyi brda/ /'khor lo nang gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /mi phyed ye shes mtshan ma ste/ /rdo rje in+d+ra nI la rgya/ /rnam pa lnga yis rab phye ba'i/ /rtse mo
'khor ba 'jig byed pa'o/ /shar nas me long ngo bo ni/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /lho ru kun mnyam ye shes yin/ /gcig gi ming can rin po che/ /nub tu so sor rtog
pad+ma| |pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba/ /byang du gong ma'i sems gang yin/ /'gro ba'i rnam rtog 'joms byed pa/ /bya ba sgrub pa ral grir 'gyur/ /'od 'phro 'bar ba 'dra ba'i mdog /shar
@#/ /lho byams pa'ang spyan yin te/ /sprin sngon dang ni mnyam pa'i 'od/ /lho nub snying rje zhes bya ba/ /mA ma kI ni rigs rdo rje/ /nub byang pad+ma zhes bya ba/ /dga' ba
legs par gnas pa bzhin/ /byang shar ut+pal ltar snang ba'i/ /btang snyoms bcas pa sngon po 'dra/ /de bzhin shar sgor sbyin pa ni/ /tha ba mdangs ldan 'od dang bcas/ /de
bzhin snyan smra zhes grags pa/ /dbyig pa 'od bzang rdo rje 'bar/ /nub tu don spyod ces bya ba/ /rta mgrin gyi ni pad+ma'o/ /don mthun pa ni rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje 'khyil ba'i rdo rje can/
phyag rgya dgod pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /'di ni legs par bshad pa yin/ /ji ltar dbyibs kyis mchod pa ni/ /rnam gsum bsgoms pas 'gyur ba yin/ /dang por chen po yod pa
yi| |phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad/ /de ltar mkha' dang mtshungs gyur dang / /shes nas 'gro la phan par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsum dang lhan cig 'byung / /de tshe zla
zer phreng ba yi/ /skad cig la sogs dus dbye bas/ /lo grangs bcu drug pa yi ming / /ma skyes par 'byung zhi ba ni/ /bud med ces ni nges par bshad/ /zhi ba'i chos dang rjes
dran pa| |mdangs bzang 'od ni yin par gsungs/ /rten 'brel bag chags dri yin te/ /ye shes kha phye me tog go /dngos po med pa rigs yin te/ /kun mkhyen ye shes
dbus nyid do/ /chos dbyings nyid ni bud med ni/ /shes rab 'di 'dras mnyes par byas/ /nang nam yin phyi ma yin/ /gnyi gar ma yin gzhan nas min/ /gnas med gnas pa'i rna
'byor gyur/ /de bas mA ma kIr bshad do/ /de yi ngo bo nyid gcig pa/ /byin gyis brlabs pas de bshad do/ /nam mkha' dang ni gcig tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas
'gyur/ /de bas yul du rnam brtags pa/ /bsdu ba dag ni bshad ba yin/ /ye shes dbang po stong pa gcin/ /rnam dag chos nyid khu ba yin/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khra
rang bzhin chos su yongs brtags pa/ /de nyid lha rnams zhes bya ste/ /dngos med pa ni dbul ba yin/ /de byas sangs rgyas sras po rnams/ /khyad par du ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /gang yang
'jig rten pas brtags pa/ /de rnams ji skad bshad pa nyid/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pa/ /gsar pa nyid du bkal ba legs dang / /shin tu tshad ldan mdzes pa yi/ /thig gis
mkhas pas thig gdab bo/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor brtag bya ba/ /khru ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam la/ /ngos bzhi dang ni gra bzhir ldan/ /rta babs kyis ni mdzes par bya/ /de yi dbus
su 'khor lo ni/ /dgongs pas dang po bshad pa ste/ /de las ldog pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /'di na 'jig rten pa rnams rtog gang zhig 'jig rten 'das la gnas/ /de ni gzungs kyis
@#/ /dbang bskur ba/ /dngos med pa ni 'dzin pa dag /yid ni rtag tu mkha' dang mtshungs/ /dam pa 'jig rten shin tu 'das/ /'khor ba dang ni gcig shos spang
len pa ma yin gtong ba min/ /med pa ma yin gnas ma yin/ /blo ldan kun tu 'di shes pa/ /rnal 'byor thams cad rig pa mchog /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor le'u 'di ni/ /nges
pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bshad/ /dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la/ /gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur pa/ /de rnams shes rab thabs dag ni/ /ji ltar gnas pa de ltar byed//
gsang ba'i dgongs pa lung bstan las/ /de las thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /le'u bzhi pa nyid yin no// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog /rdo rje gsung bdag
'gro ba'i bla/ /slar yang rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ /sngags spyod don gyi de nyid zhus/ /sngags kyi brtul zhugs spyod pa gcig /khyad par du ni bsrung bslab pa/ /de rnams kyi ni dgongs
pa'i gsung / /spyod pa bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de nas bdag po de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa dag gi tshig /gsan nas 'gro ba'i don gcig pu/ /gsungs pa'i don
can bka' stsal to/ /mi rtog don las yang dag byung / /zhe sdang la 'jug mtshan nyid yin/ /dngos med la gnas gti mug ste/ /'dod chags 'dod chags las byung ba/ /'dod
chags ldan pa'i ming can yin/ /theg pa mchog ni bla med pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste/ /'di dag rigs su yang dag bshad/ /dngos grub de ni 'di bsgrub bo/ /rigs
ran myur bar shes par bya/ /smyig mkhan dag ni dal ba yin/ /mtshams med byed pa gnyi ga ste/ /gsod pa don gnyer sems pa po/ /theg pa chen po bla med pa'i/ /theg pa mchog
'di 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems can sdig chen byas pa dang / /gzhan yang mtshams med byed pa po/ /gang yang slob dpon smod pa yis/ /bsgrubs kyang grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di
gnyis dad pas myur du ni/ /zhe sdang dag la gnas pas gnas/ /gang gis phung sogs dngos med par/ /zhi gnas las byung sems kyis byas/ /de ni srog gcod byed pa ste/ /theg
pa mchog la gnas pa yin/ /nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dag /rten 'brel gnyis su ston pa ni/ /de ni rdzun smra dga' ba ste/ /gnas med la gnas rnal 'byor pa'o/ /rdzogs sangs
rgyas kyi ye shes gang / /de ni rdzas su shes bya ste/ /de 'phrog ngang tshul gang yin pa/ /gzhan gyi nor la chags par 'dod/ /gang zhig de nyid dngos gcig pa/ /de bzhin nyid la rtag
sbyor ba| |sems can de de 'dod la dga'/ /sgrub pa mchog la dam par 'gyur/ /de yi stong nyid gti mug la/ /yul ni bshang ba zhes grags te/ /dbang po gcig ba zhes bya la/
@#/ /de dag zhi ba za ba yin/ /theg pa chen po chos mchog 'dir/ /de dag bsgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur/ /de tshe rdzun de 'dod pa dang / /bshang gci zas su byed pa
po| |shes rab pha rol phyin shes rab/ /chos kyi sku ni ma gcig pu/ /gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyor ba/ /dngos med ces bya 'dod spyod pa/ /longs spyod rdzogs dang mnyam
gang yin/ /de nyid sring mo yin par 'dod/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /gsang sngags lus kyis mnyes par bya/ /bshang gci zas su byed pa yi/ /sprul sku'i gzugs
can bu mo de/ /sgrub pa pos ni bsgom par bya/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo ni/ /'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas mnyes byas/ /theg pa mchog gi chos nyid la/ /de nyid 'jig rten par byung ba/ /rtog
bo| |ji ltar mi rtog nam mkha' ni/ /kun tu khyab par gnas gyur pa/ /'di ni sgom pa zhes bshad de/ /ting 'dzin bsam khyab ces bya ba/ /de nyid 'jig rten par byung ba/ /rtog
pa dga' ba'i ming can no/ /sangs rgyas yum gyi ye shes la/ /'dod spyong gos par mi 'gyur te/ /rnam par mi rtog sbyor gcig gis/ /myur du sangs rgyas des thob 'gyur/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das gsung ni/ /sgrib kun sel ba la sogs pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches/ /thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur/ /'di ni bdag po bcom ldan
'das| |de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /ci yi slad du tshig ngan pa/ /de bzhin gshegs 'khor nang du gsung / /'dod chags bral dang chags bcas dang / /gti mug bral ba
rmongs bcas dang / /zhe sdang bral ba sdang bcas pa'i/ /rigs kyi dngos grub ston mdzad cing / /gang gzhan sdig pa'i nyes pa dang / /'tshe ba la sogs yongs spangs pa/ /'di ni de byed
sems can rnams/ /snod yin zhes ni thub gsung ngam/ /de nas mgon po thugs rje can/ /sems can kun la phan dgyes pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /byang chub
sems dpa' la gsungs pa/ /'di ni sa khams dang mnyam pa/ /sems can kun 'dzin gcig pu pa/ /chu khams rtog dang bral ba po/ /sna tshogs gsal bar 'gyur ba yin/ /bdag
po me yi gzugs can te/ /thams cad za bar nye bar sbyor/ /de bzhin phyi nang bdag nyid mchog /'gro la gos pa'i dri gcig pu/ /bcom ldan sna tshogs nam mkha' mtshungs/ /thams
cad snang zhing zab mo/ /de nyid bdag nyid bdag yin par/ /bsgoms na rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur/ /snying po zhes bya sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos nyid dag pa 'di yin zhing / /sngags kyi spyod
don spyod rnams kyi/ /byang chub spyod pa'i mchog 'di yin/ /de nas brjod mi lang zhes pa/ /brjod mi lang pa nyid gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing rdul grangs mnyam de/ /sgrib pa thams
@#/ /cad sel la sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /kun nas 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de thams cad/ /gcig
tu brgyal ba nyid gyur to/ /de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsung / /gnyis med de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyal ba ru/ /gzigs nas gtso la 'di skad
gsol| |mgon po sgrib kun sel la sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rang bzhin chos nyid ji lta bar/ /'di rnams bslang bar mdzad du gsol/ /mi g.yo
ba 'di gsang ba ste/ /zhi ba gcig pu bde ba'i mchog /rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed pa/ /'di ni dgongs pas gsungs pa yin/ /dngos po med cing 'khrug pa med/ /yid 'ong
rdo rje tshig gcig pu/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa'i dbye ba yis/ /bye brag mang por gyur pa yin/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis/ /gzugs la sogs pa mtha' yas te/ /de
yang de bzhin gshegs mchog dang / /byang chub sems dpa' nyid du gyur/ /de las spro zhing bsdu ba dang / /zhi ba nyid las rab sbyor bas/ /ye shes lus can ye shes can/ /
brgyal lo zhes ni shes pa ni/ /yan lag dbye ba gang dang gang / /'gro ba zhes ni grags bdag pa/ /de de rang lha'i sbyor ba las/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'byung bar 'gyur//
dkyil 'khor rang lus gang yin pa/ /de nyid bsdus pa 'di lta bu/ /'di ni 'jig tshogs lus rtog la/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyal bar gyur/ /des ni bden 'di ma shes pas/ /
dbyangs bcas brgyal la bskul ba ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /brgyal ba zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /de nas gsung ba rdo rje gsum/ /dgongs pa'i tshig gis bshad
pa dag /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshig gsan nas/ /ting nge 'dzin ni mngon du mdzad/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam rdo rje/ /'gro la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i/ /'di nyid gsum yul 'jigs pa po/ /
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /mgon po snyoms par zhugs pa yi/ /'od gang chen por gyur pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' des reg pas/ /rang gi stan la gnas par gyur/ /de
nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /ngo mtshar rmad du gyur spyan dang / /dgyes shing mgu ba skyes gyur nas/ /chos kyi dbyangs ni 'di skad gsungs/ /e ma'o chos e ma'o chos/ /e ma'o
chos kyi don byung ba/ /bdag med chos ni yang dag ngag /chos kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje gsung gcig dag pa'i don/ /dri med mkha' dang mnyam pa'o/ /mi 'gyur don las yang
dag byung / /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub mchog gcig pu de bzhin gshegs/ /dus gsum dag gi lam du byung / /rdo rje dbyings gcig rdzogs longs spyod/ /nam mkha'i
@#/ /lam gcig phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsung thugs ni nam mkha' ste/ /spyod pa'i mchog ste chos gcig ldan/ /de nyid gsum ston sna tshogs pa/ /spyod pa'i
gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/ /gang zhig spyod mchog 'di ston pa/ /gsang ba yang dag srung ba dag /de ni ci dga' bar yang byed/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje mchog /sngags rnams kun gyi dam pa yi/ /spyod pa'i le'u lnga pa yin// //de nas dpal chen mi
bskyod pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba can/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /thugs byin brlab pa zhes bya ba'i/ /gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs pa yin/ /oM zhes
bya ba dang po yin/ /sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/ /tsit+ta gsum par yongs su brtag /badzra bzhi pa'i gong mar ldan/ /swa b+hA wAt+ma kaHlpa pa/ /a haM dus kyi ming can yin/ /sku drug
gsum pa'i ming can no/ /de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /rdul phra rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku ni byin gyis brlab pa gsung / /oM
zhes bya ba tshangs par bshad/ /sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/ /ka ya chags thogs dbang phyug ste/ /badzra rig byed yin par bsgrags/ /swa b+hA wAt+ma kaH'dod lha/ /a haM skem byed
ces brjod de/ /dgongs pa yis ni yang dag brtags/ /shes rab dbye bas dbye bar bya/ /de nas tshe dpag med ces pa'i/ /kun tu mi gnyis rdo rje can/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs
nas| |gsung ni byin gyis rlob pa gsung / /oM ni dang por bsgrags pa yin/ /sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/ /wAka ces bya ba gsum pa yin/ /badzra dus kyi ming du 'gyur/ /swa
b+hA wAt+ma kaHlnga pa/ /a haM zhes pa drug pa ste/ /gsum po 'di dag bshad pa rnams/ /re re zhing drug gsum du bshad/ /thugs dang sku dang de bzhin gsung / /rim
dang rim pa min pas gsungs/ /bdag po las ni gcig pu las/ /rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba 'byung / /yon tan chos 'di rdo rje gsung / /de nyid gsum gyi dam tshig mchog /de bas 'di
ni sgom pa mchog /g.yel ba med par rdzogs par bya/ /'di bshad pa yi blo ldan pa/ /rab mchog rdo rje gsum byung bas/ /bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyur cing / /sngags kyi mtshan
nyid mtshan mar bya/ /de nas dkon mchog dpal 'di yang / /sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /de nas gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM ni zung gi dang
por ldan/ /sarba ta thA ga ta zung / /de bzhin nyid ni ye shes tshogs/ /thams cad me long ming can no/ /a nu rA ga skye med de/ /de ni gsum pa yin par gsungs/ /rkyen dang nyan thos kyis
@#/ /bshig dka'i/ /badzra yang ni bzhi par gyur/ /dngos med bdag nyid can ye shes/ /swa b+hA wAt+ma kaHzhes bshad/ /ye shes lnga po nyid kyi ming / /chos kyi dbyings
kyi ngo bo nyid/ /a haM so so rdzogs longs spyod/ /dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /bde ba chen po'i ming gyur pa/ /mtshon pa drug pa'i ming can no/ /dngos med gnas pa'i bdag
nyid can/ /de yi rjes su mnyes bya'i mchog /de lta'i chags pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /mgon po thams cad mnyes par bya/ /de nas dpal chen gdon mi za/ /don yod rdo rje
zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /des ni gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM zhes bya ba dang por ldan/ /sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/ /pU dza rnam par thar pa'i ming //
badzra sems ni rnam sgom pa/ /swa b+hA wAt+ma kaHzhes bshad/ /a haM pha rol phyin zhes bya/ /lnga po drug dang gsum du bshad/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg bya dang ni chos
kyi dbyings/ /de dag dngos med gyur byas pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas mchod mchog yin/ /mig sogs shes las yang dag byung / /mngon shes lnga yis nye bar mdzes/ /mchod pa
lnga bshad 'di rnams kyis/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /so sor byang chub ston mdzad pa/ /rdo rje gsum rig gsang dbang po/ /thub pa
chen pos yang gsungs pa/ /sku gsung thugs la dmigs pa la/ /gang tshe yid ni mgu gyur pa/ /de nyid gsum la nyer sbyor ba/ /dngos grub rab mchog de thob 'gyur/ /bdag med par
ni sems dmigs shing / /lus dang ngag kyang rnam par bsgom/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gnas sgom zhing / /sbyor ba rnam gsum rdzogs par bya/ /rdo rje de nyid gsum dmigs na//
shin tu phra ba'ang yod ma yin/ /sngags kyi rang bzhin sbyor ba yis/ /sgom pa med cing byang chub med/ /rdo rje gsum gcig mtshan nyid du/ /mdor na rnam par brtags nas su/ /
sngags la sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /gnas la gnas med bsgom par bya/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po'ang / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod/ /kun mkhyen
sangs rgyas kun mchog gis/ /sgom pa'i mchog 'di bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs
ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtsam par bya/ /yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam/ /sna yi rtse mo'i bdag nyid can/ /rgyu dang mi rgyur yang dag ldan/ /de ru gnas par mkhas
bas bsam/ /blo ldan ye shes kyis brtags pa'i/ /gsang ba'i ye shes gnas bsgom mo/ /gsang ba mchog ces bshad pa ste/ /de nyid gsum ni dam tshig mchog /nam mkha'i
@#/ /dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms te/ /de yi steng du gnas bzhag go /dbang phyug chen
po skem byed de/ /gzhi phyed nam mkha'i mtshon pa dag /bdud rtsi zhes ni brtags pa gang / /de ni hUM zhes bya bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /'khor lo
dkyil 'khor yid 'ong bsgom/ /spyan gyi gzugs su yang dag sbyor/ /rdo rje pad+mo gnyis bsgom pa'o/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor
