bsgom par bya/ /dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis/ /de yi steng du rnam par bsgom/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid bsgom/ /sangs
rgyas zhi ba'i gnas dgod pa/ /'khor rnams kyis ni kun nas bskor/ /ut+pal mthon ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ /rtse mo lnga pa 'od po che/ /nas kyi 'bru tsam nan tan gyis/ /ri rab rtse
mor rnam par bsam/ /tsa na ka yi tshad tsam/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas/ /sna yi rtse mo ri rab rtse/ /byang chub 'dod pas 'di bsgom bya/ /'khor lo la sogs sgom
pa ni| |de yi khyad par dag tu brtag /yid 'ong dngos grub kun gyi gnas/ /byang chub gnas mchog bla med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas yang dag byang chub bzhugs/ /mdor na de ni
spro bar bya/ /gang tshe chos ni legs mtshan pa/ /rdo rje gcig ni bsgom par bya/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po/ /dag pa chos rnams kun gyi mchog /'gro kun don du
ston pa pos/ /gsang ba mchog ni bka' stsal to/ /skad cig thang gcig yud tsam dang / /zla phyed zla ba lo yi dus/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum po ni/ /skad cig gcig tu
mnyam par bshad/ /zla ba drug bshad de nyid yin/ /dngos med rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o/ /skad cig gcig tu bsngags pa ste/ /dus gsum las 'das yin par dgongs//
gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa/ /rnal 'byor pas ni zla drug bsgom/ /mchod chen de ni byas nas su/ /gsang ba'i de nyid rnam par bsgom/ /yul dang dbang po sems pa ni/ /
bshang gci zas su byed pa po/ /byas na de 'dra'i dngos grub ni/ 9/bza' ba rnam rtog med pa 'o/ /de nyid 'di ni bla med pa/ /byang chub sems gcig las byung ba'o/ /rtog med 'dus
ni ma byas shing / /mi rtog don ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /ma ni mA ma kIr bshad de/ /sa ni mngon par byang chub pa'o/ /bsam gtan de ni dga' spyod pa/ /sha zhes bya bar de bshad
do| |nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni/ /sha chen de ni yin par bshad/ /gsang ba pa yi go 'phang mchog /rdo rje gsum ni myur du 'grub /dam tshig chen po glang chen rta/ /de
@#/ /bzhin khyi la sogs pa'i sha /phung po la sogs rigs dbye bas/ /gang gsung mnyam pa'i grangs kyis so/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor gnyis med zas/ /bsam
gtan dga' ba'i ming gcig pu/ /'jig rten rgyang pan 'jig rten pa/ /bza' ba'i rang gi ngo bor gyur/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen brtag pa dang / /de bzhin drod gsher las
skyes pa| |'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /'di dag zas su kun tu bshad/ /de nas rdo rje gsum dgongs pa/ /bcom ldan 'das las thos pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs
pa kun bdag po/ /lag na rdo rjes tshig gsol pa/ /nyan thos rnams kyi dam tshig kyang / /phra mo'i rnal 'byor ston mdzad cing / /mgon khyod 'jig rten pa dang ni/ /'jig rten
'das pa dag kyang gsungs/ /chu dang 'o ma gcig 'gyur bzhin/ /khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad/ /'jig rten 'ga' las yang dag pa/ /ngang pas 'o ma ji bzhin len//
ji ltar skom pas gdungs pa yi/ /skyes bu la la de bsres 'thung / /de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi de rnams 'thung / /dgongs pas sngags kyi de nyid
du| |gang zhig gsum du gsungs pa 'di/ /ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs/ /mgon po gsal bar bshad du gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gis/ /grags
ldan lag na rdo rje la/ /bu khyod legs so cher legs te/ /bye brag gsum khyod la bshad bya/ /rkyen dang nyan thos zhes grags dang / /de bzhin mdo sde la spyod rnams/ /'di dag
'jig rten pa rnams te/ /bya ba sbyor ba'i bya bar gnas/ /rnal 'byor grub nas 'jig rten gnas/ /'jig rten 'das par gyur pa yin/ /de ni ting 'dzin rnal 'byor yang / /de dang
'dra bar byed ma yin/ /gang yang 'jig rten shin tu 'das/ /rnam par mi rtog 'jigs med pa/ /de ni de bzhin nyid dngos gcig /'khor ba dang ni gcig shos spangs/ /brtul
zhugs bzang po'i rnal 'byor 'dis/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes 'gyur zhing / /blo ldan byang chub sems rnams kyis/ /byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /'dod khams kyi ni
dbang phyug dang / /rnal 'byor go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/ /gzi ldan stobs kyis phyug pa dang / /mdangs bzang mthong na dga' ba dang / /mthong ngam tshig gis bskul ba yis//
'jig rten 'di dag dbang du byed/ /gsang ba 'di ni mchog yin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa yin/ /de nyid sngags kyi gsang ba 'di/ /rdo rje gsum las 'das pa'i mchog/
dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la/ /skyes bu gang zhig gnas gyur pa/ /gsang ba yang dag srung ba po/ /de rnams ci dgar byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs kun dam pa ste/ /
@#/ /dam tshig las ni dam tshig mchog /rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /le'u drug pa yin par bshad// //de nas rdo rje gsum gsang dbang / /dam
tshig chen po de nyid gcig /ting 'dzin gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog /mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di gsungs so/ /de nyid dam tshig bzhi po gang / /'dod pa thams cad ces te
bshad| |de rnams longs spyod ldan pa yi/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten par bya/ /rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor bas/ /bdag dang gzhan ni mchod par bya/ /de ni 'jig rten mchod
'gyur ba/ /'jig rten 'das pa zhi ba nyid/ /dka' thub myur ba de yin la/ /sdom pa dam pa yin par 'dod/ /mi zad pa ni gnyi ga ste/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad
kyang / /gzugs sogs lha rnams yin par 'dod/ /de dag bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgrub pa po rnams myur du 'grub/ /tha dad yi ge slong mo yin/ /de 'dod pa ni za ba ste//
gang zhig zlos la dga' ba de/ /de dag slong mo za bar 'dod/ /dka' thub dag ni mi bya zhing / /sdom pa mi bzad nyid kyang min/ /'dod gsum de nyid longs spyod cing / /sngags
kyi de nyid ma nyams bzlas/ /rdo rje gsum dbye ba de gnas ni/ /sngags rig byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang / /shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sangs
rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog rnams gang / /mi 'gyur chos ni brnyes pa yang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /kun mkhyen ye
shes chags ldan pas/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams bsten/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyes bya zhing / /byang chub pha rol phyin chags bya/ /de ltar gzugs la gsum shes
nas| |mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /de nyid gtso bo bcom ldan 'das/ /sna tshogs rnam par snang mdzad che/ /sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /
'di ni bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso/ /dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /
'dod chags chos ni 'dzin pa'i gtso/ /dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid don yod rdo rje grags/ /sna tshogs gtso bo bcom ldan 'das/ /
reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /rang gi rigs la dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /mi bskyod me long gzugs can no/ /nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dang / /gnyi ga
rjes su mi dmigs pa/ /gzugs la rdzogs gsum de yin te/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /gzugs sgra ro la sogs pa la/ /sems ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya/ /gsang ba
@#/ /bsdus par gyur pa ni/ /snying po sangs rgyas kun bskyed de/ /mkhas pas gzugs sgra la sogs pa/ /lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom/ /de bzhin rigs su sgom
pa ni| |sgom pas der ni bsgom par bya/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje sbyor ba ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bshad/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor bas kyang / /chos ni rjes su dran pa bsgom//
rdo rje gsum sgom rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo rje rjes dran sgom pa 'o/ /rigs dbye ji skad bshad pas kyang / /chos dang longs spyod sprul skur byung / /rigs ni rjes dran sbyor gyur pa/ /de
bzhin khro bo rjes dran pa'o/ /de nyid gsum yongs gyur pa gcig /rdo rje gsum nyid med chos nyid/ /lha rnams rjes dran sbyor ba ste/ /de bsgom byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bzhi
po dag ni re re bzhi/ /ji lta ji ltar mgu bcas sogs/ /de nyid lo yi grangs yin te/ /bcu drug par ni yongs su brtag /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten pa yin/ /bud med lo
grangs bcu drug pa/ /gzugs bzang phra dang mchod pa ni/ /dben pa zhes byar brtsam par bya/ /byin gyis brlabs nas yid 'ong ba/ /khyad par gsum zhes bya ba yi/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo che/ /spyan sogs nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /bsgrub bya de nyid yang dag sbyor/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /dang por sbyor ba 'di bsgoms
na| |sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /yi ge hUM dang de bzhin oM/ /phaT kyang der ni bsgom par bya/ /de nyid gsum tshul gsum bdag nyid/ /ci rigs par ni rnam par spro/ /
'od zer rnam pa lngas khyab pa'i/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'di mchog ste/ /gsang dang snying ga sna rtse ru/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgom bya/ /'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin dkar bar/ /shes rab de
ni rtag tu bsgom/ /gang phyir yid ni dgar gyur pas/ /de bas de nang yid 'ong ba'o/ /gnas med gnas par legs sbyor bas/ /bzhi mtshungs gcig tu sbyor ba rigs/ /sangs rgyas
rjes dran sbyor la sogs/ /byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya/ /nyams dga' sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan/ /b+ha ga zhi ba gcig pu'i ming / /rang gi de nyid gnyis med byung / /rdo
rje de bdag nyid du sbyor/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba ste/ /b+ha ga ling+ga yin par bsgrags/ /gzhug pa gnyis med sbyor ba ste/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su sgom pa 'o/ /de las blo
ldan gyis spro ba/ /ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse mor gnas/ /mnyam pa med pas khyad par du/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams der spro 'o/ /chos rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang / /rdo rje chos kyi rab sbyor bas//
rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyar/ /b+ha ga'i ling+gar brtag pa 'o/ /de nas ba spu'i bu ga las/ /'bad pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro/ /de nyid bsam kun rdzogs byed pa'i/ /'di ni chos kyi bdag
@#/ /po yin| |rdo rje rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /dngos med gcig pa la sbyor ba/ /stong la rdo rje rab sbyor 'gyur/ /b+ha ga ling+ga zhes bshad do/ /de nas ba spu'i bu ga
nas| |rdo rje sprin rnams kun tu spro/ /rdo rje byang chub sems sgom nyid/ /myur du dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /rigs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pas stong nyid rdo rje
las| |de bzhin rnal 'byor pas spros na/ /rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /khro bo rjes dran sbyor ba la'ang / /stong dang rdo rje gnyis ldan pa'i/ /khro bo'i ba spu'i bu ga
nas| |khro bo'i sprin rnams spro bar bya/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /khyab bdag rnam snang mdzad chen la/ /rjes dran sbyor ba'i dgongs pa ni/ /thub pa che la slar zhus pa/ /
thub khyod kyis ni gang gsungs pa/ /b+ha ga'i ling+ga'i sbyor ba ni/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i sbyor 'di las/ /sangs rgyas la sogs spro gyur pa/ /tshul 'di ma 'ongs skye bo la/ /phyi
dus kun rmongs skyed pa ste/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi bdag pos ni/ /ci phyir gsungs zhes de rnams smra/ /'gro bas nam mkha' mtshan ma can/ /rten 'byung khyod nyid mi
shes shing / /de rnams shin tu rmongs dbye bas/ /ji bzhin par ni rtogs par byed/ /mgon khyod bde ba chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ston gcig pu/ /sku med srid gsum
bdag nyid can/ /dgongs pa gnyis ka'i mtshan dang ldan/ /de bas khyod ni chos kun gyi/ /yon tan gsum bdag de nyid gsum/ /dgongs pa bya ba dri med gsum/ /sangs rgyas kyi
ni bdud rtsi 'byung / /khyod 'dir b+ha ga khyab 'jug ste/ /ling+ga drag po'i ming can nyid/ /khyod ni sa bon tshangs la brtags/ /khyod ni rten 'byung 'gro ba 'byung / /dus gsum las
'das rnal 'byor che/ /dus dang rtsis su gyur pa nyid/ /shes dang shes bya rnam par grol/ /de bas khyod ni 'gro ba'i bla/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /de la sogs pa'i tshig
gsan nas/ /dam tshig rjes su dran sgom pa/ /bcom ldan 'das ni ston par mdzad/ /rang gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor las/ /rang gi khu ba'i thigs skyes
pa'i| |sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor rjes su dran bdag nyid/ /dbang po gnyis nyid sbyor ba las/ /rang gi tshangs pa rtag drangs te/ /rnal 'byor pas ni
dkyil 'khor bya/ /sku rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi phung po lnga/ /sangs rgyas de nyid sogs brtag pa/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar rig /gsung rjes dran pa'i
sbyor ba lnga/ /rdo rje chos gsung phun sum tshogs/ /de yi gsung ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ /bdag kyang de dang 'drar chos 'dzin/ /thugs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba gang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
@#/ /thugs dang ni/ /kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sems can rjes dran sbyor ba gang / /sems can rjes dran rdo rje nyid
spyod pa mkha' mtshungs ji bzhin du/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sngags sku rdo rje gsum zhes pa/ /de sbyor dran pa sgom pa ni/ /rdo rje sngags kyi sku gang yin/ /gsung dang
sku ni rnam sgom pa/ /de nyid gsum mnyam gcig pa nyid/ /rtag tu gsum 'das gyur pa yi/ /sngags 'dzin mchog ni ci 'dra ba/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /dam tshig
rjes dran rnams kyis ni/ /de bas tshangs par shin tu dbyung / /dngos med gcig tu sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du gsung / /de bzhin gshegs mchog che ba ni/ /dngos med
ces bya bsad pa ste/ /blo dang ldan pas 'di bsad na/ /dngos grub sngags mchog thob par 'gyur/ /shes rab dam tshig sbyor gyur pa/ /rjes su dran pa zhes bshad do/ /pha rol
phyin pa zhes grags pa/ /yod med gnyis dang bral pa'o/ /thams cad rang bzhin dri ma med/ /ma skyes pa dang zad pa med/ /byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/ /khams med
'byung ba'ang med pa 'o/ /ma skyes rjes su sbyor ba gang / /der ni ci yang brjod min zhing / /ma skyes ming ni gcig bu pa/ /dran pa de ni yin par bshad/ /ji ltar nam mkha' 'od gsal ba//
mtshan ma med cing 'gyur ba med/ /rang bzhin mkha' dang 'drar gyur cing / /gnyis med gnyis su yod min zhing / /yan lag bcu gnyis sbyor gcig gang / /zhe sdang rdzogs longs
spyod pa'i ming / /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten gyur cing / /de ni rigs rjes dran zhes bya/ /rten 'byung las skyes rdzogs sangs te/ /bud med lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /brtan pa'i sems
ni thob pa las/ /rang gi khu bas mchod par bya/ /dngos med bdag nyid dag pa gang / /de ni dag par bshad pa yin/ /de nyid kyis ni mchod par bsngags/ /shes rab pha rol phyin
pas 'gro/ /'di yis lus la mchod pa dang / /khyad par du ni de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin bshad de bzhin thugs/ /chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs/ /sku gsung thugs ni
yang dag grub/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /gang bshad rigs ni dman bshad pa/ /de la'ang tshul de grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid mchod par bshad pa nyid/ /de bzhin so sor
rab tu brtag /mi phyed rdo rje'i sbyor ba yang / /gsung gi dbang bskur ba nyid gsal/ /dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/ /gang zhig sems ni ma rmongs pa/ /mkha' la gnas
pa'i nyi ma bzhin/ /de ni ci dgar spyod par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba ste/ /sngags spyod pa ni mchog gyur pa/ /le'u bdun par rab tu
@#/ /bstan|| //de nas dpal ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /dkon mchog dpal ni 'od chen po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /bla ma rdo rje gsum
gyi bdag/ mgon po rdo rje 'dzin chen po/ /dbang phyug dbang phyug dam pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi ston pa la/ /bstod pa 'di yis gsol ba btab/ /nam mkha'i spyod pa rdo rje
mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' thub pa che/ /theg pa chen po'i rnam snang ba/ /kun tu bzang po brtul zhugs bzang / /dngos kun dngos po gcig pa'i mchog /rigs mchog thams
cad yang dag 'byung / /rgyal ba'i dam pa'i mchod pa'i mchog /mchod pa'i kun mchog bshad du gsol/ /'dod chags chen po zhe sdang che/ /gti mug chen po blo gros che/ /
theg pa gsum po rab ston cig /rdo rje theg pa ston pa po/ /nam mkha' gcig pu dngos po'i mchog /ye shes rgya mtsho bla ma che/ /rdo rje gsum po chags med pa/ /rgyal gnas
mchod par bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje gsum po lam gyi mchog/ /thar lam gcig bu ston pa po/ /sangs rgyas skal mchog shin tu dag/ mi mchog mchod pa bshad du
gsol| |dngos po kun gcig shin tu dag /byang chub sems ni rgya mtsho che/ /chos kyi 'khor lo gcig bskor ba/ /rten 'brel ye shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje gsum gcig rnam
dag don/ /sna tshogs sangs rgyas bya ba mdzad/ /bdag med med chos shin tu dag /phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /thams cad nam mkha'
mi 'gyur che/ /thams cad dbang bskur kun dbang po/ /kun don rin chen mchog 'dzin pa'ang / /na chung mig yangs btsal nas ni/ /gzugs dang na tshod rnams kyis brgyan/ /lo
grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa/ /rnyed nas mi yi skye gnas brtag /rnam par dben nam gtsang ba yi/ /sa phyogs su ni rgyal bdag nyid/ /zhi ba zhi ba'i gnas yid 'ong / /bshad gci chu yis
byugs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster ba'o/ /rtag tu mchod pa nyid bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yi/ /phung po zhes bya sna tshogs skyes/ /rdo rje gsum po mi phyed
khams| |rgyal ba zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /kun mkhyen ye shes lang tsho ste/ /len pa mi gsal la sbyor la/ /de nyid na chung yin par brtag /'jig rten pa rnams 'thob byed rgya/ /'gro
ba'i don ni rab grub pa/ /gang zhig dngos med ces bshad pa/ /mtha' skyes bzhin du brtag pa yin/ /gtsang ba rnam dag sems yin te/ /rnam par dben pa dngos med pa/ /sa
ni spyan zhes bya ba yin/ /sa phyogs rgyal ba 'byung ba yin/ /zhi ba sna tshogs nges 'byung ba/ /zhi ba'i gnas ni myur la sogs/ /bshad gci yul dang dbang por grags/ /chu ni
@#/ /shes rab la sogs drug /'di dag gis gang byugs gyur pa/ /rdzogs longs spyod pa'i 'dod 'byung ba/ /de dag rgyal ba'i chos bshad pa/ /dgongs pa sbyor
ba chos nyid do/ /mchod pa'i yan lag gnyis pa yi/ /bkod pa'i yan lag mtshan nyid bshad/ /'jig rten shin tu 'das spyi 'o/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i snying ga ru/ /rkang
pa'i bar dang lte ba dang / /rked pa gsang ba 'jig rten pa/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi bkod pa ni/ /rigs ni lnga po bya ba yin/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /ye shes
rgya mtsho rnam par bsgom/ /bdag nyid zla ba'i nang gnas par/ /brtul zhugs can gyis snying gar bsgom/ /chu de sbyor bar gyur pa ni/ /mA ma kI ra ni yongs su brtag /zhi ba rdo
rje 'dzin 'dod pas/ /bsdu ba de yang rab tu bya/ /rin chen rang bzhin mchod rten ni/ /'od zer sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum pa/ /gnas de ru
ni bsam bya ba/ /blo ldan pa spu'i bu ga las/ /ji lta ji ltar spro bar bya/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mchog gzhol bas/ /mchod pa'i sprin ni des spro bya/ /gos dkar pad+mar
yang dag dgod/ /rnam lnga gcig la rnal 'byor ma/ /me yi sbyor ba bshad pa ni/ /de yang mi gsal zhi la gnas/ /sgron mar ut+pal nyid gyur pa/ /rlung ste sbyor ba lnga pa'o/ /
'jug dang gnas dang skye ba dang / /de bzhin ldang ba'i ming can no/ /de nyid rnam pa gsum byas pas/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas/ /de nas blo ldan gyis dbul ba/ /lha rnams
kyi yang dngos med nyid/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs ba mchog /khyab bdag rnam snang chen po las/ /me tog dgongs pa thos nas ni/ /rdo rje can gyis thub chen zhus/ /me dang rlung dang
dbang chen dang / /chu ru yongs su brtags pa yin/ /re re'ang dang po sbyor zhes bya/ /me tog de lnga gsum du bshad/ /bya rgod me tog za ba dang / /bung ba sha za zhes zer zhing / /me
tog 'di yi dgongs pa ni/ /ma 'ong skye thobs mi shes so/ /ma rtogs pas ni de rnams kyi/ /dngos grub ring du gnas par 'gyur/ /'di ltar bdag ni skal min zhes/ /smra zhing de
rnams bdag nyid smod/ /de ltar bdag nyid kyis smad pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad smad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad smad gyur pas/ /mi las 'das nas gzhan du
'gro/ /gtso bo sangs rgyas nang na min/ /phyi rol na min gnyi gar min/ /tshogs pa las ni ma yin te/ /rkyen gyis 'gro ba dag la gnas/ /de bzhin de bzhin gshegs sangs
rgyas| |lus la gsang sngags 'di nyid las/ /gsang sngags 'grub par dka' ba'i rgyus/ /des ni bdag dang de dag smod/ /de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ /dgongs pas de ni
@#/ /bshad du gsol/ /rang gi ngo bo ma 'tshal na/ /mkhas pa dag ni nyams par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/ /gsang ba'i bdag po la gsungs
pa| |nyin dang mtshan mo dbye ba yis/ /me tog don ni bshad par bya/ /pad+ma ut+pal nyin mor bshad/ /dzA ti mtshan mo yin zhes bshad/ /lnga yi bdag nyid gsum dang gcig/
gnyis lnga gcig dang gsum du 'gyur/ /de yi thabs ni nyin mor bshad/ /mtshan mo shes rab ces bshad do/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis/ /mjug tu 'byung ba nyid du
'gyur| |de gnyis dbus kyi sbyor ba gang / /dgongs pas yongs su brtags pa yin/ /de ni sangs rgyas snying por 'gyur/ /de bas lha tshogs kyis de min/ /rnal 'byor pa dang
sngags pa rnams/ /dgongs pa'i chos la rab brtson bya/ /dgongs pa byin brlabs rgyu yis ni/ /de rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rlung ni bcur grags pa/ /de ni pad+ma
ut+pal med/ /de nyid ces grags rdo rje gsum/ /dzA ti gcig pu gsum du 'dod/ /kar ni ka dang ma li ka /yug ti kA ra bI ra ni/ /go rim bzhin du spyan sogs te/ /sa la sogs
par 'dir sbyar ro/ /dngos med go 'phang la bkod pas/ /lha rnams kyi ni skur sbyor bas/ /gcig tu sangs rgyas kun mnyes pa'i/ /mchod pa chen por de 'gyur ro/ /lnga po'i bdag
nyid yang dag gzhag /lnga bcu dag ni nyis 'gyur bya/ /de nyid gsum sbyor 'khor lo ni/ /dpag tshad brgya yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /der ni mkhas pas rtag par ni/ /rigs rnams rab tu
dgod par bya/ /pad+ma 'khor lo rdo rje dang / /de bzhin ut+pal rtag tu bsgom/ /dpag tshad bzhi po sbyor gcig pa/ /dpag tshad rgya khyon de nyid gsum/ /byams pa la sogs gru bzhir 'gyur/ /
mdzes pa phung pos brgyan pa yin/ /gru bzhi de ni rigs su gyur/ /zhi ba sbyor ba gcig ming can/ /mchod rten ye shes sems rang bzhin/ /gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med/ /rigs
rnams mchod phyir de nyid ni/ /shes rab can gyis gnas bsgom mo/ /mngon shes lnga yi gnas 'dod rnams/ /de yi mchod pa rgya mtsho gsal/ /rin chen ye shes spro bdag nyid/ /gos
ni bsdu ba zhes bya'o/ /mchod pa mchog rnams de dag gis/ /byang chub 'dod pas mchod par bya/ /shes rab can gyis mchod mchog las/ /lha rnams rtag tu mnyes par bya/ /sbyor
gcig de las yang dag byung / /rin chen 'byung gnas na chung yin/ /dga' mgu yang dag ldan pa yin/ /dngos grub shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /nga rgyal la sogs bdun zhes bya/ /rin chen
thams cad dbul bar bya/ /chos dang rdzogs longs spyod las byung / /rin chen bdun gyi nor de ni/ /des bkang ba yi zhing 'di ni/ /shes rab thabs gcig las byung ba'i/ /dngos grub
@#/ /'dod pas sbyin ba'i phyir/ /zhing de nyin re dbul bar ni/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa'i/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin 'dir 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas
dkyil 'khor dbus su de/ /phyag rgya'i bdag por mnyam bzhag ste/ /'dod chags blo ldan sangs rgyas la/ /reg par yang dag sbyor ba dbul/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus
gnas par/ /bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsgom/ /bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /yul dang dbang po sun 'byin pa/ /dngos med gcig par yang dag 'byung / /
yul dang dbang po zhes bya ba'i/ /bshang gci ji lta ji lta bar/ /de nyid mchod pa rnams kyis mchod/ /skal bzang bzhin ni mdzes pa yi/ /bud med gzugs bzang rnyed pa dang / /
gsang sngags yi ge'i gnas 'gyur bas/ /rnal 'byor ma de byin brlabs la/ /byas nas gnyis med sbyor gcig pu/ /rang gi lus kyi nang du gzhug /spyan sogs ji lta ji
lta bar| |byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas bkod de/ /mig bzang dag pa'i bya ba yi/ /rang byung khu ba blangs nas mchod/ /gang zhig de ltar rtogs pa de/ /blangs pas rdo rje 'chad
bar 'gyur/ /sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang / /spyan la sogs par rab brtags pa/ /de ni 'jug sogs sbyor ba yang / /de ni khu ba za bar 'gyur/ /'di ni sngags rnams
thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste/ /rdo rje ye shes can gsang gi /gsang sngags dngos grub byed pa'i mchog /rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog /dgongs pa lung
bstan la gnas nas/ /gang zhig sems ni bzod gyur bya/ /de ni ji bzhin nyid du'ang byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsung gi gsang ba las/ /bshang gci'i dam
tshig ces bya ba'i/ /le'u brgyad pa yin par bshad// //de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gtso/ /thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog /
gzugs don dbang phyug dam pa yin/ /rdo rje gsum nyid longs spyod pa/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor/ /sangs rgyas ye shes sbyor gcig pa'o/ /gsang ba nyams ni dga' bar
bshad| |nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje rtse gcig rdo rje yang / /sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/ /'od 'phro mang po 'bar
ba dang / /'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang / /dus gsum sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung / /bsgoms la rdo rjes phye mar brlag /rdo rje gsum gcig longs spyod ni/ /rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur
pa'i| |thugs kyi dngos grub byed bsam gtan/ /bsgoms na myur du thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje mchog ces bya ba yi/ /rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bu/ /rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /sems can
@#/ /thams cad bsad na ni/ /de ni myur bar mi bskyod pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur/ /zhe sdang rigs chen de nyid kyis/ /zhing de 'gengs par byed par
'gyur| |de nas dgongs pa chos gcig pu/ /gtso bo kun mkhyen thams cad rig /dam tshig de nyid gsungs pa yi/ /mgon la phyag na rdo rjes gsol/ /'di ltar dngos med mchog
gyur pa| |khyod ni chos rnams ston mdzad pa/ /'jig rten pa dang 'gal tshig gis/ /mgon khyod ci phyir ston par mjed/ /gang zhig de bzhin nyid dngos gcig/ /dus gsum byung ba'i
sangs rgyas rnams/ /chos sku gcig pu las 'khrungs pa/ /ji ltar rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ de ni phyer brlags gyur pa las/ /ji ltar yang dag sems 'grub 'gyur/ /chos sku
gcig pu las byung las/ /lhag pa zhes bya gyur nas su/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /phye mar brlag par ji ltar nus/ /phyer brlag byed pa mdangs med pas/ /
phye ma nyid kyang khyad par du/ /sangs rgyas sngags don rnal 'byor pa/ /nus pa bsam mi khyab ldan la/ /de 'dra bar ni phyer brlag par/ /sngags pa gzhan gyis mi nus so/ /sems
can gyis ni sems can bzhin/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyer brlags pas/ /'di gnyis khyad par med do zhes/ /ma 'ongs skye bo smra bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas gcig pu mthar
thug pa| |min zhes mi rnams nges smra zhing / /gang zhig sangs rgyas kyis gsungs bzhin/ /rab tu spong bar byed par 'gyur/ /theg bzang bsgrubs na 'tshang rgya ba/ /dgongs pa'i bum
pa bzang po mchog /de ni bcom ldan myur sbyor bas/ /mi bskyod zhing du skye 'gyur ram/ /sems can 'khor bar 'khor gyur ba/ /de tshe zhe sdang che skye 'am/ /snying rjes gsad par
bya'o zhes/ /sngags pa rnams ni de mi spong / /'das tshe ston par gyur pa dang / /da ltar rjes su ston mdzad dang / /mnyes bya ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams/ /sangs rgyas byang chub stsol
ba'o| |mi bskyod gzugs can rdo rje yis/ /de rnams ji ltar gzhom par bgyi/ /de nyid sna tshogs don ldan tshig /de rnams kyis ni ji ltar rtogs/ /gang zhig shes pas rgyal sras
rnams| |dgongs pa'i don la rtog med 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs skye bo'i don du ni/ /de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra ba'i/ /'gro la phan pa'i tshig gsan nas/ /de nas
gtso bo rdo rje 'chang / /khyab bdag gis ni slar gsungs pa/ /legs so bu khyod cher legs te/ /kun tu bzang po khyod legs so/ /dgongs pas bshad pa'i don du ni/ /khyod kyis nga
la gang dris pa/ /gsungs don ji lta ji lta bar/ /de ni nga yis bshad par bya/ /phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas sems can rab brtan zhing / /sngags dang phyag
@#/ /rgya'i sbyor ba yang / /dbye ba sna tshogs rab tu brtan/ /'khor ba mi bskyod ming can te/ /de'i sngags rdo rje zhes bya ba/ /mi gsal rdo rje zhes bshad de/ /dngos med
gcig pu rdo rje nyid/ /des bshig pa ni bsad pa ste/ /sangs rgyas sems can khyad par du/ /sna ni tshogs kyi dbang po yi/ /kha ni rang bzhin nyid du g.yo/ /rnal 'byor pa yi lag
gyur pa/ /'gro ba rlung gi ming can no/ /mi bskyod rdo rje'i spyod pa nyid/ /lag tu rdo rje bzhag nas ni/ /de tshe myur la sogs bya ba/ /klu yi rang bzhin sna tshogs nyid/ /phung sogs
brtags pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku gsung thugs las yang dag byung / /de yi yan lag phung por bshad/ /de ni phyer gyur bsad pa yin/ /'di ni zhe sdang rigs yid 'ong / /mi
bskyod ye shes rdo rje nyid/ /de bzhin skye ba dam pa yin/ /dngos grub chen po des 'thob 'gyur/ /de nas dpal ldan bde chen po/ /ye shes thar pa rab sgrub pa/ /rang bzhin dag
gis gos med pa/ /byang chub spyod pa rab sgrub pas/ /phyag na rdo rje 'od chen po/ /gsang ba gsum gyi gtso bo la/ /bos nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sgrub pa'i dam tshig de
nyid gsungs/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa la/ /rnam par snang mdzad bsgom bya zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bsgom/ /
rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis/ /rdzas rnams thams cad dbrog par bya/ /shes dang dbang po ldog par 'gyur/ /rnam
smin dngos po med pa yi/ /de nyid dbrog pa'i rdo rje dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub pa'i/ /rin chen rdo rje mchog sbyor ba/ /rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur ba dang / /nor gyi rgya mtshos gang
ba yi| |yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur/ /'di ni gti mug rigs de nyid/ /dam tshig yin par yongs su bsgrags/ /rigs kun rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ /de las thub pa'i skyes mchog
'gyur| |de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /'dod chags thar par rab 'jug pa/ /gsang ba dag pa gnas med pa/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
dbus gnas par/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /dpag med chos ni rnam bsgoms te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang / /bud med lta bu'i sbyor ba yang / /ting nge 'dzin
gyi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad de ru bsgom par bya/ /'di ni rdo rje tshul mchog yin/ /dngos med bsam pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gsal mi gsal la yang dag sbyar/ /chos dang rdzogs longs
spyod sbyor ba/ /gsang sngags kyis sprul dbang po gnyis/ /sbyor ba bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor ba'i/ /snyoms zhugs sbyor ba de yis ni/ /de dag thams cad nye
@#/ /bar spyod/ /sku gsum mi phyed sngags rnams kyi/ /'di ni sgom pa mchog de yin/ /de nyid dam tshig sbyor ba 'di/ /'dod chags rigs gcig sgom pa'o/ /
'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog ste/ /sngags pa rnams kyis nyin re zhing / /rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya/ /de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsum//
rdo rje sngags don sgrub pa po/ /bdag med ye shes las byung bas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
bsgom par bya/ /don yod rdo rje rnam bsgoms te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje tshig gi rdzun smra ba/ /rgyal ba thams cad slu ba ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi| |nam mkha'i gsung ni dri med pa'o/ /gang zhig brdzun du smra bshad pa/ /rdzun de nyid ni dam pa ste/ /dpa' bo gang zhig sgom byed pa/ /de ni rgyal ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /
gsang pa'i ye shes dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub byed ba'i mchog /dam tshig 'gugs par gang gyur pa'i/ /rigs kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'o/ /kun tu kun nas 'bab
pa yis| |ji bzhin don du drangs byas te/ /so sor rtog pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de ni dngos grub rgya chen 'thob/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum rgyal bdag /rdo rje'i
dngos grub rab ston pas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /der ni dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas sku ru rab brtags pa'i/ /
dam tshig de ni yang dag bshad/ /dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms te/ /gzugs rnams kun gyis sa 'di gang / /phung po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun
gyis thams cad du/ /rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni/ /sa rnams dman pa zhes bya ba'i/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes/ /bcom ldan thub pas de skad gsungs/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa kun bkod pa/ /sna tshogs gzugs can 'od po che/ /bsam pas dpal ldan gcig pu nyid/ /dpag tu med par gyur ba yin/ /de nas gang zhig dam tshig sogs/ /
chos dbyings rdo rje gsum nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /dam tshig rdo rje dpal la sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas ni/ /
tshig lam rdo rje zhes bya 'di/ /de ni de rnams rjod par byed/ /ci 'di mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /gang zhig khams gsum las 'das shing / /
'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyi/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /ngo mtshar che ba'i tshig
@#/ /gi lam| |gtso bo'i yang dag rdo rje'i tshig /dgongs pas ci slad gang gsungs zhes/ /brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang / /brjod mi lang ba rnams kyis gsol/ /
de nas de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/ /brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang / /brjod kyis mi lang grangs kyi ni/ /ri rab rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
dang / /dam tshig rdo rje dpal sogs pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen la/ /dngos med las byung gsal ba gsungs/ /dman dang smad pa'i 'du shes ni/ /rgyal ba'i sras
rnams ma skyed cig /ci'i phyir zhe na de bzhin gshegs/ /'byung ba gang 'di spyod mchog yin/ /'di ltar sngags kyi spyod mchog 'di/ /rnam par dag yin rigs kyi bu/ /sangs
rgyas mnyam med 'byung 'gyur 'di/ /gsang ba'i sngags don spyod pa nyid/ /'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu/ /nam mkha' kun tu song ba ste/ /chos rnams kun kyang der rtogs
shing / /rab dbye'i sbyor bar gyur pa nyid/ /'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas shing / /da ni gzugs kyi khams mi gnas/ /de bzhin gzugs med khams na'ang min/ /'byung ba bzhi
la de mi gnas/ /rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang / /de ltar don gyi dbang mkhyen nas/ /dgongs pa'i dbang gis rgyal ba rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams dgongs nyid kyis//
chos rnams ston par mdzad pa yin/ /de bzhin du ni khyed rnams kyis/ /mdor na khong du chud par bya/ /yang dag byang chub don rnams kyis/ /nam mkha'i nges tshig sbyor bas ni/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sbyor ba byung / /dam tshig rjes su rig par bya/ /'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu/ /gtsub shing gtsub stan bcas pa dang / /skyes bu'i lag pa bskyod pa yi/ /rkyen las du ba 'byung
bar 'gyur/ /de nas me yang 'byung mod kyi/ /gtsub shing la sogs re re nas/ /'di ltar so sor brtags na go /me de gang na'ang mi gnas so/ /brag ca dang ni gzugs brnyan dang / /sgyu ma
dang ni smig rgyu dang / /de bzhin chu zla rmi lam ste/ /chos rnams thams cad de dang 'dra/ /mgon po pi wang sgra lta bu/ /rkyen don las tshig yang dag byung / /de bzhin 'gro 'od gnas pa
rnams| |cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin/ /gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gnas pa nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin/ /des na khyed kyis rdo rje yi/ /dam tshig rjes su rig par bya/ /
de ltar chos rnams dngos med ces/ /gsang ba'i de nyid don mkhas pas/ /rnam par smin pa ldog bya'i phyir/ /phung po de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
rnams| |ngo mtshar rmad du byung nas ni/ /ngam pa yis ni mig gdangs te/ /tshig ni 'di skad ces gsol to/ /chos 'di ngo mtshar rmad byung ste/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa yi/ /mi rtog
@#/ /rnam par dag pa yang / /kun rdzob tu ni bshad bar mdzad/ /dam tshig chen po yang dag gnas/ /dgongs pa lung ston mchog la ni/ /gang zhig yid 'ong
bzod gyur pa/ /de ni de bzhin spyod pa yin/ /mchog tu ngag pa'i de nyid don/ /gsang ba chen po zhes bya ba/ /dam tshig tshul ni yang dag bshad/ /le'u dgu pa rdzogs pa yin// //
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /rdo rje gsum 'byung bcom ldan 'das/ /slar yang dgongs pa 'dus nas ni/ /bla ma chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /dam tshig rdo rje de nyid gnas/ /
mngon par byang chub ded dpon nyid/ /sku dang gsung thugs gtsang gtso la/ /btud de de bzhin gshegs pas gsal/ /snying po sngags ni kun bsdus pas/ /gsang ba yang dag rdo
rje gsum/ /dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol/ /gsung gcig
du ma'i rnam par rtog /yang dag bsdus don de bzhin gsungs/ /de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso/ /'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas/ /gsung
ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje gsum/ /sku dang gsung thugs sgom pa ni/ /mnyam zhing rnam par mi rtog pa/ /dmigs pa med cing gnas med pa'o/ /de nas
mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /pha rol phyin pa sngags tshul gyi/ /rdo rje zhes bya'i ting 'dzin la/ /dpa' bo chen po snyoms zhugs te/ /da
bzhin gshegs kun la gsungs pa/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'di ni/ /mgon po mi bskyod la sogs pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa du ma
dang / /rig pa bye ba khrag khrig ni/ /brgya stong du ma zhes bya dang / /sems can don bya la rol par/ /mchog ni de rnams ston par mdzad/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams mchog tu/ /
'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pas/ /rol cing dgyes par gyur pa dang / /yongs su spyod pa yod kyang ni/ /sngags spyod pa la brtson rnams la/ /kye ma dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs/ /rang
gtso gsang sngags spyod tshul mchog /chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /'di dag rdzogs par gyur mnyam nas/ /spyan ras kyis ni 'tsho mi mdzad/ /de ltar rnam par spyad pa'i
don| |gsang sngags brtul zhugs spyod rnams la/ /yang dag par ni byin brlabs phyir/ /de ni ston par mdzad 'di yin/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog /thub la phyag na
rdo rje gsol/ /mgon po de bzhin gshegs de rnams/ /so so skye bor gyur pa la/ /dngos po med cing dmigs su med/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam gyur nas/ /'dod pa'i
@#/ /yon tan ldar ldan nas/ /ji ltar de rnams rol par mdzad/ /de rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du/ /nges par gyur ba'i 'khor rnams dang / /sems can
don gyi bya ba kun/ /'dod pas ston par mdzad pa yin/ /mgon po 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams/ /sbyin sogs drug ces bya bar 'byung / /thams cad dag kyang de nyid 'byung / /pha
rol phyin par mnyam bzhag nyid/ /de ltar pha rol phyin 'byung ba'i/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan/ /'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba yang / /'dod pa lnga po 'di yis mdzad/ /'di
rnams kyis ni mgon po 'di/ /mi bskyod la sogs rgyal ba rnams/ /rol cing dgyes par mdzad pa dang / /'gro ba'i don kyang mdzad gyur cing / /'jig rten pa dang 'gal bya
rnams| |de yang de bzhin mdzad gyur pa/ /dag pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog 'di/ /de rnams kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /phyag byar 'os pa'i rigs pa ni/ /nges par ldan pa nges par
'dod| |yod med la sogs byed pa ni/ /nyis 'gyur mtshan ma can du 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu lam du chos gsungs pa/ /gang zhig 'jig rten phung po lnga/ /khams la sogs
par mtshon pha gang / /gzugs sogs zhes bya'i ming can yin/ /'di ni yan lag thams cad ni/ /bya ba nyan thos theg pa'o/ /de nyid rkyen gyi theg pa ste/ /tshig de ston par mdzad
pa 'di/ /gang zhig rdo rje theg par gnas/ /de bzhin ji bzhin sgra ru 'dzin/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa la/ /nges par 'byung ba'i tshul gsum po/ /chos sku ngo bo la sogs pa/ /
mkha' dbyangs mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa/ /gnas med gnas par sbyor ba yis/ /'gro ba'i snying du rnam rol pa/ /zhi ba gcig la gnas pa'i mgon/ /'khor ba dang ni gcig
shos spangs/ /sngags las yang dag 'byung ba de/ /mi bskyod la sogs par brtags rnams/ /dngos med gnas la gnas pas na/ /sgrub pa po rnams gzigs mi 'gyur/ /
gsang sngags rkyen gyi sbyor ba yis/ /de ni rdzogs longs spyod gzigs 'gyur/ /bcom ldan gsang ba gsungs pa 'di/ /don de 'tshal bar ma gyur pas/ /rnam rtog du ma'i kun
rtog las/ /chos nyid de yis shes mi 'gyur/ /ji skad gsungs pa mi shes pas/ /phyi dus skye bo la la smra/ /'jig rten pa rnams drang bya'i phyir/ /gsang bar gyur pa bstan du gsol//
de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/ /lag na rdo rje grags pa che/ /dgongs pa'i don ni rtogs gyur pa/ /bu khyod shes rab chen po legs/ /gang zhig shes pas ma 'ongs pa'i/ /skye bo
rnam par mi rtog 'gyur/ /tshig gcig la yang sna tshogs don/ /yang dag bsdus nas khyod kyis bshad/ /de nas dam pa bcom ldan 'das/ /bla ma kun mkhyen thams cad rig /
@#/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag la/ /spyan ras kyis ni 'tsho bya'i phyir/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mchog /sku gsung thugs kyi
rdo rje yi| |gsang ba yi ni mchog gi gnas/ /snying po sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /bskul ba gcig pu zhes bya ba/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gsang gcig pu/ /mchog
las mchog tu gsungs gyur pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yang dag rtogs/ /dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs/ /dam tshig la ni dmigs pa
dang / /chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs/ /dam tshig la dmigs de bzhin no/ /nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/ /tshig lam nges par brjod pa ni/ /de nyid sngags su
yang dag bsdus/ /sna tshogs gsung ba gzugs gcig pu/ /yi ge hUM ni gcig gsungs la/ /de nas yi ge oM gsungs te/ /de bzhin mgon pos yi ge AH/ /swA ni de
bzhin bzhi pa yin/ /hA yang 'dod lhar gyur pa ste/ /de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas lnga/ /hUM oM AHswA de bzhin hA/ /'di ni gsungs pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas
pa kun| |rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar 'gyur/ /de rnams gnyis med sbyor la gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran/ /zhi ba'i sbyor bar chos gcig pa'i/ /rnam par mi rtog
chos gcig skyes/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de yang / /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po yis/ /de yi byin rlabs sbyor don du/ /dam tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i
dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /dkyil 'khor bkod pa zhes bya ba/ /re re'ang gsum gyi sbyor ba yis/ /sgom pa'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya/ /bye brag gsum po gcig brtags pa'ang //
bkod pa mi gsal ba nyid do/ /zla ba'i dbus gnas yi ge hUM/ /rang gi gzugs gcig rab tu brtag /rdo rje 'od zer rab 'bar ba/ /rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams
kyi sku gsungs thugs/ /snying la de yis rnam bsgoms nas/ /dpal ldan de nyid skad cig der/ /rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang chen gtso/ /'di ni kun mchog chen
por skye/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskyed bya ba/ /sngags kyi cho ga dam pa'o/ /snying po rang gi rdo rje sngags/ /rdo rje bsdus pa zhas bshad do/ /rang sngags tshul las byung ba 'o/ /skyes bu'i
gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /sbyor ba bzhi po sbyor gcig pus/ /gnas bzhi dag tu de dgod do/ /kha dog gsum po zhal gsum lta'i/ /de nyid gsum gcig rnam bsgom zhes//
bcom ldan 'das mchog nam mkha' ni/ /rdo rje dam tshig gtso bos gsungs/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog /zhi ba'i bdag nyid thub pa che/ /gtso la phyag na rdo rje yis/ /
@#/ /gsang ba 'di ni slar zhus pa/ /hUM oM AHdang swAhA zhes/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs gyur bas/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/ /de nas rab 'dar brgyal
gyur cing / /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pa/ /thub chen de 'dir ji lta bur/ /mgon po de ni phyi dus na/ /ji skad gsungs pa mi rtogs pa/ /gcig pu mkha' mnyam sangs rgyas
dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen rnams/ /rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal 'gyur zhes/ /byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs so/ /lan brgya stong dang bye ba yi/ /grangs dag tu ni ston
mdzad cing / /ston pa sna tshogs ston mdzad kyang / /'dar zhing brgyal bar de ma gyur/ /ma 'ongs dus na'ang 'byung 'gyur ba/ /mi \u0f72 mkhas pa yi nga rgyal can/ /bla ma'i lung ni blangs nas
su| |rtags ni rang nyid 'dzin par byed/ /de ni sngags don gsungs pa yi/ /mtshan nyid gsang 'di mi shes par/ /sngags don de nyid mkhas pa yis/ /gzhan rnams la ni mi snyan
sgrog /'khrul ba cung zad tsam mthor na/ /bzhad gad dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /reg na dug dang mtshungs pa yi/ /mi de zhi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig yid ni rin chen 'dra'i/ /'gro
la phan pa'i sngags pa rnams/ /'di ni ma 'ongs dus su yang / /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /de rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ /skad cig rjes gsung grub don du/ /sbyor
bar dgongs pa'i bsam pa can/ /bcom ldan 'di ni bshad du gsol/ /de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ /'gro phan phyag na rdo rje la/ /de ltar sbyar ba yang dag sbyor/ /sgom pa'i dngos
po rtogs byed pa/ /dbang po nyi ma thub pa nyid/ /gang zhig phyogs bcur gnas pa rnams/ /sras bcas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyur/ /phung po la
sogs grangs mnyam pa'i/ /lus las skyes te yod pa 'di/ /stong pa'i rkyen du sbyor ba las/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas gyur 'dod/ /sngags de sngags pa sangs rgyas de/ /bdag
nyid de sras yang dag sbyor/ /zhi sogs mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las/ /zhi ba'i bde ba de nas brtsam/ /bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis dag cing / /rang bzhin dri ma med byas la/ /dal dang myur
dang gnas pa yi/ /sna tshogs de gcig dag la gzhug /yid dman rim la sogs pas kyang / /sbyor ba de nyid dag la gnas/ /de nas dbang po med gyur pa/ /gang tshe zhi ba'i bde gcig
pu| |rang bzhin dag pa'i sbyor ba ste/ /de yi chos ni lta ba po/ /de nas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sngags/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam las byung / /gang phyir rang ni zlo gyur pa/ /yi ge hUM gi
gsang sngags lnga/ /de tshe snying las rab 'dar cing / /dbang po thams cad brgyal bar 'gyur/ /gang yang phung sogs yan lag ni/ /sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /de nyid kyi ni
@#/ /grangs mnyam pa'i/ /rnal 'byor ba yi lus rab 'dar/ /nye bar mtshon sogs tshig rnams ni/ /phung po la sogs bshad pa gang / /sangs rgyas sras
bcas par gyur te/ /de ni brgyal zhing 'dar bar 'gyur/ /de gnyis la ni snyoms 'jug ba/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid dran te/ /de sngags
bdag nyid dngos las byung / /de 'dir mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje gsang ba rmad byung pa/ /phra mo'i snying gang dbus gnas par/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam pa 'o/ /de yi
dbus gnas zhi ba yi/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsam par bya/ /de hUM zhes bya'i 'od po che/ /de yongs gyur pa'i rdo rje ni/ /'di ni mchog gyur rtse lnga pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu
bsgom| |rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gsum ni bsam par bya/ /de yi snying gar bsdams nas ni/ /lha rnams rab tu bskul bar bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /
rdo rje thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /'khor lo pad+ma'i rigs sogs pa'ang / /rol mo 'di ni dam pa ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rnam bsgoms nas/ /snying ga ru ni bskul bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje
yi ni tshul mchog 'di/ /zhag bdun par du byas nas ni/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang / /rdo rje gsum po yang dag sgrub/ /phung po la sogs sangs rgyas gang / /de ni dngos po med
lta ba| |de nyid mchog gi gsang sngags kyis/ /skrag pa rnam smin mthong ba la/ /skrag ba mi rnams 'di dag ste/ /gsang sngags gnyis med sbyor gcig byung / /mthong bas skrag ste
mchog ster cing / /'di dag 'di nyid brtags pa yin/ /zhi ba gcig pu'i sbyor ba las/ /sngags lus rdzogs pa nyid gyur nas/ /yid la mgu zhing dga' gyur pa'i/ /dngos grub rgya
cher ster bar 'gyur/ /phung bo la btags sangs rgyas dang / /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /sngags kyis sbyor ba'i don sgrub pas/ /rmongs pas 'da' ba byas nas ni/ /de yi
srog ni der zad 'gyur/ /zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor gcig las/ /'di ni 'jig rten 'das pa mchog /de las ldog pa 'jig rten pa'o/ /de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /'jig rten
gsum gtso ston pa po/ /'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtsos/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /gang zhig sngags kyi skyes bur bshad/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes gzugs/ /
de ni dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i/ /gcig par sgom pa rtag tu byed/ /bdag dmigs sems can yod min pa'i/ /sngags kyi dbang po rnam sgom pa/ /dbang po gnyis sbyor bzang po ste/ /
dngos bo thams cad rnam brtags pa'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sngags kyi dam tshig mchog sgom pa'o/ /rang gzugs rdo rje yang dag sbyor/ /rig ma dbang phyug bdag
@#/ /kyang bsgom/ /gnyis med gnyis su med chags pa/ /lta ba dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro/ /gsang ba zhes bya der sbyar ba/ /de nyid mnyam pa'i bdag nyid do//
de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ /thams cad dbang bskur dam pa ni/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum grub pa/ /gsang ba'i dgongs pa bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyor
ba yis| |phung po bdag nyid mi dmigs pa/ /chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i rim/ /bud med de ni rgya chen 'gyur/ /rab tu sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /'gro ba'i bud med ces bya ba/ /
gsang sngags de nyid don gsang nyid/ /de ni gsang bar nye bar spyod/ /der ni yid 'ong sangs rgyas rnams/ /bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin/ /sngags rig dam pa spro 'o zhes/ /
der ni bcom ldan gtso bos gsungs/ /byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig ni/ /ston pa 'dir ni bla ma cher/ /'jig rten pa la 'dir bshad de/ /'jig rten 'das pa ldog pa'o/ /
nam mkha' lta bu'i byang chub ni/ /'di yis shin tu 'thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems kyi yon tan mtsho/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog des 'thob/ /dgongs pa lung bstan
gsang ba la/ /gang zhig sems ni dad gyur pa/ /gsang ba 'bad de de yang dag bsrung / /de ni rtag tu legs par byed/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
kun gyi yang / /de nyid bskul ba zhes bya ba/ /le'u bcu pa yin par bshad// //de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje gsum mchog mchog gsang ba/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa kun mchog gcig/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga mchog ces bya'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje yis/ /sngags rig skyes bu zhes bya ba'i/ /
le 'u 'di ni bka' stsal to/ /sngags mchog de ni phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bsgom/ /rtogs dang bri ba 'thob pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje ye shes dag gis kyang / /tshangs pa la
sogs yang dag bshad/ /ye shes snying po dam pa ste/ /rdo rje gsum sogs bshad gyur pa/ /sku yi rdo rje 'thob byed pa'o/ /a dang zung na gsung rdo rje/ /byang chub bdag med 'thob
byad pa'o/ /hUM ni rdo rje gsum mtha' nyid/ /sku gsung thugs ni 'thob byed pa'o/ /de ni 'jug pa sogs gnas nyid dong / /ldang ba dag tu rab tu bshad/ /nyi shu lnga sogs ming can
gyi| |skyes bu'i gzugs su 'di 'gyur ro/ /de bas re re'ang gsum nyid de/ /rdo rje gsang sngags nyid du gyur/ /brjod med sa bon brgyad pa las/ /de ni nam mkha' las brgyal 'gyur//
brgya phyed rlung ni gcig bu la/ /de las nges bar nyi shu lnga/ /skyes bu nyid du byung ba na/ /mgrin bcu zhes bya'i ming can dang / /sgra sgrog gsod pa'i dga' byed 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs pa
@#/ /gcig nyid gyur/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po ste/ /'jug ba la sogs rim du bshad/ /'di dag bsnyengs med de gcig pu/ /de ni zhi ba dngos med nyid//
de las kyang ni yang dag 'byung / /longs spyod rdzogs sku dam pa'o/ /de nas sngags gcig sprul pa las/ /'gro ba'i don gyi bya bar 'gyur/ /mtshams dang skye mched nor
lha 'o| |zla ba zung gcig rig byed de/ /de la sogs pa'i grangs gyur rnams/ /de ni rig pa'i skyes bur gnas/ /'di rnams las gcig bzung nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rol mo
bstan par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid 'di/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam/ /dkyil 'khor brgyan pa zhes bshad pa/ /yi ge b+h+rUM ni des bsam mo/ /rdo rje sprin ni spro
bskyed pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi sku/ /de dbus gnas ba'i rnal 'byor par/ /sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/ /sngags rnams kun gyi gtsug tor ni//
sngags kyi skyes bu gsang ba pa/ /gcig pu nyid ni bdag por 'gyur/ /sngags spyod don ni sgrub pa po/ /chos la 'khor lo gcig 'khor lo mchog /rgyal dang rmad byung che
gtsug tor/ /lus dang rnam par rgyal de bzhin/ /bya ba mchog tu yang dag bshad/ /sbyor dang bya ba gnyis med bzhin/ /sbyor ba 'ba' zhig nyid la 'di/ /b+h+rUM ni gtsug tor
chen por bstan/ /ye shes rdo rje snying po 'di/ /dus sbyor gcig gi ming can no/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam nyid ldan/ /sngags kyi skyes bu dngos grub stsol/ /rdo rje'i dkyil
'khor dbus gnas par/ /oM zhes bya ba de ru bsgom/ /phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yi ge AHni rnam par bsgom/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la'ang / /yi ge
hUM ni de ru bsgom/ /yi ge bruM ni gnas ming can/ /rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid de/ /rdo rje gsum 'byung bka' stsal to/ /snying po dus gsum
sangs rgyas kyi/ /rdo rje gsum ni mnyes byed mchog /sku dang gsung thugs thog ma mtha'/ /oM AHhUM gi grangs dang mnyam/ /sangs rgyas sku mchog gsung gi lam/ /thugs kyi ye
shes 'jings su bya/ /rang nyid 'don pa nyid du ni/ /re re zhing ni yang dag bshad/ /sngags kyi skyes bu'i sbyor ba yang / /rgyu yi bdag nyid ming can yin/ /byang chub tshul mchog
'di yin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje ye shes sprul ba ste/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob byed pa'o/ /sngags kyi rig pa zhes bsgrags pa/ /'di ni sangs rgyas skyes
bu yin/ /rdo rje gsum mnyam mi phyed pa/ /rdzogs pa la sogs sgom pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje ni/ /gsum po ye shes rdo rje stsol/ /byin rlabs dpal chen zhes bya ba'i/
@#/ /dam tshig ting 'dzin gyur pa yin/ /rnam par dben dang ci rigs pa'i/ /stan dag la ni sbyor ba bzhi/ /rig pa'i skyes bur yang dag sbyor/ /brtul zhugs
can gyis kun tu brtsam/ /thabs dang shes rab nyi zla phyed/ /thun gcig tu ni rab tu brtag/ /de yi phyed nyid zla phyed kyis/ /rdo rje gsum ni nges par 'grub/ /'jig rten 'das
pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /'jig rten pa'i yang phyin ci log /rdo rje gsum sbyor stsol dngos grub/ /'grub par 'gyur ba the tshom med/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /phra
mo'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig dus/ /bskyed pa yi ge oM bsgom bya/ /sbyor ba bzhi yi gtan tshigs gang / /snying por yongs su brtags pa yin//
sna rtse dang ni rtsa ba nyid/ /spyi bo mtha' ni dga' ldan gnas/ /gcig dang gsum gyi dngos por 'gyur/ /dag pa'i gnas kyi grong khyer ba/ /phyed pa gsum gyi ming can ni/ /rigs
kyi dbye ba rdo rje gsum/ /sna yi rtse mo sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gsum sbyor brtul zhugs can/ /mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo/ /sgrol ma gtogs pa sangs rgyas spyan/ /'od zer lnga yi
sprin chen po/ /rnam par snang mdzad gnyis med gnas/ /rdo rje rnam snang de las ni/ /dngos grub rgya chen stsol bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sku yi 'od 'dra ba/ /skad cig der
'grub rnal 'byor pa/ /ye shes lnga po bsten nas ni/ /rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/ /ye shes 'das dang ma 'ongs dang / /da ltar byung ba rdo rje gsum/ /de 'dir bskal bar brtags
gyur pa| |grangs med ces bya de nyid do/ /sku yi gsang ba de nyid 'di/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i rim par gsungs/ /zhi ba'i bde las shes bya ba/ /rang myong sbyor ba gcig las
de| |sku yi gsang ba mchog 'di ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs/ /rdo rje 'od zer bkod pa yis/ /ting 'dzin yang dag bka' stsal to/ /a dang u ni lkog ma'i
dbus| |rkan gyi steng gi ming can no/ /i dang tsa ni lag g.yon nyid/ /u dang mu ni g.yas par brtag /ri dzu 'di ni gsang bar dgod/ /li ti rkang pa gcig shos la/ /dkyil
'khor gcig ni de nyid do/ /dkyil 'khor lnga las rgyal gyur pa/ /ha ni lus skyes gtsug tor dang / /gcod ni gsum po gcod pa can/ /yon tan bzhi yi bzhi po de/ /lnga po'i
lnga par de 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje gcig phyed sbyor/ /de ni 'od zer lngar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa chen po de nyid 'di/ /cha zhes bya bar de yongs bsgrags/ /dus can bdag nyid
sbyor dbang po/ /de yi rang sbyor gzugs can gcig /a ni thabs 'gyur sbyor ba ni/ /dbang po gnyis po gcig tu 'o/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor
@#/ /mchog bsam pa/ /rang sngags skyes bu bsams nas ni/ /AHni ngag gi lam du bzhag /kha dog lnga yis kun nas ni/ /brgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po dag/ 'jig
rten dbang phyug mchog sgom pas/ /dam tshig ye shes bsgom par bya/ /gsung gi dam tshig spros par bshad/ /khyab bdag mi zad rtag pa ste/ /thog mtha' med pa'i mthar
thug pa| |zhi ba mya ngan 'das zhes bya/ /chos kyi gsung las rnal 'byor dbang / /rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/ /rdo rje gsum gyis bskal bar
gnas| |gsung gi gsang ba 'di nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs/ /dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ /ting nge 'dzin du yongs su bsgrags/ /nam mkha' rdo rje
dbus gnas mchog /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /der ni rang sngags skyes bu dag /hUM ni sems la gnas rdzogs bya/ /dam tshig chen po de nyid can/ /kha dog rnam lnga
bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /ston pa rdo rje'i thugs 'dra ba/ /yang dag ye shes yon tan mtsho/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni//
rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/ /lkog ma rkan dang de nas mchu/ /spyi bo sa yi ming can te/ /rdo rje gsum thugs gsang ba gcig /de nas haM las zhugs pa yis/ /de bzhin
gshegs kun ye shes ni/ /dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba/ /rdo rje ye shes gcig las byung / /ting 'dzin gsang bar bshad pa yin/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje
chen por bsam nas ni/ /lus kun la ni khaM dmigs na/ /rdo rje ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /dngos po med don gsal byed pa/ /khaM nyid kyis ni thams cad bshad/ /rlung gi rkyen dang
kun sbyor las/ /khaM du'ang 'gro bar gyur pa yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /yang dang yang du mchod pa dang / /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas/ /gnyis med lhun
gyi ngo bo nyid/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid sbyor ba/ /so so ru ni yang dag gnas/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dam tshig che/ /chos rnams des ni mi gzigs so/ /sangs rgyas kun ni gnyis med
dang / /mi snang 'di yi dam tshig yin/ /dngos po med pa'i gnas thob na/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs so/ /sku gsung thugs las yang dag byung / /mi snang rdo rje gsum 'di
yin| |de yi bkod phreng zhes bya ba/ /ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag gsungs/ /ma 'dres pa yi chos bdag nyid/ /sku dang ldan pa'i 'od po che/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /rang
sngags skyes bu bsam par bya/ /haM ni rdo rje bzhir bshad pa/ /snying ga ru ni yaM mdzes pa/ /rtag tu sbyor bas gzhug pa ni/ /'od zer rnam par bsgom par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi longs
@#/ /spyod ni| |'jam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje can/ /sa bcur rab tu gnas na ni/ /dgongs don de tshe kun tu byung / /ye shes nyid ni zla ba 'di/ /byang chub sems
dpa' rdo rje can/ /snang ba can zhes bya ba yis/ /ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /th+l+hIM ni 'bar ba'i 'od bzang ba/ /mtshon cha mchog
ni rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /'di ni rdo rje mkha' 'dra sbyor/ /dam tshig bkod pa'i gnas gyur pa/ /ting 'dzin dam tshig mi snang ba'i/ /th+l+hIM ni yang dag 'byung ba bshad/ /
sangs rgyas mngon par shes gnas pa/ /dam tshig tu ni yang dag bshad/ /mngon shes lnga dang 'dra ba 'di/ /de ni skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog
sgrub pa| |'di ni dam pa yin par bshad/ /de yi dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub chen po sgrub pa'i mchog /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil
'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i mchog bsgoms la/ /yi ge oM ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di/ /yi ge oM ni mi zad gtso/ /'di ni mi phyed
sbyor ba yis/ /bsgoms bas mi bskyod 'dra bar 'gyur/ /mi bskyod pa yi dam tshig mchog/ de sku byang chub rdo rje can/ /ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad/ /de ni skyes bu dam
pa yin| |mi bskyod mtshungs pa'i sku dang ni/ /gsung thugs rtse gcig 'dzin pa las/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje can gyis mchod par 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor brgyan pa bsam/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms te/ /de nas rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/ /dkon
mchog dpal dang 'od 'dra zhing / /dkon mchog gsum dpal mtshungs pa yi/ /bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal 'dra zhing / /sku gsung thugs sbyor rdo rje yis/ /ye shes gsang ba'i
gnas su 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dpag med las byung ba/ /rdo rje ye shes 'dzin de 'gyur/ /longs spyod dam tshig ces bya ba/ /rin chen rdo rje gcig tu 'byung / /de nyid gsum gsang
dgongs pa las/ /rin chen rdo rje de gnas 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la
der ni chos kyi oM bsgom mo/ /chos kyi oM ni de tshe yang / /rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje dpag med 'dra ba ni/ /bcom ldan dpag med rdo rje can/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje
yis| |dpag med tshe dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po lam gyi mchog /'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa/ /ye shes rgya mtsho dpal dang ldan/ /'gro don gcig tu 'byung bar 'gyur//
@#/ /don yod pa yi dam tshig mchog /sems can don ni sgrub gyur pa/ /'od zer ye shes mchog ces bya'i/ /ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad/ /sems can
khams ni ma lus pa'i/ /longs spyod kun tu 'gyur ba yi/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /de ni rnam snang rdo rjer bshad/ /
'od zer de ni rab tu bsgom/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i yi ge oM/ /'od chen der ni rab tu bsgom/ /de nas 'di ni rdo rje gsum/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de ni bcom
ldan mgon pos bshad/ /rnam snang rdo rje can de yin/ /rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor las/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od/ /de nyid ye shes rdzogs byang chub/ /rdo rje sku
gsum sgrub pa po/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdzogs byang chub/ /de la dmigs pa'i rdo rje can/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba nyid sbyor ba/ /'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o/ /tshig gcig la
ni sna tshogs don/ /sngags kyi de nyid gsal gyur pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog la/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ni/ /gsang dgongs rdo rje zhes bya ba/ /thub pa che la
slar yang zhus/ /oM A hUM ni gsum la sogs/ /b+h+rUM sogs thog mar gnas pa yis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sngags kyi skyes bur de 'gyur ro/ /oM ni rnam snang rdo
rjer 'gyur/ /AHni 'jig rten dbang phyug gtso/ /hUM ni rdo rje sems dpar bshad/ /skyes bu rdo rje can du 'gyur/ /b+h+rUM ni gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /khaM ni nges par mi snang ba/ /haM ni
'jam dpal yang dag bshad/ /k+ShaM ni rdo rje bkod ces bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rin po che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dngos grub stsol/ /de bzhin mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /oM la
sogs pa lnga las skyes/ /oM AHhUM ni de nyid gsum/ /rnam snang rdo rje can gyur pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje grags/ /shin tu rnam par nges par bshad/ /gsang sngags dkyil 'khor
rnal 'byor pa/ /lnga po bco lngar yang dag bshad/ /khrag gi sbyor ba las byung ba/ /gsang sngags skyes bu zhes bya ba/ /gsang sngags chen po'i sbyor ba yang / /ting 'dzin skyes bu dam
ba yin| |sna tshogs sngags don de nyid 'gyur/ /phyag rgya gcig par dkyil 'khor te/ /de dag gsang bar bshad pa ni/ /dgongs pa gcig las yang dag 'byung / /dga' ba gcig
cing dga' ba'i ming / /de dag ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur/ /mgon po rkyen dang bral ba'i mi/ /pi wang sgra ni mchis ma lags/ /de bzhin phyag rgya med pa ni/ /gsang sngags dngos grub
mi 'byung ngo / /brda gsum gyi ni de nyid 'di/ /gang gi don du rab gsungs pa/ /lag pa'i sbyor bas rab bsgrubs pa'i/ /phyag rgya ji ltar gnas par mdzad/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor
@#/ /ba ni| |phyag rgya gcig pu'i sbyor ba dang / /gsang sngags gcig pus mi 'grub ces/ /khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad/ /'dir ni sngags sbyor
gcig pu las/ /phyag rgya bstan par ma mdzad na/ /gsang sngags gcig skyes dngos grub ni/ /'jig rten pa rnams ji ltar sgrub/ /sngags la dmigs pa'i sbyor gyur pa/ /lha rnams
kyi yang sbyor las byung / /'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das pa zhes bya dang / /yang na shin tu 'jig rten las/ /mgon po
'jig rten pa rnams kyi/ /ji ltar de la 'gro phan 'gyur/ /spyan dang pa dang gshegs su gso/ /'dir ni ji ltar legs par brjod/ /gang gis 'dir ni dngos grub 'grub/ /
lha rnams mngon phyogs ji lta bu/ /'di dag ma 'ongs skyes bo yis/ /gang zhig shes na yang dag par/ /nges par rnam rtog med 'gyur ba/ /me yi skyes bu 'di dag gsungs/ /de
nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ste/ /phyag rgya'i nges par 'jig rten pa'i/ /phyag na rdo rje la gsungs so/ /rnam rtog sna tshogs lcags zhes bya//
nyes pa gsum tshogs bdag nyid las/ /gsang sngags skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /de ni mi mchog dag tu 'gyur/ /gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa yis/ /lcags ni gser du byed pa
yin| |de bzhin sngags kyi de nyid kyis/ /mi ni bder gshegs byed pa yin/ /nges byas sbyor ba'i gsang sngags ni/ /zhi bde dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya med pa'i sngags
gcig pus/ /sngags kyi skyes bur 'gyur ba yin/ /dngos med pa las yang dag skye/ /sngags kyi skyes bu 'byung ba ste/ /'di ni phyag rgya chen po ste/ /'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o/ /spyan
drang bar ni bzhugs pa yis/ /myur ba yis ni gshegs su gsol/ /gnas pa yis ni de sgrub pa'o/ /yid ston dngos grub dam pa yin/ /de ni skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya
che dang gcig sgrub las/ /myur ba la sogs gsum ldan pa/ /de ni phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /'bad de bla mas slob ma yi/ /rna ba'i drung du bshad par bya/ /myur ba dang ni 'jug
pa dang / /gnas pa'i rjes su sbyor ba rnams/ /spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol/ /'di dag phyag rgyar yang dag gyur/ /sgrub pa la ni myur la sogs/ /ci rigs ba ni nges par
sbyar| |phung po la sogs chos rnams kun/ /stong zhing rten 'brel las byung ba/ /mthong zhing de bzhin sbyor ba las/ /chos kyi skur ni de gnas 'gyur/ /'dir ni gsang sngags sbyor
'gyur med/ /phyag rgya'ang chos sku 'di nyid yin/ /de lta na yang 'gro ba'i don/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byed/ /'on te rdo rje 'dzin gang zhig /sbyor ba gsum dang ldan pa'i mi/ /
@#/ /spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol/ /de bzhin du ni gnas gyur pa'o/ /nye ba'i tshig ni spyan drang ba/ /ring nas lag par rab tu sbyor/ /de bzhin gsang sngags
de nyid kyang / /gnyi ga la ni yang dag sbyor/ /rigs kyi dbye ba sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya bud med yin par bshad/ /sems kyi rkyen sbyor bdag nyid ni/ /'jig rten pa ni rab tu brtag/
rang gi mtshan mar yang dag sbyor/ /rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgyas sa gsum la gnas pa/ /sa 'og klu yi bu mo yang / /brtul zhugs can gyi sems kyis dgug/
gzhug pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni/ /de rnams gnas pa'i sbyor ba nyid/ /dngos med de nyid gcig pu yis/ /'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya/ /gzhan yang gsang ba pa yi mchog/
sems kyi rkyen ni nyid ltos dang / /dngos med byang chub 'thob pa la/ /gsang sngags med cing phyag rgya med/ /'jig rten na ni rtog ci rnyed/ /dus gsum du ni kun 'byung ba/ /de ni
dngos med sems gcig las/ /rnal 'byor pas ni skad cig rtogs/ /byang chub kun rdzob ma yin la/ /de las gzhan du'ang rnyed mi 'gyur/ /gnyi ga las min gzhan las
min/ /mun pa'i sgron ma mtshungs par 'gyur/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis sngags/ /gsang ba 'di ni rab ston te/ /de ni sgrub dang bsgrub bya dang / /rnam par mi rtog brtags
pa 'o| |sems can kun gyi longs spyod du/ /sngags kyi skyes bu rab tu gnas/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /rnam par dben par rab tu brtag /gsal dang mi gsal yang dag
ldan| |klung dang 'bab chu la sogs yin/ /mya ngan 'das pa gnas sbyor ba/ /dur khrod la sogs pa yi ming / /'di ni sngags rigs mchog rnams kyi/ /bsam gtan bsdus las
spyod pa 'o/ /'jig rten 'das pa de nyid 'dir/ /'jig rten pa ni ldog pa'o/ /mi bskyod ye shes la sogs pa/ /rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam/ /mngon shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /
sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su bsgom/ /rdo rje mngon shes rdo rje che/ /dam tshig mchog tu bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje chen po rab mdzes pa/ /rtse lnga pa la de bzhin 'bar/ /rang bzhin lnga ru
sbyor ba yis/ /mngon shes lnga por 'gyur ba yin/ /mngon shes lnga yi ting 'dzin la/ /gnas nas bla na med pa brtag /gtso bo me stag mang po 'khrug /rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom
par bya| |rdo rje la ni rab dgod pas/ /rdo rje mngon shes skye bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /'khor lo rdo rje 'bar 'od 'dra/ /sangs rgyas 'jug par rab bsgoms na/ /
sangs rgyas mchog dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /lus la rnam par snang mdzad bzhag /snying gar yi ge oM bsams nas/ /sngags la mngon
@#/ /shes sgom par 'gyur/ /'gog pa rdo rje gyur pa'i sems/ /nam zhig bdag nyid bdag las skyes/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog 'byung ba yi/ /dpal ldan yid
bzhin nor bur 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /der ni mi bskyod rab tu bsgom/ /hUM ni snying ga'i zla gnas par/ /bsams la sems ni de ru bzhag /sangs
rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /tshe dpag med pa rab tu sbyor/ /A ni snying ga'i thig ler gnas/ /bsams la rdo rje'ang yang dag bzhag /'di ni dgongs pa'i mchog gi
mchog /rdo rje mi phyed gsum sbyor skyes/ /'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub cher 'byung ba'o/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil
'khor bsgom par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM/ /bsams na bskal pa gcig tu gnas/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par
bya| |lus dang ngag sems yi ge AH/ /bsams na bskal pa dag tu gnas/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /lus dang ngag sems
yi ge hUM| |bsams na de ni bskal par gnas/ /bcom ldan bdag po rdo rje gsum/ /dam tshig rtog pas de skad gsungs/ /dbus mtha' can gyi yi ge 'di/ /sngags kyi skyes bu
mchog tu 'gyur/ /brjod du med cing ming med la/ /shes dang shes bya rnam spangs pa'ang / /kun rdzob la ni legs gnas na/ /tshig gi sngags su 'di brjod do/ /rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje can| |rnal
'byor 'dir 'gyur phyin chad ni/ /gang zhig klog gam sems kyang rung / /rdo rje ye shes lta bur 'gyur/ /ji ltar gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po/ /dgongs pa lung ston 'di gyur pa/ /
sangs rgyas kun gyi de lung ston/ /khyad par du yang byin gyis rlob/ /klog cing sgom dang ldan par ni/ /bris nas gang du 'jog gyur pa/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rigs skyes
rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur/ /khams gsum thams cad bcom nas ni/ /myur bar de bzhin gshegs 'gyur zhing / /'khor los bsgyur ba'i bu bzhin du/ /byang chub myur du des 'thob
bo| |khams gsum sku dang gsung thugs kyi/ /sngags pa'i yan lag gyur pa ni/ /sangs rgyas 'dus la brten pa yis/ /de ni dngos po med par 'joms/ /dngos med gcig pu rdzogs
longs spyod/ /phung sogs yan lag don las byung / /bde gshegs sems can spangs pa ni/ /sngags pa sngags las gyur pa yin/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rang mtshan nyid/ /skad gcig
kyang ni 'dor mi byed/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /rigs las skyes la byin gyis rlob/ /dgongs pa lung ston la gnas nas/ /gsang ba'i rin chen yang dag bsrung / /mig gzugs
@#/ /rang gi ngo bo nyid/ /spyod pa ci dga' byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni/ /gsang ba'i dgongs pa'i ming can te/ /sku dang gsung thugs gsang
ba dang / /gsang sngags dam tshig de nyid byung / /de ni rig pa skyes bu mchog /bcu gcig par ni yang dag bshad/ /ras ni bris dang mtshungs par 'byung / /'thob pa'i phyir ni le'ur
gyur|| ||de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /skyed pa ye shes bla ma gtso/ /de nyid dam tshig mchog gyur pa/ /rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal to/ /mkha' dang mtshungs shing mi rtog
la| |rang bzhin gyis ni dam chos can/ /dngos med shin tu dri med la/ /dam tshig gcig tu gyur kyang ni/ /gar dang glu dang rol mo dang / /dgod dang sgeg pas rab mdzes pas/ /
'jig rten sangs rgyas gar mkhan gyi/ /rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom/ /gzhon nus bsgrubs pa'i sems can ni/ /ji lta ji ltar ston pa bzhin/ /gar sogs rtsed mos byang
chub ni| |myur du de nyid las 'thob 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan ba/ /de yi ming ni yid ldan pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gnas/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs
rgyas 'gyur/ /sems can gang 'di mthong ba dang / /thos shing reg par gyur pa ni/ /de ni u dum ba ra yi/ /me tog 'dra bar gyur pa yin/ /sems can kun gyi gtso bo 'di/ /gsung
gi rdo rje chos nyid skyes/ /gcig dang du ma las grol ba/ /rten 'byung gsal bar byed pa yin/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag mchog de/ /chos kyi de nyid rab ston pa/ /thub chen rnam par
snang mdzad la/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas zhus/ /mgon po de nyid bsdus pa las/ /rol mo 'dir ni gyur pa dang / /'jig rten pa de gar byed pa/ /gsungs te ma 'ongs skye bo ni/ /chos
dbyings de ni gar min na/ /gtso bo ji ltar gar bgyid lags/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan gar/ /gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba yin/ /chos dbyings de ni glu min na/ /gtso
bo ji ltar glu len 'gyur/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan glu/ /gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/ /chos dbyings de ni rol mo min/ /gtso bo ji ltar rol mor 'gyur/ /'jig
rten rgyad pan rmongs rol mo/ /gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/ /chos dbyings de dgod ma lags na/ /gtso bo ji ltar rgod par 'gyur/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan rgod/ /
gsang mthon myos pas bskul pa lags/ /chos dbyings de sgeg ma lags na/ /gtso po ji ltar sgeg par 'gyur/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan sgeg /gsang mthon myos pas bskul
ba lags/ /de ltar rnam pa mang po la/ /gzhan rnams kyang ni sbyor byed cing / /bza' dang min las sbyor ba yis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni bdag yin snyam/ /rdo rje yi ni tshig mchog 'di/ /yod
@#/ /med rab tu zhi ba nyid/ /de yi rang bzhin gcig sbyor bdag /yang dag mchog bsdus de nyid mchog /de nas de nyid yang dag gzung / /rnal 'byor rigs mchog
rnal 'byor pa/ /de nyid gsum mnyam nyid sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rol mo ston/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis rnam dgod pas/ /nor can ming ni nyams la sogs/ /gcig pu'ang
dpag med dngos bshad pa'i/ /gar gyis skye rgu dga' bar byed/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sogs dngos grub/ /sna tshogs khyed kyis gsungs pa rnams/ /sems zhi ba yi rnal
'byor pa/ /de rnams lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/ /mgon po shes rab 'di srid du/ /thabs kyis mchil bar nye bar sbyor/ /sngags kyi gzan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /khyed ni 'jig
rten pa rnams 'dzin/ /bshad du zin kyang mi rig pa/ /dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ni/ /gzhan rnams la ni ston mdzad pa/ /ngo bo nyid ni gzhan min pa'o/ /phyi rol sngags don
dngos grub ni/ /de nyid du ni tshol mod kyi/ /'gal ba'i rjes 'jug chos nyid can/ /der yang 'grub par 'gyur ma yin/ /de rnams gsang ba mi srung zhing / /sred pa yis ni ston
par byed/ /bcom ldan 'das gsung gsang ba ni/ /gsang mchog tshig gis sgrog par byed/ /khyod bka' las 'das dman pa rnams/ /sngags kyi nus pa rnam spangs pa/ /
'jig rten pa rnams sdang 'gyur zhing / /de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ma yin/ /sred pa'am dad pa dag gis kyang / /rkyen dang de bzhin nyan thos rnams/ /gsang ba la ni smig rgyu bzhin//
rigs skyes gzhan yang ltung bar 'gyur/ /mgon po de ni der gnas shing / /nyams shing blo gros dman par gnas/ /de nas tshig min gyur par 'byung / /tshig gi bdud rtsi sbyor ba las/ /
chos kyi tshul 'di thos pa dang / /phyi nas 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' ltung 'gyur bar/ /bdag nyid che de byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin byang chub 'gyur ba dang / /
sngags pa rnams kyang gsang ba lags/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /gsang ba mdo sde rnam smra ba/ /gdong g.yogs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /de tshe tshig gis rig skyes pa/ /gsang
sngags la sogs chos rnams la/ /dad pa rnams ni skyed mi byed/ /log pas mkhas pa'i nga rgyal ni/ /byis pa phyi nas byed par 'gyur/ /a yi dog pa'i ras 'di ni/ /sbyor shes
rnams kyi 'di ma yin/ /de rnams dad pas rjes 'jug pa/ /gtam dag kyang ni byed par 'gyur/ /sgyu ni g.yo yi tshul gyis na/ /rgyal po rnams ni slu bar byed/ /steng du g.yogs pa dag
gis ni| |brgyad gnyis pa la tshul du byed/ /de ni ma skyes pa yi bdag /ras kyi rgyu med pa nyid ni/ /AHyi dog ras nyid rgyal po'i/ /yang dag dngos grub byed pa'i mchog /dam pa'i skye ba
@#/ /nyid mthong na/ /de ni longs spyod lam skyed min/ /de bas skye bo med gcig pu/ /bya ba'i sems ni rab tu 'jug /der ni mche ba can mi 'gro /de la btsal ba
'ba' zhig yin/ /rgyal po dngos grub chen po'i ras/ /bar chad shin tu mang po pa/ /bya ba de ni rnam par 'joms/ /sgrib pa med pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /de ni tshig de thos pa dang / /rgyal
po'i bar du yid dga' zhing / /dngos grub chen po'i rigs mchog las/ /su zhig bdag ni zlog par byed/ /ras kyi bar chad byed pa dag /de la chad pas gcad par bya/ /'di la
'jigs pa'i sems bor la/ /skye bo med par khyed kyis ni/ /rgyal rigs dag gam rigs bzang ngam/ /gang zhig mi srun rigs can rnams/ /dog pa med pa ras 'jig pa/ /de
dag thams cad brlag par bya/ /de nas rgyal po sbyin pa ni/ /rgyud kyi slob dpon bdag nyid che/ /rin chen rin thang med lnga sogs/ /bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu 'o/ /'di yis
gdong ni g.yogs nas su/ /rgyal po 'bras bu longs spyod cig /AHyi dog pa ras de byin/ /ji ltar skye bzhin rgyal po byas/ /rin chen rin thang med blangs rnams/ /'di ni
ji ltar bzhag nas su/ /de nas de ni mi snang ba/ /rgyun can des ni de tshe byas/ /de la sogs pa'i sna tshogs tshig /rigs skyes pa la de rnams smra/ /rang nyid 'jigs shing gzhan
rnams kyang / /skrag par byed cing the tshom med/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /'byin pa ston ba mnga' bdag gtso/ /phyag na rdo rje go byed pa/ /snyan pa'i gsung gis bka'

stsal pa| |rdo rje rdo rje chen po legs/ /rdo rje thal mo bstan byas te/ /rdo rje 'di ni zhus gyur pa/ /de nyid bsdus pa dam pa 'o/ /rdo rje thal mo de nyid 'di/ /lung bstan bya yi de nyon cig /de nyid
gsum du gyur pa de/ /rdo rje thal mor yongs su brtag /de nyid gsum ni lha gsum ste/ /tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /de ru nga ni lha gsum 'gyur/ /oM AHhUM dang grangs mnyam
pa'i| |gsang sngags 'jug pa thams cad ni/ /sna tshogs lus can gcig ming can/ /zhi ba nyid ni gang du ston/ /der ni nga yang gnas pa yin/ /dpral yon de la bzhin mi sdug /de yi
skyes bu ming ldan ming / /de rnams lag pa'i dbus nas ni/ /mtheb sogs ji bzhin grangs su bshad/ /lag pa g.yon ni drag por 'gyur/ /g.yas pa de bzhin khyab 'jug ste/ /gnyis
po sbyor ba tshangs pa yin/ /de bas yon tan gsum bdag dang / /rig dang mchod sbyin snyan tshig ste/ /rig byed der gyur gsum du bshad/ /srid srung zhi ba nga yin te/ /mthar ni 'gro ba
gnas pa yin/ /lag pa gnyis pa 'di dag ni/ /bzhi po'i phyed phyed rnam brgyad pa/ /phyed po'i tsam gyi haM mchog ni/ /rab tu zhi bar rab tu bsgrags/ /nyi ma zla ba mi rnams der/ /so so
@#/ /yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /yi ge phyed tsam mchog gyur dang / /shis pa zhi ba skyon med pa/ /yon tan oM dang yi ge phyed/ /oM zhes gsal bar brjod pa yin//
sna yi rtse mo ra yang dag ldan/ /gtsug mtha' dang ni lag par gnas/ /nyi ma zla ba'i sbyor ba las/ /ye shes me ni nges par skye/ /lce dang rkan gyi mtshan ma ni/ /sbyor las thar par
de bshad de/ /AH/ 'og tu a dang yang dag ldan/ /de steng yi ge AHnyid de/ /thad ka ru ni ma bshad de/ /khyod ni yig phyed zhi ba nyid/ /yi ge oM ni tshangs pa ste/ /AHni khyab
'jug yin par bshad/ /hUM ni rlung du gyur pa yin/ /de nyid drag po zhes bya 'o/ /zhi ba'i phyed phyed ces bya ba/ /der ni bdag yongs bsgrags pa yin/ /gnas dang 'pho dang skye ba
dang / /gzhan gyi lus las yang dag 'pho/ /ye shes rang nyid me yin te/ /khyab par 'dzin pa de bzhin no/ /ral gri la sogs dngos grub der/ /byang chub phyi rol nyid 'grub
'gyur| |gnyis po 'di dag gnas pa yi/ /rnam dag 'di dag rab tu brtag /tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams der/ /ma 'ongs pa rnams sgom par 'gyur/ /de ni mtho ris sogs
'gag pas/ /de bzhin 'byung ba sem pa yin/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams sogs spangs nas/ /gnyis spyad par ni rnam par gnas/ /shin tu sbyor gcig gyur song bas/ /'jug
'gyur pa ni drag po yin/ /nam mkha' dgag pa'i sbyor ba yang / /tshangs par gzhol ba'i bdag nyid can/ /mngal gyi gzugs gyur khyab 'jug ste/ /de yi dbus na dbus bzung
ba| |spu yi cha ni stong las gcig /zhi de rnam par mi rtog nyid/ /thar pa gcig pur de ston bya/ /thar pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/ /de lta bas na 'di log bya/ /zhi ba nyid ni sgrog pa 'o/ /ston
pa de rnams phye nas ni/ /zhi ba'i chos rnams smra bar 'gyur/ /thabs chen de bzhin shes rab dag /'di 'dra mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshangs la sogs pa'i lha rnams kun/ /khyed
kyi thal mo dag la gnas/ /de rnams phyag rgya ston byed cing / /sngags ni bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /'di nyid du ni nyi zla dang / /sbyin sreg las can me dang ni/ /lo dang zla ba'i sbyor ba dang / /
rtag tu 'char dang 'phel 'grib dang / /de nyid gsum gyi sbyor skyes 'di/ /de nyid gcig pu rnam par gnas/ /zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor chos la/ /de yang gcig dang du ma spangs/ /khyed kyi thal mo
las byung ba/ /de bas de ni 'da' mi bya/ /de bzhin gshegs kun spangs 'gyur bas/ /de ni spangs bar mi bya zhing / /'di dag dngos med la ltos pas/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mchog tu 'dod/ /
gzhan du rnam rtog nyid las ni/ /dngos grub 'bras bu'i snod mi 'gyur/ /de bas thal mo sbyor ba 'di/ /sems can rjes bzung dam pa yin/ /ma bsdus pa yi sems can rnams/ /
@#/ /bsdu ba'i don du khyod kyis bya/ /smad bya 'on pa lkug pa dang / /de bzhin long bar gyur pa dang / /gang zhig 'phye bo la sogs gyur/ /de rnams la ni phan phyi'o
bya| |de la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa/ /de ni khyed kyi thal mor gnas/ /de ni 'jig rten 'das gtsor gyur/ /de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyu can no/ /de ni nang min phyi ma yin/ /gnyis min
gzhan gyi rgyu las min/ /phyag rgya tshogs pa las skyes min/ /'jig rten rkyen las byung ba min/ /rdo rje thal mo bsdams pas na/ /ming ni rdo rje thal mor gyur/ /sems can rnams
kyis rtogs dka' ba'i/ /snying po brtag par bya ba'i mchog /phyag rgya 'di lta bu 'di yin/ /phyi nang gnyis kyi ming can no/ /mi bskyod rin chen dpag med de/ /dngos grub rnam snang
de bzhin gshegs/ /'di dag lag pa g.yas pa yi/ /mthe'u chung la sogs rnams la gnas/ /gnyis por gcig gyur dge 'dun te/ /de 'di skyabs ni gsum yin te/ /sangs
rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams/ /gcig dang gsum du brtags pa yin/ /phan tshun bcings pa'i rdo rje nyid/ /shes rab thabs kyi gnas mchog yin/ /thal mo bcings pa tsam
gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas thams cad nyid thob 'gyur/ /skyabs mchog gsum dang de nyid gsum/ /rdo rje gsum dang rnam thar gsum/ /zhal gsum mdog gsum spyan gsum
dang / /lha gsum dang ni khams gsum dang / /dus gsum dam tshig mchog gyur gsum/ /tshul gsum dkyil 'khor gsum du 'gyur/ /sbyor ba gsum dang lam gsum ste/ /ji
srid rtogs pas brjod pa rnams/ /de ni thal mo sbyor 'di yin/ /'dod nor yon tan gsum gyi mchog /rim dang bslab pa ster ba dag /ma 'ongs skye bos 'thob par 'gyur/ /de nyid
du ni der 'gyur na/ /gcig dang du ma rnam par spangs/ /chos bshad bshad pa dngos med pa/ /'gro ba rkyen gyis yang dag sdud/ /'di ni mkha' ltar rang bzhin gcig /gnas med
gnas pa zhes bya ba/ /bsdu ba byas par gyur pas kyang / /sku gsung don gyi chos nyid do/ /'di ni thog mtha' med pa ste/ /dngos po med cing gnas med pa/ /mtha' med zad pa med par
'byung / /sku gsung thugs kyi rkyen las ni/ /rnam pa'i 'jug pa'i ye shes te/ /de las sangs rgyas snying por gyur/ /hUM gis sems can yang dag 'byin/ /sangs rgyas skur ni rab tu brtag/
oM ni thams cad sdud pa ste/ /AHni gnas pa por 'gyur ro/ /gcig pu rnam gsum de bzhin lnga/ /gsal dang mi gsal sbyor ba ni/ /rten 'brel chos nyid 'di yin te/ /de nyid kyi ni
sngags bshad pa'o/ /zlos na bsam gtan rnam bral bar/ /de yi lhun grub 'bras bu ste/ /rang bzhin grub pa 'di yin te/ /'dod pa'i bzlas par de bshad do/ /rnal 'byor pa la de
@#/ /gsal te/ /byis rnams de la phyin ci log /rkyen las byung ba de nyid gsum/ /dngos po med bar de bshad do/ /de nyid bsdus pa bshad pa ni/ /yid min pa yi
bzlas par 'gyur/ /yid ston gcig ni mdor bsdus las/ /rings dang dal dang gnas pa rnams/ /zhi ba'i chos nyid la skye ste/ /nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par thim/ /dngos po
med pa'i de nyid 'di/ /rten 'byung chos zhes bya ba yin/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bsdus te gyur/ /sprul pa bsam mi khyab ces dben/ /sdud pa po ni gang gyur pa/ /de yang phul du
gyur pa'i ming / /rdo rje la sogs yang dag sbyar/ /sems can rnams ni de sbyor byed/ /dam tshig la sogs sngon de ni/ /de nyid kyis ni rdo rje sbyar/ /sems can dgongs pa'i sbyor ba
yis| |de yi chos rnams ston par byed/ /rnam pa dgu po thog mtha' can/ /sdud pa po rnams byas pa yin/ /gsang sngags de nyid gnas dgod pas/ /sems can rnams ni der
'jog ste/ /gsol ba 'debs dang phyag 'tshal dang / /'jig rten rnams la gsol ba dang / /rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams mnyes byed de/ /khyod kyi thal mor gnas pa yin/ /
gang zhig sems can sangs rgyas gyur/ /de bzhin gnyis med chos nyid can/ /gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad sangs rgyas rnams gnas so/ /sna tshogs
mtshon pa de nyid do/ /mthong ba gsal byed thal mo yin/ /de bas de rnams mgu gyur pa/ /chos kyi de nyid rkyen las so/ /rgyu med rang gi de nyid 'di/ /khyed kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor las byung //
gang zhig shes pas 'dod 'grub pa'i/ /dngos grub des ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /AHnyid der ni mi gsal ba'i/ /rgyu las sbyor bar gyur pa yin/ /dog par de ni yongs bshad de/ /dngos
