po med par ras kyi ming / /'phags pa gshin rje gshed bsgoms la/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs su'ang bsgom par bya/ /dog pa de yi ras don las/ /mi snang ba la sogs grub cing / /yid
bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i mchog /'gro ba'i don gcig yang dag byung / /AHyi dog ras mtshon pas ni/ /'jig rten pa la dgongs pas bshad/ /'di ni chos dang rdzogs longs spyod//
sprul pas de ni gsum du 'gyur/ /byis pa rtog par bya ba'i phyir/ /de ni rnam pa lngar yang 'gyur/ /tha mal byis pa'i chos rnams gang / /rnam lnga gcig pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de yang
shin tu ldan sems can/ /sems can sogs la rnam par gnas/ /rtag pa ltar ni so sor snang / /'gro ba dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig /skye ba med las skyes pas na/ /
gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa'o/ /shes 'dod de tshe sngags pa ni/ /'gro ba byis pa de tshe spyod/ /de nas gsang sngags grub 'gyur ba/ /rnam par mi rtog gcig shes nyid/ /ya yi
@#/ /sde sogs gnas byas te/ /sngags ni na ri bri bar bya/ /rang gi sde bcas gnas dag ni/ /yi ge a bzhin sngon 'gro ba/ /so so gzhan pa'i bzhi pa ni/ /i
u dang ni ring por bcas/ /a ai au u ya ste mtha'/ /bzhi po dang bcas zlum por bri/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sbyor ldan pa'i/ /'gro ba mnyam gzhag bskyed pa yin/ /'di
dag rang skyes gnas gzugs kyi/ /chu yi yi ger zhugs par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhon nu'i gzugs nyid kyang / /rnam par bsgoms pas skye bar 'gyur/ /cha bcas dbang gnas
sngags pa ni/ /bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /na ga yi ni grangs bzhin du/ /skud sogs sbyor la gang gnas pa/ /nyi shu yi ni sngon ma yang / /de ni ras te bzhi pa'ang yin//
sngon med cha lugs gzugs gyis ni/ /khams gsum dag ni lta bar 'dod/ /'gro ba'i don ni byed gyur pa'am/ /mnyam nyid ye shes de nyid las/ /yon tan gsum ni brda
byas pa| |yon tan med pa'i yon tan ming / /gzhon nu'i spyod pa'i lus kyi ming / /lta ba 'di ni bar skyes/ /de ni sgo glegs mtha' yin te/ /e u ngang ni ring por bcas/ /yi ge
gsum bcas thig ler ldan/ /tsheg drag mtha' yi ring sde can/ /yi ge a ni yig sbyor ba'ang / /bcu gcig par yang gyur pa yin/ /de nyid ring po ring po'i mthas/ /bcu gnyis
ba mi grangs su 'gyur/ /de nyid yi ge ur sbyor las/ /yi ge oM zhes brjod pa yin/ /snga ma'i ri mo'i sbyor ba yin/ /ming ni bcu bzhi par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste a las sngags
pas ni| |AHnyid du ni blta bar bya/ /de bzhin A yi sbyor ba las/ /yi ge a ni ci 'dod par/ /ji bzhin grangs kyis yang dag blta/ /re re'ang a yi sbyor bas bsgo/ /i r-i l-i
u'i tshogs las kyang / /sngags pa ya ra la wa'i gzugs/ /lkog ma kha dang bar dang ni/ /rkan dang spyi bor gang gnas pa/ /gang tshe a ka'i sde grangs las/ /A yi kha yi rgyab
na gnas/ /i tshan phrag pa lag pa dang / /tshigs rnams la ni de bzhin no/ /dpung pa dang ni lag pa dang / /lag pa g.yon par rab tu brtag /dpyi dang brla dang byin pa dang / /rkang pa
g.yas g.yon de bzhin no/ /gzugs de yi ni grangs mnyam pas/ /ta tshan shin tu dngos grub ster/ /u tshan de bzhin dbus dang ni/ /lag pa ru ni yongs su bshad/ /rkang pa yang
ni ri ti'i tshan/ /'das pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa yin/ /de bzhin nyid kyi sbyor ldan pa'i/ /sngags pa rnams kyis shin tu mthong / /lhun gyis grub pas dngos grub pa/ /me tog gis
mdzes phreng ba bzhin/ /rang rgyud kyi ni nang nyid du/ /lha mchog dag ni bya ba yin/ /dgongs pa la sogs rnam pa kun/ /de nyid las ni bdag 'grub 'gyur/ /tsha ba'i bzhi bzhi sde sbyor bas/ /
@#/ /mkhas pa yi ni sgo rnams bya/ /ka tsa Ta ta pa tshan yang / /dbus dang shar la sogs sngon 'gro/ /'gro la phan pa'i 'dod pa yang / /ma spel bar ni mthong ba yin/ /thams
cad kyang ni rdzogs yi ge /yi ge hA yis mchod par bya/ /sna tshogs pa ni 'byin byed cing / /'gro ba dus gsum gcig pa'i dngos/ /yi ge a ni lus su bya/ /lhag ma rnam pa dang
bcas pa/ /mtshams med lnga yi sbyor ba las/ /sngags pa 'gro ba phan par ston/ /sha thog mtha' gnas sngags las skyes/ /dbang bskur gsum po spyi las skyes/ /gzugs
med rtogs pa'i chos rnams ni/ /skad cig gcig gis nges sbyor gyur/ /de tshe dkyil 'khor med byas pa/ /'jig rten pa rnams chos dgar 'gyur/ /a ku ha gnas byang
phyogs gnas/ /yod pa nyid kyang dus gsum 'das/ /gang dang gang nas byung ba yi/ /gsang sngags bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs/ /de dang de ni bzhugs gyur pa/ /rang gi mtshan
ma gcig shos nyid/ /gzugs med 'di la gnas yod pa/ /cha ni gsum zhes bya bar 'gyur/ /steng 'og phyogs kyi cha rnams su/ /dngos med pa ni rnam par gnas/ /dngos
po gcig gyur mthong ba dang / /'gro bcas tshangs pa 'gro bdag nyid/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po las/ /smon lam la sogs bsgom bya ba'o/ /'gro ba don gtogs 'dod
ba'i yon tan gyur rnams la/ /dgyes pa'i bde mchog dga' ba'i 'dod pa mdzod/ /sngon chad mdzad pa'i smon lam rab mchog dgongs nas ni/ /thub pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog rnam par
dbye bar gsol/ /nor bu rin chen dag gis rnam brgyan sku yi mchog /'gro ba'i don byed sring mo bdag la brten par mdzad/ /lhag pa'i snying rje las byung rab mchog ldan pa'i sku/ /
bdag ni yongs su bzung la chos rnams don yod mdzod/ /sring mos kyang ni khyad par du/ /de ltar bskul ba tsam gyis ni/ /de nas yongs su 'dzin mdzad de/ /rig pa'i pad+ma dpal du
mdzad| |shin tu snyan cing yid 'ong dbyangs kyis ni/ /phan pas myur du 'gro ba gnyis med 'dir snod gyur/ /bla ma bdag ni gal te gson par mchis bzhed na/ /dga' ba las byung
chos dga' bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /'gro ba dang ni 'od dang gnas pa tsam 'di ni/ /nam yang ltos par gyur pa dag gi mnga' ba lags/ /kun tu song ba'i bdag nyid can gyi dam
tshig ston/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rnams dang khyed bdag 'dod pa mdzod/ /dgongs pa'i ye shes rdo rje yis/ /sangs rgyas yon tan gcig la bzhugs/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg de bzhin
khrus| |dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags pa mdzad/ /'dod pa med cing chags la zhi/ /de yang don dam dag gyur yin/ /spyod dus de bzhin /sngags pa ni/ /bzlas brjod dngos po med pa yin/
@#/ /bsnyengs pa yang ni yid bzang ldan/ /mda' dang rig byed yon tan dang / /zung dang zla dkyil rnal 'byor pa/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gzhag bar bya/ /ha yi sde tshan ka
sde dang / /bcu gnyis phyed phyed dag tu sbyar/ /gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs 'di ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la dgod/ /de nas sngags pa mdun 'dug ste/ /dgongs ba'i don
gyis brtag par bya/ /phung po khams la sogs lta ba/ /brda las ji ltar lus yin bzhin/ /ma byin len pa byang chub sems/ /kun rdzob bstan pa rdzun smra ba/ /phung po srog chags
gyur ba ste/ /tshangs ba'i gnas bzhi bud med yin/ /mi sbyin tshig dang rkang pa ste/ /de bzhin rten pa nyid kyang ni/ /dus gsum sbyor ba gcig pu ru/ /sngags ba yis ni de bya'o/ /
bshang ba zhes ni yul la bshad/ /gci ba zhes ni dbang po yin/ /de dag za bar bshad pa ni/ /ma skyes gcig pur mthong ba 'o/ /khrag ni pags bar yang dag bshad/ /sa
bon lus zhes bya ba yin/ /rkang ni sems kyi kun rtog pa/ /za ba dngos med gyur pa 'o/ /smon lam dbang gis 'di rnams ni/ /bi mu ra shu pa sa 'di/ /lha rnams sbyor ba'i chos
nyid du| |bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod ba yin/ /dgongs pa yis ni bshad pa la/ /byis pa rnams ni yi ger rtog/ rdo rje theg la gnas khyod kyang / /chos nyid de yang mi shes so/ /rtog
pa kun las rnam 'das pas/ /chos kyi dbyings te mkha' dang mtshungs/ /de 'dra 'jig rten rgyang pan pa/ /mthon po'i gsang gis rtog par byed/ /yi ge gang gis mi gang zhig /'gro
la gsal bar rtog byed pa/ /'gro don gcig pa'i sbyor ba las/ /de nyid kyis ni de nyid mthong / /gang zhig rnam smin smin pa yis/ /sems ni dngos grub la gzhol ba/ /rdzogs
longs spyod pa'i skur sbyor las/ /dngos po med pa nyid du byung / /bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs/ /kun rdzob don gyi gnyen por 'byung / /sprul pa'i lus las sngags pas
ni| |sgyu ma bzhin du ston par byed/ /gsang ba'i dgongs pa de nyid 'di/ /'jam dpal ye shes dam pa 'o/ /rdo rje gsum gnas sbyor ba yis/ /sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom//
nam mkhar brtags pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /phung po dgon pa chen por 'dod/ /gnas med gnas ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin nyid gnas sa phyogs yin/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
dpag bsam shing / /dngos grub sna tshogs me tog ldan/ /sprul pa'i 'bras bu shin tu mdzes/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ri/ /dngos med dben pa nyams dga' ba/ /rdo rje zhes
bya des bsgrub bya/ /phung sogs yan lag thams cad de/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba dngos grub gyur/ /sngags 'don bar ni gang gyur ba/ /bsdus ba sngags ni gcig pu pa/ /lus sogs
@#/ /rdo rje gsum la ni/ /rdo rje 'jam pa bsgom par bya/ /lus la sogs pa rdo rje gsum/ /de nyid gsum nas spro bar bya/ /rdo rje gsum dang legs sbyor las/ /'jam
pa'i rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas yang dag rtog /sems sbyor ba ni dpag tshad yin/ /lnga bcu gnyis gyur gang yin pa/ /brgya brgya pa nas mngon phyogs
la| |ci rigs gcig pa'i yang dag rtogs/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar cig stsol/ /dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje snang ba yis/ /sa la sogs pa brgyan pa
ni| |de ni snang ba zhes bshad do/ /tshangs pa dbang po la sogs lha/ /dad bas de la phyag kyang byed/ /'di ni mi snang byed pa ste/ /ting 'dzin 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid/ /rnam par smin
pa ldog gyur cing / /ji skad gsungs pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /phung po la sogs grangs mnyam par/ /mi bskyod la sogs rab tu brtag /bshang gci sbyangs las der gyur
pa| |gang zhig dam tshig ces bya'o/ /dam tshig ces bya de dag mchog /mi phyed rdo rje gsum 'byung bas/ /dkon mchog gsum ni mnyam byas te/ /bdag med pa yang bsgom par
bya| |dkon mchog gsum ni lcags gsum yin/ /bdag med ces bya kha yin te/ /gang 'di rnam rtog gcig nyid du/ /bcug pa ril bu yin par 'dod/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis
mi byed pa'i/ /sgom pa sems kyi dam pa'o/ /de ltar de nyid shes bsgoms nas/ /skad cig gis 'jam rdo rjer 'gyur/ /'khor lo 'od 'phro mtshungs par 'gyur/ /rang gi sngags
kyis rnam bsgoms nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur bar bshad/ /sum cu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i/ /ri rab kyi ni rdul phran rnams/ /de
snyed de yi rjes 'brang rnams/ /dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'o/ /gnas ni lha yi sbyor ba ste/ /sna ni ri rab ces bya'o/ /bdag nyid chen po sum cu bdun/ /nam mkhar spro ba bsam mi
khyab| |'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag po ste/ /'di dag 'khor du gyur pa yin/ /'jig rten pa yi rang ngo bo/ /phyi yi ri rab brtag pa yin/ /dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /'khor lo'i ting nge
'dzin ces bya/ /'khor lo dngos grub rnyed sla ba/ /skad cig sbyor bas sgrub ba 'o/ /rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms na/ /rdo rje kun gyi gnas
mchog ste/ /thugs kyi rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ /rdul phran ji snyed yod ba yi/ /de snyed bud med de yi ni/ /sum 'gyur gnas su 'gyur ba yin/ /khams gsum
gyi ni rdo rje che/ /drag po yis ni phyag byas 'gyur/ /rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni yang dag bshad/ /pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /rang sngags rdo rje las byung ba/ /chos
@#/ /rnams kun gyi gnas bsgoms na/ /rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i/ /ri rab rdul phran grangs snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog
gi ni| |dkyil 'khor la ni bdag nyid 'jog /gos med mnyam nyid ye shes kyi/ /rdo rje pad+mo gru bcas sbyin/ /so sor rtog pa zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad/ /
shin tu grangs med bskal par ni/ /grangs kyi ming gis gnas par ni/ /gnas shing sgom par byed pa yin/ /de yi ye shes lngar ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni/ /
'jig rten phan phyir gsungs pa rnams/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i/ /yon tan gsum ni yongs su bsten/ /'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra ba'i/ /rang sngags
las byung ral gri ni/ /blo ldan lag par de bzhag na/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ rang gi sngags kyi khong chud 'di/ /ho ho hUM de khams gsum pa/ /pad+ma spangs pa'i
tshangs pa cher/ /rnal 'byor pa de 'gyur ba yin/ /khams gsum kun gyis cher mchod cing / /tshangs dang lha min phyag byas pa/ /stong gsum mi yi mchog gcig pu/ /dbang
chen po yi tshangs par 'gyur/ /thugs kyi rdo rje mchog bsgoms pas/ /dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa dag /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /de ni de ma thag tu 'thob/ /rang gi rdo
rje ting 'dzin 'di/ /dngos med gcig pu yang dag byung / /byang grol la yang de mi gnas/ /ral gri'i kha dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /oM ni ril bu tsa na ka'i/ /'bru tshad tsam du bsams
nas ni| |dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na/ /byang chub ye shes 'od po che/ /blo ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /dzam+bu chu bo'i gser mdog
gam/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /tsa na ka yi 'bru tshod tsam/ /yi ge'i dam pa AHbsam mo/ /de yi dbus su lha yi gzugs/ /khar bcug nas ni rnam bsgoms na/ /byang
chub ye shes 'od po che/ /de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /dzam+bu chu bo'i gser mdog dang / /nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /nam mkha'i dbus na gnas pa yi/ /tsa na ka yi 'bru tshad
tsam| |yi ge hUM ni rnam bsams te/ /dbus su rang gi lha bsams nas/ /khar bcug nas ni rnam bsams na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che/ /dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /dzam+bu
chu bo'i gser mdog dang / /nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /rnam bar snang mdzad mkha' dbyings kyi/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms la/ /lag tu 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na/ /
'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i sku mdog sbyor ba yang / /'di ni ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o/ /'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /dzam+bu
@#/ /chu bo'i gser mdog gam/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dra ba'i/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje mi phyed rab bsgoms te/ /lag tu rdo rje
bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/ /rdo rje sku yi sbyor ba las/ /rdo rje rigs kyi mchog bsgoms pas/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /
nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /rin chen la ni rin chen bsgoms/ /de nyid lag tu legs bzhag na/ /rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rin chen mchog gi sgrub pa
'di| |rin chen sku yi sbyor ba las/ /rin chen rigs kyi mchog bsgoms pa/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /tshe dpag med pa rab bsgoms
la| |lag tu pad+ma bsgoms na ni/ /pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /pad+ma mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/ /pad+ma'i skur ni sbyor ba las/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen bsgoms pa ni/ /ye shes rdo rje dag
gis bya| |nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /don yod mchog ni rab bsgoms la/ /lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na/ /ral gri'i rig ba 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dam tshig mchog
ni 'di sgrub pa/ /sku yi dam tshig sbyor ba las/ /dam tshig rdo rje rigs bsgoms pa/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /bsgrub bya rdo rje'i dbye ba yis/ /mdung thung rdo rje lcags kyu sogs/ /
sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yis/ /bsam gtan nyid kyis sgrub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig chen po 'byung ba yi/ /dam tshig dngos grub ces bya ba'i/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum dbang phyug /sna
tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung nyid/ /'gog dang lam ste bzhi po ni/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor yang dag bshad/ /sgrub pa po ni gnas ming
can| |shing gcig drung du yang dag rtog /chos dang rdzogs longs spyod ming can/ /sna tshogs mtshan gcig yang dag dgong / /mtshan ma rkyen gyi gzugs can no/ /'byin dang rngub pa
nyid dang ni/ /gnas pa yis ni nyer mdzes pa/ /yid ston pa yi mnyam sbyor la/ /rab tu zhi ba'i zhi gnas su/ /dus gsum rtog pa gcig las 'das/ /rdo rje lcags kyu khyad par
dang / /sgrub pa po ni rtag tu sgrub/ /sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu ni/ /sbyor gsum rdo rje can bsams pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi lcags kyu 'o/ /sangs rgyas ye shes blo can gyi/ /mi
gsal gsal bar yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo las/ /'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin/ /
gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de nyid sngags don rnal 'byor pas/ /'gro ba 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang / /mi gsal sbyor bas sbyor bar byed/ /gang yang dam tshig phyogs
@#/ /rnams ni/ /mkha' dbyings dbye bas gnas pa rnams/ /de nyid rdo rje bkug nas ni/ /sngags rig pas ni spyad par bya/ /nam mkha'i khams ni dgug pa 'di/ /dam
tshig chen po rdo rje can/ /sngags kyi de nyid gcig sbyor las/ /lcags kyu de rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i mchog /rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams
nas ni| |rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che/ /rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bya/ /me long lta bu'i sngags pas ni/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par bsgom/ /lag tu sku dang gsung thugs
kyi| |lcags kyu la sogs rab tu bsgom/ /de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis/ /de nyid las ni lha rnams dgod/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /dngos grub kun ster las byed 'gyur/ /
sku dang gsung thugs thams cad ni/ /mtshan nyid gcig par bsgom par bya/ /lce yi rdo rje sbyor ba yis/ /gsung gi rdo rjer de mnyam bsgom/ /brtul zhugs can gyis phyi nang
gnyis| |gsang ba'i rdo rje mchog mchod do/ /dngos med dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ /ji lta ji ltar rab sgrub pa/ /dam tshig gsum gyi rnal 'byor ba'i/ /de ni yang dag yin par
bshad| |gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yi/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'dod/ /bcom ldan dam tshig chen po yi/ /rnal 'byor pas ni de skad gsungs/ /de nas phyag na
rdo rje ni| |go byed gsang ba yang dag gsungs/ /grang zhig shes na rnal 'byor pa'i/ /mnyam gzhag mchog ni thob 'gyur ba'i/ /gsang dbang de nyid dam pa yi/ /de ni de yis yang
dag bshad/ /rnal 'byor chen po gcig bdag nyid/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam ba'i gnas/ /byas na dam tshig yang dag pa/ /sha chen la ni yang dag sbyar/ /dngos med ba yi sha
chen gyi| |dam tshig mchog la gnas nas ni/ /blo ldan bdag nyid sgom ba ni/ /rdo rje dngos grub longs spyod ster/ /rdzogs longs spyod yul bshang ba yin/ /de nyid ye shes dbang
po gci| |dam tshig 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /longs spyod rdzogs phung las byung ba/ /glang po'i shar ni de rab brtag /dam tshig gcig tu legs
sbyor las| |mngon shes lnga dag thob par 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni rta sha ste/ /dngos med de nyid las sbyor las/ /dam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor na/ /mi snang gnas kyi mchog
tu 'gyur/ /dgongs bas gcig shos bzlog pa yin/ /phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa/ /dngos med de ni khyi sha yin/ /dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor/ /dngos grub thams
cad rab sgrub pa 'o/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas can ba lang sha /khro bo'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor/ /rdo rje dgug pa'i dam pa 'o/ /'di ni 'jig rten
@#/ /par gyur las/ /dgongs pas gcig shos bzlog pa yin/ /sha chen dang ni bshang gci dang / /glang po rta khyi ba lang dag /mi rtog gcig pa'i sgrub pa yis
dam tshig gcig tu de 'grub 'gyur/ /bstan pas 'di ni sgrub pa ni/ /sngags kyi longs spyod rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje sbyor ba'i gsang ba yis/ /sgrub pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur//
de ni sangs rgyas byin rlob cing / /rnam kun rdo rje can gsum dang / /snying gar ye shes dam tshig dang / /dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad tshim 'gyur ba'i/ /'di
ni dam tshig sdom pa'o/ /dngos grub thams cad ster ba'i mchog /dam tshig mchog 'dis rab tu bya/ /dam tshig kun gyi dam pa ste/ /rdo rje zas kyi ting 'dzin to/ /de nas 'gro la
phan pa'i mgon/ /gtso bo rnam snang chen po la/ /gsang ba'i dgongs pa dam pa ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas slar yang zhus/ /gang zhig spyi bor brtags pa ni/ /gcig pu nyid du gyur pa
des/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug tu/ /mu stegs rnams kyis 'tshal mi 'gyur/ /rang gi bstan bcos brda yis ni/ /phyi rol ba de rnam rtog la/ /ting 'dzin brtags pa 'di dag kyang //
'di la rang gi ngo bo med/ /tshangs sgo mdzod kyi rgyud las ni/ /ri rab gcig dang bcas par bshad/ /byis pa mchog ni rmongs byed pa/ /gsung 'di skye bo ltung bar 'gyur/ /de nas
bcom ldan bdag po 'dis/ /rdo rje can la slar gsungs pa/ /legs so rdo rje legs pa che/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod legs pa/ /rkyen dang nyan thos theg pa dang / /'dir ni nga yis gsal
bshad pa/ /sangs rgyas kyis bshad ye shes dag /theg pa chen po mi mthong ngo / /tshad yod dang ni yongs chad pa'i/ /rang gi lus la gang bshad de/ /ye shes de rnams dri med 'dod/ /khron
pa'i rus sbal zhes bya'o/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam ye shes/ /rdo rje theg pa bla med pa/ /mchog sbyin nga ni khyed bzhin du/ /rgya chen de yis mi mthong ngo / /rdo rje theg pa rgya mtsho ste/ /de yis
yang dag ma mthong bas/ /rang gi lung ni tshad ma yis/ /gzhan yod pa ni min zhes smra/ /theg pa chen la gsang ba rnams/ /srang la bcal te de smra ba/ /de rnams sngon bzhin gsal
min zhes/ /nga yi tshig las bltas te smra/ /de nyid rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la sgom pa rnams/ /gang gis shes na rtog med 'gyur/ /gsang ba dgongs pas
gsungs pa yin/ /sngags kyi de nyid don byang chub/ /sna tshogs dngos grub 'bras bu ster/ /dgongs don ji lta ji lta bar/ /de ni nga yis yang dag bshad/ /dam tshig rdo rje lce la ni//
rdo rje can gyis hUM bsams te/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bdud rtsi lnga/ /zos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur/ /AHdang oM gyi gsang ba dag /'di ni rdo rje gsum mchog ste/ /'di lta bu yi sbyor ba
@#/ /yis| |rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od chen 'gyur/ /'di ni rdo rje'i bdud rtsi yi/ /phreng 'gyur dam tshig rdo rjer bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'byung / /ting
nge 'dzin ni bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog /sku gsung rdo rje can du 'gyur/ /de nyid sems can thams cad kyi/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgya mtsho che/ /'jig rten
khams ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog /rdo rje bdag nyid de snang byed/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni
thams cad du/ /grub nas 'di ni der sbyor ba'i/ /rig pa 'dzin par de 'gyur ro/ /sku yi rdo rje bsgom bdag nyid/ /grub mchog dam tshig la gnas pa/ /mi snang gyur pa kun gyi
mchog /stong gsum dag ni snang bar byed/ /lha yi bu mo mchog 'phrogs nas/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor mar legs sbyor/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed ces bya ba'i/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
ma lus kun/ /dpe de dang ni grangs gcig pa/ /sangs rgyas dus gsum rnam spangs pa/ /lag tu skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /rdo rje mig gis de mthong 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni gang dag tu//
sgra grags pa ni ji snyed ba/ /rnam pa la gnas ma nor bar/ /skad cig gis ni de kun thos/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag dang / /sku la sogs pa gsum gyis mtshan/ /sems zhes bshad pa'i
sgom pa mchog /sems can rnams kyi de nyid rig /bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gis 'gengs/ /rdo rje bsam mi khyab sngon 'gro/ /rang gi rna ba sems bcas
ba/ /gang+gA'i bye ma'i ming can gyi/ /gnas kyi dngos po bshad pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon shes gnas/ /'di ni yang dag bka' stsal to/ /mngon shes drug ni don grub bo/ /
de ni sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/ /'khor rnams kyis ni rab mdzes pas/ /sku sogs rdo rje gsum 'di ni/ /'jig rten khams rnams kun tu spyod/ /yid rton
bden gcig bsnyen pa ste/ /de nyid gsum mnyam gnyis med pa/ /brten te dam tshig gcig gyur pa/ /ye shes nye bar sgrub pa'o/ /yid rton mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las/ /sgrub pa yi ni
dam tshig 'gyur/ /'bras bu mngon sum byas sbyor ba/ /sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o/ /rkyen dang nyan thos mdo sde ba/ /'di dang ldan pa rab tu bsngags/ /sems la dmigs dang 'dir sbyor
ba| |skad cig gis kyang de 'grub 'gyur/ /bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor gcig dang / /nye bar sgrub bar gang gyur dang / /sgrub pa'i dam tshig nyid dang ni/ /sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa yin//
'di la yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba/ /ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs/ /sa dang shing gi rin chen sogs/ /lha nyid du ni rab tu brtag /chos kyi dbye bas shes par bya/ /rdo rje ye shes
@#/ /sgrub pa po/ /bsnyen pa'i dam tshig yang dag sbyor/ /byang chub mchog ni rnam par bsgom/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg bya chos rnams
la| |dngos grub mchog ni rnam dpyad pa/ /de ni nye bar sgrub par 'gyur/ /sngags bdag gang yin bsgoms nas ni/ /bskul ba sgrub par 'gyur ba yin/ /rang sngags rdo rje can gyi
gzugs| |de ni sgrub pa chen por 'dod/ /bsnyen pa rdo rje bdud rtsi dag /sngags pas kun tu brtag par bya/ /dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni/ /dbu rgyan la ni mchog gang
bsam| |'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /de nyid gsum gsang yang dag 'byung / /sngags kyi de nyid don gnyer ba'i/ /sgrub pa pos ni dben pa bstan/ /sna tshogs lung
gi yang dag rtog /sngags ni dgon pa chen por 'dod/ /de yi dpag bsam shing longs spyod/ /sa phyogs zhes ni yongs su bsgrags/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /
rnam pa'i dben pa chen por bshad/ /ri 'or rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /de rigs dngos med las byung ba'o/ /de 'dra'i dben pa'i mtshon pa ru/ /der ni 'od chen rnam gnas
te| |gnas med pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /rtag tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan rdo rje'i sgrub pa ni/ /chen pos de skad bka' stsal to/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sogs/
'jig rten pa rnams smra ba gsal/ /bsnyen pa sku yi brtul zhugs mchog /blo dang ldan pas rdo rje bzhis/ /rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor ba/ /bsgoms na dngos grub 'thob par
'gyur| |me long zhes bya dgon pa che/ /rin chen zhes bya dben pa'o/ /chen po zhes bya 'od dpag med/ /don yod pa ni ri 'or yin/ /chu ngogs dag pa'i chos kyi cha/ /gnas lnga dag
tu rab tu brtag /ji srid don ni sbyor ba bzhis/ /yi ge oM ni sdom par 'gyur/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gcig /rang gi mtshan nyid 'dor mi byed/ /de bzhin de nyid gsum
bzhi'i phyed/ /yi ge oM gcig sdom pa'o/ /gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba'i/ /oM gcig gis ni 'gro la khyab/ /de nyid mi gsal sbyor dbang po/ /gtso bo rang nyid zlog pa yin//
la la glang po spangs nas ni/ /rjes la dbyibs ni tshol bar byed/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs sngags pa ni/ /oM las sdom pa gzhan du 'dod/ /gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi dang lnga/ /dus
thub de bzhin nor can dang / /phan tshun sbyor gnas brjod pa la/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i grangs su 'gyur/ /bcom ldan gcig kyang du ma ste/ /tshig tu brjod pa rnam par spangs/ /brda tsam
du ni oM zhes bya/ /dngos med sbyor ba'i chos nyid yin/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste/ /sku gsum du ni yang dag bshad/ /gsum po yang dag 'dzin pas ni/ /des na oM ni sdom pa
@#/ /yin/ /dang po gcig pu mi bskyod dgod/ /de nyid sdom par gyur ba yin/ /brda ru brjod pa sna tshogs pa/ /bsams nas sdom pa kun tu bshad/ /mi phyed
nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis/ /bsam dang gdon dang rnam par bral/ /rten 'brel rig las yang dag 'byung / /rjes bcas zhes bya de bsgom bya/ /rtag tu 'byung ba'i ye shes
gzhag /mig la sogs pa bdun brgya la/ /g.yas dang gcig shos zla phyed de/ /shes rab thabs kyang sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag zung gyur zla ba ste/ /rdo rje ming can phyed dang gnyis/ /
de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /zhag ni thub pa zla phyed dang / /zla gcig zla ba phyed gnyis pas/ /'jig rten pa yi zhag dbye bas/ /rgya cher ngas
ni bshad pa yin/ /gsang ba mchog las byung ba ni/ /zla ba phyed kyis sgrub par gsungs/ /de nyid nye bar 'grub bshad pa'i/ /sdom pa'i yul ni dam pa yin/ /gang tshe shes rab
thabs ye shes/ /de bzhin nyid shes las byung ba/ /sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed 'od po che/ /byang chub skad cig gis sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sku ni byed par 'gyur//
srog la sogs dang grangs mnyam pa'i/ /bdag med phyogs bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje byin rlabs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'das dang ma
'ongs sangs rgyas dang / /gang zhig phyogs bcur bzhugs pa rnams/ /chos sku mchog gi rnal 'byor pa/ /sangs rgyas de rnams byin gyis rlob/ /'das pa rnams ni chos sku yis//
bsam mi khyab pa'i phyogs na bzhugs/ /sngags phyogs bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /ma 'ongs rnams kyis byin gyis rlob/ /sangs rgyas gsum la dbye ba ni/ /cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin//
'on kyang dngos med las byung ba'i/ /sngags pa rnams la byin gyis rlobs/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms la/ /sku ni ji lta bar 'tsham pa//
de ltar byin gyis rlob par mdzad/ /rig dang ma rig yang dag ldan/ /srog la sogs te bcu gnyis bshad/ /dus kyi nyis 'gyur lam la sogs/ /de nyid zla ba la sogs 'gyur/ /zla ba
la sogs grangs mnyam pas/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis ming can yin/ /khyab 'jug de nyid dbye ba yis/ /lam rtsom pa ni brtags pa yis/ /de nyid du ni sgrub pa mchog /sdom pa yul zhes
bshad pa yin/ /sngags dang dngos med de byed pa/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor dang mtshungs/ /rtog pa las byung de 'di ni/ /dngos med pa ni sgom pas so/ /ma 'ongs pa yi skye bo ni/ /lha
yi gzugs la 'dud par byed/ /mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang / /lce dang de bzhin lus dag dang / /pags pa rkang par yang dag ldan/ /'dzin pa dag ni mi nus pa/ /lta dang nyan dang dri dang
@#/ /ro| |reg bya rnams ni dngos med pa/ /rang bzhin sems med gyur ba yi/ /'jim gzugs sangs rgyas sku can te/ /'on kyang 'gro ba'i bla ma'i sku/ /sangs rgyas
byin gyis byin rlabs gyis/ /de bzhin sngags sbyor bdag nyid can/ /dngos med rdo rje'i sku nyid yin/ /shing dang sa dang rin chen sogs/ /rang gi lha yi gzugs byas la/ /rang gi
chos ni spangs nas su/ /tshig gi lam de ston par byed/ /sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa mchog /cho 'phrul de 'dra ga las byung / /de nas dad sogs yang dag pas/ /slar yang de la
gsol 'debs kyang / /gsol ba 'debs pa tsam gyis ni/ /de dang 'dra bar ga la 'gyur/ /phyi rol chos la gang zhig dga'/ /lha rnams thams cad spong ba yin/ /de ltar sku las
sku byung ba/ /dpal ldan chos 'di'ang gsum gyi lam/ /byin rlabs pa dag longs spyod na/ /gsung gi rdo rje can du byed/ /'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams/ /phyogs bcu na ni
gang bzhugs pa/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur de rnams ni/ /mi phyed gsum gyi lam du 'gyur/ /yid rton bde ba zhi bdag nyid/ /de bzhin nyid shes las byung ba/ /yi ge gcig ni
gsum drug 'di/ /rang nyid 'gro ba'i khar brjod do/ /de yi byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje mi phyed rdo rje can/ /gang gzhan sangs rgyas kyis gsungs dang / /'gro ba'i sgrar ni
'di gyur te/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum rnal 'byor/ /gsung gi rdo rje mi phyed pa/ /rdo rje can mchog de byin rlob/ /'jug pa gnas pa'i sbyor ba
dang / /ldang ba dang ni yang dag ldan/ /gsung gi rdo rje dngos med pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob/ /ji ltar 'khor los bsgyur rgyal ni/ /tshig gi lam gyis las byed 'jug /gsung
byin rlabs pas sngags pa ni/ /de bzhin don yod nyid du byed/ /der ni yang dag bshad pa 'di/ /sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba'o/ /sangs rgyas de rnams byin rlob pa/ /sdom pa yul ni
dam pa'o/ /rdo rje thugs ni 'dzin rgyal po/ /de ni bdag la byin rlob mdzad/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum sbyor bas/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i gnas/ /gang zhig byung dang 'byung
'gyur ba'i/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /de yi byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas/ /lan gsum las ni byung ba mdzad/ /sku yis ston pa'i mdzad pa mchog /rang sangs
rgyas ni sgom pa yin/ /mdo sde ba dang nyan thos kyi'ang / /smra ba sgrub pa por gyur yin/ /sems ni rnal 'byor ldan mchog gis/ /'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o/ /'gro 'ong gnas dang
bral ba ni/ /rdo dang sa dang dbyig byed pa/ /lus la sogs pa mtshon pa yis/ /'on kyang de ni gsung du 'gyur/ /sems dang lus dang mi ldan pa'i/ /de bzhin nyid ni 'gro don can/ /sku gsung
@#/ /thugs kyi rdo rje gcig/ gyur kyang so sor bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje chos dag gam/ /de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung / /sku gsung thugs kyi sangs rgyas
sogs| |rdo rje gsum po mi phyed brtag /de 'das rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can/ /so sor rtog pa 'gag par 'gyur/ /sku la sogs pa'i grangs mnyam par/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni gang
rtog gyur/ /stong pa nyid du sbyor ba yang / /de ni gsal bar the tshom med/ /sna tshogs sbyor gyur sngags rnams ni/ /gang zhig stong par mngon sum byed/ /'das pa dag ni de thams
cad| |rmongs pa'i bdag nyid de 'gag 'gyur/ /nyan thos rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi/ /byang chub bsdus nas bshad pa yis/ /'jig rten pa yi gang bshad pa/ /mdor bsdus pa ni
'di yin no/ /sangs rgyas yang na rdo rje chos/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung / /rmongs pas 'di las 'das na ni/ /de ni 'gag par the tshom med/ /dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas
nas| |gsang ba dam pa yang dag srung / /lhun gyis grub pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba mchog /rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i//
dam tshig sgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'i/ /le'u bcu gnyis gsungs pa yin/ /dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po
d+harmA shrI b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ badzra dz+nyA na sa muts+tsha ya nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ ye
shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes rdo rje kun las
btus pa'i rgyud las ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'o/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug stong gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma rig pa
dang / sems las byung ba dang / sems zhes bgyi ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ rigs
kyi bu nyon cig /ye shes gsum rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba de'i phyir ye shes gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/ /byams pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ ye shes gsum rdo rje'i ngo
bo ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa/ /'gag pa med pa/ skye ba med pa de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / snang ba
nye bar thob pa dang / stong pa chen po'o/ /de yang rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /'on kyang snang ba dang bcas par brjod par bya'o/ /ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis sems las byung ba ste/ de ni/ snang ba
@#/ /mched pa dang / shin tu stong pa zhes gsungs so/ /sems las byung ba'i rkyen gyis sems te/ de ni/ snang ba dang / stong pa ste/ sems dang / sems las
byung ba dang / ma rig pa'i rang bzhin bdag med pa'o/ /gsum po de dang de 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/ /de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems
dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug pa mthong nas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar gyur pas 'dug /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' chen po de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal te gtugs nas gzhan yang zhus pa/ e ma'o ston pa/ rtogs par dka' ba rnam par shes pa
gsum gyi dbye ba mchog tu zab pa bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang 'od gsal ba
las byung rnam par shes pa de nyid sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya la/ de ni/ chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i
bdag nyid de las rtog pa gnyis su gyur te bdag dang / gzhan dag tu'o/ /rnam par shes pa de'i bzhon pa rlung ngo / /rlung las me'o/ /me las chu'o/ /chu las sa'o/ /de rnams
las phung po lnga dang / skye mched drug dang / yul lnga ste/ de dag thams cad ni/ rnam par shes pa rlung dang 'dres pa'o/ /de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba rab
tu gsal bar spyod pa rjes su myong bar byed de/ snang ba'i rgyus rang bzhin rnams yang dag par 'byung ngo / /de las 'od gsal ba/ gnas pa med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ skye ba med pa/
don dam pa'i bden pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de las byung ba'i mun pa'i snang ba ni/ ma rig pa'o/ /de'i rang bzhin lta ba dang / 'khrul ba dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / brjed
nges pa dang / le lo dang / mi smra ba dang / mi gsal ba'o/ /ma rig pa sems las byung ba ste/ nyi ma'i snang ba lta bu dang / shin tu gsal ba'i smig rgyu ba lta bu'o/ /de'i rang bzhin
'dod chags dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / drag po la sogs pa dang / kun rdzob tu mngon sum du skyes pa'i gzugs dang / lha'i tshogs dang / mtshan ma dang / rdo
rje'i brda'o/ /sems las byung ba las sems te/ zla ba'i snang ba dang / shin tu gsal ba'i chu'i zla ba lta bu'o/ /rang bzhin ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'o/ /kun rdzob
@#/ /tu ni/ mngon sum gyi bud med dang / b+hu ga dang / pad+ma dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o/ /rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba las shes rab kyi ye shes
byung ba las rang gi rdo rje'i 'bad pa las me'o/ /me las chu ste/ nur nur po'i rnam pa dang / de las mer mer po dang / nar nar po dang / gor gor bo dag go /de nas 'dod chags
dang bral ba'i snang ba la khrag gi gong bu mkhrang gyur rnams so/ /de khu ba dang khrag dag gis bskyed pa'o/ /de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba las 'dod chags so/ /
'dod chags las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / bar ma'i 'dod chags rab tu shes par bya ste/ de'i phyir lus te/ lus las byung ba'i skyil krung bcing ba la sogs pa dang /
gsung gi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa A li kA li las yang dag par byung ba'i sngags dang / sems kyi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa sa bon dang mtshan ma las lhar dmigs
pa'o| |gzugs la sogs pa'i yul ni/ dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba ni/ sems dang sems las byung
ba dag gi thabs su gyur pa'o/ /sems dang sems las byung ba mnyam par sbyar ba ni/ bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs su gyur pa'o/ /de sgyu ma'i dpes nye bar mtshon
pa ste| de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra
brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / mig 'phrul dang / dbang po'i gzhu dang / glog dang / chu bur dang / me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis bde ba chen
po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par byed pa yin no/ /ji ltar 'o ma bsrubs pa las mar dang / ji ltar til las til mar te/ de bzhin du rdo rjes ni/ thabs kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon
pa'i phyir dang / pad+mas ni/ shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar 'o ma dang til yang dag par mngon par 'dus byas pa med par mar dang til mar mi 'byung ba de
bzhin du sngags dang phyag rgyas mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyar ba med par rnam par shes pa gsum nye bar mtshon par mi nus so/ /gang gis b+ha ga dang
ling+ga yang dag par sbyor bar mi nus pa des ni/ bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin mi rnyed do/ /bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig la lhag par mos pa tsam gyis ni/ las dang po pa'i
sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa la yang slob par 'gyur ro/ /gang rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde bas rang bzhin snang ba yang dag par nye bar mtshon par byed pa
@#/ /de ni| bde ba chen po'i go 'phang la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ sbas pa'i bshad pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ spyi'i don ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos spyod pa rnam par rtog
pa'i bag chags las ma grol ba rnams rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dag tu btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dod chags kyi chos gsal bar byed pa ngo mtshar
can gyi rdo rje'i tshig thos nas smod par byed pa de rnams dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo nas bshad pa de ni/ spyi'i don du bshad pa gsungs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dod chags la spyod pa'i chos kyi tshul du mthar thug pa ji ltar lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang
chub sems dpa' rnams/ /legs so legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje mchog dang ldan pa rnams nyon cig /mtha' ni/ mu ste/ 'od gsal ba yang dag pa'i
tshul zhes bya ba mthar thug pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ thabs gang gis mthar thug pa thob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i mtha' stong pa gsum mo/ /stong pa gsum gyi mtha' 'od gsal ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
gsol pa| bcom ldan 'das/ stong pa gsum 'od gsal ba'i mthar ji ltar 'gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar mes shing bsregs te thal bar byed pa de
bzhin du 'od gsal bar shes rab kyi ye shes yun ring pos rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ /ji ltar ta la'i lo ma thal bar byed pa de bzhin du thabs kyis ye shes rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ /
ji ltar ras bal gyi 'dab ma bsregs pa de bzhin du snang ba thob pa'i ye shes mchog tu myur bas rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ /de bas na rim pa 'dis shing ta la'i lo ma dang / ras bal gyi
'dab ma thal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa chen po rnams mthar 'od gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ mthar thug pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa'o/ /byams
pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtha' drug gis bshad pa ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgongs
pas bshad pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang / sgra ji bzhin pa dang / sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so/ /byams pas gsol pa/ bcom
@#/ /ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzhag ste tshig re re'i bshad pa bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang mthar thug pa
bshad pa de nyid dgongs pas bshad pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa dang / bar ma nye bar mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs
pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni/ /dgongs pas bshad pa'o/ /lus dang ngag dang yid med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / thams cad stong pa dang / dag pa dang / 'od gsal bzhes bya ba la
sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig ni/ dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o/ /ga bur dang / khrag chen po dang / tsan+dan dmar po dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i
tshig rnams ni/ drang ba'i don ste/ ga bur ni/ khu ba dang / khrag chen po ni/ zla mtshan gyi khrag dang / tsan+dan dmar po'i khu ba dang bsres pa ni/ tsan+dan dmar po'o/ /rdo rje ni/ mtshan
ma ste| thabs so/ /pad+ma ni/ b+ha ga ste/ shes rab dang / phyag rgya dang / btsun mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni/ nges pa'i don to/ /gnyi ga dang / spyod pa dang / bya ba'i rgyud
rnams su don gsal bar gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ dkyil 'khor dang / mchod sbyin dang / gtor ma dang / sman dang / zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams dang / de bzhin du 'jig
rten pa'i dngos grub chen po brgyad gsungs pa rnams ni/ sgra ji bzhin pa ste/ de ni/ yi ge'i don gyi bshad pa'o/ /ko TA khya/ ko TA ba/ ko TAH/ ko TA bash+tsa/ ko Ta rA gA/ ko la khya/ ko la wa/ ko
la| ko la bash+tsa/ ko la sta tha/ 'dis dbang po dang / yul gsungs te/ de lta bu la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni/ sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
chen phos gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dang / gnyi ga'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i rgyud dang / bya ba'i rgyud dang / rtog pa'i rgyud rnams kyi tshad ji ltar lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ming stong phrag bcu gnyis zhes bya ste/ rgyas par phye na grangs med do/ /gnyis ka'i rgyud stong phrag drug go/ spyod

pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgyad do/ /bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o/ /rtog pa'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o/ /de dag ni/ stong phrag sum cu rtsa bzhi ste/ rgyud dang rtog pa'i ming gi mtha' ma'i yi ge ji
snyed pa ni/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha 'di dag ni/ ming gi yi ge'i mtha' ma rnams so/ /byang chub sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de rnams kyi byed pa dang / cho ga dang / bsgrub bya dang / sgrub pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa'i
@#/ /bden pa las bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis langs te 'dod chags las byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas rab tu bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dbus
su 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis btsun mo'i b+ha ga la yang dag par bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'gal ba/ rmad du byung
ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gi mtha' drug gang gis rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa ni/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la bzhugs so/ /rig pa'i lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor gyi
'khor lo la dgod pa dang / de las byung ba'i byed pa dang las dang sgrub pa la sogs pa de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa ni/ gnyi ga'i rgyud la bzhugs so//
las kyi bya ba sna tshogs phyag rgya chen po bya ba'i rgyud kyi phyag rgya dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu dpyad pas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa ni/ spyod pa'i rgyud la bzhugs
so| |'jigs par dmigs shing shin tu gtsang spra byed pa dang / ye shes sems dpa'i bde ba dam pa med pa dang / bdag nyid lha'i snyems pa med pa dang / rmad du byung ba'i spyod
yul ma yin pa dang / skyon gyi rgyu'i rtog pas rab tu spyod pas sgrub par byed pa ni/ bya ba'i rgyud la bzhugs so/ /sngags dang / sman dang / sbyin sreg dang / phye ma dang / mig sman
dang / rkang mgyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po brgyad rab tu dpyad pa sgrub par byed pa ni/ rtog pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol ba/
bcom ldan 'das/ rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang / mtha' drug gi bshad pa dang / rig pa rnam pa bzhi
dang / bshad pa rnam pa bzhi dang / dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang / gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa dang / bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa rnams so/ /gleng bslang ba rnam pa
lnga ni/ 'di lta ste/ ming dang / gang gi don du byas pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshad dang / dgos pa rnams so/ /mtha' drug tu bshad pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dgongs pas bshad pa dang / dgongs
pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang / sgra ji bzhin pa dang / sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so/ /rigs pa rnam pa bzhi ni/ rgyud dang / gleng gzhi dang /
nges tshig dang / rgyu rnams so/ /bshad pa rnam pa bzhi ni/ yi ge'i don dang / spyi'i don dang / sbas pa dang / mthar thug pa rnams so/ /dbye ba rnams pa gnyis ni/ 'di lta ste/ tshogs la
bshad pa dang / slob ma la bshad pa'o/ /gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa ni /'di lta ste/ rin po che dang / tsan+dan dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pa la rnams so/ /bden pa
@#/ /rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ kun rdzob ni/ mi brtan pa dang / g.yo ba'o//
de'i bden pa ni/ chu zla lta bu'o/ /don dam pa'i bden pa ni/ stong pa chen po bco brgyad do/ /de'i mtha' ni/ gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba/ don dam pa'i
bden pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rnal 'byor chen po bas las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la brten nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab tu spyod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyis sems can gyi don mi byed pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang du sems can gyi
don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas yang dag pa'i mtha' las langs te sems can gyi don byas nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug par byed do/ /
de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /ye shes rdo rje kun
las btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ bde ba chen po'i le'u ste rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o/ /rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ka ra'i zhal snga
nas dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA pa khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur/ slad nas bla ma de nyid dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la phab pa/ ye shes rdo rje kun
las btus/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i gsal byed yin/ /ye shes rang bzhin 'khor ba dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo la/ /de gnyis dbyer med rdo rje ste/ /kun 'dir 'dus pas kun
las btus/ /de ston pa la der brtags nas/ /gzhung la'ang ming don 'tsham pa yin// //rgya gar skad du/ tsa tur de wi ba ri pr-its+tshA/ bod skad du/ lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus
pa| dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing / /sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa/ /shin tu dga' ba'i sbyor chen la/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
cher bzhugs te/ /'od zer 'chang zhing 'khrigs pa yi/ /gsang chen chos kyi 'byung gnas la/ /byang chub sems ni 'phros nas su/ /chos kyi dbyings gnas zhu mdzad do/ zhu ba'i dngos
po de mthong nas/ /lha mo spyan mas yongs zhus pa/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /tshig 'di dag ni gsol ba ste/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams 'phro ba ni/ /gang las skye bar 'gyur pa
lags| |dang po ji ltar 'ong ba yin/ /de bzhin phyir 'gro ji ltar lags/ /yan lag med pa gang de ni/ /yan lag dang bcas 'gyur nas su/ /lus dngos 'gyur ba ji ltar lags/ /
@#/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/ /de bzhin lce dang lus dang yid/ /dbang po phung po'i dngos rnams dang / /khams rnams su ni 'jug pa yang / /ma rig bag chags
sred pa yis/ /bcings pa'i nyon mongs 'dod chags sogs/ /rnam par shes pa sna tshogs pa/ /ji ltar dngos su 'dus pa lags/ /dngos po med pa sgom pa'i gzugs/ /gzugs
sogs spyod yul mtshan nyid rnams/ /rang bzhin med cing dmigs med la/ /dmigs pa dang bcas ji ltar lags/ /de dag ngo mtshar chen po ni/ /bdag gi the tshom lha sa
bka' stsol/ /de ltar zhus ma thag tu ni/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /shes rab zab mo zad med ni/ /nyon cig spyan ma bshad par bya/ /dpyad du med cing shes
bya min| |de bzhin dpyad mkhan gyis shes dka'/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni/ /nam mkha' nam mkha'i spyod yul lo/ /mi shes mun pas bsgribs pas na/ /nyan thos
rnams kyis shes pa min/ /spyod yul bag chags shes mkhan ste/ /rang sangs rgyas su sprul pas te/ /de dag kun gyis kyang mi shes/ /shes med so so'i skye gnas dag /ma 'ongs
pa dang 'das pa dang / /da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum la/ /byol song bag chags las byung ba'i/ /dud 'gro yi dgas skye ba rnams/ /de kun gyis kyang mi shes te/ /sangs rgyas
spyod yul gsang chen no/ /snying po shin tu snying po'i mchog /gang de kun bdag la gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni/ /lha mo khyod la bshad par bya/ /byang chub sems
dpa' 'od gsal ba/ /zla ba shel dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ /de nyid ye shes lnga yi dngos/ /yungs kar che ba'i tshad tsam mo/ /de yi dbus su bzhugs pa'i lha/ /mi gsal gsal ba'i gzugs
can te/ /phyed tshad tsam gyi phra mo'i mchog /yid kyi dngos po'i thig le'i gzugs/ /rtag tu snying gi dbus gnas pa/ /'od zer chen po 'bar ba can/ /ji snyed dgu pa'i bar du ni/ /dpral ba
la gnas rkang mthil bar/ /thig le de kho nar bsdus te/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/ /cha shas lnga pa tsam yin te/ /bcu gnyis kyi ni tha ma la/ /cha shas drug gis mtshan pa
nyid| |nga ro thig les brgyan byed pa/ /rdo rje khong nas phyung nas su/ /sa bon skye gnas dbus bzhag ste/ /chos kyi dbyings ni zhu bar byed/ /de ni rim par bskyed byed na/ /sgo dgu la ni
kun tu 'gro/ /khyab cing khyab gnas 'gro kun la/ /mi g.yo la sogs g.yo dang bcas/ /tshangs sogs lha dang lha min gyi/ /gzhi ni de las gyur pa'o/ /gang las gtso bor skyed byed
pa| |sa dang nam mkha' de zhes gsungs/ /ji snyed lus la gnas pa'i bar/ /de yis las dang las min byed/ /dge dang mi dge bsam pa yang / /bya ba'i las kun byed pa yin/ /sbyor
@#/ /brtag tu de gsungs te/ /mchod bsgom par gsungs pa yin/ /gang tshe las kyi lus zhig na/ /de tshe de yi rang mthu yin/ /de 'dra'i lus su de 'gyur te/ /gang
gis g.yo dang mi g.yo khyab/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid 'dra ba/ /de ni gnas par shes par bya/ /bcu yi gnyis mtha' tshig gi don/ /gang gis rtag tu bsgoms byas na//
des ni dngos grub rgyas pa yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin par bdag nyid 'gyur/ /so dang mchu dang rkan dang lce/ /mgul gnas gang la yod pa ni/ /gang la de ni yig 'bru nyid/ /de ni zad
dang gnas phyir ro/ /brjod pa med cing the tshom med/ /sgra yig rnam par spangs pa ni/ /rang gi phyi nang de bzhin nyid/ /byang chub sems ni 'dir gsungs so/ /lha mo bzhis yongs
su zhus pa las/ lha mo spyan mas yongs su zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas lha mo mA ma kyis/ /rdo rje can la 'di zhus te/ /byang chub sems kyi rim pa yis/ /kha
snying lte ba gsang ba la/ /'gro dang phyir 'ong bstan pa ni/ /rdo rje chen mos bka' stsal 'tshal/ /cha shas rnam pa du zhig gsungs/ /gnas kyi rnam pa bsgyur ba du/ /kha dog rnam
pa du zhig gsungs/ /de bzhin gdan yang ji ltar 'tshal/ /rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa/ /cha shas bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing / /pad+ma bzhi la yang dag gnas/ /snying ga'i pad+ma
la gnas nag /kha yi pad+ma la gnas dkar/ /nga ro lte ba'i pad+mar gnas/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma nga ro mthar/ /stabs kyi mtha' ru 'gro byed pas/ /thig le'i sbyor bar rab tu gnas/ /snom
byed pa dang thos byed pa/ /de tshe mthong byed za byed pa/ /reg par byed kyang de kho nas/ /bde dang sdug bsngal tshor byed pa'o/ /gang las bzhang byed bza' byed pa/ /de bzhin tsho de dang du ba//
'byed pa gcod pa de kho nas/ /cho ga rnam pa mang po shes/ /rgyal po don yang byed par 'gyur/ /dbang phyug don yang byed par 'gyur/ /bram ze rgyal po rje'i rigs dang / /dmangs rigs
smad pa'i rigs rnams dang / /bud med du ma sprul par byed/ /dud 'gro yi dwags skye ba dang / /gzugs can rnams dang gzugs med dang / /de bzhin 'dod pa'i srid rnams las/ /
'byung ba thams cad skyed byed pa/ /de nyid kho na rdzu 'phrul 'phang gnas/ /de ltar de bzhin nyid shes pa/ /dam pa'i yig 'phang gnas/ /de ltar de bzhin nyid shes pa/ /dam pa'i yig
'bru shes pa gang / /des ni gsang chen shes pas te/ /gang des bdag nyid kun gnas pa/ /kha dog med cing kha dog dmar/ /kha dog dkar dang ser ba yi/ /thig le'i gzugs su bsgyur
ba 'dis/ /'gro dang phyir 'ong rnam par bstan/ /gang de rig pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /mtha' yas bcas pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /skye dang bsdus dang 'jig pa la/ /thig le'i gzugs su rab
@#/ /gnas so/ /gang gis brgyad khri rtsa bzhi'i chos/ /stong phrag brgya ru shes na yang / /de yi de nyid mi shes te/ /de dag kun kyang 'bras med do/ /bcu gnyis
lnga yi lnga pa yang / /brgyad kyi mtha' ru 'byung ba 'dis/ /sgra yig dang po yi ge a/ /lnga pa yis ni yang dag brgyan/ /snying rje chen po las byung ba/ /kha mar bltas pa'i dur gas
brtags| |gdod ma mtha' ma med pa'i lha/ /de ni spyi bor bstan pa yin/ /de dag gsang chen dam pa yin/ /lha mo bdag gis rab bstan to/ /lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa
las| lha mo mA ma kIs zhus pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// //de nas lha mo gos dkar mos/ /yan lag kun gyis btud nas su/ /thal mo snying gar sbyar byas te/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' la gsol ba/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi bsdus pa dang / /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /rang bzhin nyid ni ji ltar lags/ /lha yi dbang phyug khyod la zhu/ /gang gis 'od
kyi gong bur bsdu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags/ /gsungs shig de nyid yig 'bru'i tshig/ 'dus pa gsungs pa ji ltar lags/ /chu khams dang ni me yi khams/ /ji ltar
ro ni mnyam por 'gyur/ /ma las skye ba gsum tsam dang / /de bzhin pha las skye ba gsum/ /de dag drug sogs gong bu las/ /ji ltar mi rnams skye ba lags/ /sangs rgyas
gzugs ni bdag mi 'tshal/ /thub pa chen pos bka' stsal mdzod/ /rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal ba/ /gsang ba shin tu gsang gyur ba/ /nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// skye gnas
dbus su rtsa gnyis ni/ /g.yon dang de bzhin g.yas pa ste/ /g.yon du byang chub sems zhes bya/ /g.yas su de bzhin rak+ta 'o/ /de gnyis phrad nas gcig 'gyur ba/ /chos kyi dbyings
ni 'dus pa yin/ /mun pa sku ste rdul gsung gzugs/ /thugs kyi rang bzhin snying stobs te/ /rdul ni rak+ta byang chub sems/ /mun pa de bzhin bskyed pa yin/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam
sbyar nas/ /rang bzhin mnyam pa'i ror 'gyur ro/ /dri chen chu dang shel me tog /de bzhin lnga pa byang chub sems/ /bdud rtsi lnga dngos gong bur bsdus/ /de las rdo rje 'dir gsungs
so/ /cha shas gnyis pa dang ldan pa/ /de bzhin dgu ba yab yin no/ /de skad gsungs pa de la ni/ /sum cu dang ni bcu dang ni/ /de bzhin lnga pa'i sa bon te/ /cha shas gnyis pa lnga
yi ni/ /drug gi btags pa des byung ba/ /de ni thig ler gsungs pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge bruM/ /skye gnas pad+ma la gnas pa/ /de nyid sa bon swAhA mtha'/ /'dus pa la ni
shes par bya/ /chu khams pha las skyes zhes bya/ /me yi khams ni ma las skyes/ /sha dang khrag dang pags pa yang / /ma las skyes pa zhes bshad do/ /tshil dang rkang dang khu ba
@#/ /ni| |pha las skyes zhes bshad pa yin/ /gong bur yang dag 'dus pa ni/ /de dag tsam du bshad pa yin/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /de bzhin 'du
byed rnam shes rnams/ /sangs rgyas dngos po lnga yi gzugs/ /phung po zhes byar bshad pa'o/ /lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las/ lha mo gos dkar mos zhus pa ste le'u
gsum pa'o// //de nas bzhad pa'i zhal gyur te/ /lha mo sgrol ma bcom ldan mas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa ni/ /gsungs shig rdo rje can
chen po// //rdzas rnams sgrub pa bka' stsal 'tshal/ /de bzhin rig pa'i sngags rnams kyang / /dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtag pa dang / /sbyin sreg so sor bya ba dang / /de bzhin mchod
pa'i cho ga yang / khyad par du yang bka' stsal 'tshal/ /de ltar lha mos zhus ma thag /rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub thabs ni/ /nyon cig lha mo
bshad par bya/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni/ /de bzhin ro dang reg la sogs/ /khams bco brgyad po de dag kyang / /chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba'o/ /de dag nyid las byung ba
ni| |byang chub sems zhes shes par bya/ /byang chub sems las dong bu skyes/ /gong bu las kyang yid bskyed do/ /yid las nam mkha'i khams kyang ni/ khams rnams dang ni
skye mched rnams/ /dbang po phung po 'byung ba rnams/ /de ltar dbyings su bsdu ba ste/ /bsdu ba de ni bstan byas pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa yin/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyi//
sgrub pa yang dag spyad par bya'o/ /ji ltar gal po zhes dngos kyis/ /bsgrub par bya ba rab tu brtag /chos dbyings sgrub pa bshad nas su/ /rdzas brgyad yan lag sgrub pa bshad/ /ril
bu mig sman dngos grub dang / /sa 'og ral gri'i dngos grub dang / /nam mkhar 'phur dang mi smang dang / /'chi ba med dang nad 'joms dang / /mig dang glang po che dang rta/ /glang dang khyi

dang bong bu dang / /rnga mo ma he sbyang ki rnams/ /cha ni mnyam po bya ba'o/ /mthe bong tshigs tshad tsam du ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag nas sbyar/ /dri chen chu dang rak+ta dang / /byang chub sems
ni tshad tsam ni/ /sngags bzlas nas ni sbyar byas te/ /byin gyis brlabs kyang bya ba 'o/ /phyag 'tshal dang ni yi ge AH/ /dbus su de bzhin hUM byas te/ /'bar ba'i hUM yig 'bar byed
pa| |dgu po de ni rab tu bsgrub/ /lan ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ /sngags bzlas nas ni phye mar brtag /yungs kar lnga yi tshad tsam du/ /lnga dang lnga ni 'byor bar bya/ /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu
bzhi la| |ril bu rnams ni byas nas su/ /pad+ma'i snod la bzhag byas te/ /stong phrag brgyar ni bzla bar bya/ /mtshams bzhi la ni bsgoms byas nas/ /nyin dang mtshan du bza' bar
@#/ /bya| |de ni bskal pa'i mtha' bar yang / /dngos grub rgyas par 'gro ba ste/ /gzi brjid mdangs dang stobs brtson 'grus/ /lnga pa la ni smon lam yang / /
mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa/ /ril bu chen po zos phyir ro/ /rdzas kyi sgrub pa rnams rdzogs nas/ /rig pa'i sngags rnams bdag la stsol/ /yi ge e dang baM yig dang / /laM
yig dbus su yang dag gnas/ /dang po'i mdog ni dmar po ste/ /gnyis pa yi ni mdog dkar ba/ /gsum pa kha dog ser ba rnams/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /
'khor lo ltar ni bskor ba ni/ /nyin phyed dang ni mtshan phyed la/ /rig pa de ni rab 'byor na/ /de ni skad cig kho nar 'grub/ /lha mo lha min bu mo dang / /mi yi bu mo rnam pa bzhi/ /
sa yi dkyil 'khor kun tu ni/ /sngags kyis bkug nas spyad par bya/ /sgom pa de bzhin rig pa'i sngags/ /bdag gis bshad pa zin byas te/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni
bshad par bya/ /dga' ma sems kyis rtse gcig nyon/ /dkyil 'khor lus zhes gsungs pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor b+ha gar bstan pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor byang chub sems
dang ni| |dkyil 'khor gsum du brtags pa ni/ /brtags pa rnams kyang 'dus pa ste/ /gang du gtso bo skyed par byed/ /phung po rnams ni sangs rgyas gsungs/ /'byung ba rig
mar brtags pa'o/ /chags pa lcags kyu kho na ste/ /zhags pa pad+mar chud byed pa/ /kha phrad pa ni sgrog yin par/ /sgra bsgrags pa ni dril bur bshad/ /spos ni dri chen zhes gsungs te/
me tog rak+ta zhes 'dod do/ /mar me sha rnams kho na yin/ /dri ni byang chub sems zhes 'dod/ /sgeg mo ling+gar bstan pa ste/ /phreng ba b+ha ga kho na yin/ /dbyangs ma dbugs su bstan
pa dang / /gar mkhan ma ni rnal 'byor te/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang por gsungs/ /de rtogs pa ni skal bzang yin/ /rtogs pa de rnams byams pa sogs/ /de ltar nang gi
bdag nyid gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor gzhan ni sngon bshad zin/ /sbyin sreg las ni bshad par bya/ /nyon cig sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi/ /sbyin sreg phyi dang nang gsungs te/ /phyi ni
sngon du bstan pa yin/ /nyon cig khyod kyis nang gi ni/ /pad+ma bzhi rnams 'byor pa ni/ /lus kyi dbus su nye bar gnas/ /me dang de bzhin rlung dang ni/ /dbang chen dang ni chu de bzhin/ /
rlung gis me ni 'bar byas te/ /chu yis yongs su smin par byed/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /gang du me ni bskyod pa'o/ /ra yig mngon spyod yi ge ste/ /ya yig dbang
gi las kho na/ /la yig rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ /ba yig zhi ba zhes gsungs so/ /gang zhig zas dang btung ba ni/ /de dag thams cad chu la ste/ /pad+mar k+Sha yig kha mar lta/ /snying gi
@#/ /pad+mar btsud par bya/ /lte ba'i pad+mar 'gro phyi rol/ /kha sbyor tshul gyi sbyor ba yis/ /gsang ba'i pad+mar 'gro ma thag /thal bar mtha' ru rnam par bstan/ /
de ltar sbyin sreg bdag bshad pa/ /nyin dang mtshan du bya ba ste/ /rtag par rgyun du zas zos na/ /tshe 'di kho nar 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgas pa med cing nad kyang med/ /'chi ba med
cing 'bras rnams med/ /de ni glo bur 'chi ba med/ /'tshe ba thams cad zad 'gyur zhing / /rmi lam ngan yang zhi bar 'gyur/ /bzang po skal par gson pa ste/ /sems can thams
cad dga' bar smra/ /mthong ba tsam gyis bskul byed do/ /sbyin sreg las rnams bshad byas nas/ /lha mo mchod pa bstan par bya/ /dri dang phreng sogs gos rnams dang / /spos me
zas dang lha bshos kyis/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab 'byor nas/ /bdag la mchod pa rnams ni bya/ /bdag ni thams cad sangs rgyas nyid/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas yin te/ /de
bas nan tan thams cad kyis/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu mchod/ /gang zhig 'ga' yang bya ba'i las/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bsgom/ /zas dang btung ba de bzhin gos//
de bzhin dri dang phreng kho nas/ /rig ma bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'i/ /bdag ni lha nyid bsam par bya/ /de ltar bshad nas rdo rje de/ /cang mi gsung ba'i dngos por bzhugs/ /de nas lha
mo bzhi rnams kyis/ /phyag gi thal mo sbyar gyur te/ /dgyes pas rab tu zhal bzhad nas/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /rnam par mi rtog pa thob ste/ /dang mi gsung bar bzhugs
gyur to/ |lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las/ lha mo sgrol mas zhus pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam pa gsang chen zhes bya ba'i rgyud
lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa dpal o D+yan gyi yul nas byung ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i de kho na nyid rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti nyid kyis bsgyur
cing zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya nI laM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ru dra bi tri bi na tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can
drag po gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bdud rnam
par 'joms pa bdud kyi sde dang lhan cig tu 'og man gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi pho brang na thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon
po can sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rjes su gnang ba 'di lag na rdo rjes zungs cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag
@#/ /bye ba dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa/ mig me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs me lce ltar
'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can/ pad+ma dang chu lhas lag pa dang dpung pa brgyan pa/ nor rgyas dang dung skyong gis dbu la brgyan pa/ sprul rin po che 'bar ba'i cod pan thogs
pa| klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas snyan cha byas pa/ rkang pas sprul gdug pa 'bar ba mnan cing za ba/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su bcings pa/ sprul nag
po se ral khar thogs pa/ bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma khro gnyer du bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/ lce glog ltar 'gyu ba/ gshin rje'i cha byad can/ gsus po che
sprul za ba/ rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pas rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma'i steng na bzhugs pa/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs
par byed pa/ a la la zhes bsgrags pas skrag par byed pa/ klu thams cad brlag par byed pa/ gad rgyangs chen po rgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa/ gshin rje'i gzugs
can khams gsum 'jigs par byed pa/ klu rnams 'dul bar byed pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bstod nas gsung du gsol zhes
smras so/ /de nas nam mkha' de nyid la gzhal yas khang dang / 'khor lo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i drag po chen pos 'khor bsdus nas/ phyag na rdo rje drag po che/ /rdo rje khro bo
drag chen 'joms/ /rdo rje gzi brjid sngags kyi gtso/ /rdo rje mi thub 'jigs byed che/ /rdo rje 'phrin las kun don mdzad/ /thabs 'dul 'khor lo che sku la/ /'byung ba lnga yi bdag
nyid che| |mdzes ldan 'od zer can dang ni/ /mdangs can sgra dbyangs rlung 'byin te/ /skyed byed las kun sgrub pa la/ /'gugs shing sdud dang sdom zhi mdzad/ /mtha' brtul
las rnams sgrub pa la/ /thig le'i rang bzhin mi shigs la/ /kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las/ /bgegs rigs stong phrag 'joms mdzad pa/ /'khor lo'i bdag po khyod la bstod//
sa bon rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /thabs dang shes rab sreg gso mdzad/ /bde chen rab tu gsol mdzad nas/ /sdug bsngal nyon mongs 'joms la 'dud/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba
d+harmA NAM A d+ya nu t+ma n+nA twA ta oM AHhUM/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya
ba byin nas 'khor rnams spros te/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das/ legs so legs so/ /de'i phyir 'di'i gsang sngags las thams cad sgrub pa/ /sdig pa thams cad
@#/ /'joms pa/ drag po gsum 'dul ba 'di gsung du gsol zhes brjod nas bskor ba byas te spyan sngar 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dug go /de nas sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig sngags 'di gdug pa can rnams 'dul ba'i don du brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/

b+ho b+ho paM nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i daM nI lam+ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badzra pA Ni hr-i da yaM/ ya sa mA ti kra ma tha/ mA ku la uta sA da naM b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ ma

ti kra ma tha/ ha ra ha ra nA gA nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ b+hiM da b+hiM da nA ga marma Ni/ bi shIn+tu nA ga sha rI raM/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya nA ni/ tad+ya thA/ hUM phaT/
nA ga bi dA ra NA ya phaT/ nA go ta sA da nA ya phaT/ nI lA ba sa nA ya phaT/ a pri ta ha ta ba la ba ra kra mA ya phaT/ kri tAM tA ya phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta ru pA ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ trA sa
nA ya phaT/ kuSh+mA Na Do ta sA da na ya phaT/ pre ta pi sha tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a pasma ra bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha

ya| sar+b+ba big+h+nAn bi na sha ka rA ya phaT/ sarba sha trU saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ de'i cho ga ni/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis zin pa la
chu la sngags btab ste gtor na btang bar 'gyur ro/ /klu zlog par byed na/ smag shad kyi lcug ma'am/ bal po se'u'i lcug mas bya'o/ /yi dwags dang brjed byed rnams la ni/
skud pas bya'o/ /rims nad med par bya ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ge 'chus pa la ni/ skud pa sngon pos bya'o/ /nor 'dod pa la ni/ zhag gcig bsnyungs bar 'dug ste spos
kyis bdugs na/ rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston no/ /mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du me tog sngon po la sogs pas mchod la sngags stong bzlas nas
gsol ba btab na/ gser gyi dong tshe bdun stong sbyin par byed do/ /rgyas btab pa 'grol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o/ /sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na nyungs kar gyis bya'o/ /'jigs pa
thams cad las srung ba la ni/ rtsi mar snying pa dang thal ba dang nyungs kar gyis bya'o/ /nad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad la ni/ skud pa sngon po la srung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags
na| srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa thams cad la ni/ tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa mgul la btags na/ srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /chom rkun zlog par
'dod na sas bya'o/ /dug la ni/ rtswa ku shas bya ba par bya'o/ /bdag srung ba la ni/ yid kyis sam chus bya'o/ /gzhan srung ba la ni/ skud pa sngon pos bya'o/ /las de dag thams cad
@#/ /la sngags brjod pa ni/ gcig gam/ gsum mam/ lan bcu bzhi'am/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / bdud dpung dang bcas pa rjes su yi rang ste bstan pa la 'khod do/ /'phags pa lag
na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //bal po'i paN+Di ta de ba puN+ya ma ti dang / lots+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos
bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ bi b+hang+ga gu h+ya tan+t+ra NI tri ru dra da ma naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i rgyud rnams kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba/
'jam dpal rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje yis/ /gsang ba'i don 'di yang dag zhus/ /sgrub dang gnas dang mtshan nyid dang / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka'
stsal pa| |shes rab snying rje gsang dbang ldan/ /lcags 'dra'i ri dang bya skyibs dang / /nags tshal 'thug dang mchod rten nang / /zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa che/ /mche ba
gtsigs pa nag po ste/ /dkar po g.yas te khros pa'i mdog /hUM sgrog me lce 'bar ba'i dbugs/ /dmar ser g.yon te bzhad pa'i zhal/ /spyan dmar me dpung dang 'dra ba//
zla ba rgyas pa lta bu'i zhal/ /nor rgyas dung skyong ser pos dbu/ /dga' bo nye dga' snyan cha dmar/ /dpung pa pad+ma chu lha dkar/ /se ral 'dab bzang rigs ldan nag /tsham ngam rdo
rje sdigs mdzub dang / /thal mos bdud 'joms sbrul nag 'dzin/ /zhal gsum pa ste 'jigs pa che/ /sku gsum dag gis rab tu mtshan/ /pho nya gsum gyis gdug pa 'dul/
klu yi gnyen po'i gnod sbyin bdag /bdud 'dul tshangs pa'i pho nya ni/ /zla ba nyi ma dag gi steng / /glang chen kar ka gser gyi gdan/ /brgya byin ser po rdo rje 'dzin/ /tshangs pa ral gri
pad+ma 'dzin/ /klu 'dul sbrul nag 'dzin pa 'o/ /bdud 'dul dbang po nyi ma'i steng / /gnod sbyin zla dang stobs kyi steng / /klu 'dul ri steng rgya mtsho'i nang / /sbrul nag 'khyil pa stobs
ldan te| |mkha' dang ri bos mnan pa'i steng / /gser mdog stobs ldan gnyis kyi gdan/ /brgyad khrir zhabs bzhag ri rab mnan/ /me dpung sku la 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /khams
gsum khyab mdzad khro bo 'phro/ /sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i skur phyag 'tshal/ /de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /rdo rje me dpung 'od dang ldan/ /de nyid mkha' dang 'byung ba las/ /dur
khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'i gnas/ /bdag po'i sa bon las byung ba/ /zla nyi thod pa rdo rje las/ /drag po'i rtags ldan gtso bo che/ /mdzes ldan sku la yang dag 'khril/ /drag chen
@#/ /'dul mdzad dri za'i gtso/ /mdog dkar rtse gsum 'bar ba 'dzin/ /'od 'phro dkar mo sku la 'khril/ /'joms mdzad spu gri 'bar ba 'dzin/ /mgon po
gzi brjid gshin rje'i bdag /mdog ser dbyug thos gshin rje 'dul/ /mdangs ldan ser mo sku la 'khril/ /'ja' 'dra ba yi zangs dri bsnams/ /'brug sgra sgrog pa'i klu
yi gtso| |mdog dmar klu 'dul sprul gyi zhags/ /sgra yi lha mo sku la 'khril/ /mdog dmar gcod pa'i ste'u bsnams/ /'phrin las khro bo gnod sbyin bdag /ljang nag po
con gnod sbyin 'dul/ /rlung 'byin ljang gu sku la 'khril/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams/ /'gugs pa lcags kyu lcags kyu ste/ /sdud pa zhags pa zhags pa'i
bdag /sdom pa lcags sgrog lcags sgrog ste/ /zhi mdzad dril bu dril bu zhi/ /kha sbyor bde dang longs spyod dang / /chos dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo la/ /sa bon rab tu 'bar ba
yis| |thabs dang shes rab sreg gso mdzad/ /nyi ma zla ba'i 'phro 'du las/ /thig le'i rang bzhin mi shegs la/ /gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum
'dul zhes bya ba las/ le'u dang po'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i sngags ni khyod kyis zungs/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub pa dang / /sdig pa
dag ni zhi ba'i phyir/ /klu dang gnod sbyin bsdigs pa dang / /bdud rnams ma lus zhi byed pa'i/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas byin brlabs pa'i/ /rdo rje can gyi sngags bshad bya/ /tad+ya thA/

b+ho b+ho paM nA gA a d+hi pa ta ye/ i daM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badzra pA Ni hr-i da yaM/ yaHsa ma ti kra ma tha/ mA ku la uta sA da naM/ b+ha bi Sh+yan+ta/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ ma ti kra ma

tha| ha ra ha ra nA gA nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga marma Ni/ bi shI R+yaM tu nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya nA naM/ tad+ya thA/ hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA

rA NA ya hUM phaT/ nA go ta sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI la ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pri ta ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya phaT/ kri tAM tA ya phaT/ kr-i tAM tA rU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ tra sa nA ya phaT/ kusmAM

Do ta sA da nA ya phaT/ pra ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a pasma ra bi na sha ka rA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+naM bi nA sha ka rA ya

phaT| sar+b+ba sha trUM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ ni lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ zhes pa phreng ba'i gsang ba'i sngags so/ /sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gis gsungs pa'i rig
sngags 'di ni/ sdig pa thams cad 'dag pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ las thams cad 'grub pa yin te/ de yang rig pa 'dzin pas bsgrub ste/ dam tshig dang ldan
@#/ /pas so| |de yang bla ma la gus shing / /yi dam dkon mchog la dad cing / /byang chub sems dang sdom pa dang / /lha dang sngags la gus pa dang / /rgyun du rnal
'byor dang ldan te/ /rgyud don don la brtson ldan na/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin mdzad de bcom
ldan 'das la zhus pa/ dam tshig dag las 'das na las rnams mi 'grub cing / dag pa med dang don med dag ste/ 'bras bu gang du skye 'gyur zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje'i dmyal ba'i
nang du mi bzad pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de'i tshe'i tshad ji tsam du sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhes zhus pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje/ khyod legs so/ /legs so/ /skrag par ma byed cig /'dis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs bshig ste/ thugs dang 'gal bas rdo rje
gdan nam zhig tsam na thar bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje'i gdan nam 'jig par 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi sems can thams cad sangs
rgyas pa'i 'bras bu thob ste rdo rje gdan 'jig ste thar par 'gyur ro/ /bar ma do dang skye gnas 'jig pa dag yod do/ /de'i gsang ba'i sngags ni/ zla ba'i steng du yi ge a
bkod de/ chos nyid dag pa'i sngags brjod do/ /na maHsa man+ta badzra NAM/ sar+b+ba d+harmA ta badzra satwa hUM/ zhes phyogs bcur kha bltas te rdo rje thal mo sbyar te ye shes kyi 'od kyis gsol ba
btab la rdo rje sems dpa'i skur mos par bya'o/ /oM badzra satwa hUM/ zhes pa 'bum du brjod na/ rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'jigs byed che/ /me long me
long gsal ba'i sku/ /zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa che/ /mtshon cha 'jig la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs/ /chos dbyings chos dbyings
rnam par dag /zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /so so kun rtog kun rtog bral/ /pad+ma dri med pad+ma'i bdag /zhal gsum phyag
drug mtshon cha 'dzin/ /rgya mtsho skyes sku phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rin chen bai DUr gzi brjid 'bar/ /mnyam pa mnyam nyid ye shes sku/ /zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin/ /rin
chen rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal bstod/ /las kyi sku ste 'phrin las mdzad/ /bya ba bya ba sgrub pa'i bdag /zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin/ /'phrin las rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal bstod/ /

oM a nan+ta pa ra swAhA/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ A kaR+Sha ya baM d+ha ya swAhA/ ha ya gri ba ban+d+ha sho kA swAhA/ oM a pa re a pa ra dzi ta swAhA/ ro Sha Na ye b+h+yaHphaT/ de nas lha'i gsang sngags

@#/ /brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra kro d+ha trai lokya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ mA ra ya tsit+ta rbad rbad/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA kA la ya hUM phaT/ tsit+ta la kro d+hi duny+dza/ oM badzra kro d+ha nA ga hUM
phaT| mA ra ya rak+ta rngubs rngubs/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i te hUM phaT/ mA ra ya sod sod rbad/ de nas lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis rig pa phul ba/ ma hA de wa mA ra ya sod sod/ ma hA

yak+Sha a su ra mA ra ya ha na ha na/ nA ga ra dza mA ra ya dzaHdzaHma hA ma ni mA ra ya rngubs rngubs/ ma hA b+hUM mA ra ya tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA ya k+Sha mA ra ya b+hin+da b+hin+da/ kharga mA ra ya khos
khos| ma hA brah+ma de ye phaT/ mA ra Na sod sod/ mA ra Na bying bying / mA ra Na mugs mugs/ mA ra Na ha la ha la/ mA ra Na d+hu na d+hu na/ mA ra Na myos myos/ mA ra Na bying bying / thum ri li
li| thum ri li li/ dzaHdzaH/ bum pa legs par ldan pa yis/ /sman gsum rtsi sman sna tshogs dang / /kha di ra yi lo 'dab bcas/ /lcags kyi rdo rje'i khong gseng du/ /gsang
ba'i sngags ni brjod par bya/ /gnam lcags mchu ni stong pa ru/ /sprin bral ser ba gcad pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /ta d+ya thA/ oM Tak+ki tsa ti gu h+ya li
mi Sha sha gu gu/ shi ti bi ti/ hu ya hu ya pU ra ta swAhA/ oM badzra pA Ni badzrA Da ki nI na ga he he/ hu ya hu ya/ hu lu hu lu/ pU ru te pu ru te swAhA/ oM many+dzu shrI ya mAn+ta ka/ e ka a pa

ra hUM phaT/ oM ma Ni pad+me be sha pra be sha mA ma ru lu be sha kha thun b+h+yoHoM brah+ma swa sti/ puSh+TiM su ra kau shi ka/ ru dra I shwa ra/ biSh+Nu/ i sha ni/ ku mA ra shaM ka ra/ sma ra sha trUM swAhA/ oM

karkoT/ ku li sha /pad+ma/ ma hA pad+ma/ a nan+ta/ tak+Sha ka /bA su ki/ shaM kha pA la/ nA ga rA dza swAhA/ oM A di t+ya/ so ma aM ga ra/ bu d+haHbr-i haspa ti/ shu kraH/ sa nai sh+tsa ra/ ke tu swAhA/ oM

nak+Sha tra/ karti ka /ro hi Ni/ mr-i ga shi raH/ ar+d+haHpu narba suH/ pu Sh+yeHa sh+le ShaH/ ma g+ha/ pUrba pha la gu NI/ ut+ta ra phal gu NI/ tastA tsitra s+pha ti/ bi shA khA/ A nu rA d+hA/ dz+ye Sh+Tha/ mU laM pU rba

ShA D+hA/ ut+tA rA Sha D+hA/ sha ba NaHa b+hi dzi ta/ sha ta b+hi ShA d+ha niSh+ThA/ pUrba b+ha dra pA dA/ ut+ta ra b+ha dra pA da/ rai pa ti a shwi nI b+ha ra NI swAhA/ oM in+d+ra ya/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ ag+ni

rAk+Sha sa/ bA ya be/ I sha na sUR+ya/ tsan+d+ra lo ka pA lA ya swAhA/ bai shra ba Na/ dr-i D+ha raSh+Ta/ bi ru pAk+Sha D+ha ka /bi ru pAk+Sha swAhA/ oM de ba nA ga rA dza su ra gan+d+har+b+ha sh+tsa/ ga ru Da/ kin+na ra/ ma ho

ra ga /kuM b+haN+Da swAhA/ ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ sarba nA ga phuH/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ nA ga hr-i da yA ni phuHbin+da bin+da/ nA ga marma Ni phuH/ bi shIR+Yan+tu nA ga sha rI rA Ni phuH/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya na ni

phuH/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya phuH/ nA gota sA da nA ya phuHswAhA/ yak+Sha bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha kro d+ha sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha nI la ba sa nA ya phaT swAhA/ yak+Sha a pra ti ha ta ba lA ya phaT/
@#/ /yak+Sha pa rA kra mA ya phaT/ yak+Sha kr-i tAM tA ya phaT/ yak+Sha kr-i tAn+ta rU pA ya phaT/ yak+Sha ro Sha NA ya phaT/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams cad dbang du 'dus
par gyur to/ /gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba las/ gsang ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas cho ga yang dag
bshad| |maN+Dal me tog bcas pa'i steng / /mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa dang / /bum pa sngon po mgul chings bcas/ /mchod pa rnam lnga dang ldan pas/ /sgrub po dag ni snyung
ldan pas/ /rmi ltas rim pa gsal ba yis/ /nad pa dag la yungs sngags so/ /bcom ldan mgon po zhal gsum dmar/ /phyag drug rdo rje sdigs pa g.yon/ /drag po'i
thal mos 'jigs par byed/ /tha ma sbrul gdug ri rab mnan/ /'khor du gnod sbyin chen po ste/ /sha za rab 'jigs ral pa can/ /gdong ser ser gdong gnod sbyin mo/ /bong

bu'i rna ba rna ba 'phyang / /ral pa gyen 'greng ral gri so/ /gnod sbyin 'khor de lnga brgya bcas/ /yak+Sha bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha kro d+ha sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha ni laM ba sa nA ya hUM

phaT/ yak+Sha pra ti ha ta ba lA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha pa rA kra mA ya phaT/ yak+Sha kr-i tAn+ta ya phaT/ yak+Sha kr-i tAn+ta rU pA ya phaT/ yak+Sha ro Sha NA ya phaT/ ces brjod de chu la bsngags shing
gtor na/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon las thar ro/ /mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa'i drung / /tshon sna lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /mchod pa lnga dang ldan pas mchod/ /sgrub po dag ni snyung ldan
pas| |rmi ltas rim pa gsal ba yis/ /nad pa dag la tshon snas bcing / /bcom ldan mgon po zhal gsum ldan/ /phyag drug rdo rje bsdigs pa g.yon/ /drag po thal mos 'jigs
par byed/ /tha ma sbrul gdug ri rab mnan/ /mkhas la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan bdud/ /dga' rab dbang phyug thod phreng can/ /bum sna sen dgu sha za bdud/ /btsun mo me tog mdzes pa
dang / /'od zer 'phrog dang mdangs 'phrog ma/ /gdon rigs stong phrag brgyad cu'i 'khor/ /ma lus bcas pa'i sngags 'di ni/ /gnad la bor ba'i srog sngags so/ /pre ta bi shA

tsi bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa kro d+ha sA d+hA nA ya hUM phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa nI laM pa sa nA ya hUM phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa a pra ti ha ta ba lA ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsi pa rA kra mA ya phaT/
pre ta pi ShA tsa kr-i tAn+ta rU pA ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa ro Sha Na ya phaT/ nyi ma zla ba dag gi bar du rlung la bskyon te tshon sna lngas bcings te bskrad par bya'o/ /mchod rten sku gdung ldan
pa'i drung / /maN+Dal me tog bcas pa'i steng / /snyung bas khyi yi sha la bsgrub/ /rmi ltas rim pa ldan pas brtag /brgyad khri zhabs nub 'jigs pa'i me/ /gad rgyangs bzhad mdzad
@#/ /zhal gsum pa/ /nag po zhabs gdub gdug pa 'dzin/ /stobs chen rab tu gnon pa po/ /klu chen ma rungs gdug pa can/ /nor rgyas dang ni dung skyong dang / /
dga' bo dang ni 'jog po dang / /pad+ma pad+ma chen po 'o/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan rnams/ /rgya mtsho dag la gnas pa yi/ /klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag gsum/ /sprul pa las la
grub pa yi/ /glen pa nga rgyal rdzu 'phrul can/ /sprul ba 'bum sde 'khor bcas pa'i/ /ma lus pa yi sngags 'di ni/ /gnad la bor de'i rtsa sngags so/ /ha ra ha ra nA ga phu/ pra ha
