sar seng ldeng phur ba gdab/ /ston zla ra 'bring gza' rgod rgyu dus gtad/ /skya rengs shar dang nyi phyed nya la gtad/ /rdzas mchog ma phyung chu 'khyags nyin re 'bab/ /de nas klu rnams
@#/ /kun gyi gnyen po rak+ta tsa muN+Di zhes bya ba 'dis bskul bka' stsal to/ /hUM| sku ni gnam lcags 'bar ba la/ /dmar ser me yi ral pa can/ /dmar ser mi yi ral ba can/ /khams gsum
srid gsum kha na khyer/ /srid pa gsum ni lto na 'phyo/ /ya 'gal gnam la ma 'gal sa/ /nyi ma'i sman dang spyan nas 'char/ /zla ba'i skyin tang zhal nas 'char/ /ri rab rtse
dgu phyag na bsnams/ /mi bzad 'bar ma gtum chen mo/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' nyan ma/ /'dul ba'i gnyen po klu 'dul ma/ /thugs dam klu yi ban+d+ha 'dren/ /zas su klu

yi sha la za/ /klu yi gnas ris dbang du sdud/ /sngags bka' stsal pa/ oM nA ga zhung thun/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ phaDa phaDa swAhA/ las kyi go cha drug ni rab tu
gces| |log gnon gyi sngags bka' stsal pa/ nA ga li du ma la ya sa do ma d+he ba ku ru hUM hUM/ dzaHdzaHb+h+yo b+h+yo/ 'khor lo tshul du lus la'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo
rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mthar thug drag po'i las kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas 'khor de dag gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan nyid kyi
mtshams bcad ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes gsol ba dang / bka' stsal pa/ 'dul ba'i tshogs nyon cig /nga'i rang bzhin ni/ dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs par
rtogs par byos shig /nga'i rang bzhin ni/ skya ba med par rtogs par byos shig /nga'i rang bzhin ni/ 'gag pa med par rtogs par byos shig /nga'i rang bzhin ni/ stong pa nyid du
rtogs par byos shig /nga gang yin pa de ni/ gsang ba'i bdag po'o/ /nga gang yin pa de ni/ rdo rje sems dpar rtogs par byos shig /nga gang yin pa de ni/ khams gsum rnam par
rgyal bar rtogs par byos shig /nga gang yin pa de ni/ gtum po chen po nyid du rtogs par byos shig /nga gang yin pa de ni/ chos so/ /chos kyi phung po'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pas de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes shing dga'o/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ yongs su gtang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //rgya gar gyi mkhan
po a bA yu ga ta'i zhal snga nas zhus nas bod kyi lots+tsha ba chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra tsaN+Da tsit+ta gu h+ya tan+t+ra ut+ta ra/ bod skad du/
dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma/ dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kyai/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung
thugs kyi gsang ba'i bstan pa dam pa'i dbang ji lta ba'i gsang ba dam pa mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ngang las ma hA tsaN+Da kro
@#/ /d+hi hUM| zhes gsungs pas/ g.yon du khro mo gtum chen mo/ /mthing nag chen mo 'jigs tshul can/ /dbu skra kham pa gyen brdzes ma/ /spyan dmar
sdang mig bgrad pa'i tshul/ /mche gtsigs khro gnyer spyan gsum ma/ /phyag g.yas dril 'dzin gtso la 'khyud/ /g.yon pa thod khrag gtso la stob/ /zhabs gnyis gtsol
dgyes tshul 'khril/ /hi hi dgyes dang ha la'i sgras/ /thams cad g.yo zhing brlag par byed/ /dur khrod rgyan ldan me dpung nang / /sku la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs/ /de nas bcom
ldan dgyes chen po/ /dgyes pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas pas/ /nyid kyi mkha' la hUM oM ldan/ /nor bu dang ni rdo rjer ldan/ /rdo rje'i rtse mo'i sbubs mar phaT/ /yum gyi gsang bar pa
tra ldan| |pad+ma dang ni ze 'brur ldan/ /ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lo/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ yum rnam par 'phrul ba dang / mkha' gsang
rab tu ldan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bde rdzogs gangs lags bshad du gsol zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das
bde rdzogs chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor lo bde rdzogs zhes bya ba bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po mchog /bde skyong 'khor lo sum cu
gnyis| |dung dang kun da lta bur gnas/ /mi shigs hUM ni kha 'og bltas/ /mgrin chen longs spyod 'dab bcu drug /dbus na gser zhun lta bu maM/ /ya ba ra la kha dog bzhi/ /
phyogs bzhi 'dab ma bzhi na gnas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab brgyad de/ /hUM muM dbus te phyogs mtshams na/ /oM kro d+hi ha maM laM paM taM/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo drug cu bzhi/ /dbus
na oM dkar de bzhin du'o/ /me yi 'khor lo gru gsum raM/ /rlung ni gzhu 'dra ba dan can/ /dza nya phaT dang raM ldan pa'o/ /dbab dang bskyil ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /shin tu snod ldan
dam pa la/ /srin mtheb lces blang dbugs kyis drang / /byin rlabs byas pa'i shes rab ma/ /rang lus thabs ldan gtad pa dang / /bde ba dang ni bde ba che/ /shin tu bde chen bde
mchog yin/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ /'khor lo bde rdzogs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| sems can don du byin rlabs mthu/ /sngags kyi mthu rnams bka' stsol cig /ces gsol pa/ nyon cig lha'i dbang po/ sngon chad nga la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyis gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin par dbang bskur te/ da ltar ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /'di ni/ klu thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o/ /nyi ma sa sla la naM/ nA ga kun zhi/
@#/ /tsit+ta mu ling naM/ bzlog byer/ nA ga shig /nA ga bzlog /nA ga byer/ nA ga da ha da ha mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga ha na ha na/ mA ra ya phaT/ gsang ba gsang ba'i mdzod
'dzin pa'i/ /sngags des klu rnams brlag par byed/ /rdzas su bstan pa 'di lta ste/ /rtsa ba dang ni skyabs su bcas/ /lce pog nag po rgya tshil dang / /mgo gnyis pa'i dra ma g+ha d+ha/ /
sa yi dri dang rnam lnga'o/ /gdug pa thams cad 'jil bar byed/ /shu dag tshil chen rwa gzhob dang / /dri chen dri chu rma bya'i mdongs/ /byug dang bdug par bya ba'o/ /mu zi gla rtsi
dri chen dang / /zhun chen dri chu sbyar ba rnams/ /ltor btang gdon rnams rang zhir 'gyur/ /'dis ni rang nyid srung bar byed/ /nA ga sha ti du na dzibs/ nA ga tsi ta naM/ nA ga ni ra rbud
shAn+tiM sha du rtsubs/ nA ga A ro li ka shams/ nA ga dun dun/ gyen gyen/ nA ga sha ti/ ya ya/ tshubs tshubs du sha rbud/ dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma
las/ klu thams cad brlag par byed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum rnam par 'ching bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas 'jig rten 'ching byed kyi sngags gsungs pa/ oM e ka ya ma/ he ka ya ma/ hri ma ya ma/ sartsa tsit+ta gzer thun big+h+nAM zhes gsungs ma thag tu srid pa'i rtse mo nas
mnar med pa la thug pa yan chad sems rnam par myogs te lus ri mo bzhin g.yo ba med par bcings par gyur to/ /de nas dpung rnam par zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs te dpung zlog byed kyi gsang sngags gsungs pa/ oM e ka ya ma he du na rak+Sha he dun/ hUM dza hUM/ ya ma tsit+ta sha ma/ sha truM stam+b+ha ya naM d+h+r-i ka rbad ces gsungs
pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'khrugs shing dregs pa can thams cad rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba bzhin gyur te myos par gyur to/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs
gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ 'jig rten bcing zlog gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das khyung rnam par spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas khyung las la gzud pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags gsungs pa/ grang ti tig tig /gra ta brag shi ta ta le he du hUM phaT/ de nas yang sha trUM 'ba' zhig ba bsad pa thun mong ma yin pa'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rdo rje drag po thog 'bab ces bya ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM mA ra Na sod sod/ mA ra Na bying bying / mA ra Na rmugs rmugs/ mA ra Na ha la ha la/ mA
ra Na dun dun/ myogs myogs/ bying bying thum ri li li rbad dza dza/ nA ga la sogs sha trUM sbyar/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bsad pa
@#/ /sngags kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas yang lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ gdug pa can tshar gcad pa'i las khyad par can bka' stsal du gsol zhes
gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das khyung sgrol byed gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rab tu gsang sngags bka' stsal ba/ oM tad+ya thA/ oM Ta ki tsa ti/
guR+ya la/ g+h+yu li/ mi li sha sha g+h+yu g+h+yu/ sha da ti pi ri ti/ hUM ya hUM ya/ hUM tu ti swAhA/ 'bras dang so ba nas nag dang / /a ru ra rnams zhib btags te/ /dgu dang bcu gcig
bsgrub par bya/ /mkha' lding sgo nga sngags kyis bskor/ /'gram du bzhag la bsgrub par bya/ /mA ra Na sod/ mA ra Na bying bying / mA ra Na mugs mugs/ mA ra Na ha na ha na/ mA ra
Na du na du na/ ha la ha la/ myos myos/ bying bying / thum ri li li dza dza/ de nas gtor ma dbul bar bya/ /ba liM ta khA hi khA hi/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ mahA rag si pa to/ /sa ma ya swAhA/
gsol ba gdab cing 'phrin las bcol/ /gla rtsi shing kun sha chen dang / /lce pog nag po sha ri ra/ /byi ku stag gi sder mo rnams/ /ras su btum nas lus la bcang / /oM nyi ma

sa sla la naM/ g+hu ni zhi tsi ta g+hu li nAM/ tsit+ta mu dra zlog byer/ tsit+ta gu li nAM/ ya khra nA ga zlog /nA ga shig /nA ga mgo la nAM/ ha pa sa khre/ rtag tu stom changs gtor mas mchod/ /zhi bas
dug dbyung byad kyang dgrol/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi ru/ /nA ga'i gzugs bris dug can bzhag /tshon skud sprul bsgoms bcings ba de/ /spu gri 'bar bas gtubs shing
dbye/ /ri rab chen po'i phyogs bzhi na/ /dug bzhi las skyes rigs bzhi'i klu/ /sa chu me rlung dug bzhi'i bdag /bcings pa dgrol cing dug dbyung phyir/ /dug thub sgro la khyung bsam phyir/
dug bya ba rang rang gnas su gtang / /bden pa bdar zhing ting 'dzin gsal/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ rab tu gsang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas
bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bdud rtsi mchog bka' stsal ba/ rin chen bum pa tshad ldan la/ /dri yi rgyal po la sogs lngas/ /
phyugs la pog nag dud pas bdug /rtsi ldan 'o ma 'bras dang nas/ /til dkar dang ni a ru ra/ /ba ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /mngar gsum klu sman sna tshogs dang / /tsan+dan la sogs
drir sbyar ba'i/ /chu dkar lcug ma 'o ma can/ /kha rgyan byas te mgul ba yang / /dar ras sngon pos bcings byas la/ /maN+Dal gtsang ma'i steng du bzhag /lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis/ /
dri lcag sbu gur mchu bcugs te/ /dbugs ma shor bar rab tu bsnag /seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad dang / /sngags kyi mda' mchog la yang bsnag /bum pa la sngags 'bum
@#/ /tshar re| |bton nas snying rje'i yul la bkru/ /khong du btang na grol bar 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bdud rtsi bum khrus
kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas yang bdud rtsi bum pa khrol bu la sgrub pa gsungs pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po gtso/ /ting 'dzin gsang bar sgrub pa ni/ /dzA ti pha la nas
sngon mo| |'bras dang so ba ma gi ta/ /ting 'dzin bzhu btul byas te bsgrub/ /de la brtags byung phye mar bsgrub/ /byugs nas dri chus skyo mar sbyar/ /zhun chen sbyar te khong du btang / /bum
pa'i chu la lcags spug bsngags/ /mchod dang ting 'dzin brtson par bya/ /bum chus khrus bya lde gus byug /skyo ma zhu chen khong du gtang / /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las
bum pa khrol bu phye ma dang / lde gu dang / khong du gtang ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po dag /gdug pa'i dug la
rnam mang yang / /bsdus na rnam pa gnyis yod de/ /mngon sum dug dang rku dug ste/ /rkun thabs dug ni bzlog par dka'/ /gdug can nyon mongs gsum ldan te/ /gti mug che bas byol zong
rigs| |'dod chags che bas dbral bar dka'/ /shin tu zhe sdang che bas kyang / /dug ni rkun thabs dag tu gtong / /de phyir slar yang ldog par byed/ /phrag dog che bas rang rten la/ /gzhan gyis
gces na gzhan la gnod/ /rkun thabs dug gi mtshan nyid kyang / /thabs shing gdug pa'i dug glod kyang / /bar bar skabs su ldang bar byed/ /de zlog thabs ni shin tu'ang dka'/ /de yi zlog
thabs dam pa 'di/ /ngas bstan pa la the tshom du/ /gang zhig byed par gyur ba de/ /nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /grub kyang yal bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas lha yi dbang po dag /the tshom med

par nges par byos/ /tsan+dan dmar pos gtsor byas te/ /nA ga ge gsar ma g+hi ta/ /rgya tshil rgya mtsho'i wu ba dang / /phag rgod dag gi sha dag ste/ /yang na rgya tshil ma gi ta/ /phag rgod sha dang sbyar byas te/ /
lcags snod nang du lcags kyis phur/ /'bum phrag gsum du bsnyen byas nas/ /sgrub pas dkar gsum gzhan mi rten/ /'o ma so la chus lus bkrus te/ /nya la gnas drug thig le bya/ /mkhur
tshos gnyis dang dpral ba dang / /snying ga lkog ma lag mthil gnyis/ /thig le tshon gang ba re bya/ /lte ba pus mo gsang gnas su/ /ma g+hi ta nyid 'ba' zhig byug /thig le re la nyi shu gcig /de
ltar lo gcig bar du bya/ /gangs ri la ni nyi ma bzhin/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ rkun thabs kyi dug zlog pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang
pos gsol ba/ kye ma khro bdag rdo rje 'dzin/ /gdug pa'i dug gi mtshan nyid gang / /bzlog dang mi bzlog ji lta bu/ /khro bdag chen pos bshad du gsol/ /zhes gsol bas/ bcom ldan 'das
@#/ /kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bas nyon cig lha yi dbang po khyod/ /bsnyen dang sgrub brtags dang gnod pa rtogs/ /lcags zangs mi dang gcer bu bum pa thogs/ /
ba glang nya lci bas zas su za ba dang / /mi chen 'bar dang zab pa 'dzugs pa dang / /bskyed shing 'dzugs dang nyi ma shar ba dang / /bzang ba yi ni rtags su shes par bya/ /nyi ma nub dang nam
sros thur la babs/ /btson du bzung nas mi thig khur bskur dang / /sgrub po gzhan yul 'gro ba ngan pa'i rtags/ /lung pa dang ni bskams nas chu byung dang / /nya sprul sa rlung gsod dang 'tshod
pa dang / /rid dang skem pa de dag khri la 'dug /gcer bu spyi bcings tshogs kyis sems can gsod pa mthong / /'jigs pa'i chu mig bskams dang rtag tu nor bu rgyu/ /sbal sbrul zas
su za dang khyi spyang gsod la sogs/ /bzang ba yi ni ltas su yang dag shes par bya/ /chu nang chud dang spal sbrul lus la 'jug /de dag phyi bzhin du ni 'brang byed zhing / /sbrang bu mchu ring la
sogs lus la za/ /ba glang ma he'i tshogs kyis gdung nas 'ded pa dang / /khyi spyang tshogs kyis gzugs dang 'dam du tshud/ /'phag seng bu chung la sogs ston pa ngan/ /gnod pa'i
rtags su gting ring grog po ru/ /mi shong bzhin du phyin dang slar mi thar/ /ri brag dog mo lung dang phu rdugs dang / /lha khang gnas khang hrul por mi shong bzhin/ /sgo la 'dzul nas slar yang
yang mi 'thon dang / /chu ngan mtsho dang lu ma nya sprul sogs/ /phag pa ba glang ma he la sogs te/ /shin tu yid du mi 'ong gzugs mang ston/ /ri gzar mi thar lce spyang tshogs kyis 'ded/ /de dag
gnod rtags lus kyis nyams myong yang / /nul ba dang ni glu dang chang la dga'/ /nad dang nyams lci yan lag na ba dang / /sha ni 'gul 'phrig shu g.yan sha bkra dang / ngo lhog sha ro skabs su
zug gzer che/ /de dag gnod pa'i rtags su shes par bya/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bsnyen sgrub kyi ltas dang / gnod rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu
pa'o|| ||de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gyi lus la gdug pa'i dug lus la sleb pa'i mtshan nyid bshad du gsol/ /de skad ces
gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha mthangs bar du sleb pa'i dug /rtag tu snying yang mi dga' zhing / /sha rtsa za zhing 'gul dang 'phrig /rtag tu 'phrug snying 'bod pa dang / /
sha yang 'o ma'i spris ma bzhin/ /sha mdog me lce 'dra ba'o/ /skabs su sha mthangs bar dag na/ /chu grang blugs pa snyam byed dang / /shu ba bal bldags sha bkra 'o/ /gdug pa dug gis sha
la sleb pa ni/ /'phrig 'gul za sprid ber ba ltar/ /sha ni nag cing dmar la bem/ /du ba mig tu song ba bzhin/ /mig gi mtha' mchu yis gang / /mig kyang zlum la smin ma grugs/ /smin ma byi
@#/ /zhing mig kyang 'gul/ /sor mo rnams ni byi mjug 'dra/ /rtsa dang chu la zhugs pa ni/ /lus la dri ma nga ba 'byung / /chu bur dang ni chu rgangs dang / /de ni rtsa yi me tog yin/ /
chu ser mdog ni dung khu 'dra/ /chu ser sko rul mnan pa dang / /ko ba rul ba'i dri mnam pa'i/ /chu ser dag ni 'byung ba yin/ /ro stod mi bde blo yang 'degs/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid 'di dag dang //

'byung bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod/ /me 'od tsha ba 'dra ba 'ong / /tsher ma zug pa 'dra ba 'ong / /lus po che la 'brum pa 'ong / /kor tshe shu ba 'byung ba dang / /rma dang ser ka mi 'tsho ba/ /ko ra tshe tshor ba
med pa 'byung / /na tsha med pa'i shu ba 'byung / /tsha la 'khums pa 'byung ba yod/ /lus kyi nyams stobs chung ba 'byung / /glang shu ba dang sha bkra 'byung / /sha ro spal mig 'dra ba 'byung / /
sha sul thams cad 'gul 'phrig 'byung / /dug gis rus par sleb gyur na/ /phyi yi sha rnams kun bskams te/ /mdog ni sngo skya sha mdangs 'tshor/ /gos kyi mdangs kyang 'chor ba ste/
de ni thar bar mi 'gyur yang / /sngags dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin gyis/ /tshe ring skad gsang lus kyang bde/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ gdug
pa'i dug rus pa la sleb pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang bos gsol ba/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i dus kyi 'gro ba la phan
gdags pa'i phyir rdzas kyi khyad par bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po gtso/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi sems can rnams/ /
gdug pa'i dug gis nyen pa na/ /phan pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta bu/ /kun kyang sngags kyis bsgrub par bya/ /me 'od 'dra na spyang dug gtang / /tsher ma zug pa lta bu la/ /ra dug dang ni re lcag go /cha la

'brum pa 'byung ba ni/ /btsod dang spang spos gtang bar bya/ /sha ni kor tshe shu ba la/ /ra thug sred dang long rtol gtang / /rma dang ser ka mi 'tshon/ /khong du sgrub pa'i ma g+hi ta/ /de nyid drag

po'i sngags kyis gdul/ /kor tshe tshor ba med pa la/ /stag sha gser gyi me tog dang / /rgya tsha sbyar te gtang bar bya/ /sha bu thal ba bdud rtsis gso/ /mu zi ba bla ldong ros dang / /dri chu sbyar te

bsku bar bya/ /na tsha med pa'i shu ba la/ /bong ril ti tsha mar dkar bsku/ /tsha 'khums lce pog rwa ru gzhog /tsha dang zhun chen sbyar bar bya/ /lus kyi nyams stobs chung ba na/ /bum pa'i chu dang ma

g+hi ta| |sbyar te bkru zhing btung bar bya/ /dri chu zhun chen gtang bar bya/ /sha bkra gur gum phag tshil lo/ /gla shu 'dra ba byung ba ni/ /gser gyi me tog mu zi dang / /sngags kyi bya ba 'bad par bya/ /sha
ro sbal mig 'byung ba dang / /sha yi sul rnams 'gul ba la/ /gla ba mu zi lce mdog nag/ sha mthangs bar gyi dug rnams la/ /sa yi dri dang ma g+hi ta/ /shu dag lce bog ru rta dang / /gu gul nag po
@#/ /dri ma dang / /ro yi ro dang btsan dug dang / /byi gu gcig skyes mi phag bcud/ /yang na btsan dug lce po ga dang / /ldong ros dang ni sa yi dri/ /zhun chen dri chus bsdus te
bsku| |gu gul shu dag shing kun dang / /gla rtsi btsan dug ro yi ro/ /rus tshan btags te zhun gyis bsdu/ /ril bu byas te bsregs nas kyang / /yang dang yang du sna bug gdug /dug chen klu dang
de las gram pa'i gdon/ /skye rgu 'tshe byed gdon rnams gang yin yang / /bdug pa chen po'i dri 'od tshor ba yis/ /bdug pa can rnams klad pa rab tu 'gas/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis mun pa ji bzhin
no| |sha la zhugs pa'i gdug pa'i dug rnams la/ /byung ba'i rdzas rnams phyi nas byug /gdug pa can gyis rtag tu bdug /ma gzhi ta dang dri chu grang mor sbyar/ /bkra zhing khong du gtan du gtang

bar bya| |nad rnams 'byang zhing sbu sogs byi ba skye/ /rtsa dang chu dag gnas pa'i dug /byug pa gdug pa chu bo'i gzhung bzhin du/ /khong du gtang ba'i rdzas ni 'di lta ste/ /ma gzhi ta ni dri yi chus
sbyangs te/ /a ru ra dang sbyar ba rgyun mi gcad/ /rtsa yi gnas su nad rnams dwangs snyings 'byed/ /dwangs snyigs phyed pa'i nad ni phyi ru 'byung / /gangs kyi ril nyi ma lta bu'o/ /dug rnams rus pa
dag la rgyas/ /khong du gtang ba'i rdzas ni rgyun du gtang / /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ gdug pa'i dug rdzas kyis 'dul ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis
pa'o|| ||de nas yang lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ gdug pa can shin tu yang tshar gcod pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig dbang po chen po'i lha/ /gdug pa shin tu tshar gcad na/ /sreg pa'i las la shin tu brtson par bya/ /thab khung gru gsum sor brgyad pa/ /khrag dang
dur khrod sol bas byug /dkyil du rdo rje rtse gsum bri/ /zur du mchod rten gsum bzhag ste/ /de steng drag po'i snod bzhag la/ /nang du gru gsum rtse mo lha'o/ /gdug pa'i shing yang zur gsum brtsig/

dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar lhor bya/ /shing shun dag la sha trUM yang / /brgya rtsa brgyad bya dug sna dang / /tsha ba gsum dang bong bu'i chu/ /rnga mo bya rog brun yang bsags/ /lha yi ting 'dzin mchod

sngags kyis/ /ting 'dzin gsal te lha la dbul/ /sreg pa'i sngags ni 'dis bya'o/ /sarba big+h+nan mA ra ya dz+wa la raM/ stong rtsa brgyad dang brgya rtsa brgyad/ /lan grangs mang du byas pa yi/ /thal ba chu
chen gzhung la bor/ /thabs khung 'og ma'i thal ba yang / /khyi yi dri chen tsha ba gsum/ /bsres te sha trUM gzugs byas la/ /nA ga staM b+ha nan zhes rgya gram dkyil du mnan zhes gsungs so/ /dpal
rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ dregs pa can shin tu tshar gcad pa sreg pa drag po'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas yang lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kye
@#/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mnan pa'i las ni bgyi pa yis/ /shin tu tshar gcod ji ltar bgyi/ /zhes gsol pas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha yi
dbang po chen po nyon/ /rus spal khog pa kha sbyar du/ /rgya mtsho sbu ba khre rgod dang / /nA ga gsar cu gang dang / /dkar gsum sha chen sha ri ra/ /ma g+hi ta yis gtso byas te/ /ru rta dang sbyar
ro nye'i shubs/ /re bas btums te sngon dmar dkri/ /sngags kyis mda' la sum stong bsngags/ /nA ga s+t+waM b+ha nan/ /brgyad gsum dbus ma'i zla zer la/ /nub kyi rgya gram sum mdo'am/ /yang
na gnod pa'i sa phyogs su/ /shug pa'i phur pas khru gang brko/ /der bcug g.yam pa rgya gram can/ /de steng mnan pa'i ri rab gzhag /de dag byed tshe dman zas spang / /kha zas dkar gsum
mngar gyis bya/ /sha rul khrag rul rgya tshol dang / /sngags mda' sngags dang ldan pa yis/ /rang gnas brten pa'i bar du gcad/ /thog drag lta bur sngags las bya/ /rtsa gcig bar du gnod mi
'gyur| |dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ phyir mi ldog pa'i mnan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang pos yang gsol pa/ /kye bcom
ldan 'das/ gdug pa can de dag de nyid kho nar 'gro ba la rnam par 'tshe 'am/ de dag gzhan dang gzhan dag gi mthu yang gnon par 'gyur/ gal te gzhan dag gi mthus kyang 'gro ba ma rungs
par byed na/ de ji ltar yongs su bsal bar bgyi/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig dbang po chen po lha/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi sems can la/ /gdug pa'i
du gcig zhugs gyur na/ /pho nya tshogs kyis ma rungs byed/ /btsan dang rgyal po 'god po dang / /dngos grub 'tshe ba byed kun du/ /de dag de nyid shes gyur na/ /de dag rang gshed rang gis byed/ /rA

dza tsit+ta rbad nan/ tsa hu ra thums dza mA ra ya rbad nan/ /oM tri tsit+ta rbad nan/ tri tsit+ta rbad nan/ hab shaM tri tsit+ta rbad nan/ /ru tri tsit+ta rbad nan/ /rA dzA tri ga nan/ tsa hur thuM dza mA ra ya rbad/ sde brgyad spyir

'dul ba ni/ oM AHhUM badzra sarba duSh+TaM/ trig nan/ e hur thuM dza mA ra ya rbad/ gal te rgyal po gdug pa dag/ shin tu che bar 'gyur ba na/ /ku sha rtswa la brgya byin gzugs/ /mdze mo'i sogs pa g.yas pa
la| |khrag chen gyis bri snying gar rtsal/ /tri badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ lce pog gis gdug sngon dmar bcings/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /gru gsum nag por bcug byas la/ /lcags kyu

phyag rgya bcas la dgug/ tri badzra tri badzra/ yak+Sha duSh+TAn badzra aM ku sha dza kro d+hiM krol sha/ rA dza tha ma naM/ rA dza sha trUM mA ra Na phaT/ rA dza a mu kaM /b+hak+Sha Ni gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ gr-ih+Na mA ra ya phaT/ phur pa
gdab cing lcag gis brab/ /de nas bskor ba'i 'khor lo bca'/ /rtsa ba'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la/ /ku sha'i gzugs bzhag phyi rtsibs la/ /re mig bcu bzhi ldan pa la/ /rtsibs la gzugs bris bong khrag
@#/ /sbyar| |re mig cha la bskor sngags 'god/ /du tri pa tri dkor ba khaM rbad/ ya tri dkor ba khaM rbad/ yungs kar khrag sna dug snas brab/ /yang na chu bo'i gzhung la
bskur/ /yang na phugs rdugs grog por mnan/ /de'i tshe zhing lcags drag tu bsnun// //dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs

gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi slob dpon a ba yu ga ti la dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba bla ban chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis zhus te bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra tsaN+Da tsit+ta gu h+ya tan+t+ra ut+ta rot+ta ra/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje ga tum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de nas 'khor de na gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje gtum po zhes bya ba 'khod pa stan las langs te bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas mig 'dzum dang bcas pas rang gi spyod pa
las shin tu spa gong bar byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ /kye bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i dus na gdug bcan gyis sems can la rnam par 'tshe zhing rnam pa gsum
gyis sems can ma rungs par bgyid de/ reg pa'i dug gis kyang rab tu yang gzir bar bgyid do/ /kha rlangs kyi dug gis ni/ rab tu myos shing shin tu yang lci bar bgyid do/ /mthong ba'i
dug gis ni/ za zhing 'phrug cing tsha bar byed do/ /'phro ba kha rlangs kyi dug can dang / reg pa lus kyi dug rnams kyi gdung ba bsal ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes
zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig gnod sbyin gsang ba'i bdag /dug gsum dug gi rtsa ba yang / /dug gsum las ni byung ba yin/ /rtsa ba'i dug la rang bzhin
med| |de ni dug gso sman gyi mchog /sman nyid rang 'byung gzhan la min/ /de nyid rang dang gzhan las grol/ /rtsa ba'i dug la rang grol na/ /dug gsum la sogs gzhan du med/ /dug lnga
las 'phros 'byung lnga'i dug/ /kun rdzog tsam du 'byung ba 'joms/ /de dag rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir/ /rang bzhin rang grol bdud rtsi yis/ /rtsa ba'i dug sogs 'joms par byed/ /lha yi skur
dang sngags kyi mthu/ /ye shes 'byung ba chen po yis/ /las kyi 'byung ba 'joms par byed/ /rdzas kyis kyang ni de bzhin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud
phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ dug dang dug 'joms byed kyi le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas gnod sbyin gtum pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye bcom ldan 'das/ dug chen de dag smin pa
la| |gdon pa'i las dag gang gis bgyi/ /nan tan gyis ni bka' stsol cig /ces gsol pas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ badzra sarba Sh+Ti tsit+ta rbad nan/ mahA kA la tsit+ta
@#/ /rbad nan/ sarba sha trUM mA ra ya rbad nan/ zhag grangs nyi shu gcig tu bya/ /nam langs nyi ma shar kha ru/ /stong tshar re ste de bzhin du/ /srod dang tho rangs nam
gung la| |me khrag gsum dang dug sna dang / /drag po'i rdzas rnams dag gis brab/ /nA ga'i gzugs byas rdza yi nang / /gzugs nad phu la sngags phreng bskor/ /rdzas nang thal chen
'brub khung du'o/ /sngags bar rtsa ba'i 'khor lo yis/ /kha chod sme gos nag po dgab/ /de nas drag po'i sbyin sreg bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud
phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ gdug pa srog gi 'khor lo'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang gsungs pa/ nA ga'i gzugs la reg bya ni/ /sngags kyi 'bru bzhin sngags bkod
do| |klu rgyal bzhi gzugs mthar gzhag nas/ /gdug pa las kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /dang por zhi ba tha mar drag /dang por drag la tha mar zhi/ /thog ma gnyis ka zhi dang drag /oM nA ga rA dza
sa ma ya/ a pa lA ya tsit+ta dzA lA ya sa ma ya swA hA/ nyi shu cig gis mthar dbyung ngo zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ dam tshig srog
gi 'khor lo 'jam pa dang rtsub ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas yang gnod sbyin gtum pos gsol ba/ kye bcom bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
la gnad pa dang / gdug pa can 'dul ba thun mong gi las bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thun mong phyi ru gsad 'dod na/ /'phrin
las mi 'gyur 'khor lo bskor/ /'khor lor gzhug dang gzugs la gdab/ /gsad pa'i 'khor lo lto sbyar du/ /gang dmigs gzugs de khrag tu bri/ /snying gar ming bri lte ba la/ /shwa
rI ra ste mgo bo la/ /ban+d+ha ban+d+ha zhes pa dgod/ /yan lag bzhi la ha na ste/ /mA ra ya bral gnyis dang ni mtshan ma la'o/ /dmigs pa'i sa nas zag pa'i rdzas/ /blangs te bong bu'i chus sbrus la//
sha trUM gzugs bya yig 'bru rnams/ /gnas su bkod de sngon mar bcing / /dug rdzas gtum pa'i rdzas kyis gtum/ /brtson khang bskur te thun rnams dbab/ /zla ba gcig tu gnag par
bya| |bdun bdun bskor bya bar bar du/ /mchog pa'i las bya mtshan thun dbab/ /sreg dang mnan pas mtha' brtul bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi
ma'i phyi ma las/ 'phrin las mi 'gyur ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas gnod sbyin gtum pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i dus na gdul dka'
ba'i gdol pa rnams kyi lo tog 'joms pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lo tog 'joms pa'i las bya na/ /nA ga gzir
@#/ /te gzhom par bya/ /zhes stobs kyi yi ge 'bru bzhi dang / mi 'gyur ba'i yi ge 'bru gsum gsungs pa/ oM hUM badzra gsungs so/ /sarba duSh+TA na/ zhes thams cad dbang du sdud pa
so| |nA ga tsit+ta rbad nan/ /zhes klu'i snying gzer drug pa gsungs so/ /sarba duSh+TA na/ zhes thams cad dbang du sdud pa gsungs so/ /pho shar shar phob/ ces chu 'khyags kyi snying po gsungs
so| |gcig tu dril zhing brdegs par bya/ /nA ga'i gzugs bcad sngags bkod nas/ /yungs kar brde gcing phur bas gdab/ /mdze thod nang du klu gzugs gzhug /khrag chen btsan dug
gla ba'i khrag /yungs kar yungs nag bsngags shing brdeg /klu gzugs ni ma pa'i chu nas dbyung / /dang po chu 'phrul che bar 'dod/ /nya ma thag pa na dbab las bya/ /bsad cing ro ru
'dugs pa na/ /dus las yol te phebs mi 'gyur/ /rtags dang ldan par gyur pa ni/ /bdag nyid ting 'dzin ldan pa yis/ /drag po'i sngags kyis klu gzugs gtum/ /rdzas dang thod
pa chu mig mnan/ /drag po rgyu ba'i dus dang sbyar/ /'jig rten ldog par the tshom med/ /ces gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ chu 'khyags
lo tog 'joms byed kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas dregs pa thams cad shin tu yang yi rang bar gyur/ ljon shing la dus kyi rlung drag pos bskyod pa bzhin 'dar bzhin
du 'khod de bka' bzhin du bgyid do/ /zhes 'dzer cing sbyan sngar na 'khod pa pa las gnod sbyin gtum pos gsol ba/ gye bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i dus kyi bstan pa la gnas pa'i slad du
las gnad la dbab tu gsol zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdud rnams las la gzhug pa ni/ /kha rag nag po khra mA ya nr-i mA ra dzA na khu ga dzA/ btsan rnams las
la gzhug pa ni/ A bi shu rag sha tshal pa tshal pa a nr-i tri dzAHdzaH klu btsan las la gzhug pa ni/ nA ga rA dza shu la a/ tri dza dza mA ra ya nr-i lo sod/ rgyal po las la gzhug pa ni/ tro ta ni
tro ta ni/ pa tra pa tra/ shU la shU la/ d+ha sha dri ba mA ra ya nr-i dzaHdzaHrbad/ klu rnams las la gzhug pa ni/ nA ga gur ling / snying khrag bam rul/ nA ga ra ra he sa tang rbad/ phu du ma shi

kha la rag sha rbad/ gnyan las la gzhug pa ni/ u ta kha kha da ra sing+ga ga sha kha la ni dun mA ra na du na rbad dzaH/ de dag gi phyag brnyan las la gzud pa ni/ dza la dza nr-i ha na nri ma du / snying

kha la ni dza dza dza ni rbad/ phu kha la rag sha rbad/ ling+ga byad gzhug re bas dril/ /rta nag thod par bcu gnas kyang / /nub kyi phyogs kyi bra gnag rtsar/ /mthun pa'i rdzas dang ming byang sbrag /
rta nag lug nag snying dag dang / /lug nag mthing nag dar gyis brgyan/ /rta nag thod bcug brag rtsar gtang / /mthun pa'i ming bris dug gis brab/ /mthing nag dar dril mdze thod gzhug
@#/ /ba dmar rta dmar snying dang gzugs/ /thod par bshos cha dmar por gzhug /chu mig brag gi rtsa ba ma/ /rtse na brag dmar yod par gtad/ /ming rus bris la za
'og dril/ /'jon mo spre'u'i mgo co ru/ /rta dang bya dang lug dkar snying / /spyan gzigs dkor 'bru za 'og dril/ /thod par bcug ste lha khang gi /them pa'i 'og tu mnan par bya/ /sha trUM
spal nag lto bar bri/ /glang dmar ra rur bcug la dril/ /rtsi sman 'bru dang rin po che/ /ba dmar glang rur blugs nas kyang / /nA ga gdug pa'i lag tu gtad/ /mdzo dre'i thod par ming byang
gzhug /chu rta'i gzugs dang rta sngon snying / /thod par bcug ste rgya mtshor bskyur/ /tsa ra dmar po'i thod pa ru/ /sha trAM mi gzugs dar dmar dril/ /sngon dmar dog pas dam du
bcing / /bya dmar ra dmar snying dang gzugs/ /thod par bshos cha dmar po gzhug /byang phyogs brag dmar rtsa ru mnan/ /sngags pa'i mi dbyang bris nas kyang / /tsa ra sngon mo 'grong
par gzhug /mdzo rtol ba glang dre 'u'i yang / /thod par bcug ste chu 'gram dang / /shing gcig rtsa ru mnan par bya/ /ting 'dzin sngags dang rdzas rnams kyis/ /rang gi bya ba nan tan
byos| |zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ bstan par gnod pa che ma la dbab pa'i le'u sngags kyi phong bstan pa ste drug pa'o// //
de nas gnod sbyin gtum pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i dus na gdug pa can phyag brnyan bcas pa'i sbyor ba'i mthu zlog pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nas sbyor ba'i mthu bzlog na/ /rang lus sbas te de dag gi /mig gi 'bras bu gcar bar bya/ /rang lus spa bar bya ba ni/ /skye 'gro mig
gi 'bras bu gcar/ /nag po khwa ta'i 'bras bu dang / /tsa ra rog po'i 'bras bu gnyis/ /mig la bskus te nor bu btsal/ /rnyed nas lus bcang ri khrod 'grim/ /de dag rnyed par ma gyur na//
gser dang dngul rdo zha nye'i rdo/ /spra tshel dang ni a ru ra/ /ba ru ra dang pi pi ling / /pho ba ril rnams cha bsnyams te/ /bzhus te rdzi dang rlangs la gzab/ /de dag gzhan gyi sbyor pa yis/ /bdag
gam gzhan las 'tshe 'gyur na/ /dregs pa kun gyi 'bras bu gcar/ /lto 'phye'i sha dang spal 'dra'i sha /sa chu dag na gnas pa'i mi/ /glang ma'i sgron shing 'bras bu dang / /me ma btang ba'i du ba
dang / /nyag gcig po yi dri chen dang / /sems ma chags pa'i sha rnams kun/ /legs pa nan tan byas bcas nas/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams kyis/ /rnam par dag bas mthong mi 'gyur/ /gdug
pa'i klu rnams 'gras pa'i gdon/ /de dag 'bras bu gcar ba ni/ /phag pho rog po'i don snying lnga/ /lce pog nag po gser lum dang / /tha nu'i thang nyams rnyed gdung ste/ /lus la bcangs par gyur
@#/ /pa na| |sha mig rnam par dag pa yi/ /klu chen brgyad kyis bltas gyur kyang / /mthong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs
gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ lus rnam par spa ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon lag na rdo rje gtum po dang / gnod sbyin gyi
ded dpon lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can dang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon lag na rdo rje stobs po che dang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon lag na rdo rje gsang pa'i bdag po dang / de dag la sogs pa
'dus pa chen po rnams rab tu yi rang ste lan brgya stong du mar mchod cing bskor nas mngon par bstod do/ /de nas lag na rdo rje bzhi la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje bzhi po dag/ rgyud 'di
dag gang na gnas par khyed kyang rjes su 'brangs la rgyud 'di 'chad pa dus gsum du mchod cing bkur bar gyis shig/ de'i dgos pa gang ci yang rung ma lus par sgrubs shig /phyi ma'i
dus na o tre'i yul du rgyas par 'gyur gyi/ der srung bar byos shig ces gsungs nas chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la bzhugs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi
ma'i phyi ma las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi slob dpon a ba
yug ti la dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bla ban chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis zhus te bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po

lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM mu tsi ni swA hA/ mu khe sa swA hA/ mo ha ni swAhA/ din+ti ri swA hA/ cho ga ni/ chu khyor ba gang la bzlas pa byas te 'thungs nas sems bzhin du nyal na/ lag na

rdo rjes rmi lam ston par 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam mthong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni yak+Sha ma hA ru dra badzrA na la dzi hwA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad
du| phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gnod sbyin drag po chen po rdo rje me lce'i rgyud ces bya ba/ 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
'das thams cad 'byung ba'i yum btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs te/ de nas gnod sbyin drag po bye ba phrag bcu dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na drag cing gtum pa'i
rigs ji snyed pa thams cad thabs cig go /de nas bcom ldan 'das drag po'i skyil mo krung bcas nas g.yas pa nam mkha' la bsgreng / g.yon pa sa la bgrad nas spyan ldog pas phyogs bcur gzigs
te zhal nas hUM ha zhes pa'i sgra cher byung ngo / /de nas 'khor thams cad gtso bo mi snang bas yun ring du brgyal bar gyur to/ /de'i skad cig de la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bo'i gtsug nas sangs rgyas
@#/ /thams cad kyis gnang ba/ sngags rnam gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa/ phyag brnyan lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba/ kha dog sngon po cher grags pa/ phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje
rtse dgu pa thogs pa/ g.yon pa na nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po drag po thogs pa zhig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so/ /de nas nam mkha' lding gi gshog pa bskyod pas rgya mtshor zhugs te klu'i
rgyal po dga' bo dang 'jog pos rang gi bdag po'i spyi bor 'dud do/ /nye dga' bo dang dung skyong gis rna cha byas so/ /rigs ldan gyis mgul rgyan du byas so/ /pad+ma dang pad+ma chen pos lag gdub
tu byas so/ /sprin gyi shugs can gyis se ral khar bcings so/ /hu lu hu lus ska rags su byas so/ /'brug sgra dang bdud 'joms kyis rkang gdub tu byas te/ slar bdag po'i lag pa
g.yon par song ngo / /de nas gnod sbyin bye ba phrag bcu dang / drag po'i rigs rnams brgyal ba las sangs te phyogs kun tu bltas pa las phyag brnyan lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho'i nang du 'dug pa
mthong nas rings par kye ma a la la bdag cag gi gtso bo nyid bzhugs so/ /zhes brjod nas song ba las phyin te bltas pas cher drag pa/ skra kham pa gyen du 'phags pa/ mig me mdag gi
phung po ltar 'bar ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ lce glog ltar 'gyur/ /gsus pa rdzing bu ltar 'khyil ba/ rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pa rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ klu'i
rgyan cha bdun dang ldan pa/ lag pa g.yas na rdo rje rtse dgu pa thogs pa/ g.yon na nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po drag po thogs pa/ sku byin po la dpag tshad nyis 'bum drug khri yod pa bzhugs so/ /
de nas gnod sbyin rnams kyis gsol pa/ gtso bo/ khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i don drag po rgyas par gsol cig /bdag cag rnams kyis zhu bar ma spo bas so zhes gsol nas
lag na rdo rje la gos sngon po dar la bai DUR+ya zhun ma'i nang du btsos pa zhig bla gos su gsol to/ /stag gi pags pa drug stong gis sham thabs su bcings so/ /de nas lag na rdo rje rings par
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te mdun du snying po dang ldan pa'i skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' dang sa gzhi la
gzigs nas bar snang du yang spyan gyis 'khor bar gzigs so/ /de nas khaM bruM saM zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod do/ /de nas lag na rdo rje stan las langs nas rdo rje thal mo rang gi snying gar sbyar te
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba drag po'i don bdag dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhu na/ ci bcom ldan 'das kyis
skabs dbye bar gnang ngam zhes gsol ba dang / ci yang mi gsung bar bcom ldan 'das gdug pa'i tshogs nges par 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs
@#/ /ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i gdug pa thams cad snying 'dar bar gyur to/ /de nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs nas
lag na rdo rje la gzigs te/ byed pa g.yon pa'i chu shing snying po nas drangs te bkug pa'o/ /byed pa skyes pa'i chu shing sgra dang bcas pas brkyang ba byas te gnas so/ /de nas lag na rdo rje phyag
rgya de nyid yang dag par rig ste tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/ khyed la sogs pa'i 'khor dag sa phyogs 'dir ma gnas par phyogs gzhan du de nges shig /gal te mi 'gro na khyed la sogs
pa'i snying 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes brjod pas sgra gnas kyi khung bur sgrib byed kyi tshogs song ste snga ma bzhin du 'khod do/ /lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las/ gleng
gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas phyag na rdo rje yis/ /thub pa'i sku la 'di skad gsol/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje drag po'i don/ /rgyas par bdag la bshad du gsol/ /gsang ba'i
bdag po legs par yang / /nyon la yid la zungs shig khyod/ /nga yi gsang ba gang min pa/ /rdo rje drag po gang yin pa/ /de la mtshan nyid gzhan med de/ /khyod nyid kyi ni rgyud dang yang / /
khyod kyi bya ba'i las bshad bya/ /skye ba bzhis bsdus sems can rnams/ /gdug pa can gyis gtses gyur pa/ /thabs su ldan pa'i zlog pa yi/ /mtshan ma nges par bshad par bya/ /
ba ni rnam par snang mdzad de/ /dza ni mi bskyod thub pa'i sku/ /ra ni rin chen 'byung ldan sku/ /me lce'i yi ga 'bru gsum po la/ /dang por gtso bo bshad bya ba/ /pA ni rdo rje 'joms byed ma/ /Na
ni pad+ma 'joms byed ma/ /i ni kun 'gro 'joms byed ma/ /'og btags gsum po ming mthar sbyar/ /e ni kun tu go byed de/ /ra ni smin par byed pa ste/ /ba ni kun nas sdud pa yin//
sa ni yongs su rten pa'i las/ /ya ni yang dag bskyod par bshad/ /go 'byed gnyis pa'i steng gnas pa'i/ /sna ldan ngag tu shes par bya/ /de las nges par byung bas na/ /kun snang
gang yin dngos dang sbyar/ /bsam pa'i dngos la 'jug rnams kyi/ /yan lag thabs rnams thams cad du/ /gong du smos nas brjod pa yin/ /don du gsal bar zlos pa yis/ /tshig
ni rgyas par brjod mi dgos/ /las las grub pa'i gzugs rnams la/ /drag po yongs su ston pa dang / /gnod sbyin be con thogs rnams la/ /gtso bo'i don du bshad pas na/ /tshig tu
nges par yang dag brjod/ /khyod kyi lung 'chang rab dga' bas/ /de nyid rigs su byung ba ste/ /kun kyang drag po'i las la dga'/ /snang ba dag par mi mthong bzhin/ /de nyid la ni nges par
brjod| |gong du bstan pa gang yin pa/ /so so dag la gdon mi za/ /sbyor ba sna tshogs nges bsgrub na/ snang bar 'byor pa sna tshogs pa/ /mngon du rgyas shing nges par gsal/ /snang ba
@#/ /chen po bdag med par/ /rgyud pas yongs su 'grub pa yin/ /kun rdzob gong ma'i tshig lta bur/ /dngos po bstan pa lta bur mthong / /don dam 'og ma'i sgra lta bur//
nyon mongs kun bsregs rang bzhin gyis/ /'od gsal ba ru gnas pa yin/ /snying po don dam la 'jug pa/ /phyi rim kun rdzob la brten bya/ /dang por sangs rgyas mi gnas shing / /snga
ma'i bya ba sbyor bar brtson/ /dbang thob pa la rlom sems med/ /bla med man ngag nges pa las/ /bla ma nyid la ci nus kyis/ /yang dag par ni mchod par bya/ /rdo rje ngo bo kun 'byung
dang / /gdug pa thams cad sreg phyir gang / /dngos po la 'jug gong ma'i sgra/ /gong ma'i tshig tu brjod pa yin/ /lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las/ nges tshig gi
le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //gos sngon lag na rdo rje yis/ /sangs rgyas mgon la 'di skad gsol/ /gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba yis/ /thabs kyi dkyil 'khor gsung du gsol//
rig pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ /yang dag don dam dngos gyur na/ /dkyil 'khor lha gzugs med pa ste/ /'gro ba rtog pa la gnas par/ /de yi kun rtog bsal ba'i phyir/ /lha yi sbyor
ba bshad par bya/ /gang zhig mos par byed pa yis/ /khru gsum dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi pa/ /nags sam dur khrod khang stong ngam/ /gtsug lag khang ngam mchod rten nam/ /de dag
gnas su nges par brtsam/ /dang par bsnyen pa rab gnas pas/ /bu mo bcu drug ston mo byas/ /bdag gis zhag gsum khrus bya zhing / /spyi bo lkog ma snying ga ru/ /gsang ba gsum gyi
yi ge brtag /rams su btsos pa'i gos nyid la/ /gur gum thig le nges btab ste/ /de nyid la ni bskon par bya/ /zas su dkar gsum sbyin byas shing / /skyes pa dang ni 'phrad mi bya/ /snying po 'di
nyid 'bum tshad du/ /rang gis bzlas pas rig pa 'byin/ /de nas bsnyen pa rdzogs pa las/ /bu mo nyid la tshig brjod do/ /ba yi rnam lnga nyid dang yang / /rams dang mthing shun kun 'dus su/ /rin
thang mi brtsi nyor bcug ste/ /de nyid rigs mthun nang btums la/ /gnas gang yin par bdag la gtad/ /de yis zhag gsum sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya nges pa nyid dang yang / /snying po gong gi
sbyor ba yis/ /dri chu btab la grangs tshad du/ /phyin par yang dag bzlas par bya/ /de nas skud pa sngon po ni/ /bu mos legs par bkal ba la/ /sngags kyis dag byas rab mdzes pas/ /
srad bu dgu ru nges par bsgril/ /me tog sngon po'i nang btums la/ /seng ldeng phur pa lnga rnams kyis/ /srad bu yongs su bri bar bya/ /rab tu tshad du nges pa yis/ /phyag rgya ma la ngag
brjod pas/ /de nyid mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor legs par byas pa yin/ /'phang du khru gang tshad byas te/ /dang por byang shar mtshams nyid nas/ /kun rten kha dog
@#/ /rigs mthun blang / /yongs su bsdus byas nges par bya/ /gnyis pa gnyis pa nyid du nges/ /gsum pa gcig gi tshad dang ldan/ /de ltar tshad du ldan pa las/ /
shin tu mnyam par 'thas par bya/ /de nyid rjes su 'jug pa yis/ /dang po'i srad bu gang yin pas/ /kha dog ser po'i thig gdab bya/ /dkyil 'khor dgu ru nges pa las/ /'bru
dang sa dang rin chen dang / /phye ma nyid du btags pa yis/ /dkyil du pad+ma bcu drug pa/ /'dab mar ldan par bri bar bya/ /shar dang lho dang nub byang dang / /mtshams rnams su yang de bzhin
bri| |le tshe'i pad+ma gang yin pa/ /sna tshogs par ni yang dag bshad/ /mtshams rnams su ni mchod pa yi/ /lha mo yongs su dgod par bya/ /sgo bzhi dag tu khro mo bzhi/ /sbyor bas yang
dag dgod par bya/ /rin chen pha gu 'dod yon dang / /dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan/ /twa ra na ni bzhis brgyan cing / /sna tshogs rdo rje gzhir gnas yin/ /gdugs dang ri dwags gang yin
pa| |rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par sgeg /sngags pa byang chub blo ldan pas/ /keng rus phreng ba nyid dang yang / /sbrul mgo'i phreng pas rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje sna tshogs rab 'bar
ba'i| |phreng bas phyi rol legs par bskor/ /zur bzhi dag tu bum pa bzhi/ /rgyan gyis rdzogs par yang dag bri/ /de dkyil phyag na rdo rje nyid/ /snga ma'i tshul gyis yongs su gnas//
shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal nyid/ /yang dag par ni bri bya ste/ /kha dog dmar po nyid la yang / /dbu gsum phyag ni drug pa'i dbyibs/ /zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/ /pho
ni rdo rje nges pa las/ /mo ni dgra sta yang dag ldan/ /bar ma gnyis kyis 'ching byed pa/ /gung mo mthe bong nges mdud nas/ /gzhan rnams yongs su brkyang ba yin/ /de nyid snying po gang
yin pa| |snying gar yang dag bzung byas nas/ /de 'og pho yis zhags pa 'dzin/ /mo yis dril bu bzung byas pha/ /dang bo nyid la dgod par bya/ /lho ru nag po chen po nyid/ /kha dog
dud sprin lta bu la/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa'i dbyibs/ /pho nyid tsan+dan bde chen bsnams/ /mo ni zhags pa yongs su 'dzin/ /khro zhal gzigs pa mi bzad pas/ /phyogs
bcu rnams su rab tu gzigs/ /de nyid mgon po gang yin pa/ /phyogs gnyis par ni rab tu dgod/ /nub phyogs gsum par dgod bya ba/ /lus ngan sras po stobs po che/ /kha dog
ljang gu nyid la yang / /cung zad spyan ni rgyas pa nyid/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa la/ /spyi bor rdo rje rmog gis brgyan/ /g.yas pa nyid la rdo rje can/ /g.yon pa ne'u la'i rkyal pa 'dzin/ /
zhabs gnyis drang por rab gnas te/ /shar phyogs bltas pas yongs su gnas/ /byang phyogs bzhi bar dgod bya ba/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yongs su gnas/ /kha dog sngon pa de nyid la/ /
@#/ /rngam pa khro gnyer brjid pa'i zhal/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang stangs stabs tshul/ /phyag gnyis brang du ral bsnol te/ /g.yon du nges par cung zad gzigs
lhor bltas yang dag dgod par bya/ /byang shar rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ kha dog dmar nag 'jigs pa la/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum rab bzhugs nas/ /phyag g.yas gri gug rnon po 'phyar//
g.yon pa cang te'u drag po brdung / /gtso bo la bltas dgod par bya/ /shar lho rdo rje ro langs nyid/ /kha dog sngon skya rab 'bar la/ /mi bzad 'bar ba 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /cung
zad g.yas su nges par gzigs/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum tshul gnas te/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog rab bzung nas/ /gong srin la sogs gsum po rnams/ /dam por bkug pas yongs su
bsdams/ /mtheb mdzub bzhi rnams rab brkyang ste/ /spyi bor nges par bsnol bar bsnams/ /lho nub rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste/ /kha dog dmar skya nyid la yang / /shin tu mi bzad 'jigs
ba'i gzugs/ /zhabs gnyis mthil sbyar btsugs pa la/ /nam mkha' gru bzhi pa ru 'dod/ /lag gnyis sbyi bor thal sbyar nas/ /me lce 'bar ba yongs su 'dzin/ /thod pa lnga yis
mgo brgyan pa/ /gtso bo la bltas dgod bar bya/ /nub byang bzhi pa'i mtshams su yang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /zhal gsum phyag ni
drug pa la/ /zhabs gnyis dag tu rnam par bshad/ /g.yas g.yon dang po glang chen gyis/ /pags pa yongs su brkyang pa 'dzin/ /de 'og g.yas pas dgra sta la/ /g.yon pa rdo rje yang dag
'dzin| |gsum pa'i g.yas na lcags kyu ste/ /g.yon na mi mgo rlon pa bsnams/ /brkyang bskum tshul du gnas nas kyang / /gtso bo nyid la kha bltas bzhugs/ /mtshams kyi gru chang gang yin par//
'od skyed ma dang yid 'phrog ma/ /kun bzang ma dang glu sgra can/ /rang gi phyogs kyi kha dog la/ /shin tu zhi bas ldem bag can/ /phyag g.yas su ni me tog dang / /dri dang zhal zas sil snyan rnams//
gar gyis rol par yang dag ldan/ /nu ma cung zad 'bur ba la/ /dar dag dkar pos smad g.yogs pas/ /gtso bo la bltas mdzes pa'i gzugs/ /phyi yi gra ru dgod par bya/ /sgo rnams su
ni sgo skyong ni/ /srog gcod ma dang dbugs rdub ma/ /khrag 'thung ma dang sha za ma/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa la/ /stag dang seng+ge sbrul dang yang / /dom du yang dag gnas pa ste/ /phyag
g.yas tho ba rkyal ba dang / /hom gzar gri gug rnon po bsnams/ /g.yon pa rnams ni zhags pa nyid/ /kun kyang 'jigs par yongs su 'dzin/ /rang gi phyogs kyi kha dog ste/ /kun kyang nag po
shin tu sreg /g.yon brkyang g.yas ni bskum pa nyid/ /mche ba gtsigs shing rngam pa'i sku/ /shin tu khro gnyer brjid pa'i zhal/ /gar thabs kyis rol bde chen gnas/ /cung zad
@#/ /g.yon du gzigs pa yis/ /ha la ha la'i sgra yang sgrog /gzhan yang lha rnams de dag kun/ /thod pa lnga yis rgyan byas nas/ /rgyan cha lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /
kun kyang stag gi pags pa yis/ /smad ni yongs su dkris pa yin/ /de steng gdan ni rab gnas pa/ /gtso bo gnyis la nyi zla yis/ /phrag pa nyid la 'khor bar rgyu/ /tshangs pa dbang po lha
chen gnyis/ /zhabs gyis yongs su mnan pa yin/ /shar gyi lha chen rnam rgyal nyid/ /keng rus steng na bzhugs pa bzhin/ /gzhan yang de ltar gnas pa yin/ /sa bon gnas ba gang
yin pa| |sgra dang bcas pa shes par bya/ /dang po gtso bo skyed byed gang / /hUM las nges par rdzogs bya zhing / /gzhan rnams 'di las 'byung bar bsam/ /hUM maM baM aM/ yaM baM DaM b+haM/
braM maM saM shaM/ praM shaM raM laM/ de dag las byung sngags pa yis/ /'od dang bcas par ba der gshegs kyi/ /zhal nas 'byung bar yang dag ldan/ /de las rags pa gang zhig gis/ /
'bar 'phro nges par bskyed par bya/ /dang po kun kyang gcig pa yis/ /baM las gyur pa sna tshogs pa/ /yang dag par ni bskyed par bya/ /de 'og kaM las rab bskyed pas/ /skam por
yongs su brtag pa yin/ /de dag rab rdzogs sngags pa yis/ /sku ru yongs su rdzogs byas la/ /bdag gis rnal 'byor yang dag 'grub/ /de nas sngags pa blo ldan pas/ /rigs su
nges par gang yin pa/ /thabs 'di la ni 'jug par bya/ /kun la 'jug par gyur pa yi/ /khyab pa'i bdag po chen po ni/ /rigs kyi gtso bos sbyi la khyab/ /mdun ni rdo rje'i rigs yin te/ /lha
min la sogs nges par 'jig /g.yas pa nyid na gnas pa gang / /rin chen rigs su nges pa ste/ /sha za la sogs nges par 'jig /rgyab na gnas pa gang yin pa/ /pad+ma'i rigs su
yang dag ldan/ /nor la sogs pa gang dgod pa/ /re ba bzhin du skong bar byed/ /g.yon na nges par gnas pa gang / /las kyi rigs su nges pa las/ /klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa/ /ma
rungs pa rnams yongs su 'jig /gzhan rnams lhag ma thams cad kun/ /pho nya'i tshul du nges par gnas/ /dang po nyi ma shar ba na/ /las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs pa/ /so so dag la snying po
nyid| |gong du buM las rab rdzogs pa'i/ /brgya rtsa brgyad dag nges par bzlas/ /hUM gi sgra dang rab ldan pas/ /bdag nyid kha nas me 'bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snang bar bcas byas te/ /de
nyid stangs stabs bskyod pa yis/ /gdug pa thams cad sreg byed dang / /bder gshegs mngon par dgyes par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu bzung byas nas/ /khro bo 'i cha lugs gang yin pas/ /
phyogs rnams rmongs par byed pa yin/ /lha mo'i gzugs 'chang gang yin pas/ /gzhan gyi sems kyang 'phrog par byed/ /re mig rnams kyi bar gang yin/ /me lce 'bar ba yongs
@#/ /su bri| |'khor lo'i 'og tu gnas bya ba/ /chos 'byung phyag rgya nges par bri/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la/ /kun 'byung yul du nges par gsal/ /rten 'brel
yang dag 'byung ba yis/ /kun rdzob la ni don dam brten/ /rten pa nyid du yang dag gnas/ /de bas snang ba mi gsal bar/ /chos 'byung phyag rgya nges par yang / /rgyas pa la sogs ma
yin gyi| |drag po'i dkyil 'khor yin pa dang / /de bzhin dbyibs su rang gsal ba/ /dran dang bcas pas bri bar bya/ /mthu dang ldan pa'i gang zag la/ /stobs ni shin tu nges par skye/ /
dkyil 'khor lha gnyis mngon bsgrubs bas/ /lus la gzi brjid 'jug pa'o/ /rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las/ /dkyil 'khor dang lha'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //lag na rdo rje
gos sngon gyis/ /'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsol/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams dgyes bya ba/ /thabs de gang lags gsung du gsol/ /nang gi bdag nyid can dang yang / /phyi yi khrus
sogs rab byas la/ /rab gsal la sogs rgyun bcad nas/ /gang yang rung ba'i lo nyid la/ /ston zlar ba nas brtsams nas/ /lha min bla dang me tog gi /drag po dang po de nyid la/
/bdag gis sbyor ba nges par brtsam/ /dang po bdag nyid lus nyid la/ /rgyan cha lnga yis rab brgyan te/ /lus la gos dag sngon po nyid/ /bla gos smad g.yogs yang dag bcings/ /
spyi bo la sogs gnas lnga ru/ /sbrul gyis yongs su bcings par bya/ /rang nyid dkyil 'khor shar sgo ru/ /'dug pas sbyor ba brtsam par bya/ /de nas dang po bla re gang / /steng du nges par phub
byas la| |zur bzhi dag tu bdan bzhi/ /sngon pos yongs su dpyang bar bya/ /bla re dag gi dkyil dag nas/ /skud pa la brgyus me tog gi /phreng ba yongs su dpyang bar bya/ /de nas snga ma'i
tshul gnas la/ /gong du bstan pa'i gnas rnams su/ /bdag gi las 'di nges par brtsam/ /gtor ma'i las rnams kun rdzogs dang / /mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams dang / /seng ldeng phur

pa sor brgyad la/ /sngags 'di yis ni yang dag bsngags/ /oM badzra kI la ya sarba bi g+haM ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra pany+tsa dz+nyA na sho d+ha ya sar+b+ba tsak+Shu ka ra ya hUM/ sngags de dag gis phur
pu dang / /skud pa lnga la lan grangs ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas byas la/ /tsan+dan la sogs dri lnga yis/ /gos pra yang dag bcang bar bya/ /de nas sngags pa blo ldan pas/ /bdag nyid
srung ba'i 'khor lo brtsam/ /rang gi phyi rol mtshams su ni/ /mi 'gyur las ni bsil ldan sgom/ /de steng sdud pa'i dngos po gan/ /kha dog nag po yang dag bsam/ /de las khyab byed
rigs lnga pa/ /yang dag par ni bsam par bya/ /de nas yongs su rdzogs pa las/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil par dag bsam ste/ /rdo rje sdigs mdzub phyag rgya yis/ /sngags bzlas pas ni
@#/ /bgegs bskrad la/ /rigs gtso'i rtse mo de nyid la/ /kaM las lus skyob bsam bya ste/ /sbyi bor gnas pas khyab par bsam/ /de nas gtor ma de nyid
la| |gdug pa la sogs gang yin dang / /skye ba bzhis bsdus sems can la/ /las kyi bar chad mi 'gyur phyir/ /bsam par rdzogs par rin thang bya/ /de nas bdag nyid dad pa
yis| |mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams ni/ /bsam pa sngags kyis dbul bar bya/ /gong ma'i stang stabs las bya ba/ /g.yas pa nges par bskums pa las/ /g.yon pa legs par
brkyangs byas te/ /g.yas pa'i lag pas rdo rje nyid/ /phyar nas g.yon gyi be con dang / /rtse sprad spyi bor gnas byas la/ /g.yon pa'i be con g.yas spos la/ /g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon
pa yi| |lag pas bzung nas snying gar mnan/ /be con nges par bskor ba yis/ /phyogs bzhi mtshams su nges par gdab/ /kha nas hUM gi sgra 'bar zhing / /sna tshogs rdo rje gar thabs
kyis| |lan gsum bar du bskor bar bya/ /de nas gdug pa gang yin pa/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu song ba las/ /sa phyogs nges par gtsang bar 'gyur/ /de nas thig sogs gdab pa yis/ /sta
gon legs par gnas pa dang / /rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur la/ /rmi ltas nges par gdab par bya/ /bzang ngan ltas dag dbab pa dang / /bzlog dang mi bzlog bya ba gnag/ /shes rab
can gyis gsal bar brtag /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bzhengs bya'i phyir/ /bdag gis drag po dang po la/ /phye ma lnga la sngags dag dang / /phyag rgya bcas pas byin gyis brlab/ /de nas snod dag
thod pa la/ /byas pas rdo rje phyag rgya gdab/ /nges par las kyi sbyor ba brtsam/ /phyogs su nges par skor ba yis/ /dbugs rgyu ba yi dngos po gang / /yi ge mngon par gsal ba yis/ /rgyun
mi 'chad par bri bar bya/ /skabs kyi skad cig shes pa yis/ /rab tu khro gnyer bstan par bya/ /dang po nag po bri bya zhing / /gnyis pa dkar po nges par dgye/ /gsum pa nyid ni ser po ste/ /bzhi

pa dmar po yang dag ldan/ /lnga pa ljang gu bri bya zhing / /drug pa kha dog sna tshogs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor las rnams rdzogs pa dang / /rdzas su yongs su ldan byas te/ /gru bzhi dag tu byang shar gyi/ /
mtshams nas sa gang bu mo yis/ /blangs pa las byas mchod rten ni/ /sngon po bzhi dag gzhag par bya/ /de yi bskor ba'i rtse mo la/ /gong gi srad bu btags byas te/ /me tog sngon po'i phreng ba
yis| |'khor bar yongs su brgyan par bya/ /bum pa sngon po bcu bdun nyid/ /mtha' ma'i phyogs su nges par gzhag /sman dang spos dang snying po dang / /la na tshwa rtsi thog la sogs pas/ /legs
par bkang pas gnas pa yin/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan nas/ /lus la mngon par phyogs par gzhag /de nas sngags pa blo ldan pa/ /grangs dang nges par rab sbyar la/ /zhal zas zu
@#/ /med legs pa dang / /dri dang snang ba gang yin dang / /byug pa'i dri dang tshangs skud dang / /phreng ba ral gri be con rnams/ /yang dag pa ru dgod par bya/ /gdugs
dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /phyogs su nges pas yang dag gnas/ /de nas bdag po gang zhig gis/ /na bza' dar yug sngon po la/ /gur gum thig les legs bris la/ /de nyid la ni
dbul bar bya/ /yol pa sngon pos phyogs bskor la/ /phyi ma rnams kyis snang mi bya/ /gal te snang bar gyur pa na/ /rang gi lus las ma gtogs pa'i/ /gzhan rnams brlag par 'gyur ba
yin| |de bas legs par bsgrims pa yis/ /phyi rol gzhan la bstan mi bya/ /gang zag gcig pur gnas pa yis/ /las kyi sbyor ba 'di brtsam bya/ /phyag dag sngon du song ba yis/ /
mchod pa'i las la mngon par gzhag /bdag nyid las kyi phyag rgyar gnas/ /bsam pa mngon du gyur pa yis/ /kun gyi 'bras bu gang yin pa/ /bdag gis gsal bar rab tu brtag/
sngags dang phyag rgya rab ldan pa'i/ /mchod pa 'di dag nges pa las/ /bgegs bsal ye shes rab dbab pa'i/ /rnal 'byor rdzogs par yang dag gnas/ /rang rang rigs kyi phyag rgya yis//

sngags bzlas pa yis dbul bar bya/ /oM na mo nA lIM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nAM puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na mo nA lIM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nAM

d+hu pa na ra yA tA yA mi hUM/ oM na mo nA lIM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nAM A lo ke nir yA ta yA mi hUM/ oM na mo nA lIM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nAM gan+d+ha nir yA ta yA mi hUM/ oM na mo nA lIM

pa ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA naM nai wi d+yi nir yA ta yA mi hUM/ oM na mo nI laM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nAM shab+da nir yA ta yA mi hUM/ oM na mo nA lIM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA naM

tsa ni yA nir yA ta yA mi hUM/ oM na mo nA lIM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nAM bA sa na nir yA ta yA mi hUM/ oM na mo nA lIM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nAM gan+d+ha ra nir yA ta yA mi hUM/ oM na mo

nir laM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nAM spaR+sha nir yA ta yA mi hUM/ oM na mo nA lIM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la de ba tA nAM rat+na sarbA bstu nir yA ta yA mi hUM/ de yi sngags kyi mchod pa las/ /sdig
pa bshags pa'i sngags kyis su/ /phyag rgya nges par rab bcas pa/ /sdig pa bshags pa'i smre sngags kyis/ /lus ngag yid gsum btud pa yis/ /yang dag par ni bshags par bya'o/ /
bsod nams rjes su yi rang dang / yongs su bsngo dang skyabs 'gro dang / /sems bskyed pa dang gnas bzhi dang / /gong du bstan pa'i phyag rgya nyid/ /skabs 'di dag tu shes par bya/ /dang po
rgyu las skyes pa las/ /phyi nas dngos por mi gnas shing / /rang bzhin 'od ni gsal bar bsgom/ /lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las/ mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
@#/ /de nas lag na rdo rje yis/ /gsang ba'i mgon la 'di skad gsol/ /bsam pa rab tu rdzogs pa yi/ /nang gi rnal 'byor gsung du gsol/ /bde gshegs gsang
bas bka' stsal pa/ /gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba la/ /thabs kyi dngos grub par 'gyur/ /dang po shes rab can dag gis/ /bdag gi dngos por snang ba las/ /de nyid dad la
mchog nyid kyis/ /'od zer bsil ldan yang dag bsam/ /de la gang du gyur pa ni/ /dbyugs rgyu 'gugs par nges par bsam/ /de las gsal ldan rigs lnga pa/ /stong pa'i dpe las
mngon song ba'i/ /gzugs bzang ma sogs rig ma yis/ /mi 'chi lnga ldan dus 'gyur las/ /'dzin pa can la sbyin par bsgom/ /de nas sngags 'dis rab bsngags te/ /bdag nyid

rigs su ldan pa yis/ /bdag pos phyag rgya nges par gsal/ /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM badzra pA Ni hUM a ho a ha raM ta thA s+thi to yaM a ho ma ma pr-i yaM stu ti hUM/ bdag nyid dngos po la brten nas//
mtshan mar mi gnas ma skyes pa'i/ /gdod nas grub pa bsam bya ste/ /sangs rgyas dngos la rab sbyor bas/ /dang por dngos dag bsam byas nas/ /bdag nyid gang gi gzugs gnas
la| |steng du mig 'dra'i dngos po bsgom/ /de las gang du gyur pa las/ /'jigs byed rigs dgu nges par bsam/ /mig 'dra'i spu gu rab sbyar bas/ /snying po'i steng du gsal bar
snang / /snying po'i steng du chu bsgrubs pas/ /yan lag stong dang ldan pa nyid/ /spun la phyogs par kha bltas nas/ /bdag las gong du gyur pa yi/ /hUM gnyis las bsgrub steng ma yi/ /nges
par gsal byed sbyar ba las/ /dngos po'i snying por rab song ste/ /de las mi 'chi 'od ldan pas/ /'joms byed steng na rab gnas pa'i/ /mig 'dra'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan/ /'joms
byed mig 'dra gar mar sbyor/ /thabs dang shes rab gsum du nges/ /dngos po gsum las rab brgyud de/ /snying po'i steng du rab gnas pa'i/ /mig 'dra steng du nges par song / /rang gi gar
ma'i khyon tsam la/ /skad cig bye brag bcu drug pa'i/ /thabs su yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ /dang po dngos por brtag mi bya/ /rdzogs pa nyid la me 'bar bas/ /rim pa de nyid mi gnas shing / /
dngos po'i snang ba gang yin pa/ /mar me'i rtse mo lta bu yi/ /phyi nas rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i/ /dang po rab tu brtag par bya/ /rim pa gsum pa rab rdzogs yin/ /steng du paM gnyis rab
'bar dang / /hUM las skyes pa thub pa'i sku/ /yang dag pa ru brtag bya yin/ /'og kyang gong ma'i sa bon las/ /bskyed par bya ba kho na yin/ /sems dpa' gnyis su nges pa dang / /'khor lo
spros pas char lta bu'i/ /lo tog shin tu smin byed pa'i/ /skyon rnams spangs nas de nyid du/ /slar yang ngo bos yang dag gnas/ /de ltar gsal bar ma 'khrul bar/ /skyon gyis ma gos dri
@#/ /med do| |mkha' la kun zhes sems kyis su/ /rdo rje lam du rab zhugs nas/ /nor bu dri med zla ba yi/ /las la sbyor ba sna tshogs pa/ /mnyam par sbyar bas
bde ba'i mchog /mi 'dzag gnas dang ldan par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa sangs rgyas bde bas bde/ /lus la chags par mi lta zhing / /sems la chags pa chen por bskyed/ /de 'dra'i
spyod pas yongs bsdus nas/ /gang zhig mya ngan 'das pa las/ /mchog gyur mi gnas mya ngan 'das/ /sa la mngon par mi gnas shing / /kun tu 'ang mngon par mi gnas
pas| |ye shes rdo rje go 'phang nyid/ /brgyud pas mngon du byed pa la/ /'di la rdzas la sogs pa yi/ /'di yi dngos grub gang yin pas/ /nges par 'grub pas smos ci dgos//
shes rab can gyi las 'di las/ /chags pa chen por yang dag bsgrub/ /lus la me 'bar chen po yi/ /snying po 'di nyid bzlas pa las/ /rang nyid pad+ma gsang ba yi/ /drag po'i
rtags su nges pa ste/ /de bzhin rtag tu bsgrub par bya/ /sngags bzlas cho ga gsum las ni/ /khyad par nges par dmigs byas la/ /bdag nyid tha mal gzugs kyis gnas/ /de dag
phan tshun brgyud pa yis/ /zo chun brgyud pa bzhin du bsam/ /drag po'i bzlas pa de nyid dang / /rang bzhin rdo rje'i bzlas pa yis/ /rigs gsum yongs su bsdus pa yin/ /oM b+hau

b+hau bA na nA ga a d+hi ba ta ye/ i daM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badzra pA Ni hri da yaM/ yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha/ mA ku la uta sa da nAM b+ha bi ShaM te/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ ma ti kra ma tha/ ha ra

ha ra nA gA nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga marma ni b+hi shIR+Yan+tu nA ga sha rI raM/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga nA ya nA ni/ tad+ya thA hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ nA ga kro ta

sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI lIM ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pra rA kra mA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tA na tA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta ta rU pA ya hUM phaT/ ro Sha NA ya hUM phaT/ trA sa nA ya hUM phaT/ kuM b+hAn+Da uta sA da nA

ya hUM phaT/ pra ta pi shA tsi bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha a basmA bi nA sha kA ra ya phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+naM bi nA sha ka rA

ya phaT/ sar+b+ba sha trUM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ i daM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyAM pa ya ti swAhA/ oM daMSh+Da ka rA lo ki b+hI Sha na nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ye/ nA ga a laM kA ra sa pa te ke tu byA

g+h+ra tsa ra ma ni ba sa nA ya/ b+ha ma kA ra ga ru Da ra sa ti/ kro d+ha mUr ti na tre lokya da hA ya/ b+h+ya ma man+t+ra a sa na ru drA ya nA ga tsa ru ma b+hak+ShA ya hUM phaT/ oM trai lo kya b+hi dzA ya hUM phaT/ oM mahA kA la ro Sha

NA ya hUM phaT/ oM bai shra ma NA ya hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da la hi na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra yak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra ya be tA li ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra b+hai ra bA ya hUM phaT/ oM

@#/ /badzra pra b+hot+pa tA ye hUM phaT/ oM ma no hA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM sa man+ta b+had+ye hUM phaT/ oM sh+da gI t+ye hUM phaT/ oM pra NA pa te t+yai hUM phaT/ oM shwAM sa t+yai hUM phaT/ oM rA ga ta pri ya ni

hUM phaT/ oM mA na sa b+hak+Sh-i ni hUM phaT/ oM tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na sar+b+ba sid+d+hI ya hUM phaT/ oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzri Ni hUM phaT/ oM ba su rat+na bi ta hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta sid+d+hi hUM phaT/ oM saM sho d+ha ya ba ra ba ra hUM phaT/
oM tsa pa sha sa ba ni ra hUM phaT/ oM ku mA ra tsa sha ma Ni hUM phaT/ de nas phyogs bcu 'khrugs pa las/ /yi ge nges par gang yin pa/ /bla ma'i man ngag rab gsal bas/ /gcig tu bsdus pas
bzlas par bya/ /rang byung sngags pas bdag nyid la/ /grangs tshad bzung ba gang yin pa/ /rigs kyi dbang gis rnam par bshad/ /kun tu snang ba gang yin pa/ /rigs su bsdus nas ngag
gi yang / /spyod yul ma yin tha ma la gnyid/ /drag po'i snying po nyid la yang / /rang bzhin rdo rje bzlas pa yis/ /rigs gsum yang dag bsdus pa yin/ /gong ma'i sngags la rab bsngags pa/ /
mtha' ru kun la hUM gis brgyan/ /de mthar bskrad pa'i tshig dag gis/ /yongs su brgyan pas nges par bzlas/ /gang dang gang la las sbyor ba/ /de dang de las man ngag gis/ /mngon
par shes pas yang dag bshad/ /bzlas pa phun sum tshogs ldan pas/ /rab 'bring tha ma ldan pa yis/ /dang po sbyor ba nges pa dang / /mtha' mar las la 'jug pa la/ /grangs dang
cha ru rnam par ldan/ /spyod yul bsdus pa nges gsal ba/ /bdag gis gang la brtag par bya/ /dang por srid la chags pa dang / /bar du gang zhig gnas pa nyid/ /tha mar 'jig pa gang yin
pas| |sngags rnams thams cad rgyas par gsungs/ /'byung ba lnga dang rab ldan pas/ /de las chos rnams thams cad las/ /yongs su 'byung bas yang dag gnas/ /de dang rab sbyar dang po'i
don| |'di las grub par gyur pa gang / /las rnams sna tshogs gang yin pa/ /gdon mi za bar nges pa yid/ /lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las/ /nang dang sngags kyi le'u ste
lnga pa'o|| ||lag na rdo rje gos sngon gyis/ /bcom ldan mgon la 'di skad gsol/ /sems can smin par bya ba'i phyir/ /'jug pa'i thabs nyid gsung du gsol/ /kun
mkhyen mgon pos bka' stsal pa/ /dang por sa brtag la sogs pa/ /nges par gong du bstan pa ltar/ /las rnams nges par rdzogs par bya/ /sa phyogs dben pa'i khyim rnams su/ /ba yaM
rnam lnga la sogs dang / /rams dang mthing shun nges par sbyar/ /tha ma'i tshad du rab sbyar la/ /gur gum thig les yang dag gdab/ /zhal zas sna tshogs 'byor ldan pa'i/ /kun kyang lnga
lngar yongs su gnas/ /las rab mchog gi gtor ma la/ /rdzas rnams phun sum tshogs pa yis/ /sems bskyed pa dang skyabs 'gro dang / /gsang ba gsum gyi gnas rnams su/ /dri yi
@#/ /thig le rdo rje dang / /bcas pa'i gung mos kun bskus la/ /mi 'gyur gsum la sku gsum du/ /sngags 'di dag gis byin gyis brlab/ /oM tri ma ta bi sho
d+ha ya AHhUM/ de nas so shing dag la ni/ /sngags 'dis yongs su dag byas la/ /slob ma la byin so bkrus te/ /mig bkab bsam pa dag pa yis/ /de yi steng du bor bar bya/ /gang
du kha bltas me tog phreng / /rigs dang rjes su bstun pa las/ /de yi dngos grub brjod par bya/ /de nas srung skud sngon po las/ /sngags kyis dag par byas pa las/ /skyes pa g.yas
pa bud med g.yon/ /dpung pa dag la bcing par bya/ /bkra shis rtswa yi sngags dang stan/ /legs par bcug pas mtshan ma brtag /bzang ngan ltas su bcas pa dang / /bzlog
par bya dang bya mi dgos/ /shes rab can gyis rgyud gzhan las/ /'byung ba bzhin du brtags la bya/ /dang por bsnyen pa rab 'bring dang / /tha mar yongs su bsnyen byas la/ /de
'og sngags pa blo ldan pas/ /yang dag par ni sbyor ba brtsam/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sid+d+hi A/ oM sar+b+ba rak+Sha sarba sid+d+hi AHhUM/ rang bzhin mi gnas dogs pa yis/ /kun rdzob dri ma
sbyang bar bya/ /de nas sna tshogs 'byor pa las/ /gong du smos pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /yongs su rgyas par bri bar bya/ /rdzas rnams phun sum tshogs pa la/ /mchod pas yang
dag mchod par bya/ /de nyid gzugs la rab tu yang / /gnas pas bdag nyid de nyid du/ /yang dag par ni bskyed par bya/ /pad+ma nyid la gos la sogs/ /sngon pos yang dag dkris byas la/ /
bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis su/ /dri chus gtor zhing gzhug par bya/ /mdun du nges par gnas pa las/ /che chung de nyid 'byor pa yis/ /mon nyid khas dag len du gzhug /thal
mo bdag gis bzung byas la/ /sems bskyed la sogs rgyas par brjod/ /snang ba sna tshogs nges pa las/ /rigs ni rjes su gzung par bya/ /me tog sngon po'i phreng ba yis/ /sngags brjod pas
ni bor bar bya/ /de ltar lha tshogs rab bstan nas/ /bum pa'i chu yis slob ma la/ /dbang bskur slob dpon bdag nyid kyis/ /byin pa bum pa'i dbang yin te/ /rags pa rnam par dag par 'dod//
de nas phyag rgya bcas pa las/ /byang chub sems ldan ma nyam pas/ /bdag dang gzhan rnams gang rung bas/ /bde ba sngon du rab sbyar nas/ /bsam pas yang dag sbyar byas te/ /thabs dang
shes rab phyag rgya yis/ /de yi kha ru sbyin par bya/ /de dag gsang ba'i dbang yin te/ /de 'og rnam par dag pa yin/ /de nas bdag nyid dngos po gang / /bu mo mdog bzang sngon mo la/ /gar
dang ldan pa'i yangs pas bskyod/ /cho gas yang dag bzung byas la/ /thabs gnyis rab tu bskyod pa yis/ /sna tshogs dngos po snang ba yis/ /de 'og sor bzhi gzhal byas nas/ /shes
@#/ /rab gnyis la mnan pa yis/ /bde ba dpag tu med pa myong / /de myong skad cig rdzogs pa yis/ /dpe la bltas pa yin par bstan/ /de yis shes rab ye shes
kyi| |dbang nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de rdzogs sems nyid dag pa ste/ /bzhi pa chos nyid mngon rtogs dbang / /med pa mngon par snang bar 'gyur/ /de yis spyi la khyab gnas
te| |rang la yod bzhin nges par spangs/ /oM A khaM bI ra hUM/ oM ya thA ku la ta thA a haM/ sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag brnyan 'bar/ /de nyid du ni slob ma 'grub/ /dar la sogs pa sngon po
yis| |slob ma nyid la dbang bskur la/ /sngags 'di yis ni byin brlabs la/ /dang po gnyis sbyar dar bzung nas/ /sngags kyis yang dag bskon par bya/ /mkha' lding sngon po 'dab
rgyas pa/ /mgul pa dar dpyangs ldan pa yis/ /bu nyid la ni nges par sbyin/ /dngos grub sna tshogs 'grub pa dang / /gdon rnams thams cad 'joms pa dang / /be tson sngon po dbyig
dang ldan/ /me tog sngon po'i phreng bas kyang / /de nyid la ni bskon byas nas/ /sngags dang phyag rgya 'dir ldan pa'i/ /bu nyid la ni sbyin par bya/ /dang po gsum bar ba sbyar bas/ /spyi bo'i steng
du ngos bzung ste/ /de ni byed pa po la gzhag /bdag nyid yan lag rigs ngan gyis/ /dbus kyi g.yon pa bgrang byas la/ /rigs tshang yan lag bcings pa yis/ /phyar de byed pa po la
gzhag /de yi stod la gnas bya ba/ /tshangs pa chen po mthong byed dang / /mchod pa kun gyi sdud pa yis/ /dar dmar ras sam gang rung ba'i/ /sngags chus dag byas legs bkab nas/ /bzhi ru nges par
gcig pa yi/ /dngos po gang dag gdags par bya/ /phyag rgya 'da' min grags par ldan/ /bya bas sngags bzlas yang dag ldan/ /kun la khro gnyer brjid pa ltar/ /oM u da ra saM g+ha ba b+hu

ya hUM/ oM g+ha ru Da sarba nA ga b+hak+Sha hUM/ oM ba raM dan d+ha ka sar+b+ba sid+d+hi pra bta hUM/ oM a dz+nyo pa ya ti lo ke ba shi ka rA ya hUM/ de yi lag pa sgrom byas la/ /bdag gi drag po'i las sbyor ba/ /de yi

sgro ma nas drangs byas te/ /snying po 'di nyid nges par sbyin/ /oM tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na badzra pA Ni da ha da ha/ sar+b+ba bi g+h+nAM ha na ha na sar+b+ba na/ sar+b+ba ar+tha shI g+h+raM ku ru hUM/ de nas legs pa'i mtshan ma la/ /chos la
dbang sogs mi gnas na/ /'jug par 'gyur ba ga la srid/ /rgyud gzhan la ni spyi dbang gnas/ /des ni kun la 'jug par 'gyur/ /spyi nyid dbang la mi ltos par/ /de nyid la ni rtogs pa'i mchog/
'di yi 'jug pa kho na yin/ /lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las/ dbang gi le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas lag na rdo rje yis/ /gsang ba'i mgon la 'di skad
gsol| |thams cad rdzogs pa chen po yi/ /rim pa'i rnal 'byor gsum du gsol/ /bde gshegs gsang bas bka' stsal pa/ /steng dang 'og gi steng du gnyis/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi
@#/ /bdag nyid ni/ /thams cad shes rab dam pa ste/ /yon tan sdud sogs tshogs snying po/ /sa bon 'bras bu rnam pa yis/ /spar dang sgom la ltung bar 'grub/
rnam par snang mdzad gnas dag tu/ /rtsa gnyis gnyis kyi bdag nyid can/ /glo gtad rtse la ltung gyur nas/ /bde de gyen du ldog pas ni/ /thams cad gnas su gcig tu 'gyur/ /snang
ba mtha' yas gnas dag tu/ /brgyad gnyis shes rab ri mor bcas/ /dbus kyi byang chub thig le la/ /glo gtad snang mdzad gnas su phyin/ /de yis sangs rgyas thams cad bkug/
yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur/ /'og nas rang gi gnas su bsdu/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas dag tu/ /brgyad dang bzhi yi bdag nyid can/ /dang pos dang 'byung ba yi/ /nges pa'i ri
mo bsam par bya/ /rang gi sa nas mtha' yas bskul/ /'dres pas bde ba'i gnas su phyin/ /thams cad 'dres par rang gi sar/ /bde dang ldan nas de yis 'grub/ /sprul pa'i
gnas su bcu gsum la/ /gnyis pa gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /yi ge thig le bcas pa yis/ /'gro rnams bde ba'i gnas su spros/ /slar 'dus de ru dngos grub 'gyur/ /yang na rtag
chad bral ba yi/ /dbu ma chen po'i dbyings nyid du/ /ye shes phra mo mar gyis spros/ /dbyings la thug nas mar la byung / /de tshe mi gnas bsam dang bral/ /'dod chags dag dang ldan
gyur na| |gcig shos len pa'i yon tan ldan/ /rtse mor ma dang phaT ldan pas/ /tsaN+Da li yi drod byung nas/ /sems dpa' ye shes rtse la zungs/ /de yis yang sbrul gnas su bkug /snyoms
par zhugs shing g.yo bas bzlog /tha ma'i yi ge 'gro 'ong ni/ /zhu ba'i bsam pas bya bar gsungs/ /de nas de bsangs dngos grub 'gyur/ /yang na 'og gi thig le bzhi/ /rlung de sprul
pa'i 'khor lor 'dus/ /dro bar byang chub sems bkug nas/ /rtse la phyin nas nub byang bsam/ /slar log phar 'gro yang dang yang / /tha ma snyoms par zhugs grub 'gyur/ /yang na gnas
bzhi gsum po dag /gang yang rung bas steng du phyin/ /slar log rdo rje rtse la bton/ /tshur log gnas nas las rnams byas/ /des ni dngos grub chen po yang / /rdo rje bzhin du 'grub par bsam//
khams gsum thams cad dag pa dang / /zhing rnams gtsang mar skye bar 'gyur/ /bsam gtan de dang ldan pa'i tshe/ /gzhan pa'i yul du 'grub 'gyur spang / /spang ba ma yin blang ba min/ /
snyoms pa de yi ngang la gzhag /gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa yis/ /rang gi sems g.yeng 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /bstan pa'i rang bzhin med par bsam/ /bar du so so'i thig le bsam//
thams cad sgyu ma lta bur brtag /dang po dang po'i dus dag tu/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lha mor bsam/ /des ni rtog pa zhi bar 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las//
@#/ /las thams cad rdzogs pa chen po'i rim pa rnal 'byor ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas lag na rdo rje yis/ /bcom ldan mgon la 'di
skad gsol/ /'jig rten kun la phan gdags phyir/ /gtor ma'i rim pa gsung du gsol/ /kun mkhyen mgon gyis bka' stsal pa/ /rnal 'byor rnams la phan gdags
phyir| |bdag gis gtor ma bshad par bya/ /phan gdags pa dang tshar gcad pa/ /phan pa mchog dang thun mong ngo / /gsang ba bla med mchog tu 'dod/ /phyi nang thun mong shes par
bya/ /rgyas dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus/ /char gcod pa yang shes par bya/ /dgug dang bskrad dang bsad pa dang / /mnan dang bsreg par shes par bya/ /rgyun dus chen po'i gsum nyid
dang / /chung du rgyun nam dus chen gyi/ /bcu gnyis bzhi 'am tha ma gcig /rtsa ba lnga'am yan lag lnga/ /'bru dang shing tog sman rnams dang / /cha mthun 'bur ba la sogs rdzas/ /de
steng dkang gsum klu la shis/ /khrag sna snying sna sha sna gsum/ /de sogs mthun rdzas tshar gcad pa'i/ /bskyed rim dang ni ldan pa yis/ /bla gnas srung ba byas pa las/ /cho ga
gsum du byas pa'am/ /yang na skad cig lhar bskyed la/ /mtshan ma ldan pa'i pad+ma ru/ /rdzas rnams kun gyis bkang nas ni/ /zla ba rdo rje hUM gis mtshan/ /mtho gang la ni ri bong can//
de la bcu drug bdun pas mtshan/ /rdo rje mtshan ldan pa ru ni/ /sdud spyod 'phro ba'i mthing dmar dkar/ /pad 'od ye shes lnga ldan gsum/ /gru gsum 'og nas zla gam can/ /thugs kyi mthing nag
'phro ba las/ /rdo rje lte bskul mtha' gsum bskyod/ /dmar po 'bar bas mtshan ldan khrol/ /thugs kyis bsdus shing gsung gis sbyangs/ /sku las 'phros pas ri 'od bskul/ /shes rab
can las 'od zer 'phros/ /de yis yab yum bskul nas ni/ /kha dog dkar po'i bdud rtsi 'bab/ /dang po skul byed 'od du zhu/ /khong gseng gnas pa pad+mar 'bab/ /bab pa'i rting la de nyid
lhung / /lan gsum bskol bas 'o ma bzhin/ /bzhi pa'i dbang po gnyis par mtshan/ /de nas gdan bskyed 'khor bcas bkug /dzi baM rdo rje khong gseng gis/ /bzhi pa'i dang pos mnyes par

bsam| |yang na yud tsam lhar bsams la/ /thugs kar nyi ma de steng hUM/ /'od kyi chos 'byung gru gsum sprul/ /de yi nang du pad+ma ni/ /'dab brgyad dur khrod de dbus su/ /yaM las rlung byung raM las me//
de steng a las ka pA la/ /nang du bdud rtsi oM AHhUM/ /de steng zla ba rdo rje hUM/ /zla aM 'od 'phros bdud rtsi bkug /bsdus dang bzhu dang bdud rtsir bsam/ /yi ge gsum dang go rim bzhin/ /
thugs las 'od 'phros rlung la phog /rlung gis mer sbar thod pa bskol/ /de yi rkyen gyis bsdus pa dang / /gzhu dang mdung rtser bsdus pa dang / /yi ge gsum dang sbyar la dbul/ /yang na
@#/ /lha mo dkar mo yis/ /mtshan ldan dag ni bkang la mchod/ /yang ni skad cig lhar bskyed la/ /thugs ka'i hUM gis bdud rtsi sbyangs/ /slar yang ye shes bdud rtsi
'bab| |yud tsam sprul pas lha yis gsol/ /bstod nas gshegs shing las bcol lo/ /rgyas dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus/ /kha zas spyad pa bsdus dang mthun/ /de ltar yi
ge brgya pas bshags/ /lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las/ gtor ma'i cho ga'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas rdo rje gos sngon gyis/ /bcom ldan mgon
la 'di skad gsol/ /rnal 'byor thams cad bkra shis dang / /gnod pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir/ /sbyin sreg cho ga gsung du gsol/ /'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal
pa| |gzhan dag dran pa bskyed pa dang / /dngos grub ldan pa thob 'dod pas/ /man ngag rim par dran pa'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor don du bshad par bya/ /sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa yis/ /sgrub
pa yi ni dus dag tu/ /sbyin sreg gis ni las kun 'grub/ /sa brtag bslang zhing sbyang ba dang / /byin gyis brlab cing srung pa dang / /sa gzhi dkar po rgyar khru gang / /zabs sor bcu
gnyis zlum por bya/ /de dbus rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /sor ni brgyad pa dag tu bya/ /thab de ba yi rnam lnga dang / /nang kun dri ni dkar pos byug /dus gsum me tog dkar pos gtor/ /yaM
shing ni ma pa pa la sha/ u dum ba ra a mra la/ /sogs pa byang chub shing dag dang / /'dab ma can dang 'o ma can/ /rlan dang bcas pa mnyam bcad la/ /rtse mo'i cha las byung ba yi/ /mtho gang tsam ni
'o ma dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi la sogs pa/ /rtse gnyis lo ma bcas pa dbul/ /rnying rul gas dang 'bus zos pa/ /srog chags gnas pa spangs par bya/ /nas dang bra yos til dag dang / /'bras
can yungs kar mar dag dang / /me tog thang chu dri zhim dang / /ci tsam rnyed pa dbul bar bya'o/ /bud shing dag gi rnam pa yang / /thab las cung zad dma' bar ni/ /dgon pa'i ba yi lci bas
bya| |de nas sngags pa lus bkrus te/ /dri zhim spos dang bla bas byug /tshad med bzhi yi sems ldan zhing / /zhi ba'i rgyan bcas dkar pos bgos/ /lha yi rnal 'byor gsal
byas la| |srod dang snga dro'i dus su ni/ /shar phyogs su ni kha bltas la/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba bya/ /mchod yon 'bru dang bcas pa yi/ /dri zhim pa yi chus bcug la/ /rang gi lha
yi snying po brjod/ /las thams cad pa'i chu dang ni/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin sngags kyis bsang / /las rnams thams cad bum pa dang / /mchod yon g.yon du gzhag par bya/ /bud shing
bsreg rdzas g.yas su gzhag /de nas oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ zhes pas me ni sbar ba ste/ /rlung yab kyis ni me sbar ro/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM/ de ni me sbar snying po yin/ /de nas hUM gis thab
@#/ /bskyed la/ /de dbus raM las gru gsum ma/ /oM las pad+ma la gnas pa/ /raM las byung ba'i me lha ni/ /sku mdog dkar po rgyan dang ldan/ /'bar ba'i phreng
bas rab tu brgyan/ /gsus khyim che la phreng ba g.yon/ /guN+De 'dzin pa'i rdo rje me/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ /thugs ka'i sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /me lha ye shes sems
dpa' bkug /bkug cing dbang du bya ba'o/ /de nas dbang ni bskur ba dang / /sku gsung thugs byin brlab pa'o/ /de nas mchod yon phul nas ni/ /mchod pa lngas ni rab mchod do/ /
sgeg mo la sogs mchod pas mchod/ /oM ag+ne ha bya ka bya ba ha na/ ye ha bya ti ya na ye swA hA/ zhes pas bsreg rdzas rnams dbul bya/ /de nas dbul ba'i rim pa ni/ /'bar ba'i me la
