lha rdzas gzhu yang 'dzin/ /rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas sprin gyis 'bar/ /'di 'dra gang zhig rtag sgom pa/ /de yi rdo rje sems brtan zhing / /ring por mi
thogs byang chub thob/ /rga shi rnams kyi pha rol 'gro/ /sems can gyi stobs mtha' yas pa rdzogs par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po rdo rje shugs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /traM gyi
ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i bdag nyid de/ /zhal ras gsum ldan spyan gsum pa/ /thor tshugs cod pan rnams kyis brgyan/ /bde ba chen po kha dog dmar/ /ting
'dzin phyag rgya rnam par bzhugs/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas pa ste/ /phyag g.yas ni na rdo rje dang / /g.yon pa rin chen yongs su 'dzin/ /'od zer ser po 'phro ba las/ /rin chen 'byung
ba'i sprin chen nam/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyis/ /rin chen char gyis rgyas par byas/ /rin chen mngon par thob pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /khaM gyi
ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /don yod rdo rje bsam par bya/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya legs bzhugs pa/ /ma rgad ta yi 'od ltar 'bar/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri dang / /g.yon pa yis
ni lcags kyu nyid/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro zhing / /legs par grub phyir slar yang sdud/ /'od zer chen pos rab gsal zhing / /ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /'di 'dra rtag
@#/ /tu sems byed pa/ /nam mkha' snying po thub pa che/ /'du byed thams cad spangs pa yi/ /mkha' dang mnyam par de 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i snang bar byed pa'i ye
shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /la yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang brgyan/ /lha mo spyan gsum phyag brgyad pa/ /zhal gsum gser gyi
mdog dang mtshungs/ /sgeg pa'i cha lugs legs 'chang ba/ /cung zad bzhad pas 'dod chags ma/ /dang po'i phyag ni mchog sbyin mdzad/ /de bzhin gnyis pa mi 'jigs sbyin//
phyag gsum pa ni rdo rje ste/ /bzhi pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /rin chen snye ma gnyis pa na/ /gsum pa na ni bgrang phreng ste/ /bzhi pa gzhu yis legs
par brgyan/ /'od dmar 'od zer phreng ba can/ /lha rnams 'jigs pas sems myos te/ /lag pa thal mo sbyor bar byed/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro bar/ /ye shes rdo rje spyan
ma bsam/ /byang chub yan lag 'bras brgyan pa'i/ /lha mo 'di 'dra bsgom par bya/ /ye shes spyan gyis snang bar byed pa'i rdo rje 'jo tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ma yi ye shes
las bsgrubs pa/ /rdo rje rigs can mA ma kI/ /lha mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma/ /dgod cing zhal ras khro dang bcas/ /ut+pa la sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba/ /'od dmar shin tu 'bar
ba can| |dang po mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag /gnyis pa legs par rdo rje bsdams/ /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste/ /gnyis pa zhags pa legs
par bsnams/ /gsum pa yis ni gzhu yang 'dzin/ /rdo rje can ma sku gsum 'chang / /dngos med ngo bo mtshan nyid can/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro ba/ /'di 'dra sgom pas bsgom par bya'o/ /
sgyu 'phrul 'byung ba'i stobs kyi ye shes zab mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /zla ba'i mdog dang ldan pa'i yum/ /ming ni gos dkar can zhes bya/ /spyan
gsum dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /zhal ras gsum pa dga' mdzad ma/ /phyag drug mi 'jigs sbyin mdzad ma/ /gnyis pa na ni rdo rje ste/ /gsum pa mda' yis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yon
pa pad+ma bsnams par bya/ /gnyis pa na ni bgrang nor phreng / /gsum pa na ni gzhu bsnams shing / /rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'phro bar mdzad/ /pad+ma'i
sprin gyis rgyas par bsgom/ /gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na/ /rin chen sku ni bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma'i gzugs kyis 'jo tshul sangs rgyas kyi rgyal ba 'dren pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin to/ /ta yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /lha mo sgrol ma rdzu 'phrul che/ /'jo sgeg cha lugs la gnas pa/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug sems dpa'i skyil
@#/ /mo krung / /bzhad pa ma rgad 'od dang ldan/ /dang po mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag /gnyis pa na ni rdo rje bsnams/ /gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon
pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste/ /gnyis pa na ni ut+pal nyid/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu yang 'dzin/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar ba can/ /sangs rgyas 'phro bas rgyas mdzad pa/ /dga'
mdzad sems can kun gyi ma/ /rtag par rgyun du bsgom par bya/ /sems can thams cad dbang du 'gro zhing dga' bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
skyes mchog rgyal bas gsungs pa yi/ /sems ma bzhi ni brjod pa'i ming / /sems ma dang ni rig chen ma/ /chos ma rdo rje las ma ste/ /rol pas rjes su mnyes mdzad ma/
de dag ji ltar rigs par bsgom/ /de dag kyang ni bsgoms pa yis/ /ring por mi thogs byang chub thob/ /sems can rab tu dga' byed pa'i/ /'phags ma bzhi yi ting 'dzin
to| |tsuM gyi yi ge las bsgrubs pa/ /ming ni skul byed ces ma'i gzugs/ /sku gsum rgyal ba byed pa phrag /bdun gyis gsang sngags glu yis bstod/ /yi ge dgu pa thabs
dgu can/ /lha dgu rnams kyi gnas kyang yin/ /zhal gsum ston kha'i 'dam bu'i mdog /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /na chung skal ldan dar la bab/ /rig sngags thams cad
sgrol mdzad ma/ /dang po'i zhal ni cung zad tsam/ /bzhad cing spyan gsum ldan pa ste/ /g.yas kyi zhal ni rnam gdangs pa/ /ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma'i 'od/ /mche ba zla ba tshes pa bzhin/ /lce
ni glog bzhin ljib par mdzad/ /g.yon pa kha dog dmar po ste/ /tshems kyis sgros ni rnam par mnon/ /rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs/ /gdu bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /brgyan
pa'i phyag nyi shu rtsa drug la phyag gnyis rtsa ba'i phyag rgyas snying ga'i gnas rnam par brgyan pa'o/ /g.yas pa gnyis ni/ /mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o/ /gsum pa na ral gri'o/ /bzhi pa na rin
po che sbyin pa'o/ /lnga pa na shing tog bI dza pu ra'o/ /drug pa na mda' gsor ba'o/ /bdun pa na dgra sta'o/ /brgyad pa na dbyug to'o/ /dgu pa na tho ba'o/ /bcu pa na lcags kyu'o/ /bcu gcig
pa na rdo rje'o/ /bcu gnyis pa na se go la gtog pa'o/ /bcu gsum pa na bgrang phreng ngo / /g.yon pa gnyis pa na yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan no/ /gsum pa na pad+ma'o/ /bzhi pa na
ril ba spyi blugs so/ /lnga pa na zhags pa'o/ /drug pa na gzhu'o/ /bdun pa na mdung thung ngo / /brgyad pa na 'khor lo'o/ /dgu pa na dung ngo / /bcu pa na sdigs pa'i mdzub mo'o/ /bcu
gcig pa na bum pa bzang po'o/ /bcu gnyis pa na thag mdung ngo / /bcu gsum pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /pad+ma la bzhugs
@#/ /bsgom par bya/ /la yi zhing cung bgos pa yi/ /steng du bla gos gyon pa ste/ /sna tshogs tshig gu na bzar gsol/ /cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /sangs rgyas
rnams kyi sku gzugs 'phro/ /sum cu'i lha rnams ltung ba dang / /bgegs rnams shin tu 'jigs skrag par/ /thal mo sbyor bar byed pa ste/ /'di 'dra gang zhig rtag sgom zhing / /
bsgrims nas gsang sngags brjod pa des/ /sangs rgyas nyid du thob 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /ting 'dzin ngo bo thob 'gyur zhing / /sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/ /
rgyal ba mtha' yas pa'i ye shes skul bar byed pa'i stobs kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ra yi ye shes la bsgrubs pa'i/ /rin chen sgron ma zhes bya'i gzugs//
zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug gser gyi mdog dang ldan/ /na chung dar la bab pa'i tshad/ /zhal ni cung zad bzhad pa ste/ /phyag ni rin chen gdu bus gtams/ /phyag
gnyis rin chen thal mo ste/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor phreng ba 'khrug /g.yas pa'i phyag ni mi 'jigs sbyin/ /gsum pa mda' ni rnam par gsor/ /g.yon mdzub ma rungs rnams la
bsdigs/ /gsum pa yis ni gzhu yang 'dzin/ /'od zer dmar po legs par 'bar/ /rol stabs thabs kyi zhabs kyis gnon/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni 'phro zhing sdud/ /chos 'dzin yid du
'ong ba yi/ /lha mo 'di 'dra bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas rin chen sprin gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /b+h+ri yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /'jigs las sgrol
ba khro gnyer can/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /phyag drug pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ /rol pa'i stangs la brtson pa ste/ /zhal ni khro dang bcas par
bzhad| |legs par 'bar ba'i rtser lha can/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa be con 'dzin par bshad/ /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub
mo can| |gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs bsnams/ /gsum pa na ni mtshon cha gzhu/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro zhing / /de bzhin gzhan dag legs sdud pa'i/ /nyal dang 'greng dang
'dug pa na/ /lha mo 'di 'dra rtag tu bsgom/ /'jigs pa thams cad dmigs pa med par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /ming ni rdo
rje lu gu rgyud/ /thams cad 'ching ba bskyed pa ste/ /sems can ma rungs phung bar byed/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug sngo bsangs gzugs bzang ma/ /zhal ni cung zad
bzhad par mdzad/ /lag pa g.yas na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /gsum pa na ni mda' yang bsnams/ /g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste/ /gnyis pa na ni zhags pa
@#/ /gsungs/ /gsum pa gzhu yang thogs par brtson/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni sbrin 'phro ba/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud bsgoms na/ /byang chub skad cig gis 'thob na//
dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /rdo rje sgrog gi ye shes kyi rdo rje lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mai yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /thub pa'i skyes mchog byams pa ni/ /zhal
ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /de yi 'og na pad+ma ste/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /phyag bzhi dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /phyag gnyis chos 'chad phyag rgyas
brgyan| |g.yas pa yi ni phyag gnyis pa/ /sems can skyob pa mchog sbyin mdzad/ /g.yon pa lha rdzas klu shing gi /me tog ze 'bru'i mgo lcog bsnams/ /sangs rgyas byang
chub sems dpa' yi/ /sprin chen de bzhin 'phro bar mdzad/ /byams pa'i stobs kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam par brgyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /muM gyi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /gzhon
nu 'jam pa tshig gi lam/ /shes rab ye shes mchog thob pa/ /zab mo tshul ni ston pa po/ /zhal gsum spyan gsum zur phud gsum/ /gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /cod
pan bzang po mi 'khrugs can/ /me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis klubs/ /'og ma pad+ma chen po la/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /'jo sgeg thabs kyis rol pa ste/ /zhal ni
cung zad bzhad pa la/ /dpa' bo chen po phyag drug pa/ /dang po mi 'jigs sbyin par bya/ /gnyis pa na ni ral gri nyid/ /gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /de bzhin g.yon pa shes rab
'chang | |gnyis pa na ni ut+pal thogs/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do/ /shes rab ye shes mchog gis klubs/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin gyi bsnams/ /'phro bar sangs rgyas
'dod pas bsgom/ /'jam dpal mchog gi shes rab dang ye shes kyi rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /spos kyi glang po ye shes tog/ de bzhin du ni bzang skyong dang / /blo gros rgya mtsho
blo gros ni/ /mi zad pa dang spobs brtsegs nyid/ /ngan song kun spong mthu chen thob/ /mya ngan kun mun 'joms pa'i blo/ /nor bzang dang ni dra ba'i 'od/ /de bzhin zla 'od 'od dpag med//
nam mkha' mdzod dang sgrib kun sel/ /de ltar de sogs grangs med pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyob pa kun/ /sa bon yig 'bru rnams las 'khrungs/ /yi ge phyag rgya'i sbyor ba
can| |zhal ras gsum pa span gsum pa/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis rol par mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di yi rgyu/ /gsang sngags zlos par bsgom par bya/ /mdog ldan 'du
zhing 'phro mdzad pa/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsam/ /hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /gzi brjid ldan pa 'jam dbyangs kyi/ /gshin rje'i dgra zhes rnam grags pa/ /bskal pa'i me
@#/ /ltar 'bar ba ste/ /char sprin gyi ni 'od dang 'dra/ /zhal drug pa la phyag drug pa/ /de bzhin zhabs drug mi'u thung 'dra/ /gsus khyim shin tu che ba ste//
de ni drag po chen po yin/ /lcags 'dril rdo rje mche ba can/ /sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /stag lpags kyi ni sham thabs bgos/ /rol pa'i stabs can ma he bcibs//
de yi 'og tu pad+ma byas/ /mi thod phreng can skra 'khyil pa/ /ag tshom ser la sgra chen 'byin/ /mgo yi steng na mi 'khrugs pa/ /sku gsum la ni rnam par bzhugs/ /'jam
pa'i dpal gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad/ /g.yas pa ljags ni 'dril ba ste/ /g.yon pa'i tshems kyi sgros mnan khro/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na ral
gri ste| |gnyis pa na ni rdo rje nyid/ /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa gzhu ni
brdungs pa yis/ /shin tu legs par rnam par brgyan/ /lha mo yis ni g.yas nas 'khyud/ /gnyis pa na ni ut+pal thogs/ /g.yon pa zla ba ltar snang ba/ /pad+ma dkar po
thogs par bya/ /'og tu lha dang bgegs kyi rnams/ /sngar ma bred nas phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar dang bcas/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'phro zhing sdud/ /rnal 'byor
ngag gi sgo nas su/ /bsgrims nas gsang sngags bzlas pa de/ /'dug dang nyal dang 'chag pa na/ /legs par bsams te kun zos shing / /'dod pa lnga la longs spyod kyang / /nam
mkha' lta bur gos mi 'gyur/ /gshed byed thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i ye shes gshin rje gsod pa'i 'dul ba 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pra yi ye shes las
bsgrubs pa/ /khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug gis ni rnam par brgyan/ /mdog gser mi thung gzugs can la/ /'od zer dmar
po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa la/ /dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad/ /de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par bsgyur/ /g.yon pa tshems
kyi sgros kyang mnan/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis 'bar ba ste/ /lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje thogs/ /gnyis pa na ni dbyug pa ste/ /gsum pa na ni mda' yang thogs/ /g.yon pa sdigs
mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa gzhu can yin par gsungs/ /spyi bo'i steng na mi 'khrugs pa/ /rim bzhin 'phro zhing sdud pa ste/ /'di 'dra goms
par bsgom par bya/ /zlos pas sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ha yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /khro bo pad+ma
@#/ /mthar byed pa/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /kha dog dmar po phyag brgyad spyan/ /sku ni sbrul gyis dkris pa ste/ /pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs/ /
khro bo lta bas gzigs mdzad pa/ /dang po zhal ni rnam par bzhad/ /g.yas pa ljags ni 'dril ba ste/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan pa/ /stag lpags gsol zhing khro
ba lo| |g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa na ni dbyug to gsungs/ /gsum pa na ni lcags kyu ste/ /bzhi pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo
ste| |gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa na ni pad+ma ste/ /bzhi pa na ni gzhu nyid do/ /de yi cod ban mi 'khrugs pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni mang po dag /'phro zhing 'du bar
bsgoms byas na/ /'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /rta mchog gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /ming ni khro bo bgegs kyi
gshed| |me yi dkyil bzhugs sgrub pa sbyin/ /lag na rdo rje rjes 'brangs pa/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /bgegs rnams 'joms mdzad phyag drug can/ /dang bo'i
zhal ni bzhad pa ste/ /de bzhin g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pa/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan khro/ /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra'i mdog /zhabs kyis bgegs ni mnan
ba ste| |gnyis pa pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs/ /g.yas kyi phyag na ral gri ste/ /gnyis pa na ni dgra star gsungs/ /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub
zhags pa can/ /de bzhin gnyis pa nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu yang gsungs/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro bar/ /ye shes mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /bgegs
rnams thams cad 'dral ba'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /mi g.yo bus pa'i gzugs dang ldan/ /zhal ras
gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa la/ /dang po'i zhal ni bzhad pa ste/ /de yi g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pas/ /khrag gis brlan pa'i ljags kyang 'dril/ /
g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan khro/ /hUM gis snying ga'i phyogs kyang bkang / /mthing shun gyi ni mdog can te/ /rin chen ri steng pad+ma la/ /rol pa'i zhabs kyis stabs su bzhugs/ /
thub pa bgegs kyi chu 'dzin 'joms/ /phyag drug 'bar ba 'phro ba yi/ /'od bzang dmar po'i dkyil 'khor na/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri ste/ /gnyis pa na ni rdo rjer gsungs/ /
gsum pa mda' ni rnam par gsor/ /g.yon pas bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa gzhu ni brdungs pa la/ /chang bas bzung ste lta ba dang / /
@#/ /sna tshogs me tog gis bcings ba'i/ /cod pan dang ni dbu rgyan thogs/ /zur phud g.yon pa bung ba'i mdog /mi 'khrugs pa yis rnam par brgyan/ /sangs
rgyas rang bzhin sprin dag gis/ /cho 'phrul chen po du ma 'phro/ /de ltar rtag tu rnal 'byor gang / /sgom pas sgom par byed pa de/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi/ /them skas la ni 'jog
par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa mi g.yo ba'i ye shes rdo rje bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hUM gi ye shes las bsgrugs
pa| |ming ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug pa zhes bya bar bsgrags/ /dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i/ /thor tshugs cod ban bzang
po can| |dang po'i zhal ni bzhad pa la/ /g.yas pa yis ni rnam par bsgyur/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan khro/ /dpral ba khro gnyer rim pa can/ /'bar ba char sprin lta bu'i
mdog /dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba can/ /phyag gnyis 'dod pa'i phyag rgyar ldan/ /g.yas pa na ni rdo rjer gsungs/ /gsum pa mda' yis rnam par rol/ /g.yon pa
yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa'i phyag na gzhu yang bsnams/ /pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i thabs/ /'og tu bgegs kyang rnam par mnan/ /sangs rgyas lang long 'phro mdzad pa/ /
ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgoms byas na/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes 'thob/ /snying thams cad 'gugs ba'i ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam par rgyal bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hUM gi ye shes las
bsgrubs pa/ khro bo be con sngon po can/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug gis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dang po'i zhal ni 'jo sgeg bzhad/ /de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par
gdangs/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros kyang mnan/ /sku ni kha chu 'dra ba ste/ /lus ni sprul gyis rnam par brgyan/ /skra tshogs lcang lor 'khyil pa ste/ /dbu rgyan la ni sangs rgyas
bzhugs/ /pad+ma la zhugs rol stabs can/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa na ni be con nyid/ gsum pa mtshon cha mda' dang ldan/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags
pa ste| |gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid bsnams/ /dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba can/ /sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis bskrun pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni
rtag tu 'phro/ /bgegs kyis rtog pa'i ye shes rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hUM zhes gsungs pa'i khro bo ni/ /ye shes dam pa stobs po che/ /zhal ras gsum pa
spyan gsum pa/ /phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /sbrin gyi kha dog 'dra ba ste/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /mig dmar skra 'bar gyen du brdzes/ /mgo bo la ni mi 'khrugs
@#/ /bzhugs/ /dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad/ /de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par gdangs/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan pa/ /pad+ma la bzhugs
'gying bag can/ /drag po'i tshim rngam stang stabs can/ /phyogs bcu'i lha rnams phung bar mdzad/ /'bar ba rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nang
na bzhugs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa be con thogs par mtshon/ /gsum pa yis ni ral gri gdengs/ /bzhi pa mda' yis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yon
pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa na ni tho ba nyid/ /phyag bzhi ba ni gzhu can la/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro ba/ /sgom pa mchog gis
bsgom par bya/ /bsnol ba med pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /b+hUM gyi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur
ba ste| |sku gsum ldan pa zhal ras gsum/ /gser gyi mdog can 'od bzang ba/ /'dom gang 'od kyis rnam par brgyan/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgyar rnam par gnas/ /rin chen ri
steng pad+ma la/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /rigs kyi yum ni bzhi po rnams/ /gzugs dang yan lag kun mdangs can/ /zhal ras 'jo sgeg tshul gyis brgyan/ /gos dang
rgyan gyis klubs pa ste/ /chags phyir spro pa'i rtsol ba can/ /phyag rgya rin chen snye ma dang / /rdo rje pad+ma ut+pal ldan/ /lha mo so so'i phyogs na bzhugs/ /gtsug tor 'od zer lnga pa can/ /
kun tu 'khor lo'i phrang ba dang / /'khor lo'i bar na rdo rje gnas/ /'od zer phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro bas/ /nam mkha' thams cad 'gengs par
mdzad| |byang chub snying po don gnyer bas/ /'di 'dra'i 'khor lo can bsgom zhing / /bsgrims nas rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis/ /ring po mi thogs 'dod pa 'thob/ /byang chub snying po
thams cad kyi rgyan gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dzaM gyi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /gnod sbyin gnod gnas sku gsum can/ /zhal ras gsum pa phyag gnyis na/
bI dza pU ri ne'u la can/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 'am/ /yang na bzang po'i 'dug stangs gnas/ /ngos na rgyan rnams thams cad kyis/ /brgyan pa'i gnod sbyin mo bzhi dag/
rin chen char pa 'bebs par byed/ /mgo bo'i steng na sangs rgyas lnga/ /de yi cod pan bzang ba yi/ /g.yon phyogs rtse phran rgyan yang chags/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro zhing /rin
chen char pa 'bebs par mdzad/ /gang zhig nor rdzas 'dod pa yis/ /gnod gnas 'di 'dra bsgoms byas na/ /de yis sa chen nor rdzas kyis/ /ring por mi thogs gang bar 'gyur/
@#/ /lag na rdo rjes bdud rtsi yi/ /chu yang rtag tu dbul bar bya/ /rin po che sprin sbyin pa'i char 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ma
yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i/ /nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'od zer can/ /rta bdun ldan pa'i shing rtar bzhugs/ /'bar ba'i lag 'khyor snang mdzad pa/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan
gsum ldan/ /phyag drug kha dog ser por snang / /phyogs bcu srung par brtson pa ste/ /'jo sgeg tshul du zhal yang bzhad/ /na chung rgyan ni g.yo ba can/ /cod pan rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas lnga/ /thor tshugs me tog rnams kyis brgyan/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa na ni khab skud bsnams/ /gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa
sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa a shwI yal ga ste/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do/ /gzugs brnyan mang po 'phro ba yis/ /sdang ba'i sems can bcing ba dang / /
mig dang kha ni 'drub par byed/ /gsang sngags bzlas brjod 'bad pa dag /gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na/ /lha mo hUM mdzad bsgom par bya/ /'di ni sgom par byed pa yin//
dbang du sems can rab tu 'gro/ /sdang ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par byed pa'i rdo rje mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i/ /rig pa'i ri
khrod shing lo can/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /zhal ras bzhad cing khro dang bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /na chung gzhon nu phyag drug ma/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje
ste| |gnyis pa na ni dgra sta nyid/ /gsum pa mda' yang rnam par gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa shing lo'i bam po ste/ /phyag gsum pa ni gzhu nyid de/ /
thor tshugs me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /de steng kha dog lnga po dag /rab tu 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /mdog ser pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /dkyil 'khor dmar po char 'bar
ba| |khro ba'i sprin 'phro sdud mdzad cing / /gdon gang skyes rgu'i nang gnas pa/ /de dag khro bo'i mes kyang sreg /phyir yang bsregs nas sangs rgyas kyis/ /kha dog bdud rtsi char 'bebs
mdzad| |de 'dra rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms na/ /mi ngas thams cad zhi bar mdzad/ /nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dza yi
ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /rig sngags mtshan ni dug sel ma/ /sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can/ /nor bu 'bar bas brgyan pa ste/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /
gzhon nu mtshan ni 'bar ba can/ /bzhad cing khro dang bcas pa ste/ /sprul gyi ska rags dag gis brgyan/ /phyag drug rol pa'i stang stabs can/ /mgo yi steng na mi 'khrugs
@#/ /bzhugs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa ral gri thogs par brtson/ /phyag gsum ba ni gar thabs kyis/ /stang stabs tshul gyis
mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa dug gi me tog can/ /phyag gsum pa na gzhu nyid do/ /dbu rgyan me tog rnams kyis brgyan/ /gser
mdog pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'od ni dmar po dkyil 'khor can/ /dza rnams 'phro bas bskor ba ste/ /kun nas 'bar ba rnams kyis khebs/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan
'phro ba can/ /phyag bzang bum pa zla 'dra ba'i/ /kha ni dza yis rnam brgyan pas/ /dug gis phog pa rnam la ldugs/ /rtag tu sku gsum dug sel ma/ /dug gis phog pa rnams
la bsgom/ /de ltar bsgoms par byas pa yis/ /ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob/ /nyon mongs rnams kyi dug sel ba/ /gdengs ka'i dbang po rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag
rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /tri yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /sku chen ha la ha la ste/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /thor tshugs cod pan rnams kyis brgyan//
zla ba tshes pa bsnams pa'i lha/ /dbu rgyan thod pa dag gis brgyan/ /thor tshugs rgyal po'i sku gzugs bzhugs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /pad+ma dkar po lta
bur snang / /sems stobs ldan pa'i 'jo tshul can/ /phyag brgyad zhal yang bzhad pa ste/ /smad g.yogs stag gi pags pa mnabs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa
bgrang nor phreng ba can/ /gsum pa yis na mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa pad+mas rnam par brgyan/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'jin/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do/ /g.yas pa
mdud rtse gsum pa la/ /sbrul gyis yongs su dkris pa ste/ /g.yon na thod pa dri zhim pa'i/ /me tog sna tshogs kyis bkang pa/ /pad+ma dmar po la bzhugs pa/ /rol pa'i
stang stabs tshul du gnas/ /rin chen ri phug nang bzhugs par/ /rnal 'byor sems dpas bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin gzugs dang ni/ /cho 'phrul chen po
sna tshogs 'byung / /rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis/ /kha zas thams cad za byed cing / /nang gi sngags pas sngags brjod cing / /rim bzhin rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms na//
byang chub myur du thob 'gyur zhing / /bla na med pa'i bde ba 'dren/ /'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrubs pa/ /ha la ha la yongs su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /sa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /stong chen rab tu 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /lha mo nad kun 'phrog ma ste/ /sdang ba'i sems can 'joms mdzad ma/ /phyag
@#/ /stong ldan zhing dbu stong la/ /spyan gsum dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /brtson chen phyag brgyad khro ba dang / /steg pa'i thabs kyis dgongs pa can/ /phyag
g.yas mchod sbyin lha rdzas kyi/ /ral gri lcags kyu mda' dang ldan/ /phyag g.yon pad+mo rdo rje nor/ /zhags pa gzhu dang sta re can/ /mdog dmar zhal ras bzhi pa ste/ /bgegs
stong 'joms par mdzad pa yin/ /rang gi rnal 'byor la brtson pas/ /nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs 'jug cing spro/ /glang po rta dang skyes pa dag /za bar mdzad ma phreng ba can//
de yi las kyis bskul ba yi/ /gsang sngags dpa' bos gdon par bya/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug las 'dod bas/ /'di byas bas ni srung bar 'gyur/ /dpung chen po la rnam par lta//
ba thams cad srung ba stobs kyi mchog stong chen po rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /d+h+wAM zhes bya bas skyed pa yi/ /
sdigs pa'i mdzub mo'i phyag rgya can/ /drag mo chen mo zhal bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum phyag brgyad kyis rnam brgyan/ /ral gri gtun shing 'khor lo mda'/ /mdud rtse gsum pa
rdo rje gzhu/ /chom rkun mdzub mos bsdigs pa ste/ /rdo rje ro langs 'byung ba dag /mthong bas dbung rnams bcom gtor bas/ /lha mo rtag tu bsgoms na ni/ /ring por mi
thogs byang chub 'thob/ /'jig rten gsum rnam par 'joms pa la mkhas pa mchog gi rtse mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pra yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /stobs chen pha
rol gnan mdzad ma/ /spyan gsum phyag brgyad g.yas pa na/ /ral gri 'khor lo mdung rtse gsum/ /mnga' yis rnam brgyan phyag g.yon na/ /rdo rje zhags pa dgra sta gzhu/ /bsnams
bas sdang ba'i bgegs ltung mdzad/ /bu mi 'tsho dang mo gsham dag /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu gnas su/ /lha rnams kun gyi bum pa yis/ /slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur zhing //
de yi mngal du byis ba ni/ /'jam pa'i gzugs can 'jug par bsam/ /zhags pa'i phyag rgyas mtshan ngan nas/ /skyes pa gzugs can 'byung ba dang / /dran pa yis ni dral nas
kyang / /mngal ni bsod nams dag gis spel/ /mngal thams cad rnam par lta ba so sor 'brang ma'i ye shes kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ba yi ye
shes rol pas bskrun/ /lha mo nor gyi blo gros ma/ /gzi byin gser gyi mdog can la/ /phyag drug lang tsho dar la bab/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /'jo sgeg thabs bcas 'bar ba ste//
de yi phyag g.yas mchog sbyin mdzad/ /gnyis pa 'bru yi snyem can/ /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /phyag g.yon yid bzhin nor bu dang / /rin chen char 'bebs gzhu yang 'dzin/ /
@#/ /grogs mo'i skye bos yongs bskor cing / /mngag gzhug gnod spyin mo yi gzugs/ /rin chen char pa 'bebs pa dang / /nor kun gyi ni char ba dag /'bebs
par byed pa bsam par bya/ /nor gyi blo gros chen mo 'di/ /de ltar sngags pas bsgoms na de/ /dpag tshad bdun ni rgyas par yang / /nor gyi char gyis khyab par mdzad/ /byang chub sbyin
mchog dam pa ma/ /de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid bsgom/ /nor gyi rgyun gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bi yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /
srin mo 'bar ba'i klog phreng can/ /ming ni dngul dkar las skyes mo/ /stobs mo che la pha rol gnon/ /gsus 'phyang me la mche gtsigs ma/ /skra ser ram kham pa gyen du brdzes//
thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ /spyi bo la ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs/ /bcu gnyis dbu dang bco brgyad phyag /spyan ni gsum gsum thod phreng ldan/ /drag mo lag na rak+ta yis/ /
bkang ba'i thod pa thogs pa ste/ /smad g.yogs seng+ge'i pags pas g.yogs/ /sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can/ /ral gri lcags kyu 'khor lo dang / /gtun shing rtse gsum
dril bu dang / /ba dan ltag dbyug mdung mchog sbyin/ /gzhu mda' mdung thung be con dang / /zhags pa dgra sta tho ba thogs/ /rgyan rnams kyis ni lus la brgyan/ /mdog nag
rol pa'i stabs kyis ni/ /pad+ma'i gdan bzhugs sdang ba dag /'dul ba zhes brjod 'di lta bu/ /rtag tu hUM gis hUM mdzad pa/ /bzlas brjod yang dag ldan par bsgom/ /sems can
kun don tshogs pa yi/ /byang chub ring por mi thogs 'thob/ /sems can thams cad 'ching bar byed pa'i mchog rab byang chub kyi snying por rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /k+ShiM zhes bya bas sgom pa'i gzugs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /na chung gzhon nu 'jo tshul can/ /mgo bo skra tshugs phyed du bzung / /de bzhin du ni stod g.yogs
kyang / /la dkar seng ba bgos pa ste/ /de la kha dog lnga pa yi/ /ma tog 'phrul ba rnams kyis brgyan/ /gser gyi mdog can bzhin 'dzum pa/ /phyed zur bas ni rnam par rol/ /dpag
bsam shing gis brgyan pa yi/ /rin chen ri la legs par bzhugs/ /'jam pa'i khro bo rdo rje yis/ /de yi mgo bo mnan nas bzhugs/ /tha ma thog thag gnod sbyin mos/ /nam
mkha' gang bar bsgom par bya/ /gnod sbyin mo thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /sngags la oM AHhUM/ yi ge gsum pa mig gsum gzugs/ khyab
'jug lha chen mes bo ste/ /gdong gsum rang gi mtshon thogs la/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis bskul can/ /rdo rje ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na/ /mod la dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'jig
@#/ /rten thams cad grub pa mig gsum rnam par rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /gzhan yang gsang sngags yi ge yi/ /sa bon gang gis sbyar byas te//
rdo rje yig 'bru rnams bsgoms na/ /de dag ma bsgrims bzhin du sgrub/ /'phrog ma 'phrog byed las skyes pa'i/ /bu ni lnga brgya po rnams dang / /lnga rtsen dang ni dpal can ma/ /myur
ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /ting nge 'dzin rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la zhi bar lta ba rdul dang bral ba'i mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum las sna tshogs kyi ye shes skyed par mdzad pa 'di dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM b+ha ga ba ti ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha
lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ de nas las thams cad rab tu rdzogs par byed pa 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa'
mkhas rnams dgyes/ /bdud kyi dpung rnams 'dar gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje rjes dran byed/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ /rdo rje dam tshig gis bskul na/ /shi ba
rnams la srog sbyin mjad/ /ma grub pa rnams grub par rtsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsum rdo rje 'bar pa'i mchog
dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs nas rdo rje 'chang mchog thams cad skyed pa'i yum rdo rje dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sgrub
par byed pa 'di phyung ngo / /oM shaM ka re/ shIn+taM ka ri/ g+hu Ta g+hu Ta g+hu Ti ni g+hA Ta ya g+hA Ta ya g+ha Ti ni swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rdo rje gsum las skyes gyur pa/ /thams
cad kyi ni mig phye nas/ /rdo rje shugs ni rjes dran gyur/ /sgrub pa thams cad srung mdzad ma/ /de bzhin las rnams sgrub pa yin/ /sdig pa thams cad 'joms ma ste/ /zhi dang rgyas dang
'phel mdzad ma'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'dod chags chen pos zhen pa pad+ma gar gyi stang stabs thugs kyi rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par 'thor ba'i dam
chig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos thams cad 'dzin pa mchog gi yum 'di rdo rje gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka Tang+ka Te swAhA/
de nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan mchog /dam pa 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi mig phye nas/ /rdo rje pad+ma rjes dran byed/ /rgyas pa chen po yum yin te/ /chos mdzod rnam par
@#/ /'phel mdzad ma/ /bsgoms shing bsten te bzlas brjod na/ /rgya cher srung bar mdzad pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dbang du bya ba khong du
chud pas/ rdo rje gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis dga' bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ye shes la 'jug par byed pa sna tshogs thams cad
'chang ba'i yum gyi sgrol ma 'di gsungs so/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang sras kyi rnams/ /spyan phye rnam par gdangs nas
su| |ye shes rdo rje ldan par dran/ /lha mo bzlas brjod byas tsam gyis/ /skya rgu rnams ni mngag gzhug 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi mchog gi ye shes la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di rdo rje gsum las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba

duSh+Ta satwa da ma ka a si mu sa la ba ra shu pA sha ha sta/ co tur mu kha/ /tsa tur b+hu dza/ Sha T+tsar Na/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sarba duSh+Ta prA NA a pa ha ri NI/ mahA bi g+h+naM g+hA ta ka/ bi kr-i ta A

na na| sarba b+hu ta b+ha yaM ka ra/ aT+TAT+Ta hA sa nA di na/ byA g+h+rA tsarma ni bA sa na/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba karmA Ni/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ sarba man+t+rAn nan/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ba ra mu drAn/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha

ma| sarba b+hU tA na/ ma tha ma tha/ /nirma tha ni rma tha/ sarba duSh+Ta/ pra be sha ya bra be sha ya/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye bai ba shwa ta/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kAR+yaM/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa ba tsa/ mA bi

lam+ba mA bi lam+ba/ sam ya ma nu smra/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ bi spo Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba nA sha ya ri pAM/ ka ra ka ra/ big+h+nan sarba A sha pa ri pU ra ka /he he b+ha ga wA na/ kiny+tsi rA ya si/ ma ma
sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya swAhA/ de nas khro bo 'di gsungs pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems mkhas kun/ /'dar zhing 'jigs pa skyes gyur nas/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad/ /rdo rje ra ba
dra ba yin/ /ye shes sna tshogs can la lta/ /srub gcig pa'am sgrub gnyis pa'i/ /thod pa bzang po rnying pa dang / /rkang rjes sa yi cho ga la/ /lha mo bzhi yi sbyor ba dang / /sangs rgyas lnga
yis byin brlabs te/ /sku gsum dbyer med bsgoms nas su/ /myur bar khugs kyi bar du ni/ /rkang pas mnan te bzlas brjod bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang
mdzad chen pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes kyis ye shes kyi rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i mchog sprin chen po nam mkha'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje

gsum rnams las snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daMSh+To te ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya/ a si mu sa la/ ba ra shu pA sha ha stA ya/ oM a mre ta kuN+Da li/

@#/ /kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba bi g+h+nAM bi nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka
rA ya swAhA/ khro bo chen po gsungs pa yi/ grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /yid phyung nas ni skrag par gyur/ /log 'dren rnams dang bgegs rnams 'dar/ /sku
gsum ye shes mchog mnga' ba'i/ /rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa dran/ /de yi rkang rjes sa dang ni/ /rlung gi gtsubs ba'i shing lo la/ /khro bo'i 'khor lor gzir nas su/ /tshogs
bdag rkang ba'i dang du bzhag/ /hUM dang phaT kyis bskul nas su/ /bskrad pa'i sbyor ba byas na ni/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can yang skrod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
khro bo'i ya shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyams par zhugs nas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra
NAM| oM hUM dzi na ri tiT+Ta hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas khro bo 'di brjod pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /'jigs par gyur cing skrag gyur nas/ /gtso bo rnam
snang mdzad ba dran/ /srin po 'byung po dang mkha' 'gro/ /skem byed gdon rnams gzir bal/ /rdo rje gzir ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /hUM tsam gyis kyang las byed do/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mtha' yas kyis yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa kun nas sdud pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje

pad+ma'i khro bo chen po 'di sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM/ ta ru la/ bi ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ka /dz+wa li ta/ bi s+phu liM ga/ aT+TaT+Ta hA sa nA di ni/ ke Sha ti

sa Ta to pa Ta ka ra/ badzra khu ra/ nir g+hA ta na/ tsa la ti ba su d+ha ta la ni shwA sa mA ru to tik+Sha p+ta d+hA ri Ni d+ha ra/ b+hI Sha na aT+TAT+Ta ta Ta Ta ha sa/ a pA r-i mi tA/ ba la pa rA kra ma/ A R+ya ga Na b+hI ta

b+hU ta ga Na/ a d+h+yu Shi ta/ bud+h+ya bud+h+ya ha ya grI ba/ khA da khA da/ pa ra man+t+rA na/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ sid+d+hi m+ma a d+hiSh+The te A bi Sha A pi Sha ya/ badzra sarba dzra ra pi shA tsA ni/ sarba gra he Shu/ a pra ti ha to b+ha

ba| badzra daMSh+Ta kiny+tsi rA ya si/ i daM duSh+Ta gra han/ duSh+Ta sarba ma pA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ mar+d+ha mar+d+ha/ pA Ta ya pA Ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ baM d+ha baM d+ha/ bud+d+hA d+harma saM g+ha/ a nu dz+nyA taM karma

ku ru shI g+h+raM ha ya gr-I bA ya phaT/ badzra ya phaT/ badzra g+hA ta ya phaT/ badzra nai trA ya phaT/ badzra daMSh+T+rA ya phaT/ badzra khu rA ya phaT/ badzra khu ra nir g+hA ta nA ya phaT/ pa ra man+t+ra be nA sha nA ya phaT/ badzra trai

lo kya b+ha yaM ka rA ya phaT/ sarba karma su pra ti ha ta ya phaT/ badzra ku la san+t+ya sa nA ya phaT/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sarba phaT swAhA/ de nas khro chen byung ba yis/ /rdo rje pad mchog las byung rnams//
@#/ /yid ni 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur/ /'khor bcas 'jigs pas rnam 'khrugs nas/ /byang chub tshogs ni dran byed cing / /ye shes rdo rje dran 'gyur ba/ /
lag pa la ni pad+ma dang / /ha zhes bya ba mchog 'bar bsam/ /khro rgyal ting 'dzin la gnas nas/ /rdo rje gsum yig 'dzin ba yis/ /khams gsum dag kyang khyab byed pa'o/ /mi
bzang dug ni drang bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis don yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po be con sngon po can 'di rdo rje gsum las byung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ e hi e hi/ b+ha ga wA na/ nI la badzra daN+Da/
tu ru tu ru/ hu lu hu lu swAhA/ gu lu gu lu/ gu lA pa ya/ gu lA pa ya/ kra ma kra ma/ b+ha ga wA na bA yu be ge na/ b+hu tAn shI g+haM/ da ha da ha/ da ra da ra/ ba ha ba ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha

ma tha| pA ta ya pA ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo TA pa ya mo TA pa ya/ sarba garmA Ni/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+ha k+Sha ya b+ha k+Sha ya/ a s+thi mi daM a s+ya ru d+hi ra ma da dza mi daM/ bi shwa mad dza/ ru d+hi ra/ pri ya

e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ sarba big+h+na na/ sarba bid+yA ni/ sarba man+t+rA Ni sarba mU la karmA Ni kr-i ti ma Ni/ pi Sha dA ni/ sarba gra hA na/ ha na ha na/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ marda marda/ i daM me/ kAR+yaM sA d+ha ya/

hUM nI lA ya nI lA ya nI la badzra daN+DA ya/ tu ra tu ru/ big+h+nAn bi nA ya ga /nA sha ya nA shA ya/ hu ru hu ru/ 'di p+ta tsaN+DA ya/ sarba sha trUM n+'aM hr-i da yA ni pI Ta ya/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ pa ra bid+yA nA ma/ ts+tshe da ka hUM

bid+yA nA ma shiSh+Ta ka/ sa ma yaM a nu sma ra/ badzra d+ha ra bA tsa nAM tsa/ ma ra ma ni krin+ta/ hUM ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ hu ru hu ru/ phaT phaT/ hUM hUM kr-i tan+ta ya/ de ba
ro Shi bi dra ba ya ka /ha na badzra dan+Tan swAhA/ khro bo chen po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu bdud kyi ris thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rab tu g.yos te sku gsum gyi mchog
gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad dran par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyor ba'i tshogs bskul na brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la khro bo chen pos gsod par byed do//
de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas bkod pa kun tu rnam par 'phro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stobs po che rdo

rje 'di sku gsum las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ u gra shUl bA Ni hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM j+yo ti nir nA da hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM ma hA ba lA
ya swAhA/ de nas khro bo gsungs tsam gyis/ /gdengs ka yis ni bskor ba kun/ /yid ni shin tu 'jigs skrag ste/ /rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dran/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas pa
@#/ /yis| |las kun rab tu grub par byed/ /char pa chen gcod 'gyur la/ char pa chung na rab tu 'bebs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu 'bar

ba'i snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo chen po 'dod pa'i khro bo 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ Tak+kaM hUM dzaHde
nas khro bo gsungs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'dar/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang skrag/ bdud kyi dpung rnams ltung bar gyur/ /rkang g.yas sna tshogs rdo rje
yi| |sbyor bas mtshan ni mnan nas su/ /sku gsum ye shes stobs ldan pas/ /khro gnyer rim par gnyer byas te/ /gsang sngags kun gyis bkug nas su/ /sems can thams
cad dbang du byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje rab tu 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i ye shes rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje khro bo mi g.yo ba gtum po 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsa la kA Na tsa Na Da/ na Ta na Ta/ maT+Ta maT+Ta/ saT+Ta saT+Ta/

taT+Ta ta T+Ta/ ta na ta na/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/ mo ha ka ra/ ha sa ha sa/ badzrA hA sa ku ru/ hA sa hA sa/ ma ra ma ra Ta ma ra ma ra Ta/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ ha na ha na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a bi sha

A bi sha ma hA man+t+ra pa la ka /d+hu na d+hu na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khA da/ big+hAn/ mA ra ya mA ra ya duSh+Tan/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sarbAn ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA bi Sha ma badzra s+pho Ta ya pho Ta ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ tri

ba lA ta raM ga na rta ka/ aM aM aM/ hUM hUM hUM/ a tsa la tsa Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hUM hUM/ a sa man+ta ka TA Ta ma hA ba la sha ta ya/ pa ra man+t+ra na/ aM aM/ hUM hUM/ maM shud+d+h+yaM tu lo ka /tu Sh+yaM tu badzra/
na mo tu skru/ a pra ti ha ta pa le b+h+yaHdza lA ya/ trA Ta/ a sa ha na maHswAhA/ de nas khro bo mi g.yo ba/ /khro bo stobs chen 'di gsungs pa/ /lha dang klu kun mngag gzhug byed/ /gnod sbyin
srin po lha ma yin/ /'jigs pa thob nas brgyal bar 'gyur/ /bdud kyi sde rnams lhung nas su/ /tshig cing rab tu zhum bzhin du/ /gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad dran/ /khor bo'i rgyal po du ma
yis| |bcug pas 'jigs pas nyen bzhin du/ /gtso po rnam par snang mdzad nyid/ /sna tshogs las rnams myur du mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po
rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis 'jigs pa chen po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i

rgyal po chen po gnod mdzes 'di gsungs so/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ g+h+r-ih+NA pa ya g+h+r-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga wA na/ bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo 'di gsungs
@#/ /pas| |lha yi bu mo thams cad ni/ /skra tshugs zhig cing gcer bur gyur/ /mig rtse rig rig byed pa dag /sku gsum rdo rje mchog mnga' ba'i/ /zhal gyis
nu ma gnyis mnan pas/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad/ /ye shes kyis ni 'joms dran 'gyur/ /lcags kyu yis ni rnam dral te/ /rdo rje zhags pas bcings nas su/ /bu
mo thams cad dgug bya ba/ /bu mo dgug pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes chen po rnam par bsgyings pa'i dga' ba ston pa ces bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku gsum gyi mchog rdo rje 'chang skyed par mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di rjes su dran par mdzad do/ /'khor lo che la rnam gnas
nas| |sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin dag dang / /de bzhin rdo rje 'chang ba'i sprin/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags thogs 'byin/ /kun mkhyen ye shes las byung gtso/ /gsang sngags
skyes bur bdag bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'gugs byed na/ /rdo rje 'chang sogs ci zhig smos/ /bud med lha chen bu mo dag /rlung la rkang pa bzhag nas su/ /
lcags kyus snying la drangs nas ni/ /sems can kun yang 'gugs 'gyur te/ /'di la dpyad pa cung zad med/ /rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /sku chen zla ba'i kha dog yin//
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi 'bebs bsam ste/ /lan grangs bcu ni brjod pa yis/ /de ni gdon mi za bar khugs/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /rdo rje lcags kyu
chen po yis/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba yis/ /gzhon nu ma dag nges par 'gugs/ /rdo rje gsum 'khrugs khro bo ni/ /rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa ste/ /lha ma yin kun nges sreg cing / /
lha min bu mo rdzes chags pas/ /gsal shing gis ni bskyel nas su/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis/ /drangs nas lha min bu mo 'gugs/ /btsag dang thod le kor dang ni/ /ba
bla 'byor bar gyur na ni/ /gzas zin tshe na khar bcug ste/ /rdzas rgyal rdo rje lcags kyus 'grub/ /drag po rlung dang khyab 'jug dang / /lha mo gnod sbyin gnod sbyin ma/ /mngag gzhug
bcas par 'jigs skrag ste/ /ming bris kun nas rtag tu 'gugs/ /sangs rgyas 'khro lor legs bzhugs te/ /'jam pa'i rdo rjer rnam par bsgom/ /khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed/
lag na rdo rje lcags kyu thogs/ /khros shing 'bar ba 'phro ba yis/ /gnod sbyin bu mo bkug nas spyod/ /phyag rgya gsang sngags sbyor ba dang / /sbam gtan 'khor los byor ba/
yis| |dgug par bya ba'i tshig gsungs pa/ /gzhan du byas na 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i zhabs drung kun gnas pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /kun gyis sems
@#/ /rab rdzogs byed pas/ /yang dang yang du skul bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang bar mdzad chen pos rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas ye
shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje rgyal mo chen mo rnam par bsgyur ba'i rdo rje 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las
phyung ngo / /oM shU li ni swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /klu mo dbang chen grags pa dag /gos dang bral zhing tshig bzhin du/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang dran/ /gsang
sngags rig sngags 'di yis ni/ /klu rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed/ /bsam gtan rdo rje mthu dang ni/ /gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pa yis/ /gsor gdub rgyan
ni gsol ba yi/ /klu mo mig yangs bku gnas ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngas chags pa'i/ /klu mo nye bar spyod par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' chen po'i shugs
rgya mtsho 'phro ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas skul byed ma chen mo'i gzugs kyi rig sngags chen po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/
samyak+saM bud+d+ha ko TA ni na/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa le tsu le tsu n+de swAhA/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
lus| |ting nge 'dzin las g.yos par gyur/ /bdud rnams brgyal zhing tshe ga nas su/ /thams cad cho nges 'debs par byed/ /sa yi 'og gi bu mo dang / /lha min bu mo klu mo dang / /gsang
dbang bu mo rnams 'khrugs nas/ /gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad dran/ /rig sngags 'di ni bzlas pa dang / /sgom pa yi ni sbyor ba yis/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur zhing / /bkug
nas rab tu longs spyod byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos bdud rtsi'i

dam tshig gi rdo rje'i khro gnyer 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /oM b+ha ya nA sha ni trA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+hai ra Ti b+h+r-i ku Ti ti Ti/ bai Ta Ti bai Ta Ti/ shwe te shwe te/ dza Ti ni swAhA/
de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rig sngags 'chang dang lha rnams ni/ /g.yo sa shing 'jigs pa thob par gyur/ /bdud rnams 'jigs pas rnam 'khrugs te/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam
snang mdzad/ /yid gcig tu ni dran par byed/ /nor bu'i gdub rnams g.yo ba yis/ /rig sngags 'chang ma klu mor bas/ /lha min bu mo gsang ba yi/ /bu mo bkug nas spyod par
byed| |'dis ni las kun byed pa dang / /mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'jigs pa yin/ /yang na gsang sngags thams cad ni/ /skye bo med pa'i na gas tshal du/ /sngags pas bye ba bzlas
@#/ /nas su/ /las rnams thams cad bya bar gsungs/ /gang gzhan slob dpon smod pa dang / /theg pa chen po sun 'byin dang / /mi gang gsang sngags rgyud dag
gi /sbyor ba la ni 'phyag byed pa/ /de yis dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /de ni rtag tu gdon gyis zin/ /bsgrims nas gsad par bya ba'am/ /yang na lus ni gzhig par bya/ /sngags
pas 'di ltar byas nas ni/ /byang chub dngos grub legs par 'thob/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad ni/ /sku gsum ye shes las byung ba'i/ khyad par du ni bsgom par
bya| |dgra la 'di ni the tshom med/ khrag 'thung chu yis brlan pa'am/ /dur khrod thal ba'am bshang gci yis/ /brlan pa'i gos ni bgos nas kyang / /rkang pas mtshan ma
mnan nas su/ khro bo'i rgyal por sbyor byas te/ /gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig /chus brlan pa yi gos bgos te/ khro bo'i mdun
du bcings nas su /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan na ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par 'jig /bshang gci yis ni sngags pa'i gos/ /rul ba'i da cin smad pa dag /bgos nas
gsang sngags bzlas brjod na/ /mod la 'chi ba'am bskams par 'gyur/ /dur khrod thal bas bsdus pa'i gos/ /bgos nas khro bo'i 'khrugs nas ni/ /lan grangs stong du
brjod na ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'ang rnam par 'jig /skra ni lhug par bshig nas ni/ kha bzhin rnam par bsgyur byas te/ /rkang pas mtshan ma mnan nas ni/ /nam mkha'i khams
kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ /ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam/ khang stong ngam ni bzhi mdo 'am/ /mtshan ma gcig pa'am shing gcig tu/ /drag shul spyod pa brtsam par bya/ /
de yi rkang rjes sa la ni/ /mi rus las byas phur bu dag /sor brgyad tsam gyis tshad tsam la/ /lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pa'i/ /phur bu yis ni btab nas su/ /dgra
yi khyim sgor brkos te gzhug/ sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa/ /shes dang mi shes spangs pa yang / /zla phyed nya yi nang rol tu/ /'ching ba'am yang na 'jig par
'gyur| |mkhas pas thod pa yongs tshang ba/ khyad par can ni rnyed pa dang / /de la gsang sngags tshig bris te/ /rdo rje tshig gis bzlas brjod nas/ /dgra yi sgo'am
yang na ni/ /grong du sbas na nges par skrod/ /ta la'i 'dab ma'am gzhan la'ang rung / khro bos gsang sngags legs bris te/ /dgra yi khyim mam sgo khar ni/ /sbas na 'chi 'am
bskams par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bka' stsal te/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsum
@#/ /rdo rje'i phur bu'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te khams gsum thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku dang gsung dang
thugs rdo rje'i phur bu zhes bya ba 'di nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo / /oM g+ha g+ha/ g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya/ sarba duSh+Tan phaT phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/
sarba pA paM phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la/ badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra/ kI la ya hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rdo rje dbang chen
grags pa kun/ /brgyal nas 'jigs pa skyes gyur te/ /rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa dran/ /mi yi rus pa'i phur bu'am/ /yang na seng ldeng las byung ba'am/ /lcags
las byas pa'i phur bus ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par 'jig /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam bzhag ste/ /'od bzang me stag 'khrug pa can/ /sku gsum rdo rje mthas
gtugs par/ /gzugs brnyan la ni bsams nas sbyar/ /rnam snang phyag rgya chen po'am/ /yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can/ /phyag rgya chen po gshin rje gshegs/ /'dod pa'i
khro bo nyid du ni/ /rdo rje phur bu bsam par bya/ /bdag nyid chen po stobs po che/ /bdud rtsi thabs sbyor rdo rje dang / /rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gyis/ /sdang dang gtum po gcad par bya//
sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po yang / /thugs nas zhabs la thug par du/ /rdo rje phur bus rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par gnon/ /
'di ni phur bu'i mthu rlabs te/ /steng 'og lha yi dam tshig yin/ /rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad gnon pa yi/ /ting 'dzin sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /myur du
'chi 'am bskams par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ye shes rnam par bsgyings ba'i
rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i sku gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi phur bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams

las phyung ngo / /oM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ da ha da ha/ dIp+ta badzra tsakra hUM phaT/ phan tshun bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /mthe bo'i ngos kyi drung du bsdu/ /snang mdzad zhabs kyis mnan nas su/ /rdo rje
phur bus gdab par bya/ /gtab pa tsam gyis sems dpa' che/ /sku gsum ye shes las byung ba/ /dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs par mdzod/ /gzhan du byas na brlag par
'gyur| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i thugs kyi ye shes chen po rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po'i stang
@#/ /stabs kyi phur bu zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams las phyung ngo / /oM badzra rA dza hUM/ rtse mo lnga pa bcings
nas su| |me stag 'phro ba bsgoms byas te/ /rdo rje thugs kyis zhabs kyis mnan/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya/ /btab pa tsam gyis rgyal po che/ /sku gsum ye
shes las byung ba/ /dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs par mdzad/ /gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dam
tshig mchog rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsung gi dam tshig gi stang stabs kyi phur bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang
gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo / /oM tri oM b+hur+b+hubaHrdo rje sor mo bcum pa yis/ /pad+ma kha bye 'bar ba yis/ /'dod chags rdo rje zhabs kyis mnan/ /rdo rje phur
bus nges par gdab/ /btab pa tsam gyis rgyal po che/ /sku gsum ye shes las 'byung ba/ /dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs par mdzod/ /gzhan du byas na brlag par
'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyis chags pa yin/ /cho ga bzang po tsam gyis ni/ /rdo rje mkha' dbyings mthas gtugs pa/ /mnan 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ces bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje phur bu'i tshig rnams bka' stsal to/ /de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog /sems can khams la phan bzhed rnams/ /dgyes shing mgu ba
brnyes nas su /rdo rje dbyings kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /kye ma 'o gsang ba'i tshig gi mchog /kye ma'o gsang ba kun 'dus pa/ /kye ma'o zhi ba chos kyi tshig /ye shes rdo rje phur bu rmad/ /
gsang sngags kun gyi phur bus 'di/ /bde gshegs bka' yi rjes su byed/ /'di dag sangs rgyas kun gyi ste/ /phur bu de nyid rnams las byung / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
chom rkun thams cad mdongs par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'od zer can 'di gsungs so/ /oM mA rI ts+yai de ba tA ye
swAhA/ rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni/ /dbang chen grags pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /thugs ni dgyes shing mgu bar 'gyur/ /sras rnams kyi ni spyan yang phye/ /'di ni las rnams
thams cad ma/ /chom rkun sdang ba 'ching mdzad ma/ /'di yi sbyor ba la gnas na/ /'gro ba'i tshon mthong mi 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de
bzhin gshegs pas sdang ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed pa'i ye shes chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
@#/ /'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma hA sa hA sra pra marda na ba ra sid+d+hi da mI
ge ma Ni badzra Ni hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / /bdud kyi ris rnams
g.yos par gyur/ /gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad pa/ /thams cad tshig bzhin btud nas su/ /bcom ldan rig sngags mthu stobs kyis/ /gnod bgyid thams cad gzir
lags so/ /gang ni rig sngags stobs mo che/ /pha rol gnod pa 'di zlos pa/ /der ni bdag cag mi mchi zhing / /der ni srung ba dag kyang bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas brgya byin mngon par mtho ba'i stobs lha ma yin rnam par 'joms pas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi gzungs chen po 'di gsungs so/ /oM b+ha ga ba tI d+h+wa dzA gra ke yu re pa ra sai n+ya/ bi d+h+wa na sa na ka
swa sai n+ya pa ri la ni/ u lU kA mu khi/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ pa ra s+yai n+ya ma/ a nan+ta b+hu dze/ a nan+ta mu khe pra ha ra pra ha ra hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs
pas| |sangs rgyas zhing rnams g.yos par gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab g.yos shing / /bdud kyis de rnams tshig par gyur/ /gnod sbyin srin po gos bral nas/ /'jigs
shing skrag par gyur pa yis/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang dran/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyi tshig lags te/ bdag cag dam tshig la gnas par
'tshal lags na/ mgon mdzad cing lus thams cad rab tu sgrub tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas mngal
thams cad yang dag par skyes pas khyab pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo so so 'brang ma 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma Ni
d+ha ri badzra Ni ma hA pra ti sa re swAhA/ rig sngags chen mo gsungs pa dang / /rig sngags rgyal mo'i mthu yis ni/ /mi yi skye rgu 'tshe byed pa/ /mthu chen mngal ni 'phrog pa dang / /
log 'dren kun dang sdang ba'i rnams/ /mi bzad me lces tshig gyur nas/ /'jigs pa dang ni skrag pa yis/ /rdo rje snang mdzad drung lhag ste/ /zhabs la gtugs te tshig smras
pa| |bdag cag dam tshig gnas par 'tshal/ /rig sngags dam tshig rtag gnas pa/ /gang gis mngal yang mi 'phrog cing / rtag tu mngal ni spel bar mdzad/ /de na
@#/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas nor gyi rgyun gyi yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags gyi rgyal mo chen mo nor rgyun 'di gsungs so/ /oM ba su d+ha ri ma hA ba su d+ha ra br-i Sh+Ta ni pA ta ni ba su swAhA/ nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba yi/ /rig
sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dag /yid ni 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas/ /rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ /drung du nye bar 'ongs nas su/ /
dam bcas pa yi tshig smras pa/ /bcom ldan nor rgyun ces bya ba'i/ /mtshan ni mi mchog sgrog bgyid na/ /de la nor gyi char 'bab cing / /nor chen dang ni ldan par ba gyi/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod par byed pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas srin mo glog 'bar ma sgyur ba'i snying po 'di

gsungs so/ /a re du tre ni pra ku pa ha tsaN+Da/ ma hA be ga d+ha ri bid sA d+hu dzi tre/ ma ho da ni/ rau dra ki pA la ma la d+hA ri Na dza Ta mu ku Ta/ man+ti te/ nA nA pra ha ra Na/ d+ha ri hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sarba

ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ ku ru ku ru/ hUM hUM/ pra ma d+ha ma/ sarba sha trU NAM/ sho ni ta bi pa/ pra tsa N+De/ be ga d+ha ri/ pa tsa ta pa tsa ta/ be kir ta sa ta ya hUM/ da ha da ha/ sarba sha truM/
sarba duSh+Tan/ ni krin+ta/ pra sA da ya hUM/ mahA b+ha ga ba te/ dz+wA la dz+wA la hUM phaT/ che ge mo zhig me sha mA nA ya swA hA/ de nas srin mo 'bar ba'i glog /rig sngags chen mo gsungs
pa yis/ /bdud kyi gnas rnams tshig par gyur/ /dgra rnams kyi ni snying yang bskams/ /dur khrod kyi ras la srin mo btsag gis bris nas legs par sbas te gu gul gyi
bdug pas sreg cing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ me tog dmar po dang / dri dmar po dang / gtor ma dang / lha bshos dmar por byas pa byin nas dur khrod du brko bar
bya'o| |de'i steng du ming nas smos shing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis gtor to/ /brkos pa'i mong la phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad bcings par
'gyur ro/ /mnan pa dang rmongs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrog ma'i dga' ston gnod sbyin mo'i tshogs dga' bar byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje chen po 'phrog ma'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM hA ri t+yai ma hA yak+Shi NI ye/ ha ra ha ra/ sarba yak+Shi NI phra be sha ni swAhA/ de nas
'phrog dga' 'phrog ma ni/ /gnod sbyin chen mo gsungs pa dang / /gnod sbyin ma kun g.yos nas su/ /dngos grub phyir ni mngon phyogs gyur/ /khro mo'i 'khor lo gnod sbyin ma/ /
@#/ /brgyad dbus 'phrog mas brgyan byas te/ /lcags kyu 'bras bu ne le can/ /gnong sbyin brgyad kyis klubs nas su/ /gnod sbyin ma kun bsgrub par bya/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nad chen po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mi ngas chen po zhi bar mdzad pa'i rigs
sngags ri khrod kyi shing lo can ma 'di gsungs so/ /oM bi shA tsi par+Na sha ba ri sar+b+ba mA ra pra sha ma ni hUM phaT/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams
rab tu g.yos/ /gnod byed nad 'gro srin po dang / /sdang ba rnams kyi snying yang zags/ /yam shing 'o ma can dang til/ /'o mas du ba zhi bar 'gyur/ /nam mkhar kun nas
rig sngags kyi/ /rgyal mos legs par bkang nas su/ /bdud rtsi char 'bebs bsams na ni/ /mod la gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ 'di
ni| gsang sngags kyi ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa'i rim par phye ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
pas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sku gsum ye shes kyi rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba lag pa'i phyag rgya tha dad pa rnams mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis nyon
cig /gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing / /'di ni lus ni byin brlabs te/ /rang gi gzugs su rnam bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob
'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las mthe bo gnyis bteg pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ste/ sku byin gyis brlab pa'i
phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las g.yon pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste g.yas pa'i mthe bo bteg pa ni/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ste/ gsung byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las
g.yas pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste g.yon pa'i mthe bo bteg pa ni/ rdo rje 'chang gi ste/ thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcings pa las g.yon
pa'i mdzub mo bsgrengs pa'i thor to g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ba ni/ rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug nas lag pa g.yon pa pang
par bzhag ste g.yas pas la gnon pa ni/ mi 'khrugs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /nga nyid las g.yas pa mchog sbyin par byas pa ni/ rin chen 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las lag
pa gnyis bsam gtan gyi tshul du byas pa ni/ 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byas pa ni/ gdon mi za bar grub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag
@#/ /pa gnyis rdo rje bcings pa byas pa las gung mo gshibs te bsgrengs pa ni/ rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las gung mo'i tshigs dang po bkug
ste rin po che'i tshul du byas pa ni/ rdo rje rin chen ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las gung mo pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar gdu bu'i tshul du byas pa ni/ /rdo rje chos ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las
gung mo nang du bskum pa ni/ rdo rje las ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu ltar byas te mthe bo'i rtse mor mig gi tshul
du byas pa ni/ sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo bsgrengs pa'i tshigs gsum par mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i tshul du bzung ba ni/ mA ma kI'i phyag
rgya'o| |lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar te pad+ma kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni/ gos dkar can gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las mdzub
mo gnyis bkug pas gung mo'i sen mo mnan te mthe bo gnyis dbus su bzhag nas cung zad bkug pa ni/ sgrol ma'i ut+pa la'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te mdzub
mo dang gung mo'i tshigs dbus mar gdu bu'i tshul du byas nas mthe bo gnyis glor bzhag pa 'di ni/ skul byed ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rdo rje bcings pa byas pa
las mdzub gnyis mo gnyis mthe bo'i rtse mor bkug pa 'di ni/ /rin chen sgrol ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis brkyang ste mthe bos so so'i mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan nas lhag ma
rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa 'di ni/ khro gnyer can ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis so sor khur tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lug gu rgyud ltar bcings
pa 'di ni/ rdo rje lug gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bsgrengs te rtse mo'i tshul du byas la gung mo'i rgyab tu srin lag
bsnol la mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu'i tshul du byas pas dkris pas mthe bo gnyis mdun du bzhag pa las cung zad bkug ste kha'i tshul du byas pa 'di ni/ gshin rje gshed kyi
phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying gar bzhag ste lag pa g.yas pa thal lcag gi tshul du byas pa ni/ khro bo gzhan gyis mi
thub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis la the'u chud lug gu rgyud ltar mdud la mdzub mo gshibs te bsgrengs pa las ldog ste dpral bar bzhag pa ni/ rta mgrin gyi phyag
rgya'o| |lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bos srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyi sen mo mnan la ral gri shubs nas dbyung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o//
@#/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcas pa las rgyab sprad de mthe'u chung gnyis lug gu rgyud ltar bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs pa las zhags
pa'i tshul du byas pa ni/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo snying gar bzhag la g.yas pa khro bo'i sor mo be tson gyi tshul du
'phyar ba ni/ be con sngon po can gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje snying gar bzhag la g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdeg stangs dang bcas par 'phyar ba ni/ stobs po
che'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung mo bsgrengs te sprad nas me tog gi tshul du byas pa ni/ byams pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa
gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyis srin mo mnan nas ut+pal la kha phye ba'i tshul du bzhag pa ni/ 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi phyag
rgya'o| |lag pa g.yon pa pang par bzhag la lag pa g.yas pa glang po che'i sna ltar byas pa ni/ spos kyi glang po'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur nam mkha' la bsgrengs
pa lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo ba dan gyi tshul du byas pa ni/ ye shes me tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /bzang po'i 'dug stangs su 'dug ste thal mo khong stong du sbyar te snying gar bzhag pa ni/
bzang skyong gi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis chu rlabs kyi tshul du brkyang ba las sor mo rnams chu rlabs drang pa ni/ blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur snying gar
bzhag la g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ni/ blo gros mi zad pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur pang du bzhag la g.yas pa se gol gtogs pa'i tshul du byas pa ni/ spobs
pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis pad+ma cung zad kha bye ba ltar byas pa ni/ mthu chen thob kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis me tog 'dor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni/ ngan song
thams cad spong ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las bsnun pa'i tshul du byas pa ni/ mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros
kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis brkyang nas 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni/ dra ba can gyi 'od kyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa mchog sbyin par byas la g.yon pa zla ba'i tshul du byas ba ni/ zla
'od kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis bum pa'i tshul du byas nas dbang bskur ba ni/ 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la g.yas pa'i khu tshur nam mkha' la
kun tu bskor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa sa la brkyang nas lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bo sprad nas zhi ba'i tshul du byas pa ni/
@#/ /sgrib pa thams cad nges par sel ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon ba rdo rje khu tshur las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying gar bzhag la hUM zhes bya zhing / lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo
rje khu tshur rdeg stangs dang bcas par 'phyar ba ni/ ri khrod lo ma can gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa sor mo brkyang pa las mdzub mo dang mthe bo skam pas 'dzin pa'i tshul du
byas la| lag pa g.yas pa khab kyi tshul gyis 'tshe bar byed pa rnams kyi kha mig 'drub pa ni/ 'od zer can ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis spyi bor sbrul mgo gdengs ka'i
gdugs ltar byas nas phud ces brjod pa ni/ dug sel ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba ni/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /
de nyid las g.yas pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyus dza zhes byas pas dgug pa ni/ rdo rje khro bo lcags kyus dgug pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ba ste rdo rje khro bo
lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe'u chung mche ba'i tshul du byas pa las bsnol te 'gram pa gnyis su bzhag la/ lce ljib cing khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya ba ni//
rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis bskum/ mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du byas nas kha'i grar bzhag ste hUM zhes bya zhing khro bo'i lta bas lus
gcu ba ni/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste bsnol nas gyen du bteg pa ltar byas pa ni/ dkyil
'khor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mkhrig ma gnyis bsnol te bstod cing bteg pa ni/ sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bsnol nas mchan khung du bsnams
te khro bo'i lta bas 'gyur ba dang bcas pa ni/ gdon thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon brkyang ste kha sbub pa la de'i steng du g.yas pa bzhag nas lag pa
gnyis kyis sor mo bskyod pa ni/ lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang 'phrul 'khor 'byed pa dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo smrar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo dang mthe'u chung
gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings te bzhag la/ lhag ma ba dan rtse gsum pa'i tshul du byas nas stang stabs dang bcas par hUM zhes bya ba ni/ khro bo rdo rje sa 'og gi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon

pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi khro bo'i mdzub mos bsdigs pa ni/ rdo rje bdag mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste phur bu'i tshul du byas pa ni/ rdo rje phur bu'i phyag rgya'o/ /

g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur brdung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni/ rdo rje tho ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje mdud pa dor ba'i tshul du byas pa
@#/ /ni| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bcing pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te sog le drang pa'i tshul du byas pa ni/ rdo rje
sog le'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo zla ba'i tshul du bya ste gdong g.yogs shing brkyang la khro bo'i mig tu byas nas a la la zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje srin mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /
lag pa gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings pa la mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni/ sprin thams cad gtub pa'i char pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur
bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu ltar byas te skam pa'i tshul du dpung pa brkyang ba ni/ 'khrul 'khor gyi phur ba dbyung ba'i skam pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyi
mthe bo lag mthil du bzhag ste lhag ma rnams 'dab ma ltar g.yab cing rkang pa ya gcig sa la btsugs la/ gcig rgyab tu bskums nas khro bo'i lta bas lce ljib cing hUM phaT
ces bya bas rim gyis bskyod pa ni/ rdo rje nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya'o/ /'di bcings pa tsam gyis khams gsum khyab pa'i dug kyang skad cig gis sel bar byed do/ /rdo rje khu
tshur gnyis mda' gzhu gang ba'i tshul gyis phyogs bzhir mda' bkang ste 'phangs pas pha rol dpung gzhig pa ni/ mnyes par bye dpa'i rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur gnyis
las gung mo gshibs te bsgrengs ba las rin po che'i tshul du bku ga la/ mthe bo brkyang ba'i steng du mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu'i chul du byas pa ni/ sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi phyag rgya
g.yul las sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos sor mo mnan te gung mo bsgrangs la g.yas pas pad+ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul du byas pa ni/ ha la ha la'i phyag rgya'o/ /khu
tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gnyis dkris la mdzub mo gnyis gshibs te bsgrengs nas ldog la dpral bar bzhag pa ni/ rdo rje khrag 'thung gi phyag rgya ste/ dur khrod du 'jug pa na mkha'
'gro ma rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /g.yon pas thod pa bzungs la g.yas pas mdung rtse gsum thogs nas ral ba bcings te zla bas brgyan cing mtshan bsgrengs la/ mig gsum pa
gar byed pa ni/ gar thabs kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di ni/ bde byed kyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa mi 'jigs par byas pa las sor mo rnams cung zad phya ste mthe bo lag mthil du bzhag /de bzhin
du g.yas pa'i khu tshur dbyug to 'dzin pa ltar byas pa ni/ khyab 'jug gi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis brkyang nas pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni/ tshangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal
mo khong sdong du sbyar te me tog ltar byas pa ni/ ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi ni/ /rgyab du mdud pa ltar 'dor zhing / /rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i/ /rin chen cod pan
@#/ /phreng dbang bskur/ /ting 'dzin gnas pas 'khor lo can/ /'khor lo mnga' ba'i lha rnams la/ /sangs rgyas sa ni rab 'gengs pa'i/ /gsang pa'i mchod
pa 'byung bar bsam/ /'gyur zhing cung zad 'jo tshul can/ /sgeg mo yi ni phyag rgya yis/ /gar gyi tshul du bkod nas kyang / /hUM zhes bya ba glur blangs shing / /de nas sangs rgyas kun
dgyes pa/ /rdo rje rgyud ni bsgreng bar bya/ /de nas phreng chul phreng ba yis/ /lha rnams kun la bcing bar bya/ /'jo sgeg thabs la spro ba yis/ /lag gnyis bskor zhing dgrol ba dang / /g.yas
nas g.yon du bskor ba yis/ /gar thabs byas la mgo la gzhag /me tog dbul ba'i tshul du ni/ /gang gis me tog thal mo sbyar/ /bdug spos rtse mo sbyar ba yis/ /gung mo gnyis
ni ldog ste bsgreng / /bskor zhing bsgyur ba byas pa yis/ /mthe ba gnyis mar me'i tshul du bzhag /dung gi tshul du lag bsgyur nas/ /dung phor lta bur mchod yon dbul/ /de nas lha rnams
kun la yang / /lag pa'i gar gyis byug tshul bya/ /de nas sil snyan tshul gyis su/ /lag gnyis sil snyan legs par brdung / /dung dang gling bu 'bud pa dang / /lag pa gnyis ni rnga
yag g.yob/ /bsil yab tshul gyis bsil yab dang / /sor mo gnyis kyis rgyal mtshan bya/ /tshon dgye tshe na lcug phran ltar/ /bskyod cing tshon gyi phreng ba dgye/ /lag g.yon snod
kyi tshul byas la/ /g.yas pa yis ni lha bshos dbul/ /khang pa brtsegs pa bzhag nas su/ /gos kyi tshul gyis gos rnams dang / /gdu bu ska rags rkang rgyan dang / /rna cha do shal
gnas lngar bzhag /de nas gdugs kyi tshul gyis su/ /lha rdzas gdugs ni legs par gzung / /bsam gtan tshul gyis lag pa dag /nam mkha' la ni mdzes bskor na/ /sangs rgyas
zhing rab 'gengs byed pa'i/ /bla re rnams pa sna tshogs 'gyur/ /grar ni pad+ma'i phreng ba dang / /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan/ /gsang sngags 'di ni cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje dril bu gsil ba

yis| |sgo 'phar dag kyang dbye bar bya/ /oM badzra g+ha N+Da ra Ni ta/ pra tsa Ni ta/ saM pra ra Ni ta/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha k+She tra/ pra tsa li te/ pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ nA tA swa b+hA be badzra d+harma hri da ya san+to Sha Ni hUM hUM hUM/ lag
g.yas rdo rje gsor bya zhing / /sna tshogs khugs su 'gyur ba yis/ /rdo rje glu yis bstod pa bya/ /rdo rje theg pas mnyes byed pa/ /'di ni don dam mchod pa yin/ /gang gis rnam rtog rnam spangs
te| |byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pas/ /lus ngag sems ni rnam dag pa/ /de yi mchod pa bla na med/ /sems can gang gis dbu ma yi/ /theg pa gong ma ma bsgoms shing / /theg
pa dman pa lhag mos pa/ /de yi mchog pa kun rdzob pa/ /sangs rgyas dbang chen grags kun gyis/ /mchod pa de dag gsan pa dang / /ngo mtshar byung ba'i spyan phye nas/ /legs so zhes ni rab
@#/ /tu gsungs/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /byang chub sangs rgyas thabs su ste/ /rdo rje bsgom pa byas pa yis/ /nyon mongs med par byang chub 'thob/ /rdo
rje theg chen legs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa legs/ /zab cing rgya che legs pa ste/ /rdo rje rin chen kun 'dus legs/ /de nas ye shes kyi sku gsum las byung
ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje theg pa bsngags pa thos nas dga' bas spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad la/ /dga'
pa'i yid kyis bstod par byed/ /thod ma med cing skye ba med/ /'gyur ba med cing gnas pa med/ /mkha' bzhin rnam rtog las grol ba/ /rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags
thabs su brtags pa gang yin des/ /ye shes kyi ni sras po kun/ /rdo rje theg pa bsgoms pa yis/ /sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur/ /zhes smras so/ /bde ba las 'khrungs
rdo rje 'chang ba yis/ /dngos po dngos med 'byung gnas chen por mkhyen/ /dang po gang du rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /dag cing dri med blos ni oM du sprul/ /gzugs mang tshul gyis
phreng bas bskor ba yi/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsung snyan yi ge kun la khyab pa yi/ /spros med gsung du 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs/ /mig gsum lha
mo dang bcas 'dul mdzad pa/ /sgyu 'phrul tshul mang ldan pa 'ga' ma mchis/ /gang du bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa/ /na chung dag dang lhan cig bzhad mdzad cing / /g.yas pa'i
phyag gos rdo rje gsor nas su/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gis dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol/ /lha mo mtha' dag btsun mor gyur ba yis/ /dam tshig rnams kyis bya ba byas par 'gyur/ /gcig gi lag
pas kun nas 'khyud pa ste/ /gnyis pa rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu/ /gsum pa mi bzod me tog phreng ba 'thor/ /bzhi pa bde ba yis ni mda' yang 'phen/ /gang zhig glu 'di len
par byed pa dag /bde ba'i rdo rje can dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje'i glu yin no/ /oM a nut+ta ra sar+b+ba pU dza me g+ha ud ga te s+pha ra Na i
maM ga ga na khaM hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di lan gsum brjod pas mchod pa'i sprin rab 'byams thams cad byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ 'di ni
phyag rgya'i mchod pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis tshig mthun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /ye shes gces pa dri med pa/ /byang
@#/ /chub sems ni rin po che/ /bla na med pa bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par thugs
su chud nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems ni lus kyi rnam yin la/ /lus kyang sems kyi rnam pa yin/ /sems kyang tshig gis
brjod pa yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rnam par sbyor ba thos nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod
do| |e ma kun tu bzang po ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /chos rnams skye ba med pa ste/ /g.yo ba med cing gnas pa med/ /rtog pa'i dri ma spangs pa 'di/ /bskyed par bya
zhes rab tu gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas gsung spros pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang
chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag skyes te/ /chos can med cing chos nyid med/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs med pa'i/ /byang chub sems 'di brtan pa
yin| |zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag dngos med de/ /chos kyi mtshan
nyid spangs pa yin/ /bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i/ /byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis gsungs so/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po skye
ba med pa ste/ /dngos po ngo bo yod min pas/ /nam mkha'i go 'phang thob bo zhes/ /dngos rnams rab tu brjod pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis gsungs so/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla ma'i yang bla ma ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang
