chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /gzod nas dag cing rnyog pa med/ /sems can med cing srog kyang med/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub med/ /
rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i/ /byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis gsungs so/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'
@#/ /sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems
rnam par dag pa mthong nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye ma'o dag /kye ma'o chos ni bstan pa rnams/ /bdag med chos las legs
byung ba| |byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems ni sgom pa yis/ /mi g.yo yi ge las byung ba/ /rmi lam sogs ltar ma skyes pa/ /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal
lo| |gnas dang stan ni rnam bsams te/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /dang por rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes/ /dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas/ /yid kyis hUM byas rdo rje
can| |rdo rjes sems mas byin gyis brlabs/ /rin chen lus su nga rgyal bya/ /lag pa bstod de bskor ba yi/ /lcags kyu yis ni spyan yang drang / /byon nas dang por phyogs bcings te/ /
dam tshig dag kyang dbul bar bya/ /gdan rnams so sor phul nas su/ /mchod yon dbul pa'i sbyor ba bya/ /dbang bskur mtshon cha go sogs/ /sil snyan mchod sogs ngo bo bya//
rnam pa kun gyis mnyes par bya/ /rnal 'byor dbang nyid can gyis brtag /rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste/ /byin gyis brlab dang yongs brtags dang / /gzugs gnyis rdzogs
par gyur pa ni/ /rnal 'byor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs/ /sngags kyis byin brlabs nga rgyal bskyed/ /rnal 'byor byin brlabs yin par gsungs/ /byang chub sems ni dag pa dang / /
gsang sngags sa bon bskyod pa che/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs su brtags pa yin/ /rim gyis gzugs ni rdzogs byas pa/ /de ni brtag par brjod pa ste/ /rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungs/ /
bsdu dang spro bar byas pa las/ /rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dag /skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do/ /dang por dam tshig byin brlabs par/ /
rnal 'byor spyod pa bdag gis brtags/ /rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dag /'di ni rnal 'byor cho gar bshad/ /nyon mongs dri mar byas pa'i sems/ /byang chub sems kyis dag byas te/ /de
ni rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes/ /brjod cing thal mo gsum gyis sbyang / /dag gyur de nas blo yis ni/ /sems la so sor brtag par bya/ /sems la so sor brtags nas kyang / /phyi rol
rang bzhin stong par bya/ /sems tsam la ni gnas nas su/ /byang chub tshogs kyi bag chags des/ /bsgom par bya ba'i ngo bo dag /zla pa'i gzugs su rnam par brtag /lag pa'i pad+ma
la gnas pa'i/ /oM gyi myu gus bskrun pa yis/ /yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs/ /rdo rje skur ni bsgom par bya/ /AHzhes bya ba spros med gsung / /sems ni hUM zhes bya ba
@#/ /sprul| |yi ge gsum gyi byin brlabs lus/ /snying la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs/ /de la rang gi yi ge ni/ /mdog gzugs 'od ni phyed bsams te/ /nga rgyal
bskyed nas de la ni/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid bdag yin brjod/ /rgyan kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ cha shas kyi ni dra ba can/ /ye shes sems
dpa' rdzogs par brtag /de 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /go cha mtshon cha la sogs bya/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas lngar dbang bskur te/ /cod pan phreng ba rnams kyis klubs/ /de nas
de 'og sangs rgyas kyi/ /sprul pa mdzad pa'i sgyu ma spro/ /yan lag bzhi pa'i dbus ldan pa'i/ /phyogs bcur khro bo bcu dag dang / /snyems ma dang ni rtogs ldan ma/ /mtshon cha mda'
dang rtse mo can/ /sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam mang po/ /rnam par 'phrul par byin gyis brlabs/ /kun la khyab par byed pa yi/ /sna tshogs dbus su bzhag nas ni/ /de nyid chen po bdag nyid
lngas| |phyogs bzhi'i 'khor lo khyab byas te/ /dga' bas dga' byed bzhi yang sbong / /ting 'dzin kun gyi dga' ba la/ /longs par spyod pa'i sngags pa yis/ /'khor lo la ni rdo
rje'i gzugs/ /pad+ma'i gzugs la de dag ni/ /'khor lo kun las pad+ma yi/ /ngo bo yis ni rol ba dang / /e zhes bya ba 'phos pa las/ /mdog ldan bdag nyid gzugs su bya/ /mdzes
pa'i rgyan nyid kun ldan pa/ |nyid stan la bzhugs par blta/ /sgeg mo glu dang gar rnams dang / /rgyal mtshan la sogs tshon dgye dang / /sil snyan mchod pa'i rnam pa ni/ /sna tshogs rnams kyis
mchod par bya/ /rnam pa kun dang ldan par ni/ /bdag nyid kyi ni lus bsgoms nas/ /myur ches pa dang bul ba dang / /mi gsal gug skyed nyams pa dang / /rtog pa ngan pa rnam spangs nas/ /de nas
gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya/ /bzlas pas skyon lag g.yas gyis/ /bsgrims te rdo rje gsor nas kyang / /g.yon pas rdo rje dril gsil zhing / /rdo rje glu tshul sna tshogs dang / /ba dan tshul du
bya bas mchod/ /bzlas pa'i mjug ni brtul nas kyang / /gshegs su gsol te bdag nyid bsrung / /lus dang ngag dang sems bsgoms te/ /brtan por ci bder 'gro bar bya/ /bar chad du ni
gyur na yang / /yi ge brgya pas byin gyis brlab/ /de ltar bsgom pas sgom byed pa/ /rdo rje theg pas rab rdzogs pa'i/ /byang chub des ni myur thob nas/ /zla nyi'i dkyil 'khor lta bur snang / /sna
tshogs las kyi thog 'dren cing / /rin chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed/ /chags chen pad+ma'i gdung rgyud can/ /gnas chen 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur/ /dpal ldan rig sngags kun gyi gtso//
dga' chen rdo rje lcags kyur 'gyur/ /sgyu ma bshig pa kun shes shing / /dregs pa 'joms byed khro bor 'gyur/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /'di ni/ /byang chub kyi sems
@#/ /sgom pa'i ye shes sgrub pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs
pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyi nang gi 'khor lo thams cad rab
tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi las kyi sbyor ba rab 'byams 'di bka' stsal to/ /lha ni gang yang rung ba zhig/ 'khor lo'i dbus su bzhag na ni/ /de yi ming smos rdo rje yi/ /dkyil
'khor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs/ /zhi dang rgyas dang drag shul dang / /rang gi las la sbyor ba na/ /'khor lo'i rgyal po rnam bsgoms nas/ /bdag po nyid kyis rab tu
bya| |zhi ba spyan dang skul byed mas/ /rgyas la rin chen gos dkar mo/ /dbang la sgrol ma lu gu rgyud/ /yams dang gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir/ /'od zer can dang ri khrod mas//
drag shul spyod la mA ma kI/ /khro gnyer can ma dag gis bya/ /'di dag shes rab rol ba ste/ /chags pa'i rdo rjes rdzas chags pa/ /gsang sngags de nyid kyis bskul na/ /gdon mi
za bar 'phrin las mdzad/ /spyan dang lha mo skul byed ma/ /dbang po zhi ba zla 'dra ba/ /phyag gnyis na ni bgrang phreng dang / /ril ba spyi blugs kyis brgyan pa/ /dang por ting 'dzin
gyis sprul nas/ /bum pa zla ba'i mdangs ldan pa/ /bdud rtsi'i 'o mas rab bkang ste/ /lag gnyis pad+ma'i gdub mchog gis/ /rnam par snang mdzad zhabs drung du/ /nad pa
la ni gdugs par bsam/ /rin chen ma dang gos dkar can/ /sku tshe kha dog ser po ste/ /lha mo ser mo snang ba la/ /phyag na rin chen pad+ma can/ /dang por ting 'dzin gyis sprul nas//
yid 'ong rgyal ba'i 'dod pa yis/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i zhabs drung du/ /bdud rtsis rab tu dgang ba dang / /bla med rin chen khar bab na/ /rgyas pa mtshungs med mdzad par 'gyur/ /
lha mo sku chen mdog dmar ba/ /sgrol ma de bzhin lu gu rgyud/ /kun nas 'od dmar 'bar ba can/ /lha rdzas lcags kyu zhags thogs pa/ /rab tu bzhad cing spyan phye bas/ /'od dpag
med pa'i zhabs drung du/ /bsgrub bya rgyags pas myos pa dag /bkug ste mda' yis bsnun na ni/ /skad cig nyid la dbang du mdzad/ /mi ngas gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir/ /sku chen
nam mkha'i kha dog can/ /'od zer can dang ri khrod mas/ /rdo rje don yod zhabs drung du/ /mkhas pas sngar bshad tshul du ni/ /bdud rtsi yis kyang rnam par bzlog /lha mo khro gnyer mA
ma kI/ /margad lta bu'i mdog can ma/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrog pa/ /rdo rjes bsdigs pas brtson pa yis/ /rdo rje mi 'khrugs zhabs drung du/ /khros nas rdo rje'i me yi char/ /'bebs
@#/ /par rnam par bsam par bya/ /rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba des/ /bsgrub bya tshig nas mog ces byed/ /sbyor ba 'di yi mod la ni/ /de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/ /yang na
lus ni 'jig par mdzad/ /byin brlabs dam tshig dbang bskur la/ /rdo rje sems ma rin chen dang / /chos dang rdo rje las ma bzhi/ /sbyor ba rnams ni rab tu sbyar/ /sems dpa'
chen po bcu drug kyang / /bla med 'khor lo byed pa ste/ /rang gi phyogs nas las byas na/ /'bras bu don yod sbyin par byed/ /khro bo'i lus la legs gnas te/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos byar
bar bya| |dam tshig la sogs cho ga bzhin/ /der ni rdo rje bsgoms nas bskul/ /rkang ba'i rjes kyi sa blangs la/ /dur khrod thal ba dag dang bsre/ /de yi ras blangs mi rus dang //
chu 'gram gnyis kyi sa dag ni/ /brtags nas lung bong gcin gyis sprul/ /de las dgra bo'i gzugs byas la/ /de tshe gzugs brnyan bcing bar bya/ /dug dang ske tshe lan ch+wa dang / /
'bru mar tsha ba rab bsres te/ /dgra bo tsha ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ /de yis lus nang rab tu dgang / /de nas rnam shes rlung 'dra ba/ /lcags kyu yis ni bkug nas kyang / /srin bu me
khyer 'dra bcug ste/ /zhags pa yis ni dam du gzung / /de ni rdo rje sgrog tu gzhug /bsgrim nas de yi ming smos te/ /dgra bo'i lus ni ma lus par/ /bo son cha yi tsher mas dbug/
mi rus las byas phur bu 'am/ /yang na seng ldeng las byung bas/ /dbral ba snying mgrin dbung mgo gnyis/ /gnas lnga dag tu bsgrims te gdab/ /nim pa'i shing la sbar ba yis/ /me
sbar ba la bskam par bya/ /mkhas pas rkang pa nas brtsams te/ /mtshon cha rnon pos gtubs nas ni/ /'bar ba'i lus can khros pa yis/ /de yi dum bu sbyin sreg bya/ /las 'di
la ni lhag par yang / /rus spal gyi ni rkang thabs sbyar/ /nyi ma'i gung ngam nam phyed na/ /las 'di nyid ni bsgrub par bya/ /las 'di byas nas nges par ni/ /gang zhig rgyal bas bsrungs
na'ang des/ /nges bar 'chi na khyab 'jug dang / /lha chen tshangs pas ci zhig smos/ /phyi rol gyi drag shul spyod pa'i go cha'o/ /gsod pa'i ye shes las sprul pa/ /nang gi yang ni bshad
par bya| |bsgrub bya yid kyis bsrungs nas su/ /cho ga bzhin du dgug par bya/ /lag na ral gri mtshon cha dang / /be chon rdo rje gtun shing zhags/ /lag na 'khor lo mda' gzhu can/ /
khro bo sna tshogs bsnams pa des/ /sgrub bya zhags pas bcings nas su/ /rdo rje yi ni khro bo yis/ /lho yi phyogs su khrid pa dang / /rdo rje gzhan gyis brdeg pa dang / /de ni ral gris
gtub pa dang / /sgyu ma lang long nar bar bsam/ /oM hUM badzra rAk+Sha sa b+hak+Sha ya tha phaT/ rdo rje srin mo bsgoms nas kyang / /bya rog wa dang bya rgod kyis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor nas su//
@#/ /de dag zang thob byed par ni/ /sgom zhing ming nas skul bar byed/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje rnga mo rnams bsams te/ /bsgrub par bya bar yongs
brtags pa/ /de yi rgyab tu zhon nas su/ /rdo rje khro bos gzir bzhin du/ /lho phyogs su ni bkri bar bya/ /de yi rkang rjes sa la ni/ /rlung gis gtsubs pa'i shing lo la/ /de yi ming nas
brjod byas te/ /rdo rje sna yon drung du sba/ /de lta bur ni sbyor ba'i las/ /bsgoms shing cho ga bzhin byas na/ /brgya byin nyid kyang bskrang 'gyur na/ /sa steng skye bo smos ci dgos/ /de
mi gsang sngags dang spel te/ /'jug pa'i sgro la bris nas ni/ /dge sbyong bram ze'i skras dkris te/ /sa yi 'og tu bskos nas gzhug /rdo rje khro bo gnyis kyis ni/ /'thab mo 'gyed du
'jug par bya/ /de ltar bsam pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'dod pa bzhin du dbye bar 'gyur/ /hUM zhes bya bas gang ba yi/ /rdo rje phra mo bsgom byas nas/ /sna yi rtse mo nas bton te/ /bsgrub
bya'i lus ni dgang bar bya/ /lus kyi tshigs ni thams cad du/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bcings nas su/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'phros gyur pa/ /des ni lus kyang bskam par bya/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma
bsgoms te/ /kun nas kyang ni gzhig bar bya/ /oM badzra DA ki nI a mu ka s+ya rak+ta A kaR+Sha tsa sha ya hUM phaT/ sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni/ /bskams 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//
mkhas pas rlung gi phyogs song te/ /dkyil 'khor 'grub bzhir byas nas ni/ /spos kyi thig le bdun byas te/ /de dag kham pa'i phor ba dgab/ /de ni ri rab thams cad nas/ /rtse mo brgyad par
sprul byas te/ /rdo rje 'phro bas brgyan pa yis/ /de dag rnams ni mnan par bya/ /yaM zhes bya bas bskyed pa'i rlung bdun rnams/ /laM zhes bya bas mtshan ma dbang chen gyi/ /nang du rlung rnams
nges par chud par bya/ /de lta'i sbyor bas 'jig pa'i rlung yang bcings/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgoms nas de'i 'dab la/ /klu brgyad bkod dbus me tshogs 'bar ba can/ /rdo rje khro bo'i sku yi
zhabs mthil gyis/ /klu rnams mnan na char sprin char ba 'bebs/ /hUM zhes bya ba gnyis dbus klu rnams kyis/ /snying po yongs bcug spel mas gzir nas su/ /hUM zhes bya ba bzlas
brjod byas nas su/ /'jig dus char ba lta bu char ba 'bab/ /nyi ma'i mdog ltar dmar po'i 'od bzang zhal/ /nam mkha' khyab par rnam par gdangs nas ni/ /kun nas char chus
yongs su gang ba'i sprin/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lce yis bldag /dbugs rngub pa yis bkug nas 'byung ba yis/ /shing bal bzhin du rab tu gtor bar bya/ yang na rang gi
phyag rgya tshogs 'bar ba/ /btang bas skad cig la ni bcad gtubs te/ /hUM zhe bya bas bsdigs pa byas na ni/ nam mkha' dag kyang ston ka'i dus ltar snang / /me yi dkyil
@#/ /'khor la gnas snang mdzad kyis/ /zhabs drung dpral dbyes nas byung mi g.yo bran/ /bdud las rnam rgyal phyag drug mda' gzhu zhags/ /ral gri 'khor lo rdo
rje char 'bebs pa/ /khro bo grangs med pa yis yongs bskor nas/ /bgegs rnams sreg mdzad hUM gi sgras bkang nas/ /'jig rten gsum bo gang ba'ang rnam par 'jig /rkang
rjes sa dang mi yi khrag dag las/ /mi yi gzugs byas mi rus phur bu la/ /'od zer can gyi gsang sngags bsgrags pa yis/ /lan grangs nyi shur mngon bsngags mig tu gdab//
tshogs kyi bdag po'i khar ni ming bcug gnas/ /phyi bzhin rdo rje gtun shing dag gis brdung / /oM sum+b+ha badzra mu sa le na/ /tsur+N+Na ya na ra b+hi big+h+na na hUM phaT/ las 'di bsams pas
mod la ni/ /me yi bgegs kyang bzlog par 'gyur/ /stang zil kha dog lta bu nam mkha' lding / /lus la sprul stong dag gis brgyan byas pa/ /mkha' la 'dug nas gdengs ka
stong ldan pa'i/ /klu brgyan dag dang char sprin rnams la bsgo/ /brgya byin bka' ni de dag gis thos nas/ /sprin tshogs bum ba'i char gyis me yang gsod/ /nam mkha' lding gis
'dab mas bkab nas ni/ /mchus brkos chu klung gis ni mtshams kyang bcad/ /oM badzra nA rA ya Na/ nir ba bA ya/ ma ha ni ba ma mu me g+he hUM/ zhal ras gsum ba ston ka'i zla ba'i
mdog /phyag bzhi 'od dmar sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /lha mo bzhi ba snyems ma byams ma dang / /chu srin rgyal mtshan me tog rol bas bskor/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje legs
gsor zhing / /g.yon pas rdo rje dril bu sgeg par bzhag /ldem bag 'jo sgeg tshul gyis rol ba ste/ /sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sprin rnams rnam par 'phel/ /rnam pa kun gyis rnam
brgyan cing / /rin chen cod pa na dbang bskur bas/ /nam mkha' la ni 'bab pa yis/ /thog thog rnam par zlog par byed/ /oM ma hA puk+ka badzra/ /che ge mo dza zhes bya ba dang / hUM zhes bya ba nas pU
ra Ta ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ sbyor ba 'di ni byas pa yis/ /bla med byang chub rgyas par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ /mi 'khrugs
rin chen 'od dpag med/ /don yod gsang sngags rgyal rnams dang / /bzang po rnam pa bcu drug po/ /kun dang drag po'i ting 'dzin la/ /gnas pa yis ni khro bo dang / gsang sngags rdzogs
mdzad rig rgyal ma/ /rnam pa kun dang ldan pa dag /rims bral rang gi ting 'dzin gnas/ /thams cad ldan pa'i khor rnams la/ /gzigs pa chen po rnam gzigs nas/ /sku gsung thugs
kyi rdo rje can/ /smin ma mdzes par bskyod nas su/ /yan lag 'phrog pa'i 'dzum bstan nas/ /thugs kyi sems ni dga' bar mdzad/ /dga' bar mdzad pa'i mod la ni/ /sangs rgyas mchod
@#/ /kun gyis mchod pa/ /shes rab chen po'i thog 'dren pas/ /bsgrims te so sor gsor nas des/ /bde chen ting 'dzin la gnas te/ /ldem pag 'jo tshul
gyis bltas nas/ /lag gnyis pad+ma'i tshul gyur te/ /spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /ye shes lam ni rab ston pa/ /rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad la/ /lag na rdo rje stobs
po che| |yid rgyas pa yis tshig gsol ba/ /ci slad rnam pa thams cad du/ /zur gyis rnam par gzigs pa dang / /smin ma bskyod byas 'dzum mdzad pa/ /ye shes rnam par
bsgyings pas gsungs/ /byang chub chen po'i rdo rje can/ /lag na rdo rje gsol mod la/ /brtan zhing zab pa'i gsung gis ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rol pa bshad/ /sgom
pa'i lam la legs byung ba/ /rdo rje ye shes rnams kyi thabs/ /bde bas byang chub thob 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas kyi/ /rje su 'brang ba'i 'khor nyon cig/
gang la dngos rnams dngos med cing / /mtha' gnyis kyi ni mtshan ma med/ /dbus la'ang spyod pa med pa dag /dus gsum 'das pa'i nam mkha' 'dra/ /thabs dang shes
rab rnam spangs pa/ /de la byang chub ji ltar rtogs/ /rtogs bar 'dod pa de dag ni/ /thabs rnams nga yis bshad par bya/ /phung po dngos po yong med pa'i/ /byang chub sems
ni grogs gyur pa/ /spro ba dang ni btung ba yis/ /sku gsum mchog ni mchod par bya/ /sems kyis sku ni 'thob 'gyur zhing / /sems kyis chos rnams bstan pa yin/ /sems
kyis byang chub 'thob 'gyur bas/ /de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par bsgom/ /sems ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste/ /byang chub kyang ni sgyu ma 'dra/ /dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gas/ /gyo mo la ni/
sngags bzlas te/ /legs par byas pa'i gzugs dag la/ /sbyor ba goms pas bsnun na ni/ /rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i gzugs/ /zhen pa'i sems la snang bar 'gyur/ /de
bzhin bsod nams ye shes las/ /byung ba'i tshogs kyis sgom pa'i sems/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la/ /bla med byang chub snang bar byed/ /dngos po don dam mi shes pa//
phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pas/ /ngan par rtog pa'i rnam rtog gis/ /rin chen sems 'di dri mar byas/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams dang / /dngos po thams cad lngan zhes gsungs/ /de la
gtsang dang mi gtsang sogs/ /mi shes pa yis yongs su brtags/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mngon zhen pas/ /don dam phyi rol byas pa yi/ /theg pa dman pa rnams kyis ni/ /bla med byang
chub ji ltar 'thob/ /byang chub rnam pa gnyis gsungs te/ /lhag ma dang bcas lhag ma med/ /lhag bcas phung po'i ngo bo ste/ /nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su bsregs/ /lhag med pag
@#/ /chags med pa ste/ /mkha' ltar dri ma med pa yin/ /bla med byang chub 'di ltar bur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rnam bar bshad/ /de yi byang chub spel ba'i
phyir| |las kyi tshul ni sna tshogs yin/ /rnal 'byor can gyi gsang sngags gang / /ye shes sems dpa'i zhabs drung du/ /rtag tu mnyes byas ma grub pa'i/ /lhag ma nga yis
bshad bya ste/ /de ni bde blag thabs kyis su/ /tshar bcad nas ni sgrub pa bshad/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal po che/ /rdo rje zhags pa rab gdung byed/ /rdo rje khu tshur gzi brjid che//
rdo rje phur bu rnams 'dril byed/ /rdo rje tho ba rdung ba ste/ /rdo rje nag mo char 'bar ba/ /lha rnams kun la 'jigs ba skyed/ /phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs 'di/ /bsgoms nas las
la sbyar na ni/ /dam tshig rgyal bas bstan pa'i phyir/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i las byed do/ /gsang sngags rig pas hUM zhes pa'i/ /lcags kyu btang nas zhabs drung dgugs//
'di ni gal te sangs rgyas sam/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i snying las 'gugs/ /dam tshig gis ni zhugs pa dang / /rdo rje bcing bas bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas/ /rdo rje
nag mos kun tu bsdigs/ /rdo rje yi ni phur bu yis/ /gzugs brnyan gyi ni gnas lnga po/ /dpral ba mgrin pa snying ga dang / /de bzhin dpung pa gnyis su gdab/ /rdo rje thobs brdung
bar bya| |cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par gnon/ /bsdigs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gzugs brnyan mig yor gyur ba dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub
rab rdzogs pa'i/ /dngos grub de tshe sbyin bar mdzad/ /'di ni mthu yis grub pa yi/ /sbyor ba gcig pu gsang chen yin/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis gsang ba'i
sgrub pa thobs nas mgrin gcig tu thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba gsol to/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad/ /dpa' bo chen po legs so zhes/ /zab mo chos kyi mchog gyur pa/ /dam
ba bshad pa mdzad pa legs/ /sems can phan phyir thugs rje yi/ /lcags kyus kun nas 'bar ba legs/ /bdag med chos rnams sgrub pa yi/ /ye shes snying khu 'bar ba legs
gsang chen thams cad bstan pa yi/ /rdo rje theg pa nges par gsungs/ /theg pa'i tshul 'di la gnas na/ /bla med byang chub bde bar thob/ /oM badzra aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya hUM/ oM badzra

pA sha ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badzra Tak+ki rA dzA ya hUM/ oM badzra muSh+Ti gr-ih+na hUM/ oM badzra kI la ya kI la ya hUM/ oM badzra mud ga ra A ko Ta ya hUM/ ye shes kyi snying khu'i snying po can du gyur pa'i gang
sngags dag pa mchog tu gyur pa don yod pa'i las 'di dag su la yang bstan par mi bya'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul 'dra ba las/ /'di ni/ /sbyor ba'i thabs kyis sgrub pa'i rim
@#/ /par phye ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sbyor ba'i las thams
cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rdo rjes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbab pa la sogs pa'i las bya ba 'di bshad do/ /oM zhes bya ba mgor bzhag ste/ /AHni
bzhin gyi pad+ma la/ /hUM ni bskul nas snying gar bzhag /yaM ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la/ /bzhag nas bsgrims te btegs byas nas/ /'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yi/ /'gro ba
thams cad 'bab par 'gyur/ /dbab snod skul byed gzugs de yi/ /gzugs kyi ngo bor bsams nas su/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i nga rgyal gyis/ /gsang sngags snyems dang bcas par

bklag /brjod par bya ba thogs pa med pa'i phreng ba ni/ na maHsa man+t+ra bud+d+ha nAM/ samya k+saM bud+d+ha ko TI na na/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+de swAhA/ brtson 'grus chen po thogs pa med par
'dul ba/ stobs che ba/ pha rol gnon pa che ba/ phyag na ral gri dang / tho ba dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa bsnams ma/ khro mo chen mo/ khro bo'i dbang phyug ma/ drag po'i gzugs
can ma| zhal ras mtha' yas pa/ phyag stong ma/ mi pham ma/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ don yod pa/ gdul bar dka' ba/ mig stong ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
byin gyis brlabs ma/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing mchod pa rab tu grub ma/ rdo rje'i sen mo can/ rdo rje rdo rje 'dren ma/ rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/ rdo rje'i sku can ma/ rdo rje spyan
gdangs pa'i stang stabs can/ /drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul can gyi gzugs can du bsgyur bar snang ba/ sku rdo rje dang bai DUR+yas brgyan ma/ oM b+ha ga ba ti tsun+de druM druM druM

druM| mr-i mr-i/ ru ru/ sru sru/ ru ru/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ A be sha ya A be sha ya/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ha ra ha ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra
ya| pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sngang ba'i gdon dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / /zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam
pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / las las skyes pa 'gro ba dang gnas pa 'di dag dang / sdang ba gang dag

bdag la 'tshe ba thams cad/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ mar d+ha ya mar d+ha ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ ta pa ya ta pa ya/ u pa d+ha ya u pa d+ha ya/ ha na ha na/ badzre Na sa ra sa ra daN+De na/ ma ra ma ra/ khang+ge

na hUM hUM hUM/ tsuM tsuM tsuM/ tri tri tri/ oM tsa le tsun+de sarba sA d+ha ya swAhA/ de nas rdo rjes bskul nas su/ /rdo rje dril bu gsil bya zhing / /rdo rje bcing ba bskyod par bya'o/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor la
@#/ /gnas oM/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad dang / /'brel ba'i pad+ma bzhag nas su/ /AHzhes bya ba brgyad kyis brgyan/ /dbus su bsgrub bya bzhag nas su//
hUM bzhi yis ni mdzes par bya/ kham phor sbyar nang bcug ste/ /steng du rdo rje 'chang bas mnan/ /sgom zhing gsang sngags skul tshig gis/ /bzlas brjod dag ni bya ba dang //
ba zhes bya ba'i theg pa yis/ /kun nas kyang ni bkri bar bya/ /'di ni sku gsum las byung ba'i/ /lha dang mi kun mnan par 'gyur/ /sngags la mkhas pa'i bdag nyid ni/ /kha
dog dmar po rdo rje can/ /'dod chags che dang ldan pa'i gzugs/ /'dod pa'i lha dang lhan cig bsam/ /sku gsum ldan ba mda' thogs shing / /g.yon pa yis ni gzhu yang bzung / /
oM hUM bud med spyi bor bsam nas ni /'dod pas snying zag dregs bdo ba/ /mdog dmar thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /'dud bzhin du ni mdun bzhag ste/ /rdo rje mda' yis bsnun na ni/ /
pad+ma dag nas zil ba 'dzag /rdo rje mda' yi sbyor ba yis/ /'dod chags can ma 'dzag par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor can gyis dbang bya'i phyir/ /'dod chags rdo rje can yang bsgom/
mi thod las byas cang te'u la/ /spre'i pags pa g.yogs nas ni/ /ngos nyid la ni pad+ma bri/ /bud med khrag gis 'dzag par bya/ /de yi dkyil du phreM bris te/ /mi yi skra yis
btags nas ni/ /mthing ril gyi ni rkang rus kyi/ /phreM hUM ming nas brjod cing brdung / /lam gyi bzhi mdor dkyil 'khor ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos bris/ /grar ni bu mo zas sbyin ma/ /'gugs
par brtson pa'i lcags kyu bya/ /gtso bo khrag 'thung cha lugs kyis/ /gzugs can gyis ni rting pas brdung / /'dis ni khams gsum rnam gnas pa'i/ /bu mo zas sbyin 'gugs par
'gyur| |gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan la/ /gnas pa yis ni nga rgyal gyis/ /rnal 'byor 'khor lo rdzogs gyur na/ /tshig gi rnam pa tsam gyis kyang / /lha dang lha min mi la sogs/
rnal 'byor can gyis thams cad byed/ /gang tshe dbang nyid la gnas pa/ /de tshe thams cad mngag gzhug 'gyur/ /bltas ba tsam gyis 'chi ba 'am/ /de tsam gyis kyang gcod pa'i
mchog /sgyu ma'i ye shes kyis bskul nas/ /rnal 'byor can gyis glu dang gar/ /ji lta ji ltar bsgoms byas pa/ /de ltar 'gro ba rab tu byed/ /sbyin sreg de nyid gnas pa'i/ /me yi lha ni
zhal yin pas/ /sna tshogs las rnams grub byed pa'i/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bshang / /sbyin sreg gis ni lha rnams tshim/ /tshim par gyur nas dngos grub ste/ /gsang sngags lhag chad
gang yin pa/ /thams cad sbyin sreg dag gis skong / /de phyir sku gsum mkhas mchog gis/ /sbyin sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad/ /gtsub shing las ni byung ba'i me/ /dge ba yi ni
@#/ /las rnams byed/ /gdol pa'am dur khrod las byung ba'i/ /me yis las rnams rab bsgrub pa/ /thab khung zlum bo gru bzhi pa/ /zla gam dang ni zur gsum
pa| |dkyil 'khor zur gyi kha khyer la/ /rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyan/ /sbyin sreg de nyid tshul rig pas/ /thab khung rnams kyi dbus su ni/ pad+mo steng gnas gtsug tor dang / /rdo
rje rin chen pad+ma gzhag /ji ltar rigs par 'dug nas su/ /lag gnyis pus mo'i bar bzhag ste/ /dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni/ /blug gzar bkang ste de bzhin sreg/
sbyin sreg la dgos g.yas su gzhag /g.yon du chu yi snod dag go/ las kun byed pa bzlas nas su/ /bsang gtor dang ni 'thor 'thung bya/ /ku sha'i rtse mos non pa yis/ /
thabs khung khor yug bskor bar bya/ /me ni 'bar bar shes pa dang / /g.yas pas mi 'jigs mtheb bskyed cing / /gsang sngags 'di ni cho ga bzhin/ /me yi lha ni spyan drang ngo / /
tshur spyon tshur spyon 'byung po che/ /lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog /sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang / /'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol/ /oM ag+ne ye/ 'di pya dI pya/ a
be sha ma hA shri ye/ ha bya ka bya/ ba ha nA ya swAhA/ lag g.yon rdo rje bsang gtor te/ /mchod yon mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /me yi phyogs nas 'bod pa ni/ /gsus po che la
mig gsum pa/ /gdong bzhi lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /'od dmar ral ba'i thor tshugs can/ /me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing / /las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan/ /lag pa dang po
mchog sbyin la/ /gnyis pa na ni sngags nor phreng / /g.yon na ril ba spyi blugs te/ /gnyis pa na ni be con nyid/ /mdog dmar rgyan ni med pa la/ /drang srong rnams kyis yongs bskyor ba//
'di lta'i gzugs ni bsams nas kyang / /thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol/ /de la sbyin sreg la dgos pa/ /kun nas lan gsum sreg blugs dbul/ /de nas 'thor 'thung
byas nas su/ /'bar ba'i rnam par bsgyur bar bya/ /rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya/ /legs par tshim byas bzod gsol te/ /'dod pa'i dngos
grub gsol ba gdab/ /bum pa rgyal mtshan rdo rje gdugs/ /pad+ma lcags kyu'i rnam pa dag /me lce mdog dkar snang ba dang / /'khyil ba'i mtshan ma mkhas pas brtag /de
nas myur du 'grub 'gyur bas/ /sgom dang bzlas la 'bad par bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni/ /oM zhes pa dang swAhA mthar/ /dbyangs kyi rgyun ni bsring pa dang / /bar chad
med pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba mo/ /'byor ba rgyas pa mngon par spel/ /dregs gdong stabs tshul bcas pa dang / /dbang du gyur bas dbang bya 'o/ /drag
@#/ /shul spyod tshul la gnas pas/ /hUM zhes pa dang phaT dang bcas/ /lus ni me lce 'bar ba dang / /'jig rten gsum po bzar bsams nas/ /
skul ba'i tshig dang spel ba yi/ /gsang sngags yi ge nges par sbyar/ /sngags grub cho ga shes pa yis/ /sbyin sreg cho ga thams cad la/ /sna tshogs las dang ldan
pa'i lha| |gang dag yin pa mchod par bya/ /sbyin sreg de nyid kyis bskul cing / /dang po dgang blugs sreg cing dbul/ /phyis ni rim bzhin rnam par spel/ /zhi dang rgyas dang
dbang rnams la/ /dge ba rdzas rnams sbyin sreg bya/ /bshang gci khrag rkang rus pa dang / /sha chen dag kyang sbyin sreg bya/ /ci ste ye shes sems dpa'i zhal/ /mi gtsang ba yis
bkang na ko /ji ltar sdig pa mi skye 'gyur/ /gal te sdig 'gyur 'bras bu gang / /sems can mi shes pas rmongs te/ /thams cad shes rab rnam spangs shing / /phyi rol dngos la mngon zhan pa//
rnam rtog dra bas blun byas gang / /de dag gis ni dge sdig gi/ /phung po gnyis su rnam par brtags/ /chos 'di rang bzhin gyis dag ste/ /skye ba med cing gnas pa med/ /sams can shes
pa spel ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs kyis bstan/ /dam pa'i don du dge spangs na/ /bsod nams med pa ci zhig smos/ /dper na chus gang chu klung gi/ /pha rol 'gro ba'i
sems can dag /rtswa dang shing la sogs bsdus te/ /chu la rgal ba'i gzings byas nas/ /de la 'jus te legs rgal na/ /bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'khor ba'i pha
rol gyi| |chos kyi lam ni bskyed byas kyang / /chos dang chos min rnam spangs nas/ /byang chub bde ba thob pa bzhin/ /de phyir rnam rtog drang spongs la/ /zab mo yi ni chos spel
te| |de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung lam la/ /sngags rig rnam rtog ma byed cig /rnam rtog rmongs po chen po ste/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed pas/ /nam mkha' la
bur dri med pa'i/ /rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin mnos/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te/ /lus dang ngag dang sems bsdams nas/ /nga 'o snyam pa'i gzi bskyed gzugs/ /
rnam pa kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa tshe 'di la/ /ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /las las byung bar rnam bstan pa'i/ /skyes pa bud med gzugs mang
la| |brnyas pa nyid du mi bya 'dis/ /rdo rje lus can dam tshig yin/ /ngan rtog bzang rtog dra ba yis/ /sems kyis sems can rnams la ni/ /sna tshogs gdung bas sun mi
dbyung / /rdo rje sems ldan dam tshig yin/ /sred pas bskyed rtsub phra ba yis/ /tshig dag rnam par mi smra zhing / /mnyan na bde bar byed pa 'di/ /rdo rje dag can dam tshig yin/ /rnam
@#/ /par snang mdzad cher 'khrugs mchog /sha yi khams la gnas pa yin/ /rkang la mi 'khrugs rgyal po ste/ /khrag la rin chen 'byung ba gtso/ /sems
can rnams kyi rus phung gi /rus gong la ni 'od dpag med/ /rtsa yi tshogs rnams rnam 'dren pa/ /thub pa skyes mchog don yod la/ /dam tshig shes pa rnams la ni/ /gsang
chen nga yis bstan pa 'di/ /blo ldan rdo rje sems kyis ni/ /rtag tu bsten zhing bsgom par bya/ /'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin rmongs/ /sred dang de bzhin rnam spel ba'i/ /chos
ni rnam pa lnga po 'di/ /thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs/ /bshang gci khu ba mchil ma khrag /'dzag pa 'byung ba bzhis bsdus pa/ /sgom pa'i blo gros rdzogs pa
yis| |dam tshig bsten par bya ba ste/ /rtag tu bza' zhing btung bar bya/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ 'di ni/ sbyin sreg rim par phye ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i mchog dngos grub 'di bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ gsang sngags sgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi tshogs yang dag par bskul
nas rdzas thams cad kyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs gsang chen 'di nyon cig /rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin la/ /gnas shing sku gsung thugs bsgoms te/ /mdun du
'khor lo legs par bzhag /sku gsum rdo rje can gyi gzugs/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /'khor lo'i nang du zhugs gyur par/ /bsgom zhing 'khor lo
bsgrub par bya/ /me yi 'od ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ /'khor lo chen po 'phags par 'gyur/ /spyan ni bzlas brjod byed bzhin du/ /bla med 'khor lo blang bar bya/ /rgyal chen
'khor lo drug pa dag /'od ni rnam par snang mdzad bzhin/ /lan gsum 'jug pa'i sems can la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /mi 'khrugs par ni rnam bsgoms
shing / /rdo rje mdun du bzhag nas ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bskul na 'dis/ /sku gsum rnam par 'phel 'gyur zhing / /'bar ba'i phreng chen mnyam pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje chen po 'phags
par 'gyur/ /mA ma kI ni zlos bzhin du/ /rdo rje bla med blang bar bya/ /rdo rje rgyal po blangs pa yis/ /gtso bo rdo rje 'chang gnyis 'gyur/ /gtso bo chen po sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub
sems dpas yongs bskor nas/ /sems can kun sems la gnas pa'i/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / /'jig rten khams su rnam rgyu zhing / /kun gyi bsam pa yongs rdzogs
@#/ /byed| |rin chen 'byung ba bsgoms na ni/ /rin po che ni mdun bzhag ste/ /sbyor ba'i rim pas rnam spel na/ /rin chen chen po 'phags par 'gyur//
rin chen sgrol ma zlos bzhin du/ /'od bzang gzi brjid 'bar ba can/ /phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yi/ /nor bu'i rgyal po blang bar bya/ /lha rdzas nor bu blangs pa yis//
rin chen 'byung ba gnyis par 'gyur/ /de ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen bzhin/ /rin chen char pa rab 'bebs shing / /sems can kun
gyi dbul ba 'joms/ /gtso bo yid bzhin nor bu can/ /sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par rgyu/ /'od dpag med par rnam bsgoms nas/ /pad+ma chen po mdun bzhag ste/ /
rim bzhin gzi brjid gzengs bstod na/ /'dab ma bye bas rnam brgyan pa/ /'od bzang gser ltar 'bar ba can/ /pad+ma chen po 'phags par 'gyur/ /gos dkar
can ma'i gsang sngags kyis/ /yid las byung ba'i pad+ma blang / /pad+ma'i rgyal po blangs pa yis/ /'od dpag med pa gnyis par 'gyur/ /chos mdzad rnams kyis thog
'dren cing / /sems can rnams la bdud rtsi stsol/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang byed gtso/ /bde ba can gyi rgyan du gyur/ /don yod grub pa rnam bsgoms nas/ /ral
gri mdun du rnam bzhag ste/ /rnal 'byor rim pa 'di yis ni/ /sgom pa de nyid kyis bskul na/ /rdo rje 'bar ba lta bu'i 'od/ /ral gri chen po 'phags par 'gyur/ /sgrol ma'i
gsang sngags zlos bzhin du/ /ral gri bla med blang bar bya/ /de ni ral gri mchog blangs nas/ /don yod grub pa gnyis par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing du rnam rgyu zhing / /sems
can rnams kyi mi shes gcod/ /rtag tu dri med snang gyur te/ /chu yi nang gi ston zla bzhin/ /rdzas kyi dngos grub bstan nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya/ /rnal 'byor che la
rnam gnas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo che/ /zhe sdang rigs ni 'dren mdzad ma/ /rdo rje gdan can mA ma kI/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i lha mo dang / /lha mo 'gro ba dbang mdzad
ma| |mkha' la longs spyod spyod mdzad ma/ /rim pa bzhin du nga yis bshad/ /de nas bu mo mig yangs ma/ /lo ni bcu drug lon pa la/ /gzugs dang mdangs dang lang tshor
ldan| |gser gyi rna cha g.yo ba can/ /gcig gcig bsgrims te btsal nas su/ /lha mo byi dor legs byas te/ /rigs lnga yi ni tshogs can ma/ /las kyi rjes su bsgoms
byas nas/ /bzhag ste sprad pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /pad+ma la ni rdo rje bzhag /sprad pa dang ni 'khyud pa yis/ /rdo rje dang ni pad+ma bskul/ /gar gyi tshul du gyur pa dang / /de bzhin spro dang
@#/ /bsdu ba yis/ /mod la sgyu mas dregs myos nas/ /rdo rje las ni bdud rtsi 'byung / /rnal 'byor ldan ba'i shes rab las/ /pad+ma la gnas bdud rtsi btung //
rnal 'byor ldan pa'i kha yis ni/ /'thungs pas de bzhin gshegs lnga yis/ /sku ni yongs su 'gyur ba 'thob/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos kun la/ /thabs dang shes
rab rnam par 'phel/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku yi snying bo grub pa ste/ /'dod lnga'i yon tan rjes 'jug pa'i/ /byang chub bde bas bsgrubs na ni/ /
rdo rje pad+ma byin brlabs nas/ /rjes su chags pas 'thob par 'gyur/ /grub chen gsang ba'i dngos grub ni/ /sdug bsngal med pa'i bde ba'i thabs/ /rjes su chags
pas bde ba yi/ /rdo rje theg pas mnyes par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i khyad par 'di yis ni/ /lan gsum 'jug pa'i gsang sngags dang / /las kyi phyag rgya ngas bshad
de| |de dag lag pa'i phyag rgya dag /ye shes phyag rgya rab bskul bas/ /dam tshig mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /thub chen sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba/ /sna
tshogs 'phrin las mdzad par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes khams gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs las phyung ngo / /sa
ni spyan du brjod pa ste/ /chu khams mA ma kI zhes bshad/ /sgrol ma rlung zhes kun tu brjod/ /gos dkar can ma me ru bsgrags/ /rdo rje dam tshig nam mkha'i dbyings/ /ston pa rdo rje 'chang
bas bshad/ /ces de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa'i dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin
gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po byams pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung
dang thugs gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ rigs kyi
bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis 'di ni/ rdo rje'i byang chub kyi sems su blta bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems
@#/ /rdo rje slob dpon 'di gnyis gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar nas rigs kyi bu/ mdor bsdus nas yang bshad par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs shing gshes pa'i bar de dag thams cad dus gsum du byon nas slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
mchod pas mngon par mchod nas 'di skad ces/ bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha yin no/ /bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma yin no/ /bdag
cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston pa yin no/ /zhes rdo rje'i yi ge gsum phyung nas slar yang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi
bu| dper na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i bar de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bsod
nams kyi phung po bas ni/ rdo rje slob dpon de'i spu'i khung bu gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po ches khyad par du 'phags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ /byang chub kyi sems
ni| sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa'i bar nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po byams pa 'jigs shing skrag pa'i yid kyis cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa dang / rin chen 'byung ba dang / don yod grub pa dang / de
bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bos nas shes ldan byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nyon cig /phyogs bcu dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon gyi drung du byon nas mchod par mdzad cing phyag 'tshal bar brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyi ston pa yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de nyid ni/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir
ro| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang
gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub gang la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsum ni/ /rdo rje'i slob
@#/ /dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang yid la gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gsol pa/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi
gsang ba gang la gnas/ nam mkha' la gnas so/ /nam mkha' gang la gnas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi sems la gnas so/ /sems gang la gnas/ gang du yang ma yin no/ /de
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /dkyil 'khor dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya dang / stang stabs
dang / 'dug stangs dang / bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / mchod pa dang / las la sbyar ba dang / slar bsdu ba rnams ni/ gsang sngags kyi tshul de kho na nyid bcu yin
par gsungs so/ /dus gsum du 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thugs rje'i ro gcig pa rnams kyi gsang ba dang / gsang chen dang / ye shes rnam pa gsum gyi snying po bstan pa dag ni/
slob dpon gyi kha nas bla ma la gus pa'i slob mas shes par bya'o/ /bla mas dam tshig ci ltar lta ba bzhin gyi dbang du byas nas bshad par bya'o/ /bsgrims nas sems
can rnams la rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor chen po dang / lhag pa'i rnal 'byor rnams go rim bzhin bshad par bya'o/ /'di mtha' dag ni/ rgyud thams cad kyi spyir shes par
bya'o| |de kho na nyid kyi dngos po mtha' dag yongs su mi shes par gsang sngags smra ba nga yin no/ /zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'chad par byed na/ dam tshig thams
cad nyams par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig las nyams na bdud kyis gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu shi nas dmyal ba'i gnas mi bzad pa chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can rnams
la brten te byang chub thob par 'gyur bas sems can la bslu bar mi bya'o/ /zhes shes bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam de nyid la sems can de dag sbyar bar bya'o/ /gang
zhig 'di la brtson par ma byas pa de dag gis ni/ lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig sbyin pa'i dka' ba spyad pa dang / dka' thub ci lta bus kyang sdig pa gzhom pa'am/ bdud rtsi'i ro
thob par mi nus so/ /rnal 'byor gcig khong du chud nas dben par song ste sgom pa byas na sdig pa las grol zhing tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams dang / chos bdag
med par bsgoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnal 'byor khong du chud par bya'o/ /shes rab dang ye shes kyi 'jo tshul gyis gsang ba lnga'i bdag nyid kyi gtso bo la mchod par bya'o//
dngos po thams cad dngos med par/ /bzhi bcu'i don ni rtogs pa dang / /rdo rje pad+mas dbang bskur bas/ /bdud rtsi lngas ni dga' bar byed/ /gsang bar bya ba'i chos gsang ba/ /gsang
@#/ /zhing sbas te gzhag par bya/ /'dod yon lnga yi rnam pa ni/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya sogs/ /rnal 'byor sems dpa' spyad bya zhing / /de bzhin bza' dang btung
byas na| |bltas dang khu tshur rnam pa yis/ /sems can thams cad dbang du byed/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ cho ga thams cad bstan pa rim pa phye ba ste bcu pa'o// //
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
pa la mngon par bstod do/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba theg pa chen po'i yang theg pa chen po'i tshul zab mo/ /gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba chen po rdzogs so// //

bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta kr-iSh+Na ya ma ri nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos
pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo thams cad ni b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs te/ gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed
dang / phra ma rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / phrag dog rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / zhe sdang rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / tho ba gshin rje gshed dang /

dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dang / pad+ma gshin rje gshed dang / ral gri gshin rje gshed dang / mtshams rnams su rdo rje tsa rtsi ka dang / rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang / rdo rje gau
rI rnams mtshams su'o/ /de dag la sogs te gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi bdag po la gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las nges par bton to/ /zla ba rdo rje sbyor ba yis/ /gshin rje mthar byed bsgom par bya/ /bdud rnams zhi bar bya phyir dang / /zhe sdang thams cad
bsal ba'i phyir/ /'od zer lnga yis 'khrigs pa yis/ /rdo rje srung ba'i don du sgom/ /phyir mtshams rdo rje sa gzhi dang / /ra ba dra ba de bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa skyed pa po bdud 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed la sogs pa thams cad kyi sa bon 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje
@#/ /rnams las nges par phyung ba/ dbus su ya dang k+She ma me da yats+tsha ni rA dza sa do ru Na yo ni ra'o/ /ya sogs yi ge dang po las/ /gshin rje gshed du 'gyur ba yin/ /yi ge k+Sha nag ta
mug brjod/ /yi ge ma ni phra mar gsungs/ /yi ge me ni 'dod chags nyid/ /yi ge da ni phrag dog 'gyur/ /gshin rje gshed sogs lnga ru grags/ /yi ge ya las tho bar 'gyur/ /yi ge ts+tsha las dbyug pa'i
gtso| |lag na pad+ma ni yig las/ /lag na ral gri rA las yin/ /dza las tsa rtsi ka zhes brjod/ /yi ge sa las phag gdong ma/ /yi ge do las dbyangs can bsgrags/ /yi ge ru las gau r-I dran/ /na yo Ni ra
mtshams kyi bzhi/ /thod ba bzhi ru 'dod pa yin/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'jigs rung ba/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dkyil du bsam/ /de dkyil bzhugs pa'i gshin rje gshed/ /nag cing 'bar ba bsgom par bya/ /shar

du gti mug rdo rje ste/ /lho ru de bzhin phra ma yin/ /nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje ste/ /de bzhin byang du phrag dog go /mtshams kyi rdo rje rtse bzhi la/ /rtsa rtsi ka sogs rnam par bsgom/ /sgo yi rdo rje rtse bzhi la/ /tho
ba la sogs rnam par bsgom/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi ru/ /mi yi mgo bo bzhi dag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gshin rje gshed po rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhe sdang chen po'i rigs kyi sngags gsungs pa/ oM hrIHSh+T+ri wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

bdag bos gti mug rdo rje chen po'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM dzi ni dzi ka /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phra ma rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM rat+na d+h+ri ka /de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos 'dod chags rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM A ro lika /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phrag dog rdo rje'i sngags gsungs

pa| oM pra dz+nyA d+h+r-i ka /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje tho ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM muD+ga ra d+h+r-i ka /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

bdag pos rdo rje dbyug pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM daN+Da d+h+r-i ka /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje pad+ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM pad+ma d+h+r-i ka /de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje ral gri'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM khaD+ga d+h+r-i ka /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje tsa rtsi ka'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM me tog

ra ti| de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM dwe Sha ra ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i

sngags gsungs pa/ oM rA ga ra ti /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje kau rI ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM badzra ra ti /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po sku gsung

@#/ /thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+mA ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma

ko\u0f85haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po zhe sdang chen po'i sku nges bar bstan pa/ zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa la/ /in+d+ra nI la 'dra ba'i mdog /phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa
nyid| |gshin rje gshed ni bsgom bar bya/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba la/ /gsal ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa nyid/ /gti mug rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /zhal gsum phyag

drug rgyas gyur ba/ /gser gyi rnam pa'i 'od dang ldan/ /phyag na rin chen bsnams pa nyid/ /phra ma rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dbang byed pa/ /pad+ma rA ga tshungs pa'i 'od/ /phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa
nyid| |'dod chags rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /zhal gsum phyag drug thams cad la/ /rin chen margad 'od dang ldan/ /phyag na shubs can bsnams pa nyid/ /phra ma rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ mngon par rtogs ba'i rim par phye ba ste le'u dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom

ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la bstod pa/ gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa/ /gti mug rdo rje'i ri ngo bo khyod/ /ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gshin rje gshed po rab

'jigs pa'i/ /phra ma rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ /rdo rje thugs dang rab ma tshungs pa/ /rdo rje rin chen phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ /gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa/ /rdo rje gsung dang rab mtshungs pa/ /

rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phrag dog ngo bo'i ring bzhin khyod/ /gshin rje gshed po las kun pa/ /rdo rje chags dang rab tu mtshungs/ /phyag na ral gri phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos po khyod/ /

sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pas/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso/ /dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje mig dang /rdo rje sna ba dang / rdo rje lce dang / rdo rje lus dang /rdo rje thugs zhes bcom

ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni/ mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas yang dag bshang bya ba/ /'dod pa'i don grub sgrub byed pa'i/ /gshin rje gshed po nyid mtshungs pa/ /gshin rje rje 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor lo//
skud pa gsar pa legs bsgrims la/ /legs pa'i tshad la mdzes pa yis/ /skud pa byas pas thig gdab bo/ /gshin rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor lo/ /mtshan rnams thams cad rab rdzogs shing / /bar chad thams

cang rab nyams pa/ /zhi ba la sogs rab 'jug pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i cha byad la/ /rtse mo lnga dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /las kyi rdo rje de la bris/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'khrigs pa yis/ /rdo rje de yi dbus su bri/ /ral gri

byang gi phyogs su bri/ /'khor lo'i 'od kyis bskor ba yi/ /'khor lo shar gyi phyogs su bri/ /'od kyi phreng ba mnyam 'phro ba'i/ /rin po che ni lho ru bri/ /pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs 'dra'i 'od/ /pad+ma nub kyi phyogs su bri/ /'od zer lnga dang mnyam ldan pa'i//
@#/ /shar gyi mtshams su 'khor lo bri/ /lho ru rdo rje bri bar bya/ /nub tu pad+ma'i me tog ni/ /yu ba dang bcas kha bye gsal/ /'od kyi phreng ba mnyam 'phro ba'i/ /ut+pal la
ni byang du bri/ /shar gyi sgor ni tho ba ste/ /dbyig pa de bzhin lho yi sgor/ /'dam las skyes pa nub kyi sgor/ /byang du rdo rje ral gri'o/ /shes pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa la/ /mchod
pa khyad par 'phags pa ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gis/ /'jigs pa med par mngon par mchod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje
gshad nag po'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i rim par phye ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa'i
rgyal po 'dis bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa yi/ /'jigs pa'i gshin rje 'doms dkyil 'khor/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gtso bo/ /
mgon po dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen pos nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rnams las bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga nges par phyung ba/ oM
AHhUM/ rdo rje me lce sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje can kun mnyes pa dang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs/ /ye shes 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid/ /dgug pa dang ni gzhug
pa dang / /bcing dang de bzhin dbang bya nyid/ /tho ba la sogs sngags bzhi yis/ /mnyam par gzhag pas rnam par bsgom/ /ma he rdo rje rnam bsgoms la/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo rnam
bsgom bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /gti mug rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /rta bdun ldan pa'i dbus gnas pa/ /phra ma zhes bya rnam bsam bya/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dbus
gnas pa/ /'dod chags rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /rdo rje las ni bsgom par bya/ /zhi ba'i gti mug rdo rje ste/ /rgyas pa de bzhin phra ma yin/ /'dod
chags rdo rje dbang du byas/ /rdo rje las kyis thams cad du'o/ /rdo rje las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /mi tshil mi yi thod par gzhag /de bzhin mi skras sdong bu bya/ /dur khrod dag tu du ba bsgrub//
mig sman dag ni de bzhin du/ /mig sman las kyi sgom pa dang / /las kyi bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mig sman 'di ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /khrag dang gur gum bzung byas nas/ /sgrub pa byug
pa bsgrub par bya/ /las kyi rdo rje sbyor pa yi/ /rkang ba byug pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni mnyam pa la/ /sha lnga dang ni ldan pa yis/ /lcags gsum du ni bcug byas na/ /las kyi
sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /kan+ta'i lcags kyi ral gri ni/ /las kyi sbyor pa bsgrub par bya/ /las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yis/ /las kyi ral gri rab 'grub 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
@#/ /thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag bo'i rgyud las/ las kyi rim bar phye ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ las kyi dbye ba'i dbye ba las/ /sems can
'jug pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol/ /yon tan rgya mtsho rnams nyan lags/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /las ni thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /nyes kun
gsol ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs rdo rje nyid kyi mthus phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa
byas nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te yang dang yang du phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan to/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /dbang du bya
ba'i 'khrul 'khor bstan/ /gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo mchog /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bud med dbang du bya ba dang / /bsrung ba'i don dang de bzhin du/ /zhi ba ro tsa
nas bzung ste/ /gro ga'am de bzhin smyug shun la/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris nas/ /na maHnA mas rnam bsten la/ /nag dang yu can ma yin pa'i/ /kham phor gnyis ni
kha sbyar te/ /mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang bar gzhug /skud pa dkar pos kham phor bcing / /shar du mngon par phyogs pa yis/ /me tog dkar pos dus gsum gtor/ /gshin rje
mthar byed chu shel 'drar/ /bdag nyid bsgoms nas mdun bkod la/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ /bsgrub bya bltas nas dbang bskur bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis gang ba yi/ /
bum pa dkar po zla ba 'dras/ /rdzogs sangs du mas khrus byas te/ /bltas nas sngags kyi bzlas pa brtsam/ /oM na maHhrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT de ba dat+ta ya shIn+taM ku ru na maH
swAhA| zhi ba'i cho ga gsungs pa 'o/ /skyes pa zhi ba'i gur gum gyis/ /bri bya de bzhin rgyas pa yang / /'khor lo gnyis ni kha che yi/ /swAhAs ming ni brgyan pa yi/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni bris byas
la| |mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang nas ni/ /kham phor kha sbyar nang du gzhug /skud pa ser pos bcings nas ni/ /me tog ser po dus gsum gtor/ /byang du kha bltas mdog ser ba'i/ /gshin
rje gshed du bdag nyid bsam/ /bsgrub bya zla ba ser nag la/ /bum pa ser pos bskru bya zhing / /dbang bskur ba ni bsgoms byas la/ /spros la rgyas pa'i bzlas pa bya/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rI wi kr-i

tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de ba dat+ta puSh+T+riM ku ru swAhA/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT bau Sha Ta de ba dat+ta s+ya puSh+TiM ku ru bau Sha Ta swAhA/ 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas pa'i cho
@#/ /ga gsungs pa'o/ /gro ga'am ras la rgya skyegs kyi/ /khu ba'am tsan+dan dmar bo 'am/ /srin lag gi ni khrag kyang rung / /yi ge ho yis bsten pa yi/ /'khor
lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri/ /'khor lo nag po sogs bral ba'i/ /kham phor gnyis ni kha sbyar du/ /mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang pa gzhag /skud pa dmar pos bcings byas la/ /
nub phyogs su ni kha bltas nas/ /me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ /bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed ba/ /kha dog dmar po cher 'bar ba/ /zla ba dmar po la gnas pa'o//
bsgrub bya yang ni rnam bsam bya/ /rang gi lus las byung ba yi/ /'od zer dmar bo lcags kyu yis/ /bsgrub bya dgug par bya bar bsam/ /sngags ni spro zhing khri bzlas bya/ /
des ni bsgrub bya nyams gyur nas/ /rkang pa gnyis su lhags gyur nas/ /gos bral skra ni bshig gyur ba/ /rnam par bsam la bzlas pa brtsam/ /gal te dbang du ma gyur na//
mar la sogs pa bral byas la/ /du ba med pa'i seng ldeng mes/ /'khor lo de ni sgrub pos bsro/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ ho de ba dat+taM ba shaM ku ru ho/ /oM
hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ bau ShaT de ba dat+ta s+ya ya ba sha ma na ya bau ShaT 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang du bya ba'i cho ga gsungs so/ /dur khrod
gos sam yang na ni/ /rang byung gis bskul ras la ni/ /khrag dang rgya skyegs bsres pa yis/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris la/ /yi ge dza dang yi ge hrIs/ /ming ni rnam par bsten
byas la| |btsun mo yi ni pad+ma'i snod/ /kha sbyor nang du btsud byas te/ /skud pa dmar pos bcings byas la/ /me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ /bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa/ /
nub ka'i nyi ma dang 'dra dmar/ /lcags kyu dmar pos bkug pa yis/ /bsgrub bya dag ni rnam bsgom bya/ /snying la lcags kyus brgyab nas ni/ /ske nas zhags pas bcings byas te//
gcer bu skra ni ma bcings par/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /seng+ge dmar po'i steng 'dug la/ /rdzas lnga yis ni bkru bya zhing / /'ongs pa ru ni bsam par bya/ /gal te bsgrub
bya mi 'ong na/ /seng ldeng gi ni me mdag la/ /der ni bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /brtul zhugs can gyis 'khor lo bsro/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hrIHa mu kaM A
kaR+Sha ya hrIH/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT dzaH/ de ba dat+ta A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o/ /dur khrod gos la mkhas
pas ni| |yung ba yi ni khu ba yis/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri/ /yi ge lam gyis bsten pa yi/ /bsgrub bya'i ming yang bri bar bya/ /kham phor kha sbyor nang du ste/ /kham phor
@#/ /ser po'i steng du gzhag /de la mkhas pas re khA bri/ /re kha bdun nam yang na bzhi/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bri bar bya/ /ri rab lcog brgyad ces
grags pa/ /de yi steng du mnyam par bri/ /yi ge hUM dang yi ge baM/ /ri rab de ni bsten par bya/ /de yi steng du lam yig las/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /sna tshogs
rdo rjes mnan pa la/ /skud pa ser pos bcings nas ni/ /gshin rje gshed po mdog ser po/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /bsgrub bya ser po rnams bsams la/ /
ri rab kyis ni mnan byas pa/ /phyag na rdo rjes mnan byas pa/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi 'og tu/ /man+d+ha ra sogs ri bo dang / /sna tshogs ri bo rnams kyis kyang / /bsgrub bya mnan
par bsgom par bya/ /de la gnas nas bzlas pa bya/ /oM hrAMHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ laM de ba dat+ta s+thA ne stam+b+ha ya ku ru laM/ 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rengs par
byed pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o/ /ngag ni rengs par 'dod pa yis/ /de bzhin 'khor lo gnyis bris la/ /bsgrub bya'i ming yang bri bar bya/ /der ni sngags kyang spros la bzlas/ /

oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ laM de ba dat+ta s+ya ya thA sra ra thA/ ka ra krit+te nan+ti bar ya sa thA a bi rU pa kaM de ba dat+to ya dz+nyA dat+ta ya s+ya bA ka stam+b+ha na ku ru laM/ bcom ldan
'das kyis rengs par byed pa'i cho ga de skad gsungs so/ /shin tu legs par sbas pa yis/ /'di las gsungs bzhin dgongs pa dag /gshin rje gshed nag sbyong ba yis/ /nyi ma
gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngar bzhin dur khrod kyi ras la/ /'khor lo gnyis bris brtul zhugs can/ /ske tshe dang ni tshwa dang ni/ /dug dang gzhan yang nim pa dang / /tsha ba
gsum dang tsha ba'i mar/ /dur khrod kyi ni sol ba dang / /d+ha dur lo ma'i khu ba dang / /tsan+da li 'bras mdzub mo khrag /tshwa sgo can gyi sa blangs te/ /gdol ba'i rdza ma'i dreg pa dang / /rab tu
ltogs pa'i smyu gu yis/ /bcu bzhi la bris brtul zhugs can/ /khros pa'i sems kyis nyin phyed na/ /gdug pa can rnams gsad pa'i phyir/ /sems can gnod pa byed pa'i ming / /yi
ge hUM gis bsten byas la/ /bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa'i/ /sbyor bas lho phyogs kha bltas te/ /khro chen rab tu drag po'i gzugs/ /rus pas mgo bo rnam brgyan la/ /ma he
la zhugs lce phyung 'dril/ /gsus pa che la rab 'jigs pa/ /skrag byed skra 'bar gyen du 'greng / /sma ra smin ma de bzhin ser/ /g.yas na rdo rje chen po dang / /gnyis pa na ni ral gri dang //
gsum pa'i phyag na gri gug go /da ni g.yon pa'i bri bar bya/ /'khor lo dang ni pad+ma che/ /thod pa nyid ni g.yon na 'o/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni shin tu nag /g.yas pa'i zla 'od bzang po 'dra/ /
@#/ /g.yon pa'i dmar po yin par brtag /rdo rje rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan/ /ba spu khung nas 'jigs chen po/ /rang rigs bdag po rab 'phro ba/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
steng na ni/ /zhabs ni g.yon pa brkyang bas gnas/ /mche ba gtsigs shing rgyags pa yis/ /bskal pa'i 'bar ba me dang mtshungs/ /'di lta bu yi bdag nyid kyis/ /bsgrub par bya
ba mdun du dgod/ /gdug pa'i mtshon gyis brgyab pa yis/ /dri ma can la nad kyis gzir/ /gos med 'dar zhing nyam chung bas/ /don 'dod pa yi tshig smra zhing / /mtshon gyis
gzir bar byas pa yis/ /rnag gi thum pos lus gang ba/ /grang ba'i rlung gis gtses gyur cing / /me yi nang du zhugs pa la/ /ma he dang ni stag dag dang / /khyi dang mchu ring can
dag gis/ /sangs rgyas sde ni sngon 'jigs pa'i/ /sdig po che dag za bar byed/ /mthar byed pa yi lhor gnas pa/ /tsher mas lus ni bkang ba dang / /rkang pa shing lcags sgrog
gis bsdams/ /de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas/ /pags pa dag ni bshus byas nas/ /de la tshwa dang ske tshe bskus/ /hUM zhes zer ba bsgom par bya/ /de yi lus srung la sogs
la| |bcad pa dag ni mdun du dgod/ /de yi go cha'ang med byas nas/ /stong pa'i lus ni mdun du bsam/ /rang gi lus byung khro bo ni/ /gshin rje gshed sogs bdag nyid 'dras//
de yi lus la brgyab nas ni/ /tshil bu rkang dag 'thung bar byed/ /de yi mdun du gshin rje bsgom/ /lag na dbyig pa stobs po che/ /gdug pa can des rdeg par byed/ /de yi rgyu ma'i phreng
ba sogs/ /bya rgod kyis khyer mkha' la 'gro/ /sa yi 'og nas klu dang ni/ /lha ma yin la sogs pas rdeg /'di ltar bsgrub bya nyams bya ba/ /snying rje la gnas sems kyis ni/ /byed pas
'khor ba'i gnas bton nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyad par can gyi thugs kyis 'di lta bu'i gsung phyung bar mdzad do/ /
e ma'o bsad pa'i yang dag bsad/ /bsad pa ma yin sdig las dkrol/ /ji srid bsad kyang ma bsad do/ /sdig pa stong phrag byas pa yis/ /mnar med la sogs mi skye bas/ /e ma'o
sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag /bsad pas byang chub thob par byed/ /sems can gsod pa bsad pa nyid/ /snying rje chen po nyid kyis byas/ /e ma'o snying rje stobs kyi mchog /snying rje dman

pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM de ba dat+ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de ba dat+ta mA ra ya phaT/ de ni/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis rnam par rtog pa'i rdo rje 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang sman gyis bsad pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed
@#/ /nag po'i rgyud las/ rim par phye ba bzhi pa'o// //de nas 'khor lo gnyis bris la/ /yi ge phaT kyis bsten pa yi/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni bris byas
la| |thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug /skud pa sngon pos bcings byas te/ /nyi ma phyed kyi dus su ni/ /dur khrod sa yi nang du sbas/ /gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba yis/ /rta dang ma he zhon
pa yi| |lag na mtshon thogs bsgrub bya gnyis/ /mdun du bsgrub bya dgod par bya/ /khros pa'i lus la sprul pa'i tshogs/ /gnyis ka'i phyogs su bsam par bya/ /gnyis kas
'thab mo mang po byed/ /khros shing gdug pa'i sems ldan pa'i/ /stobs ldan khros pa bsgom par bya/ /bsgoms pas bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM
phaT phaT/ de ba dat+ta ya dz+nyA dat+te bi dwe ShA ya hUM phaT/ 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbye ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o/ /cho ga dag ni snga ma bzhin/ /'khor lo gnyis ni bris byas la/ /yi
ge hUM phaT gyis bstan pa/ /thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug /skud pa nag pos bcings byas la/ /sha za'i tshul du spa bar bya/ /gshin rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pas/ /mdun du bsgrub
bya bsgom par bya/ /yaM byung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra ba'i/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag po la/ /de steng mdog sngon rngan rnga mo bsgom/ /de la gdug pa can bskyon la/ /lho yi phyogs su kha

bstan te/ /khro bo'i tshogs kyis de brdeg pa/ /sangs rgyas yin yang bzlog par dka'/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM phaT de ba dat+ta u ts+tshi Ta ya naM hUM phaT/ 'di ni/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bskrad pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o/ /khros pas rnal 'byor lhor bltas la/ /ra khrag ro bsregs thal ba dang / /dug gi tshwa dang ske tshe dang / /mar khu smyon pa'i khu ba yis/ /
dur khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis/ /rim ba 'di bzhin bri bar bya/ /bsad pa gshin rje'i lus la gnas/ /dbye ba rta dang ma he yi/ /bskrad pa rnga mo'i lus la gnas/ /zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil
'khor gyis/ /rgyas pa zla ba ser po la/ /btsun mo snying gar dbang du bya/ /ra la bskyon pas 'gugs par byed/ /ri bo'i dkyil du rengs bya gzhag /sha ra b+ha 'am seng+ges dgug /de bzhin
gzhan yang mtshon par bya/ /ro tsa na dang rgya skyegs dang / /kha che yi ni khyad par gyi/ /dbang du bya ba gro gar bri/ /dge ba'i sems kyis bzung byas na/ /'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /
kham phor kha sbyar nang du gzhug /khwa yi sgro yi smyu gu yis/ /nyi ma phyed nas bri bar bya/ /pad+ma'i kha sbyor ro bsregs sar/ /gshin rje'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs
gsang sngags bzlas/ /lho phyogs gnas te tshar gcad bya/ /mtha' yi ya bor zhi ba la/ /yi ge ni de gnyis ka dang / /phyi nas dkyil gyi ya spangs te/ /yi ge lhag ma ci bde bar/ /
@#/ /sngon du bsnyen pa khri tsam bya/ /'dis ni las rnams rab sgrub pa/ /ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas/ /rab tu grags pa'i 'khor
lo 'di/ /yi ger bris nas gnas pa dang / /'khor lo bris nas gnas pa yi/ /khyim der 'thab mo rtag tu 'byung / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje
gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khrul 'khor gyi go rim bri ba zhes bya ba ste rim par phye ba lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bcom ldan
'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ gang gis rdo rje can mnyes pa/ /zhe sdang phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas/ /dngos
grub rgya chen thob par byed/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos/ /'di lta bu yi gsung bsgrags so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha kun gyi/ /dbu la gshin rje gshed po bsgom/ /rtag tu dkyil 'khor
bri bar bya/ /rtag tu sbyin sreg gis kyang dgang / /rtag tu dam tshig dag kyang gzung / /sdom pa dag kyang yang dag gzung / /dang po la ni cod pan dbang / /gnyis pa ral gri sbyin par bya/ /gsum
pa rdo rje dril bu dang / /zla ba bza' ba bzhi pa ste/ /bzhi po 'di ni dbang chen po/ /nag po'i zhal nas byung ba yi/ /dbang 'di dag gi bye brag gis/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis byang chub
thob| |'byung po kun gyi gtor ma'i lus/ /sngags 'di de nas rab bshad bya/ /sngags chen bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/ /'byung po thams cad 'dar 'gyur ba/ /oM in+d+ra ya hrIHya mA

ya Sh+T+rIHba ru NA ya wi/ ku pe rA ya kr-i /I shA na ya ta/ ag+na ye A/ nai ri te ye na/ bA ya be na/ tsan+d+rA ya hUM/ a kaR+Sha ya hUM/ brah+ma Ne phaT/ ba su d+ha ri N+h+ye N+ye/ bai ma tsi tri Ne swAhA/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yo
hA| ha ha hi hi/ hUM hUM/ pheM pheM/ phaT phaT swAhA/ bi Ta mu tra chu bsres pas/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni/ /lha rnams kyang ni tshim par byas/ /ha ha zhes kyang dran par bya/ /dkyil
'khor rim gsum bya ba ni/ /brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bris pa la/ /sngags ni kun tu dgod par bya/ /brtul zhugs can gyis bcu gnyis
par| |grub pa'i sngags rnams dgod par bya/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /oM ya ma rA dza/ sa do me ya/ ya ma do ru/ Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni

ra yak+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha/ ni rA ma ya/ hUM hUM phaT/ dkyil du ya byas shar du k+She/ /lho ru 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste/ /yi ge me ni nub tu bri/ /byang du da ste da ma na/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni spyin bya ba//
mtshams kyi stong pa dag tu 'o/ /hUM gnyis kyis ni bsten byas la/ /dgod pa thams cad sgrub par byed/ /ya tsa ni ra dzas do ru/ /na yo na ri la sogs pa/ /phyi rol rim par g.yon
@#/ /brtsams bri/ /don kun rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /rim pa gsum pa de la ni/ /kun tu cha re bor ba la/ /shar nas brtsams nas bri bar bya/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHla
sogs pa'i sngags/ /de yi bar dag thams cad kyi/ /cha brgyad bor ba dag la bri/ /a mu kaM ku ru/ uts+tsha Ta ya ba shiM ku ru/ bi dwe Sha ya/ shAn+tiM ku ru/ puSh+TiM ku ru/ 'di ltar
g.yon nas brtsams nas ni/ /las dang rjes su mthun par ni/ /phyag 'tshal na ma tha ma'i bar/ /tha ma ru bau ShaT dang / /hUM phaT dang ldan sa bon gyis/ /zhi dang rgyas dang mthar
dbang byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo rnam par bri ba zhes bya ba ste rim par phye ba drug pa'o// //
khrag dgug pa yi sbyor ba ni/ /zhal gsum phyag drug skem pa yi/ /phyag na 'khor lo zla 'od 'dra'i/ /mkhas pas tsartsi ka bsgom bya/ /chang dag dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /zhal
gsum phyag drug phag gdong ma/ /rab sngo phyag na rdo rje bsnams/ /mkhas pas phag mo bsgom par bya/ /shes rab bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dmar
ba la| |zhi ba phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /dbyangs can brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom/ /khu ba dgug ba'i sbyor ba ni/ /zhal gsum phyag drug ral gri bsnams/ /nor bu margad
'dra ba ni/ /gau ri mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed po bsad pa dang dgug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje tsartsi

ka'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM tsa rtsi ke sid+d+hI n+d+ra nI la ha ri Ni rat+na tra ya a pa ka ri No ru d+hi ra a kar+Sha ya dzaH/ sngags 'di dag ni dran byas na/ /kha gdangs pa dag byas pa yin/ /'jig
rten gsum gyi khrag chen po/ /'gugs par 'di la the tshom med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed chen po chang 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te rdo rje phag mo'i chang 'gugs pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM badzra g+ho na su g+ho ne badzra mA ma kI b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ tai d+ha tu kaR+yaM/ A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ rdza mkhan lag pa phyis
pa'i sas/ /bum pa kha mdzes nyer byas la/ /rkun ma'i skra ni rten bzhag ste/ /sngags ni rjes su dran par bya/ /sngags 'di che ba'i bdag nyid 'di/ /ba ta mchod rten dag tu bstan/ /dal
gyis dmigs nas 'bad par bya/ /chad ni 'gugs par rab tu grags/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i gshin rje gshed rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ dz+wA la dz+wA la/ me d+ha bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud+d+hi bar+d+ha ni swAhA/ tshes
@#/ /kyi dang po nas bzung ste/ /kun tu zla ba nya yi bar/ /sbyar ba'i skad ni smra bar bya/ /ji srid zla ba'i rjes 'jug pas/ /rtag tu tshigs bcang brgya zin 'di/ /ngag
gi dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur/ /khams gsum ma lus pa dag ni/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed rdo rjes khu ba 'gugs pa
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khu ba 'gugs par byed pa'i gau rI'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM A kAR+Sha Ni A kaR+Sha Ni gau ri hrIHduSh+TA ya duSh+TA ya/ shu kra ma/
a kaR+Sha ya dza dza dza hUM hUM hUM swAhA/ pad+ma kha dang rdo rje dang / /dril bu lcags kyu'i rlung sbyor gyis/ /bzlas dang sgom pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /khu ba'i tshogs ni 'gugs par byed/ /nags
kyi nang ngam dben pa ru/ /las 'di dag ni bskul byas nas/ /nub bdun tsam du sbyor ba yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin
rje gshed chen po rdo rje nag po 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbang bskur ba mchog gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje
rnams las phyung bar mdzad do/ /u dum ba ra man+dA ra/ /ba ri dza ta ka phreng dang / /kar ni ka yi phreng ba ni/ /bu khyod zungs la byin gyis rlobs/ /ral gri chen pos khams
gsum pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed/ /las kyi ral gri dam pa 'di/ /bzung na bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /shes rab
thabs kyi ngo bo nyid/ /rdo rje dril bu sgrub pa 'di/ /longs la slob ma yang dag gzung / /btung ba rin po che 'dis ni/ /rdo rje lus ni rab tu bsgrub/ /kun tu ye shes bu khyod kyis/ /'thungs
shig ye shes las byung ba/ /slob ma'i khar yang blug bya ba/ /gshin rje gshed kyis bsgrubs pa yin/ /rdo rje slob ma bdag nyid ches/ /shin tu dga' ba'i sems su bya/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ 'gugs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o// //de nas rdo
rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor bar byed/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa dang / /gdug pa can dag bsal phyir gsungs/ /dpal ldan ral gri 'chang ba'i bdag /
srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor bar byed/ /ral gri 'bar ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /rig pa gsum las mchod par byed/ /sems can thams cad skyob pa yi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par
gyis| |sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /slob dpon dag gis dkyil 'khor bri/ /gos kyis gdong ni bcangs byas la/ /
@#/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun sgor gzhag /khyod su zhes kyang 'di skad dri/ /skal bzang bdag ces tshig tu brjod/ /gsol btab pa yi blo bzang la/ /yol ba'i
nang du sbyin par bya/ /dbang bskur don du gus chen pos/ /de nas lan gsum ched du brjod/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas chos chen pos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ltar/ /bdag kyang
mgon pos dbang bskur zhing / /mchog kyang bdag la stsal du gsol/ /de bzhin glu dang rol mos mchod/ /de bzhin khrus dang byug pas kyang / /slob ma dad pas blug par

bya| |de la bstod pa kun kyang bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang gi rgyal pos stong pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM
d+harmA d+hA tu badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhi ba la sogs byed pa yis/ /sbyin sreg de nas bshad par bya/ /sbyin sreg gang gis grub pa yi/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /zhi
ba zhi ba'i sems kyis te/ /rgyas pa rgyas pa'i sems kyis so/ /dbang yang der gtang sems kyis te/ /bsad dang bskrad pa la yang ngo / /zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum bo ste/ /
rgyas pa yi ni rdzing bu 'dra/ /dbang du bya ba zla gam ltar/ /nam mkha'i khams 'dra bas ni bsad/ /zhi ba khru gang tshad du ste/ /de bzhin rgyas pa'i khru do ba/ /ji ltar rgyas pa de ltar
dbang / /bsad pa la ni sor nyi shu/ /zhi ba steng du khru phyed tshad/ /rgyas pa la ni khru tsam ste/ /sor lnga gnyis ni bsad pa la/ /dbang la ji ltar de bzhin dgug /tshes gcig la ni zhi ba
bya| |zla ba nya la rgyas pa ste/ /bcu bzhi la ni mngon spyod do/ /dbang gi las ni tshes brgyad la'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i
rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o// //rgya mtsho'i sa ni blangs byas la/ /klu yi gzugs gcig brtsams byas te/ /yi ge hUM phu snying gar ni/ /hrIH
Sh+T+rIHla sogs bzlas pa bya/ /char ni mi 'bab dus dag tu/ /bzlas pa khri byas 'bab par 'gyur/ /sbrul nag po yi sha dang ni/ /nim pa'i lo ma dang bsres la/ /de la ril bu byas
nas ni| |brtul zhugs can gyis rgya mtshor bzhugs/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa khri byas na/ /mtsho rlabs rengs byed mchog yin no/ /tsan+dan 'bras bu brgya blangs la/ /'bras dang
mar shas bsres byas te/ /'bum phrag brgya ni rab bzlas la/ /sbyin sreg byas na lha mthong 'gyur/ /dur khrod ro bsregs yog pa'i shing / /brtul zhugs can gyis gzugs su
bri| |smyon pa'i khu bas bskus byas la/ /sngags khri bzlas pas mdzes thebs 'gyur/ /grub pa'i yungs kar blangs byas na/ /'bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas byas na/ /sbrul gyis
@#/ /bzung nas 'gyel ba la/ /gtor na 'tsho bar the tshom med/ /ri gshong chu yi sa blangs la/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa 'bum byas nas/ /mgo la bskus pa
tsam gyis ni/ /mgo yi nad ni nyams par byed/ /sngags ni lan bdun mngon bzlas pa'i/ /lag pas mgo bo mnyes na ni/ /mgo ni zug gzer 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de ni
'di ltar the tshom med/ /bram ze yi ni sha dag la/ /dur khrod sa dang thal ba las/ /gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs byas te/ /phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa la/ /rdo rje chen po
g.yas pa na/ /de bzhin mi mgo g.yon pa na'o/ /mdog ni dkar po cher 'jigs pa/ /de yis gdug pa 'joms par byed/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni sha lnga yis/ /nyin re bzhin du
gtor ma sbyin/ /bdag gi dgra bo choms shig ces/ /rnal 'byor pas bdag gsol ba gdab/ /nub mo de skad brjod pas nyal/ /dgra ni tho rangs 'chi bar 'gyur/ /chu 'gags
la sogs pas gzir zhing / /yang na nad kyis thebs par 'gyur/ /dgra yi bai ro tsa na blang / /mi yi rkang sbubs yongs bkang ste/ /rab tu bkang nas 'bum bzlas na/ /shing
rtser rgyu ba'i yi dwags mtshungs/ /lha rdzas dngos grub kun byed cing / /dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje
gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed ces bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o// //ro langs chen po'i sgrub thabs ni/ /de nas yang dag bshad
bar bya| |sgrub pa bzang po kun byed cing / /dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub pa'i/ /bzang po ma god rma med pa/ /shing la sbyangs pas bsdus byas la/ /phab la legs par bkru bya ste/ /
der 'dug sngags bzlas brtul zhugs can/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar sngags kyi mthu/ /bsam pa chen pos 'o dod 'bod/ /gshin rje rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /yid kyis cung zad 'jigs
mi bya| |rnal 'byor lam ni gang 'dod ba/ /de kun thams cad ster bar byed/ /ma he dang ni ku be ra/ /stag dang de las gzhan pa dang / /dom dang spre 'u dag la ni/ /khyi dag gi ni khyad
par dang / /dug dang ske tshe tshwa dang ni/ /de bzhin tsha gsum so ban dza/ /'di dag legs par sbyar gzugs bya/ /gshin rje gshed po 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /de la rnal 'byor pas
gsol gdab/ /hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags kyis ni/ /che ge mo de bdag la stsol/ /de yi pha yis ster bar byed/ /gal te rnal 'byor pa ma phyin/ /rmi lam gshin rje gshed rdeg
cing / /lho yi phyogs su khyer mthong nas/ /sad na de yi pha yis ster/ /zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa la/ /in+d+ra nI la 'dra ba'i mdog /tho ba 'dzin pa'i brtul zhugs can//
@#/ /phyag tu tho ba dgod par bya/ /zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa la/ /mdog dmar po ste khros pas 'jigs/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /
mkhas pas phyag tu dbyig pa dgod/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dmar ba la/ /'jigs pa chen po bsdigs pa yis/ /phyag na pad+ma dmar po bsnams/ /pad+ma zhes bya mkhas pas
bsgom| |zhal gsum phyag drug ljang gu ste/ /phyag na ral gri bsnams pa yi/ /las kun byed par gyur pa 'o/ /ral gri zhes bya rnam bsgom bya/ /b+ha gar ling+ga rnam bsgom nyid/ /
dkyil 'khor bdag po rnam par bsgom/ /zhe sdang rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis/ /gti mug rjes dran bsgom par bya/ /gti mug rjes dran la dmigs nas/ /phra ma rjes dran bsgom
par bya| |phra ma rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis/ /'dod chags rjes dran bsgom par bya/ /'dod chags rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis/ /phrag dog dran bya brtul zhugs can/ /so so'i rigs
kyi sprin rnams ni/ /ba sdu'i khung nas spro bar bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /gtum po'i khro bo bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /lha mo bzhi po rab
bsgom bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ rjes su dran pa rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o// //zhe sdang
gis mnan 'gro mthong nas/ /zhe sdang gshin rje gshed gzugs su/ /bcom ldan gshin rje'i dbang du mdzad/ /zhe sdang thams cad zad par byed/ /gti mug gis mnan 'gro
mthong nas/ /gti mug gshin rje gshed gzugs su/ /bcom ldan gshin rje gshed dbang mdzad/ /gti mug thams cad zad par mdzad/ /'gro ba phra mas mnan mthod nas/ /phra ma
gshin rje gshed gzugs su/ /bcom ldan snying rje can gyis mdzad/ /phra ma thams cad zad par mdzad/ /'dod chags kyis mnan 'gro mthong nas/ /'dod chags gshin rje
gshed gzugs su/ /bcom ldan snying rje can mdzad nas/ /'dod chags thams cad zad par mdzad/ /phrag dog gis mnan 'gro mthong nas/ /phrag dog gshin rje gshed gzugs
su| |bcom ldan snying rje can mdzad nas/ /phrag dog thams cad zad par mdzad/ /byams pa tsa rtsi kar gsungs te/ /snying rje de bzhin phag mo 'o/ /dbyangs can ma ni dga' ba ste/ /
btang snyoms gau rI yi gzugs so/ /bdag nyid dngos po thams cad kyis/ /rdzogs par byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi/ /rnal 'byor snying ga'i sa bon spro/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom
med| |de nas da ni bshad bya ba/ /spyod pa yi ni mtshan nyid mchog /gshin rje gshed po 'jigs gzugs kyis/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs su 'grub/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa
@#/ /phyogs su/ /ma he mchog ni bkug la zhon/ /sbrul dag gis ni brgyan bar bya/ /lcags kyi rdo rje gzugs par bya/ /skra yang ser po dag tu bya/ /gye na
brjes pa yi khyad par gyis/ /mgo la thod pas yang dag bskor/ /sma ra lkog spu ser por bya/ /hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags brjod cing / /lcags kyi rdo rje mkha' la gsor/ /rdo rje
