gshin rje gshed sbyor bas/ /seng+ge'i sgra yang de la bya/ /nus pa cung zad skyes pa ni/ /rol cing grong du 'jug par bya/ /gar dang bde ba'i cha kun gyis/ /drug las skyes sogs
glu blang bya/ /de nas rgyal mtshan khams mthong na/ /der ni 'o ma rab bsgrub bya/ /'o ma la sems gcig goms pas/ /phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub bya/ /phag mo yi ni gzugs
bzung ba'i/ /btsun mo kun la 'khyud pa yis/ /dpa' bo seng+ge bzhin du spyad/ /'dod pa'i don kun rab tu 'grub/ /de nas da ni bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya ma ni rab sgrub babs/ /
gsang sngags chen po yi ge gcig /de yi bzlas pa mngon bshad bya/ /yi ge hrIHlas byung ba yis/ /ma he yang dag bsgom bya ste/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /ma he
steng du bsgom par bya/ /gang yang cung zad gcod cing 'bigs/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs gzugs de ni/ /ma he sna tshogs sgrub pa yi/ /blo dang ldan pa'i phyag na bsnams/ /
de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dbyig pa gshin rje gshed sgrub thabs/ /yi ge hrI ni gsang sngags che/ /ma he chen po la bcibs pa/ /phyag ni 'bum phrag rdzogs pa'i phyag /sku ni mi
ro'i thal bas bskus/ /ri rab dang ni mnyam pa'i lus/ /gser gyi sa gzhi thug par mnan/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bye ba'i phyag can sgrub pa'i thabs/ /yi ge hUM las byung
ba'i gtso/ /wi kr-i tA na gsang sngags che/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rI wi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT ha hA hi hI hu hU he hai ho hau haM haHphaT swAhA/ dgos pa thams cad sgrub pa yi/ /dam tshig sgrub thabs
bshad par bya/ /sngags kyis dub pas kha zas bza'/ /ngan pa dang bral rnyed dka' min/ /sha chen dang ni rta dang ni/ /glang po che yi khyad par dang / /ba lang gi dang khyi dang ni/ /bong bu rnga
mo lce spyang ngo / /sngon po dang ni bsres pa yi/ /snum chen gyis ni lus byugs na/ /lus la byugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /snang mdzad si du ba ra dang / /de
bzhin bil ba'i lo ma dang / /so phag phye ma bsres pa dang / /gser shing lo ma'i khu ba rnams/ /'di yis dril phyis byas gyur na/ /khams gsum po ni dbang du 'gyur/ /dug dang chu
bur de bzhin mdze/ /dril phyis byas pas nyams par byed/ /gci ba chen po btung bar bya/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi de bzhin du/ /'di ni rnal 'byor mchog gtso bo/ /rang byung me tog btung ba
@#/ /bzhin| |de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ spyod pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rim par phye ba
ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo tsa rtsi ka'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing
phag mo'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / dbyangs can gyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par zhugs pa dang / gau rI ma'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin
la yang snyoms par zhugs te mchod pa'i glu 'di dag brjod par mdzad do/ /a kye kye gshin rje gshed nag bla/ /srin po'i gzugs can rang bzhin khyod/ /bdag gis khyod
mthong shin tu 'jigs/ /khros pa'i rang bzhin 'di thong mdzod/ /mtho ris sa steng sa 'og bcas/ /khyod kyi gar gyis g.yos par mdzod/ /any+dza nag po bcag 'dra ba'i/ /khro
khyod ro langs zhi gar mdzod/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul zhing / /mdangs nag tshad ni thung ba la/ /bde chen ngo bo bro gar gyis/ /rdo rje dbyangs can ma gsol 'debs/ /hrIH
Sh+T+rIHsngags dang gar gyis khyod/ /srid pa gsum gyi 'khrul pa chod/ /snying rje khros pa'i dang grol gar/ /'gro bas dad ni ngo mtshar 'gyur/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bzlas
pa yi ni mtshan nyid mchog /bzlas pa gang zhig rab bzlas na/ /dngos grub yangs pa thob pa ni/ /myur bar ma yin dal bar min/ /ring du ma yin thung du min/ /sngags ni cung zad thos
par bzlas/ /gshin rje slob dpon mi mchog gi/ /ma he mi dang so gnyis dang / /ba lang dang ni rta dag dang / /bong bu rnga mo'i rus pa las/ /bzlas pa'i phreng ba rab bsgrub bya/ /zla ngo
gcig gi bcu bzhi la/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /sha lnga dag ni bsdus byas nas/ /bzlas na dngos grub 'grub pa'i mchog /ril bu dag ni se so la/ /rnal 'byor pa yis
gshin gshed bsgom/ /mkhas bas ni yang mi mgo ste/ /khrag gis bkang pa'i mgo bsgom bya/ /khri tsam gyis ni 'byung po rnams/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams stong phrag gis/ /bdud
dang yi dwags tshogs kyang 'chi/ /gshin gshed rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid 'bum bzlas na/ /des ni las kun byed pa yin/ /bye ba bzlas na dngos grub ster/ /
bye ba lnga bzlas smos ci dgos/ /nyin re'ang yang na zla re 'am/ /de bzhin lo ni re re 'am/ /gtor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi sbyin/ /dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhir shes/ /rtag tu cung zad ci za
dang / /de bzhin cung zad 'thung ba dang / /gzhan yang bza' ba thams cad kyi/ /phud ni gshin rje gshed la dbul/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul ba'o/ /las
@#/ /ni thams cad sgrub pa dang / /bdag nyid zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bdag nyid kyang ni dbul ba dang / /rta dang ba lang glang po dang / /gser dang de las gzhan pa dang //
rang gi chung ma de bzhin bu/ /ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang / /de bzhin du ni spun zla dang / /na bza' sna tshogs dag dang ni/ /gdugs dang rdul yang mdzes pa dang / /khyim dang gdan dang
dri zhim dang / /de bzhin glu dang rol mo dang / /ral gri dang ni rgyan dag dang / /brtul zhugs can gyis bla mar dbul/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ nye bar mkho ba'i las kyi khyad par thams cad zhes bya ste rim par phye ba bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas sems can thams
cad kyi| |sdig pa dag ni ji snyed pa/ /de dag gcod pa'i gri gug ste/ /zhe sdang gcod pa'i shubs can no/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /ring po'i thod pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje
mkha' 'gro ma sgrub thabs/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gtogs par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mchog bsam bya/ /gnas der rtse lnga pa yang bsgom/ /de yi steng du gnas
dgod bya/ /mthing mdog nag po 'jigs tshul la/ /phyag drug 'jigs su rung ba ste/ /phyag na rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /phyag gzhan dag la gzhan dag dgod/ /shar du sangs rgyas
mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyag drug gti mug rdo rje mtshungs/ /lag na 'khor lo 'jigs par byed/ /bsgom bya sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyag drug phra ma dang
mtshungs pa/ /phyag na rin chen rab 'bar ba/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /nub tu pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyag drug pad+ma 'dzin pa 'o/ /byang du las kyi mkha' 'gro ma/ /ral gri
'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor rim pa 'o/ /me la sogs pa mtshams bzhi ru/ /lha mo bsgom bya brtul zhugs can/ /lA s+ya ma le de bzhin gar/ /glu ma yi ni khyad par ro/ /las kyi cho ga
mthong ba des/ /der ni sgo skyong bsgom par bya/ /thob dbyig pa dang pad+ma/ /de bzhin gzhan ni ral gri 'o/ /oM badzra DA ki nI/ oM bud+d+ha DA ki nI/ oM rat+na DA ki nI/ oM pad+ma DA ki nI/ oM
karma TA ki nI/ laM naM gaM maM/ mtshams su'o/ /oM mung+ga dzaH/ oM daN+Da hUM/ oM pad+ma baM/ oM khaD+ga ho/ /'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs gsungs
pa'o| |ring po'i thos pa bsgrub don du/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya/ /der ni/ gsang sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur te/ oM a kI sha tsa ra badzra DA ki nI swAhA/ de nas yang
dag bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje sa 'og sgrub thabs so/ /sa 'og rnam par bsgrub don du/ /gnod mdzes rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /phyag drug mdog sngon 'jigs pa yi/ /phyag tu gtun shing dgod
@#/ /par bya/ |dkyil 'khor gyi ni dkyil dag tu/ /'di ni rab tu dgod par bya/ /shar du spyan ma dgod par bya/ /de bzhin lho ru mA ma kI /nub tu lha mo gos dkar mo/ /
sgrol ma byang gi phyogs su dgod/ /me tog spos dang de bzhin dri/ /mar me la sogs mtshams su dgod/ /tho ba la sogs sgo drung ste/ /sbrul gyis brgyan pa'i ska rags byas/ /las
kyi cho ga mthong nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ltar bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sa 'og sbyor ldan pas/ /rmi lam du ni lam mthong 'gyur/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bdun pa'i rgyal po'i
dkyil 'khor te/ /mkha' spyod nyid ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /rta yi mchog ni rab tu bsgrub/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'jigs par byed/ /nyi ma'i dkyil
'khor steng du gzhag /rta yi gdong pa rab mdzes pas/ /g.yas pa srad bu khu tshur bcas/ /phyag g.yon pa ni thod pa 'o/ /oM phuM phuM phuM hi hi hi/ gsang sngags 'di ni mkhas pas bzla/ /
rta yi mchog tu gyur par grags/ /shar du ba Da bid bsgom bya/ /lho phyogs su ni rim gro ma/ /nub tu bdun pa'i rgyal po ste/ /rta mchog ma ni byang phyogs dgod/ /bdag po'i zhal
phyag ji lta bar/ /thams cad de dang 'dra bar bsgom/ /sngags 'di yis ni thams cad du/ /gshegs su gsol bar rab tu grags/ /smyug ma'i gling bu pi wang dang / /rnga zlum rnga
bran mtshams su gzhag /ba lang sna dang glang po'i sna/ /de bzhin gdong bzang gdong ngan te/ /gtun shing dang ni sta re dang / /lcags kyu dang ni zhags pa dang / /gar la sogs pa'i rnal
'byor gyis/ /sgo bzhi ru ni rtag tu bsgom/ /sngo chags g.yon par bsgom par bya/ /rang gi phyag mtshan de bzhin g.yas/ /ji ltar rta mchog sngags kyis ni/ /rdo rje sa 'og gi yang
gter/ /rta mchog rnal 'byor nyid kyis ni/ /khams gsum nam mkha'i khams su 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud
las| dngos grub nges par bstan pa ste rim par phye ba bcu gsum pa'o// //de la 'di ni/ srad bu brgyad pa'i dam tshig gi mchog ste/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM
Ad+ya nut+pan+na twAt+ta oM AHhUM/ dpal ldan gshin rje gshed bsgoms la/ /slob ma rnam snang mdzad du bsgom/ /ye shes thig mchog rtse mo rtse/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag nas
gdab| |de la 'di ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig go/ /oM AHhUM/ dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur rim par bya/ /de yi sgo yi nyi shu'i tshad/ /ba yi rnam lnga mnyam byugs
pa'i| |skud pa sangs rgyas kyis rab brtags/ /de la 'di ni/ rdo rje chen po gsol ba btab pa'i dam tshig go/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas slob dpon che/ /e ma ho chos dang tshogs kyi
@#/ /gtso| |dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /de la 'di ni/ sa chen po yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga ste/ rdo rje sa'i lha mo
bkug la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du 'gyur/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa yi ni khyad par dang / /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la'o/ /sgo ni dkyil 'khor cha brgyad de/ /khyams
chen dag ni bor ba la/ /bdag nyid chen pos shes par bya/ /yid du 'ong zhing legs spras pa'i/ /mu khyud sgo tsam shes par bris/ /lha yi snam bu'ang de tsam mo/ /rdo rje lha mo ldan pa
yis| |glu dang rol mo gar yang dgod/ /mchod snam sgo yi byed nyid de/ /'gram dang ngos kyang de tsam mo/ /do shal sen mo do dang ni/ /nyi ma zla ba me tog phreng / /de la gos dang
'phan dag go /rtsa ba sa yi thig rgyab tu/ /tshon rtsi'i snam bu de yi phyed/ /de la snying po chen po 'dis/ /bdag nyid 'khor lo rnam par dgod/ /der ni rang gi phyag rgya'ang bsten/
dam tshig ye shes gzhug pa ste/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /shar du dkar po chen po ste/ /lhor ni ser po dang ldan pas/ /nub kyi char ni dmar po 'o/ /byang du ljang gu
dang ldan par/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'dra ba'i/ /dbus kyi char ni yang dag bri/ /de la phyag rgya dgod par bya/ /las kyi cho ga mthong nas ni/ /rtag tu phyag rgya mkha' mnyam pa/ /phyag rgya
de nyid rtag tu bri/ /de yi dkyil du rdo rje bri/ /shar du 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /de lta bu la sogs pa blta/ /phyag mtshan kun tu zhal dang mtshungs/ /de la 'di yi dgang gzar ni/ /de yi yu
ba'i tshad bya ba/ /khru gang dang ni ldan par bya/ /de yi dkyil 'khor rtse mo ni/ /sor bzhi po la zlum por ba/ /gting du sor gnyis zab pa la/ /de la sor phyed mchur byas pa'o/ /blugs
gzar pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra ba'i/ /kha ni mthe bo'i lto gang la/ /de la sor gcig tsam zab pa/ /rgyud 'di ru ni rab tu bsngags/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang / /mtshams med lnga ni
byas pa dang / /sems can srog ni gcod pa dang / /nya dang sha ni mngon za dang / /chang la mngon par dad pa dang / /chad lta'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa dang / /mngon par dbang ni ma bskur
dang / /kun tu 'khyams shing ldom bu dang / /grong gi gla mi byed pas kyang / /gshin rje gshed rgyud mngon gzhol na/ /nag po'i tshig ni ji lta bar/ /grub pa 'di la the tshom med/ /de
nas byams pa la sogs kyis/ /rdo rje nges pa 'di mthong nas/ /rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /mi smra bar ni sdod par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga'o/ /'byung bzhi'i sa
bon chen po yis/ /'khor lo bzhi ni rab bsgrub bya/ /gnas bzhi rab tu sbyor ba bsam/ /nam mkha' la ni g.yo bar byed/ /rkang pa dag gi 'og tu yaM/ /lte bar raM ste snying gar laM/ /mgo bo
@#/ /la ni yi ge baM/ /yi ge ya ni nag chen po/ /drag la rngam pa rab gyur ba'i/ /gru gsum sreg ba'i me ltar 'bar/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur dmar/ /rdo rje sa
gzhi 'dzin bzod pa'i/ /ser po chen po gru bzhi ba/ /ri rab ri yis mnan pa yis/ /nor 'dzin de ni bsgom par bya/ /dkar po zlum po bsil chen po/ /sprin bzhin du ni char pa
'dzin| |rgya mtsho du ma chus gang ba'i/ /gangs kyi ri bo ltar bsil ba'i/ /gnas bzhi ru ni sbyor bas na/ /khar ni snang ba mtha' yas te/ /slob ma rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /myur ba ru ni
'bebs par byed/ /de la 'di ni spro ba'i cho ga'o/ /rdo rje chos ni mgon chen po/ /snang ba mtha' yas bde ba che/ /gsungs shig 'dod chags chos chen po/ /dge dang mi dge legs
par bri| |khru gang nas ni brtsams nas ni/ /ji srid khru ni stong gi bar/ /slob ma chen po 'phar bar 'gyur/ /de ni dbab pa'i cho ga 'o/ /'jigs gzugs ri mo'i mtshan nyid ni/ /de
nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /sa ni 'jam po blangs byas la/ /brtul zhugs can gyis bzlas pa bya/ /sran gre'u 'o ma de bzhin sha /bu ram tin ni ni la sogs/ /snum dang
nim pa'i lo ma dang / /na ti de bzhin dza ge sa/ /dang por dkar bor bri bar bya/ /kha dog gzhan gyis de nas bsgom/ /rdo rgyus dang ni btsag dag las/ /rgya skyegs lta bu'i
mdog tu 'gyur/ /yung ba de dag rams dag las/ /de bzhin kha dog ljang gur 'gyur/ /sngon po dag ni rams kyis bya/ /de bzhin du bas nag po 'o/ /ldong ros kyis ni ser po ste/ /dmar po
de bzhin 'tshal gyis so/ /de la pil ba'i snying po gzhag /ha cang nyung dang mang ba min/ /mang na nag por 'gyur ba ste/ /nyung na de bzhin 'thul bar 'gyur/ /gzugs ni khro dang zhi ba 'o/ /
mtshan nyid dag ni bshad par bya/ /rol ba zhi bar gsungs pa ste/ /khro bo sbom la thung bar bshad/ /sna na sor bzhi bya ba ste/ /dpral ba kos ko mchu de bzhin/ /mgrin pa 'gram pa de
bzhin mtshan/ /sor bzhi dag tu bya ba yin/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi lag pa la/ /gyen du sor ni nyi shu yin/ /lag pa rkang pa gdong ji ltar/ /mig ni mthe bong gang tsam ste/ /rna ba gnyis la sor
gnyis bsgrags/ /'bras bu gnyis la de bzhin bzhi/ /mchu ni sor gnyis bsdoms pa 'o/ /lte bar sor gcig zab pa yin/ /lus ni mgrin pa bor ba yi/ /gdong ni sum 'gyur lus
la dgod/ /ral ba cod pan de yi tshad/ /rin chen cod pan sor drug pa'o/ /ral pa gcig ma rab sgrub thabs/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gnod sbyin mo ni sgrub 'dod pas/ /ral pa
gcig ma rab sgrub thabs/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig ste/ /gri gug dang ni thod pa la/ /shin tu sbom la mdog sngo ba/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom par bya/ /dzaM b+ha la ni shar du
@#/ /bsgom| |bsu d+ha ra lho phyogs su/ /chu dbang nub tu dgod bar bya/ /byang du rna cha gos ko 'phyang / /me la sogs pa'i mtshams dag tu/ /gnod sbyin mo bzhi rab
bsgom bya/ /ku ta la kye he ni gyi haM/ /ba su d+ha ri chog bzhin dgong / /der ni sgo ba rnams bsgoms te/ /tho ba la sogs mnyam par ro/ /'khor lo lnga ma mthong ba bzhin/ /de bzhin
mdog ni rab sbyar bya/ /phyag mtshan bdag ni lhar 'dzin pa/ /mkhas pas phyi nas sngags bzlas te/ /oM e ka dza Ti ba su d+hA ra Ni swAhA/ puk+ka si ni rab sgrub thabs/ de nas yang
dag bshad par bya/ /gang zhig bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten gsum la 'tshe nus pa/ /sku mdog ser po zhal bzhi pa/ /phyag bzhi bong bu la bcibs pa/ /puk+ka si yi lus
bsgom bya/ /zhags pa tho ba mda' dag dang / /brtul zhugs can gyis gzhu bcas bsgom/ /oM puk+ka si aM zhes sngags brjod do/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /de nas yang
dag bshad bya ba/ /de yi mod la mi snang bar/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje grags 'gyur ba/ /'bar ba'i gser 'od 'dra ba yi/ /ser po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs ni
'dzin pa'i mgon/ /mi mthong bya ba'i don du bsgom/ /shar du mdzes ma dgod par bya/ /de bzhin lho ru skra can ma/ /nub tu ser bo bsgom par bya/ /byang du nye ba'i skra can ma/ /thams
cad phyag na ral gri dang / /'khor lo la sogs gzhan la dgod/ /thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'o/ /sa bon yi ge maM las byung / /dkyil 'khor
gyi ni dbus na bzhugs/ /thams cad zhabs ni g.yon brkyang bas/ /ri bong can gyi gdan la bzhugs/ /'od zer can dang ri khrod ma/ /de bzhin nor 'dzin skul byed ma/ /me la sogs
pa'i mtshams bzhi ru/ /bsdus pa dgod bya snying po la'o/ /mya ngan med dang yal 'dab dang / /'bras kyi snyam dbyig pa 'o/ /ser dang ljang dang yang ser po/ /dkar po'i lus ni bsgom
par bya| |kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu gdab par bya/ /tho ba la sogs sgo ba bzhi/ /bsgoms na mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ste rim par phye ba bcu bzhi pa'o// //'phags pa dzang+gu la'i
sgrub thabs/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /gang zhig bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /chu yi steng nas 'gro 'gyur ba/ /ser po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /sa bon phu las yang dag
byung / /sku chen phyag na sbrul bsnams pa/ /rma bya la ni zhon par dgod/ /shar du rma bya dgod par bya/ /de bzhin lho ru khro gnyer can/ /nub tu ri khrod lo ma can/ /byang du rdo rje lcags
@#/ /sgrog ma| |rma bya'i sgro dang spyi blugs dang / /lo ma dang ni lcags sgrog ma/ /de dag rnam par bsgom par bya/ /ser dang dmar dang de bzhin ljang / /kha dog
sngon po dbye ba nyid/ /mkhas pas 'di ltar bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin sngags 'di dag kyang bzlas/ /oM phu dza/ tho ba la sogs sgo ru dgod/ /me tog la sogs mtshams su
dgod| |dzang+gu li yi sbyor ba yis/ /chu yi steng nas rtag tu 'gro/ /ku ru kul+le rab sgrub thabs/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /gang gis bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /klu yi bu mo
rab 'gugs pa/ /kha dog dmar po zhal bzhi pa/ /phyag brgyad dang ni rab tu ldan/ /hrI yi sa bon las byung bas/ /klu ni 'gugs par byed pa yin/ /phyag brgyad du ni klu dgod
de| |mtha' yas la sogs klu rigs brgyad/ /lus ni sbrul gyis rab tu brgyan/ /brtul zhugs can gyis mdzes ma bsgom/ /sngags ni/ oM ku ru kul+le hrIHphuHswAhA/ de nas
gsang ba bshad par bya/ /bsdus nas yin gyi rgyas pa min/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha yi bu mo 'gugs byed pa/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig ste/ /phyag na
mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa/ /lus ni ser po chen po yi/ /rdo rje lus med bsgom par bya/ /shar du dga' ma bsgom par bya/ /lho ru 'dod pa'i mdzes ma bsgom/ /nub tu
'dod pa'i lha mo bsgom/ /byang du 'dod pa'i lcags kyu 'o/ /'dod pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi/ /phyag tu mda' dang gzhu bsgom bya/ /ser dang dmar dang de bzhin ljang / /dmar skya dag
ni bsgom par bya/ /mtshams rnams su ni rtag dgod pa/ /mi 'gag de bzhin mtshams kyi bdag /g.yi dang spre'u'i rgyal mtshan ni/ /sgo yi phyogs kyi bshad par bya/ /'dod pa
'gying dang 'gying bag can/ /dran dang de bzhin mda' gri can/ /lha rnams de dag thams cad kyi/ /dbu la gshin rje gshed po bsgom/ /bud med kyi ni pad+ma ru/ /rdo rje lus med bsgom
par bya| |yi ge yid las yang dag byung / /kun tu 'khor bar rnam par 'phro/ /bslus shing g.yengs pa bsgom par bya/ /myos nas bde ba'i 'dod yid kyi/ /dmar po'i gos kyis
yongs dkris te/ /rkang pa'i drung du lhung bar 'gyur/ /der ni sngags kyang bzlas par bya/ /yi ge oM ni ring por drang / /yi ge swAhA tha mar sbyin/ /yi ge si ti'i sngags bzlas bya/ /che
ge mo zhig bdag dbang gyur/ /thams cad du ni bsgoms byas nas/ /nag po'i tshig ni ji bzhin gyis/ /rnal 'byor 'dod pas de thob 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ lus med rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rim bar phye ba ste bco lnga pa'o// //he ru ga chen sgrub pa'i thabs/ /de nas yang dag bshad
@#/ /par bya| |rnal 'byor 'khor bar bcings pa la/ /gang zhig shes bas myur grol ba/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig ste/ /kha dog sngon po phyed gar can/ /rdo
rje phyag tu bsgom par bya/ /gzhan yang thod pa bsgom par bya/ /spyan gsum skra ni gyen du 'greng / /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /kha T+wAM ga ni g.yon phyogs su/ /phreng ba dag gi
rkang pa brgyan/ /sa bon hUM las yang dag byung / /yi dwags la gnas rtag tu dgod/ /sangs rgyas lnga ru rab sbyor ba/ /thod pa lnga ni dbu la 'o/ /cod pan la ni mi bskyod bsgom/ /
he ru kar grags bsgom par bya/ /shar du chos kyi 'khor lo ma/ /sangs rgyas byang chub lho ru 'o/ /'dod pa kun gyi 'khris ma nub/ /byang du he ru ka nyid 'dra/ /rgyan kun gyis ni
rnam brgyan pa'i/ /kha dog sna tshogs rnam par dgod/ /gzugs mdzes yi dwags la bzhugs pa/ /gti mug thams cad nyer 'joms byed/ /chos 'khor a shad tha'i dbyug
pa| |de bzhin yid bzhin nor bu'i shing / /lha mo rnams kyi phyag g.yas su/ /rdo rje yang ni bsgom par bya/ /chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad la/ /thod pa'i snod ni g.yon pa
la| |spyan ma mA ma kI sgrol ma/ /gos dkar yid du 'ong ba rnams/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru/ /'khor lo phyi rol gshin gshed do/ /shes rab mthar byed rta
mgrin dang / /'khyil par bcas par bsgom par bya/ /'khor lo yi ni sgo srung ste/ /cho ga'i las ni mthong bas so/ /gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ he ru ka sgrub pa'i rim par
bye ba ste bcu drug pa'o// //rnam pa lnga ni bsgoms byas la/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgoms pa yis/ /mkhas pas 'khor
lo bsgom par bya/ /gru bzhi yi ni sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo bskyed par bya ba ste/ /tsa rtsi ka sogs glu dang ni/ /drug las skyes sogs len par byed/ /snying rje khros pa'i dad sgrol
bzhengs/ /khams gsum kun gyi gti mug gsol/ /dad sgrol gsol bas ma bzhugs bzhengs/ /bdud 'di dag las rgyal bar mdzod/ /'jig rten mgon po stong nyid ci ste
bzhugs/ /dad sgrol 'jig rten bsod nams kyis bzhugs shig /byang chub 'dod pa'i 'jig rten mgron bos nas/ /khyod ni stong pa nyid la sems par byed/ /ji ltar skar
mda' 'pho ba bzhin/ /byang chub sems la zhugs par gyur/ /rdo rje 'chang rang ngo bo nyid/ /snying rje dang ni 'dod chags sems/ /dang por sgom pa rnal 'byor te/ /gnyis pa
rjes kyi rnal 'byor yin/ /gsum pa shin tu rnal 'byor te/ /bzhi pa rnal 'byor chen po 'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rdzogs pa yin/ /rnal 'byor yin par 'di ltar 'dod/ /de ni
@#/ /rgyu mthun lha yi sku/ /rjes kyi rnal 'byor yin par grags/ /'khor lo thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /shin tu rnal 'byor yin par bsgrags/ /sku dang
gsung dang thugs rnams dang / /lha yi mig sogs byin brlab dang / /ye shes 'khor lo gzhug pa dang / /bdud rtsi myang ba dang ni/ /mchod dang bstod pa chen po dag /rnal 'byor
chen po zhes bya 'o/ /slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya/ /bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /de bzhin spun la khro ba dang / /nyes pa bsgrag par mi bya 'o/ /byang chub sems kyang gtang
mi bya| |bdag gzhan chos la smad mi bya/ /sems can la ni byams pa dag /nam yang gtang bar mi bya 'o/ /yongs su ma smin sems can la/ /gsang ba dag ni bstan mi bya/ /bdag
sogs phung po brnyas mi bya/ /grong pa'i chos ni sun mi gdon/ /gdug la byams pa rtag tu gtang / /chos la tshad ni gzhal mi bya/ /sems can dad pa can mi bslu/ /rtag tu dam
tshig bsten par bya/ /bud med shes rab rang bzhin la/ /smod pa nyes pa de bzhin no/ /rnal 'byor slong mos rgyu mi bya/ /rnal 'byor spang bar mi bya ste/ /rtag par rgyun du gsang sngags
bzla| |rtag tu dam tshig la sogs bstan/ /gal te bag med byung gyur te/ /bla ma dam tshig la gnod na/ /des ni dkyil 'khor bris byas la/ /bde gshegs rnams la nyes pa
bshags/ /snying rje can gyis mi brtag par/ /dad pas bla ma'i dam tshig srung / /nyes pa ma lus rnam spangs sems kyis ni/ /bsam gtan la sogs bzlas pa mchog gzhol bar/ /
byas la rtag la bla ma bla mar bya/ /brtan cing dul la snying rje gcig tu sems/ /dad dang lhag pa'i bsam pas bzod pa 'dzin/ /slob ma bla ma la ni gus pa dang / /dad pas gshin rje gshed
la gus pa la/ /brtul zhugs ldan pas de ni yongs sbyin bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang gi gsung nye
bar thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur te/ /'di lta bu'i ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /brtul zhugs mthar thug thod pa chen po ltar/ /'khrul 'khor mthar thug gshin rje gshed kyi
rgyud| |rgyud kyi mthar thug pa ni 'dus pa ste/ /byung bar ma gyur 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /e ma'o zhi ba chen po'i chos/ /e ma'o khro bo 'jigs mdzad pa/ /e ma'o mya ngan 'das pa'i
mchog /e ma'o 'khor ba zhi ba nyid/ /e ma'o 'di ni rab tu mtshar/ /nyes pa gang de yon tan gyur/ /byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/ /dngos po ma yin bsgom bya min/ /khams
ma yin zhing rnam shes min/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa nyid/ /nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa/ /chos 'di bde ba chen po ste/ /sa yang ma yin chu min te/ /me min rlung
@#/ /min nam mkha' min/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bskyed pa yang ni rab gnas nas/ /dngos po thams cad dngos med bshad/ /dngos po med ces
ma bsgrags pa/ /rnal 'byor sbyor ba dang 'brel phyir/ /chad pa ma yin rtag pa yin/ /yan lag med cing kha dog med/ /thog ma bar dang mtha' spangs pa/ /dngos po thams cad
med par 'gyur/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das tsartsi ka chen po la sogs pas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /bsod nams sdig pa dag
dang ma 'brel bas/ /mchog tu dga' ba dri med dag pa yi/ /mgon po de bzhin nyid kyi gter chen gcig pu dang / /kun kyang snying rje'i sems kyis mgon 'di yod/ /chos rnams
ngo bo bde ba chen po'i dngos/ /mchog tu dga' ba 'di yi ngo bo nyid/ /de la gzugs med bsod nams med cing sdig pa med/ /skye ba dang ni 'gag pa dag ni yod pa min/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rim par phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas gtam
rgyud bshad par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po la byang chub kyi bar du gcod pa'i phyir shin tu 'jigs su rung
ba'i 'jigs pa chen po ston cing bdud kyi dpung chen po lhags te/ /de'i dus na bdud chen po las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bcom ldan
'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las gshin rje gshed kyi khro bo nges par phyung ste/ /nges bar phyung nas kyang lag na rdo rje thub pa chen po'i bka' bzhin byed pa la phyag na
rdo rje khyod 'di lta bu'i gshin rje gshed kyi khro bo'i gzugs su bsgyur te bdud dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / lha rnams kyang choms shig /chings shig /rtogs
shig ces gsungs so/ /de'i dus na ji ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa thos te/ skad cig la bzung zhing don bzung ste bsdus nas rab tu yid la byas so/ /zhes
gsang ba chen po'i bdag po chen po rdo rje rigs kyi gtso bo n+nA da ku be ra'i yab kyis de skad ces gsungs so/ /o D+yan gyi yul nas yang dag par byung ba/ dngos grub thams cad skyed
par byed pa/ rgyud kyi rgyal po 'bum phrag bdun pa las phyung ba gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ le'u bco brgyad pa'o// //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po mkhas pa dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims
@#/ /rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba/ slad kyis lots+tsha ba dge slong dar ma grags kyis bcos la de las kyang dge slong rdo rje grags kyis
bcos so// //rgya gar skad du/ ya mA ri kr-iSh+Na karma sarba tsakra sid+d+ha ka ra nA ma tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed dgra nag po'i 'khor lo las thams cad
grub par byed pa ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la gti mug rdo rje dang / ser sna rdo rje dang / 'dod chags rdo rje dang / phrag dog rdo rje dang / sa rdo rje dang /

chu rdo rje dang / me rdo rje dang / rlung rdo rje dang / byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po ma dang / yon tan gyi phreng ba ma dang / sems kyi rgyud tshim par byed pa ma dang / brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo
ma dang / bdug spos ma dang / me tog ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma dang / de la sogs pa dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas lha mo be ta lI stan
las langs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ da ltar 'di na gdug pa can rnams kyis sems can thams cad la
'tshe bar bgyid pa dang / ma 'ongs pa na yang theg pa chen po pa dang / sems can thams cad la'ang 'tshe bar bgyid pa dag 'byung na/ de rnams ji ltar tshor gcad par bgyi/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las snying po 'di phyung ngo / /hrIHde ma thag
tu bcom ldan 'das nyid zhal drug pa phyag drug pa zhabs drug pa'i ngo bor gyur nas ma he rwa gnyis pa la brdzis te/ ma he'i bdag po chung ma bcas par oM hrIHSh+TiHlbi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM
phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes zhal bzhad pa dang bas pas oM gsung zhing mnan par gyur to/ /lha dang / lha ma yin dang / bdud thams cad kyang skrag cing 'dar ba dang bcas pas 'dud
par gyur to/ /tshangs pa dang dbang po la sogs pa thams cad kyang phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan khro bo yi/ /rgyal po chen po rab 'jigs pa/ /thugs rje
chen po dang ldan pas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /de nas sgrub pa bshad bya ba/ /rtsibs brgyad dbus kyi lte ba la/ /bdag nyid phyag dar zhal rnams ni/ /drug drug ldan par
gyur pa bsgom/ /zhabs kyang de dang 'dra bar ste/ /g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag na ni/ /rdo rje tho pa g.yas gnyis na/ /ral gri de bzhin g.yon gyi yang / /dang por zhags pa sdigs mdzub
@#/ /ldan| |gnyis par gtun shing legs par 'dzin/ /rdo rje dril bu tha mas bsnams/ /steng zhal nag po rab 'jigs pa/ /zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung ste/ /
brkyang bskum gar gyis zhabs bzhir gnas/ /stag lpags kyis ni rnam dkris shing / /seng+ge ral ral pa ni/ /gyen 'greng bsdus te spyi bor yang / /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam
par bcings/ /'di ni khro bo 'chol pa ste/ /lag cha sna tshogs dag dang ldan/ /shar rtsibs la sogs rnam bzhi la/ /gti mug sogs te bzhi po yang / /dkar dang ser dang
dmar ba yang / /de bzhin bzhi pa ljang gu ste/ /g.yas kyis 'khor lo rin chen 'bar/ /pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /g.yon gyis dril bu legs par 'dzin/ /mtshams su laM
sogs las skyes pa/ /lha mo bzhi po nges par bsam/ /bdag po 'dra ste sgeg nyams 'dzin/ /grwa yi lha mo mtshan la ni/ /lA s+ye mu ti kur ldan no/ /rin chen phreng ba phyag
gnyis bsnams/ /pi wang sgreg pa'i gsung dbyangs can/ /gar gyi rgyas par 'gro ba yi/ /don la rtag tu brtson 'grus ldan/ /bdug spos sogs dang bzhi po yang / /rang gi
mtshan ma nges par 'dzin/ /phyag rgya'i sngags rnams brjod pas so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gti mug rdo rje'i sngags
'di gsungs so/ /oM dza ni dzika /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags 'di gsungs pa ni/ ser sna rdo rje'o/ /oM rat+na d+h+r-i ka /de nas yang
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM A ro li ka ste/ 'dod chags rdo rje'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phrag dog rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM pra dz+nyA d+h+r-i ka /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po
bde bar gshegs pas sa rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM lo tsa na hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos chu rdo rje'i sngags 'di
gsungs so/ /oM mA ma kI trAM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos me rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM pAN+Da ri hrI/ de nas yang
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rlung rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /tA ra a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
bdag pos bde ba chen po skyed par byed pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM lA s+ye/ de nas yang yon tan brgyud pa bla ma'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM mA le/ de nas bcom ldan
@#/ /'das kyis dbyangs can ma skyed par byed pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM gI ti/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gar ma'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /
oM nr-i ti| de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod pa'i sngags rnams gsungs pa ni/ oM badzra d+hU pa/ oM badzra puSh+pa/ oM badzra dI pa/ oM badzra gan+d+ha/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i sngags dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcing ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad rjes su dgyes par byed pa'i sngags rnams bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsungs pa ni/ oM badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ oM badzra pA sha
hUM| oM badzra s+pho Ta baM/ oM badzra A be sha hoH/ blo ldan mkhas pas ci nus kyis/ /thig gis thig ni gdab pa la/ /tshad ldan 'jur mdud med pa dang / /gsher zhing gsar ba mdzes
pa yis| |shar du bltas te gdab par bya/ /tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab pa yang / /lho ru bltas te gdab par bya/ /de 'og mtha' yi thig gdab pa/ /byin zar gnas te dbang ldan
blta| |rlung gnas bden bral kha bltas te/ /nub tu legs par bri bar bya/ /de nas shar du kha bltas te/ /byang du bris te byin zar gnas/ /bden bral min pa'i mtha' ma gdab//
blta ba bden bral phyogs su 'o/ /slob dpon ldang min grogs po ni/ /ri dwags zhon pa'i phyogs 'dug ste/ /tshangs thig dang po gdab par bya/ /gnyis pa'ang bden bral phyogs
'dug ste/ /bgegs phyogs brkyang la gdab par bya/ /dbus dang mtha' mar phye ba yi/ /gzhal yas khang pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang / /rta babs bzhis ni
brgyan pa yi/ /dbus kyi rtsibs brgyad lte ba la/ /rdo rje tho ba bri bar bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du/ /gri gug kyang ni bri par bya/ /shar rtsibs 'khor lo chen po ste/ /rin chen lho
yi phyogs rtsibs la/ /pad+ma dmar po nub tu bri/ /byang du rdo rje kun tu rtse/ /shar lho phyogs su'ang de dang 'dra/ /gra bzhir brgyad po'ang nyis brtsegs su/ /mtshan ma rnams ni legs par
bri| |sgo bzhi dag tu bri bar yang / /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /gzhan yang rgyan kun legs par bri/ /mchod pa legs par dgram par bya/ /khu tshur dku gnyis bzhag pa
dang / /de bzhin dpral bar nyug pa dang / /kha nas 'byin dang gar bskyod dang / /bdug spos nyug dang me tog 'thor/ /mthe bong bsgrengs te rang lus la'ang / /gzhan la nyug tshul
gnas pa ni/ /brgyad po mchod pa'i lha mo dag /bskyed dang legs gnas phyag rgya yin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi lha rnams dang / /rang lus bcug ste gnas pa la/ /sngags kyis byin

@#/ /gyis brlab pa ni/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba
At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ mig sogs byin gyis brlab pa la/ /gti mug rdo rje sogs kyis srung / /dbang sbubs stong pa nyid byas te/ /snying po'am ming gi yi ge yis/ /rigs kyi phyag
mtshan bsnams pa yi/ /sku rnams nges par bskyed pas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bdud rtsi myang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM AHhUM/ dag cing 'bar bar rnam brtags te/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i
bdag po ste/ /zla ba'i dbus su gti mug bsam/ /rin chen dbus su bsam pa yang / /ser sna nyid du bsam par bya/ /pad+ma'i dbus su 'dod chags bsam/ /sna tshogs
dbus su phrag dog bsam/ /bsam bya ljags la sa bon te/ /'phros pas bkug ste tshim par bya/ /shar ni dkar po chen po ste/ /lho ni ser po nyid du 'o/ /nub ni dmar por
nges par shes/ /byang ni ljang gur yang dag ldan/ /de las de bzhin re khA'i rim/ /dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i tshe na yang / /byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms/ /tshad med pa
yi rim pa yis/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rnams/ /yod min med min gnyis ka min/ /gnyis ka min pa'ang ma yin te/ /
spros bral ngo bo med par bsgom/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ raM las nyi ma rnam bsgoms te/ /de dbus las kyi rdo rje ni/ /kun tu rtse lnga'i rang bzhin te/ /de
dbus hUM las rdo rje ni/ /kun tu phra mos bgegs bcom ste/ /ra ba gur dang sa gzhi yang / /de yi 'og tu nges par bsgom/ /gru gsum gyen bsgreng dkar po ni/ /shin tu gsal
bar bdag gis dmigs/ /zhe sdang las ni sngar ma byung / /byung zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems la gzhol ba dang / /gtong zhing thos pa'i khengs pa med/ /le
lo bcom zhing khro ba med/ /ser sna med de g.yo yang med/ /sgyu spangs shes rab gsal ba dang / /gcig tu theg pa che la gzhol/ /des ni dka' ba med par yang / /gzhan gyi
don du 'di brtsams na/ /grangs ni bye ba tshang ba yis/ /bcu bzhir tshang ba'i gsang sngags kyis/ /las rnams kun grub the tshom med/ /yang lha mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /de yi 'khrul 'khor ji lta bu/ /yi ge rnams ni ji ltar bri/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bdun tshan bdun dang ldan pa yi/ /re mig legs par
@#/ /bri bar bya/ /las kun byed pa'i 'khor lo la/ /mchod pa yis kyang legs mchod la/ /de 'og las rnams brtsam par bya/ /bzlas pa'i mtshan ma rmi
lam mam/ /mngon sum byung bar gyur nas kyang / /'khrul 'khor rnams ni bri bya ba'i/ /rmi lam mtshan ma 'di yin te/ /tshal chen zug pa'i gling dag dang / /lha gang mchod rten
gzhal yas su/ /dam pa rnams dang nges phrad de/ /dbang bskur ri la 'dzeg pa dang / /rgya mtshor bcas pa'i chu rgal lam/ /kla klo bran du 'khor rmis na/ /nges par 'grub ste
'khor lo bri/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa gsungs te/ yaM las byung ba'i rlung dkyil 'khor/ /sngon po gzhu yi dbyibs can la/ /
ba dan ldan par nges par bsam/ /raM las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor/ /gru gsum dmar po bsam par bya/ /baM las byung ba chu yin te/ /dkar po zlum po bsam par bya/ /
laM byung sa yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /ljang ser gru bzhi bsams byas te/ /sngon du bsam bya lta rim bzhin/ /twa ra phyi nas nges par bsam/ /b+hUM las byung ba'i 'khor lo'i
rtsibs/ /drug gnyis ldan pa'i lte ba la/ /b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang pa ste/ /gdan dang ldan par sgrub pos bsam/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag
rgya dang sngags kyis bde bar gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bsdu bar bya'o/ /oM badzra sa mA dzaH/ lag ngar gnyis ni nges bsnol la/ /mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul byas te/ /se
gol brdab cing brdung bar bya/ /lcags kyu la sogs rnam pa bzhis/ /nges par dgug pa la sogs bya/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
bdag pos mchod pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM ar+g+haM pra tI ts+tsha swAhA/ pra ba ra sad kA ra phra tits+tsha swAhA/ nag po rab ri med pa yi/ /bum pa lto che bre tshang pa/ /mchu 'phyang mgrin
ring gdan ldan par/ /snying por ldan pa'i sman sogs gzhug /mgrin par ras bzang dag gis dkri /'dab mar ldan pa'i lcug ma yang / /dri dang ldan pas kha brgyan te/ /
bdud rtsir ldan pa yis kyang mchod/ /bla re gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / /ba dan sil snyan rol mo yis/ /gus pas dkyil 'khor la yang mchod/ /'dzam bu'i gling ngam
gling gzhan dag /nor bu rin chen bkang ba yang / /stong gsum la sogs de bzhin te/ /zhum pa med par byas te dbul/ /blo ldan sgrub pos sems can la/ /phan pa'i sems
kyis srog mi gcod/ /ma byin par yang mi blang ngo / /'dod pa mi spyad brdzun mi smra/ /gnod pa'i rgyu phyir chang mi btung / /gdug pa rnams las ldog ste bya/ /dngos su'am yang na
@#/ /sngags dang gzhan/ /'khrul 'khor dang ni ting nge 'dzin/ /sman gyis kyang ni bya ba ste/ /de ltar mi byed de yi ni/ /nges par dam tshig nyams par 'gyur/ /
gdon dang log 'dren dag gis kyang / /nges par 'chi ste dmyal bar ni/ /yun ring sdug bsngal gyis sdug ste/ /de bas nan tan ldan pa ru/ /bzod pa mi bskyed snying rje yis/ /sngags
kyis nges par bsad par bya/ /mi ldog pa yi sems su gnas/ /byang chub chu yis ra ro zhing / /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi/ /phyag rgya che la de gzhol te/ /ngo bo dang bral
dngos po 'jig /ma byin byang chub blang ba la/ /brtson pas le lo dor bar bya/ /brdzun du shes bya dngos po rnams/ /de nas de bzhin gzhan la brjod/ /rgyas btab pa yi dngos
po la| |rgya bshig shes rab ral gri yis/ /bcad cing rnam pa med pa la/ /bsad pa yang ni nga yis bsgrags/ /u med pa yi yi ge rnams/ /steng gi g.yas phyogs nyid nas bri//
'og gi yi ge bri ba ni/ /de nyid g.yon gyi phyogs nas bri/ /A li kA li nges bris te/ /k+Sha ma gtogs par dbus stong ste/ /de la bgegs kyi mtshan ma'am/ /ming sogs nges
par bri ba yang / /lto ba'i nang du chud par bri/ /'khor lo nyid kyang de 'dra ba/ /gru bzhi dag tu bri ba ni/ /ma ning 'dod pa'i kA li dang / /A li min te lhag ma yin/ /gdug
pa'i yi ge bcu bzhi po/ /ming dang bcas par phyogs bzhir bri/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa yis/ /bzhi pa gcig gi mgo steng du/ /sum bskor nyid ni shis pa yin/ /las kun
byed pa'i 'khor lo de/ /'bri bar byed pa'i spyi dus dang / /khyad par dus tshes lha yi ni/ /rnal 'byor med pas bya ba min/ /phyogs su blta ba'i bye brag gis/ /las kyi sgrub pos
shes par bya/ /las kun byed pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /bde gshegs kun gyi snying po ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'ang yin/ /'khor lo 'dir ni bcug pa gang / /sangs
rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig /dam chos smod pa'ang de bzhin zhi/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'ang dbang du 'du/ /lha min pra ti'ang zhi bar byed/ /dgra bcom gsod pa'ang de zhi la/ /brgya
byin nyid kyang dbang du nges/ /de lta bu yi 'khor lo de/ /thog mar bris te de 'og tu/ /byin rlabs ma nor de nyid la/ /mchod pa gus par bdag gis bya/ /mchod min las rnams
byas pa la/ /'bras bu 'byung min 'khrul pa la'ang / /'bras med ngal ba nyid yin no/ /yang lha mo ro langs ma nyid stan las langs te mchod pa chen po byas te 'di skad ces
gsol ba btab bo/ /'khor lo 'bri ba'i snag tsha gang / /bri gzhi smyug gu ji lta bu/ /gcig gam 'on te de tha dad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan
@#/ /'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /nga'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do/ /ji ltar las rnams bye brag
yod pa ltar/ /bri ba'i gnas dang gzhug pa'i gnas/ /tha dad de bzhin 'khor lo bsgrub/ /snag tsha tha dad 'bru rnams bzhin/ /grong khyer chen po srung 'dod dam/ /skyes pa srung
bar 'dod na yang / /gro ga de bzhin u b+hi shun/ /la gor zho sha'i shun pa 'am/ /ras la kha ches 'khor lo ni/ /bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan par ro/ /so ma btang ba'i kham
phor du| |sbrang mar dag dbus 'khor lo gzhug /skud pa dkar pos legs par dkri/ /nang par shar du kha bltas te/ /me tog dkar po dag gis mchod/ /bdag nyid dkar
po'i mdog tu bsam/ /mdun du skyes pa zla ba la/ /mtha' dag gnas pa mdun du bsam/ /sangs rgyas phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yis/ /bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa
yis| |chu rgyun dag gis dbang bskur te/ /de 'og bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /swAhA'i sngon du skul tshig ldan/ /bud med la ni gi wang ste/ /phyi rol mtshams bzhir phur pa
yis| |bgegs bskrad steng du bla re bre/ /phyi ma skyes pa'i ji bzhin no/ /bye brag tu yang skyes pa 'am/ /bud med zhi bar 'dod na yang / /ga pur tsan+dan dag gis ni/ /shiR+sha
shing gi shun pa la/ /'khor lo yi ge legs bris te/ /shar du nang par bltas te mchod/ /las kun byed pa'i thab la yang / /sngon gsungs zhal ldan dgod par bya/ /phyi rol
mtshams bzhir phur pa yis/ /bgegs bskrad steng du bla re bre/ /bum pa kha rgyan dang ldan zhing / /rin chen 'bru dang sman du ldan/ /dri zhim chu dang ldan par bya/ /gos bzang gis ni
mgrin pa dkri/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya/ /thang ga'am dkyil 'khor la mchod de/ /dri 'am chu dang me tog dang / /bsres pa'i skyor mes chu yang blugs/ /gzar bu stong
gis sbyin sreg bya/ /chu des gzhan yang gtor bar bya/ /bar ma chad par nyin bdun du/ /de ltar rgyun du gtor ma sbyin/ /phyi nas 'khor lo rin chen de/ /bum pa'i nang nas rnam phyung
ste| |rgyal mtshan rtse la btags nas su/ /gnas mthon por yang gzhag par bya/ /zhi bar byed par the tshom med/ /sngar bshad pa yi shing shun dang / /dur khrod ras la sgrub po
yis| |yung ba'i khu bas 'khor lo bri/ /so ma btang ba'i kham phor du/ /sgrub pa'i rkang rjes sa dag dang / /snang mdzad chu ngogs sa dag dang / /ri dang lam sa btags nas ni/ /ldong
ros dang ni yung ba yis/ /khu bas sbrus te gzugs byas la/ /'khor lo gnyis dril yung ba dang / /ldong ros kyi ni khu bas bsku/ /snying gar bcug ste gzhug par bya/ /seng ldeng
@#/ /phur pa sor brgyad pas/ /lus la sogs pa gdab par bya/ /dgra rnams 'ong ba'i lam du yang / /khung bur brkos te gzhug par bya/ /laM las dbang
chen gyis mnan cing / /suM las skyes pa de steng na/ /sna tshogs las kyis mnan pa yis/ /kham phor skud ser dkri bar bya/ /rgyal chen dag ni ser po yang / /dbang chen la
gnas lhor bltas te/ /bsgyur bya ser po'i ris mnan par/ /bsams nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /swAhA med par stam+b+ha ya/ /laM gyi mtha' can lnga stong bzlas/ /gtor ma rgyun
du sbyin par bya/ /rengs pa chen po'i las 'di yis/ /dmag gi dpung yang nges par rengs/ /'ga' tsam la ni smos ci dgos/ /sran ne lan gsum bsngags pa yis/ /dur khrod
ras la 'khor lo bri/ /rims dang dug gis zin pa ste/ /de yi steng du gzhag par bya/ /bdag nyid dkar por rnam bsams te/ /cho gas byab cing gdon par bya/ /de ni de nas zhi bar
'gyur| |ngag dag rengs par 'dod na yang / /smyo byed khu ba dur khrod sol/ /btsag rnams bsres te so ma btang / /kham phor gnyis la 'khor lo 'di/ /pho dang mo yi bskor phyogs
gnyis| |ma nor bris te kha sbyar la/ /re bsregs sa dang thal bas g.yogs/ /steng du bzlas shing spel ba ni/ /stam+b+ha na dang ku ru laM/ swAhA med pa'i sngags 'di yis/ /kha bcing
ba ni nges par 'gyur/ /gang zhig gsod par byed pa la/ /snying rjer ldan pa'i gang zag gis/ /gdug byed las 'di byed pa la/ /gshin dgra lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /zhag gcig gis
ni 'grub par byed/ /bcu bzhi nyi ma phyed pa na/ /bya rog sgro rtse'i smyu gu yis/ /dur khrod kyi ni ras dag la/ /dug dang tsha dang ske tshe dang / /nim pa tsha ba gsum dag dang / /tsha ba'i mar khu
dur khrod sol/ /smyo byed mdzub mo'i khrag gis bri/ /ro bsregs pa yi thal ba dang / /bsgrub bya'i rkang pa'i rjes kyi sa/ /mi yi rus phye la sogs pa/ /gzugs byas de yi snying gar
gzhug /dur me dag la de bsro zhing / /khros pa'i sems kyis khri bzlas na/ /skad cig tsam gyis 'chi ba ni/ /de yi khyim mam dur du sba/ /de lta'i las kyis de 'grub ste/ /mtshan mo
phyed na kha lhor blta/ /bdag nyid 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te/ /zhal sogs sngon du gsungs pa ltar/ /ma he'i steng na mche ba gtsigs/ /gsus khyim che la gyen skra 'bar/ /spu
sogs gzhan yang de 'dra'o/ /ba spu dag gi bu ga nas/ /'jigs mtshon sna tshogs thogs pa yi/ /khro bo mang po 'phro ba ste/ /bdag nyid bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/ /bsgrub bya mdun
du bsam bya ba/ /mtshams med rdzogs pa'i sdig dang ldan/ /dri ma can de phyogs gos 'chang / /grong khyer skye bos 'tshe ba can/ /grang ba'i reg pas lus la rgyas/ /mtshon gyis
@#/ /btab pa byas pa la/ /gcan gzan sogs za mdun du bsam/ /ngag tu'ang de ltar yang yang brjod/ /lcags kyi khyud mos yan lag bsdams/ /tsher
mas dbugs pa byas pa ste/ /lus ni pags pa med par bsam/ /ske tshe lan tshas lus byugs te/ /a chu ba yi sgra 'byin bsam/ /de yi mgon skyabs bsal byas nas/ /
gshin rje'i lto ba'i tha mar bzhag /be cen thogs pas de za 'o/ /'di ltar bsad pas sangs rgyas kyi/ /sras su de ni skye bar 'gyur/ /las kyi sdig las de grol lo/ /gsod
pa'i sngags de sbel ba ni/ /hUM che ge mo mA ra ya hUM/ /bsgrub bya nang dag dbye ba na/ /ma he rta yi pags pa dag /yang na ro dang dur khrod ras/ /rta dang ma he byi la 'am/ /khyi dang nim
pa'i 'dab khu dang / /khyim bya'i khrag dang skem tshe bsre/ /der ni 'khor lo 'di bris te/ /rnam par 'gras pa bskul dang ldan/ /rta spal dag gi nang bcug ste/ /ma he'i rmig
pa'i nang bcug la/ /stong phrag bcu ni tshang bar bzlas/ /nim pa'i shing bsros de nang spa/ /de nang 'gras pa nyid dang ni/ /dpag tshad brgyas mchod 'thab par 'gyur/ /a mu ki
dang a mu ki /bi dwe Sha ya phaT/ rims kyis thebs par bya ba la/ /dur khrod ko ba che ba la/ /a rka shing gi lo ma dang / /tsi tra ka dang ske tshe dang / /khrag gis 'khor lo bri bar bya//
bri ba bskos la ri mos dgang / /seng ldeng 'dab ma dug med la/ /bsro zhing khros pas lnga brgya bzla/ /khyim dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / /dur khrod sbas na rims kyis 'dzin/ /rgyas pa'i
las kyis rgyas 'dod na/ /gi wang gis ni gro ga la/ /'khor lo gnyis ni rnam bris te/ /skul tshig ldan par yi ge bri/ /zla drug thang ga'i mdun dag tu/ /gnod sbyin dang ni gnod sbyin mos//
rin chen char ni 'bebs pa dang / /gshin dgra ser po zla ser la/ /gnas par bsams te khri bzlas na/ /'phags pa nor 'dzin 'dra bar 'gyur/ /oM che go mo puSh+TiM ku ru oM/ /gro ga
sogs kyi shog shog la/ /gi wang dang ni rang byung gri /me tog dag gis bri ba ste/ /yang na tha ltag khrag dang ni/ /bil ba'i lo ma'i khu ba dang / /ras dmar po yi khu ba dang / /sen rtsi
rnams bsres bri bar bya/ /sbra tshil kyis ni 'khor lo bri/ /bum pa mar sbram ldan par bzhag /dus bzhi dag tu mchod pa ni/ /me tog dmar pos mchod pa 'o/ /de tshe bzlas pa tshul
dag ni| |ho ba shaM ku ru ho/ /de ma thag tu lha rnams kyang / /dbang du byed par nges 'gyur ro/ /gro ga dag la bri ba ni/ /zla ba gzas zin dus dag gam/ /rgyal gyi nyin par bri bya ste/ /skud
pa dmar pos 'khor lo dkri /me tog dmar pos mchod pa bya/ /thod pa kha sbyar nang bzhag ste/ /bzlas pa khris ni brgya byin gyi/ /bu mo'ang rnyed par nges 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod kyi ni
@#/ /ras dag la/ /gur gum sogs kyis 'khor lo bri/ /yi ge thig les rnam bskor te/ /a mu ki dang mA ma kI/ /mo ha na dang rnam sbel la/ /bsgrub bya'i gos
kyi mtha' ma la/ /legs btags chos kyi dbyings nyid du/ /bsgoms nas zlos shing 'gro na yang / /lha dang lha min gyis mi mthong / /bdag nyid gshin dgra nyid bsgoms pas/ /chu
yi steng nas 'gro 'dod na/ /rdul phran lha yi rnam par te/ /u D+yan du ni bdag rang nyid/ /nges par steng 'gro gzhan dag kyang / /bu mos nags kyi ras bal la/ /skud pa bkal ba
gzhon nu mas/ /sum sgril du yang de yis bya/ /gdug sngags stong du tshang bar te/ /bzlas tshul sngon du gsungs pa bzhin/ /skar ma rgyal gyi dus la bzla/ /bri ba'i nyin mo'ang
de'ang de la 'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhar brtag pa/ /g.yon gyis mdun byas gzhan la gdags/ /ma lus mtshon dag rengs byed de/ /gcer bu la yang rengs par byed/ /me
tog las ni gzhan du min/ /sha lnga sogs kyi ril bu ni/ /legs par grib ma dag la bskams/ /lcags gsum dag gis dkri bar bya/ /bzlas shing mchod pa byed pa'i tshe/ /
dngul dag gi ni rengs bzhin bya/ /'bar bar gyur pa nyid na yang / /mchod pa legs par rnam byas te/ /bskor ba brgya phrag du ma byas/ /de nas blo ldan sgrub pa pos/ /khar
bcug tsam gyis 'dod pa sgrub/ /phyung na sngon ltar rnal ma nyid/ /gso ba 'dra bar 'o mas kyang / /nges par 'khrul 'khor bkru bar bya/ /rig sngags 'khrul 'khor las grol te/ /rnal
ma nyid la gnas pa yin/ /snum ster dag gi sa bon la/ /nya lcibs dang ni byi tang ka /khu bas yang de byugs pa la/ /thod pa sas ni rnam bkang bar/ /spas te bzlas pa grangs med bya/ /de
tshe mchod dang gtor ma dag /yongs rgyas 'bras bu rnams blangs te/ /khar bcug mkha' 'gro byar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /zhus dang 'das byung gdug pa dang / /mngon par
rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par spros pa dang / /thig gis gzhal yas mtshon pa dang / /rdul tshon phyogs las rnam par brtag /yang dag byin gyis brlab pa dang / /
bdud rtsi myang bar bya ba dang / /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa dang / /sngags kyi dngos med de bzhin mtshams/ /chos 'byung dang ni sgrub po dang / /bzlas dang de yi grangs tshang dang / /'khor
lo dang ni yi ge gnyis/ /nges par zhus dang mchod pa dang / /'khor lo 'bri ba'i mtshan ma dang / /'byung ba bzhi dang bsdu sogs dang / /sdom pa 'khor lo'i yi ge bri/ /bzhi dang de bzhin
snag tsha dang / /so so las kyi bye brag ste/ /bsdus te nga yis bstan pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung po rnams la gtor mas tshim par bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
@#/ /snyoms par zhugs te sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las sngags 'di phyung ngo / /oM hrIHSh+TIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ 'byung po rnams dang rnam
spel te| |tha mar sbyar ba byas pa ni/ /hi hi hi hUM pheM pheM pheM swAhA/ dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam bzhugs pa'i/ /zhe sdang gshin gshed rdo rje ni/ /spros med nam mkha' lta bu las/ /snying
rje thabs kyis sku sprul pa/ /ye shes khro rgyal rab 'jigs pa'i/ /dud kha mun chen sku la 'dud/ /gar dgu nyams dang ldan pa yi/ /gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed/ /skye med
don dam ngang nyid las/ /thabs kyis sprul pa'i skur bstan pa/ /'jigs byed drag po'i cha lugs can/ /zla ba nya 'dra khyod la 'dud/ /bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yi/ /ser
sna gshin rje rdo rje ni/ /'dzin pa po las grol ba yis/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo sprul/ /gter 'chang ser sna grol mdzad pa/ /btso ma gser 'dra khyod la 'dud/ /chags
pas ma lus dbang mdzad pa'i/ /'dod chags gshin rdo rje ni/ /skye med rnam dag chos dbyings la/ /khams gsum pa dag khro bor sprul/ /ma chags spyan ldan thugs rje
can| |ban du lta bu'i sku la 'dud/ /shes rab thabs ldan he ru ka /phrag dog gshin rdo rje rje ni/ /rnam rtog dpe dang bral ba las/ /thugs rje'i sprul pa'i khro bo ni/ /'gro
don brtson pa'i ral gri can/ /sna tshogs mdog can khyod la 'dud/ /thams cad skyed pa'i lha mo che/ /dbang po lta bur bsgyur mdzad pa/ /khams gsum gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan/ /
rnam snang can gyis bdud bzhi 'jigs/ /bde ba chen pos rtag tu dgyes/ /ye shes spyan can khyod la 'dud/ /kun sdud lha mo rin po che/ /rnam rtog skyon las rnam grol yang / /dus
gsum bde gshegs bdag gir byed/ /rin chen tog can mdzes pa'i sku/ /don dam thugs chud 'khor ba sel/ /ma lus kun gyi bdag la 'dud/ /'dus byas ma lus sreg byed
pa| |rnam rtog zhi ba'i rang bzhin las/ /khams gsum ma lus sgrol par byed/ /'od dpag med kyis rab mdzes pa/ /ma chags phyag na bsnams pa yi/ /'phrin las dag byed can
la 'dud/ /thugs rjes g.yo ba'i rang bzhin can/ /'jig rten gsum dag sgrol bar byed/ /gnyis med bde chen ngang nyid las/ /'phrin las grub pa'i rang bzhin can/ /btang snyoms
bzhugs pas 'gro ba 'dul/ /kun tu las kyi rgyal la 'dud/ /ces gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa la so sor yongs su bstod do/ /de nas yang thams cad kyi bdag pos legs so
zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo rnams kyi sku la btud de/ gdug pa 'jigs pa'i yi ge ni/ /bcu bzhi pa la dmigs pa yang / /'khor bar dmigs par bya ba 'am/ /nyi ma'i steng na skyes
@#/ /pa ltar| |dmigs te ma yengs brjed pa med/ /bzlas pa nyid ni de ltar bya/ /bye ba tshang bar bzlas pa yis/ /rab 'byams las la mi 'grub pa/ /med de
de yis thams cad 'grub/ /'bum dang sa ya bzlas pas kyang / /phra mo'i las rnams 'grub par byed/ /gzhan du mi 'gro'i sems kyis ni/ /de lta'i tshul du bzlas pa bya/ /yul
gzhan blo ni 'gro ba yis/ /bskal par bzlas kyang 'bras mi 'byin/ /mi 'phro sems kyis 'di bzlas shing / /lam du zhugs pa'i skyes bu la/ /stag sogs chu yis mi 'jigs
so| |de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dbang gis blo sbyangs rab ldan pas/ /'bras thob de med mi 'grub ste/ /de bas de ni bshad par bya/ /bum pa'i dbang gis thog mar sbyang / /gsang
ba'i dbang gis gnyis par ste/ /gsum par bya ba de nyid ni/ /shes rab ye shes de yin te/ /de ltar de bzhin pa yin/ /brtan g.yo dngos po ma lus pa/ /bsgom par bya ba'i
dus nyid la/ /blos ni yongs su mi sgom ste/ /kun gyi mtshan nyid ma shes na/ /sgom pa kho na de min te/ /thams cad dngos nyid yongs shes na/ /de ni sgom par yongs su bsgrags//
de nyid bla ma'i kha yis te/ /'bad pas mnyes bya de mi smad/ /de la thams cad 'byung ba ste/ /bla ma la smad g.yo sgyu can/ /nges par de ni dug dang yang / /gdon chen dag ni ma
lus pas/ /'chi zhing brlags par de gyur nas/ /dmyal ba dag tu yun ring ltung / /bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal te/ /rtag tu cho nges 'debs par byed/ /de pas blo gros chen po la/ /nam
du'ang mi smad gzhan du na/ /bkur sti phu dud 'gro ba la/ /phan pa'i sems kyis de ltar bya/ /gzhan yang bsgom par bya ba nyid/ /gang dag dbang po'i lam 'gro ba/ /de de'i ngo bor bdag
gis bya/ /bsam gtan mi byed de blo yis/ /kun tu blo yis bsgom par bya/ /bcom ldan bdag po chen po yis/ /gsang dbang lag na rdo rje la/ /bos nas gsang ba'i dbyangs 'di gsungs/ /
gzugs sgra la sogs drug po rnams/ /dngos med mkha' dang 'dra ba las/ /longs spyod yul du du mar snang / /shel la tshon ni ji bzhin du/ /'dod pa lnga dang chos rnams la/ /rtag tu rnal
'byor spyod par shog /a la la ho/ /rol du gsol/ bsnams par mdzod/ mi 'dzin sgyu ma lta bu la/ /gar gyis dgyes pa'i rol pa mdzod/ /rig bya dgag pa med pa la/ /mi g.yo
bzhin du rol par mdzod/ /ho/ chags pa med pas chags par mdzod/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /sngags dang phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i/ /de yi mtshan nyid bshad pa'i phyir/ /gsung
ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /lce la sgom pa'i rdo rje ni/ /rdo rje gnod mdzes nag po ste/ /kha ni kun tu gyes pa yi/ /lag gnyis thal mo nges sbyar te/ /gung mo'i rtsa ba'i tshigs nyid la/ /mthe
@#/ /bong nges par sbyar bar bya/ /mdzub mo gung mo'i rgyab rtser sbyar/ /'di ni dam tshig phyag rgya ste/ /snying ga dpral ba lkog ma dang / /spyi bor byin gyis brlabs par
bya| |oM hrIHSh+TIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ gzhan yang rdo rje sems ma sogs/ /phyag rgyas dbang bskur dbu rgyan brtag /gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa/ /so so'i
bdag po dbu brgyan cing / /dbang bskur tshe na bum pa che/ /phyag gis bsnams te dbang bskur ro/ /'khor lo las kun byed pa la/ /gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis/ /bstod pa'i
rgyal po 'di yis bstod/ /gdug pa skrag byed 'khor lo me ltar 'bar/ /dus gsum khro rgyal he ru yi thugs/ /las rnams dag byed phrag dog rdo rje ste/ /ma lus tshems gcod
gsol bas sku yi dang / /hUM dang phaT kyi gdug rtsub sbyor bas gsung / /kun gyi rang bzhin khyod kyis gshin rje yi/ /ltor 'dzud bka' las des kyang mi 'da' zhing / /phyogs
bcu'i sprul pas gnas na 'gugs mdzad pa/ /ma lus kun byed 'khor lo che mchog la/ /gzhan gyi don rdzogs gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni dpa' bo thub chen kun
gyi bdud/ /nga yis lam bstan bdud rnams mi phyed kyang / /dam las 'da' zhing log pa kun skyed la/ /khyod kyang bka' las ma 'da' las rnams sgrubs/ /tshe dang srog bsdus
yan lag rnam par bcings/ /bdud rtsi chu rgyun rnal 'byor ngal la 'dod bsgrub na/ /ngas ni sbyin bya khyod ni dam las ma 'da' zhig /ces dpal gshin rje dgra nag po'i 'khor lo
gzhan gyi lto ba la gnas 'cha' bar 'dod pa'i gtan 'pho ba ma yin pa'i tshe bya'o/ /'khor lo snying gar lta ba'i tshe/ /sa bon tshul te lte ba la/ /yi ge ma lus 'dod pa yang / /mtshan nyid
ngan pa'i rtog pa las/ /grol te mtha' gsum ngo bo las/ /k+Sha ni zad pa'i bdag nyid la/ /u ni hUM gi bdag nyid de/ /de ni sems kyi rang bzhin nyid/ /dga' las 'das pa'i ye shes
te| |thabs ni shes rab ldan pa las/ /dus thabs bsten pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /'thob ste gzhan du de mi 'thob/ /chu 'gram chen pos bas mtha' dang / /dur khrod shing drung dgon pa
ste| |dben pa'i yul dang mo'i khyim/ /der ni mgon po 'di la 'bad// gzhan du bsgrub kyang de mi 'grub/ /skad cig de la rang bzhin kun/ /nges par mi snang rig pa yi/ /lam
du gyur pa med par shes/ /'bras bu de ni rgya chen te/ /mtha' yi 'thob pa da yin no/ /de nas yang thams cad kyi bdag po bde bar gshegs pas rdo rje cho ga gsungs pa ni/ /skyob
pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /srung ba'i dkyil 'khor rab gnas pas/ /sdang ba'i log
@#/ /'dren skye bo dang / /bgegs rnams bsal ba 'di skad gsungs/ /dpal ldan bdag ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ /bdag gis ye
shes rdo rje yis/ /lus ngag yid du bcas pa dag /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni/ /khro bo gshin rje nag po'i bdag /slob dpon gyi ni dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhes lan gsum gyi
bar du brjod par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni drung nyid du/ /dar gyis gdong ni bkab pa la/ /sgo drung gnas pa khyod gang yin/ /slob dpon gyis ni rab brjod do/ /de bdag skal pa
ldan par brjod/ /ji ltar bla med dpa' bo yis/ /mgon la dbang ni bskur ba bzhin/ /bla med byang chub gnas bya'i phyir/ /bdag la'ang mgon pos dbang bskur gsol/ /me tog
sogs te mchod pa'i mchog /rab 'byams rgya mtsho ma lus pas/ /slob dpon dpa' bo de nyid la/ /yang yang mchod cing bstod pa'i tshogs/ /rgyas par mnyes bya de 'og tu/ /dpa'
bos de la dbang rnams sbyin/ /de nas rgyal po bde chen po/ /dpa' bo longs spyod kun ldan pa/ /'gro don brtson pa'i sku gsum bdag /nyid kyis 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /sbyin
sreg med na 'bras mi 'byin/ /de bas bdag nyid dam pa yis/ /de yi las la 'bad par bya/ /gos nag rgyan gyis rnam brgyan la/ /gshin rjer rnam bltas rnal 'byor pas/ /khro bo'i
skyil krung bcas pa yis/ /sra ba'i stan la bdag 'dug nas/ /las rnams bsgrub par bya ba ni/ /mtshan mo 'am nyi ma phyed nyid la/ /rang byung me yi dkyil 'khor du/ /hUM phaT mtha' na yod
ba yi| |sngags kyis thog ma bar tha mar/ /sbyin sreg bya ste de me ni/ /dur khrod me 'am rus pa 'am/ /rdo nyid las ni byung ba 'am/ /tsaN+Da li yi khyim nyid nas/ /thab khung gru gsum can der
ni| |tsher ma can gyi bud shing brdzang / /rlung yab sbar te hUM dz+wa la raM/ /dza la hUM brjod me sbar brjod/ /lag g.yas ku sha bcas pa yis/ /mthe bong srin lag rtsa ru gzugs/ /oM e h+ye hi

ma hA b+hU ta de ba ri Shi dwi dza sat+ta ma gri hi twa a hUM ti a hA raM asma ni saM ni hi to b+ha ba zhes brjod la spyan drang ngo / /'bar ba me yi dbus nyid du/ /ming de zad byed ces bya ba/ /khro bo me ltar phun
sum tshogs/ /ba spu kham pa de bzhin du/ /du mdog zur mig steng du gzigs/ /sgra che mche bzhi ldan stobs che/ /yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/ /bzhugs nas drag po'i yi ge
brjod| |spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /rig pa'i gnas la legs par bzhugs/ /zhal bdun rnam gtsegs ma he la/ /bcibs pa du ba'i phreng rnams 'khrigs/ /phyag gnyis mdung
dang rdo rje 'dzin/ /gnyis kyis ral gri gri gug 'dzin/ /de yi g.yas kyi phyogs nyid du/ /de bzhin mdun gyi phyogs nyid dam/ /spyan drangs byin rlabs ldan pa la/ /ar+g+haM sogs kyis mchod
@#/ /pa bya| |oM ar+g+haM pra tI ts+tsha swAhA/ lag g.yas mdzub mo mthe bong dag /skam pa lta bur rnam byas pas/ /chu blangs bskyod pas dbul bar bya/ /oM ba t+yaM mthar
ni sngon gyi brjod/ /zhabs bkru ba la shis pa yin/ /dgang gzar yu ba sor bcu drug /de min sor bzhi zabs sor gnyis/ /zur gsum dbus su sor gnyis tshad/ /rtse gsum
phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /de yi dbus su'ang mtshan ma ste/ /stag sbrul gang 'dod pas mtshan bya/ /khu bcud 'dzag pa sor gcig go /khro bo rdo rje mchu yi dbyibs/ /byin rlabs
sor gcig tshad can no/ /blugs gzar yu ba sor bcu bzhi/ /zabs su sor gcig gru gsum dang / /yu ba'i mthar ni rtse gsum pa/ /gdengs pa byin rlabs mngon spyod kyi/ /
gzar bu yin par nga yis bstan/ /gnam lcags tsher ma can sogs shing / /de la de byas sangs rgyas 'jigs/ /bsreg rdzas gzugs brnyan la sogs sreg /stong du tshang
bas 'bras bu ni/ /nges par 'byin par byed pa yin/ /g.yon gyi rtsa der dgang gzar la/ /g.yas pa blugs pa'i gzar bu yin/ /kha ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma yin/ /sor mo gnyis
par de rgyas so/ /rdo rje bar gyi thod pa dag /bsreg rdzas kyi ni snod yin la/ /rdzas rnams rdo rje rin chen dpa'/ /hUM phaT kyi ni mtha' can gyis/ /bsreg bya sa chu me dang rlung / /nam
mkha' lta bu'i dbus su gnas/ /kha bye gnas pa rtag tu 'o/ /kun tu'ang kha bye bskor bar bya/ /bzhi gnyis 'dab ma'i steng du ste/ /lte ba dang ni yang dag ldan/ /lhan cig rnam par shes
pa'i lha| |nam mkha'i nyid du nges par 'bar/ /de yi mtshan mar shes bya ba/ /rdul gyi rnam par de nyid do/ /thig le yi ge med pa ste/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'od kyis gnas/ /brgyar
bshags skra yi tshad kyis so/ /arkas rab tu sbar bar bya/ /sngar gsungs 'byung ba rnam bzhi dang / /nam mkha' yang dag ldan pa yis/ /sor mo lnga dang nges ldan pas/ /gang gi sbyin
sreg des bya'o/ /gzhan dag sor mo gsum gyis bsres/ /dmigs pa thams cad 'gags par 'gyur/ /rten med stong pa nam mkha' 'dra/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi/ /phyag rgya
chen po dbang du 'gyur/ /bde gshegs kun dang mnyam 'gyur ba/ /shes rab dang ni snying rje ches/ /'gag pa med pa'i chos 'gyur ro/ /bde chen nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /rnal 'byor pa
yi dmigs pa yin/ /mdog nag 'dab brgyad lta bu la/ /rgya dang zabs su sor mo ni/ /nyi shu de bzhi bcu pa'i thab/ /byang du rtse mo bstan pa la/ /rdo rje tho ba'i mtshan ma de/ /sor ni bzhi par
bri bar bya/ /de steng sor mo gsum bor bar/ /kha khyer kyang ni de yi tshad/ /sa nag bong bu rnga mo'i spangs/ /mi rus 'bras kyi phub ma dang / /sol ba'i phye mas rnam byugs la/ /mi zhim dri
@#/ /dang bdug pas mchod/ /dur khrod shing ngam bong bu dang / /rnga mo'i sbang bskams bud shing ngo / /sor gcig gis ni dma' ba yin/ /nim pa de bzhin seng
ldeng dang / /se ba de bzhin bse shing dang / /dur khrod shing bu sor bcu pa/ /rtsa ba'i cha las rnam byung ba/ /dur khrod mar khu rnams bsnyugs la/ /de yis yam shing bya ba yin/ /bya
rog 'ug pa'i gshog pa dang / /nim pa'i 'dab ma thal ba dang / /rkang rjes sa dang bong bu dang / /rnga mo sogs kyi sbang dang ni/ /skra dang zhag dang bshad pa dang / /gci ba mi rus
yungs kar dang / /yungs mar khrag dang lan tshwa dang / /de la sogs pa re re zhing / /ji ltar rnyed pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /dug dang khrag dang smyo byed kyi/ /'dab khu thal ba sol ba
dang / /'bras kyi phub ma la sogs la/ /dgra bo dag gi gzugs byas la/ /mgo nas brtsams te ral gri yis/ /dum bur gtub cing lcags phor du/ /khrag dang chu dang
mi rnams dang / /bong bu'i gcin la phaT ldan pa'i/ /gdug pa'i yi ge rnams bzlas pa'i/ /rdzas la gsang gtor byas nas kyang / /slob dpon la sdang rmongs pa 'di/ /brjod
cing sbyin sreg dbul bar bya/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /'byung ba tshim bya gtor ma dang / /bstod bzlas mnyes par bya ba dang / /dbang gi dbye ba bstan pa dang / /dkyil
'khor 'jug par bya ba dang / /de yi sa la mchod pa sogs/ /cod pan du ni bde gshegs bzhag /mngon spyod hom gyi cho ga dang / /bsdus nas bar du rnam pa brgyad/ /pad+ma dkar
'dra mgrin pa ring / /gzugs mdzes ha cang ring ba min/ /lus la rdul 'byung yid 'phrog ma/ /dri ni shin tu'ang zhim pa yin/ /lta stangs mig sogs ri dwags 'dra/ /mgrin dang lto
ba'ang ri dwags kyi/ /skal bzang rked pa'ang ri dwags kyi/ /glang chen dri ldan bzhin 'phel che/ /myos shing nu ma rab tu rgyas/ /gzhan yang kun rdzob bden pa ni/ /bong thung de yi skra yang thung //
rkang lag ring zhing bzhin ring ma/ /nya yi dri bro bong ring ma/ /zla 'dra skye gnas rab tu ring / /skyes gnas chung zhing yan lag rtsub/ /bong ring de bzhin nu ma mkhrang / /skra srab dal smra yan
lag chung / /sngo bsangs ri mo mnyam pa de/ /gsang ba shes rab rnam gnyis la/ /rig mar nga yis bsgrags pa yin/ /ngang pa'i 'gros can skra 'khyil ma/ /bzhin zlum nu rgyas lus
kyang rgyas/ /shin tu ring min dal bar smra/ /dbus nas rna 'phyang gnyer gsum can/ /mtshan nyid ngan zhing le lo che/ /yan lag nag cing skra 'khyil ma/ /khang par gnas shing lus
rtsub ma| |sA la'i dri 'byung sA la'i bro/ /nu spangs de ni skyes bu bzhin/ /chang gis myos pa'i dpa' mo ste/ /chang la shin tu chags pa yin/ /de gnyis de la shis pa yin/ /tha ma tha mar
@#/ /nges par yin/ /'chi ba'i bsam gtan de nyid ni/ /bde ba dam par kho bos 'dod/ /'di la'ang bde ba de nyid yin/ /ka sogs spangs pa'i A li ni/ /bcu
drug yin te phrag gnyis po/ /'khor lo sogs pa'i sa bon yin/ /zla ba de dag sum cu gnyis/ /a sogs spangs pa'i kA li ste/ /bcu bdun gnyis pa de steng du/ /ya sogs
spangs pa min pa nyid/ /gsum pa'i gsum dang bzhi pa'i gnyis/ /bcu phrag bzhi ste de phrag gnyis/ /sen mo zangs sogs sa bon te/ /nyi mar rnam bsgrags de dbus gnas//
hUM dang a yi rang bzhin las/ /rdo rje tho sogs so sor rtog /thim pas nan tan ye shes te/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid dag pa ste/ /gshin dgrar bdag nyid 'dod pa yin/ /rgyan gyi
bye brag lus la gnas/ /de ni 'di skad bya ba ste/ /rig pa shes rab bstan pa dang / /skyed pa'i rgyu yi bye brag ni/ /tha mar bsten te sdom gsum mo/ /mtshon par byed pa'i bdag nyid
de| |mtshon bya sngon bstan nyid yin no/ /gshin rje gshed nag po'i las thams cad grub par byed pa'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta b+ha ro phyag rdum gyi
zhal snga nas rwa rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra ma hA b+he ra wa nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i
rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po khros pa'i rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi/ /sgrub pa yang dag rab bshad de/ /de ni lha rnams thams cad la//
drag shul che zhing 'jigs par byed/ /de la thog mar sngags pas yid du 'ong ba'i gnas gang yang rung ba'i gnas la dgod pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /de la gnas gsungs pa ni/ /dur khrod
dam| chu klung gi 'gram mam/ shing gcig gam/ mtshan ma gcig pa'am/ bzhi mdo'am/ ri'i rtse mo'am/ khang stong ngam/ ma mo'i khyim mam/ lha'i khang pa'am/ 'thab mo'i gnas sam/
grong khyer ram/ nags khrod dam/ /grong la sogs pa'i gnas su sngags pa gnas te/ rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i ming gi rgyud 'dir dbang bskur ba'i rnal 'byor pas
dbang dang / dgug pa dang / bsad pa dang / bskrad pa dang / dbye ba dang / rengs pa dang / ral gri dang / mig sman dang / sa 'og dang / ril bu dang / gser 'gyur dang / bcud kyis len pa
dang / nor dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / klu la sogs pa'i cho ga 'dis bsgrub par bya'o/ /de la cho ga ni/ dang por re zhig sngags
pas ro bsregs pa'i thal chen gyis lus byugs te mtshan phyed na gcer bu skra bsil ba byas la 'phags pa ma he'i gdong can gyi rnal 'byor gyis dur khrod la sogs par dkyil
@#/ /'khor bris te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /dril bu dar gyi 'phan la sogs/ /me tog phreng bas rnam par klubs/ /gra
rnams dag ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni phug dag tu/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis spras pa/ /zla ba phyed pa de bzhin no/ /de dbus 'khor lo bri ba ni/ /re'u mig dgu pa zlum po'o/ /sgo
gcig pa ni dbye bar bya/ /lhag ma yongs su gcad par bya/ /de dbus mi ro bri bar bya/ /shar du mgo bo lhor lag pa/ /nub tu rgyu ma byang du rkang pa/ shar lho'i grar thod pa/ lho nub tu
thod tshal/ nub byang du dur khrod kyi ra sa/ /byang shar du skyes bu gsal shing la btsugs pa'o/ /de dag ni/ 'khor lo'i dbus su mtshan ma'i phyag rgya lnga'o/ /de nas 'khor lo'i phyi
rol gyi phyag rgya rnams ni/ /shar phyogs kyi snam bu la gri gug dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / gtun shing dang / chu gri dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / lcags kyu la sogs pa
rnams bri'o/ /lho phyogs kyi snam bu la sta re dang / mda' dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / dbyug to dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje zhags pa la sogs pa bri'o/ /nub phyogs kyi snam bu la rdo rje
dang / ral gri dang / gri chung dang / phub dang / gzhu dang / dril bu dang / rlung gi ba dan la sogs pa bri'o/ /byang phyogs kyi snam bu la sdigs mdzub dang / 'phan rtse gsum pa dang /
glang po'i lags pa dang / rdo rje tho ba dang / mdung dang / me thab la sogs pa bri'o/ /sgo bzhi dang gra rnams la ro langs chen po bri'o/ /gal te mchog gi dngos grub 'dod na mar khu chen
po'i mar me dbul lo/ /mi dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / khyi dang / wa dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang / ba men dang / lug dang / ri dwags dang / phag pa la sogs pa'i
sha rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang bya rgod dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / khra dang / chu skyar dang / mthing ril dang / bzhad dang / rma bya dang / khyim bya dang / re skegs dang / khyung
chen po la sogs pa'i sha rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bza' ba dang / ston mo dang / sbyin sreg dang / gtor ma'i las bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi gra thams cad
du khrag gis chag chag bya'o/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed ma he'i gdong gi sbyor ba la gnas pas lha bshos thams cad dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas sngags bas sngon du spyad pa byas te bdag
zhi bar gyur pa'i shin tu mthun pa'i grogs sam/ bdag gcig bu rnam par snang mdzad kyis lus byugs te gcer bur phud nas skra bsil/ mtshan phyed na cang te'u bkrol la ha ha zhes bya
zhing mnyam par bzhag ste/ rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dngos grub 'dod pas 'jug par bya'o/ /rab tu zhim pa'i chad la sogs pa btung ba dang / bza' ba'i ro rnams
@#/ /dbul lo/ /phyi nas dngos grub dang / dngos grub ma yin pa la dmigs la de'i steng du dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can bsam par bya'o/ /de'i
mdun du g.yas bskum du gnas la nga rgyal dang bcas pas sems rtse gcig tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas 'jigs pa chen po byung
na| de la sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya ste/ gal te 'jigs par gyur na/ de la bgegs chen po'i bar chod 'byung ngo / /bar chad byung na dngos grub mi 'grub bo/ /de bas na sngags
pas 'jigs par mi bya ste/ de la dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dgyes so/ /dgyes nas khyod ci 'dod ces gsungs pa dang / de la rig 'dzin gyis smra bar bya ste/ ral gri dang /
sa 'og dang / mig sman dang / gser 'gyur dang / bcud kyis len pa'am/ de las gzhan yang yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub nges par bdag la stsol cig ces brjod na/ de la
the tshom med par stsol lo/ /brgya zhig la sngags pas de dag ma grub na yang de'i phra mo'i las thams cad nges par 'grub bo/ /'di ni/ 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i ming dpal rdo rje
'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo'i sbyor ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor bstan ba ste rtog pa dang po'o// //de nas las kyi tshogs kyi cho ga rab tu bshad de/ rim pa ji lta ba
bzhin du bsad pa dang / bskrad pa la sogs pa sngags pa khros pas dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sbyor ba la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis bya ste/ dang po kho nar sngags bas re
zhig gnod mdzes su bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnal 'byor gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas thog mar ni/ de bya ste/ de sbyor ba'i gtso bo yin
pa'i phyir ro/ /de la 'di'i las ni/ ji ltar bsad par 'dod pa'i sngags pas dur khrod kyi ras la dug dang / khrag dang / lan tshwa dang / ske tshe dang / nim pa dang / d+ha du ra'i khu bas rdo rje
'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo le tshe bcu drug pa bya rog chen po'i sgro rtsa'i smyu gu'am/ mi'i rus pa'i smyu gus gcer bu skra bshig pas kha lhor bltas te ma he'i gdong gi sbyor
pas bri bar bya'o/ /me gnyis kyi dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas par bzhag la de yi ge bcu pas bskor zhing hUM brgyad bri/ zur rnams su phaT kyi yi ge rnams bri/ bdag nyid
tsha ba'i mar gyis lus byugs la thod pa gnyis kyi dbus su 'khrul 'khor rab tu bcug la sgyed bu gsum gyi steng du bzhag nas dur khrod kyi mgal bas me rab tu spar te/ rkang pa
g.yon pas mnan la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzla'o/ /des skad cig gis the tshom med par 'chi'o/ /gzhan yang rims kyis thebs par 'dod na/ 'khor lo de nyid mi'i nya phyis gnyis
@#/ /kyi dbus su legs par bzhag la me thab kyi 'og tu khru phyed brkos la bcug nas me spar na rims nad kyis 'dzin no/ /de la le tshe bcu drug pa'i rab tu
sbyor ba 'di gsungs te/ 'on kyang 'di'i khyad par ni/ yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i sngags dang ldan pa yi ge btu pa'i sngags bsgrub bya'i ming dang lhan cig tu yi ge dang sngags
spel lo| |sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas dang lhan cig tu bya rog gis btogs pa'i lhag ma mi gtsang ba dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang lhan cig tu dur khrod kyi ras la byugs te/
de la sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas 'khor lo bris te dur khrod du spas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /shing gcig gi drung du spas na bskrad par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ma gcig par spas na dbye
bar 'gyur ro/ /chu'i nang du spas na rengs par 'gyur ro/ /khyim du bzhag na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /phyung nas legs par bkrus na grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba
gsungs pa gshin rje'i 'khor lo sngon gyi cho gas dur khrod kyi ras la bris te/ dur khrod dam/ lam bzhi mdo dang / shing gcig dang / grog mkhar dang / chu 'gram dang /
mtshan ma gcig pa dang / rgyal po'i sgo dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje chu dang / dur khrod kyi sol bas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan tshad sor brgyad pa byas la de'i snying
gar 'khor lo'i sngags bcug ste/ mi'i rus pa'i phur bus gnas lngar gdab par bya'o/ /tshigs thams cad la tsher ma rnon pos dgang bar bya'o/ /de thod pa gnyis kyi dbus su
bcug ste/ de grog mkhar dang gnas bdun gyi sas gshin rje'i gzugs khru gang tsam zhal gtsigs pa/ gsus pa che ba/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ phyag na ral gri dang /
zhags pa 'dzin pa/ gcer bu skra bsil ba byas la/ de'i snying gar thod pa gnyis bcug ste/ nyi ma phyed dam nam phyed na dur khrod dam ro bsregs pa'i sar spas te/ shin tu ring
par mgo lhor bstan la kha thur du phub la spa'o/ /khyim du 'ongs pa dang mnyam par bzhag pas ma he'i gdong gi sbyor bas bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags
bzlas pa byas na nyi ma gsum gyis 'chi'o/ /phyung nas bkrus na thar par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rengs pa'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs te/ te'u lo pa'i pags pa la dug la sogs pa'i
rdzas kyis yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bris la/ pags pa de bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi rdul dang / gcin btang ba'i shul gyi sas bkang la de'i skras bcing bar bya'o/ /phyi nas bong bu'i gcin
dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang lhan cig tu brdzis la kham phor dgang bar bya'o/ /der 'khor lo bcug la ro bsregs pa'i me la bzhag ste/ rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la gshin
@#/ /rje'i sbyor bas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas ba byas na zhag gcig gis rengs par byed do/ /'di ni/ phyis rjes su gzung ba mi 'grub pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'o//
sngags pas shin tu khros pas rab tu sbyor bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang dbye ba'i rab tu sbyor ba 'di ni/ gshin rje'i 'khor lo sngon gyi cho gas bris la/ gnas bdun gyi sas ma he dang rta
byas te| de gnyis gcig gi steng du gcig bzhag la/ de gnyis kyi snying gar 'khor lo bcug ste nim pa'i shing drung du bzhag go /'khor lo yang ma he dang rta'i khrag gis bri ste/
'di ni| sngags kyi bye brag ste/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas byas na zhag gsum gyis 'byed par byed do/ /de nas sngags pas bskrad par 'dod na/ gnas bdun gyi sas rnga mo byas
la/ de'i rgyab tu yi ge yaM yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa dmigs te/ de'i steng du bsgrub bya dmigs la/ de'i rgyab tu gshin rje'i gzugs lag
pas dbyug pa 'dzin par dmigs te/ de'i dbyug pas rdeg cing kha lho ru bltas nas khrid par rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /'khor lo de de'i snying gar gong du gsungs pa'i cho ga las
bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba yang dag par bris la bcug na/ zhag bdun gyi the tshom med par skrod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba gsungs te/ nyi ma'i tshes
la gtum po tsha ba'i mar khus byugs la nim pa'i shing la 'dzegs nas der bzhag la de'i lus kyi mar khu nya phyis kyis bzhar la der gnas par gzung ngo / /mar khu de blangs nas
lha chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi ras blangs la de bsregs pa'i bar gyi du ba'i dreg pa de dang / mar khu de gcig tu byas la bskrad par 'dod pa de'i mchil lham la bsku'o/ /de'i lag pa
dang rkang pa gnyis la yang byugs na skad cig gis de skrod do/ /de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa ni/ /dur khrod kyi ras sam/ gro ga'i lo ma la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bya rog gi khrag dang
bya rog gi smyu gus bri bar bya ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dang sbel te gtor ma za ba'i mgrin par bcings la/ bya rog bzung nas ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor bar
gnas pas kha lhor bltas la 'phang ste/ de'i skad cig gis bya rog bzhin sa kun tu 'khor ro/ /gzhan yang bskrad pa ni/ tsha ba'i mar khus bskus la nim pa'i shing las gtor ma za
pa'i tshang blangs la/ tshang de'i shing pha'i nags kyi shing mes bsregs pa'i thal ba de blangs la gang gi mgor blugs pa de skrod par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dbye ba'i rab tu sbyor ba ni/ bya
rog dang 'ug pa'i gshog pa dang / bram ze dang / gtum po rnams kyi skra gcig tu byas la/ d+ha du ra'i shing la me rab tu spar te du ba med pa'i mes bsregs la/ de'i thal ba blangs la
@#/ /yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas nas bud med dang skyes pa gnyis kyi bar du thal ba bzhag na/ de skad gcig gis 'byed par byed do/ /de nas dur khrod kyi ras
blangs la dug la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis bran pa'i bar du bsgrub bya'i ming bris la zer mo dang / sbrul gyi sbu dang pags pa blangs te/ de la bcug nas sdong bu byas te/ gang gi khyim
du spar ba der phan tshun 'thab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bsad par 'dod pa ni/ bshang gci la gzugs brnyan byas la/ de'i steng du rus ba phye mas rab tu byugs la dur khrod kyi me
la skra bshig pa byas la kha lhor bltas te ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor bas nam phyed na de gtubs la bsreg go /gang gi ming dang bcas par byas na de skad cig gis 'chi'o/ /rdo rje 'jigs
byed chen po nyid kyi rab tu sbyor ba 'di gsungs so/ /de nas bskrad par 'dod pas rgyal mtshan gyi ras la le tshe bcu drug pa'i 'khor lo la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags sngon du gsungs
pa'i rdzas dang dur khrod kyi sol bas gang gi ming dang bcas pa bris te/ nim pa'i shing la rgyal mtshan bzhag na de skrod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rengs par 'dod pas gshin rje'i
'khor lo g.yam pa'am ras la ba bla dang yung bas gang gi ming dang bcas pa legs par bris la bzhag na/ de rengs par 'gyur ro/ /gal te sngags pas dbang du bya bar 'dod
na| grog mkhar gyis dang / gum gum dang / gi wang dang / ba bla dang / yung ba rnams lhan cig tu byas te/ bsgrub bya pho'am gal te mo'i gzugs brnyan tshad sor bcu drug pa byas
la| gi wang dang / srin lag gi khrag gis gro ga la gshin rje'i 'khor lo bris te de'i snying gar bcug nas rang gi khyim du bzhag la me tog dmar po dus gsum du dbul ba dang / kha nub
tu bltas la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas na/ zhag bdun gyis brgya byin yang dbang du 'gyur na/ phra mo'i mi lta ci smos/ de nas yang dgug par 'dod na/ de la thod pa la 'khor lo
gi wang dang srin lag gi khrag gis bris te/ seng ldeng gi me la bsro zhing gang bya ba'i ming dang bcas par bzlas na/ de skad cig gis rlung gi shugs bzhin du 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ /de
nas sngags pas smyos par bya bar 'dod na/ d+ha du ra'i 'bras bu blangs la sha chen dang lhan cig tu shing srin gyis zos pa'i phye ma dang bsres nas bza' ba dang btung ba la sbyin no/ /sngags
kyang bzlas pa bya ste/ de skad cig gis smyo bar 'gyur zhing zhag bdun gyis 'chi'o/ /de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa/ gshin rje'i sngags dur khrod kyi ras la dug la sogs
