pa'i rdzas kyis bris te/ mar me chen po dang rnam par rnam mdzad kyi gzugs brnan byas la/ de'i snying gar 'khor lo bcug nas pha'i gnas su song la ro bsregs pa'i me la mtshon rnon
@#/ /pos gtubs nas rnam par brtsegs pa'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor ba gnas la/ rnam par snang mdzad kyis lus byugs te kha lhor bltas nas bsregs na/
de myur du 'chi'o/ /de nas dpral ba'i rab tu byung ba ni/ bya rog dang 'ug pa'i rus pa blangs la de gnyis la lcags kyi tsher mas bsgrub bya'i ming dang lhan cig tu yi ge bcu
pa'i sngags bris la gcig pu gnas su gnas te gang gi ming dang bcas par bzlas shing / de gcig la gcig brud na 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gshin rje'i 'khor lo
gro ga'i 'dab ma la bud med dang skyes pa'i ming bris nas spal ba'i gsus par bcug nas gang gi ming dang bcas pa them pa'i 'og tu spas na/ de'i yan lag mtshon gyis
'bugs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas pu bo rengs pa'i rab tu sbyor pa 'di gshin rje'i sngags dur khrod kyi ras la dug la sogs pas bris la/ ro bsregs pa'i sol bas gzugs
brnyan mtho gang tsam gyi tshad brtsigs la/ de'i snying gar 'khor lo bcug nas rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la/ ma he'i sbyor bas che ge mo'i bu mo myur bar rengs par gyur/
cig ces yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas na rengs par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i las rnams ni/ gzhan su la yang smra bar mi bya'o/ /gal te sngags pa rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can
gyis na/ dmyal bar nges par ltung ngo / /dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dang / /bla ma la brnyas par byed pa dang / dam tshig dang bral ba dang / sngags dang rgyud la 'phya
bar byed pa dang / sems can la 'tshe ba 'di rnams la phan pa'i phyir sngags pas snying rje gdungs pa'i sems kyis gnod pa rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /gal te gzhan la byas na
dam tshig nyams nas tsha ba chen por 'gro'o/ /ngas rgyud gzhan du'ang bshad de/ slob dpon la ni smad byed dang / theg pa chen po skur pa dang / /sngags rgyud rab sbyor ye shes la//
'phya bar byed pa'i mi gang dag /de ni 'bad pa gsad par bya/ /yang na gnas nas g.yo bar bya/ /rnal 'byor snying rje med pa yis/ /gzhan la rung rung byas na ni/ /de la de bzhin
las de ni/ /phyir ldog par ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ci phyir sems can mtho brtsam phyir/ /rnal 'byor pa ni 'di la'o/ /'di ni/ 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed
chen po'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las/ las thams cad grub pa'i rtog pa ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas go rim ji lta ba'i cho gas sngags btu ba rab tu gsungs te/ rab tu
gtsang ba'i yul khams su sngags pas gnas la sngags btu bar bya ste/ ji ltar drug pa'i dang po dang / /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /drug pa yi ni gnyis pa la/ /dbyangs yig gnyi
@#/ /pa dang ldan pa/ /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /yang ni dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan/ /bdun pa yi yang gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa yi yang gsum pa la//
dbyangs yig bcu gsum dang ldan pa/ /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa la/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig dang ldan pa/ /drug pa yi ni dang po dang / /drug pa'i dang po nyis 'gyur dang / /yang
ni rlung gi sa bon sbyin/ /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa la/ /bcu dang gcig gis mnan ldan pa/ /bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /bcu gsum pa yis mnyam mnan pa/ /drug pa yi yang
gnyis pa la/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa dang ldan pa/ /gsum pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /rlung gi sa bon de nas sbyin/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum yang dag ldan/ /bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa
dang / /de nas rlung gi sa bon sbyin/ /drug pa yi yang dang po dang / /bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /de la rlung gi sa bon ni/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa dang ldan/ /bzhi pa yi ni
lnga pa la| |dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa/ /de nas me yi sa bon sbyin/ /rlung gi sa bon de bzhin no/ /de nas yi ge tha ma sbyin/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan/ /rlung
gi sa bon de bzhin mchog /drug pa yi ni dang po dang / /de nas yi ge tha ma sbyin/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan/ /yang ni rlung gi sa bon dang / /gnyis pa yi ni dang po
dang / /de ni nyis 'gyur ldan par bya/ /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa/ /de nas me yi sa bon dang / /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /de nas rlung gi sa bon sbyin/ /dang
por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin/ /mchog gi dbang phyug dang sbyar ba/ /lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa yi ni dang po ni/ /mkhas pas lan gnyis brjod par bya/ /'di ni 'jam
dpal zhes bya ba'i/ /'jigs byed chen po rgyud 'khor lo/ /ma he gdong can rtsa sngags te/ /'bum bzlas pa yis las kun byed/ /'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi
'gyur ro/ /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /dbyangs yig bzhi pa dang ldan pa/ /me yi sa bon 'og tu sbyin/ /de nas mnga' bdag bcu drug mtha'/ /bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa la/ /dbyangs
yig bzhi pa dang ldan zhing / /gsum pa yi ni dang po la/ /'og tu me yi sa bon gdags/ /mnga' bdag bcu drug mtha' ma ste/ /drug pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa dang
ldan pa| |dang po yi yang dang po dang / /dbyangs yig bdun pa dang ldan pa/ /'og tu me yi sa bon sbyin/ /bzhi pa yi ni dang po la/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa/ /bzhi pa yi ni lnga
pa ni| |mkhas pa yis ni lan gnyis brjod/ /dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin/ /ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon la/ /dbyangs yig drug pa dang ldan la/ /spyi bo ru ni thig les brgyan//
@#/ /lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa yi ni dang po'o/ /'di ni sngags kyi rgyal bo ste/ /ma he'i gdong can sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad las ni byed pa 'o/ /
las kyi sngags su grags pa ste/ /sum 'bum bzlas na las kun byed/ /drug pa yi ni dang po dang / /lnga pa yi yang lnga ba la/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa/ /bzhi pa yi ni dang po
ste| |de yi lnga pa klad du gzhag /dang po yi ni dang po dang / /dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin/ /ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon la/ /dbyangs yig drug pa dang ldan pa/ /spyi bo ru ni thig
las brgyan/ /lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa yi ni dang po'o/ /'di ni ma he gdong can gyi/ /snying po'i sngags su rab tu grags/ /yi ge re re 'bum bzlas na/ /'jig rten gsum
gyi las ni gang / /ci yang rung ba thams cad byed/ /sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i dus 'dir mchod par bya'o/ /'di ni/ 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal
'byor gyi rgyud las/ sngags btu ba bstan pa'i rtog pa ste gsum pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa yang dag par bshad de/ chos thams cad la bdag
med pa sngon du 'gro bas lhar dmigs par bya ste/ dang por re zhig rang bzhin gyis dag ba'i sngags brjod pas/ chos thams cad bdag med pa'i ngo bor byas nas nam mkha'i
dkyil du yaM gyi rnam pa las grub ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor mdog du ba'i rnam pa bsam mo/ /de'i steng du dang po'i dbyangs yig las gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dmigs te/ de'i steng
du d+hIH'i rnam pa las 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i gzugs su gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /der a'i rnam pa las grub pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de las
'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rig pa'i lha mo dang / khro bo la sogs pa shin tu bskul te/ yang
'ongs nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs par bsam mo/ /de nas yang 'jam dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa de rnams gcig tu gyur nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du
bsam par bya'o/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i rnam pas dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar khyab par gsal bar bya'o/ /de'i steng du hUM mdog nag po'i 'od zer lnga dang yang dag par bsam ste/ hUM de
las 'od zer gyi rnam par 'phros pas/ sngon du gsungs pa bzhin du yang zhugs te/ yi ge de las rdo rje chen po rnam par gdengs pa kha dog nag po'i 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa rnam
par dmigs par bya ste/ rdo rje de las phra mo'i rnam pa sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo dang / rig pa'i lha mos nam mkha' til gyis gang bu ltar gang ba nyi ma
@#/ /la gnas pa rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis ni/ sems can yongs su smin par btul nas byang chub la rab tu bkod
do| |yang de nyid lhan cig tu bsdus nas rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan la rab tu zhugs par bsam mo/ /rdo rje'i gzugs de nyid zhal dgu pa/ ma he'i gzugs can/ 'jig pa'i dus kyi
me ltar 'bar ba/ rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po khams gsum za bar nus pa/ zhal gtsigs pa/ ha ha zhes ljags 'dril ba/ rnam par gtsigs pa'i khro gnyer 'jigs pa/ khro
gnyer gyi 'gram nas smin ma dang spyan 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag pa/ sgra sgrog pa/ mi'i khrag dang / tshil dang / zhag dang / rkang za ba/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
'das pa'i lha la sogs pa la sdigs mdzub byed pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / khyab 'jug dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa za ba/ thod pa gtsigs
pa'i rtse mo 'jigs su rung ba'i thod pas thod byas pa/ 'jigs pa chen po can/ phaT ces sgra sgrog cing thod pa'i 'phyang 'phrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ zhabs bcu drug pa/ gcer
bu'i gzugs mtshan ma gyen du 'greng ba/ g.yon brkyang ba/ gsus pa che ba/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ 'jigs pa chen por byed pa/ pheM zhes sgra sgrog pa/ phyag sum cu rtsa bzhi
dang ldan pa/ glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa 'dzin pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can rnam par bsam par bya ste/ de ltar shin tu bsam pa brtan par byas te de kho na
nyid kyi sbyor ba la shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya ste/ g.yas dang po na gri gug /gnyis pa na mtshon rtse gcig pa/ gsum pa na gtun shing / bzhi pa
na chu gri /lnga pa na rdo rje rtse gcig pa/ drug pa na sta re/ bdun pa na mdung thung / brgyad pa na mda'/ dgu pa na lcags kyu/ bcu pa na dbyig to/ /bcu gcig pa na kha T+wAM ga /bcu gnyis pa na
'khor lo/ /bcu gsum pa na rdo rje/ bcu bzhi pa na rdo rje tho ba/ bco lnga pa na ral gri/ bcu drug pa na cang te'u'o/ /g.yon pa'i dang po na thod pa/ gnyis pa na mgo bo/ /gsum pa na phub/
bzhi pa na rkang pa/ lnga pa na zhags pa/ drug pa na gzhu/ bdun pa na rgyu ma/ brgyad pa na dril bu/ dgu pa na lag pa/ bcu pa na dur khrod kyi ras/ bcu gcig pa na skyes bu gsal shing la
btsugs pa/ bcu gnyis pa na me thab/ bcu gsum pa na thod tshal/ bcu bzhi pas sdigs mdzub/ bco lnga pa na 'phan rtse gsum pa/ bcu drug pa na rlung gis phyar ba'i dur khrod kyi
ras| phyag gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa 'dzin pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas pa'i dang pos mi/ gnyis bsam he/ gsum pas glang / bzhi pas bong bu/ lnga pas rnga mo/ drug
@#/ /pas khyi/ bdun pas lug /brgyad pas wa/ zhabs g.yas pas 'di dag la zhon pa'o/ /zhabs g.yon pa'i dang pos bya rgod/ gnyis pas 'ug pa/ gsum
pas bya rog /bzhi pas ne tso/ /lnga pas khra/ drug pas khyung chen po/ /bdun pas ri skegs/ brgyad pas bzhad/ zhabs g.yon pas 'di dag mnan pa'o/ /dpal 'jigs byed chen
po'i dang po'i zhal ni/ rab tu nag pa ma he'i rnam pa shin tu khros pa can/ rwa g.yas kyi zhal gsum la dang po sngon po/ /gnyis pa dmar po/ gsum pa ser po ste/ mnga' bdag gi
zhal gsum shin tu khros pa/ rwa g.yon par zhal gsum la dang po dkar po/ gnyis pa dud ka /gsum pa nag po rab tu khros pa gtsigs pa'i zhal rab tu bsam par bya'o/ /
rwa gnyis kyi bar du dbus kyi zhal dmar po rab tu 'jigs pa/ zhal nas khrag 'dzag pa bsam par bya'o/ /steng du 'jam dpal gyi zhal cung zad ser ba/ yid tsam khro ba/ byis
pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spyi bor ral pa lnga dang ldan pa rnam par bsams te/ zhal rnams thams cad spyan gsum par bsgom ste/ 'di ltar bdag nyid rtag tu rtse gcig tu
dmigs so/ /de nyid dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can de bdag nyid yin par bsgoms nas dpa' bo'i gnas la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ de nas phyi nas
sngags bzla bar bya ste/ bzlas pa'i dus su rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams te/ de'i steng du rang gi sngags kyi yi ge dgod par bya'o/ /'bar ba dang / phyi nas ma yengs pa'i
yid kyis bzlas pa bya'o/ /sbyor ba 'di la gnas pa'i sngags pa yis/ /rtag tu 'jigs byed las kun bya/ /dur khrod gnas la bsgom bya zhing / /rtag tu bdud rtsi lnga rnams bza'/ /de yis
sgrub las sgrub gzhan med/ /gzhan yang mar me che za zhing / /mtshan mo rgyu ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /sum 'bum rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas bya/ /'di bzlas pa yi sngags pa yis/ /thams cad las
ni byed par 'gyur/ /'di ni/ 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud las/ sgom pa'i rtog pa ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas dpal 'jigs byed chen pos
bstan pa'i bris sku'i cho ga rab tu gsungs pa/ dpa' bo'i ras sam/ ro la bkab pa'i ras sam/ me tog can gyi ras sam/ bu skyes pa'i ras sam/ de ma rnyed na ras gang yang rung ba la
ri mo mkhan bzang po rnam rtog med pa/ mi khro ba/ gtsang ba/ mkhas pa/ yid gzhungs pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ brtse ba can/ sred pa dang bral ba/ 'di ltar yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /de lta bu'i
ri mo mkhan gyi lag pas dpa' bo'i ras la bri bar bya'o/ /gal te dngos grub 'dod pas dpa' bo'i yon sbyin no/ /de la cho ga ni/ gsang ba'i gnas su gnas la shin tu mnyam par
@#/ /bzhag pas bri bar bya ste/ ri mo mkhan dang sgrub pa pos mthong ba las 'jig rten pa gzhan gyis mi mthong bar bri bar bya ste/ zhabs bcu drug pa/ phyag
sum cu rtsa bzhi pa/ zhal dgu pa/ gcer bu kha dog nag po/ g.yon brkyang ba/ 'jigs pa chen po yang 'jigs par byed pa'i rnam pa can/ mtshan ma gyen du 'greng ba'i
thang ga bri bar bya'o/ /zhal dang po ma he/ rwa'i g.yas su zhal gsum pa ste/ sngon po dang / dmar po dang / ser po shin tu khros pa bri bar bya'o/ /g.yon du dkar po dang / dud ka
dang / nag po'o/ /de gnyis kyi dbus su rab tu dmar ba bri bar bya'o/ /de'i steng du 'jam dpal gyi zhal ser po cung zad khro ba bri bar bya'o/ /phyag g.yas par gri gug dang /
mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / gtun shing dang / chu gri dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / sta re dang / mdung dang / mda' dang / lcags kyu dang / dbyig to dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / 'khor
lo dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje tho ba dang / ral gri dang / cang te'u'o/ /phyag g.yon pa na thod pa dang / mgo bo dang / phub dang / rkang pa dang / zhags pa dang / gzhu dang / rgyu ma dang /
dril bu dang / lag pa dang / dur khrod kyi ras dang / skyes bu gsal shing gis phug pa dang / me thab dang / thod tshal dang / sdigs mdzub dang / 'phan rtse gsum pa dang /
rlung gis bskyod pa'i ras so/ /phyag gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa 'dzin pa bri'o/ /zhabs g.yas bas mi dang / ma he dang / glang dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / khyi dang /
lug dang / wa rnams so/ /zhabs g.yon pas bya rgod dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / ne tso dang / khra dang / bya chen dang / ri skegs dang / bzhad rnams so/ /'di lta bur 'dug
pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po bri bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dur khrod chen po yang bri bar bya'o/ /'jigs pa chen po byed pa/ srin po dang / zhing skyong ba dang / ro langs dang ldan pa/
skyes bu mdung rtser btsugs pa'i gzugs de mthong bar bya'o/ /n+ya gro d+ha'i shing ngag gi steng du skyes bu 'phyang ba bri bar bya/ skyes bu bsreg bzhin pa yang bri/ mdung gis phug pa'i
skyes bu yang bri/ bya sna tshogs dang / bya rog dang / khyi dang / lce spyang dag ha ha 'byin pa bri/ sgrub pa po rnams kyang bri ste/ bcom ldan 'das la rtse gcig tu lta ba/ gcer bu skra bshig
pa| phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ cang te'u dang / thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ thod pas spyi bor brgyan pa/ dgod cing dur khrod der 'jug pa bri/ 'di ni/ gsang ba'i bris sku ste/ gnas
gcig tu legs par bzhag la sha chen gyi spos dbul/ de'i mdun du dung chen gyi phreng bas bzlas pa bya/ sngags pa mnyam bar bzhag pas dus gsum du 'bad la bris sku
@#/ /srung ngo / /gzhan gang yang mi gzhag go /gzhan gang gi mdun du yang mi dgram mo/ /klog pa dang / btung ba dang / bza' ba dang / ston mo ni/ sha chen rtag
tu mtshan ma bza'o/ /gal te mchog gi dngos grub 'dod na/ dus gsum du rnam par snang mdzad dang khrag gi spos bris sku'i mdun du dbul lo/ /'di ni/ 'jam dpal zhes bya
ba| rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las/ bris sku'i cho ga'i rtog pa ste lnga pa'o// //de nas sbyin sreg gi las kyi cho ga gsungs pa/ ji ltar sngon gyi
rim pa ste/ dang por re zhig sngags pas pha'i nags su phyin la mtshan phyed na sbyin sreg gi las kun byas te/ gang du gsungs pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas las
thams cad bya'o/ /de la las ni/ 'di rnams yin no/ /gal te bsad par 'dod na/ der mi'i rus pa dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / bong bu'i spang dang / khyi'i sbang / tsher
ma dang / skra dang / sen mo dang / de dag thams cad tsha ba'i mar khus sbrus la ma he'i zhal gyi sbyor bas shin tu mnyam par bzhag la/ kha lhor bltas te ro bsreg pa'i me la
gang gi ming dang bcas par brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs na/ the tshom med par de zhag gsum gyis 'chi'o/ /yang na phyogs gcig tu gnas la me thab gru gsum byas nas der
sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas kyis gtum po'i me la sbyin sreg bya ste/ sbyor ba des ni/ las de nyid 'grub bo/ /de nas dbral bar 'dod na/ bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / rma bya dang / sbrul dang / skra
dang / 'bras phub dang / ma he dang / rta'i sha dang lhan cig tu gang gi ming dang bcas par yi ge bcu ba'i sngags kyis dur khrod kyi me la bsregs na/ des 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na dur khrod
kyi shing la gtum po'i me rab tu sbar la khyim du gnas te gong gi rdzas de bsregs na/ rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yang nyi ma bdun gyis 'bral lo/ /de nas bskrad par 'dod na/ bya rog gi sha dang /
rnga mo'i rtug pa dang lhan cig tu chang dang yang dag par ldan pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dur khrod kyi shing la me rab tu sbar la/ gcer bu skra bshig par bsgyur nas kha lho phyogs su
bltas te gshin rje'i sngags kyis che ge mo'i ming dang bcas par lag ba g.yon pas sbyin sreg stong byas na/ skrod pa las gzhan du ma yin no/ /de nas rengs par 'dod na/ ba bla dang /
yung ba dang / ldong ros dang / gi wang dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la kha byang du bltas te las kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sbyor ba dmigs nas gang gi ming dang bcas par
sbyin sreg byas na/ de nyi ma bdun gyis rengs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas grong bskrad par 'dod na/ nim ba'i shing la me rab tu sbar la khyi'i sha dang / sbal ba'i sha dang / khyim bya'i sha dang /
@#/ /rnga mo'i rtug pa dang / byi la'i khrag gcig tu sbrus la/ gshin rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pas grong gi ming dang bcas par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis rlung gi dkyil
'khor gyi dbus su sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu byas na/ grong skrod par 'gyur ro/ /las de rnams ni/ shin tu yang mnyam par bzhag pas bya ste/ gzhan du na sngags pa rang nyid la
'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gang la yang mi bstan no/ /de nas bu mo rengs par 'dod na/ tsher ma dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang bcas par rang gi khrag gis sbrus nas yi ge bcu pa'i
sngags dang bcas pas bu mo rengs par gyur cig ces dur khrod kyi me la sbyin sreg stong byas na rengs pa las gzhan ma yin no/ /de nas zhi bar bya bar 'dod na/ mar dang / sbrang rtsi
dang / 'o ma dang / dur ba dang bcas par pa la sha'i shing la me rab tu sbar na zhi bar 'dod par dmigs nas yul gyi shar phyogs su kha bltas te gnas pas dus gsum du sbyin
sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ des yul zhi bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyas par 'dod na til dang / 'bras dang / nas dang / mar dang bcas pas u dum ba ra'i shing la ma
rab tu sbar na/ las kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lha'i sbyor ba dmigs te/ kha byang du bltas nas mnyam pas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis dus gsum du sbyin sreg stong byas na
rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dgug par 'dod na ske tshe gzugs brnyan byas la de nas seng ldeng gi me'i dbus su gshin rje'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na/ ma grub pa
yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma bdun gyis gang 'dod pa the tshom med par 'gugs so/ /de nas smyo bar bya bar 'dod na/ bya rgod chen po'i tshang dang sha chen bsregs na/ smyo bar
'gyur ro/ /de phub ma'i me la bsregs na/ bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /de nas nor nor ma yin par bya bar 'dod na/ ras bal gyi me la d+ha du ra'i 'bras bu dang bcas par mtshan
mo yi ge bcu pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ shin tu chud zos par 'gyur ro/ /a ru ra bsregs na/ slar rdzas de nyid du 'gyur ro/ /rje btsun gyi mdun du sha chen
chang dang bcas pa zla ba drug tu mtshan mo sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ yul thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /ba lang gi sha dang khrag tu bcas par gang gi ming dang bcas
par sbyin sreg stong byas na/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bran du gnas par the tshom med do/ /khyi sha rdo rje chu dang bcas par skyes pa'i bdag nyid kyis mtshan mo gang gi ming dang bcas
pa sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ bdag nyid kyis nor dang bcas par dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rta'i sha rnam par snang mdzad dang bcas pa gshin rje gshed kyi sngags kyis sbyin
@#/ /sreg brgya rtsa brgyad gnas gcig tu gnas la mtshan mo rgyal po la dmigs nas byas na/ zhag bdun gyis 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /
glang po'i sha khu ba dang bcas pas mi'i 'jig rten kun la dmigs la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis mtshan mo sbyin sreg stong byas na/ zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nya
dang sha dang chang dang bcas pas 'jigs pa med par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bskrad
par 'dod na/ bya rog gi sha ma 'dres par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg stong byas na/ nyi ma bdun gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yang rab tu
'bros na/ phra mo'i mi lta ci smos/ de nas bya rog gi tshang dang / 'bras kyi phub ma dang lhan cig tu d+ha du ra'i shing la me rab tu sbar nas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags gang gi ming dang
bcas par nam phyed na sbyin sreg byas na/ nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ seng ldeng gi me la til dang / 'bras dang / bud med kyi me tog
dang lhan cig tu rdo rje'i chu dang bsres te rnal 'byor gyi gzugs dmar po dmigs nas kha nub tu bltas te yi ge bcu pa gang gi ming dang bcas par sngags pas bsregs
na/ nyam bdun gyis dbang du 'dus te/ de ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du mi 'bral lo/ /de nas 'gugs par 'dod na/ bdud rtsi mar dang bcas par seng ldeng gi me la gang gi ming dang bcas
par sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ de skad cig gis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'di rnams ni/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i sngags pas bya'o/ /gzhan pas byas na/ sngags pa 'jig
rten pas dpyas par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bye brag mi bya ste/ gang la yang bye brag sbyin par mi bya'o/ /bye brag phye na sngags pas dngos grub mi 'grub bo/ /ngas rgyud gzhan las kyang
bshad de/ ji ltar bye brag ma skyes pa/ /de bzhin bya ba'i bye brag smras/ /rdo rje sems dpas kyang mi 'grub/ /gang gi mdun du'ang sngags pa yis/ /de phyir las rnams mthong mi bya/ /
gzhan dang lhan cig tu mi bya/ /gal te sngags bas las bya 'dod/ /de dag gcig pu zhig gis bya/ /sngags pa de yis las kun byed/ /'di ni/ 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/ dpal
rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi las kyi cho ga rgya che ba'i rtog pa ste drug pa'o// //de nas bsam gtan gyi las kyi cho ga ji lta bu yang
dag par gsungs te/ bsam gtan dang sngags kyi rab tu sbyor ba las dgos pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub par bya ste/ de'i cho ga'i dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pa ma he'i gdong
@#/ /pa'i sbyor ba la gnas pa'i sngon du sbyang ba byas pas las thams cad bya'o/ /re pha las yongs su gyur pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar
'bar bar rnam par bsams la/ de'i steng du bsgrub bya gcer bu skra bshig pa/ bred par gyur pa bdag gi mdun du rnam par bsam mo/ /de nas rang gi lus las khro bo'i
gzugs mang po rnam par spros te/ khro bo de rnams kyis ral gris btab cing khrag 'thungs par bsam par bya'o/ /bsgrub bya de'i sha za ba dang / rgyu ma drangs par bsam par
bya'o| |'di skad smra bar bya ste/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dang / bla ma la skur pa 'debs pa la rgyob cig rgyob cig /sod cig sod cig bsams pa tsam gyis
rdo rje 'dzin pa yang zhag bdun gyis 'chi na/ phra mo srog chags gzhan lta ci smos/ /de nas gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba 'byung ba ni/ ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor ba'i
nga rgyal la gnas te las thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgrub bya du bar bsams la/ de'i mdun du srin po mang po bsam par bya ste/ srin
po de dag tha dad pa'i lus can/ ma rungs pa/ shin tu gtum par sha za ba dang / khrag 'thung bar rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya rnams
te/ bya rgod dang / bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / wa rnams dang / khyi rnams kyis sha za ba dang / khrag 'thung bar rnam par bsam par bya ste/ bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas
the tshom med par 'chi'o/ /dpag tshad brgya na gnas pa'i skyes bu yang sems kyis bzung bas bsam gtan brtsam mo/ /sngags pas bsam gtan brtan par bya'o/ /de nas dpral
bar 'dod na/ ma he'i snying gar bsgrub bya bsam par bya ste/ bsgrub bya gzhan rta'i snying gar rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /rta dang ma he gnyis phan tshun 'thab par byed par bsam ste/
ji srid du rta dang ma he gnyis phye bar ma gyur gyi bar du'o/ /phyi nas bsgrub bya de gnyis rab tu mi mdza' bar bsam par bya ste/ bsams pa tsam gyis nyi ma bdun gyis nges par
'thab par 'gyur te/ gzhan du ma yin no/ /de nas bskrad par 'dod na/ de ru yaM las yongs su gyur pa'i rnga mo bsam par bya ste/ yaM de'i rgyab tu yaM gyi rnam pa las gyur pa'i
rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i steng du bsgrub bya gcer bu skra bshig pa bred par gyur par bsam par bya ste/ ma he'i gdong can gyi sbyor ba
la gnas pas de'i rgyab tu gshin rje'i gzugs lag pa g.yas pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa skra bsil ba rnam par bsam par bya ste/ rnga mo de kha lhor bstan la gtang ngo / /de'i
@#/ /ming dang bcas par gshin rje'i sngags brjod pas rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor pas 'di bsams pa tsam gyis zhag bdun na 'di
ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa yang skrod par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba ni/ bya rog gam/ bya rgod kyi rgyab tu bsgrub bya skra grol ba gcer bu rnam par
bsam mo/ /de'i rgyab tu gshin rje rnam par bsam par bya ste/ lag pa tho ba thogs pa bsgrub bya'i skra bzung ba de la ma he'i gdong can gyis bka' bsgo ste/ kha lho ru bltas
nas song bar bsam par bya ste/ rtse gcig pa'i sbyor ba bsam par byas na/ rtse gcig pa'i sbyor ba des zhag bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'gugs par byed
par 'dod na/ yi ge yaM las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du a las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du gshin rje'i gzugs lcags kyu dang zhags
pa lag tu thogs pa rnam par bsam mo/ /ma he'i gdong pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas de la bka' bsgo/ /gshin rje song la yul che ge mo nas bu mo myur bar
khug cig /de skad bskul bas yaM gyi rnam par bskyod de song bar rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor ba la gnas pa'i sngags pas khams
gsum du gtogs pa'i bud med bkug la rol bar bya'o/ /ji ltar bsam gtan brtan par gyur na/ 'di'i rab tu sbyor ba de dag bya'i gzhan gyis mi bya'o/ /de nas sbrul gyis
zin pa blang ba'i rab tu byed pa gsungs te/ rang gi snying gar pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par bsam mo/ /de'i steng du dbyangs yig gsum pa 'dab mar phaT brgyad rnam
par bsam mo/ /des ni/ 'og gi klu'i gzugs rnam par bsam par bya ste/ de'i spyi bor yi ge i kha dog dkar po las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bsam par bya'o/ /klu de'i mig rnams
nas bdud rtsi 'phros nas bsgrub bya de'i lus la thim par bsam par bya ste/ bsam gtan 'di'i sbyor bas khams gsum yongs su gang ba'i dug kyang med par 'gyur ro/ /dug
khur stong yang za nus so/ /de nas zhu ba'i bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba 'byung ste/ bsgrub bya mdun du bsam ste de'i rkang pa gnyis la yi ge yaM las gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil
'khor bsam bar bya/ /de'i steng du gsang ba'i gnas su me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar po raM gyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o/ /de'i steng du snying
gar sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa mdog ser po laM gyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o/ /de'i steng du dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /
@#/ /de'i dbus su yi ge ba mgo thur du gnas pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag par bsam ste/ 'di ni/ legs par rnam par bsams nas rlung gis me rab tu
spar te| me des dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsregs par rnam par bsam/ dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi drod kyi bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor de zhu bar bsam par bya'o/ /
'di yi sbyor ba tsam gyis ni/ /de yi bud med zhu 'gyur te/ /'o ma yi ni shing bzhin du/ /zhu bar byed par the tshom med/ /de nas rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya ba
'dod na/ sngags pa ma he'i gdong can gyis rnal 'byor la rab tu gnas la de nyid mdog dmar por bsams te/ bsgrub bya gang du gnas pa de'i steng du gnas la/
phyi nas rang gi lus 'jam dpal mdog dmar po phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa can phyung ste/ 'jam dpal des bsgrub bya'i snying ga dang mgrin pa bcings nas
bkug par bsams te 'jam dpal gyi sku la rab tu gzhug go /bsgrub bya de myos par bsam par bya ste/ de'i snying gar yi ge bcu pa'i sngags rnam par bsam par
bya'o| |yang kha dog dmar po sgrub pa pos ye shes kyi gzugs kyis yi ge la gzhug par bya'o/ /de dang bsgrub bya gcig tu gyur bar bya'o/ /bsam gtan 'di'i rab
tu sbyor bas nyi ma bdun gyis 'khor los bsgyur ba yang dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du the tshom med do/ /rab tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sngags pas mi g.yo ba'i bsam
gtan gyis bya'o/ /rgyud gang la yang mi sbyin no/ /gal te sngags kyang mi bstan/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can gyi bsam gtan gang la yang mi sbyin/ smra
bar yang mi bya/ sngags kyi dbye ba yang mi bya/ bris sku yang gang gi mdun du yang mi bkram ste/ thang ga yang gsang bar gzhag go /rgyud 'di rab tu sbyor ba dang / bzlas pa dang /
smra ba gzhan su la yang 'ga' tsam yang mi smra/ gal te smras na/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis za'o/ /dam
tshig nyams par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir sngags pas su la yang mi sbyin no/ /de nas dam tshig mnyam pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / dam pa'i brtul zhugs can/ dpa'
bo bla ma la gus pa/ dul ba can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la nges par 'dzin pa/ rgyud sbas pa/ mi khro ba/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ bzlas pa dang bsam gtan la phyogs
pa| rnam par smin pa la 'dzem pa/ 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can ni/ slob ma bzang po ste/ dkyil 'khor dam pa dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po la mchog tu gus pa/ snying
@#/ /rje chen pos yid brlan pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ mchog tu bla ma la gus pa rab tu brtag pa la shin tu rnam par bsams te/ bla mas de lta bu'i slob ma la dpal rdo rje 'jigs
byed chen po'i rgyud sbyin no/ /sngags pas gzhan la byin na/ de dang slob mar bcas nas dmyal bar 'gro bar the tshom med do/ /'jig rten 'dir ni/ 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pha rol
tu ni| dmyal bar 'gro'o/ /dam tshig kyang nyams par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las/ bsam gtan gyi las sgrub pa
brtag pa'i rtog pa ste bdun pa'o// //dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud 'bum pa nas btus nas phyung ba/ rtog pa'i phyogs bklags pas 'grub pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs
byed chen po ma he'i gdong can gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i rtog pa rdzogs so// //dpal u D+yan gyi gnas chen po nas dpal 'jam dpal gyi rgyud las phyung ba/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo
rje 'jigs byed chen po zhes bya ba/ bla ma dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon dpal lA li ta badzras bton nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal yul gyi paN+Di ta mchog gi dngos grub brnyes

pa b+ha ro phyag rdum gyi zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra b+he ra wa kalpa tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs

byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'dir ni bshad bya ba/ /ji ltar 'gro rnams zad byed ba/ /sdug bsngal rnams mthar byed pa yi/ /sgrub pa'i thabs chen
mchog gyur pa/ /gsang sngags de las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dang po rnam par snang mdzad de/ /de dang nye bar ngag dbang phyug /rdo rje 'khor lo sgyur ba'o/ /gdan gyi bdag dang 'byung po'i rje/ /mgo dang
mtha' ma gnyis ldan bya/ /mchod rten sreg byed mtha' dang bcas/ /gzhan du shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje can gyi mkha' la gnas/ /yi ge 'bum phrag khri brjod na/ /nyams pa thams cad sel byed

cing / /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang mngon spyod/ /gsod dang skrod dgug dbye rengs dang / /dman par byed dang rgyal srid sogs/ /thob pa nyid la the tshom med/ /dur khrod tshang tshing khrod ngogs rtsub/ /shing gcig
khang stong mtshan gcig dben/ /gang 'dod gnas su bsam gtan brtsam/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la khyab pa me long lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
sku dang ye shes thams cad la khyab par bya ba'i phyir sku mdog dkar po zhal drug dang ldan par byas nas 'jig rten pa thams cad la gzigs nas rang gi rigs kyi yi ge nyid brjod pas sku dang /
gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan dang / 'phrin las dang / ye shes kyang gcig gi ngo bo sprul pa'i skur gyur to/ /kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje che/ /don rnams skyed pa yang nyid do/ /mkha' dkyil 'od kyis
@#/ /'gengs 'gyur ba/ /slar zhing kha dog lnga ldan pa/ /sa bon sngags kyis bskul ba yi/ /'od kyi rtse phran thub pa'i sku/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas gnas las skyes/ /rang la zhugs pas
sku rdzogs gyur/ /zhal drug khro gnyer rab brjid pa/ /ma he'i zhal ldan steng gnas pa/ /'jam dpal zhal ni 'dzum bcas bzhugs/ /lhag ma dkar dang ser dang dmar/ /du ba'i mdog mtshungs

gyen skrar ldan/ /thod ba skam rlon rgyu ma sprul/ /rus pa rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan/ /glang chen stag lpags gyon nas ni/ /hUM phaT glur len gad mo can/ /nam mkha'i lus can khro bo'i sprin/ /yang dang
yang du spro byed pa'i/ /phyag drug rab tu brjid pa ste/ /dbyug pa tho ba gtun shing dag /g.yas pa'i phyag gis rim bzhin 'dzin/ /dgra sta dang ni lcags kyu dang / /zhags pa g.yon pa'i phyag gis
'dzin| |pad+ma nyi ma ma he dang / /gshin rje'i steng na 'gying bag can/ /zhabs drug g.yon brkyang gar gyis gnas/ /'jig rten bdag po mthar mdzad pa'o/ /de ltar gang zhig dad pa dang / /blo ldan g.yo
sgyu rab spangs shing / /legs par dbang rnams thob byas nas/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyes byed pas/ /yang nas yang du dran byed na/ /brtan pa chen po thob par 'gyur/ /lha yi dge 'dun nga la nyon/ /
dpa' bo chang la rab dga' zhing / /sha chen rtag tu mur byed na/ /las rnams de yis myur du 'grub/ /sku ni du ma 'phro byed cing / /sku la sku rnams nges thim byed/ /thams cad sgyu ma nyid shes
pas| |'jig rten rnams su yid sad byed/ /khong stong kha dog dkar ba ste/ /rgyun du rlung ni 'dzag par byed/ /chu skyes dmar po kha sbyar gnyis/ /yan lag gnyis kyis legs par gcun/ /shes pa 'phel

ba me dang rlung / /nyi ma zla ba thabs ldan dang / /shes rab ldan par shes par bya/ /gnyis po de nyid rnam spangs na/ /khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro/ /chu skyes kha sbyor la brten te/ /gsum gnas pa yi ting

'dzin la/ /rdo rje chos kyis btab pa yis/ /thabs dang shes rab grol ba'i rgyu/ /blo ldan 'das pa shes par 'gyur/ /de phyir de la brtson par bya/ /chos rnams chos nyid dbyer med pas/ /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes

che| |mi shigs rtog bral mtshan ma med/ /bde chen ye shes rdo rje sku/ /ye shes mi rtog rtog pa bral/ /rtog pa'i mtshan ma thams cad sreg /spros pa'i mtshan ma mtha' dag ni/ /ji snyed sgyu ma'i rnam par shes/ /de nyid

shes nas grol ba'o/ /mi shes pas ni phyir zhing 'khor/ /'jig rten skye bo blo ldan 'gas/ /nges par rtog pa thabs kyi mchog /sdug bsngal chen pos rab 'jigs nas/ /bde ba 'dod pas nan tan bya/ /dpal rdo rje

'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ thabs dang shes rab kyi bsam gtan bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sngags grub pa las byung ba yi/ /las rnams 'dir ni shes bya ste//

der ni lha yi sku yang sbyar/ /zhi sogs bzlas pa'i rim pa la/ /rdo rje'i dbus su rdo rje ni/ /nyi zla la brten yi ge yi/ /phreng ba kha dog lngar shes pa/ /skyen bul spangs nas bklag pa ni/ /mkhas pas bzlas pa'i rim pa'o/ /drag
@#/ /po'i las rnams sgrub pa la/ /nyon mongs gcod pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /sngon po rtse rtsibs bcu pa la/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba bsam/ /zhi bar 'dod pa'i skyes
bu des| |sems ni yang dag mnyam bzhag nas/ /sngags kyi 'od kyang 'gro gzhan la/ /phan pa'i yid dang ldan par bya/ /gro ga ras dang shing shun la/ /gur gum gi waM dri rnams
kyis| |mchod rten rim pa lnga ldan zhing / /gdugs dang 'khor lo ldan par bya/ /sgrub pa po yi ming dang rus/ /de yi bum pa'i nang du bri/ /rten 'brel snying po la sogs pa'i/ /sngags
kyis g.yon nas bskor ba bri/ /gcig shos g.yas nas g.yon du bri/ /de la spel tshig med pa 'am/ /yang na 'khor lo'i bar du gzhag /'khor lo kun la kha sbyor gnad/ /rab
tu gnas par byas nas kyang / /lus sam mgul lam gang bder bzhag /des ni gdon dang byad stems dang / /rims dang yams rnams sel bar byed/ /gang zhig yul
rnams gzhom 'dod na/ /hUM gi sa bon dang ldan par/ /ming yig tsam po bri bar bya/ /so phag phye ma ldong ros dang / /ba bla ma he'i khrag gis brdzis/ /zla gam gnyis pa'i
gzugs byas te/ /bar du gang 'dod bsgrub pa yi/ /gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa yi tshad/ /byas la gan rkyal du bzhag la/ /ma he gdong gi sbyor ba yis/ /khri phrag gcig
tu sngags bzlas nas/ /dum bu dum bur gtubs byas te/ /chu bo'i gzhung du gtor byas na/ /skad cig de la de dbang 'gyur/ /bya rog 'ug pa'i gzugs byas te/ /ma nu ma li ro tsa
nas| |khyo shug bsgrub bya'i ming bris te/ /gshin rje'i phyogs bltas gsang sngags gdon/ /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/ /mi yi rje ngar phur bus gdab/ /skad cig tsam la
de dag dbye/ /de nas 'dir ni bsad pa yi/ /cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya/ /zhal drug phyag drug zhabs drug pa'am/ /yang na zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa'am/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis
pa yang rung / /ma he gdong ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /khrag rnams sna tshogs tha dad dang / /bsgrub bya'i rjes dang dug gi rigs/ /rta dang ma he bong bu'i chus/ /sprus pa'i bsgrub bya'i ling+ga bya/ /
lus la tsher mas gzugs bya zhing / /til mar gyis kyang bsku bar bya/ /yang na shing le gro ga'am/ /dur khrod ras sam shun pa la/ /rang nyid gcer bu skra bshig nas/ /lus ni
thal bas byugs byas te/ /mngon sum khros nas sha chen bza'/ /rab tu zhim pa'i chang btung zhing / /nag po'i tshes kyi mtshan phyed dus/ /'khor lo bri bar brtsam par bya/ /le tshe bcu
gnyis 'khor lo ni/ /hUM dang hrIHSh+T+rIHdbus su dgod/ /Na yo ni ra rtsibs mchan la/ /yungs kar til dang skar chu dang / /rta dang ma he khyi phag khrag /bya rog 'ug pa'i sgro yis bri/ /
@#/ /yi ge ya yi lto bar yang / /ming dang rus su ldan ba bris/ /phyogs bzhir yi ge bcu pa ni/ /ming dang bcas pa bri bar bya/ /brgyad po dag la rim pa bzhin//
yi ge 'di dag bri bar bya/ /oM ya ma rA dza kA la ru pa a mu ka mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ yi ge rnams la bskor nas ni/ /bsgrub bya gzugs dang ldan pa bri/ /de yi mu khyud dag
la ni| |yi ge bcu pa ming bcas bri/ /phyogs bzhir rtse gsum rdo rjes mtshan/ /de bzhin rdzas rnams ma lus pas/ /'khor lo lta bar ldan pa bri/ /gshin rje'i gzugs ni ral
gri dang / /dbyig pa 'dzin pa bris nas ni/ /de dang de nyid lto sbyar la/ /mtshan ngan thod pa'i nang du gzhug /tshwa gsum ske tshe dug mu zi/ /ro nyes bkang nas dkyil 'khor ni/ /gru gsum
dbus su gzhag par bya/ /yungs dang bra bo sA lu nag /dza b+hi bra bo sogs rnams la/ /gsang sngags rgyal po brjod byas te/ /dro'am du ba 'thul bar du/ /rim dang rim gyis
khrag rnams ni/ /ma lus zad par 'thung ba yi/ /ma yengs par ni bsam gtan bya/ /yang na bsgrub bya za bar mthong / /shing gcig rtsar ni rengs pa dang / /mal 'og tu ni zha
zhing lkugs/ /chu mdor byed cing ri rtse bskrad/ /bsad pa me thab 'og tu sba/ /dgug pa la ni sgo khang 'og /lha'am 'khor lo sgyur ba'o/ /bde gnas rnams kyis dbang du 'gyur/ /
mar khu chen po thod pa yi/ /nang du blugs nas bskol byas te/ /bzhar bas mig la byug byed na/ /mngon shes de nyid myur du 'thob/ /rigs ldan rgyal po las rnyed cing / /mdog ldan
lang tsho gsar bkug la/ /tsan+dan lde gu mang byas te/ /las kyi sbyer bas de nyid bcing / /yang na me la gdung bas grub/ /oM badzra kro ta ya ma rA daH/ badzra kI li kI la ha na ha na mA ra
ya phaT/ ces bya ba'i gsang sngags brjod byas la/ /rus pa'i phur bas gdab par bya/ /gsal shing la btsugs skye bu yi/ /rdzas la brten te bsgrub par bya/ /til mar byugs la
thod pas bzhar/ /mar me byas pa'i dud pa yis/ /mig rnon dag ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags rgyal po thogs med la/ /bsten pas thob bya mang yod kyang / /'di ni brjod
ba ci zhig dgos/ /yang na 'di ltar shes bya ste/ /rang nyid sngags dang ting 'dzin ldan/ /brtson chen gzhan du ma yengs pas/ /gang du brtsams pa de 'grub 'gyur/ /smad 'tshong
rang byung nyid kyis ni/ /sngon bsten tsakra legs bris te/ /ling+ga'i snying gar bcug byas la/ /rang mdun khrag gi zla gam ste/ /khrag gis byugs pa'i steng du bzhag /mi 'am rgyal
po'i bu mo dag /dgug dang dbang gi yi ge yis/ /de nyid du ni nges par 'gyur/ /nyal sa'i 'og tu mnan par bya/ /mi glang ra khyi bong phag khrag /'khor lo bris nas ling+ga yi/ /
@#/ /mgrin par bcug nas bya rog gi /khrag gis khrag skyug sngags bris nas/ /yi ge de ldan thod pa ru/ /bcug nas gsang sngags mang bzlas te/ /dur
khrod me thab 'og bzhag na/ /khrag skyug pa la the tshom med/ /bsros na tsha ba'i nad kyis 'chi/ /sbal khrag pha wang klad pa yis/ /'khor lo de nyid legs bris nas/ /ling+ga'i
mchan khung g.yon bcug la/ /g.yas g.yon sbal khrag glang khrag byugs/ /ling+ga'i phyogs su rang nyid kyi/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos mnan/ /de tshe bzlas pa mang byas
nas| |rgya gram lam du mnan la bzhag /de las ldog pa bris nas ni/ /shing gcig khong par sbas na rengs/ /rnga mong bya rog rgan po'i khrag /'khor lo bris nas ling+ga yi/ /
rkang gnyis bar bcug rang mdun du/ /khrag gis rnga mong gzugs bris te/ /de yi steng bzhag rang nyid kyis/ /rlung gi bsam gtan nges ldan na/ /bskrad pa nyid du the tshom
med| |ri bo'i rtse la 'dzegs te sba/ /ne'u le sbrul rta ma he dang / /bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag gis ni/ /khyo shug rkang pa'i rjes sbrus pa'i/ /ling+ga sor brgyad par byas te/ /khrag
des bris pa'i 'khor lo dag /snying gar bcug pa gnyis byas te/ /ne'u le gzugs byas steng du bzhag /lag gnyis rta dang ma he yi/ /rus pas brdung zhing gsang sngags
zlas/ /rtse drung shing khar sbas na 'byed/ /tsan+dan dkar pos legs bris nas/ /gser sogs rin chen rdzas su dril/ /mdun du zla ba'i gzugs steng du/ /bzhag la nyin re bskor ba
ni/ /ji srid byas na srung bar nges/ /spyi bor btags na g.yul las rgyal/ /rkang par btags na chu steng 'gro/ /ba yi 'o mas khrus byas te/ /ku sha ba mar sogs mchod nas/ /
gsol btab nad rnams thams cad srung / /de nas bcom ldan 'das las phra ba thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas las
thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sngags 'di/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /mA ra ya phaT/ ces ba bsad pa'i 'o/ /bi dwe Sha ya dbye ba'i 'o/ /uts+tsha Ta ya bskrad pa'i 'o/ /mo
ha ya rmongs pa'i 'o/ /wa shaM ku ru dbang du bya ba'i 'o/ /stam+b+ha ya mnan pa'i 'o/ /A kaR+Sha ya dzaHdgug pa'i 'o/ /oM hrIHswAhA/ kha dang lag pa bshal ba'i sngags so/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi

kr-i tA na na hUM sarba sha trUn nA sha la stam+b+ha ya phaT phaT swAhA/ snying po'i sngags so/ /oM hrIHkA la rU pa hUM khaM/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM hrIHkruM bruM sruM dzruM hUM ga /snying po dam pa'o/ /oM hrIHhAMH

b+ho mahA kro d+ha gats+tsha gats+tsha smat+pU dza pra ti grah+na pra sA daM de bi mAM ku ru swAhA/ spyan drangs pa'o/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHhaHyon chab bo/ /oM hUM hUM phaT zhabs bsil lo/ /oM sarba duSh+TA sa twad ma ka ga ga/
@#/ /zhes pa dri chab kyi sngags so/ /oM ku mA ra rU pa Ni dzaHdzaHhUM phaT/ me tog 'bul ba'i sngags so/ /oM hrIHhaHhe phaT/ bdug pa'i'o/ /oM kA la ru pa sarba duSh+Ta satwa

da ma kaM ma hA b+hu ta pa ti i maM ba liM grih+na grih+na pa ya swA hA/ gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM dIp+ta lo tsa na bi kri tA na na ma hA T+Ta T+Ta hA sa nA dI naM dIp+ta ya swAhA/ mar me'i sngags so/ /oM dza ya dza

ya su dza ya bi shwa rU pa d+ha ri gats+tsha gats+tsha swa s+thA ni kri taM te na ta thA ga ta sh+tsa bi sardza ya ma ma kAR+yaM ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid chos
thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'phrin las 'di nyid bka' stsal to/ /
nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /hUM las yongs su rdzogs pa yi/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed bsam par bya/ /dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /shes rab mo dang mnyam
du sbyor/ /srin po rab tu khros pa 'dra/ /dbyug pa thod khrag phyag na 'dzin/ /ma he pad+ma nyi ma la/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi tshul gyis bsgom/ /oM ya man+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ gsang
sngags rgyal po 'di bzlas na/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'byung / /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /ya yig sngon po las skyes pa'i/ /khro bo rdo rje 'jigs
byed ni| |pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan steng na/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gnas pa'i/ /gri gug bi d+hi pA la dang / /dgra sta dang ni thod khrag dang / /phyag bzhi po na rim pas 'dzin/ /ma he nag
po'i zhal steng na/ /'jam dpal zhal ni ser zhing 'dzum/ /dpa' bo chen po rang nyid bsgom/ /rab tu zhim pa'i chang btung zhing / /sha chen dag kyang mur ba bya/ /mtshan mo dur khrod
rgyu byed cing / /rtag par gsang sngags bzlas par bya/ /thig le 'dren pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /bsgrub bya'i phyogs su bsam par bya/ /las rnams myur du 'dis 'grub bo/ /yang na 'di
ltar shes bya ste/ /ma he gdong gi sbyor ba yis/ /sku yi kha dog so sor shes/ /khyad par du ni bsad pa la/ /nag po ma he'i zhal can ni/ /rtse gsum lcags kyu 'dzin pa ste/ /ma he sha
steng bsam byas na/ /khrag 'dren pa yi mchog tu gsungs/ /res 'ga' sku las khro bo ni/ /lcags kyu 'dzin pa grangs med spro/ /zla ba spyang kis zin dus su/ /byi la'i sder mo
ra snying dang / /bya yi khrag dang mi rus bsre/ /gang la phog pa smyo bar 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sbyor ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //
de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sgrub par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dur khrod ras sam dpa' bo'i gos/ /yang na mtshan gyi khab ma la/ /rnam snang mdzad dang rdo rje'i chu/ /dpa'
@#/ /bo'i khrag dang chang dang dug /go ro tsa nas ras 'tshes bya/ /legs par dam por drud byas te/ /lus ngag yid kyi gnas su ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa
pa'i chus/ /yi ge oM dang AHhUM bri/ /skra phyed dur khrod sol ba dang / /khrag chen ldong ros ba bla yis/ /dbang thob dam tshig srung byed cing / /shin tu gsang la dam pa yi/ /ri
mo mkhan ni brtson ldan des/ /rgyud kyi don la mkhas byas nas/ /nag po'i dus kyi mtshan phyed dus/ /gsang ba'i gnas su rab zhugs nas/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes 'jigs
mdzad bri/ /rtsa ba ma he khros pa'i zhal/ /de steng 'jam dpal 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /lhag ma dkar dang ser dang dmar/ /du ba'i mdog mtshungs gyen skra can/ /rab tu rjid cing
khro ba'i zhal/ /drug dang ldan pa'i sku lus che/ /thod pa skam rlon rgyu ma sbrul/ /rus pa rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan/ /glang chen stag lpags gyon nas ni/ /pad+ma nyi ma ma he la/ /
gshin rje mnan nas zhabs drug gis/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum gar gyis 'gying / /phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na/ /rtse gcig gnyis pa tho ba ste/ /gsum pa
gtun shing mkha' la 'phyar/ /dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa ni/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'dzin pa bri/ /nam mkha'i mdog can thal bas byugs/ /sku las khro bo du ma
'phro| |sna tshogs mchod pa'i lha mos bskor/ /legs par de ltar bris pa yi/ /rgyab dang phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /dur khrod chen pos bskor ba bri/ /mgo rdum rgyu ma
mkha' la khyer/ /rkang rdum lag rdum ro langs dang / /wa dang spyang ki gtum po dang / /mkha' 'gro pho mo sha za'i tshogs/ /bya dang gcan gzan sna tshogs bri/ /skyi bung rab tu
'jigs bris nas/ /der ni sgrub pa po yang bri/ /gri thod bzung nas sha chen mur/ /gos nag gyon nas khrag chen 'thung / /rta dang ma he rus pa yi/ /phreng ba bzung nas gsang sngags
'don| |bcom ldan 'das la blta ba bri/ /de ltar bris nas chang dang khrag /sha chen go ro tsa nas mchod/ /mnyam gzhag lha yi dge 'dun des/ /dus gsum rgyun du mchod
byed na| |rdo rje 'dzin pa myur du thob/ /sku ni rab tu sba zhing gsang / /phan yon dam pa 'di las 'byung / /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ bris sku'i le'u ste
gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /rtog pa ma lus zad byed cing / /las rnams thams cad 'grub 'dod pas/ /blo ldan ser sna rnam spangs te/ /
brtul phod g.yeng ba rnam spangs nas/ /sbyin sreg las la rab brtson bya/ /mtshal dang ba bla ldong ros dang / /bshan pa'i go thal dur khrod sa/ /mi dang ma he khrag gis brdzi/ /
@#/ /khru do pa la khru phyed brtsi /gru bzhi'i steng du zlum po ni/ /rdo rje rgya gram ldan byas la/ /de steng 'khor lo rtsibs drug la/ /mtshan ma drug ni dgod
par bya| |lte bar me yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /mtho gang tshad du byas pa la/ /ma he'i khrag gis legs par byug /bdag nyid lho yi phyogs bltas te/ /ma he zhal gyi sbyor ba
yis| |thab kyi nang gi lte ba la/ /me yi sa bon mngon bltas la/ /bskal pa'i me chen lta bur bsgom/ /der ni me lha bsgom bya ste/ /zhal gsum phyag drug nag la rtsub/ /phyag
gnyis rang 'dra'i yum la 'khyud/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gis 'gro rnams la/ /skyabs sbyin mdzad cing bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /g.yon pas ril ba mchog stsol brtson/ /zhabs drug
rigs drug mtshan ma brdzis/ /zhal nas me rnams rab 'phro zhing / /'od rnams sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /de ltar shes nas rab bsregs na/ /'dod pa'i don rnams
rab tu 'byung / /dgra bo'i gzugs rnams sha chen dang / /chang dang ma he'i khrag bcas pa/ /stong phrag gsum du bsregs byas na/ /bsgrub bya khrag tu skyugs nas 'chi/ /
glang po rta bong khyi sha la/ /stong phrag gsum gyis dbang du byed/ /bya rog 'ug pa khyi sha chu/ /bsregs na me lha 'bye bar 'gyur/ /til dang nas dang gro sA lu/ /yung ba gi waM
so phag rnams/ /stong phrag drug tu gang bsregs pa/ /longs spyod thams cad rnyed par 'gyur/ /rta dang rnga mong bya rog sha /mi sha rdo rje chur bcas pa/ /gsang sngags rnal 'byor ldan
byas te| |brgya rtsa brgyad kyis nges par skrod/ /ra sha daN+Da ut+pa la/ /chang dang ma he chur bcas pa/ /gang 'dod brgya rtsa brgyad kyis lkugs/ /dug dang khrag dang sgog pa dang / /sha chen
til mar rab sbags te/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs byas na/ /pha rol gzhan gyi gsang sngags gcod/ /tsan+dan dkar po 'bras dkar dang / /til can 'bras can yungs kar
dang / /ut+pal ka ra ga pur dang / /shar du bltas te brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bsregs na dus rnams kun tu srung / /gang zhig bya ba'i rig sogs dang / /sngags rnams bsam gtan nges
ldan pas/ /snying rje yid ni ma bral na/ /'dod pa thams cad 'dir bsgrub bya/ /gzhan du rmongs pas byas pa bslu/ /blo gros med gang shes rab 'chal/ /sngags dang dam tshig
dman gyur cing / /ting nge 'dzin la mngon g.yel ba/ /brtson pa chung zhing lhod pa 'gas/ /bskal pa stong du bsgrubs byas kyang / /'bras bu yod pa ma yin te/ /sha thang chad pa nyid
du zad| |dper na blo zhan byis pa rnams/ /'ga' zhig 'bras 'dod 'khrul gyur nas/ /phub ma rlung khar byed pa la/ /'bras yod nam yang mi 'gyur bzhin/ /ji ltar sprin dang chu
@#/ /zla dang / /dbang po'i gzhu rnams rtag min te/ /thar pa 'dod pa'i bya ba yang / /sgyu ma nyid la sgyu ma rol/ /ye shes gcig pu rnam grol rgyu/ /stong pa dpag
par blos mi nus/ /de la spyad cing gzhan bzod na/ /brtags pa'i snying po de la med/ /de la dngos rnams ma grub na/ /sgrub pa'i rim gzhan smos ci dgos/ /bya ba dang ni byed pa
dag /nges par de la brtag mi bzod/ /ngam grog g.yang sar lhung yang bla'i/ /chad par rtog pa 'di mi bzod/ /rtag pa nyid kyang rigs min te/ /dngos po yod par ga la 'gyur//
dper na byis pa rnams la mas/ /sa 'dir sdod dang ma nyid kyis/ /'bras bu shing thog mang blangs la/ /khyod la bde bas sbyin zhes brjod/ /de bzhin rnam pa du ma yang / /'jig
rten rtog pa tha dad pas/ /de dag drang bar bya phyir bshad/ /bcom ldan lha yi lha mdun du/ /sha chen po yi zhal zas dang / /chang dang til mar ma he khrag /rab tu zhim pa'i zas
mchog rnams/ /dus rnams rtag tu dbul bar bya/ /gsang sngags rgyal po yi ge bcu/ /bdag gis rgyun du gdon bya zhing / /bsam gtan rtag tu brtson par bya/ /de ltar
shes shing sgrub byed pa'i/ /skyes bu blo ldan de yis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang myur 'grub 'gyur/ /zhi sogs las la smos ci dgos/ /grong khyer dkrugs na sngags pa des/ /
khyi sha sbal sha rus sbal sha /rnga mong byi la'i sha rnams la/ /stong rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya/ /rta sha dri chen rab sbyar nas/ /ril bu byas nas bdag mdun du/ /gsang sngags rgyal po
bzlas byas nas/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs pas ni/ /rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /bud med dbang du byed 'dod na/ /nya sha chang dang sha chen rnams/ /rdo rje chu yis sbags byas te/ /brgya
rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya/ /tha mal dbang du byed 'dod na/ /sha chen glang po'i sha dang bcas/ /byang chub sems dang bsres byas te/ /stong phrag brgyad du bsreg par bya/ /dgug pa dus
rnams thams cad du/ /khyi sha nya sha bdud rtsi lnga/ /cha mnyam ril bu byas nas ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na 'gugs/ /sbyin sreg las rnams thams cad kyang / /ma he zhal gyi
sbyor bas ni/ /gsang sngags rgyal pos 'dod pa sbyar/ /ma yengs rtse gcig sems kyis bya/ /gsungs dang ma gsungs mtha' dag kyang / /ji lta ba yi rim pa yis/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po
nyid nyer gnas/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu myur du 'thob/ /zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis te/ /rgyal po lta bur rgyas pa la/ /sdang bral chags pas dbang la 'o/ /drag po'i las la khro zhing
rtsub/ |rab tu gtum pa'i yid kyis ni/ /gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par bya/ /gang zhig ltos pa med pa'i mi/ /grub pa myur du tshol byed na/ /sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag pa/ /
@#/ /rdo rje 'dzin par de 'grub 'gyur/ /dngos po gang dang gang spyod yul/ /de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro/ /mnyam gzhag nyams par mi bya la/ /dus rnams rtag
tu rnal 'byor pas/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag par bya/ /de ni thar pa nyid kyi rgyu/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di las ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub myur byed de/ /dka' ba med pa'i thabs
'di ni| |dka' spyod brtul zhugs rnam spangs te/ /shin tu bde bar sgrub pa'i thabs/ /duHkha 'jigs med bdud rtsi'i ro/ /blo ldan legs par blang bya ste/ /shin tu 'bad pas
bsgrub par bya/ /mi shes blo gros rmongs pa 'ga'/ /rtog pa'i dra bas bsgribs pa'i tshe/ /bsod nams dang ni sdig pa yi/ /phung po rnam pa gnyis su brtag /'on kyang 'dod pa
thams cad ni/ /rgyud mchog 'di las 'byung 'gyur phyir/ /dmar zhing brtson pa chung ba 'ga'/ /'di la zhugs na myur du 'grub/ /de bas ngo mtshar rgyud 'di ni/ /rnyed dka'
khyad par mchog gyur pa/ /yi ge'i dbyibs kyang mi bstan na/ /bshad cing 'grol ba smos ci dgos/ /dbang rnams nges par ma blangs shing / /bla ma mnyes par ma byas tshe/ /
bstan kyang thob par mi 'gyur te/ /tsha ba la sogs 'khor bar 'khor/ /de skad ston pas bshad pa'i tshe/ /sde rnams myos shing ba rgyal rmongs te/ /kun kyang 'dud cing mgo
bo smad/ /'jig rten 'di ni shin tu g.yos/ /gang zhig rgyud 'di nyan pa dang / /shes nas 'chad par byed pa dang / /dus rnams kun tu 'don byed na/ /tshe 'dir 'jigs pa kun bsal te/ /shi
nas mtho ris myur du 'thob/ gal te gzhan du rgyud mchog 'di/ /bstan nas bshad dam gsal phye na/ /de ni sdug bsngal mang myong nas/ /shi nas myur du dmyal bar 'gro /rang gis
shin tu bcang byas shing / /dngos grub nyid bzhin mngon byas na/ /sdug bsngal mtha' dag nges zad nas/ /myur du bla med thob par 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi
rgyal po las/ sbyin sreg gi rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las kyi dngos grub brtag pa zhes bya ba rdzogs

so// //paN+Di ta chen po a mo g+ha'i zhabs nus ba can dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba mar pa ban+d+he chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/ /slad kyis grub thob chen po kar+Na shrI'i zhal snga

nas nyan te thar pa lots+tsha nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI kriSh+Na ya mA ri tan+t+ra rA dza tri kalpa nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi

rgyal po rtog ba gsum pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don dam chos sku zhi ba nyid/ /gang 'dir khams gsum rnam rgyal te/ /gshin rje dgra zhes grags pa yi/ /'khor lo bskor ba'i
@#/ /cho ga bshad/ /yon tan ldan pa'i sngags pa yis/ /cho ga bzhin du bsnyen byas nas/ /dur khrod dben pa la sogs par/ /dkyil 'khor khru do tshad du bya/ /dri dang ba yi
rnam lnga dang / /nyi zla sogs pas byi dor bya/ /ba lang la sogs dam rdzas lnga/ /gzhan yang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / /phyi nang phyed pa'i bye brag gis/ /legs par mchod pa byas nas ni/ /
'khor lo bri dang btu ba dang / /drang dang bsre dang spo ba brtsams/ /sngags pa rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te/ /dam tshig rjes su dran pa yis/ /oM badzra sa ma
ya s+t+waM| gsang sngags 'di ni rjes dran byed/ /'khor lo bri ba brtsam par bya/ /dbus nas sor tshad bcu drug par/ /kun nas zlum pos bskor na ni/ /'di ni nang gi dkyil 'khor te/ /
rim pa gsum du bskor ba la/ /sgo med lcags mkhar bcu drug bya/ /'di ni gshin rje'i grong khyer te/ /srid pa gsum gyi 'jug sa yin/ /de yi phyi rim mu khyud gsum/ /kun tu
lcags ris bskor ba ste/ /mu khyud de dag re re yang / /khang pa sum cu gnyis dang ldan/ /'gro ba chos bzhin spyod pa yi/ /'khor lo 'di ltar bris nas ni/ /phyi rol mu khyud tha ma la/ /
yi ge ka sogs da yig mthar/ /nga nya bsal nas dgod par bya/ /yi ge d+ha sogs k+Sha yig mthar/ /de yi rjes su bri bar bya/ /mu khyud dbus ma dag la ni/ /dbyangs yig bcu drug
nyis 'gyur dgod/ /btu dang dgod sogs rtsom pa na/ /mtshan ma 'di dag shes par bya/ /zla ba mig dang yon tan dang / /rig byed mda' dang dbang po dang / /rgya mtsho bkra shis gza' dang
phyogs| |drag po nyi ma yan lag sa/ /tshes zhes bya bar rab tu grags/ /phyi rol mu khyud tha ma la/ /shar gyi tshangs thig nas brtsams nas/ /rim min gza' can khang pa nas/ /yi ge bkra
shis tsam blangs te/ /nang gi ngos kyi mu khyud kyi/ /tshangs thig gi ni ngos dag la/ /phyogs bzhir mig gi tshad du sbyin/ /rim min phyogs can khang ba pa nas/ /yi ge mig gi tshad blangs te/ /
shar du de yi g.yas g.yon gzhag /rim min bkra shis khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa can blangs nas/ /mig gi tshad du byas nas ni/ /de yi ngos la re re gzhag /nub kyi tshangs
thig nas grangs pa'i/ /rgya mtsho can gyi khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig dang ldan pa/ /mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni/ /lho yi ngos su de bzhin sbyin/ /nub nas rim pa min pa yi/ /
zla ba can gyi khyim nas ni/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum dang ldan pa/ /mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni/ /lho ngos de rjes sbyin par bya/ /de nyid dbyangs yig gsal ba ni/ /mig gi tshad du
blangs nas kyang / /sngon bzhin nub kyi ngos su sbyin/ /nub nas bkra shis khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa ldan pa/ /mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni/ /nub kyi ngos su de bzhin sbyin/ /
@#/ /byang nas bkra shis khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa ldan pa/ /mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni/ /byang gi ngos la de bzhin sbyin/ /rlung gi sa bon zhes bya
ba| |mig gi tshad blangs de bzhin sbyin/ /mda' can khang pa nang gnas pa'i/ /'od kyi gong bur byas pa dang / /de nyid nas ni bgrangs pa yi/ /gza' can khang pa la gnas pa/ /dbyangs yig
gsum par ldan pa dag /zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni/ /byang shar mtshams su re re sbyin/ /rgya mtsho'i khang pa la gnas pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa ldan pa dag /rim min yon tan
khang pa nas/ /zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni/ /shar lho mtshams su de bzhin sbyin/ /rim min bkra shis khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa ldan pa dag /yan lag can gyi khang pa nas//
zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni/ /lho nub mtshams su de bzhin sbyin/ /rim min tshes can khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa ldan pa dang / /rim min bkra shis khang pa nas/ /zla
ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni/ /nub byang mtshams su de bzhin sbyin/ /de ltar dgod par byas nas ni/ /de nas drang ba brtsam par bya/ /dam tshig rjes su dran byed cing / /rdo rje shugs dang
ldan pa yi/ /shar gyi tshangs thig ngos gnyis nas/ /yi ge zung ldan drangs nas ni/ /dbus kyi khang par gzhag par bya/ /phyogs gzhan tshangs thig ngos dag na/ /de bzhin zung
ldan drangs nas ni/ /de bzhin dbus kyi khang par gzhag /de nas shar gyi yi ger yang / /zung ldan gnyis pa drangs nas ni/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i khang par gzhag /phyogs gzhan du
yang de bzhin no/ /shar gyi zung ldan gsum pa yang / /rim pa gsum pa'i khang par drang / /phyogs gzhan du yang de bzhin no/ /mtshams kyi yi ge ya bral ni/ /rang rang nang gi
mtshams su drang / /de dag phyung ba'i khang steng du/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge drang bar bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gzhi la ni/ /ming gi yi ge drang bar bya/ /ming gi yi ge bzhi la ni/ /so so'i las
dang mthun pa yi/ /skul ba'i yi ge dgod par bya/ /bsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba la/ /yi ge phaT ni gzhag par bya/ /mnan pa la yang yi ge laM/ /zhi ba la ni yi ge oM/ /rgyas pa de bzhin
yi ge swa| |dbang la baM gyis brgyan pa ste/ /dgug pa la ni yi ge dza/ /de la las kyi 'od zer ni/ /zhi ba chu ste rgyas pas/ /dbang ni rlung ste drag po me/ /dbye dgug bskrad pa dbang dang
mthun| |mnan pa dag ni rgyas pa bzhin/ /drang ba'i sbyor ba byas nas ni/ /bsre ba'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya/ /gnyis med sngags dang ldan pa yis/ /dbus kyi bkra shis yi ge yang / /
zla ltar 'od kyi gong bur bya/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa yang / /'od kyi gong bu de nang du/ /'dod pa'i bsgrub bya gzhag par bya/ /de dkyil rang ming dang bor gzhag /phyogs kyi khyim
@#/ /na gnas pa yi/ /yi ge zung ma thams cad dang / /de tshe 'od kyi gong bur bya/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa yang / /bcu gnyis khyim du spel te bri/ /byin rlob
hUM zhes bya ba yang / /khang pa re la zur re mdzes/ /yongs su dag pa dgod byas nas/ /mchod dang gtor ma byas nas ni/ /spo ba dag ni brtsam par bya/ /las kyi dbye ba ji lta
bar| |'khor lo'i ras ni blang bya ste/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa la/ /shin tu dge ba'i ras la bya/ /dbang dang dgug la smad 'tshong sogs/ /bsad dang dbye dang bskrad pa dang / /mnan pa
la ni dur khrod ras/ /gi wang gur gum zhi rgyas la/ /dbang dang dgug la tsan+dan dmar/ /mnan pa la ni ldong ros sogs/ /bskrad la bya rog khrag gis te/ /dbye ba rta dang ma he
sogs| |bsad la dug la sogs pas bri/ /dge ba'i las la bzang po'i shing / /dge min la ni rus pa dang / /lcags la sogs pas bri bar bya/ /zhi la shar blta dbang la
nub| |rgyas la byang ste drag por lho/ /gzhan ni ci rigs sbyar bar bya/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa la/ /sa bskor rim bzhin dgod par bya/ /gnam bskor dag ni rim las
bzlog /bsad bskrad dbye ba mnan pa la/ /sa bskor rim las bzlog pa ste/ /gnam bskor dag ni rim bzhin bri/ /'di ltar legs par ma bris na/ /'khor lo rang la ldog
par 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan bskyed de bya/ /ras kyi 'khor lo legs zin nas/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor te/ /ras kyi 'khor lor spyan drangs te/ /rdo rje bsdu ba'i sbyor ba
yis| |dkyil 'khor 'khor lo btu bar bya/ /ras kyi 'khor lo mchod nas ni/ /bden pa'i byin brlabs dmigs par bya/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /'khor lo spo ba byas
nas ni/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dam tshig gi sngags so/ /oM badzra be ga /rdo rje shugs kyi sngags so/ /oM badzra a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ye
swAhA/ yi ge bsre ba'i sngags so/ /oM badzra sa mA dza/ 'khor lo spo ba'i sngags so/ /oM ya ma rA dzA sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo na ri yak+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni ra ma ya
phaT phaT/ 'di ni/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te/ las thams cad pa'o/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hUM phaT/ 'di ni/ las kyi gsang sngags te/ las thams cad pa'o/ /shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ zhi

bar bskul ba'o/ /puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ rgyas pa'i 'o/ /ba shaM ku ru swAhA/ dbang gi'o/ /ma ra ya phaT/ bsad pa'i 'o/ /bi dwe Sha ya phaT/ dbye ba'i 'o/ /uts+tsha Ta ya phaT/ bskrad pa'i 'o/ /staM b+ha ya
hUM laM/ mnan pa'i 'o/ /A kaR+Sha ya hUM/ dgug pa'i 'o/ /oM muM/ slar dgrol ba'i sngags so/ /A li kA li'i grong khyer ni/ /gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rtsa ba ste/ /las kyi brtson ra dag kyang

@#/ /yin| |yi ge btu ba med na ni/ /gsang sngags sgra ni log par 'gyur/ /yi ge tshong bar ma bkod na/ /gsang sngags sgra ni log par 'gyur/ /yi ge tshang bar ma bkod na/ /gsang sngags sgra ni log par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags
brda yis ma brjod na/ /sngags ni dngos grub med par 'gyur/ /drang ba dag ni ma byas na/ /shin tu 'khor bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yi ge bsre ba ma byas na/ /bcu drug khang pa don med 'gyur/ /bskor
phyogs log na don mi 'grub/ /rig sngags nyams dang log pa ni/ /lha min g.yul las pham pa dang / /dbang po'i dgra yis dgra bsad bzhin/ /'khor lo spo ba ma byas na/ /cho ga ngag ni
nyams par 'gyur/ /rgyu yin pa dang sbyor ba dang / /dad pa brtan pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan bskyed de bya/ /dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog
pa ste dang po'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sngags pas rtag tu bsten pa ni/ /rus sbal 'o ma zhes bya dang / /de bzhin 'od kyi lo ma dang / /'jim pa skam po nyid

dang ni/ /de bzhin me yi khu ba dang / /sgra snyan gyi ni rdzas dag dang / /'di rnams rtag tu dpyad na ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni nad med cing / /tshe ring dbang po rgyas pa dang / /rtag tu lang tsho dar la
bab/ /lha rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob/ /'di la dpyad par mi bya ste/ /mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis grub/ /ting 'dzin sngags kyis byin brlabs na/ /las kyi rnam smin sbyong par byed/ /rig pa

'dzin pa'i sa la gnas/ /de phyir cho ga bzhin du bsten/ /tshes gcig skya rengs shar ba ni/ /snod la ma reg rus spal zho/ /drod ma yal bar btung ba'am// yang na nyi ma'i sbu gus btud/ /mar gyi ngo yi tshes

gcig la/ /'od kyi lo ma btsal nas ni/ /den yid nas ni gzung bar bya/ /zhag gsum skya rengs shar ba na/ /la ma de bcad bza' bar bya/ /yang na nyi ma'i spu gsum btung / /'jim pa bzang po sbyar nas ni/ /

zhag gsum chu yi nang du sbang / /de blangs nas ni yang bskams nas/ /phyi ma byi la'i spar chad re/ /ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar nas/ /sngags pas rtag tu btung bar bya/ /me yi sdong po sar pa ni/ /sa yi mar gyis

dril nas ni/ /kha sbyar sbyor dang ldan byas na/ /me chu sa yis btsir nas ni/ /btung ngam nyi ma'i sbu gus btung / /lan tshwa bral ba dag la ni/ /zhag gsum 'chi ba'i sgra brnyan rdzas/ /nam gyi dus la
sngags pas blangs/ /cha gsum snod du zhag gsum bzhag /kha yi cha ni byugs pa ste/ /dbus ma'i cha ni bdud rtsi nyid/ /rtsa ba'i cha ni dor ba ste/ /'di rnams so sor brtan pa na/ /tha mal 'bras bu
gsum gyi phye/ /byi la'i spar tshad de dang sbyar/ /ma sbyar na yang nyes pa med/ /tshogs par brten na bza' bar bya/ /re re bsten kyang nyes pa med/ /'jam dpal gyi rtog pa las/ /dam rdzas sman
du bsgyur te bstan pa'i cho ga'i rtog pa ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni/ /las kyi grogs kyi bye brag ste/ /zhi ba'i las ni zla ba yin/ /rgyas pa de bzhin mig
@#/ /tu bsgrags/ /dbye ba yon tan zhes bya ste/ /dbang du bya ba rig byed yin/ /dgug ba'i las la de bzhin mda'/ /bskrad dang mnan pa dbang po yin/ /mnan ba rjes su
'brangs pa yis/ /bsad pa'i las ni rgya mtshor 'dod/ /las rnams de dag re re yang / /'phags tshogs mchod sbyin dang po ste/ /nyi ma gnyis par gtor ma sbyin/ /gsum pa bzlas pa rnam
par 'bad/ /bzhi pa sbyin sreg tshang bar bya/ /lnga pa las kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /drug pa bsam gtan rtse gcig bya/ /bdun pa las kyi lhag chad bskrad/ /grogs kyi las la khyad par du/ /las kyi
gtsor ni gang sgrub de'i/ /'khor lo bskor ba nyi ma bzhi/ /las kyi bye brag 'di shes na/ /zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob/ /rgyas pas yon tan drug dang 'byor/ /dbang gis mos pa rnam bzhir
bsgyur/ /dbye bas gsang sde brgyad dang 'byed/ /mnan pas dbang po drug 'ching byed/ /gzhan yang ji lta de bzhin du/ /sngags dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba la/ /dpyad na dngos grub mi 'grub ste/ /gal
te yid gnyis za gyur tam/ /bsam pa 'gyur ram dad pa nyams/ /de tshe dngos grub nye ba yang / /phyir ldog 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /dad pa brtan pos bsgrubs pa na/ /nam mkha' med par gyur
na yang / /sngags kyi dngos grub med mi srid/ /lha dang drang srong gis bshad pa'i/ /rig sngags bslu ba mi srid na/ /'dod chags bral bas bshad pa yi/ /gsang sngags sbyor bas bslu ba ni//

ma byung 'gyur bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /don la the tshom med pa yis/ /mkhas pa la ni dngos grub nye/ /yang na blun po dad pa brtan/ /de la sbyor ba'i dngos grub nye/ /rtog
cing dpyod pa'i rtog ge ba/ /de la sgrub pa'i dngos grub ring / /bla mas man ngag bstan byas kyang / /slob ma yid gnyis za gyur na/ /de la dngos grub ring bar bshad/ /bla mas man ngag spas
byas kyang / /slob ma yid gnyis mi za zhing / /bla ma'i man ngag dam pa zhes/ /gces spras byas na 'grub par nges/ /de yi phyir na sngags pa yis/ /rang gi yid gnyis spang ba'i phyir/ /
bla ma mnyes par bya ba gces/ /bsnyen bkur byas na nus mthu che/ /gsang ste brjod pas bar chad med/ /yon tan phul ba byas pas ni/ /rang sems rin chen rnam gnyis 'gyur/ /rin chen
gnyis las grub par 'byung / /dkon par gyur pas sngags pa brjod/ /bsngags na yon tan 'byung 'gyur te/ /bsngags pa dag ni ma byas na/ /ji ltar yid bzhin nor
bu yang / /gang gis bsngags pa ma byas pa/ /de la 'dod don mi ster ro/ /dad pa sangs rgyas dad pa chos/ /dad pa dge 'dun dad pa ma/ /dad pa bla ma dad pa pha/ /
dad pa lam chen dad pa gru/ /dad pa yid bzhin nor bu ste/ /dad pa gsang sngags dngos grub nyid/ /dad pa bsod nams nor yin te/ /de yi phyir na sngags pa yis/ /rang
@#/ /sems dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ /gzhan la gus ba mchog tu bkur/ /dbal gshin rje gshed nag bo'i 'khor lo bskor
ba'i cho ga las/ las kyi rgyud dang grogs bsten pa'i rtog pa ste gsum pa'o// //gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud rtog pa gsum pa
rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bcom ldan nyid kyi sku gsung
thugs/ /rdo rje rnams las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yi/ /lho phyogs rgya mtsho pha rgal na/ /de nas gshin rje'i grong khyer ni/ /ga la ba yi
gnas su byon/ /mi bzad zhabs ni bcu drug gis/ /lcags mkhar sgo med bcu drug brdzis/ /ye shes rtse gcig mtshan ma yis/ /dbus kyi lcags
mkhar chen po brdzis/ /de tshe bdud chen las rgyal nas/ /ha ha hi hi'i sgra sgrog pas/ /chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa/ /gzir bzhin du ni
rab smras pa/ /dpa' bo chen po ga la ci/ /dpa' bo'i dgongs pa bdag gis bgyi/ /bdag cag srog gi snying po rnams/ /tshul bzhin
'bul gyi dpa' bo bzhes/ /lha ma srin ni sde brgyad kyi/ /srog gi yang snying phul ba ni/ /gshin rjes ya phul ma mos ma/ /srin bos ra phul gnod sbyin k+She/ /mi yis Ni phul sa bdags//
btsan gyis tsa phul bdud kyis da/ /de rnams gcig tu dril ba ni/ /bran du yang ni khas blangs so/ /gtan tshigs chen po de yi phyir/ /ye shes lha yi dgongs pa dang / /bsnyen pa nyams
'og rab chud nas/ /lha yi bsnyen pa rab chud nas/ /sngon gyi thugs dam las mi 'da'/ /mi 'grub pa ni mi srid do/ /ya mA ra dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da ro ni ra yak+She
ya/ /yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de skad smras pa dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis/ /chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa/ /gshin rje'i pho nya la sogs kun/ /sgrol ba'i bran
du byin gyis brlabs/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /'khor bcas kun la bka' bsgo ba/ /lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la/ /nga yi bstan pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ /rnal 'byor rig 'dzin ldan pa
la| |bka' bsgo'i las rnams tshul bzhin gyis/ /zhes pas dam bcas pa dang / mnan bzhin du mna' bor ro/ /gtam rgyud kyi rtog pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
bri lo ta re/ bod skad du/ /te'u lo ba'i sgrub pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /drag po'i bsam pas gnas 'dug ste/ /
@#/ /te'u lo pags pa srog 'khor ldan/ /de yi sha khrag mchod gtor te/ /rkyal bu'i nang du bsgrub bya'i rdzas/ /rus pa ming rus ldan pa gzhug /skra yis bcings
la khung bur gzhug /bdag nyid lhar bskyed mdun du ni/ /b+h+ruM las dbyug to de yis mtshan/ /de gyur dbang chen thal ba'i mdog /dbyug tho thod pa 'dzin pa ste/ /khrag dang thal
bas spras pa las/ /mi srun 'khor gyis bskor ba bskyed/ /ma hA de ba shwa ra ra/ dgra bo mA ra ya tsit+ta hu ra thuM/ lha yi las la bskul nas ni/ /de yi gang yin bkug la bstim/ /
rtags byung nas ni hoM du bya/ /te'u lo pa'i sha khrag spu dang rus/ /sngar gyi ling+ga bcas pa de/ /dbang phyug chen po'i zhal du dbul/ /na maHmahA b+hu ti dgra bo mA ra ya phaT/ bstan pa'i
dgra 'dul las mkhan yin/ /las mkhan te'u lo pa'i rtog pa rgyud 'bum pa nas phyung ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya badzra b+hai ra ba d+hA ra NI nA ma/ bod skad du/
'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma
sel ba/ mtha' yas pa/ mu thug pa med pa/ dam pa sbyin pa/ shin tu rgya che ba/ thams cad bdag la mthun par rtag tu mtha' yas pa'i dam pa'i mchog stsol bar gyur
cig /de la nga'i rdo rje'i tshig 'di dag go/ /a ra ra/ a sa ma/ sa ma tA/ a nan+ta/ d+harme tre/ kha NA kha NA/ ma hA bi re/ tsa le sa ma ma/ A sa ha/ ma hA ba le/ kaN ka Na/ ma hA ba la

ag gri he/ ha ha badzra badzra hA ye/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hUM hUM maN+Da la sa ma ba ra ak+k+ra bi kra me/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ sarbaM thA/ sarba ti/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ak+k+ri Ni phaT swA hA/ rig sngags dang / gsang
sngags thams cad kyi snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan stong bzlas brjod byas na/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags thams cad lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas par
'gyur ro/ /las gzhan thams cad kyang don yod cing thogs pa med par byed de/ dam tshig gsum pa'i cho ga las 'byung ba'i rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang /
gzungs thams cad kyi nang na las thams cad byed pa yin no/ /de nas cho ga mi bzad pa/ /rdo rje gtams pa 'dra ba ni/ /klu dang lha srin bcas pa yi/ /sum cu gsum lhas mi shigs
pa| |de khros pas ni lhas mchod pa'i/ /brgya byin nyid kyang 'dar bar 'gyur/ /'byung po kun gyis ma smad pa/ /de ni srung bar byed pa'i mchog /ji ltar lhar bcas 'jig rten na/ /

sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med/ /bden pa'i tshig ni de yis ni/ /skye bo kun la srung gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ oM badzra pra ka ra/ badzra pra ka ra/ badzra daM Sh+TaM/ b+ha yA pa hA/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ba ri tsu ma
@#/ /bi ke /tsu lu te le/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo badzra b+he ra wa s+ya/ ma hA ga Na ba ti s+ya/ badzra shak+ti/ bar shu/ pA sha /hastA ya/ badzra ka na ka /badzre bai DUR+ya/ a
laM kri /shA rI rA ya/ badzra pA Ni ra nu pa lA ya/ tad+ya thA/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ a na yA/ a na yA/ ma hA ga Na pa ti la g+hu la g+hu/ e hi e hi/ a kra ma a kra ma/ sha raM rAM/ gri hI ta ma/ gri

hI ta ma| daMSh+Ta ma/ daMSh+Ta mA bA/ at+t+ra bi sha tu sha rI raM/ kiny+tsi rA ya si/ bi d+hu na/ ba d+ha na/ ba Ta pa Ta/ kaM pa kaM pa/ raM ga raM ga /mo da mo da/ d+harma d+harma/ badzri bA badzri bA/ spu ra spu ra/ gur na
gurna| a bi sha a bi sha/ shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM/ ma hA badzra b+hai ra we/ ga Na pa ti ra dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ cho ga la dgra thams cad rengs par bya ba dang / byad stems thams cad bcad pa
la ni/ ba'i lci ba la dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ sems khros pas mtshon cha la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te sa la btsugs na/ de ma thag tu byad stems thams
cad chad par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs zlog par 'dod pas ni/ dbyug pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te de phyogs su 'phangs na/ dgra thams cad myos par
'gyur ro/ /klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ khros te rdo rje la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te bsnun na klu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /ser ba zlog par 'dod pas ni/ rdo rje ha cang
ma drag bar bskor zhing sgra yang ha cang gsang mi mtho bar brjod na/ klu rnams ser ba mi 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /chang srung bar 'dod pas ni/ /chang gi rdzas rnams yungs kar la
lan bdun bsngags na thub par 'gyur ro/ /nad zhi bar 'dod pa la ni/ nad dang mthun ba'i sman nam chu la lan bdun bsngags te 'thungs sam byugs na nad las grol bar 'gyur
ro| |las gang byed pa thams cad la'ang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na bsam pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba ma rungs pa phyir
zlog pa rdzogs so// //'phags pas gsungs pa'i gzungs rnams rnam mang yang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal nas gsungs ba'i gzungs/ /bsrung bya'i las bdun ldan
pa'i gzungs mchog 'di/ /kun gyis thun mong ma yin rnal 'byor dam pa'i gzungs/ /rnal 'byor gyi rnal 'byor chen po don yod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas bsgyur nas bod kyi ban+d+he skyo 'od
'byung la gnang ngo // //rgya gar skad du/ shri rak+ta ya mA ri tan+t+ra ra dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dbal gshin rje gshed dmar po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal gshin rje
gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i
@#/ /b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang
ba las shin tu gsang ba'i mchog /e ma ho/ phyag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /snying rje chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje/ zhe sdang rdo rje/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i snying po gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sku nyon cig /phyag na rdo rje gsol pa/ gshin rje 'joms pa po rnams ji snyed lags pa 'dir bshad du
gsol/ gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / phra ma rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / phrag dog rdo rje gshin rje gshed ces bya'o//
rdo rje tsa rtsi ka dang / rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang / rdo rje gau ri rnams kyang ngo / /zur du bum pa bzhi rnams so/ /de ltar rab tu bskor ba'i gshin rje gshed
kyi tshogs chen po rnams so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje/ rdo rje sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bos par gyur te/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag /bdun thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang
thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung bar mdzad pa ni /sngags kyi dgug dang dbang chen dang / /de bzhin nus pa rnam mang po/ /ral gri sgrub dang rgyal srid dang / /pha rol sde ni rnam
'joms dang / /mi snang mig sman bcud nyid dang / /nges par grig la 'phrog par mkhas/ /ro langs gnod sbyin sgrub pa dang / /sbrul dang gdug pa'i tshogs srung dang / /sbyin sreg
dkyil 'khor las rnams dang / /byang chub sems ni rnam dpyod dang / /nyer mkho thams cad spyod pa dang / /pha rol grong du rab 'jug pa'o/ /'od zer ldan ni mnyam 'khrigs pa'i/ /
rdo rje srung ba'i don bsgom bya/ /sa yi cha yang rdo rje yis/ /de bzhin ra ba dang ni gur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa po bdud thams cad rnam
par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa thams cad kyi sa bon 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
rnams las nges par phyung ngo / /dbus su ya'o/ /k+She ma me dang yats+tsha na rI dza do ru Na yo ni ra ya yig la sogs pa gshin rje 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /gti mug k+She yig la brjod
bya| |phra ma nyid brjod ma yig la'o/ /'dod chags nyid kyang me yig la/ /da yig la yang phrag dog yin/ /lnga rnams gshin rje 'joms par bsgrags/ /dza yig tsartsi ka ru brjod//
@#/ /sa yig la ni phag mo ste/ /dbyangs can ma brjod do yig la/ /ru yig la ni gau rA ri 'dod/ /Na yo ni ra zur bzhi ru/ /mi yi thod pa bzhi rnams so/ /de
nas nges par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag gshin rje gshed rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhes sdang
chen po'i rigs 'di sgom pa'i rnal 'byor 'di gsungs so/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod par ldan/ /blo bzang sems can don dang gcig /byams sogs yon tan yang
dag rdzogs/ /dad dang thos pas rnam par brgyan/ /brtse ba'i bdag nyid can snga dro/ /thog mar kha sogs dag byas te/ /skye bos dben phyogs dur khrod sogs/ /bde ba'i stan
la rang brtsam bya/ /rang nyid pad+mar nyi ma la/ /rnam bkod shin tu gsal ba'i blta/ /de 'od rnams kyis sems can don/ /phun tshogs byas nas spyan drangs te/ /bla ma rdzogs
sangs rgyas bsgom bya/ /ma lus mkha' dkyil rnams khyab pa/ /dmigs te de rnams la ni phyag /lus kyi tshogs kyis rnam par brtson/ /tsartsi ka sogs rnams kyis
mchod| |de nas sdig pa rab bshags bya/ /lus ngag yid kyis yang dag sdig /byas dang byed 'gyur de bzhin du/ /gang yang rjes su yi rang ba/ /mgon po dus gsum
byas de bshags/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang mtshungs rnams kyi/ /bsod nams tshogs la rjes yi rang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam chos bcas/ /tshogs mchog rnams la
skyabs su mchi/ /yon tan rgya mtsho khyed rnams la/ /rang lus dag ni dbul bar bgyi/ /dam chos thams cad ston mdzad cing / /shin tu mthar thug mdzes par bzhugs/ /yang
dag rdzogs sangs rgyas dam chos/ /de nyid sbyin sogs rang bzhin la/ /sku gsum ye shes thob phyir du/ /rab tu dang bas gnas par bgyi/ /sems can rnams kyi don bsgrub
phyir| |rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed bgyi/ /bsod nams yang dag nyer sgrub gang / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs bsngo/ /dpal ldan gshin rje mthar byed du/ /gyur
nas bdag gis 'gro phan bgyi/ /smon lam 'di ni btab byas te/ /de dang de rnams blos gshegs bya/ /brtse bas cho ga bzhin bltas te/ /sna tshogs stong par rnam bsam
bya| |sbyor ba bral ba'i rang bzhin te/ /rgyu nyid kyis dang mtshan ma med/ /rnam par rtog dang bral nyid phyir/ /smon pa rnam par spangs pa'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA nA badzra swA b+ha wa At+ma
ko\u0f85haM/ yaM raM baM laM dkyil 'khor bzhi/ /bsdus pa'i b+h+ruM yig las skyes pa'i/ /khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom par bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa ste/ /do
@#/ /shal do shal phyod pas spras/ /lha dang lha mos legs par mdzes/ /sna tshogs rtse mo rlung bskyod pa'i/ /bdan dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /de yi dbus
gnas paM yig gis/ /sna tshogs pad+ma rnam bsam bya/ /der ni lte ba'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dbyug par bcas/ /mtshan ma mtha' dag yongs gyur nas/ /zhe
sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /pad+ma nyi ma mnyam mnan cing / /ma he dmar po'i steng bzhugs pa/ /g.yon brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis ni/ /bdud rnams thams cad nges
'joms pa/ /nyi ma bye ba'i 'od ldan lha/ /ro langs ma yis mgrin mkhyud cing / /dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /klu ni brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum
dmar po 'jigs pa ste/ /khrag ldan mgo bo'i phreng ba can/ /g.yas na rdo rje dbyug pa dang / /g.yon na thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /khro bo zhal dang mnyam ldan zhing / /ljags
'dril mche ba gtsigs pa can/ /khro gnyer ldan zhing sku rgyas pa/ /stag gi pags pas rked pa g.yogs/ /thung zhing gsus 'phyang 'jigs par byed/ /dri med dag pa'i
