'od zer 'bar/ /ro langs ma yi g.yas pa na/ /gri gug g.yon na thod pa can/ /spyan gsum ldan zhing skra grol ba/ /phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /mgo yi phreng ba
mnyam ldan zhing / /gtso bo'i mchu la myang ba mo/ /shar gyi 'dab ma la gti mug rdo rje dkar po rdo rje tsa rtsi kA dang snyoms par zhugs so/ /lho'i 'dab ma la phra ma gshin rje
gshed ser po rdo rje phag mo dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /nub kyi 'dab ma la 'dod chags gshin rje gshed dmar po rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /
byang gi 'dab ma la phrag dog gshin rje gshed ljang gu rdo rje gau rwi dang snyoms par zhugs ba'o/ /tsartsi kA nag mo/ phag mo ser mo/ dbyangs can ma dkar mo/ gau rI ljang
gu /g.yon pa na thod pa dang / g.yas pa na gri gug ste/ phyag dang / zhal dang / dbyibs ni/ dpa' bo ji lta ba bzhin no/ /me'i zur du mu men gyi bum pa bzhi mnyam gyis gang
ba'o| |bden bral du gser gyi bum pa gla rtsis gang ba'o/ /rlung du byi ru'i bum pa sih+las gang ba'o/ /dbang ldan du dngul gyi bum pa ga bur gyis gang ba ste thod pas kha bcad
pa rnam par sgom pa'o/ /khro bo 'ching ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ gtso bo dpa' bo'i ni/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ snying po'i sngags so/ /oM hauM k+Shau k+Sha yaM ka

rA ya/ grih+na grih+na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA yak+Sha se nA d+hi pa ta yo ma hA dur dAn+ta da ma kA ya nA sha la nA sha ya/ bi drA pa ya bi drA pa ya hUM hUM phaT
@#/ /phaT swAhA/ phreng ba'i sngags so/ /oM dwe Sha ra ti nu da nu da tru Ta tru Ta hUM dzaHswAhA/ rje btsun ma'i sngags so/ /oM mo hA n+ta kr-ita hUM hUM phaT/ oM pi shu nAn+ta
kr-ita hUM hUM phaT/ oM ra gAn+ta kr-ita hUM hUM phaT/ oM I ra Sh+yan+ta kr-ita hUM hUM phaT/ dpa' bo bzhi'i sngags so/ /oM mo ha ra ti hUM dzaHoM pi shu na ra ti hUMHdzaH/ oM rA ga
ra ti hUMHdzaH/ oM ir Sh+ya ra ti hUM dzaH/ dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma bzhi'i sngags so/ /oM marme marma bi g+ha te/ oM badzra tsartsi ke /ha ra ha ra/ buk+kaM mA ra ya/ a mu kA ya dzaH/

oM g+ho Ne| su g+ho Ne/ badzra mA ma kI /b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM dzaH/ oM marme marma k+Sho b+ha Ni badzra sa ra swa ti/ da ra da ra/ tha ra tha ra/ pha ra pha ra/ kaM pa kaM pa/ d+hu na d+hu na hUM
a mu kaM dzaH/ oM gaM b+hI re/ badzra karti ke /g+ha g+ha rak+ta sho Ni ta bri ye/ gau rI ye a mu kaM dzaH/ gdengs can mtha' yas sngon po yis/ /skra bcings shin tu 'jigs par
mdzad| |klu ni 'jog po dmar po yis/ /rna bar drag po'i rna rgyan byas/ /rigs ldan sna tshogs dpung pa'i rgyan/ /gdengs can ser po dung skyong ni/ /lag gdub dag tu
'dzin pa ste/ /pad+ma dkar po do shal mdzes/ /ka rko Ta ni sngo bsangs kyang / /mchod phyir thogs pas mdzes pa ste/ /gdengs can nor rgyas bdud rtsi yi/ /kha dog lta bu'i
ska rags byas/ /pad rtsa lta bu dkar ba'i mdog /pad+ma chen pos rkang gdub byas/ /thams cad phud kyi rnam pa sgrog /lce gnyis phreng ba'i mche ba can/ /zhes pa 'khor ba myang
'das kyis/ /gzugs can gshin rje gsod pa ste/ /rnam rtog thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir/ /sngags kyis yang dag byin brlab bya/ /rang nyid sa bon lcags kyus dgug/
zhal nas zhugs te thams cad du/ /mkha' khyab rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /zhal nas zhugs rnams snying gar zhu/ /der ni sa bon phyung byas te/ /rdo rje'i lam nas
zhu ba ste/ /rang 'od pad+ma'i nang gnas pa/ /sa bon rang bzhin can blta bya/ /sa bon de rnams kyis byin brlab/ /'od zer mi bzad 'phro ba ni/ /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin
bsgom bya/ /bltas te snying gar zhu byas la/ /rdo rje'i lam nas nges phyung ste/ /rang gi rig ma'i pad+ma yi/ /ze 'brur lha mo'i tshogs blta bya/ /me tog sna tshogs nyer spyod sogs//
lag pa'i yal gas bzung ba dang / /yid 'phrog klu yi mchod pa dang / /sna tshogs gar gyi rang bzhin nyid/ /bde ba chen po rab ster ba/ /rol bcas de rnams kyis mchod
bya| |kye kye gshin rje gshed dmar po/ /bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin/ /khyod mthong kho bo rnam bar 'jigs/ /bla ma khro bo'i rang bzhin spongs/ /khyod kyis gar
@#/ /mdzad sa steng dang / /sa bla dang ni sa 'og g.yo/ /chags pas brgyan pa'i khro bo yid/ /gar mdzad khyod ni ro langs lags/ /sku ni dmar zhing thung ba ste/ /
rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul pa/ /rdo rje dbyangs can mas btud zhus/ /gar mdzad khyod ni bde ba che/ /hrIHSh+TiHgsang sngags dag gis khyod/ /sa gsum po yi 'khrul
pa sel| |snying rje'i khro bo rje btsun khyod/ /gar mdzad 'gro ba rnams la gzigs/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sgra yi tshogs rnams thams cad ni//
sgra brnyan dang mtshungs rnam par blta/ /'khor lo'i gtso la bstod byas te/ /de yis de rnams de lta bzhin/ /gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /shin tu 'jigs pa gshin rje
gshed| |ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /sku yi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje gshed/ /thugs kyi rdo rje rab
gsal ba/ /rin chen rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /khyab bdag chags pa'i chos 'byung gnas/ /dbyangs mchog kun gyi mchog gi
mchog /gsung gi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /las kun byed pa'i gshin rje gshed/ /sku yi rdo rje rab gsal ba/ /phyag na ral gri khyod
phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pas/ /sangs rgyas kun rab mchog gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dbang phyug khyod phyag
'tshal| |aHyig las skyes pad+ma'i snod/ /mi mgo gsum gyi steng gnas pa/ /dag par rnam par bskyed byas te/ der ni 'og tu me dkyil 'khor/ /zur gsum raM yig las
byung ba'o/ /der ni 'og tu rlung dkyil 'khor/ /sngon po g.yo ba gzhu lta bu/ /ba dan gyis mtshan yaM las byung / /der ni de'i ming dang po las/ /bskyed de rnam snang la sogs pa/ /daM
yig sogs las yang dag byung / /glang po che la sogs pa lngas/ /hUM skye rdo rje'i kha chod kyis/ /bkab pa mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /me la rlung gis bskyod pa na/ /der ni zhu ba
rnam bsam bya/ /rdo rje'i ro mnyam dag gyur cing / /shin tu dri ma med bltas te/ /hUM yig 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams/ /spyan drangs ye shes rang bzhin can/ /sngags kyi gzugs
kyis rab gzhug cing / /mchog gi bdud rtsi lngar bltas nas/ /de nyid gsum gyis byin brlab bya/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po tshim bya ste/ /lce la rdo rje gtsang ma nyid/ /hUM yig yang
dag byung blta der/ /de 'od sbu gu'i rnam pa las/ /yang dag bkug pa de yis kyang / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kun sna tshogs gnas/ /dkyil 'khor ba rnams de bzhin gzhan/ /
@#/ /ye shes 'od kyis snying gar bkug /kun tu rtog pa thams cad spang / /thog ma tha ma dbus dbye bas/ /der yang gzung ba gcig yod min/ /de nyid kyis
ni 'khrul gzugs med/ /gang la 'khrul pa gnyis la gnas/ /thams cad tshe na sems 'khrul med/ /lus ni spro dang sdud pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ las kyi dbye dang rab dbye las/ /ji ltar sems can rab tu
'jug /rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol/ /ye shes rgya mtsho rnams nyan 'tshal/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal po/ /nyes pa thams cad gso ba'i bdag /las kun rab tu sgrub pa
po| |gsung ni 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje'i mthu mnga' ba la mchod pa byas te phyag 'tshal ba/
bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung mnyan to/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos/ /dbang byed
'khrul 'khor rab gsal byed/ /gshin rje gshed nag 'khrul 'khor rnams/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bud med dbang byed phyir de bzhin/ /bsrung ba'i don du bya ba
nyid| |gi wang gzung bya zhi ba la/ /gro ga de bzhin smyug shun la/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mngon bris te/ /na maHming ni nang du spel/ /nag po rtsa ba sogs spangs te/ /kham phor
gnyis ni kha sbyar la/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus bzhag ste/ /srad bu dkar pos dkri bar bya/ /me tog dkar pos thun gsum du/ /shar du kha bltas mchod par bya/ /gshin rje
mthar byed zla shel 'od/ /bdag nyid bsams te 'du 'god bya/ /bsgrub bya zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /zhen pa bltas te dbang bskur bya/ /bum pa dkar po zla 'dra ba/ /bdud rtsi lnga
yis gang rnams la/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khrus byed pa/ /bltas nas bzlas pa brtsam bar bya/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ na maHlha sbyin la shAn+tiM ku ru na maH/
zhi ba'i dam tshig gsungs pa 'o/ /skyes pa rnams kyi zhi ba la/ /gur gum gyis bris rgyas pa la'ang / /kha che rnams kyis 'khor lo gnyis/ /swA hA ming gi nang du spel/ /bsgrub bya'i
ming ni blangs nas ni/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus bzhag nas/ /kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag ste/ /srad bu ser pos dkri bar bya/ /me tog ser pos thun gsum du/ /byang du kha bltas
@#/ /mchod par bya/ /gshin rje 'joms pa sku mdog ser/ /bdag nyid nges par blta bar bya/ /bsgrub bya ser po zla bar gnas/ /bum pa ser pos dbang
bskur bya/ /dbang bskur ba ni bsgoms nas su/ /rgyas par byed 'dod yang dag bzla/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ lhas sbyin gyi puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ bau Sha Ta oM
hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ bau Sha Ta lhas sbyin gyi puSh+TiM ku ru bau Sha Ta ces gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyas pa'i dam tshig go /gro ga 'am yang na ras dag
la| |rgya skyegs khu ba 'am tsan+dan dmar/ /ming med khrag dang bsres pa yis/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te/ /hoHyig gis ni nang du spel/ /nag po la sogs
spangs 'khrul 'khor/ /kham phor gnyis ni kha sbyar te/ /mar dang sbrang rtsis yongs gang bar/ /srad bu dmar pos dkri bar bya/ /nub tu mngon par phyogs byas te/ /me tog
dmar pos mchod par bya/ /bdag nyid gshin rje 'joms pa po/ /sku mdog dmar po cher 'bar ba/ /bsgrub bya zla ba dmar po la/ /zhon pa nyid kyang rnam bsam bya/ /rang
lus las 'phros 'od zer ni/ /dmar po lcags kyu'i dbyibs rnams kyis/ /bsgrub bya bkug par bsams nas ni/ /spro ba'i sngags ni khri bzla bya/ /de yis bsgrub bya
brgyal 'gyur zhing / /rkang pa dag ni de bzhin 'gyel/ /gos dang bral ba'i skra grol pa/ /bsams te bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /gal te dbang du ma gyur na/ /bud med seng ldeng me la
ni| |mar sogs dor bcas brtul zhugs can/ /'khor lo de ni gdung bar bya/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hoHlhas sbyin gyi mchod sbyin ba shiM ku ru hoH/ oM hrIH
Sh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bau Sha Ta lhas sbyin gyi ba shA mA na mchod sbyin bau ShaT/ ces gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig go /dur khrod ras
sam yang na ni/ /rang byung bskus pa'i ras dag la/ /rgya skyegs sga rlon khrag bsres pas/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te/ /dzaHyig dang ni hrIHyig gis/ /bsgrub bya'i ming
ni nang spel bya/ /btsun mo'i pad+ma'i snod du ni/ /kha sbyar bzhag ste mchod par bya/ /srad bu dmar pos dkris nas ni/ /me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ /bdag nyid gshin rje
gshed po ni/ /mtshams kyi nyi ma ltar 'bar ba/ /lcags kyu kha dog dmar po yis/ /bsgrub bya bkug pa nyid bsgom bya/ /lcags kyu rnams kyis snying phug cing / /zhags
pas rked pa la bcings te/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las/ /seng+ge dmar bo mnyam zhon pa/ /rdzas lnga yis ni gsang bya ste/ /de ni 'ong bar rnam bsam bya/ /gal te
@#/ /bsgrub bya ma 'ongs na/ /seng ldeng shing me 'bar ba la/ /'khrul 'khor de gsos brtul zhugs can/ /der ni bzlas pa yang dag brtsam/ /oM hrIHSh+T+ri
wi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT hrIHA mu ka A kaR+Sha ya hrIH/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ dzaHlhas sbyin A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi 'gugs pa'i dam tshig go /blo ldan dur khrod ras ma la/ /yung ba yi ni khu ba yis/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te/ /laM yig gis ni nang du spel/ /bsgrub bya'i ming
ni yang dag blang / /kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag ste/ /kham phor ser po steng bzhag nas/ /der ni mkhas pas ri mo bri/ /dang po ri mo bzhi bcu bdun/ /mnyam par bzhag
ste mnyam bri bya/ /lcog brgyad du grags ri rab ni/ /de yi steng du yang dag bri/ /hUM yig dang ni baM yig ste/ /de yis ri rab nang du spel/ /de yi nang du laM yig gis/ /dbang
chen dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan pa la/ /srad bu ser pos dkri bar bya/ /bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po ni/ /sku mdog ser po rnam bsam
bya| |lho ru mngon phyogs rnal 'byor pas/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i/ /bsgrub bya ser po rnam bsams nas/ /ri rab kyis mnan myur dgod bya/ /sna tshogs
rdo rje mnyam mnan la/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor las 'og tu/ /man+d+ha ra sogs 'jigs rung ri/ /gangs ri g.yo med mtshungs rnams kyis/ /bsgrub bya mnan pa bsgom bya ste/ /de nyid

bzlas pa bya ba nyid/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ laM lhas sbyin swa s+thA na staM b+ha ya laM swAhA/ zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rangs pa chen po'i dam tshig go /ngag ni
rengs par 'dod pa yis/ /rang bzhin 'khor lo gnyis bris nas/ /bsgrub bya'i ming rnams nang spel te/ /de las spros shing sngags bzlas bya/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/

laM lhas sbyin ya thA prar+thA kAR+ya kr-i te taM ni ba ra ya to bi ru pa kaM /ba ra ta ya to bi ru pa kaM /ba ra ta ya dz+nyA data s+ya nA ga staM b+ha na ku ru laM/ zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dag rengs
pa'i dam tshig go /de ltar dgongs pa gsungs pa 'di/ /nang du shin tu legs spras pas/ /gshin rje gshed dmar rab sbyor las/ /nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /dur
khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis/ /sngar bzhin bri bya brtul zhugs can/ /ske tshe dang ni lan tshwas kyang / /dug dang nim pa yis kyang ste/ /de bzhin lan tshwa tsha ba gsum/ /dur khrod sol ba
nyid dang ni/ /smyo byed 'dab ma'i khu ba dang / /de bzhin gtum po'i sa bon nyid/ /mdzub mo'i khrag ni blangs byas te/ /tsi tra ka yi khu ba 'am/ /tshwa sgo can gyi sa blangs te/ /gdol pa'i
@#/ /rdza ma'i dreg pa dang / /ltogs pa can gyi smyu gu yis/ /gdug ba'i sems kyis bcu bzhi la/ /nyi phyed na bri brtul zhugs can/ /ma rungs pa rnams
bsad rgyu yi/ /sna tshogs sems can rnam 'joms pa'i/ /hUM yig gis ni rnam spel bya/ /lho ru mngon phyogs rnal 'byor pa/ /bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po ni/ /gtum po chen
po khro bo'i gzugs/ /thod pa'i dum bus rnam par brgyan/ /ma he la zhugs ljags 'gyur ba/ /gsus pa che zhing 'jigs su rung / /gtsigs shing gyen du 'bar ba'i skra/ /
de bzhin sma ra smin ma ser/ /g.yas pa rdo rje'i dbyug pa che/ /g.yon pa thod pa nyid kyang ste/ /rnam 'gyur mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /bskal pa'i me ltar yang dag
mtshungs/ /de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams te/ /de mdun bsgrub bya myur dgod bya/ /dri ldan rims gzir nad rnams kyis/ /gdug pa'i lus la gzir ba dang / /gos
dang bral bas 'dar ba dang / /nyam chung lus ni rma dang ldan/ /'bras kyi phreng bas yan lag bskor/ /mtshon cha yis ni gzir bar bya/ /grang ba'i rlung gis nye bar gtses/ /
me yi dbus su yang dag gnas/ /ma he dag dang stag dang ni/ /khyi dang mchu ring can rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas sde ni rnam 'joms pa'i/ /ma rungs chen po za byed cing / /
mthar byed lto ba'i nang na gnas/ /tsher ma rnams kyis lus gang ba/ /gdos dang sgrog gis rkang par bsdams/ /de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas/ /phags pa med par byas
bsams te/ /ske tshe dang ni lan tshwas byug /sId yig brjid pas bsam par bya/ /de yi lus kyi srung ba sogs/ /bcangs nas bdag mdun dgod par bya/ /de yi go cha bgos
byas te| |stong pa'i lus bzhin bsgom par bya/ /bdag lus las byung gshin rje gshed/ /khro bos bdag nyid sku rnams kyi/ /de ni gdung bar bsgom bya zhing / /zhag dang tshil
dag 'thung bar byed/ /de mdun gshin rje bsam bya ste/ /lag na dbyug pa stobs po che/ /gdug pa de yis gdungs pa ni/ /ma rungs de la rnam bsgom bya/ /de yi nang grol
blang bya ste/ /bya rgod kyis khyer mkha' dkyil 'gro /klu rnams kyis ni sa 'og dgug /dran med la sogs rnam par gzir/ /de ltar bsgrub bya rnam bsams te/ /sems ni
snying rjes nges 'khyud pas/ /'khor ba las ni bton byas te/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams su skyes 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs
rab tu dgyes te tshig 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o gsod pa 'di ni bzang / /gsod pa gsod pa ma yin te/ /ci srid sdig pa las grol ba'i/ /'chi ba 'chi ba nyid ma yin/ /sdig
@#/ /pa stong phrag rnams byas nas/ /mnar med sogs par gnas 'gyur ba/ /e ma sangs rgyas bdag nyid che/ /gsod pa byang chub thob par mdzad/
slar yang snying rje rnam mdzad nas/ /gsad 'os sems can gsod par mdzad/ /e ma snying rje mchog gi stobs/ /snying rje dman pas mi 'grub bo/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA
na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM de ba dat+taM mA ra ya hUM/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM phaT de ba de t+taM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam
par rtog ba chen po gsod pa'i rdo rje 'khrul 'khor dang / sngags dang / rgyud kyi gsod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig go /de nas 'khor lo gnyis bris te/ /phaT kyi yi
ges rnam spel bya/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni blangs byas te/ /thod pa kha sbyar du dgod bya/ /srad bu nag pos yang dag dkri/ /sdang ba'i sems kyis nyin phyed na/ /dur khrod rnams
su sba bar bya/ /gshin rje mthar byed du yang dmigs/ /mdun du bsgrub bya dgod par bya/ /rta dang ma he mnyam zhon pa/ /lag na mtshon thogs de gnyis dang / /khro bo
'dus pa rnams kyis bskor/ /gnyis ka'i phyogs su rnam bsam bya/ /khro bos dkris pa yi sems kyis/ /gnyis po de dag dbyug 'gyed par/ /bsgom bya 'thab
mo'i bsam pa can/ /bsgoms te bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de ba dat+taM ya dz+nyA dat+to bi dwe ShA ya phaT/ ces gsungs te/ bcom ldan
'das kyi dbye ba chen po'i dam tshig go /sngar bzhin cho ga de nyid kyis/ /'khor lo gnyis ni bri bya ste/ /hUM dang phaT yig rnam spel bas/ /thod pa kha sbyar du bkod de/ /srad
bu nag pos yang dag dkris/ /ma mo'i tshal rnams su sba bya/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gzung / /mdun du bsgrub bya rnam bsgom bya/ /yaM byung rlung gi dkyil
'khor ni/ /nag bo gzhu yi rnam pa la/ /rnga mo chen po mdog sngon po/ /de yi steng du rnam bsgom bya/ /de la ma rungs che bskyon te/ /lho yi phyogs su de khyer la/ /khro tshogs rnams
kyis gdungs pas na/ /nges par sangs rgyas rnams kyang skrod/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de ba dat+taM uts+tsha Ta ya hUM phaT/ ces gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
bskrad pa chen po'i dam tshig go /khros pa gshin rjer bltas rnal 'byor/ /khrag bcas ro bsregs thal ba dang / /dug dang lan tshwa ske tshe dang / /til mar smyo byed 'dab de bzhin/ /
dur khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis/ /de ltar rim pas bri bar bya/ /gshin rje'i lus gnas bsad ba la/ /rta dang ma he dag las dbye/ /rnga mo'i lus gnas bskrad ba la/ /zhi ba
@#/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rgyas pa zla ba ser po la/ /btsun mo'i snying gar dbang du byed/ /lkugs pa ra yi lus la gnas/ /lhun po'i dbus su rengs pa
ste| |seng+ge sha ra b+ha gnas dgug /de ltar gzhan rnams las mtshon bya/ /gi waM rgya skyegs nyid dang ni/ /kha che yi ni bye brag gis/ /gro ga'i 'dab ma la bris dbang / /'dir
ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /kham por kha sbyar du bzhag ste/ /dge ba'i sems kyis yang dag gzung / /bya rog sgro yi smyug gu yis/ /nyi ma'i gung la nges par brtsam/ /ro
bsregs pad+ma kha sbyar la/ /gshin rje gshed bdag rnal 'byor las/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHsogs sngags brjod cing / /lho ru gnas pa'i tshar gcod bya/ /zhi la mtha' yi yi ge yaM/ /
dbye ba ni gnyis kyis yang ngo / /phyi nas dbus kyi ya yig gis/ /lhag ma'i yi ge ci bde ba'o/ /sngon du bsnyen pa khri bzlas te/ /las 'di rab tu sgrub pa ni/ /gshin rje
gshed dmar rab sbyor las/ /ye shes rdo rje yis bya ste/ /drag po chen po'i 'khor lo 'di/ /bris pa gang du gnas pa dang / /yi ge bris pa'i khyim du yang / /rtag tu 'thab
mo 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ 'khrul 'khor gyi dbang du byas pa'i le'u ste
gnyis pa'o// //ri bo skye bos dben phyogs dang / /legs sbas yid brtag khyim rnams so/ /thang sku bkram ste rnal 'byor bdag /sngags kyis dgug pa yang dag
brtsam| |zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar/ /gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa mo/ /khrag 'gugs pa yi rab sbyor la/ /ca rtsi kA sgom rnal 'byor pa/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
gshin rje chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje khrag 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rdo rje tsa rtsi kA'i sngags 'di dag gsungs so/ /oM badzra tsa rtsi ke
sid+d+hi n+d+ra nI la hA ri Ni rat+na tra ya/ a pa ka ri Ne ru d+hi raM a kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ kha ni rab tu gdangs bya ste/ /sngags 'di rjes su dran par bya/ /khams gsum pa yi khrag chen po/ /'dir
ni gugs par the tshom med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed pos chang dgug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje phag mos

chang dgug pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM g+ho Ne su g+ho Ne badzra mA ma kI b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra/ t+r+yai d+hA tu ka ma d+ya A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ rdza mkhan lag pa phyis pa'i sas/ /
bum pa byas ta kun nas bsgribs/ /rkun po'i skra yi gzhir bzhag ste/ /sngags ni rjes su dran par bya/ /paN+D-i tas ni mchod rten du/ /sngags 'di'i bdag nyid che ba bstan/ /
@#/ /'bad pas brtan par dmigs byas nas/ /chang dgug pa ni rab tu 'grub/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /dbyangs can mas sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM pi tsu pi tsu pra dz+nyA war+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ me d+hA war+d+ha
ni| d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud+d+hi war+d+ha ni swAhA/ bzung nas ji srid tshes gcig nas/ /kun nas zla ba rdzogs pa'i bar/ /legs sbyar byed 'dod brtsam bya ste/ /ji srid zla ba'i rjes
'jug las/ /ngag gi dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas tshigs bcad brgya phyed cing / /khams gsum pa ni ma lus shing / /ma lus lus pa med par 'khrugs/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar byed chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje'i khu ba 'gugs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te khu ba 'gugs pa gau rIs

sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM A kaR+Sha ni A kaR+Sha ni gau rI dzaHhriHduSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta ya/ shu kra A kar+Sh+Ta ya dzaHdzaHhUM swAhA/ mkha' sgo rdo rje lam dang rlung / /dril bu lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las//
bzlas dang sgom par rab sbyor las/ /khu ba'i tshogs rnams 'gugs par byed/ /dben pa'i nags khrod rnams su yang / /las 'di rab tu bsgrub bya ste/ /mtshan mo bdun
gyi rab sbyor gyis/ /'dir ni 'grub par the tshom med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed chen bo dus 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
dbang bskur ba mchog gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las nges par phyung bar gyur to/ /u dum wa ra man+dA ra/ /pa ri dzA ta kaM mA li ka /kar+Na ka ra'i phreng ba
yang | |bu khyod zungs la byin gyis rlobs/ /khams gsum pa yi ral gri che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad phyag mdzad pa/ /bzung nas bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /las kyi ral gri
dang mtshungs mchog /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin ni/ /rdo rje dril bu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /mnyes shing gsang ba'i rdo rje zung / /khyod ni slob ma bsdu bar gyis/ /'di ni btung ba rin
chen te| |'grub pa'i lus ni rab sgrub byed/ /skyes bu byung ba'i chu 'thungs shig /mnyes gshin kun tu ye shes nyid/ /slob ma'i kha yis btung bya ste/ /gshin rje gshed ni
rab bsgrub phyir/ /rdo rje slob ma bdag nyid che/ /sems ni shin tu dga' bar mdzod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar
po'i rgyud las/ sngags kyi dgug pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /ral gri'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya/ /khab
@#/ /lan lcags kyi rang bzhin las/ /ral gri yang na dngul chu yis/ /byed byas khru gang tshad kyis ni/ /ral gri rnam bsam brtul zhugs can/ /bcu bzhi
yang na brgyad pa la/ /dur khrod dbus su gzung bar bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /thun gsum khri phrag bzla bar bya/ /zla ba so so'i bcu bzhi las/ /gtor ma mchod
pa sngon 'gro bar/ /zla ba gcig gis 'bum phrag bzla/ /'bum phrag lngas ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /grub nas ral gri rab tu 'bar/ /snang ba chen po'i 'od zer lnga/ /de nas
gzung bya 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal mi/ /'jigs byed gshin rje gshed sbyor las/ /gang tshe ral gri grub rnal 'byor/ /rtsed rmod sa ni grub
byed de'i/ /g.yul du de yi bzod par dka'/ /rkang pa gnyis dang rkang bzhi dang / /blta phyir phyogs bcu rnams su 'gro /lha dang lha min rnams mi bzod/ /mi yi 'jig rten
smos ci dgos/ /rgya mtsho'i 'jim pa blangs byas te/ /zla ba gcig gis yang dag bsgrub/ /oM phu'iHyi ge snying gar dgod/ /hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags bzla bya/ /char pa
mi 'bab dus rnams su/ /khri khrag bzlas bas 'grub bar 'gyur/ /sbrul nag dag gi sha rnams dang / /nim pa'i lo mas bsres byas te/ /de yis ri lur byas nas ni/ /rgya
mtshor zhugs byas brtul zhugs can/ /khri khrag tsam zhig rab bzlas pas/ /chu rlabs rengs pa'i mchog yin no/ /gtum po sa bon brgya blangs te/ /sran ma 'bras dang bsres pa
ni| |'bum phrag bdun du rab bzlas pas/ /lha ni sbyin sreg las gzigs 'gyur/ /dur khrod kyis ni gso ma blang / /gzugs brnyan bya ba brtul zhugs can/ /smyo byed khu bas
byug pa yis/ /khri khrag gcig gis 'gugs par byed/ /'bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas pa yis/ /don grub sa bon kun bsags pas/ /gnyid log langs te bya ba dang / /tshor bar
yang ni the tshom med/ /rgyun lam gyi ni sa blangs te/ /sngags ni 'bum phrag bzlas pa las/ /spyi bor rab tu byugs tsam gyis/ /spyi bo'i nad ni rnam par 'joms/ /lan bdun mngon
par bsngags byas te/ /lag pas spyi bor mnye bar bya/ /nad kyis nyams pa med 'gyur te/ /'dir ni the tshom yod ma yin/ /bram ze yi ni sha dag dang / /dur khrod thal ba sa des ni/ /
gshin rje gshed kyi sku gzugs bya/ /phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig pa/ /g.yas pa rdo rje chen po ste/ /de bzhin g.yon na mi mgo'o/ /sku mdog dkar po 'jigs byed chen/ /de yis
ma rungs 'joms par byed/ /sha dang bdud rtsi lnga yis ni/ /nyi ma so sor gtor ma dbul/ /rtag tu gsol btab rnal 'byor pa/ /bdag gi dgra bo 'joms par mdzod/ /ces pa brjod
@#/ /de mtshan mo nyal/ /dgra ni tho rangs 'chi bar 'gyur/ /yang na na bar 'gyur ba ste/ /myos pa la sogs kun tu 'khrug /dgra bo'i rnam snang blang bya ste/ /mi yi rkang
ni rab bkang bya/ /'bum phrag bzlas pas rdzogs nas ni/ /shing gi rtse mor sbyang bya nyid/ /rtag tu yi dwags tshal du bskor/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug mnyes na bde/ /de nas gzhan
yang rab bshad bya/ /ro langs chen po'i sgrub thabs so/ /thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i mchog /sna tshogs bya ba rab sgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas rgyal srid sgrub thabs mchog /'di las
yang dag rab bshad bya/ /'phyang ba'i shing ni gzung bya ste/ /ma nyams de bzhin rma med pa/ /blangs la gdud par bya de yang / /bzlas pa'i phreng bar rab bsgrub bya/ /zla ba zla ba'i
bcu bzhi la/ /sha lnga yis ni byug par bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /bzlas pa 'grub par byed pa'i mchog /'di yis 'bum phrag bzlas pa yis/ /nges par rgyal srid
'grub par 'gyur/ /e ma sngags kyi nus pa ni/ /gnyid log sgra ni sgrog par byed/ /gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ldan pas/ /skad cig kyang ni 'jigs mi bya/ /gang gang 'dod
pa'i rnal 'byor pas de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /ma he dang ni chu srin dang / /stag dang de bzhin gzhan rnams kyis/ /dom dang lce spyang dag dang ni/ /spre'u yang ni bye brag las/ /
sked tshe lan tshwa de bzhin du/ /shau b+hA dza na tshwa ba gsum/ /'di yis sku gzugs yang dag bsgrub/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can gshin rje gshed/ /de la gsol btab rnal 'byor pa//
hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags bzlas te/ /rgyal po cha ge bsad nas ni/ /bdag de rengs par sbyar bar bya/ /bye ba bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te/ /bden zhing bden par the tshom med/ /de
nas gzhan yang rgyal zla yi/ /dkar phyogs nyi ma bsgrubs ldan tshe/ /rdul ldan gos ni yang dag blang / /thang sku mchog ni bri bar bya/ /bri bya bkra shis mchog snag tsha/ /chen po
yang dag ldan rnams kyi/ /sku mdog dkar bo drag shul che/ /phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig mchog /g.yas pa rdo rje 'bar ba ste/ /g.yon pas 'dzag pa'i mgo bo 'dzin/ /
zhabs ni g.yon brkyang rnam 'gyur dang / /rin chen cod pan rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen rgyan rnams yongs su rdzogs/ /'od zer phreng bas kun tu 'khrigs/ /gsod pa'i bsam
pas rgyal po ni/ /'og gi cha la nges par sbyar/ /thun mong kha dog yang dag ldan/ /ji lta'i dbyibs ni rnam par gnas/ /'dus byas lha ni bsgrub par bya/ /ji ltar 'byor pa'i tshad la ni//
@#/ /de yi mdun du sbyin sreg bya/ /nges par zur gsum dkyil 'khor la'o/ /sbyin sreg 'bum gyis de rgyal srid/ /thob 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med/ /de nas
gzhan yang zla gzas bzung / /gal te nyi ma la blta bya/ /dur khrod thal ba yang dag blangs/ /gzugs brnyan bya ba brtul zhugs can/ /shrIM gI rA dzI sha lnga dang / /nim pa d+ha du
ra'i lo mas/ /mkhas pas cho ga 'di yis ni/ /gcig tu byas te gzugs brnyan bya/ /sku mdog sngon po drag shul che/ /phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig pa/ /ma he la bzhugs
rnam 'gyur zhal/ /rdo rje dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /bsgrubs te sku gzugs rang bzhin la/ /mchod pa byas na slar yang ni/ /rgyun du hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags/ /'bum phrag
bzlas te mnyes par bya/ /sde bcas g.yog 'khor bcas pa yis/ /rgyal po che ge gzhom bya ste/ /bzlas pa 'bum gyi bdag rnal 'byor/ /byas nas 'bum phrag khyad par
las| |mchod pa'i las ni yang dag ldan/ /bzlas pa'i sbyin sreg cho ga 'dis/ /sems can don mchog blo dang ldan/ /rgyal srid thob 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas gzhan
yang bkra shis kyi ras la rdo ba'i nam mkha'i chus zla mtshan gyi gos bkrus te thang sku mngon par bri bar bya'o/ /zhal gcig pa dang phyag gnyis pa/ /sku mdog nag po
'jigs rung ba/ /dbu skra 'bur ba yang dag ldan/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang / /gri gug dang ni thod pa phyag /ma he'i steng du bri bar bya/ /de ni sgom pa brtsams byas te/ /dgra yi
mdun du rnam par bsgom/ /gri gug gis ni bcad byas te/ /tshil dang zhag rnams 'thung ba dang / /rgyu ma rnams dang 'jim pa dang / /khrag ni mang po 'thung bar byed/ /'bum phrag tsam gyis bskur
bar 'gyur/ /yang na rma yis snying gar gzir/ /de nas gzhan yang mi'i rus pa sor bzhi pa blangs la/ hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs pa'i sngags nang du spel ba dgra bo'i sgor
mnan pa byas na/ gal te brgya byin dang mtshungs pa'ang 'khor dang bcas pa skrod par 'gyur ro/ /gcig pur skye bos dben par 'dug ste rje btsun gyi thang sku bkram nas phyogs
bcu na zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun du byas nas mi'i rus pa bcad pa'i khrag chen po dang bsres pa'i bya rog gi khrag gis sor bcu
gnyis pa'i tshad/ rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo la sa bon bcu gnyis dang / de nyid du dgra bo'i ming dbus su spel la/ tsheg drag dang bcas pa'i kha sbyar ba tha yig gsum
gyis phyi rol tu bskor ba bya rog gi mgrin par btags te/ gal te 'bab chu la bskyur na/ de'i tshe 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /de kho na ltar sa bon bcu gnyis bri bar bya ste/ phaT
@#/ /phaT hUM hUM na na tA kr-i wi Sh+T+rIHhrIHoM/ /ji ltar 'byor pas mchod byas nas/ /stobs po che yi bdug pa phul/ /gal te 'bab chu la bskyur na/ de gzhung du
med do| |gal te ma gyur na bya rog gi gshog pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas dgra bo'i sgo nang du ming dang spel ba ni/ 'phral du 'khor dang bcas pa
skrod par byed do/ /de kho na ltar rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su tsha ba gsum dang dug dang ske tshe rnams rus pa chen po'i 'bri smyug gis me'i sa bon gyi dbus
su tsheg drag dang bcas pa'i g+haHyig gnyis kha sbyar ba'i tha yig gsum gyis phyi rol tu bskor ba'i me'i bud shing gi me la gdung bar bya ste/ de'i skad cig la bu dang chung
ma dang g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ rgyal srid
kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas pha rol sde rnams 'joms/ /'di las yang dag rab bshad bya/ /bram ze mo yi rdul gos la/ /rgyal dang nyi mas yang dag brtsam//
ma he'i zhal gyi thang sku bri/ /brgya phrag phyag ni rab gsal ba/ /de ni phyag mtshan rnon po bsnams/ /thams cad du ni bri bar bya/ /thang sku dkar bo bri bya ste/ /pad+ma dkar pos
mchod par bya/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa 'bum phrag rnams/ /byas te de bzhin pad+ma slar/ /thang sku bkram pa mngon phyogs par/ /ba dan steng du 'dzin pa ni/ /rkang gnyis rkang bzhi la
sogs pa/ /skye bo rnams kyis mthong gyur gang / /de nas thams cad gdong gzhan 'gro/ /seng+ge mthong ba'i glang po bzhin/ /de nas gzhan yang / tshangs pa'i sa bon mar khu che/ /ku dA
ra ts+tshin gyis ldan ba/ /rnga mo'i gcin gyis yang dag ldan/ /ril bu bya 'o brtul zhugs can/ /rang gi gdong par thig le bya/ /pha rol sde ni rnam par 'joms/ /a shwi ka shing
rtsar song ste/ /brgyad pa'am yang na bcu bzhi la/ /thun gsum du ni zla ba gcig /sngon bsnyen 'bum phrag gcig byar 'gyur/ /oM sid+d+hi a nan+ta nA la hA ri Ni pa ra s+yai n+ya ba nI sha ni
hrIHswAhA| 'di nyid kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /mthong ba las pha rol gyi sde rnam par 'joms shing gang la bltas pa de 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang / shing gcig
rtsa bar phyin nas ni/ /mchog gi ro la 'dug byas te/ /g.yas na ral gri 'dzin pa dang / /g.yen brkyang ba yi zhal gyis ni/ /hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs pa'i sngags mtshan mo mtha'
dag bzla bar bya ste/ de'i tshe ral gri yongs su 'phro zhing de'i tshe pha rol gyi sde rnams srung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed
@#/ /dmar po'i rgyud las/ pha rol gyi sde rnam par 'joms pa'i le'u ste drug pa 'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /mi snang 'grub par rab gsal
mdzad| |thog mar mi snang bsgrub pa'i don du rnal 'byor pas rgyal dang nyi ma'i nyin mo brtsam zhing sngon du yang dag par btags la 'bum phrag bzla bar bya ste/ de'i drod
'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzas bzung ba'i dus nas pa Ni Ta ka ri'i rtsa ba dang / ro dang / khaM g+ha ri dang / e ra ba Da'i rtsa ba dang thams cad gcig tu byas te ril bu byas nas khar
bcug na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gzhan yang kho Ti dzA la dza ya na ti dang / brid+d+ha ra ka'i rtsa ba dang thams cad mnyam por gcig tu byas te b+he ga'i gcin la nyi ma
gsum bskams la ril bu byas nas khar bcang bar bya ste/ mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang nyi ma gzas bzung ba'i dus na ulkI'i mchu dang / ro dang / d+ha du ra ka na
ka hA ya nyid ba Da b+hi'i gcin gcig la yang dag par bzhag ste ril bu byas nas khar bcug na/ mi snang ba'i mchog go /de nas gzhan yang byi ba'i mig dang / bya rgod kyi
mig dang / sa 'og skyong bas kyang cha mnyam por gcig tu byas pa'i ril bu bshang lam du gzhug par bya ste/ skad cig de las de mi mthong bar 'gro bar byed do/ /de nas yang
nyi ma'i res la byi ba'i mig rab tu blangs te/ rams dang tsi tra ka sngon po'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig bya rgod kyi khag gis btags par bya ste/ mi snang ba'i mchog go /de nas gzhan yang
pA shI mAn sa dang / ba la mAn sa dang / ba hUM ra pha la bsnyams te dar gos kyis dkris nas bram ze'i thod pa la me lce'i dreg pa 'chags par bya'o/ /de'i mig sman gyis mig
gnyis la byug na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang gdol pa'i me tog dang / shA tA ba d+ha dang / 'dab bzang gi mig rnams ril bu byas te khar bcug na/ de mis mi mthong
bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang 'dab bzang blangs la nyi ma bdun gyi bar du dngul chu ma shA gcig byas te bza' bar bya 'o/ /des brun du gyur ba gang yin pa de dang lhan cig bdag
nyid kyi khu bas thig le byas na/ mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ mi snang ba'i rab tu bya ba 'o/ /mig sman bshad bar bya ste/ thog mar re zhig mig sman gyi don du bcom ldan 'das kyi
sngags 'bum phrag lnga yongs su bzlas te mig sman sgrub pa brtsam par bya 'o/ /dung dang bya rgod dang ku ra ra rnams kyi mig blangs te ma nyams nas sa 'og gi sbrang rtsi'i khu ba la dar
gos kyi sdong bus dreg pa 'chags par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis 'di'i mig sman byugs ba tsam gyis sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /skar ma lag la br-i ha ti dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /
@#/ /dza yan+tI nag po'i rtsa ba dang / lce spyang gi mig bsnyams te sbrang rtsis lhan cig btags nas thig le byas na/ sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /b+hU mi la ta'i
til mar dang / bi shaM ka ra'i rtsa ba'i khu bar dza dang bcas pas/ dar gos la gzhon nu mas byas pa'i srad bus dkris nas sdong bu byas te mi'i thod pa la dreg pa 'chags
par byas la mig sman byas na/ nges par gter mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang rgyal gyi zla ba dang / skar ma snubs la zla mtshan gyi gos blangs te brgyad pa'am bcu
bzhi pa la rdo rje tsa rtsi ka'i thang sku mngon par bris la mchod pa chen po byas na/ mtshan mo 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na nges par rmi lam gyi gter mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
gzhan yang shing ni ma pa'i rtser song ste brgyad pa'am bcu bzhi pa la thang sku'i mdun du tsartsi ka bsams nas lce spyang gi mgo'i steng du khri phrag bzlas na/ tsartsi ka drung du 'ongs
nas bdag gis ci bya 'dri bar 'gyur zhing sgrub pa pos bdag la mig sman gyi grub pa rab tu stsol ces pa dang / bdag la ro'i bcud len stsol ces brjod par bya'o/ /gi
wang dang lce spyang gi mig dang / dngul chu dang / shing ta la'i khu ba dang / sbrang rtsi mnyam pa rnams mkhas pas ril bu bya'o/ /'dis mig sman byas pa'i mig ni/ sa'i bu ga
mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lce spyang gi mig dang / bya rgod kyi mig dang / ku ra ra'i mig rnams de kho na ltar g.yon pas g.yon pa dang / g.yas pas g.yas pa bzung ste til mar chen
pos dreg pa 'chags par bya 'o/ /'dis mig sman byas pa'i mig ni/ sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang gi wang dang / mi'i mkhris pa dang / ga bur dang / dngul
dang / de bzhin du ha raM byin nas brtag par bya'o/ /'dis mig sman byas na sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang / grub pa sna tshogs gnas kyi don/ /nor dang 'bru sogs
phun sum tshogs/ /lcags brgyad 'joms shing nam mkha' la/ /spyod pa nyid kyang ster bar 'gyur/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i don du sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas dngul chu'i sgrub
thabs brtsam par bya 'o/ /thog mar dngul chu blangs te tsi tra ka dmar po'i khu bas bsnur bar bya 'o/ /de'i rjes la zangs kyi khu ba dang / gser gyi phye ma byin nas shA kho Da'i khu bas
bzhi cha tshad kyi nor bu bya 'o/ /glang po che'i sha dang / ldong ros kyis mnyam por btags te kong bu kha sbyar gyi nang du ra dza byin nas bsro bar bya 'o/ /gong bu gyur pa phyed mar byas nas ra
ti'i tshad kyis zangs 'joms shing gser dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /ro 'di dag til mar chen pos bsnur nas lhang tsher dang / mu zis til mar chen po nyi ma gsum btso bar bya
@#/ /ste| ji srid slar gong bur gyur gyi bar du 'o/ /sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig cung zad zos pa la skyes bu lo stong phrag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur la/ dngul bcos nas gser du
'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bA h+lA ba'i khu ba byin nas dngul chu bsnur bar bya ste/ ji srid gong bur gyur gyi bar du 'o/ /sha tA la dang dzam+b+hi ra'i khu ba dang / shA kho Da ka'i 'bras bu'i shun pa
so sor mnyam por byin nas kong bu'i nang du bzhag ste/ de nyid kyis rab tu byug par bya zhing bskams la phyi nas kong bur bsreg par bya ste/ myur du gong bu'i tshad du 'gyur ro//
ra ti gnyis kyi tshad kyi nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig ji srid par lo ma dang skyur po spangs shing thams cad du bud med bsten pa yang spang bar bya ste/ skyes bu lo stong phrag bcu gnyis su
'tsho zhing / mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /baM ga bcom na sa dngul chur 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang ran dzA ni la'i khu bas/ su pa ra na mAk+Shi dang / paSh+Te sa ra ta'i
rtsa ba mnye bar bya ste/ lhang tsher dang / na ra do Ni'i khu bas god bur bya 'o/ /kong bu'i nang du bzhag nas pha ri'i til mar la sbyar bar bya ste/ zla ba drug gis gong bur 'gyur na
lcags brgyad rnams nges par gser du 'gyur la/ zos pas mkha' la sbyod pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba dang reg pa tsam gyis lo lnga brgya rnams su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//
de nas gzhan yang dngul chu ku ma ri'i khu bas bsnur bar bya ste/ so ma ha dang / ba lA sha'i rtsa ba dang / nA ga ke sha ra'i shun pa dang / btsag dang / ka thi nI dang / de bzhin du slar ba Da'i
'o ma dang mnyam pos bsro bar bya ste/ thun gnyis kyis gong bur 'gyur ro/ /cung zad zos pa tsam gyis nges par sa gsum du 'gro bar byed cing / ra ti tsam gyis nges par zangs
srang gser du 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang dngul chu shrI khaN+Da'i so dzu'i 'o mas cung zad mnyes te mu zi dang zangs kyi snod du dzam+b+hi ra'i khu bas mnye zhing nyi 'od la bskam par bya 'o/ /
gong bur gyur pa kong bu'i nang du bzhag ste thun gnyis su bsro bar bya 'o/ /su ki ti'i kong bur bcug la ra ti'i tshad kyis dbug par bya ste zangs bcom nas gser du 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi
yang mnyer ma dang skra dkar spong zhing phan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang dngul chu ba la'i rtsa bar bsnur bar bya zhing / slar yang gdol pa'i me tog gi khu bas bsnur bar bya 'o/ /

slar yang skan tsa ka dang / ba ha ri'i khu ba la bsnur bar bya' / /de'i la ra ti'i tshad kyi gser gyi phye ma byin nas gong bur bya 'o/ /'dab ma bdun pa'i kong bu'i nang du kun dzA ra'i rkang pa'i tshad
kyis dum bu byin na gong bur 'gyur ro/ /de blangs te ra ti'i tshad kyis zangs 'joms shing gser du 'gyur ro/ /lus la'ang ra ti'i tshad kyis skyon gsum 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ /gcong
@#/ /nad la yang 'tsho ba dang / rnal 'byor pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /zos ba tsam gyis rgyang grags su 'gro bar byed do/ /de nas gzhan yang dngul chu snod du bzhag
ste rdo ba'i gzhi la bsnur zhing tri hri'i rtsa ba dang / ka ra na dza dang / bA thA'i rtsa bas bsnur bar bya'o/ /gong bu byas nas kong bu'i nang du bzhag ste mtshan mo mtha' dag par bsre
bar bya 'o/ /de nas rdzogs par 'dus byas te ra ti'i tshad kyi cho ga la zangs 'joms pa dang / zos na ra ti'i tshod kyis skra dkar dang gnyer ma spong bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba drug gi
rab tu sbyor ba las lo stong phrag rnams su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba nyid de/ dngul chu srang gcig blangs nas shing+ga be ra'i khu bas bsnur bar
bya 'o| |lhang tsher dang gser cung zad dang ldan pa/ shing+gi dmar po dang mnyam pos ga DA ya'i khu ba blangs te nges par zhag bcu gnyis rnams so/ /de'i rjes la kod bu'i nang du
bzhag ste bso bar bya'o/ /kuny+dza'i rkang pa'i tshad las/ de nas blangs te ra ti'i tshad kyis yang dag par blangs la gzhug par bya ste/ zangs ma lus bcom nas nges par gser
du 'gyur ro/ /zos nas mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob cing lo stong du 'tsho bar the tshom med do/ /gnod sbyin dang mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnams kyis bsten cing gshin rje'i 'jig rten
rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang lhang tsher nag po srang gcig dang / b+ha ka dang par+Na dang dngul chu dang ldan ba rnams kyis zla ba phyed du sbyar te rtsi bo che dang ro
mnyam du byas pa za ba'i tshad kyis chu grang mo dang yang dag par ldan par bza' bar bya ste/ zla ba sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid rgas pa dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
gzhan yang lcags srang gang tsam blangs te ra gan phye mar byas te ka shi'i khu bas mnyam par ldan pa me lce'i 'od zer la bskam par bya 'o/ /dngul chu dang mu zi rnams der bzhi cha'i
tshad sbyar ba las/ kak+ko la dang / li shi'i phye ma rnams phyed dang gnyis snga ma'i tshad las te/ thams cad gcig tu byas la rdo ba'i gzhi la lcags bsnur bar bya 'o/ /gser kong bur
bzhag nas bsro bar bya 'o/ /de nas blangs te lcags chen po zla ba'i tshad kyis bza' bar bya ste/ skra dkar dang gnyer ma rnams 'joms shing rgas pa dang 'chi ba med par byed do/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ mi snang ba la sogs kyi le'u bdun ba'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
rgyal pos grib ma 'phrog pa'i rab tu dbye ba gsungs pa/ rkang gnyis dang rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi dgra bo tshar gcod ba'i phyir rab tu sbyor ba 'di brjod par bya 'o/ /thog mar re zhig
@#/ /sems can thams cad rmongs par bya ba'i phyir dpa' bo gshin rje gshed bsgom par bya'o/ /rang khyim rnams sam mtshan mo'i dus/ /stag lpags
gdan la 'dug byas te/ /zhal gcig dmar po mi bzad pa/ /zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu 'dzin/ /ro la bzhugs pa drag shul che/ /spyan gsum shin tu 'jigs rung pa/ /
thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i lha/ /mi bzad pa yi me stag 'phro/ /'di ltar bsams nas 'bum phrag bzlas/ /phyi nas cho ga kun spyod pa/ /kA ra bI ra dkar rtsa ba/ /de
bzhin dan+tI dmar rtsa ba/ /sbal pa'i khrag gis bsnur byas te/ /thig le bcang bya brtul zhugs can/ /gang gi grib ma 'phrog byed pa/ /rkang pa de yang rmongs pas 'thob/ /rkang
gnyis rkang bzhi thams cad ni/ /rmongs par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /nyi ma rengs dang dkar phyogs la/ /srin bu lto ba nas skyugs pa/ /rab tu 'bad pas de blangs te/ /
rwa co yis ni thig le bya/ /dpral bar thig le byin byas pa/ /gang gi grib ma 'phrog bar byed/ /nges par rmongs pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /'o ma rnams kyis rab dkrus
dag /dan+tI ro ha u ha raSh+Ti'i/ /rtsa ba 'di rnams skam mnyam par/ /bya rog khrag gis bsnur nas ni/ /thig le bya'o brtul zhugs can/ /thig le 'di yis byin rlabs
kyis| |lha yang rab tu bskyod par byed/ /nges par som nyi mi bya ste/ /bya ba la yang rmongs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rab tu sbyor ba gzhan/ /ra sa shring+gi ku thA rI/ pha NI na ga pa NI dang / /'di
rnams kun gyi sha bcas pa/ /ril bu bya 'o brtul zhugs can/ /nam mkha'i rdo ba'i chu nyid kyis/ /spyi bor thig le bcang bar bya/ /nges par reg ste gdong bltas na/ /mi ni khrag tu
skyug par byed/ /kA ka ma rtsi sbrang rtsi dkar/ /khu byug dkar po'i mig gis ni/ /nam mkha'i chu dang mnyam par ldan/ /spyi bo la ni thig le bya/ /thig le 'di yi byin rlabs kyis/ /dgra bo
rnams ni dbang du 'gyur/ /gang du phyag ni 'tshal byed pa/ /de rnams nges par rmongs par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang rab sbyor te/ /sbrul nag po yi lce dang ni/ /de bzhin sre mo'i lce
nyid dang / /byi ba'i mkhris pa yang dag bsres/ /khri phrag lnga yi ril bu rnams/ /thig le 'di yi byin rlabs kyis/ /dgra bo bran du byed par 'gyur/ /ma rungs 'khor dang bcas pa yis/ /
rgyal po rmongs par byed par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang rab sbyor te/ /'chi med rtsa ba'i sI ta ka /de bzhin ba hu DA pha la/ /'di rnams mnyam po'i cha yis kyang / /ril bu bya 'o mkhas pa
yis| |thig le 'di yis yang dag bzung / /'jig rten gsum po rmongs par 'gyur/ /kha yis bdud rtsi blangs byas te/ /g.yon pa'i ming med kyis kyang ni/ /'di ni/ ril bu byin gyis
@#/ /brlab pa'i sngags te/ oM ma hA yak+Sha se na a d+hi pa ta ye ma hA dur dAn+ta da ma gA ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ bi drA pa ya bi drA pa ya/ hUM hUM sarba duSh+Ta na phaT/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ le'u brgyad pa'o// //'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs la sogs pa'i
sgrub thabs gsungs te/ oM hUMHdzaHa pa rA dzi taH/ oM hUMHdzaHa dzi ta/ oM hUM dzaHa pu ra NaH/ oM hUM dzaHa pu ra NaH/ oM shri dzaSh+ma sa na a d+hi pa ti/ oM ruM dzaHku le shwa ra/ oM hUM dzaH
bud+d+he shwa raH/ oM aM dzaHki ka ra ut+ta ma/ zhes pa 'di rnams 'byung po'i bdag po chen po rnams so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs ni/ dpal rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin pa'i mdun
du 'bum phrag bzla bar bya ste/ sngon du bsnyen par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa chen po byas nas zho dang / bu ram dang / 'o ma sbyar ba'i zas dkar po rnams kyis ji ltar
gsungs pa'i mchod pa bya'o/ /gu gul gyi dud pa byin nas mtshan mo mtha' dag bzla bar bya'o/ /nges par tho rangs 'ongs par 'gyur te/ gal te 'ongs par ma gyur na skad cig de la
'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /'ongs nas kyang bdag gis ci bya zhes bka' stsal du gsol/ sgrub pa pos bdag gi bran du mdzod ces smra bar bya'o/ /de nas brtsams te ci bya ba'i las rnams

byed de| rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal srid kyang ster ba dang / dgra rnams tshar gcod par byed do/ /lha mo ri bong can blangs te ster bar byed cing rgyab tu khur te lha'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba dang / brgya byin
nyid ster bar byed do/ /bskal pa bdun du 'tsho ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs 'di yin te/ mtshan mo mchod rten gyi mdun du 'dug ste zhag bdun du stong phrag brgyad bzla
bar bya'o/ /zhag brgyad pa la mchod pa chen po byas nas gtor ma phul te gu gul gyi dud ba dbul zhing bzla bar bya'o/ /bzlas pa na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /kye sgrub pa po bdag gis ci bya

zhes so| |sgrub pa po bdag gis ci bya ba khyod mkhyen no/ /zhes smra bar bya'o/ /de nas brtsams nas ci bya ba'i las rnams byed do/ /slar yang rgyal srid ster ro/ /lo stong phrag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//
ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du ci bya ba'i las rnams byed do/ /che ge 'tsho bar gyis shig /ces pa dang / che ge 'chi bar gyis shig ces pa thams cad byed do/ /de nas gsang ba'i sgrub thabs yin

te| rdo rje 'dzin pa khang par song ste nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ /nyi ma brgyad pa la mchod pa chen po byas nas zan zho dkar po ji ltar gsungs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /mtshan phyed pa
ji srid pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /ji srid mtshan phyed pa de nas rang nyid 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /me tog gi mchod yon dbul bar bya ste/ mnyes par gyur na rgyal srid ster zhing bsam pa thams
@#/ /cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de nas kun tu gsang ba'i sgrub thabs yin te/ gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du khri phrag bzla bar bya ste/ sngon du bsnyen par
'gyur ro/ /de nas zla ba nya ba la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mtshan phyed pa ji srid pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas mtshan phyed na myur du 'ongs shing mdun du gnas te/ kye
mnyes gshin ci byed ces smra bar byed do/ /sgrub pa pos bdag gis ci bya ba khyed mkhyen ces brjod par bya'o/ /de nas brtsams te ci bya ba'i las rnams byed do/ /gnod sbyin gyi bu mo
mchog bkug nas ster bar byed do/ /'dod ldan gyi mchog ston mo ster bar byed do/ /nyi ma so sor bza' ba dang / gos zung dang / dI nA ra lnga rnams rab tu ster ro/ /lo lnga brgya rnams 'tsho
bar byed do/ /de nas dur khrod bdag po'i sgrub thabs yin te/ mtshan mo dur khrod du song nas nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ /nyi ma brgyad pa la nya dang / sha dang / til dang /
dzam+bu li ka dang / zan dkar po dang / zho dang / bu ram dang / bdug pa dang / 'bras bu ji ltar gsungs pa'i nyi bar mkho ba rnams kyi gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ /gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul
par bya'o/ /mtshan phyed pa de ji srid pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas mtshan phyed nas ha ha'i sgra thos par byed do/ /de la 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /'khor dang bcas pa tshogs kyis yongs su
bskor nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'ongs pa na mchod pa dbul zhing mnyes par gyur na/ 'byung po thams cad bran du 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma nyi mar dI nA ra brgyad rnams rab tu ster bar byed do/ /dgra
thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /lo stong phrag 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rigs kyi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs yin te/ lha'i gnas su song ste dri dang ldan pa'i me tog dmar po dang / gu
gul gyi bdug pa byin nas khri phrag bzla bar bya ste/ sngon du bsnyen par 'gyur ro/ /nag po'i phyogs la mtshan mor nya dang / sha dang / til dang / dzam+bu li ka dang / bza' ba dmar po'i cho ga
gtor ma bzhin dbul bar bya'o/ /tu ru ka'i bdug pa byin nas ji srid mtshan byed kyi bar du bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas 'bar ba chen po zab cing 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de
la 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /mnyes gshin ci byed ces smra bar byed do/ /sgrub pa pos bdag gis ci bya ba khyed mkhyen ces brjod par bya'o/ /de nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du ci bya ba'i las rnams byed
do| |nyi ma nyi mar thun gsum du dI nA ra lnga ster ro/ /'dod pa'i lha rdzas kyi ston mo ster ro/ /lo lnga brgya 'tsho bar byed do/ /de nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs yin te/ mtshan ma
gcig par song ste gcig pus zhag gsum du mtshan mor bza' ba kha zas dmar po dang / nya sha dang / til dang / dzam+bu li ka'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ /nyi ma gsum pa la rang nyid
@#/ /myur du 'ong zhing mdun du gnas so/ /de 'di ltar bdag gis ci bya zhes smra'o/ /sgrub pa pos bdag gis ci bya ba khyed mkhyen ces brjod par bya'o/ /rtag tu rjes
su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ nges par lha mo blangs nas ster bar byed do/ /rang nyid kyis bza' ba dang gos blangs te rnam pa ster bar byed do/ /lo stong phrag gnyis rnams 'tsho bar byed do/ /
de nas pho nya mchog gi sgrub thabs yin te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa khang par song nas nag po'i bcu bzhi la bzlas pa khri bya'o/ /nyi ma bdun rnams su sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o/ /de nas sgrub thabs
brtsam par bya ste/ tsan+dan gyi maN+Dal byas nas gu gul gyi bdug pa byin la/ zho dang mar dkar po sbyar ba'i zas dang / ku sha'i chun po la nye bar 'dug pas mar gyi mar me rab tu
sbar te mtshan mor ji srid mtshan phyed gyur pa de srid bzla bar bya ste/ rang nyid pho nya mchog tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'ongs pa na tsan+dan gyi chus mchod yon sbyin par bya'o/ /mnyes par
gyur na bdag gis ci bya zhes dri'o/ /sgrub pa pos bdag gis ci bya ba khyed mkhyen ces brjod par bya'o/ /de nas brtsams te ci bya ba'i las rnams byed do/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu
thams cad rab tu ster ro/ /yid la 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed do/ /de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma sgrub pa ni/ gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi wang gi gzugs brnyan bris te
gcig pu stan la 'dug nas bzlas pa stong phrag bya'o/ /de nas bzlas pa'i mthar mchod pa chen po byas nas mar gyi sgron me rab tu sbar te mi smra bar bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas mtshan phyed nas
nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'ongs pa na 'dod pa byas te chung mar 'gyur ro/ /lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang bza' ba la sogs pa gdan la bzhag ste 'gro'o/ /bud med dang 'grogs pa dor bar
bya ste| gzhan du na rnam par 'joms par byed do/ /de nas ka na ka ma ti'i sgrub thabs yin te/ shing ba Da'i rtsa bar song nas nya dang sha'i gtor ma cho gas dbul bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyang
'thungs te lhag mas mchod yon sbyin par bya'o/ /stong phrag gcig bzla bar bya ste/ 'di ltar zhag bdun gyi mtshan mo rang nyid 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'khor
brgya phrag gsum dang mnyam du 'di rnams mtshan phyed nas nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'ongs pa na 'dod pa byas te chung mar 'gyur ro/ /skye ba bcu gnyis rnams kyi gos dang rgyan dang
bza' ba rnams ster ro/ /nyi ma so sor dI nA ra brgyad rnams rab tu ster ro/ /de nas dga' ma'i sgrub thabs yin te/ ri mo mkhan la gan la thang sku bri bar bya'o/ /gser gyis mdog can
rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na ut+pal can dzA ti'i me tog gis mchod par bya'o/ /gu gul gyi bdug pa byin pa stong phrag brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i mthar ji
@#/ /ltar 'byor ba'i mchod ba byas nas mar gyi sgron me rab tu sbar te ji srid mtshan phyed de srid par bzlas pa bya ste/ rang nyid 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'ongs nas mi smra bar
'dod pa byas te chung mar 'gyur ro/ /sgrub po'i 'khor rnams skyong zhing / lha rdzas kyi 'dod pa dang ston mo rnams dang / dngul chu'i bcud len rnams ster bar byed do/ /dI nA ra nyi shu rtsa
lnga ster bar byed do/ /de nas pad+ma ma ni'i sgrub thabs yin te/ /rang gi khyim du spyi bo'i gnas su tsan+dan gyi maN+Dal byas te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas stong phrag gcig tshad bzla bar
bya'o| |de nas zla ba nya la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas ji srid mtshan phyed pa de srid du bzlas pa bya ste/ nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'ongs pa na 'dod pa byas te chung mar
'gyur ro/ /lha rdzas kyi 'dod pa rab tu ster zhing / /dngul chu'i bcud len dang / grub pa'i rdzas kyang ster bar byed do/ /de nas ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs/ /'di las yang dag rab
bshad bya/ /gnod sbyin mo rnams sgrub dus su/ /ral gcig ma ni rnam bsgom bya/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ /gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa mo/ /sku mdog sngon mo 'jigs byed che/ /
b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom bya/ /shar du dzam+b+ha la bsam bya/ /nor 'dzin yang ni lho ru ste/ /chu dbang nub tu dgod par bya/ /byang du tsi bi kuN+Da li/ /me la sogs pa'i zur du yang // /
gnod sbyin mo bzhi rnam bsgom bya/ /kuN+Da la ha tI nI ro hi/ /mdzes ma cho gas dgod par bya/ /de nas sgo skyong bsam bya ste/ /dbyug pa la sogs mtha' dag las/ /ji ltar snga ma'i 'khor lo
mthong / /de ltar kha dog rab sbyar bya/ /thams cad gtso bo'i mtshan ma 'dzin/ /slar yang phyi nas bsngags bzlas bya/ /oM e ka dza Ti ba su sA d+ha nI swAhA/ de nas puk+ka sI'i sgrub thabs/ /
'di las yang dag rab bshad bya/ skad cig gang gis bsgoms tsam gyis/ /'jig rten gsum po puk+ka sIr/ /sku mdog ser skya zhal bzhi pa/ /phyag bzhi bong bu la zhon pa/ /bsgom
bya puk+ka sI yi las/ /bya rog tho ba mda' dang ni/ /gzhu rnams bsgom bya brtul zhugs can/ /sngags bzla bar bya ste/ oM puk+ka sI oM/ /de nas 'jam pa'i rdo rje yi/ /sgrub thabs yang
dag rab bshad bya/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa las skad cig las mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gshin
rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ gnod sbyin mo sgrub pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos//nyal ba slong bar byed pa dang / /sbrul gyi sos btab
la sogs pa/ /srung ba'i gsang sngags las gsungs pa/ /'bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas pa yis/ /don grub sa bon bsags rnams kyis/ /nyal ba slong bar byed pa dang / /'tsho bar yang ni
@#/ /tha tshom med/ /zhi ba gshin rje gshed dkar po/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor rigs rnams bsgom/ /phyag tu don grub sa bon rnams/ /'bum phrag bzhir ni bzla bar
bya| |sos btab yang dag kha bltas te/ /nyungs kar gyis ni brab par bya/ /gal te gang gis bzung ba yang / /the tshom med par ldang bar 'gyur/ /hUM yig kha dog dkar po ni/ /bsgrub
bya'i snying gar bsam bya ste/ /hrIHSh+T+riHla sogs sngags bzla zhing / /'od zer rnams kyis dug dgug bya/ /phyag g.yas de bzhin g.yon pa la/ /'dab brgyad pad+ma dgod par bya/ /de
dbus su yang hUM yig gis/ /'od zer rnams kyis bdud rtsi 'dzag /de nyid kyis ni spyi bor yang / /'od dkar dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/ /mkhas pas ha yig bsam par bya/ /de nas
hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags/ /byugs pas dug ni dgug par bya/ /oM hrIHha hrAM dzaHphuHyig /sngags kyis spyi bo nas brtsams te/ /rkang mthar bya ba sngags bzlas kyi/ /bdud rtsi'i char
pa bsgoms bya ste/ /'tsho bar yang ni the tshom med/ /sa bon yi ge rdzogs pa ni/ /'dzin pa bcings pa'i mchog yin no/ /kha dog ser po yang dag byung / /sos btab gnas la nges
par bsgom/ /oM yig dang po tsheg drag mtha'/ /cho ga nges sbyar ha tha dag /dug gi bya bas bcings pa la/ /sbyor ba rnams kyis bcings pa la/ /spyi bor gser 'joms legs
par rtogs/ /de ltar gzhan rnams kyang g.yan pa dang / /phol mig dang / dmu chu la sogs pa gos pa legs par tshar gcod pa'i rab tu sbyor ba mang pos kyang ngo / /de nas rdo rje 'dzin
rgyal pos/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor mdzad/ /bgegs dang log 'dren gdug pa rnams/ /dgug pa'i don phyir yang gsungs pa/ /bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /srung ba'i 'khor
lo rab sbyor las/ /'bar ba'i sku dang dbyug pa yis/ /lus gsum las skyes dgas par bya/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas rnams kun gyi/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang por gyur/ /slob dpon gshin rje
'joms dkyil 'khor/ /bdag ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bgyi/ /gos kyis gdong ba bcings nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang bzhag nas/ /kye khyod su zhes brjod bya ste/ /bdag skal
bzang zhes smra bar bya/ /blo bzang yol ba nang byas nas/ /bla ma mchog la gsol btab bya/ /dbang bskur don du gus chen gyis/ /mgon po'i rjes su gsum brjod bya/ /ji ltar sangs
rgyas chos chen gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur las/ /bdag la mgon pos yang dag dbang / /mchog kyang bdag la stsal du gsol/ /glu dang rol mos de bzhin mchod/ /
mchod yon zhabs bsil de bzhin nyid/ /slob mas mchod pa la dbul bya/ /yang na der ni bstod pa bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /stong nyid yang dag gsung bar mdzad/ /oM shU

@#/ /n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM pu dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM d+ha rma d+hA tu swa b+hA pa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas sbyin sreg rab bshad bya/ /zhib la sogs
rab dbye las/ /gang gi sbyin srag gis 'grub 'gyur/ /las kun rab tu sgrub pa po'i/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba la/ /rgyas pa'i sems kyis rgyas pa la/ /rab dga' sems kyis
dbang la nyid/ /drag po yis ni gsod pa la'o/ /zlum po rnam pa zhi ba ste/ /rdzing bu rnam pa rgyas pa'o/ /dbang la zla ba phyed par brjod/ /mkha' khams mdog can gsad pa la'o/ /zhi ba la ni
khru gang yin/ /de bzhin khru gnyis rgyas pa la'o/ /ji ltar rgyas pa de bzhin dbang / /sor mo nyi shu gsad pa la'o/ /khru phyed brtsigs pa zhi ba la/ /rgyas pa la ni khru gang ngo / /lnga gnyis
gsad pa las byas te/ /ji ltar dgug pa de bzhin dbang / /zhi pa'i sbyin sreg tshes gcig la/ /zla ba nya la rgyas pa ste/ /bcu bzhi pa la mngon spyod do/ /brgyad pa la ni dbang gi las/ /
shel dang nya phyis zhi ba la/ /mu tig 'bras bu rab bsngags te/ /dung dang bo de tsi ta dang / /nad med pa la mi rus so/ /tsan+dan dmar pos bsgos pa yis/ /byi ru yi ni khyad par
las| |drag mig lung thang de bzhin du/ /mi rus nA ga pha Ni yi/ /brgya phrag gcig ni zha ba la/ /de bzhin brgyad lhag rgyas pa la/ /dbang dang dgug pa nyi shu lnga/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi
mngon spyod la'o/ /brgya phyed sngags kyis bsgrub pa la'o/ /ril bu rgyu bar bya sngags la/ /phreng ba rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /de bzhin lhun po gnyis rgyu bya/ /zhi ba mdzub mo la bzhag ste/ /gung
mo la ni rgyas pa'o/ /dbang dang dgug pa ming med la/ /tshar gcad pa ni mthe chung la'o/ /kha dog dkar po zhi ba la/ /kha dog ser po rgyas pa la/ /dbang la dmar po rtag bsam bya/ /
nges par gsod la nag po 'dod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu
pa'o|| //rnal 'byor bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba dang / ston mo dang / myang ba dang / blag pa dang / btung ba la sogs pa yang dag par
ldan pa'i dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par gang ba'i
rol mo'i sgra chen po lnga bsgom par bya ste/ mdun du gtor ma'i snod skyogs sam zangs gzhong gi nang du bza' ba tsam bcas pa'i chu khyor pa gsum ji ltar rnyed pa'i dam tshig gi
rdzas dang ldan pa bzhag la/ de rab tu gsal bar drung du bzhag la sgom pa brtsam par bya'o/ /nam mkha'i dbyings su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang bcas pa bsgom par ba'o//
@#/ /ze 'bru la yaM yig las rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs can/ mtha' gnyis su g.yo ba'i ba dan dang rgyal mtshan brgyad kyis brgyan
pa'o| |de'i steng du raM yig dmar po las skyes pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa dmar po zur gsum la raM yig gis mtshan pa'o/ /de'i steng du ru yig gsum yongs su
gyur pa las mgo po gsum gyi sgyed bu la gnas pa'i AHyig dmar po las skyes pa'i pad+ma'i snod phyi dkar la nang dmar pa'o/ /der pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i rnam pa bsam
par bya'o/ /de la shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la b+h+rUM aM dziM khaM hUM gi yi ges rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams dang / de bzhin du me la sogs pa'i zur
du lAM mAM pAM tAM bAM gyi yi ges spyan ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams bsam par bya zhing / yi ge bcu po 'di rnams yongs su gyur pa las go ku da ha na rnams dang / bi ra shu
mA mU zhes pa 'di rnams kyi yi ge rnams kyis mtshan pa'i dam tshig gi rdzas bcu po 'di rnams pad+ma'i snod du blta bar bya'o/ /de'i steng du oM yig kha dog dkar po des
bkab pa'i rang bzhin bsams la/ oM yig las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng du hUM yig dkar po las byung ba'i dbyug pa de'i sa bon gyis mtshan pa blta bar
bya'o| |de nas slar pad+ma'i snod las 'og gi sgyed bu la oM AHhUM lan gsum bzlas shing brjod la bsgoms te/ snga ma bar ma chad par rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed de me'i dkyil
'khor rab tu 'bar bas gdungs shing bskol te spar bas 'bar ba'i gong bu la sogs pa dam tshig gi rdzas bcu'i rang bzhin mtha' dag zhu bas rdo rje'i dbyug pas dkrugs pa blta
bar bya'o/ /de nas slar rdo rje'i dbyug pa zhu bar gyur te bdud rtsi nyi ma 'char kha'i kha dog gam dngul chu'i rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de las slar oM AHhUM gi yi ge gsum las thon
pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis khams gsum ma lus pa la gnas pa'i bdud rtsi shin tu mang bar blangs par bsgom zhing / de nyid rab tu gzhug par bya'o/ /de nyid rab tu bcug pa
la mkha'i rnam pa shin tu gsal ba'i tshogs bsil ba'i sbrang rtsi 'dus pa'i gzugs su brtan par bya zhing / phyi nas yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /kha dog dri ro phun
sum tshogs/ /dri med ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od/ /ye shes bdud rtsir rab sbyor gyis/ /'bad nas gtor ma rdzogs byas te/ /gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i sngags pa khro bo phyag na zhags
pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa sbros nas phyogs skyong rnams kyi snying la lcags kyus phug cing / mgul ba la zhags pas bcings te bkug par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM
@#/ /phaT phaT duSh+Ta in+d+raM sa pa ri wA ra A kaR+Sha ya dza/ sngags 'dis mig stong pa dkar ser glang po che dkar po'i gdan la g.yas pa dang / gcig shos na rdo rje dang /
sdigs mdzub mdzad pa bkug ste shar du gzhag par bya'o/ /sngags de nyid kyis nye dbang mkha' lding gi gdan la rin po che'i cod pan can g.yas na be con dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ g.yon na

drung dang kau stu b+ha 'dzin pa/ de nyid kyi g.yon du ha cang mi ring bar gzhag par bya'o/ /yang de nyid kyis gshin rje ma he la zhon pa dbyug pa 'dzin pa lho ru gzhag par bya'o/ /yang de'i nyid kyis chu lha
kha dog dkar po brang 'gro la zhon pa/ phyag na klu'i zhags pa can nub tu gzhag par bya'o/ /yang de nyid kyis lus ngan ser po gter la gnas pa/ phyag na bI dza pU ra ka dang / na ku li can byang
du gzhag par bya'o/ /de nyid kyis glang sna dkar po byi ba la gnas pa/ g.yas na bgrang phreng dang dgra sta 'dzin pa/ g.yon na la phug dang la du 'dzin pa dbang ldan du'o/ /de nyid kyis dbang phyug
dkar po khyu mchog la zhon pa ral pa 'dzin pa/ phyag na rtse gsum dang thod pa can/ /phyag gnyis dkar mo la 'khyud pa dbang ldan du gzhag par bya'o/ /yang de nyid kyis me lha dmar por la gnas
pa/ phyag na bgrang phreng dang sbyi blugs can mer gzhag par bya'o/ /yang de nyid kyis srin po rol zhon pa/ phyag na gri gug dang thod pa can sngon po mi sdug pa khro ba dang bcas pa bden bral du
gzhag par bya'o/ /yang de nyid kyis rlung lha du ba'i mdog can ri dwags ser po la gnas pa rlung du gzhag par bya'o/ /yang de nyid kyis nyi ma dmar po phyag gnyis kyis pad+ma 'dzin pa/ rta bdun la
gnas pa steng du gzhag par bya'o/ /yang de nyid kyis zla ba dkar po phyag gnyis kyis ku mud 'dzin pa/ shing rta la gnas pa steng du gzhag par bya'o/ /yang de nyid kyis tshangs pa ser po zhal
bzhi pa/ spyi blugs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / dbyug pa dang / bgrang phreng 'dzin pa ral bas brgyan pa/ ngang pa la gnas pa steng du gzhag par bya'o/ /yang de nyid kyis sa'i lha mo pad+ma la
gnas pa g.yon na bum pa 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yas na dam bcas khas len pa 'og tu gzhag par bya'o/ /yang de nyid kyis thags bzang ris sngon po shing rta la gnas pa/ g.yas pa dang gcig
shos na ral gri dang / sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa de nyid du gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs phyag na phur bu 'dzin pa rnams la khro bo mgrin pa 'phyang ba nyid thugs ka'i

sa bon gyis bkug ste/ de rnams kyi snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / sbyi bo rnams su rkang pa'i mtha' yang sngags 'dis bur bu gdab par bya'o/ /oM hrIHSh+TIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT sarba In+d+ra
A dI na kI la ya hUM phaT/ ces pas phur bu btab pa'i mthar grub pa'i bcud bsdus la lha de rnams thams cad kyang gshin rje mthar byed kyi rnam par bskyed par bya ste/ byang chub kyi sems khu bas
@#/ /sam| yang na de'i tshe sa bon dang mtshan ma'i rim pas bskyed par bya'o/ /de las sa bon hrIHyig las rdzogs pa dbang po'o/ /sa bon Sh+T+rIHlas rdzogs pa
gshin rje'o/ /sa bon wi las rdzogs pa chu lha'o/ /sa bon kr-i yig las rdzogs pa lus ngan no/ /sa bon ta yig las rdzogs pa dbang ldan no/ /sa bon A yig las rdzogs pa
me lha'o/ /sa bon na yig las rdzogs pa bden bral lo/ /sa bon na yig las rdzogs pa rlung lha'o/ /sa bon hUM yig las rdzogs pa zla ba'o/ /sa bon hUM yig las rdzogs pa nyi
ma'o| |sa bon phaT yig las rdzogs pa tshangs pa'o/ /sa bon phaT yig las rdzogs pa nor 'dzin ma'o/ /sa bon swA yig las rdzogs pa thags bzang ris so/ /sa bon hA yig las
rdzogs pa 'byung po thams cad do/ /zhes pa'o/ /de ltar bskyed de rnam par bsams nas de rnams kyi mig la sogs pa rnams la gnas ji lta bar mig la sogs pa bskyed cing /
lus la sogs pa rnams la sku rdo rje la sogs pa rnams dang / gshin rje mthar byed kyi cod pan nyid dang / dang po mchod yon bsang gtor dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul
phyi nas gtor ma'i yo byad bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i rim pas sngon du ste/ de nyid gsum gyis mngon par bsngags shing / /slar de rnams kyi sngags kyi rab tu sbyong ba rnam par bsams

la phyi nas sngags 'dis bdud rtsi dbul bar bya'o/ /oM rak+ta mu ku nA ya/ rak+ta dza TA ya/ rak+ta mu khA ya/ rak+ta sha ri rA ya/ rak+ta b+hu dzA ya/ rak+ta muN+Da mA lA b+ha ra nA ya/ rak+ta ra tha sa mA ru D+hA ya/ rak+ta pad+ma A

sa nA ya/ rak+ta b+ha ra na b+hu Sha NA ya/ i daM ba lim gr-ih+na gr-ih+Na/ ma ma big+h+nAM ha ra ha ra/ tsa tur mA rA na ni ba rA ya ni bA ra ya/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sho Sha ya

sho Sha ya/ ts+tshe da ts+tshe da/ b+he da b+he da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ phyi nas yan lag so sos dbul bar bya ste/ oM in+d+ra ya na maHhrIH/ ya mA ya na maHSh+T+rIH/ ba ru NA ya na maHwi/ ku be rA ya na ma kr-i/ I shra

ra ya na maHta/ ag+ne ye na maHaH/ nai ri d+ya ya na ma na/ b+ha ya be na maHna/ tsan+d+ra ye na maHhUM/ ak+kA ya na maHhUM/ brah+ma Ne na ma phaT/ ba su d+ha rA ye na maHphaT/ bai ma tsi tri Nai na ma swA/ sarba b+hu te b+h+yo na ma
hAHha ha ha/ hi hi hi/ hUM hUM hUM/ pheM pheM pheM/ phyis nas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / lha bshos la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de rnams la sgrub pa pos phul ba'i bcud thams
cad gsol zhing nye bar longs spyod par mdzad do/ /de gnas pa rnams la rdo rje gsor la 'gyid ba dang bcas par dril bu 'khrol zhing bstod pa byas te/ gti mug dga' ma la sogs pas mngon
par 'dod pas gsol ba gdab cing / bzhad pa rnam pa brgyad kyi sngags brjod par bya'o/ /de la sngags 'di yin te/ ha ha he he ho ho hUM hUM/ gshegs par bya ste/ oM aHmuHzhes pa 'dis
@#/ /kyang ngo / /phyi nas sgrub pa po'i mngon par 'dod pa yang mdzad do/ /khyod kyis sems can thams cad don/ /ji lta'i rjes mthun grub pa stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gse
mdzad de/ /slad nas kyang ni 'byon par mdzod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ gtor ma'i le'u ste bcu gcig
pa'o// //de nas nges par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' chen po la bstod pa/ gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod//
shin tu 'jigs rung gshin rje gshed/ /ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /sku yi rdo rjer phyag 'tshal lo/ /phra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /shin tu 'jigs rung gshin rje gshed/ /
thugs kyi rdo rje rab gsal ba/ /rin chen rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso/ /dbyangs mchog kun gyi mchog gi
mchog /gsung gi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /las kun byed pa'i gshin rje gshed/ /sku yi rdo rje rab gsal ba/ /phyag na ral gri khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ /sangs rgyas kun rab mchog gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dbang phyug khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje sbyan dang / rdo rje snyan
dang / rdo rje shangs dang / rdo rje ljags dang / rdo rje lus dang / rdo rje thugs zhes gsungs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i sbyan la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i dam tshig go /de nas drag shul
gshin rje gshed/ /dkyil 'khor 'di las rab bshad bya/ /gzhin rje gshed po rab gsal ba/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed/ /gsar ba legs par bkal ba dang / /legs pa'i tshad ldan
gtsang ma yi/ /srad bus thig gdab shes rab can/ /gshin rje 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms/ /zhi ba la sogs

rab ston pa/ /zlum po'i dbyibs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ /der ni kun nas rtse lnga pa/ /las kyi rdo rje bri bar bya/ /rdo rje 'bar bas yang dag 'khrigs/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje bri/ /rdo rje'i 'od zer yang dag
'khrigs/ /'khor lo shar rtser bri bar bya/ /'od zer phreng bas yang dag 'khrigs/ /rin chen lho ru bri bar bya/ /pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'phro ba/ /sbrin gyi mdog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /ral gri byang du

bri bar bya/ /'khor lo shar gyi zur du bri/ /lho ru rdo rje bri bar bya/ /nub tu pad+ma bri ba ste/ /kha khyer zer 'brur bcas pa'o/ /'od zer lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /ral gri byang du bri bar bya/ /shar gyi sgo ru tho ba
ste| |lho ru rdo rje'i dbyug pa yang / /'dam skyes nub kyi sgo ru'o/ /byang du ral gri rdo rje can/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par shes bya ste/ /mchod pa'i khyad par rnams bya'o/ /'dod yon lnga
@#/ /yis sangs rgyas rnams/ /som nyi med par mchod par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar
po'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba 'debs par mdzad de/ gang gis rdo rje can mnyes pa/ /phyag rgya'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs/ /
rdo rje'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya rnams/ /slar yang 'grub par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /tshig 'di dag ni gsung bar mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor ba rnams thams cad kyi/ /
spyi bor gshin rje gshed bsgom bya/ /rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri bya zhing / /rtag tu sbyin sreg gis mchod bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig bsgrub bya ste/ /sdom pa gzung bar bya de nas/ /thog mar
cad pan dbang yin te/ /gnyis pa ral gri sbyin par bya/ /gsum pa rdo rje dril bu yang / /bzhi pa zla ba bza' ba'o/ /'di rnams dbang bskur chen po bzhi/ /dmar po'i zhal nas 'byung ba
ste| |dbang bskur 'di dag byin rlabs kyis/ /rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur byang chub thob/ /de nas 'byung po thams cad kyi/ /gtor ma bya ba sngar rab bshad/ /sngags chen brjod par gyur
pa na/ /'byung po thams cad rab tu 'bar/ /hrIHSh+T+rIHsogs sngags sa bon dang / /swAhA mtha' yis nges par sbyar/ /bshad gci chu dang bsres pa yis/ /maN+Dal gru gsum byas nas ni/ /lha
rnams tshim byas rnal 'byor pa/ /hA hA'i rnam pa slar dran bya/ /dkyil 'khor gsum ni byas nas ni/ /brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug rnams/ /mkhas pas cho gas yang dag bri/ /sngags rnams
thams cad dgod bya ste/ /grub pa'i sngags rnams brtul zhugs can/ /re mig bcu gnyis la dgod bya/ /mi rgyu rgyu bcas 'jig rten gsum/ /ma lus lhag ma med par 'grub/ /ya ma rA dzA sa do

me ya/ ya me do ru na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni rA yak+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ ya dbus shar du k+She dgod bya/ /lho ru 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste/ /me yig nub tu bri bar bya/ /byang du da yig dag byed do/ /

bsgrub bya'i ming ni blang bya zhing / /phyogs bral stong pa lag zung bya/ /hUM dag gis ni nang spel bya/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /yats+tsha ni rA dzA sa do ru/ /Na yo ni ra zhes phyi rol/ /thams
cad don phyir sgrub pa la/ /g.yon nas brtsams te yang dag bri/ /re mig rim pa gsum pa yi/ /mdun du gcig dor re mig la/ /hrIHSh+TIHzhes sogs sngags rnams kyis/ /shar nas brtsams

te bri bar bya/ /de mthar dor ba'i re mig la/ /re mig brgyad po yang dag bri/ /a mu kaM ku ru mA ra ya uts+tsha Ta ya/ ba shaM ku ru/ bi dwe ShA ya/ shAn+tiM ku ru/ puSh+TiM ku ru/ zhes pa de lta bu la sogs
@#/ /pa las kyi rjes su mthun pa las/ /dang po oM yig mthar na maH/ /mthar ni ba shiM bau Sha Ta/ /hUM phaT yi ge ldan sa bon/ /zhi ba rgyas pa dbang mthar byed/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //
thugs rje mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das/ /zhe sdang gshin rje gshed sku mchog /zhe sdang gis mnan 'gro gzigs nas/ /zhe sdang thams cad zad par mdzad/ /thugs rje mnga' ba bcom
ldan 'das/ /gti mug gshin rje gshed sku mchog /gti mug gis mnan 'gro gzigs nas/ /gti mug thams cad zad par mdzad/ /thugs rje mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das/ /phra ma gshin
rje gshed sku mchog /phra mas mnan pa'i 'go gzigs nas/ /phra ma thams cad zad par mdzad/ /thugs rje mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das/ /'dod chags gshin rje gshed sku mchog /'dod
chags kyis mnan 'gro gzigs nas/ /'dod chags thams cad zad par mdzad/ /thugs rje mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das/ /phrag dog gshin rje gshed sku mchog /phrag dog gis mnan 'gro
gzigs nas/ /phrag dog thams cad zad par mdzad/ /byams pa tsa rtsi kA rab brjod/ /de bzhin snying rje phag mo'o/ /dga' ba dbyangs can rab grags/ /btang snyoms gau rI gzugs
can ma/ /bdag nyid dngos po thams cad kyis/ /rdzogs gyur dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor pa/ /snying ga'i sa bon las spro bya/ /'dir ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas spyod pa'i mtshan nyid mchog/
'di las yang dag rab bshad bya/ /'jigs byed gshin rje gshed gzugs kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub phyir/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs su/ /ma he mchog la zhon bya zhing / /sbrul
rnams kyis ni brgyan byas nas/ /ljags kyi rdo rje bsgom bya ste/ /gyen 'greng khyad 'phags la sogs pa/ /dbu skra dmar ser dag tu bya/ /sbyi bor cod pan rnams kyis bskor/ /sma ra ser po dag
byas la/ /hrIHSh+TiHla sogs sngags brjod cing / /rdo rje dbyug pa yang dag gsor/ /de nas seng+ge'i sgra byas te/ /gshin rje gshed dmar rab sbyor las/ /cung zad nus pa thob pa ni/ /rol cing grong
du 'jug par bya/ /skal ba bzang po gar bya zhing / /drug las skyes sogs glu blang bya/ /de nas rgyal mtshan khyams bltas te/ /de ni 'o ma rab sbyar bya/ /'o ma goms pa'i sems gcig gis/ /phyag
rgya chen po rab bsgrub bya/ /phag mo'i gzugs su bsam bya zhing / /btsun mo kun la 'dod pa bya/ /seng+ge ltar spyod rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod don thams cad grub par byed/ /de nas phyag rgyar sgrub pa'i
thabs/ /'di las yang dgar ba bshad bya/ /sngags chen yi ge gcig po ste/ /de yi bzlas pas rab brtan bya/ /hrIHSh+TIHsogs sa bon yang dag byung / /ma he'i gdong ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo
@#/ /rje dkyil 'khor mnyam zhugs pa/ /ma he'i steng du bsgom par bya/ /gang zhig sa la 'bigs byed pa/ /sna tshogs mtshon cha'i rang bzhin can/ /ma he'i
gdong ni sgrub pa la/ /blo ldan phyag rnams las bsgom bya/ /de nas rdo rje dbyug pa yi/ /sgrub thabs 'di las rab bshad bya/ /hrIHyig sngags ni chen po ste/ /ma he chen po la zhon
pa'o/ /'bum gnyis yang dag rdzogs pa'i phyag /thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs pa'i sku/ /ri rab lhun po dang mnyam pa/ /sa yi 'og tu mnan pa'o/ /de nas bye ba'i phyag sgrub thabs/ /
'di las yang dag rab bshad bya/ /sngags chen bi kr-i tA na na/ /gtso bo hUM yig las byung ba/ /oM wi kr-i tA na na hA hA hI hI hUM hUM he he ho ho swA hA/ dgos pa thams cad rab bsgrub phyir//
'di las dam tshig sgrub thabs bshad/ /sngags kyis dub pa'i bza' ba ni/ /bzang po rnyed par dka' ba'i zas/ /sha chen dang ni rta nyid dang / /glang po che yi khyad par nyid/ /ba
lang rang bzhin khyi nyid dang / /bong bu rnga mo ce sbyang nyid/ /mar khu chen pos lus la byug /sngon po bsres pa btso bar bya/ /'di ni lus la byugs tsam gyis/ /'gro ba thams cad dbang
du byed/ /gi waM rgyam tsha'i khu ba dang / /de bzhin bil ba'i lo ma nyid/ /so phag bye mar bcas pa'am/ /gser shing lo ma'i khu bas kyang / /'di yi lus la dril phyis bya/ /de bzhin
rdo rje bdud rtsi che/ /'di ni rnal 'byor mchog rtse'o/ /rang 'byung me tog ltung bar ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ spyod
pa dang dam tshig sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig tsa rtsi ka'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / rdo rje phag
mo'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / dbyangs can ma'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / gau rI'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs te mchod pa'i glu 'di rjod par mdzad do/ /kye kye gshin rje gshed dmar po/ /bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin/ /khyod mthong khro bo rnam par 'jigs/ /bla ma khro bo'i rang
bzhin spongs/ /khyod kyis gar mdzad sa steng dang / /sa bla dag dang sa 'og g.yo/ /chags pas brgyan pa'i khro bo'i yid/ /gar mdzad khyod ni ro langs lags/ /sku ni dmar zhing
thung ba ste/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sbrul pa/ /rdo rje dbyangs can mas btud zhus/ /gar mdzad bde ba chen po khyod/ /hrIHSh+r+TIHgsang sngags dag gis khyod/ /sa gsum po yi
'khrul pa sel/ /snying rje'i khro bo rje btsun khyod/ /gar mdzad 'gro ba rnams la gzigs/ /de nas bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid mchog /'di las yang dag rab bshad bya/ /gang gis
@#/ /bzlas pa'i rab sbyor gyis/ /rgya chen dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /myur ba ma yin bul ba min/ /ring po ma yin thung du min/ /sngags ni cung zad thos
pa ste| |gshin rje'i slob dpon mi yi mchog /ma he mi dang glang po che/ /ba lang rang bzhin rta nyid dang / /bong bu rnga mo'i rus pa gzung / /bzlas pa'i phreng ba rab bsgrub bya/ /zla ba zla
ba'i bcu bzhi la/ /sha lnga yis ni byug bya zhing / /bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /mchog gi dngos grub rgyur bzlas te/ /tshes gcig ril bu rnal 'byor pa/ /mkhas pa gshin
rje gshed bsgom bya/ /yang na mi yi mgo bo ni/ /khrag dang ldan par rnam bsgom bya/ /khri phrag tsam gyis 'byung po rnams/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams stong phrag gis/ /gshin rje
gshed kyi rab sbyor las/ /yi dwags tshogs rnams gsang par bya/ /bzlas pa 'bum gyis rnal 'byor bdag /de ni las kun byed pa yin/ /bye ba bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te//
bye ba lnga yis smos ci dgos/ /nyin re zla ba so so 'am/ /yang na lo rnams so so la/ /dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhir mkhas/ /gtor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi sbyin/ /rtag tu cung zad zla ba
gang | |de bzhin cung zad gang 'thung ba/ /gzhan yang bza' ba thams cad kyi/ /phud ni gshin rje gshed la dbul/ /de nas bla mar yon dbul ba/ /'di las yang dag rab bshad
bya/ |bdag nyid zhi ba nyid phyir dang / /las kun grub pa'i phyir du yang / /phangs pa med par dbul byas te/ /bdag nyid dngul gyi rna rgyan dang / /gser dang nor dang ma ma dang / /de bzhin bu

dang chung ma dang / /skyed byed sring mo bu mo dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs na bza' nyid/ /gdugs dang rnga yab mdzes pa nyid/ /khang pa khri dang dri bzang dang / /de bzhin glu dang rol mo nyid/ /ral gri
dang ni rgyan nyid kyang / /bla mar rab dbul brtul zhugs can/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ nye bar mkho ba thams cad
