rdzogs/ /sku mdog nag po zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis g.yas pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /snun pa'i stobs can rdo rje 'bar/ /g.yon pas dril bu dkur brten te/ /sgeg pa'i tshul can nam
mkhar gdengs/ /rin chen chu 'dzin rgyan dang ldan/ /stag lpags dar gyis sku la brgyan/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bdud la brdzis/ /spyan gsum gdug pa'i mche ba gtsigs
bskal pa'i me 'od nang du bzhugs/ /yi ge gsum gyi gnas gsum po/ /lhar byas skye mched byin gyis brlab/ /gnas su khro bo'i yig 'bru bskyed/ /sbrul pa dpag med phyogs
bcur 'gyed/ /yi ge bzhi yis ye shes dbab/ /rigs bdag la sogs sangs rgyas kyis/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs cod pan bsam/ /de yi ting 'dzin 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /cho ga gsum
pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /gzhan don rgyun mi 'chad par bsgom/ /yang na gsung gi yig 'brus mtshan/ /phrin las thogs med rnal 'byor bzlas/ /'di ni rnam dag rig pa ste/ /rtag
tu mnyams 'bras bur ldan/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las dpa' bo gcig pa bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //
dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i thabs ji lta bu lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis
zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgya 'byung ba/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /skad cig ma yis lhar bsams nas/ /snying gar nyi ma'i rig pa
hUM/ /'od kyi rang bzhin smod bcud rnams/ /sbyangs te sangs rgyas sa la bzhag /'od zer gnyis pas sangs rgyas dang / /byang sems dkyil 'khor dgug bya ste/ /phyag bya hUM las lha mo bsam//
me tog la sogs pas mchod la/ /tha dad pa yi mchod pa che/ /de 'od dpag med lha mo yis/ /reg bya tha mi dad pas mchod/ /sdig bshags rjes su yi rang dang / /gsol zhing skyab
@#/ /'gro bdag lus dbul/ /sems bskyed dag pa bsngo bar bya/ /de rjes dang po byams pa ste/ /gnyis pa snying rje gsum pa dga'/ /kun gyi mtha' la btang
snyoms so/ /sbyangs gzhi sngags kyis phyi nang kun/ /stong par byas te rang lus kyang / /dbang po'i gzhu 'dra srid 'dzin gyi/ /gnas su hUM bsam de 'od bcas/ /tsi las byung ba'i 'khor
lo ste/ /rtsibs bcu la ni nyi ma bsam/ /dbus su hUM las gnod mdzes bskyed/ /de las hUM 'phros khro bcu yang / /rang rang sa la gsal bar bskyed/ /sngags pas bgegs med kyis shig par//
de la bka' lung bsgo bar bya/ /zhal bzhi'i gsang sngags dran pa yis/ /mthe bong sdigs mdzub sbyar nas ni/ /phyogs bcur brda ni bstan par bya/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ni hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na

gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga wan bid+yA rA dza ya hUM hUM phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjod pas/ /lus ngag sems las byung ba yi/ /bgegs

kun gyi ni mgo stengs su/ /rdo rje phur pa gzugs par bya/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA tA ya g+hA tA ya sarba duSh+TAn bi g+h+NAn hUM hUM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM A dz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya bA ka tsit+tA badzra kI la
ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje thobs brdung bya ste/ /oM badzra mung+ga ra badzra kI la ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ spyi bor btab pas nges par brlag /slar 'dus phyogs mtshams ma lus par/ /sa gzhi ra ba dra

ba dang / /gur bcing ba dang bla re dang / /mda' dang me yi 'od 'bar bsgom/ /oM badzra me di nAM badzri b+ha ba badzra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badzra prA kA ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badzra pany+dza ra hUM laM hUM/ oM badzra bi tA na hUM khaM

hUM/ oM badzra sha ra dza la traM saM traM/ oM badzra dzA la a na lArka hUM raM hUM/ rim pas brjod la snying rje yi/ /bdag nyid gzhan la phan 'dod pa/ /smon lam las byung rdzu 'phrul mchog /yaM las byung ba
gzhu 'dra ba/ /sngon po ba dan ldan pa bsam/ /de steng raM byung rgod ma'i kha/ /gru gsum dmar po 'od 'bar ba/ /baM las skyes pa zlum po ste/ /dkar po 'khyil ba'i tshul du bsam/ /de las
skyes pa dbang chen te/ yaM skyes ser po rdo rje'i rgyu/ /gru bzhi 'od zer 'bar ba bsam/ /de steng tsaM las chos kyi 'khor/ /lte bar bruM las gzhal yas khang / /gru bzhi sgo dang rta babs
bcas/ /dra ba phyed dang dra bas brgyan/ /phreng ba rin chen rdo rje dang / /mdzes pa'i ba dan bcas pa bsam/ /de nang baM las chu skyes ni/ /ge sar 'dab mar bcas pa'i steng / /
nyi ma kA li 'od 'bar che/ /steng du zla ba A li bsil/ /kha sbyar bar du hUM dang A/ /gnag cing dmar ba'i rnam pa la/ /de las pad+ma rdo rje bsam/ /slar yang yi ges 'gro ba sbyangs//
hUM gis mi bskyod thugs rnams bsdu/ /a yis 'od dpag gsung bsdus la/ /gnyis med zhu bas sprul pa bsdu/ /rdo rje las ni khro bo ste/ /pad+mas khro mo'i rnam par bskyed/ /khro
@#/ /bo mthing ga zhal gcig pa/ /rang 'od las byung phyag gnyis 'khyud/ /rdo rje dril bu thabs shes rab/ /g.yas dang g.yon du bsam par bya/ /
dbu rgyan la sogs rin chen ldan/ /dbu skra kham ser gyen du 'bar/ /nag po sprul lus klu chen brgyad/ /sku smad stag gi pags pas dkris/ /chos gos sngon pos sku stod
dkris/ /mche ba gtsigs shing spyan gsum dmar/ /'dod dgur sgyur zhing brkyang bskum zhabs/ /mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i steng du bzhugs/ /de yum rdo rje bde ma khro/ /dmar
ljang zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /g.yas pa gri gug yab la 'khyud/ /g.yon pa thong pa bde ba ster/ /gnyis med g.yon gyi phyogs rnams 'khril/ /rdo rje sa sbyong ba'i 'bras
bskul te/ /shar phyogs pad+mar nyi zla la/ /hUM las khams gsum rnam par rgyal/ /dkar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin/ /g.yon pa dril bu be
con te/ /khro bo'i rgyan ldan bsams nas kyang / /'byung po'i nus pa 'joms par byed/ /lho phyogs nyi ma ro steng su/ /hUM las byung ba'i legs ldan gnag /g.yas pa gri gug
g.yon pa thod/ /zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum thod phreng ldan/ /'gro bo gsod pa'i las la brtson/ /kun tu klu 'dul bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /ljang gu zhal gcig phyag bzhi khro/ /g.yas
pa rdo rje bya khyung dang / /g.yon pa dbyug to phur bu bsnams/ /sa 'og klu sogs zas su gsol/ /byang du k+Sha las rnam thos bu/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis bum stengs su/ /mdog
ser g.yas pa rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /g.yon pas nor sbyin bzung ba ste/ /dbul ba sel ba'i don la brtson/ /sgo mtshams lha yi rang bzhin la/ /ye shes spyan drangs mchod la
gzhug /de ni yi ge bzhi sbyor yin/ /lus ngag sems la yi ge yi/ /lha yi mtshan ma gdab par bya/ /skye mched lhar byas ting 'dzin gyi/ /nus pa mi shigs lhar bltas la/ /ye
shes lnga 'dus yi ge bsam/ /de yi 'od kyis spyan drangs pa'i/ /rigs lnga snyoms 'jug byin rlabs kyis/ /mi bskyod rdo rje dbang bskur te/ /gsang ba shes rab ye shes
kyis/ /rgyas gdab rigs la bzhi ba yi/ /phyag rgya che la rigs med do/ /'di ni gsang chen sku sgrub pa/ /rim gyis gsal zhing rnam par dag /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku thob pa/ /tshe gcig
nyid la 'gyur ba yin/ /rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sa thogs 'jig rten ma lus kun/ /skad cig nyid la dbang du 'gyur/ /gtsug na rin chen la sogs pa'i/ /gdug pa can
rnams snying yang 'byin/ /dga' bo la sogs klu chen rnams/ /rtag tu de la 'dud par 'gyur/ /nad kyi rigs kun ma lus 'joms/ /gnod sbyin ma lus bka' nyan cing / /lha srin
@#/ /ma lus dran du 'gyur/ /'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste/ /mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i
rgyud kyi rgyal po las dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi rig
pa'i gsang sngags kyi don ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes
rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /gsang ba mchog gi gsang ba ste/ /phrin las thams cad rdzogs byed cing / /sdug bsngal kun las skyob byed pa'i/ /A li kA
li mnyam sbyor las/ /thabs dang shes rab mnyam med pa'i/ /sngags kyi don ni rnam pa lnga/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa dang / /phrin las sna tshogs rig pa dang / /'khor gyi las

kyi rig pa dang / /'byung po 'gug dang gsad pa dang / /gtor ma gtang ba'i rig pa'o/ /oM badzra pA Ni hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra kro d+ha na nI laM bar d+ha ra badzra pA NI hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra tsaN+Da mahA

ro kha hUM phaT swAhA/ tad+ya thA b+ho b+ho bAn+nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i daM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badzra pA Ni hr-i da yaM/ yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha/ mA ku la/ uta sA da nAM/ b+ha bi Sh+yan+ti/ tad+ya thA bud+d+ha bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha bi

bud+d+ha ma hi prA pa ta/ ha ra ha ra nA gA nAM/ prA ha ra prA ha ra nA gA nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA gA nAM/ hri da ya nAM/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga d+harma Ni/ baM shIR+yan+tu nA ga sha rI rAM/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga nA ni/ tad+ya thA/ oM AHhUM

phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hUM nA go ta sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI lAM bA sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya hUM phaT/ kri tA na tA ya phaT/ kri tA na ta rU bA ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ tra

sa nA ya phaT/ kuSh+ma N+To ta swa da nA ya phaT/ pre ta bi shA tsa bi nA shA ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a ba smra rA bi nA sha ka rI ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ da ra da ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba

big+h+nan bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ sarba sha trUM saM g+ha pi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAM pa ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rAdz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ oM badzra trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra trai lo kya bi dza ya basmiM swAhA/ mA ra ya tsit+ta rbad rbad/ oM badzra kro d+ha

mahA kA lA ya hUM phaT/ oM mahA kA la gu Na hri da ya hUM phaT/ tsit+ta kro d+hi duny+tsa dzaH/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta nA ga hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li saM khaM ku ru hUM phaT/ mA ra ya rak+ta rdubs rdubs/ oM badzra

kro d+ha ku be ra rA dza ya hUM phaT/ oM AR+ya dza b+ha la dza len+d+rA ya hUM phaT swAhA/ mA ra ya ke choM choM/ mahA de ba mA ra ya sod sod/ mahA nA ga mA ra ya dza dzaH/ mahA de bi mA ra ya ha na ha na/ mahA ma

nu mA ra ya gtubs gtubs/ mahA grub pa mA ra ya tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ mahA yak+Sha mA ra ya b+hin+d+ha b+hin+da mahA gan d+harba mA ra ya khos khos/ ma hA ma ri ni mA ra ya nAM/ mahA nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni
@#/ /yak+Sha hUM/ mu ru ta mu ru ta hUM phaT/ mA ra Na sod sod/ mA ra Na bying bying / mA ra Na rmugs rmugs/ mA ra Na hal hal/ mA ra Na myos myos/ mA ra Na myos bying / mA ra Na thum ril dza

dzaH/ ka ka rak+ShaM hUM hUM s+t+waM b+h+yo dz+wa kha khA/ te she rak+Sha hUM hUM/ s+t+waM b+h+yo dz+waHkha khA/ tsa pa rak+Sha hUM hUM s+t+waM b+h+yo dzaHkha khA/ tsa ka rak+Sha hUM hUM s+t+waM b+h+yo dza kha khA/ tsa ka rak+Sha hUM hUM s+t+waM b+h+yo dz+wa kha khA/ mun du rak+Sha hUM hUM s+t+waM b+h+yo dza kha kh+'a/ ka ka rak+Sha sa ma ya

bud+d+ha ya spu ta ra/ te sha da sa ma ya bud+d+hA ya sU ta ra tsa pa rak+Sha sa ma ya bud+d+ha ya spu ta ra tsa ka rak+Sha sa ma ya bud+d+ha ya sbu ta ra/ mun du rak+Sha sa ma ya bud+d+ha ya spu ta ra/ hUM hUM hril hril/ dim dim/ phob
phob/ shar shar/ di ri di ri rbad rbad/ kha thaM kha thaM/ thuMs/ thuMs/ dza re dza re b+h+yo/ ha sa ha sa/ te pa te pa/ kri ti ha kri ti ha/ kri khug kri khug /tshal pa tshal pa/ rbad ling rbad

ling / srog tshig nan rbad/ lus dul mA ra ya rbad/ raM raM dz+wA la dz+wA la shi shi /rdul bun rbad sod/ nA ga mA ra ya hUM phaT/ dzaHhUM baM hoHd+har+m+mA ka ka ki ti ra/ d+har+m+ma te sha sa muny+dza/ d+har+m+ma

te shata ka ra/ d+har+m+ma te sha tsa ka ra/ d+harma te sha sa ma ya/ bud+d+ha ya pu ta ra/ te pa te pa kha khA raM/ te pa te pa kA tsa ri/ te pa te pa mun+du ri/ te pa te pa pus+t+waM ha ra/ te pa te pa sa dza sa muny+dza/

tsa ka ra mun+du ra khe/ badzra tsa maM ran dzA dzA/ te sha raM/ mun+du nan/ badzra dzu ru dzu ru raM/ dzu ru dzu ru sa muM dzA hUM/ badzra g+he ne khe dza/ badzra pur+Ni khe dza/ badzra muN+Da re kha dza/ kha dza rA dza mun+du ra khe/ kha

dza rA dz+dzA mun+du ra sa muM khe/ pad+ma ra Ni kha dza mun+du rA dza khe/ kha dza rA dza mun+du ra sa muny+dza ra khe dzu dzu dza dza kA hi dza/ oM kA ya wA kA tsit+ta i daM ba ling / buny+dza dzi g+ha phul+la d+hu pa mAM sa se/ sa khan+ti khun

Ni phaT gA tA/ oM a mr-i ta pra tI dza ka sa ka ru pu dzA khA hi/ rak+ta bi ba ta ka se ru pU dza khA hi/ d+hu pe puSh+pe a lo ke gan+d+he ni bi te/ ka sa ka ru pU dza khA hi/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ Ad+ya nud pan na twad ta oM
AHhUM/ 'di ni rin chen sngags kyi mchog /ma lus dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i dpal/ /gzungs ma khyod la nyer bshad pas/ /'di ni mi 'di'i dam tshig yin/ /bcom ldan 'das
phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi 'khor ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag
med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /nga yi 'khor ni bsam mi khyab/ /'di tsam grangs ni sangs rgyas kyis/ /bskal par bgrangs kyang shes mi
'gyur/ /de bas nam mkha'i tshad dang mtshungs/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /sku yi 'khor ni khro bo bcu/ /rigs lnga'i ngo bo sku gsung thugs/ /mi 'gyur gdug
@#/ /pa 'dul ba yin/ /thugs kyi 'khor ni rigs brgya ste/ /mdor bsdus sprul pa'i khro bo bzhi/ /gsung gi 'khor ni dpag med kyang / /rigs drug
'dul ba'i khyung chen yin/ /sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /gdul bya'i 'khor ni klu chen brgyad/ /gsung gis de rigs 'dul ba yin/ /gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i tshogs//
lnga brgya rigs bsdus sku yis 'dul/ /thugs kyis lha srin gdug pa 'dul/ /byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul/ /'di la 'dis 'dul sprul pa'i tshogs/ /smon lam
dbang gis byung ba ste/ /bsam gyis mi khyab des 'dul ba/ /rigs la brjod par ga la nus/ /mdor bsdus mdzes ma khyod la bstan/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang
ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las 'khor nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi las sgrub pa'i rim pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu
'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul 'dod pa'i/ /rdo rje khyung chen stobs chen 'dul/ /nga yi
gsung gi sprul pa ste/ /mche ba rno dpal drag po gtsigs/ /baM las rgya mtsho'i ri rab steng / /yi ge hUM las byung ba yi/ /dpa' bo klu 'dul bsgom par bya/ /sku mchog nag po zhal
dgu ldan/ /rtsa zhal mthing nag g.yas pa dkar/ /g.yon pa dmar po de steng du/ /dbus dmar g.yas pa ljang ba ste/ /g.yon pa btso ma gser dang 'dra/ /de steng dbus dkar
g.yas pa gnag /g.yon pa bai DUR+ya ltar sngo/ /thams cad spyan gsum rdo rje'i mchu/ /spyi gtsug rin chen rdo rje'i rwa/ /phyag ni bco brgyad g.yas pa na/ /rdo rje ral gri dgra sta zhags/ /
mdung dang lcags kyu mda' dang ni/ /rtse gsum las kyi bya khyung bsnams/ /rim bzhin chu bdag mtha' yas dang / /nor rgyas stobs rgyu dung skyong dang / /pad+ma bde chen rigs ldan dang / /
'jog po klu dgu ro stod lha/ /thal sbyor gtsol rin chen stobs/ /mjug ma phyag la dkris mdzad de/ /kun kyang rang rang kha dog 'dzin/ /sbrul mgo bdun pa sprin bzhin gtibs/ /
g.yon pa dril bu be con dang / /'khor lo rgya gram thod dbyug che/ /sbrul gyi rgyal mtshan gzhu dang ni/ /gtum chung phur dang khyud phur ro/ /rim bzhin rlung 'byin dga' ma dang / /mdzes
ldan dpa' mo 'od byed ma/ /grub ma brtan ma dge ma dang / /gsal byed rim bzhin yab dang 'dra/ /thal sbyar gtso la pad+ma 'bul/ /gdengs ka gsum gyis 'dud byed ma/ /g.yon du
@#/ /rim bzhin bsam par bya/ /zhabs bzhi chu srin ru sbal dang / /phag dang lto 'phye'i steng na bzhugs/ /gshog pa rigs bzhi'i rdo rje ste/ /mjug ma ral gri
rigs bzhir ldan/ /sder chen pags la me 'bar bas/ /rab tu gtum zhing sa bdag dang / /klu rigs ma lus brlag mdzad pa/ /'og min gnas su slebs par bsam/ /de
rjes gnas gsum yi ges brgyan/ /oM AHhUM dkar dmar zhing gnag /sprul pa go cha'i sngags bsam pa/ /oM hUM trAM hrI A/ sbyi bo mgrin pa snying ga dang / /lte ba gsang gnas
bsam par bya/ /e baM ma yA dpung pa dang / /dpyi yi steng du bsam par bya/ /hUM swa hI a brang dang ni/ /sog dprag stong mo lte lkog bsam/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsgo bzhir bsam/ /staM dza ya a sprul
pa dang / /yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab bsam/ /de nas gsang ba'i sngags bstan pa/ /las kyi khyung chen drag po'i sngags/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu bsdus pa/ /oM badzra khyung ka ra khyung

ka ra badzra ga ru Ta tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ sku yi gsang ba'i sngags su bstan/ /oM badzra ga ru Ta hUM srog tshig nan rbad/ lus dul nA ga mA ra ya phaT/ raM raM dz+wa la dz+wa la zhi zhi rdul bun rbad

phaT/ gsung gi rig pa dam pa'o/ /oM badzra tsaN+Ta ga ru Ta hUM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ badzra ba ti ga ru Ta be ge hUM dza dza ri dza pri dza hUM phaT/ thugs gsang rdo rje gtum po'i sngags
drag byed thams cad brlag par byed/ /klu rnams snying khrag 'thig pa yin/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig 'di/ /rin chen bzhin du rnyed dka' bas/ /'di la rtag tu 'bad par bya/ /mthun
pa'i rdzas kyi gtor ma sbyin/ /de yi nang du gnod pa dgug /oM badzra shrI ma mA nA ga sa bi ta cho ga khug maM laM b+haM swAhA/ 'dis ni bkug la lha la 'bul/ /gal te gsad par 'dod pas na/ /sku
gsung thugs kyi rig pa la/ /phur bu gnyis pa'i drag sngags dang / /gsad pa spyi yi sham bur gdags/ /gzugs brnyan phur bus btab par bya/ /tshangs pa yin par nges par

brlag /oM badzra tsaN+Ta ma hA ro kha Na badzra kI lA ya sarba big+h+nan mung+ga ra kI lA ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsaN+Da ga ru Ta kI lI kI lA ya sarba big+h+nan mung+gA ra kI lA ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/
gtum chung phur bus btab pa'i sngags/ /de rjes gzugs brnyan ma lus pa/ /drag po'i thab tu bsreg par bya/ /tsher ma can gyi me spar la/ /khyung chen gtum po'i nga rgyal
gyis/ /nA ga b+hu mi ba ti sarba kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra dz+wa la a na lA rka hUM/ ci rigs sngags kyis bsreg pa dang / /thal ba dkar gsum sbyar bya ste/ /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu la
dor/ /de ltar las kyi sbyor ba de/ /lan bdun byas par gyur na ni/ /klu chen dug gis snying la zin/ /nges par sos par 'gyur ba yin/ /gal te mi gtong klu chen gyi/ /
@#/ /lus dang khang bar bcas pa la/ /me dang rdo rje'i char ba yis/ /skad cig nyid la 'tshig par 'gyur/ /de bas dam tshig mi 'da' ngar/ /
las 'di myur bar mi bya'o/ /las kyi gtum po khyung sgrub pa/ /mdzes ma khyod la bstan pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud
kyi rgyal po las/ /las sgrub pa'i lha rdo rje gtum po khyung gi bsgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi sku'i sprul pa/ /pho nya gnod sbyin nag po'i sgrub pa ji lta bu lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa
legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /nga yi gnod sbyin nag po 'di/ /bya ba'i las kun
thogs pa med/ /khyad par drag po'i 'phrin las 'grub/ /dur khrod brag rdzong nag phug tu/ /nag po'i sa la dkyil 'khor bya/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad sgo dang bcas/ /mthing
nag gru gsum me 'od ldan/ /suM las ri rab steng du hUM/ /'od zer 'phro 'dus rdo rjer bsam/ /de las gnod sbyin nag po ni/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhags gsum

ldan/ /g.yas pa 'jigs pa stag gi zhal/ /g.yon pa stobs chen seng+ge ste/ /phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje 'dzin/ /gnyis pa rtse gsum gsum pa phur/ /g.yon pa dril chen lcags kyu dang / /thod pa khrag gis bkang
ba yin/ /g.yas pa gtum pas bdud mo brdzis/ /g.yon pas bdud pho nyi gdong gnan/ /phur zhabs dmar po me 'bar bas/ /gnod byed bgegs kyi mgo la btab/ /thod
phreng mi yi pags pa gyon/ /dur khrod rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /dbu skra dmar po thur du 'phyang / /spyan gsum mche ba rab tu gtsigs/ /ha har dgod cing gdug pa 'dul/ /
sprul pa'i gnod sbyin stong dang bcas/ /rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bzhin sgrub/ /de yis rig pa phul ba ni/ /oM badzra yak+Sha kA la tsaN+Ta nI lAM bar d+ha ra sha rI ra hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i gsang
sngags 'bum du bzlas/ /grub par gyur nas gang dmigs la/ /rjes su tsha ba'i 'bru dang ni/ /tshwa las ling gar 'khor lo gzhug /dmigs pa bstims la 'grub gnas gzhug /
de steng yungs kar zir dang / /dug gi rigs kyis bra ba bar bya/ /gsang ba drag po'i sngags 'di bzlas/ /oM badzra yak+Sha kA la tsaN+Ta nI lAM bar d+ha ra sarba sha trUM bi d+hA rA ya phaT/ ha

ra ha ra phaT/ pra ha ra pra ha ra phaT/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da phaT/ b+hin+da b+hin+da phaT/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya phaT/ sarba sha trUM kA ya wA ka tsit+ta bi nA sha ka ra ya phaT/ ji srid ma shi'i bar du
@#/ /brab/ /grub nas rigs med thod par gzhug /tse te chen po'i 'og tu sba/ /steng du ri rab rdo rje yas/ /mnan par byas pas nges par brlag/
yang na gnod sbyin chen po de/ /dur khrod ras la bris byas pa/ /de yi snying gar sngags 'di bri/ /e yi nang du chud par ni/ /oM badzra yak+Sha kA la tsaN+Ta sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sid+d+hi
hUM/ phyags yak+Sha pa ta laM/ /zhabs la kaM maM b+ha ra bri/ /de nyid gtor ma chen po la/ /bcug ste sngon po'i dar gyis dgab/ /de steng ras sam shing lo la/ /gnod sbyin srog gi 'khor
lo ni/ /lte ba rtsibs bcu mu khyud bcas/ /yang rtsibs bcu dang mu khyud ldan/ /me 'od ldan pa bri byas te/ /sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bkod nas kyang / /las kyi ming dang spel ba
bri/ /'di ni gnod sbyin srog yin te/ /mi 'da' bka' yi dam tshig yin/ /las rnams gang bcol sku yis byed/ /yang na rgyal rigs thod pa la/ /gnod sbyin bris la tsha ba'i mar/ /
chang dang bsres la byug bya ste/ /nyin re gang 'dod las dang sbyar/ /me tog kha dog mthun pas brab/ /bsgo ba'i 'phrin las 'grub par 'gyur/ /chu dar sngon po'i gzhi ma la/ /gser
gyis 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /lte ba rtsibs brgyad mu khyud ldan/ /phyi ma re'u mig bcu drug par/ /sa bon sngags dang sbel byas te/ /kun gyi mtha' ru 'phrin las sngags/ /bris pa mgul
du btags pa yis/ /mi mthun phyogs rnams bsrung 'gyur te/ /bung ba me la bya ba bzhin/ /khyi sha btags pa'i ril bu'i nang / /dgra yi gzugs bris sngags dang spel/ /nyi nub bya rog la byin te/ /
sngags bzlas phyir zhing lan grangs ni/ /brgya 'am stong du byas gyur na/ /gang yin gnas nas bskrad par 'gyur/ /khyi 'brel spu la srad bu byas/ /mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ /sngags
re zhing yang gnod sbyin re/ /'bras kyi nang du bskyur ba na/ /phub ma 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin khyim du bcangs pa na/ /mi phyugs la sogs 'khrig pa na/ /khyi dang 'dra bar 'brel
bar 'gyur/ /khyi nag snying du gnod sbyin gyi/ /snying dang sku dang sngags bcug nas/ /bcangs pa tsam gyis gnod sbyin nyid/ /lus dang grib ma 'dra bar 'gyur/ /skad cig tsam
yang sgrub pa'o/ /de yis gtong bar mi byed do/ /de la sogs pa'i las kyi rim/ /mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud
kyi rgyal po las gnod sbyin nag po sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi rnal
'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu
@#/ /'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rdzogs pa che/ /lha yi bya ba sngon song
ste/ /bskyed la dmigs pa thob nas ni/ /snying gar ye shes sems dpa' bsam/ /de yi rang bzhin snying nang du/ /pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i thig les brgyan/ /nyi zla'i bar du
rgya sran tshad/ /de yi nang du gnas pa'i srog /a shad mar me'i rtse ltar sgom/ /de la dmigs pa brtan pa dang / /ci yang bsam par mi bya ste/ /bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams
na/ /de las ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /gsal zhing mi rtog rig pa'i sku/ /ye shes zhes ni de la bya/ /rten med rnam dag gsal ba yin/ /rtog pa rten can bsgom 'dod
pas/ /sku yi gnas su 'khor lo ni/ /dkar po rtsa 'dab sum cu gnyis/ /mtshan gyi thabs kyis chas brgyan pa/ /gsung gi gnas su rtsa 'dab ni/ /bcu drug dmar po
shes rab ste/ /de la thabs kyis nges par brgyan/ /thugs kyis gnas su dus sbyor brgyad/ /gtso bo'i yi ge brgyad gnas pa/ /phrin las bya ba'i gnas dag tu/ /dbyug
gu'i grangs kyi rtsa gnas pa/ /shes rab gnyis 'gyur kha dog dmar/ /de dbus gnyis med g.yas dang g.yon/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam par dbye/ /rtog pa sad pa'i
'khor lo ni/ /thabs la drug dang shes rab drug /tham bde ba 'dzin pa'i sa/ /mi rtog dpa' bo gnas pa yin/ /yig 'di yis rgyan mdzad de/ /bde 'dzin 'khor lor yi ge med/ /brjod
pa thams cad spangs pa ste/ /'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin mchog /khu ba khrag dang chu ser gnas/ /'di ni lam gsum 'joms byed pa'o/ /skad cig rlung gi rta yis ni/ /thabs dang
shes rab gnyis bskul nas/ /gnyis med ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /ye shes kyis ni rtog pa bsreg /thal ba'ang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'i/ /rtag lnga rim par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
de nas dpal gyi yon tan te/ /yang nas yang du goms par bya/ /sde pa bzhi yi longs spyod ni/ /gnas su yang dag skye bar 'gyur/ /gnyis med bde ba'i gnas thob nas//
skye 'chi la sogs rgyun chad de/ /'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i gnas/ /thob par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/ /'di ltar rnam par dag pa ni/ /nyin mtshan cha yi dbye ba yis/ /
dbyug gu chu tshod dus sbyor sogs/ /brtsibs rnal 'byor ngal ba'i rgyu/ /thams cad gcig tu bsdoms gyur na/ /mi rtog mnyam nyid nam mkhar dag /'bad med ye shes
lhun gyis grub/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas ye shes che/ /khams gsum thams cad sgrol mdzad ma/ /shes rab yum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi gnas spros bral 'dus ma byas/ /legs
@#/ /rtogs bla ma mchog la 'dud/ /brjod par dka' ba'i rnal 'byor 'di/ /mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin/ /dpa' bo brtan par ma gyur na/ /yi ge hUM
gi sbyor ba yis/ /'jig rten khams kun 'jig par 'gyur/ /me yis bud shing sreg mdzad de/ /shing med me yang ji ltar gnas/ /brtan g.yo nyams par gyur pa na/ /mi
shigs yi ge rnam par dag /'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste/ /gsang ba bla na med pa 'di/ /bdag med rtogs pa khyod la bshad/ /gzhan du gang gA'i bye ma dang / /mnyam pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / /brjod par nus pa ga la yod/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las bsam gyis mi khyab pa rdzogs
pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi rigs dag la dbang bskur ba ji lta bu lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs
par nyon/ /dang por slob dpon mtshan nyid kyang / /mdzes shing dul la byams sems ldan/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi de nyid mkhas/ /snyan par smra zhing gtong la dga'/ /brtan zhing
bden smra byams sems ldan/ /bsam pa shes shing gsong por smra/ /dam tshig ldan zhing sngags tshul mkhas/ /phyag rgya dkyil 'khor brda rnams mkhas/ /de nyid bcu shes snying
rjer ldan/ /'jig rten pa yi rnam spangs pa/ /mkhas pas de nyid shes nas kyang / /de ni sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /byang chub sems dang dgra bcom dang / /nyan thos rang rgyal gong
na med/ /de lta'i bla ma srog ltar bsten/ /gal te slob dpon smod pa la/ /dngos grub rmi lam du yang med/ /de bas bla ma mnyes byas la/ /bla gos phrag pa la g.yogs te/ /pus
btsugs thal sbyar me tog sogs/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar gsol bar bya/ /grong dang tshong dus dur khrod dang / /tshal dang lha khang grong khyer te/ /byang shar dngos grub gzhan gnyis spangs/ /ro hi ta
sogs zla ba yi/ /lto 'phye'i lto bar shes pa yin/ /gzhan du nyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pas nyes pa med par bya/ /sa bslang ba dang brtag pa ni/ /rim bzhin gtsug lag khang pa dang / /
tshal dang rdo leb khang bzangs te/ /kun la brtag pa spang bar bya/ /slob dpon smin pas slob ma rnams/ /phung por lnga po dag par bya/ /sa yi nyes pa kun bsal nas/ /laM las byung ba'i lha mo
ni/ /rgyan ldan bum pa phyag na bsnams/ /de la mchod cing gsol bar bya/ /oM tshur spyon tshur spyon sa yi ni/ /lha mo chen mo 'jig rten yum/ /rin chen kun gyis rab gang ma/ /bzang po'i rgyan gyis
@#/ /rnam brgyan ma/ /do shal rkang gdub sgra ldan ma/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod bar/ /mchod yon 'di ni bzhes nas kyang / /dkyil 'khor las ni legs sgrub
mdzad/ /oM hi hi hi hi hUM swAhA/ gnang bas sa la slar thim bsam/ /slar sbyangs bsang zhing gtso bo la/ /dri yi gdan chen gru bzhi ste/ /'khor lo sum cha dor bas zlum/ /me tog sngon po'i
gdan la bsam/ /rin po che 'am sa yang rung / /bum pa nag po'i skyon spangs te/ /byA g+h+rI seng g+h+ri dbyug pa yi/ /ut+pal gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /ha sa de bas nad rnams sbyong / /dngul
dang mu tig mu men dang / /byi ru gser gyis ye shes 'phel/ /nas gro til dang sran ma dang / /mud ka yis ni lam lnga dag /ga bur gur gum dzA ti dang / /tsan dan a ga ru yis ni//
gzhan don phrin las lnga 'grub bo/ /chu dang snying po lnga yis ni/ /rnal 'byor phun sum tshogs gyur pas/ /mgrin pa gos kyis dkris pa dang / /'bras ldan shing gis kha yang
brgyan/ /ku sha la 'dug mtshan ma can/ /rang rang phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /bdug spos thogs la gsol ba 'debs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal/ /bdag la dgongs
nas gzigs su gsol/ /slob ma rnams kyi don phyir dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'tshal/ /rin po che yi
mthu bzhin du/ /bka' drin rjes su gnang ba yis/ /sang ni byon par mdzad du gsol/ /lan gsum bar du gsol bar bya/ /slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas/ /
sdom gzung gsol zhing srung ba dang / /slob dpon rdo rje can dmigs la/ /gang yang gsang sngags lha kun dang / /'jig rten skyong ba ma lus pa/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs
dang / /sangs rgyas bstan dga'i 'byung po dang / /gang dag rdo rje'i spyan ldan rnams/ /rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor mchog /deng bdag 'dri bar 'gyur ba la/ /bdag dang skal ldan
slob ma la/ /byin gyis rlabs phyir bsrung bar mdzod/ /srad bu ye shes lnga yi dngos/ /re re'ang rigs lnga rnam dag ste/ /chos kun ngo bo nyid med pas/ /phan tshun sngags
bzlas bsgril bar bya/ /dkyus su 'khor lo'i nyis 'gyur la/ /sboms su sgo yi bcu gnyis tshad/ /hUM brjod bdud rtsi lnga byugs la/ /dz+dza dz+dza sgra brjod lte bar gzung / /slar yang
de bzhin ye shes kyi/ /thig chen nam mkha' gdab par bya/ /de bzhin cha ldan gnyis pa yis/ /gtsang zhing rdo rje 'dzin bsams te/ /tshangs pa'i thig chen gdab par bya/ /gnyis
pa zur thig la sogs par/ /nub dang lhor ni slob dpon la/ /byang shar slob ma'i gnas sa ste/ /g.yas kyis bskor ba ma gtogs par/ /g.yon du nam yang ma yin no/ /de ltar
@#/ /cha yis rnam par dbye/ /thig skud chad na bla ma 'chi/ /dman dang lhag pas nad du 'gyur/ /phyogs 'khrul na ni slob ma rmongs/ /de bas mkhas
pas skyon med bya/ /rin chen lnga 'am 'bru yi phye/ /yang na 'byung khungs las 'byung ba/ /yi ge bcu yis byin rlabs te/ /rigs lnga rnam par dag pa las/ /dkar ser dmar
ljang nag po dang / /dbang ldan phyogs nas bri bar bya/ /gal te tshon rtsi mi mnyam zhing / /yo dang dma' bar gyur na ni/ /dngos grub med cing rtsod la gdung / /sbom pas nad 'byung
phra bas ni/ /nor nyams gal te chad pas ni/ /'chi 'gyur g.yas skor ma bris na/ /phur bus btab pa yin zhes bya/ /shar phyogs dkar la lho nub byang / /ser dmar ljang khur bri
bar bya/ /dbus ni baiDU R+ya lta bu/ /pad+ma phyogs kyi rnam pa ste/ /mtshams ni mdzes mtshon bum pas brgyan/ /sgo la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams dang / /dur khrod ra ba'i nang du bri/ /gtum
drag la sogs phyogs mtshams dgod/ /dbus mtho shar dang byang gzhol zhing / /mtho zhing ma 'dres drang bar bri/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin dmigs la/ /gus pas me tog dang bcas nas/ /gsol
ba 'di ltar gdab par bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa che/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /byang chub
sems mchog bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par mdzod/ /ces pa

lan gsum bar du bya/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /tshul chen snod ni khyod yin te/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga mchog /khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /rdo rje mi phyed mthu yis ni/ /mnyam med pa
yi ye shes 'thob/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob 'dod pas/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /bla ma sangs rgyas kun mchod cing / /rtsa ba yan lag nyes pa stong / /ma grol 'khor ba'i sems can la/ /snying

rje chen po rab bskyed nas/ /bsgral zhing grol ba'i lam la 'god/ /bde bar dbugs ni dbyung bar bya/ /de dag rim dang rim min pa/ /slob ma'i rim pa rnam par brtag /khrus bya so shing sbyin par bya/ /phrin
las phyogs dang dngos grub kyi/ /rim par rnam par brtag par bya/ /srung skud gdags dang ku sha sbyin/ /rmi lam brtags la ngan pa na/ /zhi ba'i me yis bzlog par bya/ /gdong g.yogs bcings la
ye shes dbab/ /dkyil 'khor dam par gzhug pa'i phyir/ /sngon bsags sdig pa ma lus las/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis 'byang / /bu khyod su yin ci dga' ba/ /bdag ni skal bzang
regs yin pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la dga'/ /mig dbye dkyil 'khor lha yang bstan/ /dam tshig chu sbyin mna' yang bsgrag /me tog dor la lha ngo bstan/ /gang dang gang du bab gyur pa'i/ /
@#/ /rigs kyis de la spro bar bya/ /chu dang cod pan rdo rje de/ /dril bu ming gi sad dbang bskur te/ /rigs lnga'i bdag nyid ye shes lnga/ /brtul zhugs lung bstan
rjes gnang sbyin/ /dbugs dbyung rdo rje slob dpon bsgrub/ /gsang ba shes rab ye shes dang / /bzhi pa brjod med dbang bskur ba/ /gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ /mchog tu rab
zhugs mthong bas na/ /deng khyod sdig pa ma lus las/ /rnam grol rigs su skyes pas na/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam gsungs pa'i/ /rjes su gnang bas dbugs phyin
'gyur/ /dngos grub rgyu yi dam tshig ni/ /bu yis rtag tu bsrung bar gyis/ /slob mas bla ma la btud nas/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar bdag gis bsgrub par bgyi/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa ltar/ /rgyan dang na bza' rin chen dang / /rgyal srid bu dang chung ma dang / /rang gi lus kyang bla ma la/ /bsnyen bkur tshim pa med par bya/ /deng du bdag tshe 'bras
bu yod/ /bdag ni gson pa 'bras bu che/ /de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /sangs rgyas sras su bdag gyur pas/ /sems can don ni mnyam med bya/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dngos grub
grogs/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo dge 'dun mchog /nad pa'am mgon med phongs pa kun/ /kha zas kyis ni tshim par bya/ /zhing skyong gtor mas mnyes byas la/ /rang 'dod 'bras bu gsol
pa gdab/ /rjes su dam tshig spyod pa dang / /skyed pa la sogs rgyun mi chad/ /rnal 'byor bas ni bsam par bya/ /'di ni rigs mchog dbang bskur bla na med/ /mdzes ma khyod la skal ldan
bsgrub phyir bstan/ /gzhan du rigs med dug la de yis slar zhing gnod/ /de phyir 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje'i bkod pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das byag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan
pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las slob ma dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi 'khor
klu sgrub pa'i thabs ji lta bu lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi
mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /gdul bya'i rigs su skyes pa yi/ /gdug pa'i klu chen rnam pa brgyad/ /rigs bsdus chu bdag ba ru Ni/ /dam tshig la gnas
sog ma med/ /'di dag sgrub par 'dod pas ni/ /mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam lnga 'byung / /pad+ma lha snam sgo dang bcas/ /sgo rgyan ltos 'gros rab tu mdzes/ /lte bar rdo rje 'dzin pa
bsam/ /mdun du las kyi bka' nyan bskyed/ /pad+ma brgyad la klu chen brgyad/ /gdengs ka bdun ldan thal sbyar bsam/ /lha rnams rigs bzhi'i sa bdag ste/ /sgo dang gru chad rigs
@#/ /kyi rim/ /mchod rdzas klu yi rtsi sman bsam/ /de rjes rdo rje 'dzin bsams la/ /klu chen gnas nas spyan drangs te/ /e h+ye hi nA ga rA dza sa pa ri wA ra sa ma
ya dzaHdzaH/ rang rang stan la bzhugs par bya/ /pad+ma'i lte bar chu bdag dang / /dam tshig sog med dkar dang ser/ /thal sbyar sbrul gyis zhabs su 'khyil/ /gtso bo rdo rje 'chang la
'dud/ /shar phyogs mtha' yas sngon po ste/ /lho phyogs nor rgyas ser po che/ /nub phyogs 'jog po kha dog dmar/ /byang phyogs stobs rgyu nag po ste/ /shar lhor pad+ma dung dang 'dra//
lho nub bde chen ser ba ste/ /nub byang dung skyong btsod dang 'dra/ /byang shar rigs ldan dUr ba'i mdog /mjug ma 'khyil bas gtsol 'dud/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni rigs bzhi
dang / /sa bdag sna tshogs gzugs kyis bskor/ /de dag sngags kyi rim pa ni/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na badzra pA Ni hri da yaM/ nA ga ya sa mA ti krA ma tha ud sA da naM b+ha bi Sh+ya ti swAhA/

rdo rje 'chang gis klu dam tshig la bzhag pa'o/ /oM ba ru tA ya hUM phuHswAhA/ oM s+phu Ta s+phu Ta ma hA nA ga rA dza kro d+ha hUM/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi s+pho Ta ya hUM phuHswAhA/ oM a nan ta hUM phuHswAhA/ oM bA /

su ki hUM phuHswAhA/ oM tak+Sha ka hUM phuHswAhA/ oM kar ko Ta hUM phuHswAhA/ oM pad+ma hUM phuHswAhA/ oM mahA pad+ma hUM phuHswAhA/ oM shaM kha pA la hUM phuHswAhA/ oM ku li ka hUM phuHswAhA/ 'di dag
klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi sngags so/ /rim pas mchod cing gso ba bya/ /mdzes pa'i rgya mtsho gtor ma yis/ /klu rnams tshim pas gdug sems zhi/ /de rjes bstod pa brjod par bya/ /hUM chu bdag
chen po sbrul pa'i dam tshig can/ /mtha' yas nor rgyas la sogs klu dbang rnams/ /rgya mtsho chu gter zab pa'i mjing chen gnas/ /rin chen sna tshogs yid 'ong spras pa yi/ /gzhal yas
'byor pa phun sum gnas na bzhugs/ /sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka rab 'bar rin chen gsal/ /yid 'ong nor bu 'dod pa kun sgrub pa/ /rang gzhan phun tshogs don rnams ster ba'i dpal//
'od 'bar sa 'og mun pa ma lus sel/ /du ma'i bskal par yon tan sbyangs pa yis/ /klu rgyal 'byor pa mchog la mnga' brnyes pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rdzu 'phrul mchog brnyes pa'i//
yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab khyod la bstod/ /sangs rgyas bka' thob dad pa'i stobs 'phel ba/ /sangs rgyas sar gnas sgrub la nan tan byed/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel bas gzhan
don mdzad/ /bdag gzhan don sgrub khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs spyan sngar khas blangs dam bcas te/ /bstan pa bsrung zhing 'gro rnams bskyang ba'i phyir/ /khas blangs
mna' 'bul dam tshig dran gyis la/ /phrin las don gyis bdag gzhan don grub mdzod/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten pa rnams la/ /oM mtha' yas dang ni 'jog po dang / /stobs
@#/ /kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan dang / /nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang / /pad+ma dang ni chu lha dang / /rgya mtsho rgya mtsho chen po dang / /dpal gyi 'od dang 'od po che/ /
gzugs che lto 'phye sbrul chen po/ /klu chen 'khro dang bcas pa la/ /mthun pa'i dam rdzas yid 'ong ba/ /dkar gsum mngar gsum gso ba'i sman/ /rin chen dar dang za 'og dang / /dpag
bsam shing dang 'dod 'jo'i ba/ /sna tshogs khyed la phul ba yis/ /klu yi nad rnams med par mdzod/ /phyis kyang mi phyed dam chos la/ /so so'i gnas su 'gro bar gyis/ /'di ni
rdo rje 'chang gi bka'/ /'di las 'das na klu rgyal rnams/ /snying 'tshig mgo bo 'gas 'gyur te/ /lus la bskal pa'i me 'bar nas/ /sdug bsngal gyur na ma legs pas/ /

dam las 'da' bar ma byed cig /nA ga rA dza sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na badzra pA Ni hUM phaT/ klu rnams dam tshig sgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin byas na klu nad rnams/ /skad cig nyid
la byang 'gyur te/ /sgrub po bde bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de bas 'di la brtson par gyis/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa bzhin/ /gtan la phab pas rab tu bshad/ /bcom ldan 'das
phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las klu sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis 'khor klu gdug pa can rnams kyis nad 'byung ba'i rtags ji lta bu lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med
bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /klu la rigs drug la sogs pa/ /sna tshogs rigs su yod gyur kyang / /'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin te//
nor rgyas dung skyong rgyal rigs yin te mthong ba'i dug /ser pos la dbang ste lci 'thibs lus po sbo/ /sha babs rab bzhi la khyad par na pa yin/ /bco lnga nyin gung rgyu ba'i dus la na/ /nad
kyi gnas ni spyi bor nges par 'bab/ /rlung rtsa babs la sha rus bar du na/ /skra 'byi glang thabs byas nas na ste rna ba dang / /glo bur 'brel bas sha ro glo lu 'byung ba yin/ /dga' bo rigs ldan
bram ze yin te bsams pa'i dug /dmar po me la dbang ba yin te tsha zhing gdung / /lus dmar skye chung thang la mig rtsa lus po skam/ /'bring po babs sa nyi nub dgongs mo'i dus su na/ /
gnam stong bco lnga rgyu ba'i dus te de la na/ /snying gar babs pa snying mi dga' zhing dran pa nyams/ /mjug tu mgo dang lus la babs te na tsha che/ /sha ro snying la 'ong bas lce yis ro mi tshor//
pa 'jog po rje rigs yin te kha rlangs dug /dkar po chu la dbang bas grang zhing bsil pa dang / /lus mdog dkar ba pags pa'i spris ma 'chags/ /tha chungs babs pa yin te tshes
@#/ /brgyad bco brgyad na/ /snga dro tho rangs mi bde ske dang dpung pa g.yas/ /brang na tha ma mchin par babs pa'i sa yin no/ /pho bas zas mi 'ju zhing mig gis gzugs
mi 'dzin/ /sha brul tshor ba med de cung zad sha lpags dmar/ /pad chen stobs rgyu dmangs rigs yin te reg pa'i dug /nag po rlung la dbang bas yang zhing g.yo/ /lus 'dar
sems rgod sha 'phar phu shus 'debs/ /yan lag tshigs bzhin zhing phol dang bad kan skye/ /sgregs dang ro stod na zhing sna khrag dag kyang 'byung / /'byang zhing lus ngal dgong
dang srod la na/ /tha chung zhag la babs te tshes gsum bcu gsum na/ /'di ni 'gong rigs rtsu bas pas smyo 'bog btsan thabs gsod/ /tha ma mkhal mar 'bab ste rna bas sgra mi
thos/ /khu chu nyams pas chu sri sor mo phra/ /chu lha dam tshig nam mkha' yin pas kun la khyab/ /gong ma ci rigs 'byung zhing dus med shes pa zhum/ /lus kyi shed nyams bral te
sna tshogs ston pa ste/ /'di ni bcos par dka' ste gtan la phebs par bya/ /khyad par mcher pa na zhing gdong la sme ba 'byung / /lus la shig mang ko dri rwa gzhob mnam pa
dang / /thur sel rlung la rul ba'i dri ma dro gyur la/ /'di ni mcher par 'bab ste chu la khrag kyang 'byung / /so so'i rtags su mkhas pas shes par gyis/ /spyir ni lnga po gang zhugs kyang //
rim pas 'di ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /me dang grog po phugs rdugs dang / /ri phug dog pa'i sgo dang dong / /lha khang 'dam rdzab mi sdug gzugs/ /dud 'gro'i tshogs dang mtsho ri gzar/ /

snying mi dga' zhing 'tshig pa ni/ /dang po 'byung bar shes par bya/ /glu len nub mo na dang shes pa lci/ /yan lag mi bde shu ba g.yan pa dang / /bas ldag 'brum chung dmar si ba 'ong / /'khrug cing za 'phrug

sha mdog nyams/ /me ris chu grangs blugs ltar grangs/ /grang sib tsha thig sha bkra che chung byed/ /sha 'phrig bem dang sbrid cing 'khol/ /mig zlum tsha zhing smin ma byi/ /lag sor sen mo nyams pas phra/ /lus

la dri nga chu bur dang / /nya sgangs gnag chu rul dri ma nam/ /stod gzer smad du 'khru bar byed/ /phyi yi sha skams mdog nyams dri ma bral/ /bug pa'i sgo yo bdud rtsi dus med pa/ /yang cig mdor bsdus
bshad pa ni/ /dbang po gsal ba'i 'bras bu ni/ /mchin pa'i sgo yin mig la brtag /rgyal mo 'khor lo g.yang ra yin/ /gnas pa rus pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /mdzes pa so yi mkhar yin pas/ /kha
dog rkang bu nus pa blta/ /nus pa chu ba'i 'bras bu ni/ /zangs mdog sen mo'i tshogs yin pas/ /skye lugs kha dog rtsa ba brtag /mdongs dang sha yi 'bras bu ni/ /khyab pa drag pa yin pas na/ /
chags lugs/ /ngog 'gyur ba blta/ /drod brten khrag gi 'bras bu ni/ /bud med gsang sgo'i chu yin pas/ /kha dog ku ya gzugs la brtag /rkang mar bcud kyi 'bras bu ni/ /rtsab gnas lugs
@#/ /skyes brtag /de rnams thams cad rtags ldan na/ /ngas kyang gso bar ga la nus/ /gsum bzhi lnga la sogs pa yi/ /rim pa rnams dang ldan pa na/ /
sngags dang sman gyis gso bar bya/ /phyi nang 'brel ba'i babs sa yis/ /legs par brtags te gso bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi
rgyal po las klu'i nad zhugs pa brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi klu'i nad gso
ba'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la
bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /byol song klu yis zin pa la/ /'tsho dang mi 'tsho gnyis yin te/ /nges pa'i rtags chen drug tshang na/ /de la mkhas pas ci byar yod/ /rnam smin las las
byung ba yin/ /gzhan rnams gso bar 'dod pa la/ /dka' dang sla ba gnyis yin te/ /dang po sngags kyi rim pa yin/ /gnyis pa rdzas dang 'brel ba yin/ /dang po sngags kyi sbyor ba ni/ /
dbang bskur tshogs bsags rgyud sbyangs la/ /rim pa gsum gyis bsnyen par bya/ /kha cig de tsam gyis kyang zhi/ /gal te nus pa che ba na/ /gsad pa drag po'i sham bu gdags/ /
kha cig de yis 'tsho ba yin/ /gal te gnod tshabs che ba na/ /klu yi rang gshed bzlas pa tsam/ /nam mkha'i klu yis snying nas gzir/ /rig pa gnyis pa gsham du sbrel/ /rdo rje lte
bar 'khor lo bri/ /de la dmigs te bsgrub par bya/ /dug rigs gsal bar gyur na ni/ /su dug ngos zin rdo rje'i nang / /dga' bo rigs ldan mo yi sngags/ /bram ze'i 'khrul 'khor
shig pa yin/ /me la chu yi 'khrul 'khor te/ /de yi sngags kyis gsang bar bya/ /pad chen stobs rgyu rlung yin pas/ /sa yi 'khrul 'khor lte bar bcas/ /pad+ma 'jog po chu yin pas/ /
rlung gi 'khor los gsad par bya/ /rang rang kha dog gshed du sbyar/ /gzhi snying sngags rnams dril bzlas/ /gnyen po mi mthun rdzas dang sbyar/ /gnyen po gang yin lha yi gshed/ /man
ngag bzhin du shes par bya/ /'khrul 'khor tshad nas ma bde na/ /rgyal po'i sdong zla dbye bar bya/ /dus tshod zhag drangs rim pa ni/ /rtags dang sbyar la shes par bya/ /rtags rjes rjes su log pa
na/ /sbyin sreg ci rigs mkhas pas bya/ /phyi rjes drag pos bcad pa dang / /lha dang rdzas kyi sngags kyis bcad/ /mnan pas las mtha' brtul bar bya/ /zhi ba drag po'i rim pa ni/ /mkhas pas
brtags la brten par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las klu'i nad bsal ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //dpa' mo
@#/ /rdo rje bde mas gsol ba/ rdo rje 'chang gi gtor ma bya ba'i rim pa ji lta bu lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa
legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /dkyil 'khor 'dri dang sbyin sreg dang / /bzlas pa thun mtshams
rab gnas dang / /dbang bskur bskrad cing gsad pa dang / /'byung po khyung dang gnod sbyin dang / /klu dang gnas skyong mchod pa ni/ /gtor ma med par gang spyad pa/ /las de
'bras bu med pa'am/ /bar chad nye bar skye 'gyur bas/ /gtor ma'i cho ga bstan par bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byor pa bsag /gtor ma'i 'og tu
rlung lha yi/ /sa bon las skyes kha dog sngo/ /g.yo ba'i rlung yab dang bcas pa/ /de steng rgod ma'i kha bsams te/ /dmar po rlung las skyes pa bsam/ /gru gsum hUM las rdo rje gsum
sku gsung thugs kyis brtan por bya/ /de steng a las pad+ma che/ /yangs la dkar zhing cung zad dmar/ /chos dbyings snod kyi gzhal yas yin/ /de nas sbyangs pa'i sa
bon las/ /bruM aM dzrIM khaM hUM bsams te/ /slar yang sha lnga sbyangs pa las/ /mAM lAM bAM tAM bAM bsams te/ /yum lnga'i ye shes rnam par dag /bdud rtsi ye shes rnam dag 'di/ /sbyang
dang sbar rtogs sbyor ba yis/ /yi ge gsum gyi sgra ldan pa/ /bde ba'i ro cher nyi mar gsal/ /'chang ba'i kha dog 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje las byung dngul chu'i mdog /gnyis med thabs dang
shes rab yin/ /sa bon las byung pad+ma'i gdan/ /yangs par rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / /phyogs skyong la sogs bkug la bstim/ /mdzub mdud gung mo rtse mo sbyor/ /mthe bong rdo rje brtan par gnas//

rang 'dod dngos grub sar bzhag la/ /hUM sgra ldan pas sngags 'dis sbyin/ /oM in+da dza ma dza la/ dzak+kha ma b+hu ta ba h+ni/ ba u rak+Sha/ tsan+da sudz+dza/ ma da pa p+pa/ ta la pa tA li/ aT+Tha sab+pa swAhA/ i daM

ba liM b+huM dzaM g+hA phul+la/ d+hu ba/ mAM sa/ paM ga /am+b+ha/ kadz+dza/ sa p+pa sA ha/ kha Na ti khu Ni phe Ta ga da swA hA/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ A d+yA nud+pan+na twa da oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'khor rnams rtogs par

bya ba'o/ /lhag par khyung chen mchod pa ni/ ha sha b+h+reng gi la du dang / /'o ma sbrul gyi sha yis mchod/ /gnod sbyin dag la sha rlon dang / /chang ni med du mi rung ngo / /ra khrag shing thog rnams
kyis so/ /klu la dkar gsum mngar gsum dang / /rtsi sman dar zab sna tshogs mchod/ /rang gi rig pa phul byas la/ /bstod cing gsol ba gang yin bya/ /hUM khyod kyis sems can don kun
mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /rang gi gnas su gshegs nas kyang / /slar yang spyan drangs tshe na spyon/ /oM badzra sa ma ya muHzhes brjod/ /mchod sbyin 'di dang ma bral na/ /zhi
@#/ /sogs grub pa brgyad gang yin/ /mchog gi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
zhes bya ba las gtor ma'i cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang la zhu ba la gsol ba bdag gi sgrub pa'i cho
ga ji lta bu lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la
bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i ma/ /rdo rje bde chen stong pa nyid/ /khyod kyi sgrub pa bzang po ni/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad/ /da ltar byung
ba'ang de 'chad de/ /ma 'ongs rnams kyang 'chad 'gyur la/ /nga yis kyang ni 'dir bshad de/ /byang chub sems ldan gang zag gis/ /rab dben pa yi sa yi char/ /mchod cing bstan

dga' bsnyen byas la/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod bya/ /rim pas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa ba shu d+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa bsgom/ /

oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ brjod med ye shes dag par bsgom/ /bsrung zhing gzhal yas khang pa der/ /mdzes pa'i pad+ma la gnas pa/ /chos 'byung rnam dag pho brang du//
nyi ma zla ba rnam dag dpal/ /baM las byung ba'i lha mo ni/ /sku mdog dmar ljang zhal gcig ma/ /phyag gnyis gri gug thod pa 'dzin/ /gar stabs rgyan gyis mdzes ma ste/ /thod pa skam po'i phreng bas
brgyan/ /shar du mA ma kI bsams te/ /sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon thod pa/ /g.yas su sangs rgyas spyan ser te/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas pa na/ /rin
chen g.yon pas thod pa 'dzin/ /g.yon du dam tshig sgrol ma ljang / /g.yas pa ut+pal thod pa 'dzin/ /rgyab tu gos dkar dmar ser te/ /pad+ma thod pa bsnams pa'i phyag /kun kyang khro zhing
gar stabs bzhugs/ /rus pa rin chen rgyan dang ldan/ /mchog sgrub nad rnams sbyang ba dang / /bsrung zhing 'dod pa zhi rgyas dang / /rang gi srog 'dzin phrin las dbang / /rtag tu ye shes pa

yang mchod/ /rig pa nges par bstan pa ni/ oM badzra su khA bud+d+ha sarba pa shaM ku ru su ra ka hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shang ka re shAn+tiM ka re/ g+hu T+Ta g+hu T+Ta g+hu T+Ti ni g+hA tA ya/ g+hA tA ya/ g+huT+Ti ni swAhA/ oM ru ru s+phu ru

dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ oM a ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te ka ro TaM bI R+yai swA hA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re ma ma A yu she swAhA/ rang rang las dang 'brel ba ni/ /'bum 'gyur
sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /las gzhan dngos grub ma bsgrubs par/ /lha mo khyod kyis byed pa yin/ /'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste/ /ches gsang bas kyang mchog yin no/ /de bas
@#/ /mdzes ma khyod la bshad/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las yum bsgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu
drug pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi las sna tshogs pa sgrub pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod
kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /sgrub po phun sum tshogs 'dod pas/ /nga nyid thog mar
mnyes bya ste/ /'dod pa'i rdzas la 'khor lo bri/ /de yi nang du chud pa yi/ /longs spyod ming dang spel bris nas/ /dgug la bcug la sngags 'di bzlas/ /oM tsaN+Ta mahA ro Sha Na/ tad+yA tha/ oM
tsa le phra tsa le la lA lu te yA/ de ba kA mahA kA la a na tsa ra ya bi si swA hA/ khri bzlas pas rang ci 'dod pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ gong bu dgug pa'o/ /rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin du bsams la ta
la'i lo ma la ri rab kyi 'khor lo byas te/ zur du hUM dang hrI'i bar du bsgrub bya'i ming bri'o/ /lte bar sngags bri/ /rtsibs la yang sngags bris te/ /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan cing / oM

tsaN+Ta mahA ro Sha Na tsa muN+Ti du ma ke shi hrIHha na ha na hrI/ pa tsa pa tsa hri/ de ba dad ta che ge mo me pa shi ri swA hA/ zhes khri bzlas pas rkang pa dgug pa'o/ /oM tsaN+Ta mahA ro Sha Na ga ga a ri

garka tha ta ri swA hA/ sngags 'di bzlas la kha bkrus la/ /khyu mchog gi lci ba dang / ldong ros bsres la rdo rje'i gzugs byas te/ lte bar 'khrul 'khor bcug la dgra'i sgor spas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /

bklags pas 'grub 'gyur nus pa ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin par rab zhugs nas/ /rdza mkhan lag pa'i 'dag pa la/ /rdo rje'i rnam par 'khrul 'khor bca'/ /oM tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na che ge mo mu kha te thAM ti sa g+ha tshA na

ting g+han da na ting laM g+hA mu tra mu rI She naM che ge mo b+ha n+d+hA ni swAhA/ sngags 'di khri bzlas khang bar mnan/ /nges par shags las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /oM badza tsaN+Ta ma hA ro Sha Na na ma ni kha be rA ya tsi ri tsi ri

karta tu be na mu shi tun+te ban+d+ha si ri kha li swAhA/ rdo rje la ni khrag gi bri/ /gang gis phyogs mtshams spas pa na/ /byi ba kha ni 'ching ba yin/ /oM tsaN+Ta mahA ro Sha Na ni tu na te si ri si ri khi li khi li swAhA/

stag gi spags pa la bris te/ /gang la btags pa'i spyang gi bsrung / /oM tsaN+Ta mahA ro Sha Na maM ra ra k+Sha to/ /nA sha ka rA ya swA hA/ shing thog la bzlas ra bar spas/ /spre'u gnod pa bzlog bar 'gyur

oM tsaN+Ta mahA ro Sha Na sarba staM b+ha ya duM b+he swAhA/ sbrang rtsi bu ram khu ba la/ /'di bzlas byug pas dom 'bros so/ /oM tsaN+Ta mahA ro Sha Na bA rA ha d+hi naM druM druM d+he swAhA/ dug dang lan tshwa ske tshe dang / /yungs
kar la phug sa pon dang / /d+ha du ra dang kal bi dang / /ma he phag dang ce spyad khrag /sbrus la rdo rje brgyad byas la/ /phyogs mtshams spas na gnod pa zhi/ /mtshams bcad pa yi dam pa yin/

@#/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na b+hi d+ha hI ni kaM b+he swAhA/ sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ /bsrung ba 'di yang mtshams gcad yin/ /oM bi ti pi na hI b+h+rIM bi Ta bi Ta bi Ta hUM hUM swAhA/ sngags
'di gang yin lci bal/ /bzlas te ma he 'thung ba'i chu/ /nang bcug zho rnams brlag par 'gyur/ /gser me la ma reg pa/ g.yu mig ma phug pa/ mu tig mu men/ gser gyis bris

pa'i khroM/ ba bla mu zi/ btsan dug gu gul gi wang spre'u'i spus gtums la/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ga ru Da tsa le tsa le bdud ru drA mA ra ya/ badzra b+ha ti ga ru Da be ge hUM ri dza pri dza nA ga rA dza mA ra ya
hUM phaT/ sngags khri bzlas te lus la bcangs na klu thams cad 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /oM pad+ma k+Sha pad+ma k+Sha ba ru ni hUM phaT swA hA/ chu gtsang ma la bzlas te mig bkrus na mig nad thams cad
'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sug smel dang / dzA ti dang / na ga ge sar dang / a sho ta ka'i 'bras bu rnams la sngags 'di bzlas te dpral bar shu tras thig le byas na kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur

ro| |oM badzra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na dzaM b+he mo ha ya hrI swAhA/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /byis pa gsar btsas bsrung ba na/ /kham phor nang du rdo rgyus kyis/ /rdo rje rgya gram lte ba'i nang / /oM

badzra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na che ge mo ya rak+Sha ra k+Sha swA hA/ hUM bcu bris te lha bstims la/ /mchod sbyin gtor ma sbyin byas te/ /de yi steng du sbyang bar bya/ /lus la gur gum chus bris pa'i/ /

'khor lo gnyis pas bsrung bar bya/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na ba sa ha do lA yI swAhA/ me do yA sA ba tsi na mo ha yi swAhA/ e sa ba dzi hA yi na mA ta yi swAhA/ sngags 'di me tog dang / gos dang / zas

dang / rgyan la mngon par sngags te byin na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na na ma sa ra nA ma tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra da mahA d+ha na d+ha d+ha Da du Di de swAhA/ bye ma dang thal chen la bsngags te zhing la

gtor na srog chags kyis za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /oM badzra su kha d+he b+hi shud+d+ha a l+lI pa ba ra tsu li tse ga sa ga gan+d+ha sA ba mi ha ban+d+ha li sa swAhA/ sngags 'di rdo rje'i shing dang / da lis dang / arga
gsum la lan bdun bdun bzlas te/ rna ba'i 'og tu bcug na tshor ba thams cad kyis gnod par bya bar mi nus so/ /mi rus la byas phur bu ni/ /bgegs kyi lus can zhal gcig pa/ /
phyag bzhi tho ba zhags pa dang / /dgra ste rtse gsum bsnams pa ste/ /dug khrag lan tshwa ske tshe dang / /rgya tshwa mar nag nang du gtso/ /stobs chen sngags bris ras mas gtum/ /khyim sgor sbas

na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa bid+hAn+sa ya/ ud sA da ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ sprul mgo gnyis pa'i thod par khyi smyon pa'i lce la dgra'i ling ga bris te rta'i rmig pa'i 'og

tu bcug la sngags 'di bzlas nas gang gi sgor sbas na bskrad pa'am smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na che ge mo mu p+ta ya phaT ces khri bzlaso/ /shing lo dang stag pa la rdo rje'i rnam par
@#/ /byas la lte bar las kyi rig pa bcug /dpa' bo g.yul du shi ba'i skra'i the gus rked par btags la klad la bskor na bgegs 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /
gro ga'i 'dab ma la rdo rje'i nang du chud pa'i lte bar sku gsung thugs kyi sngags dang bsrung bya bri/ /de'i mtha' mar las rab 'byams bri/ /de'i nye bar bstan pa'i 'khor gyi sngags bri/ de'i
mtha' mar shes rab kyi sngags bri/ /de'i mtha' mar me'i tshogs bris te dril la lus la bcangs na gdon thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /byi khung shar bltas sa dang ni/ /'ug chud
rus pa lang kA'i rtswa/ /sgo lcags khung bur blugs byas te/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na kur tri sa nA kar ti tshums dang phu Ta phu Ta swAhA/ sngags de brgya dang brgyad bzlas na/ /smyig
mas yang yang dkrog pa ni/ /sgo lcags 'bye bar the tshom med/ /dur khrod sol bas bsregs pas ni/ /slar yang snga ma dag tu 'gyur/ /rgya gram nang du chud pa yi/ /dmag gi gtso bo
bri bya ste/ /sngags dang spel nas snying ga ru/ /seng ldeng phur ba btab na ni/ /nges par de nyid rengs par gyur/ /byi ba nag po'i rtug pa dang / /sha can ra yi rwa dang ni/ /khyi nag spu dag
bsregs gyur na/ /'bru yi rnam pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de sogs las kyi rim pa ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab ji snyed pa/ /khyod la bstan par mi nus pas/ /sngags grub de yis rtogs
par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las las sna tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo
rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi char dbab pa'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /
bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /chu bdag gnas pa'i sa yi char/ /dkyil 'khor pad+ma brgyad pa la/ /sgo dang rta babs sbrul gyis brgyan/ /me tog
mchod pas mnyes bya ba/ /bram ze'i thod pa gtsang ma gnyis/ /chu bdag dam tshig klu yi gzugs/ /gur gum bzang pos bri bar bya/ /kha sbyar bar du rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa//

baiDUR+ya ltar gnas pa ni/ /chu dar yang na ras la bri/ /rtsa ba khro bo g.yas g.yon rgyab/ /dkar dmar de bzhin ljang khu ste/ /rtsa ba khyung chen zil gyis gnon/ /g.yas kyi phyag na rim pa ltar/ /rdo rje
'khor lo ral gri dang / /lcags kyu rigs ldan pad+ma dang / /bad chen dur skyong yum dang bcas/ /g.yon pa dril bu rtse gsum dang / /phur bu sbrin gyi zhags pa ste/ /mtha' yas nor rgyas 'jog po
dang / /stobs rgyu yum gyis bcings pa ni/ /thams cad gtso la thal sbyar te/ /sbrul mgo sprin chen bzhin du gtibs/ /'dab mar klu chen brgyad bskyed la/ /spyan drangs mchod pa byas nas kyang //
@#/ /char gyi rgyun chen 'bab par bsam/ /klu chen rtsa ba'i sngags rnams la/ /b+ha ri sha ya btags te bzlas/ /nges par char rgyun 'bab par 'gyur/ /gal te 'bab
par ma gyur na/ /gu gul dud pas gzir byas nas/ /phrin las sngags kyis srog kyang g.yo/ /gal te ma bab na rdo rje 'dzin pa phyung la tsha ba'i mar nag gis blugs la sngags bzlas na 'bab
par 'gyur ro/ /yang na kham phor la sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i khrag dang shas sngar ltar byas la skyer ba'i sol ba'i me la sngar ltar bsro bar bya ste/ des nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /yang na
gtum pa'i 'bras bu la/ /sngags kyis btab ste klu yi khyim/ /sbyin sreg byas pas 'bab par 'gyur/ /des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na/ /yungs kar skye tshe sbrang rgod dang / /bu ma'i me tog
phye mar byas/ /ra yi 'o mas ril bu sbyar/ /sngags bzlas mtsho 'am chu mig tu/ /brgya dang brgyad du bskyur na 'bab/ /des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na/ /sta ru'i khu bas ril bu byas/ /mtshor bskyur
nges par 'bab pa yin/ /gal te des kyang ma 'bab na/ /pad+ma ut+pal sngon po dang / /yungs kar zangs phya ba bla dang / /dbang po lag pa rgya skyegs shing / /bu ram ra yi 'o mas bsdus/ /rgya shugs
'bru tsam ril bu la/ /lan bdun bsngags te mtshor bskyur na/ /char rgyun mtshungs pa med par 'bab/ /mi 'bebs klu rnams mgo gas te/ /lus ni bskams te 'tshig par 'gyur/ /nga yi

bka' las gang 'da' ba/ /skad cig nyid la brlag par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las char dbab pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga ji lta bu lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung
ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /thab dang rdzas dang lha dang ni/ /sngags kyi rim pa phan yon rnams/ /rim pas mdzes ma khyod la bstan/ /sbyang ba'i
las ni sngon 'gro bas/ /sor ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / /bcu drug bcu bzhi bcu gnyis dang / /bcu dang brgyad las chung ba spang / /rim bzhin nad rnams zhi zhing nor 'phel dang / /rims rnams zhi

zhing zhi las 'grub/ /dbang du bsdu dang rgyas pa dang / /gsod pa'i thabs su shes par bya/ /thur du rko ba sum gnyis te/ /kha khyer brgyad cha mtho ba'o/ /rim bzhin phyed phyed rdo rjes mtshan/ /dkar ser
dmar nag ljang khu ste/ /las dang 'bral ba shes par bya/ /mchod pa'i rdzas dang yam shing dang / /dUr ba la sogs bsreg pa'i rdzas/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi rim pa yin/ /rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin par
bskyed/ /rgyas la dga' dang zhi la ni/ /dbang la chags pa khro la bsad/ /gzhan rtsub bskrad pa la sogs yin/ /dmar ba me phyogs gdung ba'i las/ /bskrad pa rlung ste gnon pa ni/ /bden
@#/ /bral dbang dang dgug pa yang / /lho yi phyogs su lta ba yin/ /gsad da dang dbye ba'ang de bzhin te/ /shar zhi byang phyogs rgyas pa yin/ /hUM las skyes pa kha dog
dmar/ /mdzes pa'i zhal gdangs cung zad gnag /dbyug gu ril ba spyi blugs dang / /bgrang phreng g.yon dang g.yas su bsam/ /ral pa'i cod pan gsus po che/ /rgyan dang ldan pa
bsams la bstim/ /bsang gtor 'thor 'thung mchod yon dang / /zhabs bsil la sogs dbul bar bya/ /me tog la sogs rim pa ste/ /gzar bu gnyis kyis dgang blugs
dbul/ /oM ag+nA ye swA hA/ de rjes me yi mtshan ma brtag /mdog dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /dbyibs dang kha dog blta bar bya/ /me ni rtse gcig 'bar gyur na/ /bsam pa thams
cad 'grub par ston/ /gnyis 'bar rtse gsum mi g.yon/ /'bar ba'i 'bras bu thams cad 'dzin/ /rtse bzhi mnyam nyid brtan pa ste/ /rgyas pa'i las la 'bras bu yod/ /zla 'dra
snum la dri ma med/ /du ba med cing bai DUr 'dra/ /nad med rigs rnams rgyas par byed/ /chu shel nor bu spung pa dang / /pad+ma rA ga gsal ba ni/ /sdig pa ma lus zad par 'gyur//
dmang ser puN+Da ri ka dang / /ban du kha dog gsal ba na/ /rgyal srid dpal rnams 'byor pa yin/ /ut+pal ma li u shi'i dri/ /tsam pa ka dang sig kar dri/ /ga pur a ga ru yi dris//
dag zhing tshe ring dpal gyi gnas/ /zab pa'i skad dang dung dang ni/ /rdza ka pi wang DA ma ru/ /de yi sgras ni bde ba 'phel/ /dpal be'u bkra shis gzugs su 'char/ /rgyal mtshan rnga yab
phyag mtshan rnams/ /rin chen gdugs kyis dbyibs su 'char/ /dge ba me yi dbyibs su bstan/ /ngan pa de las ci rigs bzlog /de rjes rdzas kyi rim pa ni/ /oM ang ye a mU ka s+ya

shin+taM ku ru ye swAhA/ bsreg blugs so/ /oM bo d+hi br-i k+ShA ya swAhA/ a shwad tha'i 'o/ /oM badzra ta lA ya swAhA/ blag sha'i 'o/ /oM badzra ku be rA ye swAhA/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi'o/ /oM badzra sha ma dzA

lA ya swAhA/ u dum wA ra'i 'o/ /oM sarba bA paM da ha na badzra swAhA/ til gyi'o/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ 'bras so ba'i 'o/ /oM badzra saM ba de swAhA/ zho dang zan gyi'o/ /oM badzra A yu She swAhA/
dUr ba'i 'o/ /oM badzra pra tI ha ta badzrA ya swAhA/ ku sha'i 'o/ /rdzas rnams rang sngags ci rigs dbul/ /bstod cing gsol ba'i las bya ste/ /me yi snying gar dkyil 'khor mchod/ /gsad la
sogs pa rim pa bzhin/ /sngar bstan pa las shes par bya/ /de rjes lhag mas ci rigs mchod/ /zhu ba la sogs rdzas rnams ni/ /lha yi zhal du mchod par bya/ /yam shing ku sha la sogs pa//
'od la mchod par bya ba yin/ /phyag tu zhal zas 'thor 'thung dbul/ /me tog bdug ba dbu dang 'od/ /thig le snying ga bsang gtor yang / /sku la phul te zhabs bsil zhabs/ /mar me la sogs
@#/ /rim bzhin gnas/ /dkyil 'khor bsdu gshegs rim pa rnams/ /mkhas pas nye bar brtags te bya/ /dkyil 'khor lhas ni mchog ster ba/ /me yis 'dod pa'i
don grub byed/ /lag pan gyis ni bde ba 'byin/ /'o ma sbrang rtsis rig pa 'phel/ /gro dang sran mas nad kun sel/ /dUr bas srog ni 'dzin par byed/ /nas kyis brtson 'grus la dbang ste//
stobs 'phel mA shA ka yin no/ /'bru 'phel so ba'i las yin te/ /sdig pa 'dag pa til yin no/ /'bras kyis nus pa 'phel byed pa/ /zhi la yungs kar ku shas bsrung / /dpal bskyed
pa ni bud shing ste/ /yam shing gzi byin ster bar byed/ /'byor ba 'phel ba mar yin no/ /sbyin bdag bkra shis thab yin te/ /dngos grub kun ster mchod pa'i rdzas/ /thabs dang shes rab
gzar bu ste/ /bdud rtsi mar gyis tshim byed pa/ /mchod pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya/ /'di ni mdzes ma'i yul yin gyis/ /gzhan gyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na
rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sbyin sreg gi chog bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol ba/ rdo rje 'chang khyod kyi gsang
ba'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bstod pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma
yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /nga yi ming ni nyi shu gcig /dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsung / /mi 'gyur g.yung drung dbang bskur te/ /'di dag mdzes ma khyod la bstan/ /na mo

nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni tsaN+Da badzra/ na mo g+ha dza kaR+N+No b+ho tsaN+Da badzra na maHsu b+hu Sha ni sa b+h+yo tsaN+Da badzra/ na mo rat+na gu Na ka ra si tsaN+Da badzra/ na mo b+ha ga ban pradz+nyA d+ha sI ra tsaN+Da badzra/ na maHA R+ya g+ho Sha sIn+na tsaN+Da

badzra/ na maHpra sa rA yi to sI tsaN+Da badzra/ na mo badzra la ar tsi shi sI tsaN+Da badzra/ na maHsA ru pa no pha la tsaN+Da badzra/ na mo dur dAn tad ma ka ma ba raHtsaN+Da badzra/ na maHb+he ra ba b+ha sa tA ru pi b+hiHtsaN+Da badzra/

na mo dro mo kro d+ha bi gra ha rU pi b+hiHtsaN+Da badzra/ na maHtsa tu ra smA rA ri Shi sin+na tsaN+Da badzra/ na mo mahA ba la ba rA kra ma tsaN+Da badzra/ na mo nai rAt+ma sid+ha nirna tA tsaN+Da badzra/ na ma na mo a mo g+ha dza ga dar+tha krid

tsaN+Da badzra/ na mo dA sha di ka bi shwa ni ra mA Ni tsaN+Da badzra/ na mo ha hA satwa so ni ra g+ho Sha tsaN+Da badzra/ na mo a tsa lo hi ka dza ta to tsaN+Da badzra/ na maHpany+tsa bud+d+ha ta ma mU ku Ta tsaN+Da badzra/ na mo badzra mahA b+he sha

yud+d+ha rod tsaN+Da badzra/ rdo rje gtum pa'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / 'bri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / glegs bam du byas te 'chang
ba la ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /srung bar 'gyur ro/ /sred bar 'gyur ro/ /skyob par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan 'di rnams 'dzin pa de mtshams med pa lnga
@#/ /byas pa'i sdig pa yang byang bar 'gyur ro/ /lan cig tsam brjod pas kyang bskal ba bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba rnams su mi skye'o/ /ngan

'gro gzhan yang spangs pa yin no/ /tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje 'chang lnga brgya yang rtag tu mtshan 'di 'dzin pa'i phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang ngo / /gdug pa can gyi klu rnams

kyis mi 'tshe zhing slar longs spyod sna tshogs sbyin no/ /'chi ba'i dus su yang bai dUR+ya lta bu'i sku lus bstan te/ rang gi gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan 'di gnas pa'i sa de ni lcang lo can dang
mtshungs pa yin no/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa gdug pa can rnams kyis nam yang gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /grub pa brgya dang sangs rgyas kyang ster bar byed na/ gzhan lta yang ci smos te/ mtshan
'di dag rin po che dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /'di ni dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis/ /ched du brjod pa rin po che/ /gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed/ /dpal dang gzi brjid 'phel ba yin//
phrin las sgo rnams thogs pa med/ /'di ni rdo rje 'chang yin pas/ /nyin mtshan dus gsum klog pa yin/ /phyi bzhin rtag tu srung bar byed/ /nad dang gdon rnams kun las thar/ /sman chen nyes pa
thams cad 'dzoms/ /'byung po kun gyis ba kur ba ste/ /mdzes ma khyod la bstan pa yin/ /'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam/ /su 'chang lag na dpal gnas te/ /rtag tu mtshan 'di brjod par
gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las mtshan nyi shu gcig gis bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/

rdo rje 'chang gi rgyud 'di bshad pa dang / sba ba dang / ji ltar gzung ba'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /
bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /phyi ma'i dus su nga yi rgyud/ /gsang ba sku gsung thugs kyi gter/ /bla med rgyud rgyal rin chen 'di/ /byang chub sems ldan
snying rje che/ /thos mang shes rab mchog tu gsal/ /dad pa che zhing lha la gus/ /bla ma bsten cing dbang bskur thob/ /dam tshig sdom pa ma lus ldan/ /brtson 'grus che la gzhan don dpa'/ /'jig rten
bde la ma chags pas/ /rgyud 'di mnyan dang bshad par bya/ /de las bzlog pa'i gang zag la/ /ming tsam bstan par mi bya'o/ /gal te bstan par gyur pa na/ /sngags pa dam tshig nyams gyur te/ /nad
gdon 'byung po ma lus pas/ /nye bar gtses te 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de nas mnar med sdug bsngal ni/ /grangs med 'das kyang thar mi 'gyur/ /de bas gsang ba sku gsung thugs/ /snying po dam pa 'di
dag la/ /rgya yis btab ste mchod pa dang / /bstod cing sba ba byas gyur na/ /yid la re ba kun rdzogs shing / /'jig rten thams cad bde bar 'gyur/ /glegs bam sor ni bcu drug la/ /rim bdun
@#/ /brgya yis btab nas kyang / /rtag tu spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzung / /'di dang bral bar ma gyur na/ /bsnyen pa de yin bsgrub pa de/ /sgrub pa chen po'ang de yin te/ /sngags kyang de yin
lha yang de/ /bla ma de yin slob dpon yang / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun yang / /de yin bskyed dang rdzogs pa de/ /ma lus dbang yang de yin te/ /'jig rten bya ba kun spangs nas/ /'di la mchod
par gyur pa ni/ /tshogs gzhan ci yod rmongs pa'i rgyu/ /ci phyir 'di la 'bad mi byed/ /ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ yum la rjes su gtad pa'i don bstan pa ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi
yum chen mo/ /rdo rje bde ma bde ster ma/ /rtog pa gcod mdzad yum khyod la/ /rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung / /gzungs ma yid 'ong rgyal ba'i sa/ /rnam dag mchod cing sdug bsngal
'joms/ /ma lus 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal/ /rdo rje bde ma phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bstod nas rgyud gtad do/ /de nas yum gyis rjes bzung ste/ /dus gsum bde gshegs ma lus pa'i/ /
thugs kyi sras po sde dpon che/ /'jig rten thams cad 'dul mdzad pa/ /dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtum po dpa' bo 'jigs par byed/ /klu 'dul gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /drag po 'jigs
par byed pa'i lha/ /rdo rje gtum po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zhes bstod nas phyag dang bskor bas mnyes par byas nas/ /slar yab kyi thugs ka'i rdo rje'i lte bar thim par gyur to/ /de nas 'khor thams
kyis mchod pas mchod cing bstod pas bstod de/ gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po gsungs ba legs so legs so/ /zhes mngon par mgrin gcig tu ched du brjod pa ched du
brjod de/ /rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa la mngon par dga' nas yi rang ste mngon par bstod par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
las| |rgyud ji ltar bstan cing sba ba dang rjes su yi rangs ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la tsaN+Da gu ru chen po dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis byang phyogs sham+b+ha la'i dpe dang bstun te bsgyur ba'o/ /slad kyis
yul dbus kyi dpe dang / kha che nas byung pa dang bstun nas legs par gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra su kha kro d+ha tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ rdo rje
bde khros rgyud kyi rgyal po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ /bcom ldan 'das bdud las rnam par rgyal
ba zhes bya ba 'og min gyi gnas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi pho brang na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe 'dus pa rnams kyis dang po sems dpa' chen po yid cher g.yos te/ /gus pas bkur sti
@#/ /dang / rim gro dang / phu dud dang / bsti stang du byas te/ e ma'o byams mgon thugs rje can/ /'gro ba'i sems can thams cad kun/ /me yis tshig cing mtshon
gyis phog /mun par 'khyams nas ri yis non/ /rlung gis khyer ba snying re rje/ /skyabs kyi dam pa bka' stsal 'tshal/ /zhes zhus pas/ der ni mgon pos sku bstan te/ /zhal gyi pad+ma rab
phye nas/ /spyan gyi gzi ma dngas kun la gzigs/ /ljags kyi dkyil nas bka' stsal pa/ /skyob pa'i dam pa 'di yin gyis/ /rdo rje bde dang khros pa yi/ /dum bu gsum pa ngas bshad kyis/ /legs
par nyon la yid la zungs/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las gtam rgyud kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /bkra shis maN+Dal
legs byas la/ /tshul dang mthun pa'i bum pa dgod/ /de yang chu gtsang sna bdun blugs/ /gzhan yang shing tog 'bras bu dang / /mngar gyi rnam pa dang / dri'i rnam pa dang / rin po che'i
mchog dang / 'bru'i bye brag dang / sman rnams blugs so/ /bum pa de'i mgrin pa dar sngon pos dkris te/ steng du bla re phub la gzhag go /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las sgrub rdzas kyi le'u ste
gnyis pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /sgrub byed rang rgyud dag pa yis/ /bskyed tshul rgyas sam bsdus kyang rung / /hUM las phyag na rdo rje ni/ /dbu gsum mthing

nag phyag bzhi mdzes /sku ni che zhing mtshungs pa med/ /zhabs kyis rgya mtsho'i nang du yang / /chu srin sbal pa'i steng du brdzis/ /g.yas g.yon dang po'i phyag gnyis kyis/ /rdo rje gsor zhing dril chen
rdung / /mtha' gnyis drug pa zhal du 'dren/ /dbu gsum g.yas dkar rigs lngas ba rgyan/ /dbu g.yon dmar po sbrul gyis mdzes/ /zhal dbus mthing nag lcags mchu can/ /steng du mkha' lding
tshangs pa sprul/ /dpa' bo gdug pa dpung pa'i rgyan/ /rin chen lhun po'i ri rab la/ /stegs bcas zhum pa med par bzhugs/ /de ltar lha dang rab sbyar nas/ /de nyid bstan pa'i yan lag gis/ /rang
lus tshags su gzhug par gyis/ /rdo rje bde khros pa'i rgyud las lha bsgom pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /sgo gsum sbyor ba shes pa yis/ /gsang ba'i

snying po 'bum du bzlas/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na/ da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ bco brgyad sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/ /ma byung mi 'byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /'di bzlas sngon du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtag

tu mtshan ma bzang po 'byung / /gzhan gyi sbyor ba 'ong mi 'ong / /rang la nges par ston par 'gyur/ /bsnyen pa'i rim pas thub mi thub/ /'bad pas legs par brtag par bya/ /de nas gtor ma'i sbyin pa ni//

oM AHhUM zhes rgyun du gtang ngo / /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las gsang ba'i snying po dang mtshan ltas bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rten ni rdo rje'i 'od du 'bar
@#/ /brten pa 'phro tshad hUM du 'bar/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer kun tu 'phro/ /'jig rten ma lus sbyangs nas kyang / /slar la thig le nyid la 'dus/ /sgra dang bcas te rang gsal
'bar/ /brtan par gyur na spro bsdu bya/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las me'i bsam gtan gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /mthing gi shog gu sngon po la//
gser gyi 'khor lo bris pa'i steng / /bsrung ba'i snying po legs bkod de/ /gang ming rak+Sha sbyar bar gyis/ /de yang tri yi sa yongs bgos te/ /sangs rgyas sems can nyid la bstim/ /de nyid
bum par legs bzhugs la/ /mchod cing bzlas brjod gsol ba gdab/ /de nas tshes pa'i dus bzang la/ /rang ngam gzhan la btags gyur na/ /bar chad thams cad nyer zhi nas/ /tshe dpal
bsod nams rgyas par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las bsrung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /'gro ba dug gis gdungs pa la/ /gdug pa'i
dbang chen la sogs pa/ /'tshe ba 'di ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi dga' sems 'phyo 'gro snying 'dod/ /nyam chung 'thibs dang ltas kyang ngan/ /yang yang na zhing gtam bsnol 'ong / /de ni klu yi
gnod pa ste/ /tshor nas legs bar bcos na bzlog /sa srin mi la 'di ltar gnod/ /lus sbrid sha 'brig sha ro 'byung / /sha bkra zor bu ngo yang 'gyur/ /de yang tshor nas bcos nas bzlog/
sa bdag gnod na 'di ltar 'gyur/ /gdon yang shin tu ldog 'gyur te/ /na tsha'i zug rdu drag por 'gyur/ /res 'ga' bde ba ltar yang byed/ /skabs su thig le kho nar na/ /de yang bcos dka'
shes pas bzlog /gnyen gyi gnod pa 'di yin te/ /shin tu na tsha'i tshabs kyang che/ /rkang lag na 'khums dri ma ldog /sha khrag lud nas mig kyang sle/ /kha yo sna yo chu ser za/ /kha yang mi thub gnod
pa za/ /chu bur byung na tshang yang che/ /tshor bar mi chog bsgrim pa gces/ /gdon tshogs gzhan yang yun mi rtog /phra mo tsam la sogs pa bzlog /kun la bsgrims te bcos na 'tsho/ /rdo rje bde khros
kyi rgyud las gzhan gyi gnod pa brtag pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /dbang chen la sogs thams cad la/ /mchod dang gtor mas mgu bar bya//
ci 'dod pa yi rdzas rnams sbyin/ /rten yod gnas su legs par spa/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis bsgo byas la/ /bum pa nor bu rin chen gzhug /mjes pa'i dar sna 'bru yi mdzod/ /gang gi rten la
sbas gyur na/ /gnod pa rags pa zhi bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las zhi byed mchod thabs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /btsan
dug gu gul gla rtsi dang / /shu dag shing kun mu zi drug /gsang sngags btab ste lus la byug /gu gul nya mkhris gla rtsi dang / /sgog pa shu dag dri chen rnams/ /bdug pa byas te yang na bkru/
@#/ /gser g.yu byi ru mig ma phug /btsan dug rma bya'i mkhris par bcas/ /bcangs na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las rten 'brel rdzas kyi
le'u ste dgu pa'o// //rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las dum bu dang po bstan pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir/ /drag
sngags 'di dag brjod par bya'o/ /oM A ra Na sod sod/ mA rA Na bying bying / mA ra Na rmugs rmugs/ mA ra Na hal hal/ mA ra Na dun dun/ mA ra Na myos myos/ mA ra Na myos bying thum ril dzaH
mi tshig spangs te drag sngags 'di/ /dbugs ma shor bar sbub mas drangs/ /bum par bstims nas rtags thob nas/ /'thungs sam bkrus na dngos grub 'thob/ /sngags la gang ming sbyar
byas nas/ /yungs kar gdug pa'i phur pa la/ /brjod de las la sbyar gyur na/ /gang la bzlas pa brlag par 'gyur/ /ma bsgrubs lan cig brjod pas kyang / /dngos grub thams cad thob
par 'gyur/ /ma byung mi 'byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las drag sngags khros pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag
lha bskyed drag sngags bzlas/ /dgod pa tshang ba'i bum pa ste/ /mi dmigs baM las rin po che'i/ /bum pa tshul dang mthun par bsam/ /de nas baM dang laM las ni/ /chu dang sa yi dkyil
'khor bsam/ /lha bsgoms khyad par bum pa 'dzin/ /mchu ni rdo rje'i sbu gu ste/ /de nas sngags kyi 'od zer 'phros/ /phyir 'phros gdug pa ma lus bsreg /'od zer lcags kyi sbub mar drangs/ /bum
par khro chu khol mar 'gyur/ /de 'thungs bkrus pas gang gnod pa/ /rdul du brlag ste dag par bsam/ /brtsams pa'i las la the che ma med/ /rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las bum pa khros pa'i le'u ste
bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag lha bsgom 'khor lo bskor/ /ro ras byi dug bya rog sgros/ /khru gang tsam gyis mtshan nyid la//
'chi bar byed pa'i snag tshal/ /'ug pa'i sgro rtsa g.yas pa yis/ /drag sngags mnyam pa'i re'u mig bri/ /de nas mtshan mar gang dmigs gzugs/ /kha dog rigs bzhi nyid du bya/ /de snying
drag sngags re re dgod/ /maN+Dal gtsang ma dris byug ste/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser dang ljang / /rma bya'i sgro yis brgyan byas te/ /lha bsgom khyad par 'khor lo 'dzin/ /'khor lo bskor
ba'i rim pa ni/ /drag sngags mnyam pa'i 'khor lo bskor/ /sngags ni/ nA ga tsakra mA ra NA hUM phaT/ gang bsam 'di la the tshom med/ /rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las 'khor lo
khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag lha bsgom phur pa gdab/ /lcags sam seng ldeng dug shing la/ /
@#/ /sngags grangs mnyam pa'i phur pa bsham/ /'khor lo'i mtha' ma bskor te dgod/ /lha bsgom khyad par phur bu 'dzin/ /drag sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa ni/ /nA ga
badzra kI lA ya mA ra Na hUM phaT/ sngags grangs mnyam pa'i phur pa bsham/ /brtsam pa'i las la the tshom med/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las phur pa khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //
de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag lha bsgom sbyin sreg bya/ /gdug pa'i shing bu khru gang tshad/ /sngags kyi grangs kyang mnyam par bya/ /sngon dmar skud pas rim
gsum dkri/ /bar der 'khor lo'i srog rtsa gcad/ /lag tu gri thogs drag sngags brjod/ /nA ga tik+Sh+Na che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ /rin par bgrangs te g.yas gzhi'i khud//
byang shar mtshams su rnam par gzhag /de nas maN+Dal dbus nyid du/ /hom khung brus te dug khrag byug /nang du ho ma du gzugs par bya/ /'khor lo gris gtubs thogs nas
ni| |grangs dang mnyam par bsreg par bya/ /mi de yugs sa'i khyim nas bslang / /lha bsgom khyad par me dpung 'dzin/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa 'di/ /nA ga tsit+tA dz+wa la raM/
mA ra ya phaT/ bsregs nas las brtsams 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las me dpung khros pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //
de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag lha bsgom mnan bsngags bzlas/ /chu srin sram mam byi ba'i mgor/ /bsregs ba'i thal ba bsdus byas la/ /gang yin nyid kyi sbyor ba bcas/
lha bsgom khyad par ri rab 'dzin/ /drag sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa ni/ /nA ga stam+b+ha ya nAn/ mnan byas chu srin kha ru bsgom/ /'di byas gang la bzlas pa brlag /'di la the tshom mi
bya'o| |rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las ri rab khros pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //rdo rje bde khres kyi rgyud las dum bu gnyis pa'o// //de nas mngon par
bshad bya ba/ /glang po'i pags par 'brug bris nas/ /gang ming bcug ste drag sngags bzlas/ /gnam lcags 'bab pa bzlog par 'gyur/ /'bru yi pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /klu yi
gzugs rnams bris pa la/ /bstim nas drag sngags rgya ba gyur na/ /gnam chu dus su phebs par 'gyur/ /thod par e bris sngags kyis bskor/ /gang yin bcug la
bstims pa la/ /drag sngags gang yin bzlas byas na/ /myur du 'grub par gdon mi za/ /srog chags 'jigs par gyur pa la/ /'chi ba'i chu yis drag sngags bri/ /'jigs
byed bkug ste de la mchod/ /de nyid yungs kar thum por 'debs/ /gang la btags pa bsrung ba'i mchog /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las/ las phra mo'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //
@#/ /de nas de dag la 'khor rnams mngon par dga' ste| bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bstod nas rjes su yi rang ba phul te mi snang bar gyur to//
mnyam pa chen po la bzhag pa'o/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las dum bu gsum
pa rdzogs so// //mchog tu gsang ba'o/ /dz+nyA na kA ras bsgyur ro// //
